1b1(rnying rgyud): chag nga / na gas / ba slad du/ bab rgyab rgya kyis byab bcom ldan 'das dang
1b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba
1b3(rnying rgyud): sapa nga da/
1b4(rnying rgyud): gas pa dang / dbang thug dang / gzugs kyis 'jigs par byed po/ gsum po dang / drag shul can dang / dregs pa can da / cad dang /
1b5(rnying rgyud): pa da// bdage myung du 'du ba byed pa/ bdabar gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dang po de kho na nyid las byung ba/ byang chub sems dpang sems dpa' chen po
2a1(rnying rgyud): na nakla das lta smosasu /
2a2(rnying rgyud): 'an/ smra
2a3(rnying rgyud): na
2a4(rnying rgyud): 'ad dug sa ga
2b1(rnying rgyud): bam ldan 'dus dasangs rgyas kyi zin las mdzad pa'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas/ nyid kyi thugs thugs ni ba chos nyid de bzhin lam ma g.yas kyang gdul bar bya ba'o yul drag shus can rnams la gzugs nas/ phyogs bdun pa ma kha'o ma dang/
2b2(rnying rgyud): dang mata me pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa rnams cad du su'i rnam par 'phrul pa bas ma gyis mi khyab pa khyo chen pa'i gzugs 'di lta ste/ su mdag mthong nag zhal dgu pa la/ g.yas kyi zhal rdi lam nag gtsigs pa/ byin 'i
2b3(rnying rgyud): da brdzug pa/ dngas kyi zhal ni mthing nag khro zhing rnam pa/ phyag g.yas kyi rdo rje 'bang bas g.yon gyi thod khrag da krug cing gas la ba/ g.yas 'og ma brgyad na lha chen po bskal ba'i gog cad de bsdams la/ ga gas
2b4(rnying rgyud): chen po byed gyi mgo bsdams pa/ de dag kyang g.yang gzhi dang bcas pa/ gapas kyi spun dgu gyen la bzlog pa/ g.yon gyi lhan dgu phreng la gzigs pa/ dbus kyi spun dgu yung la spang mig mang de pa/ khrob byed drug do dpral bar dbus pa
2b5(rnying rgyud): gang nas sred pa'i drung rdzog pa rngu pa/ kA la nas mas pa'i ma 'ab ba/ mchab dmang pa'i snang khams su gtsigs pa/ smang chug tsam ldan bzhin du gte ba/ dbumalal pa khas na ma pa'i mang 'du la ya /
2b6(rnying rgyud): nus gdug pa'is chen pa byin pa/ sbrul gyi dran pas yan lag dbes pa/ bdud dang zlardza nga sra pa dngad glang po che pags pa na ba zar gsol ba/ stag gi pags pas su sgrad dkris pa/ khrag dang zhag ga zag le dang mo brtan pa/ thal
2b7(rnying rgyud): kyis dus pa thugs pa/ thod pa sam padi ldan pa dang / gzug byed kyis thong ba rgya nam brgyan pa/ gabs brgyad byas tshangs pa dang pa jug dang dang drug can pa dang / brgya bye zung ma dang bcas padag sadan pa/
3a1(rnying rgyud): rab tu ga tu ma mo 'jigs byed pa rang gi sku dang mtshungs pa zhig dang mnyam par sbyor ba/ grangs med cing brjod kyis mi lang ba bye ba til gyi gang bu bzhin du gyur pa thams cad kyang / oM badz+ra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ ces bya
3a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i gsung sgra drag po 'byin pa/ de dag re re las kyang sprul pa dang sprul pa'i yang sprul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu snang bar mdzad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dregs pa can lha'i tshogs dang / bdud dang / gshin rje dang / srin po dang / gnod sbyin dang /
3a3(rnying rgyud): gza' bdud dang / klu dang / rgyal po dang / ging dang / ma mo chen mo rnams dang / mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang / ru tra dang / mu stegs dang / srog gi bdag po dang / nor gyi bdag po dang / tshe'i bdag po dang / sngags kyi bdag po dang / srid pa'i bdag
3a4(rnying rgyud): po dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / dur khrod chen po dang / yul chen po dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi mtha' 'khob kyi sa dang / re'i rgyal po dang / ri phra mo dang / rgya mtsho dang / chu bran dang / yongs su 'du ba'i shing dang / nags tshal
3a5(rnying rgyud): chen po dang / gnas phra mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dgu na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can po dang mo'i rnam par 'dug pa dang / gtso bo dang 'khor dang khyad par rgyu ba dang / bran dang g.yog gi tshogs dang bcas pa dag gis/ rang rang gi gnas nos
3a6(rnying rgyud): myur ba dngang zhing skrag la 'jigs pa dang yang ba'i sems dang / dul pa'i sems kyis 'thon te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar rlung drag po'i shugs kyis rab tu bskyod pa'i shing bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du rang dbang med par lhags par gyur te/ phyogs
3a7(rnying rgyud): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa dang / khyad par du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na gling bzhi dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / rol pa'i chu klu'i gnas dang bcas pa/ ri rab chen po dang / ri bdun gyi gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang / lhang gnas 'dod
3b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang bcas pa dang / dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol song gi skye gnas na gnas pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa'i cha na gnas pa'i dregs pa can rnams so so nas rang rang gi
3b2(rnying rgyud): mdun na drag po chen po'i sku gzi byin dpag tu med pa/ gzhan dag gis nye ba'i thugs mi thub pa re re 'dug pa mthong ste/ de dgra thams cad tha dad du rang rang gi sde dpon chen po rnams la skyabs su 'gro bar byed do// sde dpon chen po rnams ni
3b3(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed chen po'i sku gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la rang gi 'khor dang bcas te skyabs su 'gro bar byed de/ thams cad kyi rang rang gi gzugs dang longs spyod dang 'khor dang / rgyan dang bzhon pa dang gnas dang nye bar bde bar spyod pa phrin las khyad par
3b4(rnying rgyud): ma lus par bstan cing / ming gi snying po rnams mngon du phyung ste smras so// ma hA de ba e dzaH/ u ma de be e dzaH/ b+hu dra ma du phrag dzaH/ dun+ti ma du dzaH/ zhes 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug chen po yab yum bdud pho mo dang bcas pa rnams kyis rang rang gi
3b5(rnying rgyud): ming phul ba'o// de nas gshin rje'i ded dpon rang gi tshogs dang bcas pas rang rang gi ming dang srog dang bcas pa phul ba/ hrIHsh+lo kr-iSh+Na ya maM pre ta dzaH/ ma ma ya mun+ni b+hi tri dzaHzhes phul lo// de nas srin po'i sde dpon rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i ming gi
3b6(rnying rgyud): snying ngo // rak+Shar sha ra ma ti rak+Sha ma shu ti doHzhes phul lo// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i ming dang srog gi snying po yak+Sha ku be rak+Sha ta me yak+Shi ma sha dzaHzhes phul lo// de nas 'jig rten gyi gnod sbyin lha'i sde dpon+da kha ba can
3b7(rnying rgyud): kyi dbang pos rang gi ming phul bi/ ga~M b+ha b+ha tra d+he ba ta ru ti dzaHzhes phul lo// de nas 'jig rten gyi rgyal phran gyi ded dpon lha'i the bcu gsum gyi bdag pos ming phul ba/ gau ta pa sha li ba ra tri saM kar sha dzaHzhes phul lo// de nas spyi bdud kyi sde dpon
4a1(rnying rgyud): gi 'khor dang bcas pas ming gi snying po smras pa/ du s+phu shaM dza a ka ru kau tse dzaHzhes phul lo// de nas ye shes dang las las grub pa'i dang dam tshig gi tshogs kyi bdag mo srid pa dbang sdud ma dang / ral pa gtsigs dang / mkha'
4a2(rnying rgyud): 'i tshogs kun gyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po phul ba/ ma ma trag mu tra ra tsa e ka dza Ti ru ru ro tin+da b+hat+to re hu ma ti kha mun+d+ra pa co la me sha dzaHzhes phul lo// de nas 'jig rten gyi lba ba tsan po dang / ru tra'i rigs kyi ded dpon chen po rnams kyis rang rang gi ming
4a3(rnying rgyud): pa a b+hi shu tre ru dza ni dzi haM shaM tri dzaHzhes phul lo// de nas 'jig rten gyi bgegs kyi rgyal po dang / mu stegs byed pa dang / bdud dmu ba'i tshogs kyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po/ bi nA ya ka tir+thi ta ka du mun mun pa tho zhes phul lo// de nas 'jig ste
4a4(rnying rgyud): bdag po dang / gnod sbyin klu'i bdag po rdo rje can dang / bla'i rgyal po chen po dang / lha'i dbang phyug nag po chen po'i tshogs kyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyis rang rang gi ming gi snying po/ ging+ka ra tri pa le rA rdo badz+ra bu Ta lu rdo badz+ra la ru'i jo ma hA kA a ya 9
4a5(rnying rgyud): sa phul lo// de nas 'jig rten gyi klu dang gza' skar gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyis rang rang gi ming gi srog gi snying po phyung ba nA gtsi ta he ya nA ga me k+She tre hu la g+hu he pa sha mi ki hrI dzaHzhes phul lo// gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dregs pa'i dbang
4a6(rnying rgyud): ngas pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa dag gis rang rang gi lus dang srog dang bcas pa/ e a n+di dzaHsa ma ya srog breng phreng dzaHdzaHzhes phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa can 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dbugs phyung nas mi 'ji ga
4a7(rnying rgyud): pa byin te 'di skad du/ kye ma 'jig rten grags pa'i tshogs// khyed rnams nga lam 'jigs shig/ nga ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi phrin pas bdag/ chos nyid zhi ba chen po yi// thugs rje dang ni ye shes kyis// dus gsum
4b1(rnying rgyud): byas 'dus ma byas// skad cig nyid la mngon du gsal// ma 'ongs sems can don gyi phyir// sna tshogs lus kyi gsang ba ston// dregs pa'i sde dpon khyed rnams kyang // thog ma med nas da lta'i bar// nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i dbang gyur te// gnas
4b2(rnying rgyud): ngan len gyi bag chags kyis// lus ngag yid kyis mi dger spyod// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgyun mi 'chad/ na rag chen por lhung nas ni// thar pa'i dus med 'byung srid kyis// de bas da lta'i dus mchog 'dir// nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad
4b3(rnying rgyud): kyis// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // mdzad pa'i phrin las rab son la// bsgo ba'i gsung bzhin nyan par gyis// las dang srid pa don yod la// mi dge'i bag chags dor bar gyis// bslab pa'i gzhi bzung sems bskyed la// mthu slobs nas
4b4(rnying rgyud): pa drag shul dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rjes su spyod// rig 'dzin rnams kyi bka' bzhin skyongs// khyed cag rgyal po rje dpon dang // bran g.yog tshul du lus brten pa// dngos grub gsol zhing phrin las sbubs// gal te de ltar mi byed cing //
4b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i tshig las 'gal byed na// khyed kyi lus sems srog gi rgyud// da lta nyid du ma rungs 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal nas dam pa'i tha tshig la bkod nas bzhag go// 'jig rten pa'i sde dpon gyi tshogs rab tu 'dul ba gleng gzhi'i
4b6(rnying rgyud): le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i dbang phyug chen po yab yum la sogs pa'i dregs pa can gyi 'khor rab tu 'dus pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gsang ba'i bdag po
4b7(rnying rgyud): chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ 'jig rten gnas pa'i drag shul can// 'dod chags zhe sdang sred len gyis// gang gis mchod cing brten byas nas// bdag cag rnams ni dga' mgu rangs//
5a1(rnying rgyud): kyi kang lung rjes badzin du// btu la zugs 'dzin pa de dag la// phrin las stong pa'i grogs bya'i phyir// bdag cags ma'i gnas dang dus// rang gi sde dang 'khor g.yag dpung // mthun pa'i las dang langs spong drung // ma grags
5a2(rnying rgyud): dang bsaza pa dang // lams dang byed pa'i tshul dag dang // dmachog sbyar ba'i khyad par dag/ bdag cag rnams dang ma 'ongs pa'i// rig pa'i tshul 'dzin don phyir ru// ma lus rgyas par bshad du gsol// zhes gsos pa ma/ den pa
5a3(rnying rgyud): kyis 'jig rten gyi dregasamatshan dag sregatso bo dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams// ma so'i las dang gcig tu sbas pa dang // tha dad du sbyang ba dang // nges pa dang / mdzes pa dang / rim pa dang / 'tshal ba dang / byi dang nang dang / gsang ba dang /
5a4(rnying rgyud): gas pa dang / 'thor ba dang / mthun pa'i rdzas dang / snying po dang / mag pa dang / gnyer gtad pa dang / skul ba dang / rbad pa dang / bzlog pa dang / tshar gcad pa dang / gzir ba dang / spogs pa dang / las sna tshogs pa dag gi sgo nas// ros
5a5(rnying rgyud): po'i gsung ba sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dam tshig chen po las phyung ste bka' stsal to// nyon cig 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs// phyi ma'i tshin snyigs ma'i dus// dge sbyong chen po'i bstan pa 'di// so so'i skye bo rnams la snang // nyan thos rang rgyal rnams
5a6(rnying rgyud): grol// rdo rje 'arjod pa rnams kyi sa// byer dag sa ga ma rdzogs la gas pa// sbom med chos spu 'du 'bral med// ting nge 'dzin la skyeng sa pas 'grub// bsam pa rgya skye smon pa yis// rigs drugs po'i bdag por snang // gis kyi rdegs pas byed na sa ni/
5a7(rnying rgyud): jigs shing 'jigs par byed pa yis// gtum zhing dpa' la ches dpa' bas// gdul zhing drag par nus pa las// zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur te// rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bran// phyogs lda dregs tshogs kyin 'dul ba// khams gsum sde la da
5b1(rnying rgyud): phyuphyir byed// nga dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis// las kyi bya ba dang rdzogs pas// dur khrod chen por rab 'jigs pas// byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbenas ru// sgrib byang bsod nams bsags pas dang // bar tshed bdud bzlog las la 'bad// mthun rdzas sa la
5b2(rnying rgyud): pa brang bzhengs// dam tshig drag po'i rdzas kyis bran/ thod mkhar bar mdzod ldan pa'am// e khram grangs dang sbyar bar bya// dregs pa'i lus ngag yid gnas brten// ngas bshad tshul dang mthun par dgong // phyi rol sgo sogs rgyan 'jigs ldan/
5b3(rnying rgyud): dur khrod chen po sngon du phyung // tsa ra ma he chu glang dang // seng ge glang chen rta nag dang // bya khyi lug nag rnga mo dang // stog dang phyo rgod khyi phag gnag/ bdud bya chu sIn ta rus skal// rgod dkar rgod gnag rta dkar dmar// so bya dre'u ba glang rnams// rkyal mtshan
5b4(rnying rgyud): sha khrag snying dang bcas// sde so'i mthun pa'i gnas su bsham// dbu bzang bshos dang dam tshig rdzas// bdud rtsi sha khrag skying sbyar ba// rin chen bcud kyis sbeng ba ni// grangs mnyam yang na phyogs bzhir bzhag/ gdugs dang ba dan bla res dang /
5b5(rnying rgyud): lnga ldi dra pa za ra tshags// 'di la shis shing mthun pas te// stag gzig dom dred 'phrar spyang dang // kAd dur bya bya rgod khra// mi rta bal glang ke le yi// sha rgyas pags pa mgo yis bya// mda' gzhu mdung dang kha T+wA~M ga/ ral gri chu gri sA sri dang // tri
5b6(rnying rgyud): shUl phur pa so mangs dang // mtshon cha drag pos bskor zhing gtams// mdzes dang mi mdzes snyan mi snyen// dri nga ba dang gdang ba dang // kha mngar tshwa skyur rtsub pa dang // tsha grang 'jam rtsub dro drang bsil// gzugs sgra dri ro reg rnams kyis// ji ltar
5b7(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin du gtang // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa des// phyi nang gsang ba'i bsrung ba yis// gnod cing 'tsho ba tshar gcad de// bsod nams tshogs kyi sa rang rgyud sbyang // gzhan phan byang chub sems kyis bsgrub// chos rnams gnas lugs bzhin
6a1(rnying rgyud): dunapa// ma mthong pas snying rje bskyed// thaMd dun pa// de las gnod cigazhi mas// ye shes 'byung ba lnga dubs pa// steng du'i ci kyi// dbus su dung khrod kAzha' med khang // thod pa'ar so tings supa// gzugs parnyad pa'idu ting
6a2(rnying rgyud): skyed/ dbusu su nyi d+ha pad+ma dang // ro bzhi bsnol ba'i steng ting du// rdo rje 'tshong ba'i sku gsung thugs// nga nyid kun la snang bzhin pas ma// yum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul mo// ga tso dang gnyis med myong ba las// thabs dang shes rab 'od zer 'as// se du 'jom pas
6a3(rnying rgyud): tshul// 'phro 'dus kyi lu k+ke kha Sh+Ti gus la// de nyid gsal ba'i rgyu sbyangs pas// 'dod khams dbang phyug gtso ba che// lha mo yum dang bcas par gyur// seng ge glang chen zhabs kyis gnon// zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'thing nag rngam// na bza'i' ljang nag bcwa
6a4(rnying rgyud): bong gsod// goN+Di na kr-i gu ga tsit+ta ba snams// yum kyis kha d+mo bod khrag bzung // ragapa sgra gnyis me zugs gnas// lam/ dr-iH/ rAT+Ta/ phaT las/ phyogs pa nir bdud dang gshin rje nga// hri na sbyin rje dpa dang // rab mun brgyas pags pa /
6a5(rnying rgyud): nA ga/ steng 'og tu ni bdud ku gza'i// rje dpen yab yum sgo zhing bskyed// de ba/ dzadza/ du d+hI/ gang bzang ste dang rna maN+Da la dang / da srong pyo shir du bsnyed// Du maM/ dza ti/ d+hi ki las/ ma chen srad pa'i rgyal mo dang // ral gcig mA dang ma phyogs byed ma//
6a6(rnying rgyud): gas sde dpon lho phyogs su'o// ru tra/ a g+he/ he shaM las/ lha sbyin po tsan dmar ril ba tsan+da gyi// sde po ni nub kyi phyogs su bskyed// bi tA/ ti bi/ rlu du las/ bgegs dang mu stegs dmu bdud rtsi// sde dpon byang gi phyogs su dbyed/ ShI yau/ ra rdzis sbyin tri las/ srid pa
6a7(rnying rgyud): gagi bdege po dang // gnod sde bu tshong du rgyal po// sku phyugs 'ardorje legs// na po rlung ngo // shar blo nu byed rno nir babyed// phyi po khyams su gas pacan/ ma ma gi rog 'khor mang po dag/ 'aka' zhin gsung sngo tshul du skyed/
6b1(rnying rgyud): rang rang sngags kyi sku bstan par bya// dbang po'i tshul du gsal ba dang // 'jig rten rang rgyud so so yi// gnas nas 'od kyis bkye ba dang // gsang ba'i snying pos myur du bod// ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul 'dra ba// rang gi gzugs brnyan lus la bstim// rang rgud pa dang gzugs
6b2(rnying rgyud): tan dzug/ da/ tan / drug sa rdzun gyi nga // m+WA hU~M// kyim sa// 'dzin pa'i rje // ma gsung ba ga man
6b3(rnying rgyud): nang gsang ba'i 'dod yon tshogs// 'tshe zhing gdug pa'i bsam pa can// gzugs can gzugs med bcas pa yis// dregs pa'i tshogs la mnyes par dbul// sku yi cha lugs so so yi// don rtags mthun pa'i tshig gis bstod// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang // phrin
6b4(rnying rgyud): las smos te thugs dam skul// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugs// gsal brtan tshad dang ldan pa yis// nam mkha'i khams kun mthas khyab kun// rang gi yul gsum gsal bar dmigs// dregs pa'i sde dpon re re'i drung // rdul skyed 'dul byed gnyen po gnas//
6b5(rnying rgyud): la pa re re'i gnas drung du// lnga dpon chen po de bzhin bsam// bka' nyan gsung sdod gapo mi nus// cung tsam 'da' bar mi spyod cing // rang gi 'dod pa mi spobs la// skad cig tsam la don sgrub dmigs// de nyid kyis ni gtso chen gyis// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa tshe
6b6(rnying rgyud): rtags ldan// yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas ni// dregs pa'i sde dpon tshogs rnams kyi// so so'i gzugs brnyan gsal btab ste// rang gi ming gi snying po dang // gcod 'phrog yi ge spos te bzlas// dus tshad grangs dang mtshan ma yis// tshad bzung ma nor grub pa
6b7(rnying rgyud): yis// rtags la phab ste las la sbyar// nga nyid rjes su sgrub byed pas// dregs pa myur du dbang du sdud// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten pa'i ded dpon gyi tshogs nye bar sgrub pa'i rtsa ba'i las kyi gnyer gtad ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rab tu
7a1(rnying rgyud): bshad bya ba// 'di dag kun la ngas bshad pa'i// sde dpon chen po rang gnas nas// bod dang gzhug dang mnyes pa dang // bstod dang thugs dam bskul ba dag/ tshig brjod 'di yis bstan par bya// thugs rje rnam dag dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas
7a2(rnying rgyud): chos su stong nyid dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshigs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// khro chen dpa' gtum 'jigs byed skur bstan pa// thugs ngam dgyes bskul gsang ba'i yum dang bcas// ma rtogs shugs kyis 'dul phyir gshegs
7a3(rnying rgyud): su gsol// dregs pa'i dbang phyug 'jig rten lha yi gtso// 'dod pa'i lha mo bde chen 'byung gnas ma// 'khor tshogs drag shul mthu slobs dpung gi bdag/ khro gtum gdug pa'i rjel 'chang dpal dang ldan// rdo rje 'chang gi bka' bzhin rjes su su pa/
7a4(rnying rgyud): dam tshig rjes dgongs gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn+ta a ta na ya e dza b+h+yo/ a gats+tsha sa ma ya hri hring / dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// lha chen nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs su// bcom ldan khro rgyal rngam brjid 'bar
7a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i sku// yab yum dgyes par rol cing bzhugs su gsol// snang srid dregs pa ma lus ded dpon gtso// 'dod khams bdag po dkyis mdzad yum dang bcas// lha srin tshogs kyi gtso chen 'khor dang bcas// srin las mthun pa'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol//
7a6(rnying rgyud): badz+ra sarba duSh+Ta na a ta na ya a dza b+h+yo/ sa ma ya sti ta badz+ra hUM dzaHdus gsum sangs rgyas thugs kyi snying po mchog/ chos kyi sku las gzugs su 'gro don sprul// tshe btsan 'gran zla med pa khro bo'i rje// dbang skad yum dang bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyogs
7a7(rnying rgyud): bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus sras dang bcas// dam bcas bstan pa'i tshul bsrung 'jig rten mgon// zhing bcu sgrol mdzad phrin las drag shul can// sde dpon sum cu'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// badz+ra sarba duSh+Ta na i ta na ya e dza b+h+yo/ na ma A rA li hoH/ dpal chen
7b1(rnying rgyud): dregs pa kun 'dul lab yum la// sku gsung thugs mnyes mchod pa 'dul ba ni// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bdun bla re dang // phreng ba phye ma lnga ldi zar chags// bdug spos me tog mar me chab bsil dang // gzugs mdzes sgra snyan dri zhamar tha dang /
7b2(rnying rgyud): 'dod yon mo lus je snyed pa'i// 'phags pa'i thun mong mchod tshogs pa zhes su gsol// khyad par gsang ba'i mchod pa 'thul ba ni// dus gsum gnas su sbyangs pa'i sha dus khrag/ dug lnga sman du grub pa'i dam tshig rdzas// stobs mi tshig nus pa pa'i
7b3(rnying rgyud): rlo nga sa nasu na
7b4(rnying rgyud): sa ng+gA sa / / nga na /
7b5(rnying rgyud): na / skye
7b6(rnying rgyud): dag sde da // don da sde dang 'byung ba ste// dbang ba sti dang pA sna dang // mau po lji da nga sgru // 'i no gi yang dung byang du gcod// gdug par sems shing log par ste// me dren phyogs snang ba'i mi pan med// sa par 'dus
7b7(rnying rgyud): mugs pa// bes hU~M nem ti na ya i dz+dzab+h+ya/ me ba na/ oM mr-iH/ mu ti/ m+b+hi/ r-i/ beb te/ bA sa ta/ lam / mau kri rgyas su // gr-ig/ khA khyun/ bcom ldan pal chen dregs pa kun 'dre dang // bres chen khanas gsun m+bu'i
8a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor bcab kyi// sku mdog 'gyur med me long gzugs brnyan bzhin// gsal zhing rtog med snang ba ma 'gags pa// sgra lnga lhun grub rdzogs pa'i dngos grub gsol// gsung mchog 'gag med brag rgya sgra brtan bzhin//
8a2(rnying rgyud): mi stan grag stong tshangs pa'i gsung // gsung dbyangs nam mkha'i mthas khyab dngos grub gsol// thugs mchog spos bral bas ma 'das chos kyi dbyings// mi rtog bde chen thabs dang shes rab dang // rtsol med me g.yo mchog gi dngos grub gsol// yon tan
8a3(rnying rgyud): kyis mi yang sna tshogs yod// 'das dang ma 'das mchog dang thun mong gi// grub pa brgyad dang mthar thug dngos grub gsol// 'jigs pa brkyang sogs zhi dang 'byor pa rgyas// log lta mos pa'i tshul gyis dbang du sdud// mngon spyod dgra dgegs 'dul ba'i
8a4(rnying rgyud): dngos grub gsol// badz+ra sarba duSh+TA nA a ta na ya e dzo kA ya sid+d+hi/ bA ka sid+d+hi/ tsit+ta sid+hi/ gu Na sid+d+hi/ kar+m+ma sid+d+he/ hUM hUM hUM/ bcom ldan dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul ni// dbu dgu phyag ni bcwa brgyad de// sku mdog mthing nag khro zhong rngam// g.yas kyi zhal
8a5(rnying rgyud): gsum smug nag bgrad// g.yon gyi zhal gsum kham nag gtsigs// dbu ska ral pa me dpung 'bar// spyan dgu sdang mag bzlog cing bgrad// shangs nas srid pa'i rlung nag 'thor// snyan nas stong gsum 'breg sgra 'dir// sla ra ag tshom me ltar 'bar//
8a6(rnying rgyud): mche gtsigs srid gsum rtsa ba gcod// phyag dgu g.yas g.yon dang po yis// rdo rje thod khrag dkrug cing gsog// g.yas kyi phyag brgyad 'og ma na// dregs pa'i lha brgyad bsgral ba yi// g.yang gzhi mgo bor bcas te bsnams// g.yon gyi phyag brgyad
8a7(rnying rgyud): 'og ma na// klu chen brgyad kyi b+han d+ha ru// dregs pa'i snying khrag bkang nas gsol// dpa' bo'i chas brgyad sku la rdzogs// zhabs brgyad brkyang bsku mdor stabs kyis// khams gsum bdag po sde bzhi mnan// yum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul ma// zhal
8b1(rnying rgyud): gcig phyag gnyis mthing dag cu// rdo rje 'phyar zhing thong khrag stobs/ gnyis med dathugs kyi drin las kyis// 'jig rten dregs bza du 'khob// g+ha srin sde bcad las la 'gyed// dgra bgegs gdug pa kyang nas gtsang // khra rgyal gcol phyag 'jal bstod// dang
8b2(rnying rgyud): bka' bzhin pas mngod pa'i// lha ni nung bang phyug chen po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis su mdog ma n+ting // sngag+sa gams bug ci nagayon// lha ma~M ul ng+ge ba ni// skye ma dog la khring dag gtsal 'drad// phyag g.yas rje gsum zong khrag g.yon// seng gi glang zin bdun
8b3(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// sde dpon dregs pa kun gyi gtso// yab yum sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdud kyi rgyal po'i sde dpon ni// khram shing g.yas la dgra sta g.yon// bdud rta nag po'i khri la bzhugs// skor yum bdud mo re ma ti// khum bam g.yas la nAd rkyal g.yon//
8b4(rnying rgyud): byAb+ha dumar gdan la bzhugs// gshin rje'i ste dpon chen po ni// be cod g.yas la thod dbyug g.yon// sbyor yum gshin rje za byed mo// phyag gnyis srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor// yang yum ma he chu skyong gnon// sbyidz+nyA po'i sde dpon ldog phreng can// phyag
8b5(rnying rgyud): thog par 'dril zhing 'phen// srin mo sbal mgo khrag mig ma// phyag g.yas phung ba khrag por g.yon// phab yum 'brug dang rnga mo gnono// gnod sbyin sde dpon me dpal ni// phyag g.yas rin ched g.yon ral gyi// sbyor yum gnod sbyin nag mo ni// phyag g.yas
8b6(rnying rgyud): skra gri g.yon spyang mo// stag seng phag mo zhabs kyis mnan// gza' bdud ded dpon chen po ni// phyag g.yas mda' gzhu g.yon sbrul zhags// skye sdang sbrul 'khril 'brug chen gnon// sbyor yum thog gi bu yug can// g.yas g.yon phyag gis
8b7(rnying rgyud): thog ser 'bebs// klu rgyal ded dpon chen po ni// phyag g.yas sbrul zhags g.yon nad rgyal// sbyor yum klu mo nag mo ni// sbrul migo phyag mtshan yab kyi tshul// yab yum chu srin rus sbal gnon// phyogs bzhi steng 'og gnas bzhugs pa'i//
9a1(rnying rgyud): dregs pa'i dang dpon 'di dag ni// kun kyang snga ma dag mthing nag la// khros pa'i cha byad 'jigs tshul can// dur khyod ga yang gzhi'i rdzas kyis brtan// rang gi rdzogs 'dus phrin las mdzad// yab bum bcasA la phyag 'tshal ba rtang
9a2(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin lha yi rgyal po ni// shaM pa gri bden dekar po 'dzin// rgod dkar ru bzangs zhabs kyis marnyan// gnam rgya'i chen po dang dpon de// phyag gags ldan dka ga yon shel gyi// rta dkar rngog dmar zhabs kyis mnan// spyi bdud rtul po ru ra
9a3(rnying rgyud): b+hag g.yas pa dan g.yon shel gri// zhabs gnyis rdo rta gro bo gnon// dkar po'i ded dpon chen po gsum// shar phyogs gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod// srid pa'i ma mo ded dpon mo// 'khor lo g.yas la me long g.yon// zhabs gnyis 'brung mo mdo/
9a4(rnying rgyud): dgu gnon// sngags kyi srung ma chen mo ni// tsit+ta g.yas la spyang mo g.yon// dre rta nag mo zhabs kyis gnon// mkha' 'gro nag me mgyogs byed ma// tshwa zhags g.yas la mtshon grug g.yon// so bya nag mo zhabs kyis gnon// nagra mo'i nged
9a5(rnying rgyud): dpon ma mo gsum// lho phyogs gnas la phyag 'tshul bstod// rdo rje bdud 'dul nag po ni// g.yas g.yon phyag gis thun khrag 'phen// brag btson srog zan dmar po ni// mda' gzhu 'phen zhing dAr dmar 'phyar// che btsan 'gong rgyal chen po ni/
9a6(rnying rgyud): shung lang dang ni zhags pa 'dzin// dmar po'i ded dpon rgyal po gsum// kun kyang rta dmar zhabs kyis gnon// nub phyogs skyong la phyag 'tshal bstod// bi nA ya ka bgegs kyi rgyal// phyag g.yas kha T+wAM g.yon thod khrag/ phyi rol skyong ba'i mu stegs
9a7(rnying rgyud): gcoH/ tri shUl g.yas la thong khrag g.yon// dbu bdud chen po phrag med ni// mdang gzhu dang ni shang lang 'dzin// dge po'i tshogs kyi deng dpon gsum// bdud rtsi nag po zhabs kyis gnon// byang phyogs gan pa la phyag 'tshal bstod// tshangs pa'i rgyal po srog ni/
9b1(rnying rgyud): bdag/ spu gri gapas la nyi zhags g.yon// seng ge dkar po zhabs rgyas gnon// bdud kyi rgyal po nor gyi bdag/ bdud zhugs g.yas la spu gri g.yan// ban glang sna rings zhabs kyis gnan// su lha'i rgyal po yul sti bdag/ phyug gralas rdo rje g.yon pa dran//
9b2(rnying rgyud): dkar gnam ru zhabs kyis gnon// nug po chen po tshogs kyi bdag/ phyag g.yas be con g.yon thod khrag/ rta nag mgyogs pa zhabs kyis gnon// phyogs kyi sde dpon chen po bzhi// sku mdog dkar sir dmar nag mdzes// sgo bzhir gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod//
9b3(rnying rgyud): sde dpon dregs pa 'di dag ni// khro zhing gtum pa'i tshul 'chang zhing // na bza' g.yang gzhi 'jigs pa'i chas// sna tshogs mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ldan// rang gi 'khor g.yog tshogs kyis bskor// sprul pa'i tshe 'phrul bsam me khyab// mchod bstod chen pos khyed bsdu
9b4(rnying rgyud): na// so so'i tshogs 'dul phrin las mdzod// zhes brjod ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// dregs pa'i ded dpon mchod cing bstod// 'di ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'jig rten gtso bdag gzhung bzhin bsgrub// rdo rje 'dzin dang gnyis su med// zhes bka' stsal ti/
9b5(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gyi ded dpon nye bar bsgrub pa rdo rje'i dam tshig mchod bstod kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// 'jig rten dregs pa dbang sdud cing // tshar gcad las la skol ba'i phyir// byin brlabs gnas pa'i dbang bskur bshad//
9b6(rnying rgyud): gsang zhing dben pa'i gnas drag tu// sngar bshad las kyi pho brang ba sham// yo byad rdzas kyi khyad par 'phags// ma lus par ni gzung bar bya// rdo rje 'chang ba rjes 'bring bcas// mtshan nyid ldan pa mngon sum sbyar// dus kyi grangs dang mtshan ma'i rtags//
9b7(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa'i lung bzhin brtson par 'bad// gzugs brnyan bdag po slob ma rnams// khyad par gnas pa'i sta gon bya// bris dang rkos pa la sogs pa'i// sde dpon rnams kyi gzugs brnyan dang // phur po grangs dang mnyam par dgram// gzhan yang bum/
10a1(rnying rgyud): mdun 'dang/ gas rnams sa// na na na / yu // la sa sa ba / rna
10a2(rnying rgyud): rtse chu 'gros ma byed bstod bya// rgyu dang mdangs kyi sa thugs dam pazang // bra shugs dral gzugs srung dbab pab+h+yAM/ mos shing spris bdag drang ba yis// bdang 'dul gtsol skabs su 'gro// bstan pa bsrung bar sems babyed de// zlas bangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin/
10a3(rnying rgyud): du/ dang gnyis med la// gdug byed log lta 'dul nus pa'i// mthu dbang chen po'i gzhung 'tshal gyis// brtse ba'i thugs kyis dgongs nas ni// dkyil 'khor dam par gzhug tu gsol// nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi bu// dus gsum sangs rgyas su gsung thugs/
10a4(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// spobs 'jug pa khyod lags kyis// mngon spyod brtul zhugs dam pa yis// dam tshig chen po'i sar 'dug shog/ mgon po he ru ka dpal rje// 'dul ba'i 'khor tshogs bcas pa yi// drag shu la spyod pa'i pho brang du// mdzes pa'i me
10a5(rnying rgyud): tog bdag dbul gyis// rdo rje dam tshig 'di bzhe sa la// dregs pa 'dul nus dngos gru'i gsol// pra ti gr-ih+Na pud+d+ha trA~M/ dpral ldan rdo rje 'chang ba yi// rjes 'jug rigs kyi bu khyod ni// thog ma med nas da lta'i bar// bstan pa bsrung ba'i ska/ la ldan te// sde dpon dbang chen
10a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i khe 'a du// sbyina'i ba dga'i sengs kyis skyes// 'jalas su yi bad+gal cig zu bra bre shas Ta/ rdo rje du bye sa cig rje// 'di la mdus gsusung dang mi bya// sabye ba'i 'bras bye gan ste don te// rdo ba 'dzin mi bang 'grus de cig/ mi smras pa sa sa
10a7(rnying rgyud): ni kun mi 'dzi pa pa 'dzin ma/ rjes rtag tu byin pargya phyir/ 'a rdzogs pangs rgya'i gyi bar/ mi nga grub byung drug pa/ bas ma'i bya / thos mongs rgyas sri bcas bya// rjes su sgrubye pa 'angs
10b1(rnying rgyud): na gyis// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// lha dang dregs pa mthu stobs can// gtso dang 'khor du bcas rnams kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi dmatshig dgongs// rdo rje slob ma rig 'dzin la// dbang bskur dngos grub co la mdzad pa// nus chen rtags mtshan
10b2(rnying rgyud): bstan du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan gyis// khri sman chen po'i steng 'dug la// snod ldan slob ma mdun bzhag ste// dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i bum pa yis// sku gsung thugs su dbang bskur bya// gnyen po gtso dang gdul bya'i yul// dregs chen yab yum ngal
10b3(rnying rgyud): ba // mdzes pa'i sku gzugs sku yi dbang // so so'i tshig bstod snying po dang // smon lam bcas pa gsung gi'o// rang rgyud gnas dag don rtags kyis// chos skur dbang bskur thugs kyi'o// rigs sbyangs stobs la ngang gis gsal// phur ba drag shul rdzas kyi dbang //
10b4(rnying rgyud): tsod gtor ba shos pa spug sung thugs// ma lus mnyes par byed pas te// yo byeng tshogs kyi longs spyod sbrel// rgyal mtshan po den sgra dang 'acas// dus rnams kun du mang 'thung rgyas// sha khrag drug gtor thun rdzas rnams// dregs pa'i did dpod dbang spyad cing //
10b5(rnying rgyud): las bskul 'dzad de// mngon spyod gdug pa tshar gcad dbang // 'di dag kyang ni gzugs brnyan sba// don ngo shes pas dbang bsgyur te// chos kun spyi dang dregs pa yi// sde dpon so so'i dam tshig rtsa la// thugs rje dang ni rtogs pa yis// rang bzhin don gyis sgro la bye
10b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i// de pag byed don chen 'dir 'dus te// za dang mi gnas cig yin no// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyis// phyi nang 'khor bcas so sor snang // ma lus dbang bsde zil mnan phyir// so so'i snying po tshad kyis bskyis// nga rgyal brtan po mdun du skyes// na
10b7(rnying rgyud): sha rus khrag sogs bza'// ngag gsum tshar gcad dbyings nas dbyung // gzugs brnyan bstims la rab tu gas la// dbang bsdu las bcol 'dul ba'i phyir// zhibs 'og mnan te bran bzhin bsgo// dam tshig rdzas mchod sngar bzhin gso// dam tshig da'
11a1(rnying rgyud): cing bstod skal bcol// 'jig rten lha srin khyed rnams kyang // nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// zhal mthong lung bstan mchog stsal ba// srid pa'i sa bon phra mo yis// da rung 'jig rten las la spyod// rang rgyud rtsub mos phan gnod sbyor// da ni
11a2(rnying rgyud): bka' yi dam tshig bzung // ma 'ongs dus na bsgrub bya dang // sgrub par byed pa de dag dang // mnyam par kun la dbang sgyur te// chos nyid rig pa'i rgyal po rdzogs// theg mchog ma 'dres cir yang ston// ma lus myur du rdzogs bya'i phyir// rgyal tshab spyi bor bzhag
11a3(rnying rgyud): gnas pa// kun du bzang ba nyid thob 'gyur/ zhes bkra' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po nye bar bsgrub pa'i rdo rje dmatshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas rab tu ba shed bya ba// dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs mnyes
11a4(rnying rgyud): byA'i phyir// mthun rdzas gzugs kyis bskang pa ni// ri bo'i rtse bo'i chu bo'i mdo// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'du gnas su// skal med yul la mchod sbyin gnas// thod mkher re'u mig dgu sogs sam// yang na gleng bzhi ri rab btsog/ 'bru dang sha khrag sna tshogs pa// rin
11a5(rnying rgyud): na sa ldan ma ti gyu// gas pa bdag pas pa yi// gzugs pan ga 'khor dang bcas// sgras dag phyig mtshan 'dis rdzogs shing // rang gi sung sa bzhin par bzhigs// rlu ngas yang su byas// rjen pa ba phral 'khor bcas bzugs/
11a6(rnying rgyud): pad+ma rimA re'u mig dang po gsum// bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang // gnod sbyin gza' dang klu rnams kyi// sde dpon yab yum 'khor bcas dgod// gnyis po la ni dkar po dang // nag po dmar po nag po'o// sde dpon bcu gnyis gnas su bya// gsum pa'i phyogs
11a7(rnying rgyud): bzhi ru sgo srung bzhi// 'khor bcas ring gi gnas su dgod// za ma gsum mam bzhi pa la// phyi nang gsang bslus pa la// gsang ba'i gter dang drag po sngags// las byed btags chags lha ma srin// sde brgyad gzugs brnyan gnas su dgang // ga
11b1(rnying rgyud): sum nu'i mthun rdzas ni// rang gi gdan nam bzhon pa yi// srog chags gzugs ni lnga 'am bcu// brgya'am stong ngam grub tshad bya// skyes pa bud med glang chen ta// ban g+hu ra lug byar gyi// longs stod skong rdzas sbyar bzhin no// sde brgyad phral pa kun lA ni//
11b2(rnying rgyud): shes ldan mi dang byol song ste// 'dab chags gcan gzan ri dgas dang // sa chur gnas dang dud 'gro tshogs// mthong thos dran pa rnams kyi gzugs// ji ltar nus pa'i grangs kyis bskor// 'di dag bskang ba'i yo byad ni// 'gro ba'i glud du 'bul ba ni// rin chen ngor mi \u0f7f
11b3(rnying rgyud): ldan dang // nam mkha' sems kyi gzugs brnyan dang // sku gsung thugs ldan rgyang bu dang // shing glad yul mkhar mtshon pa drang // skyes pa bud med cha byad dang // rgyal mtshan ba dan ru mtshon rnams// dregs pa so so'i sku mdog dang // mthun pa grangs mnyam gnas
11b4(rnying rgyud): su dgod// mchod gtor bshos cha mar me dang // gling ched chung ngu de bzhin no// bzlog pasad drag po zor gyi rdzas// sbyin pa'i sa la zer bor du// gru gsum mnyam byas dug khrag dang // thun rjes sna tshogs stsal pa dang // gdug pa'i shing gi rtseng phur dang /
11b5(rnying rgyud): d+ha dug thun gtor mar bcas// bzhi brgyad bcu drug sum cu gnyis// ci rigs sbyar te mdzes par dgod// steng du zhing lpags g.yang gzhi 'am// da ra nag tshon skud gdugs kyis dbub// thA ma ra ras bzang yol bas bre// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// gtso chen
11b6(rnying rgyud): cing rdzogs pa dang // dregs pa mchod bstod mnyes byas nas// gzugs brnyan mthun rdzas sngo ba ni// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin nga rgyal ba sar// bdud rtsi mchod skye ma sa rak+ta spring // sha chen spos kyi dri bsung 'bul// rnga chen gling bu rol mo sgra chen bsgrags// mda' tshon
11b7(rnying rgyud): ba dan nag pos g.yab// hUM nga ni dpal chen he ru ka/ gdul dka' ma lus 'dul bar byed// 'jig rten dregs pa zas su za// khams gsum srid gsum nga yi dbang // snang srid 'khor 'das nga yi bran// nga yi bka' bzhin 'dir 'dus shig/ nyon mongs
12a1(rnying rgyud): dang gis dregs pa pi// lha bdud dgashin rje sbyin po dang // gnod sbyin gza' klu rgyal po dang // gang dang ma mo lha btsan dang // rang gi sde dang gapag tu bcas// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mju brdzas kyis thugs dam spangs/
12a2(rnying rgyud): ri rab chen po'i yang stengs nas// lho chen dbang phyug chen po bzhengs// btsun mo u ma de bo bzhengs// na bzang dang nag bir chen gsol// chibs su seng ge glang chen chi bas// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// grangs na po chud po nyar 'gyed// g.yon na po rgyud
12a3(rnying rgyud): la 'khol// 'khor du 'jig rten dregs pas bskor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // rtsal gyi rgyal po seng ge dang // stobs kyi rgyal po glang chen dang // shes ldan mi dang cang shes te// rdeg chen glang dang
12a4(rnying rgyud): 'dod 'jong ba// rin chen lug dang gtsang ldan dang // thos gsang khyi dang mkha' lding bye// khyed kyis bzhes pa'i dkor du 'bul// rin chen can ldan dar mi dang // sems kyi gzugs brlan nam mkha' dang // sku gsung thugs ldan rgyang bu dang // shing ris yul mkhar
12a5(rnying rgyud): mtshon pa dang // pho slong mnga' dang mo glang 'phang // rgyal mtshan ba dan ru mtshon rnams// nyid kyi sku mdog dang mthun pa'i// rnal 'byor rnams kyi klung du 'bul// dam rdzas sbyar ba'i mchod gtor dang // mthun rdzas ldan pa'i bshos tshe dang // skad gsal 'od ldan mar me
12a6(rnying rgyud): dang // rgyan ldan mdzes pa'i glid tshad dang // mdzes pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa'i sgra// zhim po'i dri dang bda' bo'i ro// khyed kyi thugs dam bskrad phyir 'bul// lha chen yab yum 'khor dang bcas// sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs te// mdos gru mdun rdzas bzhed
12a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkor// sna tshogs sbyar ba 'di bzhis la// sangs rgyas bstan pa khyed kyis srungs// dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyod kyis bstod// rnal 'byor su dgra khyed kyis sgrol// slob pa pol bar gcod pa'i// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs rigs rnams// bzhi pa
12b1(rnying rgyud): rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams dang // glo bur gnod pa brgyad cu gcig/ ye 'dro ga sum brgya drug cu'i tshogs// d+hus minA 'chi ba rnam brgyad dang // gashrIs ngan dgum pa bcwo lnga dang // gzugs can dgra dang gzugs med bgegs// rmi lam ngan dang mtshan lta/
12b2(rnying rgyud): ngan pa rnams// zhi dang bsal zhing bzlog pa dang // gdul dang tshar bcad las mdzod cig/ rI rab chen po'i shar phyogs nas// srid pa'i rgyal po gos rje ni// bdud rnams can gyi sde dpon bzhengs// na bzang mthing nag per byin gsol// ral phye nag por
12b3(rnying rgyud): gti sa// spyan mig tu zla 'khyil pa 'dra// rjong pal mtsho ba bla chos gtsigs// slar kha mnag srid rtser 'bar// chibs su bdud rtanag po bcibs// khyod kyi tshang rgyal ston pa ni// khrem thogs bdud sdig yas nas rol// shod thogs rtsis pa g.yon nas 'artse'i
12b4(rnying rgyud): snang srid po 'dud khyod kyi 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskad// shugs spyan rta nag la sogs pa// khyed kyis bzhed pa'i dkor du 'angam// rin chen dur mi la sogs pa// rnal 'byor rnams kyi klu
12b5(rnying rgyud): 'phrul// dam rdzas mchod gtor la sogs pa// khyed kyi thugs dam snying phyir 'phrul// srid pa'i bdud rje 'khor bcus kyis// sngon gyi dmatshig rjes dgongs bya// ji ltar bco ma pa'i las mdzod cig/ bdud mo chen mo re ma ti// mya bdud kun gyi sde dpon pazhing //
12b6(rnying rgyud): dpal ldan nag mo 'dzugs gzugs can// nag mi shi zlog bdud kyi me// su la mthing nag ber rtsen gsol// chibs su bong bu phye dmar chi bas// khyo rje cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// ma bdud 'bum phrag po nyer 'gyed// nug mo stong skyelas lnga 'dzud // Sh+Ta sbyi
12b7(rnying rgyud): bdud mo khyod kyi 'khor// dam chog dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// cing shes bong bu la sogs pa// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam pad // sring pa'i bdud mo 'khor bcas kyis// de ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i
13a1(rnying rgyud): phyogs nas// gshin rje ya ma rA dza ste// gshin rje'i tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog nag po ral pa can// gdug pa'i thod srul g.yang gzhis brgyan// gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags pas dkris// sha za'i dag
13a2(rnying rgyud): thong du bcings// zhal bgrang mche ba rab tu gtsigs// ma he nag po chibs su chibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// gshin rje pho mo pho nyar 'gyed// 'tsho bdag gshin rje btsun mo ste// gsod byed mon mo'i tshul 'dzin cing // gshin rje mo ya rdzi dpon
13a3(rnying rgyud): bzhengs// za byed dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// g.yang gzhi nag mo sku la gsol// chu glang nag po chibs su chibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// yi dgas pho mo las la 'dzud// snang srid gshin rje khyod kyi 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas
13a4(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// ma he chu glang la sogs pa// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // gshin rje pho mo 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar btsal ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i nub phyogs nas// srin po nag po glog phreng can// srin po'i tshogs kyi sded
13a5(rnying rgyud): bzhengs// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// glog dang 'od kyi phreng bas brgyan// 'brag chen bur ba chibs su chi bas// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// srin po 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyed// srin mo gsod byed las la 'dzud// gcan gzan gdug pa phyi nas rol//
13a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor du snang srod srin pos bskor// sprin mo sbal mgo khrag mig ma// srin mo rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog dmar nag 'jigs su rung // lus la khrag gi lha nag gsol// rus sbal dkar po'i thor tshugs can// chibs su dza ma gdong drug
13a7(rnying rgyud): chibs// khyod kyi tshe 'phrul bstan pa ni// srin mo kha'i bar po nyar 'gyod// gdong srin neg mo lus la 'dzud // sdang phreng srin mo 'khor dang bcas// srog gtsod sman pa yang yum 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// 'brug sngon /
13b1(rnying rgyud): ma ma pa gasmra pa// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // sbyin pa pa ma'i 'khor gyis bzud// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i byang phyogs das// gnad sbyi yag med pal can// gnong sbyin dun gyi sde pon bzhengs
13b2(rnying rgyud): srung dog mthing sngon 'bar ba la// me dpung tshub man ba zer gsol// stag seng rngam partsibs su chibs// khyod kyi tshe 'phrul bstan pa ni// g.yas na med pal 'bar ba la// g.yon na dung 'brel phyu ru ru// gnod sbyin stong sde po tir 'gred// um
13b3(rnying rgyud): 'drim l-I las la 'dzud// 'jig rten gnod sbyin 'khor gyis bskor// gnod sbyin chen mo blo mon ma// gnod sbyin bu mo gdug pa can// nag mo rdo rje lcags mchu ma// sman ma rin chen ne'u les brgyan// sku la pa ti nag po gsol// tshems su lcags
13b4(rnying rgyud): phag mo che bas// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// nor 'dzin mo ni pho nyar 'gyed// blo mon nag mo las la 'dzud// gnod sbyin mo ni 'bum sdes 'askor// shan pa gnod sbyin yab yum 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs/ stag seng phag
13b5(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // gnod sbyin po mo 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i steng phyogs su// gza' bdud chen po mi bzad pa// rog ti khyab 'jug rA hu la// gza'
13b6(rnying rgyud): bdud sde dpon chen po bzhengs// mgo dgu spang sbal mgo mangs lus// chibs su 'brug chen glog dargya chi bas// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// 'brug sgra stong gsum ldi ri re// nam mkhab glog 'od khyags sde byugs// gzi' bran rgya skar po
13b7(rnying rgyud): nyar 'gying // thog ser ki kang drag tu 'bebs// gza' bdud stong gi 'khor gyis bskor// gnam sman thog gi bu yug ma// gdong mo rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog dmar skya mdzes pa la// ne bza' gu zu mdzes pa gsol// 'brug sgra glog
14a1(rnying rgyud): // gis 'od ga zhon// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// gza' chen nyi zla klad la bsgom nu skar tshogs ni zhal la 'char// lha sman babum ni ngo nyar 'gyed// gdong zor ma mo las la 'dzud// zor gdong srin mo'i 'khor gyis ban// daza' 'do gdam sman pang yas
14a2(rnying rgyud): dam tshig dbang gis gradas 'dir bzhugs// 'brug chen bur ba la sogs pa'i// mthun pA'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskyad// gza' bdud gdong mo sman dang bcas// ji ltar bcol pa'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po de 'og phyogs nas// klu bdud nag mo mdo
14a3(rnying rgyud): rba rnams kun gyi sde dpon yin/ zhe u stong dung kha nag po la// tsha ba'i 'bu san hi li li// sku spad dug sbrus nag po pa// grang ba'i spel lcong wa la le// chibs su chu srin mgo dgu chi bas// khyod kyi tsha 'phrul bstan pa ni// D+ha rgyal stong ni pa nyar 'chad//
14a4(rnying rgyud): 'bum ni las la 'dzud// klu bdud gdug pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// klu mo yak+Sha nag mo ni// klu bdud la mo'i sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog dud la 'jigs bag can// srul nag gshibs pa'i ral pa las// mdze dang shu ba'i cho tsha 'phro// sba la yi thal ba
14a5(rnying rgyud): bzar gsol// sbal sbrul nye'u tha re ra// rus sbal nag po chibs su chi bas// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// klu rigs lnga yi sprul pa 'gyed// sa bdag gdug pa'i pho nya gtong // snang srid klu mo'i 'khor dang bcas// gdug pa klu bdud yab yum
14a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// chu srin dus sbrul la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // klu bdud pho mo yab yus 'khor// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po mdzes pa yi// 'di ris
14a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'i shar phyogs la// gnod sbyin rgyal po gang ba bzang // srid pa lha yi sde dpon bdengs// mdog dkar ral ka 'bar ba gsol// gnam ru dkar po chibs su chibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// gnod sbyin stong ni pho nyar 'gyeng
14b1(rnying rgyud): lhadamag 'bum sde las la 'dzud// ba dan can ni g.yas nas rol// go mtshon can ni g.yon nas rol// gnod sbyin lha yi 'khor dang bcas// skyes bu gnam rgyal chen po ni// rgyal phran kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' dar zab ber chen gsor
14b2(rnying rgyud): rta dkar rngog dmar chi bas su tsha bas// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// rgyal bran stong ste pho nyar 'gyed// grong rgya phra mo las la 'dzud// ze rgyal phra mo'i 'khor dang bcas// spyi bdud rgyal po gri rum rtsi// mi ma g+ha yi sde dpon bzhengs// sku stod rgya che
14b3(rnying rgyud): klag pa gsol// 'bum bye smad kyi sham thabs can// dbu la shel mog dkar po gsol// chibs su rdo rta gro bo che bas// khyod kyi tshe 'phrul ston pa ni// srid pa'i khyung chen klad na lding // snag seng tshong ma phyi nas rol// sde dpon mched lnga pho nyar 'gyed//
14b4(rnying rgyud): ma sangs spun dgu las la 'dzud// lha ma srin gyi 'khor dang bcas// skyes bu dkar po sde gsum yang // dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// gnam ru rta dkar gro bo chibs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // dkar po sde gsum 'khor dang
14b5(rnying rgyud): bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// bung rim gnyis pa'i lho phyogs nas// ma chen srid pa'i rgyal mo ni// snang sring ma mo'i sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' dar nag ku zu gsol// chi bas su 'brug mo yid mgyogs tsho bas// khyod kyi cho 'phrul/
14b6(rnying rgyud): skyon pa ni// tshogs kyi rje mo pho nyar 'gyed// spyan mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad 'khor// snang srid ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor/ i ka dza Ti ral gcig ma// bka' yi srung ma'i sde dpon ni// sru la na bza' mthing nag gsol// chibs su dre rta nag mo che bas/
14b7(rnying rgyud): khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// srin mo nag mo pho nyer 'gyed// bal mo nag mo lasi la 'khol// ma mo nag mo sna tshogs sbrul// spug nag 'bum kyi 'khor dang bcas// dpal ldan nag mo mgyogs byed ma// mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi sku
15a1(rnying rgyud): dpon bzhengs// na bza' mthong nag gu Ta gsol// chibs su ma bya rog po zhon// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// rigs kyi mkha' 'gro pho nyar 'gyed// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro las la 'dzud// snang srid mkha' 'gro'i 'gyur gyis/
15a2(rnying rgyud): bskor// dpal ldan nag mo sde gsum pang // dam tshig dbang gi sa gnas 'dir bzhugs// 'brug dang dre ta sa bya sogs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // nag mo sde gsum 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol pa'i phrin las mdzod/
15a3(rnying rgyud): bang rim gnyis pa'i nub phyogs nas// skyes bu rdo rje bdud 'dul ni// gnod sbyin du ti'i sde dpon bzhengs// na bana' mtha~Mng nag par chen gsol// ral ba nag po sun ltar gti bas// tshangs sun dre nag sa chebs// zheng ljags gyon pa phrin pa cha
15a4(rnying rgyud): ral chas bgos pa las la 'dzud// snang srid ru tra'i 'khor gyis bskor// btsan rgyal srog zin dmar po ni// srid pa'i btsan gyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku la daR+Sha dkar ras dmar gsol// chibs su rta dmar glog 'bru chi bas// khyod kyi cho 'phrul
15a5(rnying rgyud): ston pa ni// dbu la bse mog dmar po gsol// btsan po kha bzhi pho nyar 'gyed// mgyogs pa sde brgyad las la 'dzud// snang srid dregs pa'i btsan gyis bskor// skyes bu yam shud dmar po ni// btsan 'gong rnams kyi sde dpon bzhengs/
15a6(rnying rgyud): su la zab dmar per chen gsol// chibs su rta dra ma ra yid mgyogs chibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni/ nagayas su bri brdung tshi li li// g.yon na sbugs glu g+ho ru ru// rta zhon stong ni phyin 'bring // srid pa'i btsan 'gong la
15a7(rnying rgyud): dang bcas// skyes mchog dmar po sde gsum ni// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// dri nag rta dmar la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // dmar po sde gsum 'khor dang bcas
15b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i phrin las mdzod// bang rim bzhi pa'i byung phyogs nas// bi nA ya ka bgegs kyi rgyal// log 'dren kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// chibs su rta nag mgyogs pa chibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// rgyal
15b2(rnying rgyud): chen bzhi ni pho nyar 'gyed// phyogs skyong tshogs ni las la 'dzud// snang srid bgegs kyi tshogs kyis bskor// dbang phyug su lang nag po ni// mu stegs tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// chibs su stag
15b3(rnying rgyud): se ma he chi bas// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// sa gzhi kun ni dmig gis 'grengs// bar snang mtshon dang der gyis bkang // nam mkha' glog dang 'od kyis 'gengs// gcan gzan 'dab chags rgyag cing rdzing // mu stegs
15b4(rnying rgyud): po'i 'khor gyis skor// dmu bdud nag mo bkrag med ni// dmu bdud tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// chibs su dmun nag po chibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// da mu bdud 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyed// dmu bran
15b5(rnying rgyud): stong rje las la 'dzud// snang srid dmu yi 'khor gyis bskor// skyes mchog nag po sde gsum yang // dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// stag seng ma he rta la sogs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // phyi rol nag po'i tshogs
15b6(rnying rgyud): dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po mdzes pa yi// bang ri ma gsum pa'i shwar phyogs la// tshangs pa dkar po srog gi bdag/ lha chen gang gi sde dpon bzhengs// srid pa gsum gyi myur mgyogs par// sku la bya rgod thul ba
15b7(rnying rgyud): gsol// chibs su seng ge dkar po chi bas// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// ging chen bcwa brgyad pho nyar 'gyed// ging bdud pho mo las la 'gyed// mi rtar lug bya dang khyi// sgeg dang bya rgod la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // bang
16a1(rnying rgyud): rim gsum pa'i lho phyogs la// gnod sbyin rgyal po nor gyi bdag/ sku la dom gyi skrag pa gsol// chibs su bklung sku rings chi bas// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// skyes pa brgya dang bud med brgya// nyan thos stong dang sngags pa stong //
16a2(rnying rgyud): 'bag seng mon bu bsam mi khyab// stag seng bal glang spri dang sme// mthun pa'i rjes kyis thugs dam bskang // bang rim gsum pa'i nu'i phyogs la// rdo rje mdzes pa zhes bya ba// 'jig rten lha yi sde dpon yin// mthar shel gyi ni bza' gsol/
16a3(rnying rgyud): kun kyang shel gyi na bza' gsol// ra dkar gnam ru chibs su chi bas// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// 'dzin gid bzhi bcu pho nyar 'gyeng // rang gi 'khor sde las la 'dzud// tsa ra bya khyi la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bska
16a4(rnying rgyud): brang rim gsum pa'i byang phyogs la// lha chen nag po chen po ste// bstan pa'i bsrung ba'i sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' ljang nag ber nag gsol// chibs su bdud rta pra nag chibs// khyod kyi tshe 'phrul bstan pa ni// lha dmig phyogs kyi dbugs
16a5(rnying rgyud): cing // lha min g.yul ngo rab tu bzlog/ phyogs skyong dpal mgon las la 'dzud// mi rtar lug bya dang khyi// nag po'i tshogs kyi thugs dram bskang // dregs pa'i bka' nyan sgo srung bzhi// rang gi bka' nyan 'khor dang bcas// dam tshig dab
16a6(rnying rgyud): gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // dbang chen sde bzhi 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// pad+ma rim tha ma'i phyogs bzhin// phyi yi lha srin sde brgyad dang // rlung gi lngaphrin sde brgyad
16a7(rnying rgyud): dang // sa pa'i lha srin sde brgyad dang // gsang ba'i lha srin sde brgyad dang // yang gsang gter gyi lha srin dang // rngag po sngags kyi lha srin dang // las byed myur mgyogs zla srin dang // brtags shing chags pa'i lha srin dang // sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa la//
16b1(rnying rgyud): khyed kyi thugs dam bskang ba ni// shes ldan mi dang cang shes rta// theg chen glang dang 'dod 'jo'i ba// rin chen lug dang gtsang ldan ra// thos gsang khyi dang mkha' lding bya// khyed kyi bzhed pa'i dkor du 'bul// rin chen rgyar
16b2(rnying rgyud): ldan ngar mi dang // sems kyi gzugs ldan ngar mi dang // sku gsung thugs ldan rgyang bu dang // shing glud yul mkhar mtshan pa dang // pho glung mda' dang mo glud 'phang // rgyal mtshan ba dan rol mo rnams// nyid kyi sku mdog dang mthun pa// rnal 'byor rnams
16b3(rnying rgyud): kyi zud du 'bul// dam rdzas sbyar ba'i mchod gtor dang // mthun rdzas ldan pa'i bshos cha dang // snang gsal 'od ldan mar me dang // rgyan ldan mdzes pa'i gling tshad dang // mdzes pa'i gzugs dang snyan pa'i sgra// zhim pa'i dri dang bda' ba'i ro// khyed kyi
16b4(rnying rgyud): thugs dam bskang phyir 'bul// 'jig rten dregs pa 'khor dang bcas// sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs te// mdos grung mthun rdzas bzhes pa'i dkor// sna tshogs sbyar ba 'di bzhes la// sangs rgyas bstan pa khyed kyis srungs// dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyed kyis
16b5(rnying rgyud): stong // rnam 'byor sku dgra khyed kyis sgrol// sgrub pa po la bar gcod pa'i// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs rigs dang // bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nang rnams dang // glo bur gnod pa brgyad cu gcig/ ye 'dro ga sum brgya drug cu'i tshogs// dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad dang //
16b6(rnying rgyud): gshis dran 'gum pa brgyad cu gcig/ gzugs can dgra dang gzugs med bgegs// rmi lam mtshan lhas ngan pa rnams// zhi dang bsal zhing bzlog pa dang // gdul dang tshar gtsad las mdzod cig/ zhes brjod rang gi mthun rdzas bstabs// bskang bzlog gsad dang
16b7(rnying rgyud): gsol sogs// ji ltar 'dod pa'i phrin las bcol// gang la dmigs pa de bzhin 'grub/ zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can gyi sde dpon 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mchod bstod rgya chen po'i sgo nas nye bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas rang
17a1(rnying rgyud): tu bshad bya ba// dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs 'di rnams kun// ngo bo rang rig byang chub sems// ma skyes dbyings las g.yos pa med// 'jig rten gnas dang mthun 'jug cing // mchod dang bstod pas mnyes 'gyur bas// 'jig rten mchod bstod
17a2(rnying rgyud): zhes su brjod// phyi nang gsang ba'i bye brag ste// snang dang srid pa'i dkyil 'khor kun// gsang ba'i bdag po de nyid dang // gnas skabs mchod bstod phyi yin no// dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin las byung // rang gi snang ba dadus pa'i tshogs// dbang po'i yul gyi
17a3(rnying rgyud): spyong dang // gtsang ba'i rtog pa sbyang du'i rdzus// 'dod chags pazhi dang 'bra brgya rtse// gnyis med pa ris tu byed de// ga dram nyas byed cing // nu mong mtshan dang da byang dun/ nges par brtan pa na gag// sems dang thams la btar ni chogs
17a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad ye nas dkyil 'khor che// ma bcos rang bzhin lhun gyis grub// lung nas ma lus 'dus pa las// chos gzhan med de yul nyid dang // yul du 'dzin pa snang ba'i bdag// gnyis med rtogs shing khong du chud// mchod bstod rab tu gsang ba yi// lus la
17a5(rnying rgyud): srul zhing bsgrubs pas sku// 'bru bcu sgra yi 'khor lo gsung // rang grol snying po ma bcos thugs// lha klu gnod sbyin btsan dang bdud// srin po gza' dang mo rigs rnams// dregs shing gdug pa khro zhing gtum// myur mgyogs rmugs shing 'jibs pa dang //
17a6(rnying rgyud): bregs dang dbyings pa so so'i sde// ri rab bshos gtsang rgyan dang bcas// 'bru lug snying rtse tsa ru'i dbyibs// dkar dmar bcud ldan dmigs kyis mchod// pha dang rgyal po grogs dang lha// ma dang rje khol bran lta bu// brten pa rang gi tshul yin no// che ba
17a7(rnying rgyud): dbang gi dngos grub dang // longs spyod 'phel zhing mngag par blang // rgyud 'jam skyabs che bka' nyan zhing // drag rtsal ldan zhing slar mi ldog/ shin tu nye ba yon tan te// rang la rtseb cing 'tshe ba dang // longs spyod mi 'byor mi 'phrod dang // blo bur nad kyis gzir
17b1(rnying rgyud): byad cing // slar ldog bkra shis nyams pa dang // bsgo ba mi nyan don med cing // rang rgyad rtsub cing khengs pa dang // rigs rgyud ma smin kun gyis brnyas// bsam don mi grub mnga' thang nyams// rgyud don sbas pa ma shes skyon// khrims kyi bdag po lta bu'i lha// gan
17b2(rnying rgyud): kyis bcing zhing bsgrub par bya// dbang chen pha dang mtshungs pa'i bdud// mtshungs med grogs dang 'dra ba'i btsan// gnod sbyin khrims kyi gtso lta bu// srin po srog la rgol ba'i gshed// gza' rgod lag yan gzhon lta bu// sdong bu drag sbrul lta bu
17b3(rnying rgyud): klu// mo rgyud dbang chen rje dpon ma// mtshungs ldan de yi gnyen pos bsgrub// khugs su ma bcug bsgo mi nya na// se long gnod med bdud du 'gyur// bcud phur ma thebs slar la ldog/ rang gi rab rol ma bzhar g.yel// lto ba ma dkrugs las mi
17b4(rnying rgyud): byar// log non ma ldan bdag nyid stob// dbang du ma 'dus bsgo mi nyan// gnad kyi man ngag brgyad kyis ni// mchod bstod bsgrub ste phrin las bcol/ zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi zab pa'i mchod bstod gnad
17b5(rnying rgyud): kye la'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya// 'jig rten dregs pa'i sde dpon rnams// drag po'i las la sbyar ba ni// dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas dag tu// rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa sngon song nas// so so'i mthun pa'i rdzas bsar te//
17b6(rnying rgyud): drag po'i las kyi khang pa ni// e dbyibs sum rgya ldan par ba shA ma// gyi nang gserang ba glu gsung thugs// grwanas byin brlab dang bskang dang mchod// spyi dang sa sor bsngags pa dag/ rab tu bde bar 'dod pas dmigs// gzugs smra bsam pa'i nus pa yis// lu
17b7(rnying rgyud): dang lus kyi 'phrul 'khor dang // srog dang brog gi gnyen po yis// sems dang sems kyi ngo bo las// phyi nang kun du bsngags pa ste// 'phro 'du 'od kyis drang zhing dgug/ rang gzhan dmigs pa de la stim// sha lus khrag sogs ma lus bzas// dregs
18a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i sde dpon sku gsung thugs// mya lus mnyes pa 'di yis bya// gang la dgas pa tshad kyis sgrol// ting nge 'dzin gyi brtul zhugs kyis// bul dang myur ba zla yi stobs// 'di la the tshom mi bya ste// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang ba'i bka'/
18a2(rnying rgyud): gal te 'bar bas mngon spyod cing // myur du 'bo bar bya ba ni// da pas chu badring ba'i// sa shing gdug pa 'i byims ldan bcig/ gdom pa rigasung na shan pa dang // gzung ma grogs bral khyim gyi mes// snyir zhing drug ljag mngar ba la// gan
18a3(rnying rgyud): ban+de rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i// gling bye dmyigs te lhag sa dpeg// gtsang la kho bye 'i// drug pa'i tshig gis rab tu ga // dregs pa'i bdag rtsis mo ste// tshi brjod pa da dang bcas pa yis// rgyab cing sbyin pa'i ma bzhin bya// drang grang
18a4(rnying rgyud): papa rdzogs par ba m+b+ha// pal men da ni drag po'i rdzas// gakhrag gsus dang gisod byed pa// / mtshan tha la rin chen gsum tha byig/ rang blang bkra shes bzlog pa 'idzes// nang du 'didri 'phror gyur ba ni// mchog ting nge 'dzin su ste// skyabs cad
18a5(rnying rgyud): sma da byed 'ang // dregs pa 'khor btsag las su dmigs// gzhan pang mtshad rjes ga// gas parnyan byas// rab tu bstan pa'i dmigs pas bstim// 'bru gnas sa dang rgya phyag dang // sra gshor 'bring dang phyung tshul dang // rgya mtsha'i dbus dang lams
18a6(rnying rgyud): rje// mtshon gyis brdegs dang rlung gis bsgyul// bag steng ltung 'a ma rjes 'joms// lugs nas/ ba na 'brel te// bdag pa'i yid bris 'dzin phrang gdapa// gangag byed 'khor dang zas su gtad // ji srid 'i khor ba ma stongs par// bu dbyer mi 'gyu ru las/
18a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas sa dang rje'i sems ma rtogs// 'di ltar 'angon par spyad pa yis// btsun pa baspang phyir gyur pa'i// rjes 'brang log par smra 'ardabs// tsha ga ci la zhing 'dul ba mo// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sdeng pon chen pa'i then
18b1(rnying rgyud): pabartan pa'i las la sgyur ba'i/ lce'u ste bdun pag// / de nas gzhan yang ba shad pa ni// 'jig rten dregs pa rang gi gnang // gsang ba na gang ba drug phul gzus// san bsgras dri drung mas pa dang// na sung du na/ ba
18b2(rnying rgyud): ma he shar de ba gau/ du b+hag dun ti mA la/ ze / bid+d+hi parnam sa yang drug nga shadz+dzaH/ ra tsa lAm dz+dzaH/ ma ma du lumat+ta d+na ti/ kA lA la/ ga /
18b3(rnying rgyud): sang ni rAb trai li A gats+tsha/ dzaH/ bod pa'i sngags so// rje sa du tun a~M ka par sa rba pa sh+tsa e mr-i ta a gats+tsha/ ba lin gr-ih+Na mI sa~M ta gr-iSh+Tha nA ma hA ga Na d+h+wa pa~M gi ga 'ad ljin/ 'di dag snga bas mdzad par 'gyur// sarba swa pr-i pa~M dz+r-i
18b4(rnying rgyud): si rmA chub kyi tha dri bas t+te ra hU~M N+Da mu~MhrI d+hi/ ma hA dz+nyA nasarba d+ha thAg tu kA ya bA r+k+ka mo d+hin / phal gyi sa hA si~Mr+m+ma.A be shA ya a/ ha~Mrab tu ster bas dngos grub blang // sarba sha d+hi la/ t+yad dang b+hi hrI/ 'di sas rab tu da pa ga//
18b5(rnying rgyud): A sna / zlab s+ye kek+She ng+ge d-i patha me ma hU~M rje/ nyis/ de zhes / phrin pa ldan dang / 'dapes migs pa rdzag med// mthar 'tho shing / hrI d+ha/
18b6(rnying rgyud): sa mi sa skyegs na zhes pa khyi sa na pa sa / ngalar dril du pa sto pa/ gas no pa/ ro par ga yi ni sabs pa sa 'thos / da
18b7(rnying rgyud): yaiT+Te/ dmigs pa 'di yis phang bar bya'o// badz+ra udz+dzaT ya phaT ak+Shi sarba b+h+yo bats+tsha// sa ma ya zangs lcags 'azlog/ pha rol nus pa 'di yis 'azlog/ ma hA d+ha ri sha ya/ a b+he sha ye pa~M tsa ye/ dzi rje lo 'otshol po bsaM lugs
19a1(rnying rgyud): dbab pa'o// nA ga grA hi'i kyang zla bra dril hri la/ shar shar/ rin cag ne pro dril shar shar phob phob/ drag pos bzlog cing bsgrub pa'o// ma hA shA ts+tsha bud+d+ha wA sh+yaM ku ru mAr ya dza ya kar+m+ma ma li a mu ki si d+hu su sing+gi kar swa ste hAhA/
19a2(rnying rgyud): na pas thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// mthun pa'i rdzas dang ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi khyad par so sor dbye// gnas skyur dang ni grub pa'i mtha'// snying rje byams pas rab skul zhing // kun du khyab pa'i mchod sbyin bya// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang du bya// drag chos
19a3(rnying rgyud): deng tshar gcod pa'i// las kun rang gzhan don du spad// 'jig rten gnas shing srog dang snying // yi ge gsal bar ring 'byung gnas// mngon du rgyu ba thugs ka ste// ring thung po mo khrag dong dus// chags pang snying srog snying rje gtser// rdo rje pad+ma rA
19a4(rnying rgyud): kAnas// thabs dang shes rab chos can dang // chos nyid las dang 'bras bu yis// mi 'tshong gnad 'tshang bong dang drang // grogs dang ldan pas pas la sbyar// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi las sna chog
19a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i snying po gnad kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'jig rten dregs pa'i gtso chen rnams// tshul bzhin rab tu bsgrub pa yis// grub cing nye ba'i rtags rnams ni// nyams dang ched rtags rmi lam rtags//
19a6(rnying rgyud): sor 'byung 'gyur te// dga' zhing mdengs lta na stobs rnyed dang // bde dang rtogs pa spro ba skyed cing // mngon rgyu yid kyis gdong thob kyis// nyam de bag tsha dogs med cing // nus ldan phrin las mthar byin rtogs// 'di dag la sogs ri
19a7(rnying rgyud): da'abyung // lus 'jam dbugs kyis mi gnod cing // yang zhing brtan la khyad par dga'// nad dang gdon gyis brjo mi nus// 'byung ba'i nus pas mi skyod cing // kha dog dang ldan sdug cing mdzes// 'di la sogs pa lus dbyung gang
19b1(rnying rgyud): ji ltar bsgo ba gzhan gyis 'dzin// rang dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// mthun pa'i tshul gyis mi dor la// snyan dang mi snyan ci brjod rnams// tshangs pa yi dbyangs bzhin du 'ong // grag thos tsam gyis dbang du byed// tshul mdzes
19b2(rnying rgyud): pa dgra gi brda// gang la brtsams pa de 'grub cing // ma zhum mi spor mi 'dor bas// dbang dang ldan zhing mi g.yo la// gsang ba'i mthu stobs rab tu thob// yid kyi yul du brda 'byung ba'i// snga phyi de ma thag pa'o// bag chags ma yin mi la
19b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po mkhan pa slob dpon dang // che brtson rigs ldan rgyan bcas ldan// gcan gzan 'dab chags dud 'gro dang // skyes pa bud med bus pa sogs// rang gi gnas su lhags pa ni// nye bar 'grub pa'i rtags yin no// bran 'bangs mangs
19b4(rnying rgyud): tshul 'chang zhing // bka' bsgo las byed nyan pa rtags// ring ba'i gnas nas glu len cing // rgyang mig blta ba g.yel ba'i rtags// rang la chud pa'i las com zhing // nyes len 'ded pa bzlog pa'i rtags// zas skom 'dod cing 'a
19b5(rnying rgyud): lan bstag/ rang nyid gnod 'gyon ma skongs rtags// 'jom zhing dud mos 'debs byed pa// ma dag lus snang nyams pa'i rtags// rang gi bsgo ba mi nyan zhing // slar zhing tshul la 'khol 'dod pa// gnyen pos dbang du ma gyur rtags//
19b6(rnying rgyud): maman mye rdung zhing tshad ma ldan// nus med bya ba mi 'grub pas// stegs kyi nus pa ma grub rtags// gzhan 'dod rang la med pa dang // rang gi yod pa 'dod med rnams// mchod bskang thun rdzas mtshang rtags// shA rus khrag sa
19b7(rnying rgyud): longs spyod cing // ngo mthon rab tu che ba na// las byas 'grub pa'i rtags yin no// pha rol dmag tshogs ma byung zhing // sgo me khang par bdage zhugs la// ngan sngags gzhan gyis bzlog pa'i rtags// byi brag sde brgyad so so ni// mi dang dung
20a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ 'dab chags sogs// pho tshogs nag po bdud kyi rtags// me tshogs rgyun bzang ma mo ste// che brtson 'bag seng gtsug lag khang // brus bya sgra ste rgyal po'i rtags// mi rta khra spyang ri dgas ni// brag btsan ri btsan rtags yin
20a2(rnying rgyud): no// chu gnas dud 'gro klu yi rtags// ma he ra lug mig mangs dang // mun pa bu yug gza' yi rtogs// skyes pa chas bzang 'byor ba can// ri mtsho la gnas gnod sbyin rtags// nya ba shan pa bya ba dang // dmag gi go mtshan
20a3(rnying rgyud): po'i rtags// 'di dag sngar bshad bzang ngan sbyar// bye brag srub pa'i rtags su 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po bsgrub pa'i rtags kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang rab bsha
20a4(rnying rgyud): dregs pa can gyi khyad par rdzas// mdzes pa'i gzugs brnyan sku yi rten// ming nas bod pa gsung gi rten// phyag mtshan dam pa thugs kyi rten// lug g.yag dkar po sbal sbrel nya// glang rta sngon po rin po che// g.yul bshams b+har
20a5(rnying rgyud): bsgral bya gcan dang // rnal bu shel nag bya nag dang // rta lug khyi dang rgod gnag dang // ra phag bya khyid kar po dang // kla klo rA rog dom khyi gnag/ sbrul nug b+ha rgod ra skyes dang // rta ra bya khyid mar po yi// snying khrag mgo dang rgyal mtshan ni//
20a6(rnying rgyud): k+Sha gnod sbyin sbyin po dang // ma mo bdud dang rgyal po gling // gshin rje gza' dang btson rnams kyi// rim bzhin so so brten bya'i rdzas// rab tu gsang ba'i nyid yin no// e ldan gdug bcas rkyed med kyi// thod pa mtshon cha phur pa dag/ drug khrag
20a7(rnying rgyud): rin chen drag po'i 'bru// kun tshogs rib tugasad pa'i rdzas// klu bzung snod ni sha khrag bcas// ru bzangs rigs med myur song chu// myu gusna tshogs dri ldan rdzas// chu drag dpa' rabs drung pa'i rdzas yin no// mchod rten ri rab rgya gram pa sa// rjes
20b1(rnying rgyud): dgas nganamam tha gsum// dmigs pa'i 'bab rdzas bad+ma ni// slar la bzlog pa'i rdzas yin no// nad gdug pa ril mgo nang rnams// rab tu mnan pa'i rdzas yin+dan// drag khrag tshogs dang mtshan ma ngan// dmigs pa'i rten la daphang bar rdzas
20b2(rnying rgyud): don pa 'i si yi rten khang dang // gdug cing rab tu tshe ba'i shing // 'bru dag drug khrag bsres pa'i rdzas// gzhan yang dbang chen dregs pa'i 'khor// so so'i rigs dang sder bcas pa'i// mthun dang mi mthun gtsang dang sde// bsngags pa'i
20b3(rnying rgyud): A s+ye shes par 'gyur// me tshaM seM sa da rdo rje 'chung // rang gi rig dadzi na byang chub sems// bcu zhugs can gyis 'grub pa yis// dbus dang mtha' 'khyeb yul rnams dang // sangs nas zhing gi 'jig rten khams// dran nas
20b4(rnying rgyud): dben g.yog 'i com pa // nga dang dang mi po'i lus can nams// khams dang rigs pa bas ma pa // stong pa bde ni gnas mi byed dang // ma lus rdzogs par rabs rtogs// shi h+Na migs rnam la rnyed// de dz+nyAnas
20b5(rnying rgyud): badz+re ga tso chen rnams// da lta nga yis gdams pa yin// yang dag don la ma 'da' cig/ khyed rnams kyang ni dus nam zhig/ las kyi gnas ngan len spangs te// byang chub sa la hU~M 'gro yis// de bas bka' yangs mnasaM le// ji ster
20b6(rnying rgyud): dmyigs pa bzhin skabs shig/ gsang chen nga yi bstan pa'i tshul// phyi rol phyogs lnga sogs pa yis// nyams shing sbas par mi 'gyur bas// rgyas shing bstan par khyod kyis byos// ldes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dra bon chen
20b7(rnying rgyud): so'i rten rdzas dang las kyi gter bsgo ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de ba gshegs pa khrims cad kyi spyi dang gsung dang thun ngadag nyid gsang ba chen po'i sgra'i rnam par rol pa chen po de dag nyid kyi sku la
21a1(rnying rgyud): da du/ byags nga g+sa // sa ga rnams// shA ga na ga // du na nas// ba sa rgya dang
21a2(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan pa'i tha tshig sgrub pa dang // rnal 'byor lam gyi grogs mdzad phyir// drag po'i sku gsung thugs nyid dang // yon tan phrin las sna tshogs ston// phyi ma'i dus na rig pa 'dzin// skyes bu brtson ldan rnams kyis ni//
21a3(rnying rgyud): pa / // du sa kyi na 'i sa/ sa pa / su sa /
21a4(rnying rgyud): de nyid zhes bya rab tu blang // dbang gi rgyal po 'char bar 'gyur// gal te dang dregs pa can// so so rang chud ldan pa yis// gnyis 'dzin yid kyis rtog dpyan cing // mtshon mar rab tu sgom byed pa// rkang med khams gsum bgrod 'dod cing // mig med stong
21a5(rnying rgyud): gsum blta dang mtshungs// bdud bzhi dga' ba skyed par byed// de bas rigs mchog ma rnams kyis// gsang ba gang nyid shes par gyis// zhes bka' stsal nas/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po chos nyid de bzhin nyid spros dang bral ba'i dbyings
21a6(rnying rgyud): thim par mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po 'khor dang bcas pa chos sku mthar thug tu sgrub par gdams pa'i le'u stebacu gcig pa'o// // degs pa can gyi sde dpon 'jig rten mchod bstod srub pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// // rgya gar skang du/
21a7(rnying rgyud): bac+doMmad+ha b+hi dus sbyi sa rata s+thA nA ma/ bod snyed du/ drag sngags 'dres pa rdo rje rtsa pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma du spobs kyi bdag po la phyag batshal lo// 'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'ad rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid/ ri rab chen po'i yang
21b1(rnying rgyud): stengs/ lung lo can gyi gnas mchog/ rab tu margyan pa'i pho brang chen po na// yum chen mo dazung ba rtswa'i bdagu po dang / gnyis su med par snyoms par zhugs te/ srulas 'od zer sna tshogs rab tu spros nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gdug pa can dang / dregs pa can dang / gzi brjed can
21b2(rnying rgyud): dang / drag shul can la sogs pa dag gi gnas thams cad rab tu g.yo zhing bskyod par mdzod pas/ de dag gi sde dpon dang bcas 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams/ rlung gi thugs kyis bskyod pa bzhin du lpags pa ni 'di lta ste/ gshin rje tshe bdag nag po chen po yum dang bcas pa dang / bdud/
21b3(rnying rgyud): po byed po pa'i barmangs can da / skye bdud po dag so theg 'jig sa dang / srin po'i rgyal po gsong byed dag mi lcem dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin chen po gang ba bzang po dang/ yum gnod sbyin mo sha za ra la gtsigs dang / lnga'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po dang / ru tra'i bdag po thar ba nag por /
21b4(rnying rgyud): mu rdi btsan po rgyal po chen po dang / phyi rol b+ha'i baidag po kA la nag po dang / khyab 'jug chen po kun du chub dang / klu'i bdag po gzhon nu ga tum po dang / lha'i rgyal po 'i byin chen po dang / gnod sbyin chen po lag chub dang / bdag nyid chen po rdo rje mdzes pa dang / klu bdud chen po yam bud dmar po dang /
21b5(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang lha ma yin dang / za byed dang / yi dgas dang / 'byung po'i tshogs dang / pho nya'i tshogs 'jigs par byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug phyed chen po'i 'khor de dag rab tu 'dul bar mkhyen nas/ dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor mngon/
21b6(rnying rgyud): par sprul par mdzad dI/ nam mapa'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dag/ gzugs su brtan pa rab tu 'degs// sgra ni mi spyan drag cing gsum// dri dri mi zhis rus lcags bsrung // ro ni kha skur tshabar po// reg bya tshe rtsub mi sdu gapyod// zhe sdang chen po'i me 'bar zhing // nga rgyal keng dus phrag tug ta mas//
21b7(rnying rgyud): su gtsun nag rab tu 'thabs// 'dod chags phrag gi chu chen 'brug/ phrag dog rlung ni rab tu 'khrugs// spyir chen po'i longs spyod la// steg gcig gcan ga bani ci spyad dang // kA~M kadur byang dab chags tshogs// sha ze khrag thung rus pa 'joms// ba ma dang rul dang lcags pa dang // khyo
22a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f// tha ba dang gzhag pa dang // zab dang 'ad dang rab tu 'byor// thu ba dang thag su dang badrug pa dang // cad dang nod dang bral ba dang // 'arigs shi gdug dang rnam pa dang // rlol pa'i lto sa smang dab sprul// sun kyang gdug pa'i sems 'a
22a2(rnying rgyud): dang // gsod gi rtsod shig gtu ba lus kyi las// chogasuM ba bdud pa'i nga rlo 'byin// khros pa'i brtu'i lcags ga pa sa// ma lus 'dul zhing tshar gcod pa'o// mngan par gtsad la rab tu bdod// 'di sbyor mthing zhi spang gyur pa//
22a3(rnying rgyud): lja pA las// sems can gcig gi ba sprul// cung ba gnod pa khyong med de// ring gI rnam rtog bde bar spong // nges pa'i de nyid ljona'o// cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/
22a4(rnying rgyud): nga rgyal ba yis// dus gsum rgyal ba sras bcas kyis// thog sa med pa'i dus nyid nas// malum posbyin pa bsrung mdzad pa'i// gsung bdag chen por dbang bskur phyir// gnod sbyin lagran rdo rje 'jung // wa 'drang zlogs dang rdzasas du/
22a5(rnying rgyud): logatso chen mdun nyid nas// rang gi sman las rab tu langs// mngon du spyod pa'i sprul pa mdzad// thugs kyi gnas pa'i sa bon las// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thugakun// sdang nigo rlung gis rab tu dkyogs// 'gu gi bklong khrug cingag yo/
22a6(rnying rgyud): sha rus gtams pa'i sa gzhi las// bskal pa'i me ri rab tu 'bar// b+han+d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhapa yas khang // gdug cing 'jigs su rung ba ni// stobs chen rnams kyang nyer mi spyod// byin pas ma lus rdzogs mdzod lus// kye nang mtha' dbus kun la khyab
22a7(rnying rgyud): bstan la rab sdang pha rol pos// phung po zhabs kyi gdan du bting // 'od gdan gtsang ma gsum dang bcas// che ba mchog gi skur mdzad do// rig can mthar gnas dbur mnan cing // stom badz+ra brgyad dag cing snang // phyag gis dregs pa'i lha brgyad bskal/
22b1(rnying rgyud): d+hats+tshin+ti t+ta ga yas g.yon bsdams// thugs kyi dbang chags dang pos gzung // thugs rje mI 'gyur mthing nag mdog/ mi 'jigs rig par mnan pa'i zhabs// bdud bzhi phyogs dang bcas pa gnon// ma lus dbang du smad pa'i phyir// ral pa kham nag srid rtser/
22b2(rnying rgyud): 'byor// 'bar ba'i spun gyis khams gsum gzigs// gdangs pa'i shangs kyis srid gsum rngug// shangs kyi rlung sgras stong gsum khyab// nod dpal tshams kyis gdug pa sgol+la// ljags 'dril rkan sgra drag por bdebs// khro ga nyer 'od kyis dbang du phyud /
22b3(rnying rgyud): dpa' ba'i chas kyi sarab tu brtan// bsnyung ba'i lharnams sbru la rdzogs// stobs ldan de nyid mnyes mdzad pa'i// 'brang bachel dbang sgyur ma// dbu gsum phyag drug zhibs bzhi ma// gri gug rdzi shul bdud rtsi g.yas// cu zhing chen g.yang gzhi ga'i ni//
22b4(rnying rgyud): gtso bdag tshul 'dzin rab tu sgeg/ dkyis mdzad rab tu rol pa las// 'dul byed sprul pa rab tu 'phro// phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams kun gyi// gtum po gdug pa'i tshul 'chang ba'i// drag sngags bdag po ma lus kun// rang nyid so so'i 'khor bcas pa'i//
22b5(rnying rgyud): brten dang gnas la re rer snang // rang dbang med par 'dud cing g.yo// oM badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn e ka ya ma ma b+her b+ha gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang // gnod sbyin lha dang log lha can// chu rje che dang phyi rol phyogs// gdug byed mkha' la rgya ba dang // phyo
22b6(rnying rgyud): sadza kyA po 'gro lus 'dzin deng // nga nal 'chang dang sprul pa can// mtha' 'khob gnas mtha' ma lus rgyu// lha brjid mi ma yin gyi gnas// kha ban+d+han du thogs shing byAd+h+r-ig/ lus kyi glus kyi nus pa 'byin// ma lus pa rnams thams cad kun// shugs
22b7(rnying rgyud): drug rlung gis bskyed pa bzhin// rab tu 'dram zhing mdun druganas// thugs rje bdag thos grongs mdzod cing // gtam dum 'jigs byeng chen po'i sgo// gsang cig drug po gdung gi sgras// thus rtsom par bka' stsal ba// a me'i rjes byin /
23a1(rnying rgyud): kun gyi// drag sngags bdag po dregs pa can// sngon gyi rdo rje 'chang chen dang // rang gi bka' las ma 'da' bar// khyed rnams rang gi 'khor dang bcas// so so'i lus dang btags pa'i ming// rigs drang brten dang byed pa'i las/
23a2(rnying rgyud): sde dang cha lugs longs spyod rnams// 'jigs byed gnas 'dir myur du ston// khyed rnams 'di las 'da' byed na// nga yi srog gi dam tshig gis// khyed kyi lus sems srog dang bcas// ma lus gtan nas brlag par bya// zhes bka' stsal nas/ drag sngag
23a3(rnying rgyud): kyi tshogs 'di dag kyang bka' stsal to// oM sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na dA ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ ya ma rA dza mr-i ta ga sA mA ma/ k+She ta mA ra ya thing dzing dzaHdzaH/ du phragA rA dzA drug dun ma ti da mA ra ya tring rdzing dzaHdzaHrak+Sha rag mo ma ma ra ti ka mA ra ya dzing dzi dzaHdzaHyaR+Sha a pa slar
23a4(rnying rgyud): mu sham pa mA ra ya hri hri dzaHdzaH/ ma hA de pa shwa ra rA dza mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/ ma trang+ga ru tra kA la mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/ mun mun pa tsa tsit+ta mA ra ya hring tring dzaHdzaH/ ti ti ka ma he ma hA de ba mA ra ya hri hri dzaHdzaH/ biSh+Nu pheM tra rodza mA ra ya hrI hri dzaHdzaH/ nA ga dA
23a5(rnying rgyud): ku ma tsan+tu mI ra ya hri dring dza dzaH/ rA dza b+ha long e sa ya mA ra ya rbing hring dzaHdzaH/ ma hA khu lo sad+hi mA ra ya hring hring dzaHdzaH/ badz+re sA d+ha/ so i tsa mA ra ya hrIng hring dzaHdzaH/ a b+hi shu tr-i li mA ra ya hrid hring dzaHdzaH/ nr-i hu~Mr du mas dzaH/ sha tr-i mA ra ya rbad tse saM brjod
23a6(rnying rgyud): su 'jigs byed 'bang ba ni slar yang 'jigs su rung bar bstan to// sangs rgya'i thams cad kyi ting khams stong gsum gyi snying chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mtshungs pa'i sgra cher po dang / 'a dang kyob 'bar ba dang rlung gi shugs drag pos gang
23a7(rnying rgyud): bar gyir to// bdud dang gshin rdza la sogs pa'i skyebyas chu'i dregs pa can rnams kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas te/ rab tu 'dres nas rang rang gi rigs kyi thugs pa dang phul te/ nyid kyi dun du nyes gyur nas/ bka' ba tu
23b1(rnying rgyud): par brtson par gyur to// drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las byin brlabs chen pos dbang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud kyi rgyal po me'i kha rlangs can zhes bya ba/ mdog nag //
23b2(rnying rgyud): pa nas me 'bar ba/ lag na khram shing dang bdud zhags nag po thogs pa/ zhing lpags kyi gos gyon pa/ yum bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma zhes bya ba/ lag na khram shing dang thod pa rlon pa thogs shing / gos su mi lpags gyon pa/ bdud rta nag po la khyo
23b3(rnying rgyud): shug gnyis char don nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdud kyi rigs kyi lha'i tshogs dang bcas nas rings par lhags so// de bzhin du 'chi bdag gshin rje zhes bya ba// mdog nag thod pa kri gug 'dzin// cung ma gshin rje za byed ma// gri gug thod pa phyag
23b4(rnying rgyud): gis 'dzin// khyo shug zhing lpags rlon pa bgos// ma he chu glang zhon nas ni// gshin rje pho mo'i tshogs dang bcas// 'gal byed gzor zhing myur du lhags// srin po gsod byed yab yum yang // mdog nag zhing gi pags pa bgos// ral gri gri gug g.yas
23b5(rnying rgyud): gyis bzung // g.yon gyis mi mgo thod khrag thogs// stag dang seng ge zhon pa spyod// srin po'i tshogs bcas myur du 'khod// gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po dang // chung mu sha za ral gcig dang // mthing nag mgyogs byed rta la zhon// zhing lpags gyon te phyag
23b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyis// ral gri dang nag zhing sngags bzung // gnod sbyin tshogs dang bcas te 'khod// drag sngags bdag po'i sde dpon te// shar lho nub byang phyogs dag gi// gnas su gtso la bdud cing 'khod// dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba// 'jig rten lha
23b7(rnying rgyud): pi sngags dag gis// dkar po ba dan shel gri thogs// dar dkar gos can gdam ru zhon// dregs pa lha yi bdud 'khor bcas// rings par bcas de shar phyogs 'khod// thar pa nag po zhes bya ba// mdog nag mchod gtor dug thun 'dzin//
24a1(rnying rgyud): nag zhon te zhing lpags bgos// sde dang bcas rta g+ho phyogs 'khod// mu rje nag po zhes bya ba// dar nag dang ni zhags pa thogs// ber nag gyon te mu ta zhon// rang gi sde dang nub phyogs 'khod// mu stegs nag po chen pa yang /
24a2(rnying rgyud): dang ni tri shUl bzung // mi lpags bgos zhing ma he zhon// rang gi sde bcas byang du 'khod// khyab 'jug rog ti zhes bya ba// mthing nag khram shing dgra sgra 'dzin// sprin nag bgos shing 'brug ldan zhon// gza' bdud 'khor btsas steng phyogs la
