24a3(rnying rgyud): klu rgyal sog ma med ces pa// gos nag sbrul lpags na bza' can// bum pa dang ni rus sbal 'dzin// chu srin zhon te klu tshogs bcas// 'og gi phyogs su 'khod cing 'dug/ gzhan yang li byi lag dgu dang // ze se gtso dang yam shud kyi// sos
24a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs kyi bdag po dag/ dkar ser dmar po'i mdog ldan zhing // shel gri thogs shing lag dgu 'gyed// dar dmar mdung rings lag gis 'dzin// rta dkar bya rgod ra skyes dang // rta dmar zhon te zhing lpags bgos// so so'i sde dang g.yog bcas
24a5(rnying rgyud): shing // phyogs kyi sgo bzhir gnas bcas 'khod// gzhan yang lha klu gnod sbyin dang // ma mo gshin rje srin po bdud// ru dra mu stegs 'gong the dang // ging rgyu gza' dang rgyan bran sman// sdang skyid lha srin dregs pa zhen// ded dpon chen po rnams kyi 'khor//
24a6(rnying rgyud): phyibyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // yang gsang dang ni drag po dang // btags shing chags pa smas pa dang // las byed shan pa rdor shong dang // che grags rtsal dang ma mo dang // mun thibs stong 'khrugs srog gcod dang // glen zhing dbang che la sogs rnams// bcom
24a7(rnying rgyud): ldan rdo rje 'chang ba yi// bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub byed pas// ma thogs dur khrod gnas chen du// 'dar zhing myur ba'i shugs dang bcas// rang gi nus pa rab bstan to// bka' nyan gsung bstod rjes 'brangs gnas// de ltar 'khod pa'i 'jig
24b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i drags pa'i bdag po sngags kyi stobs dang ldan pa de dag gis/ rang rang gi 'khor dang / rigs kyi sde dang / mtha dang / sangs spyod kyi khyad par dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bstan nas/ 'di skad ces gang gsas to// datsa'adzin 'ad
24b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa chen po// bdag cig la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa'i/ ma rungs pa'i tshogs gdug pa can sdang ba/ gnod pa dang / shugs pa dang / 'tsho ba dang rtsed pa de bsam pa dang ldan zhing / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / phan pa'i sems
24b3(rnying rgyud): minus pa rnams kyis te/ rang rang gi khams dang / byed pa dang / rigs dang / las kyi bya ba dang / rten dang / nus pa dang / dbang gi khyad par dag dang / mthun pa'i bstan pa mi bzad pa stobs dang ldan pa dag bka' stsal par gsol zhes gsol to// drag sngags
24b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa rtse ba'i rgyud las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu bkod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// sgyu yi che b.rab ston cing // gsung gi snying pos gnad skul te// thugs kyi dgongs pa gtsor mdzod nas// 'jig rten dregs pa
24b5(rnying rgyud): can dang mthu stobs can// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// hUM 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs chen rnams// nga yi bka' bzhin nyan par brtsi// nga ni chos snga badre zed te// yinas mi bcos spyan gyis grub// snang ba'i skul dngos po med// ye shes
24b6(rnying rgyud): sku ste skye yi mcho// nga ni sngags gsungs thu rten te// yenas su spyad sgra dang bral// brjod pa'i gsung la 'dzin pa med// ma 'gags gsung ste gsung gi dpel// nga ni bden pa'i thugs mchog ste// yin sa mtshan ming yang dag bral// gnyis med thu
24b7(rnying rgyud): los rtsol ba med// skye med thugs te thugs kyi dpal// nga ni yon tan chogs chen te// lhun gyis grub cing bsam mi khyab// smon med dgos pa ma lus 'byung // dngos grub chen po bskyed pa'i gzhi// nga ni phrin las mdzad pa ste// yongs rdzogs pa
25a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag nyid can// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon du spyod// sna tshogs gzhan don lhun gyis rdzogs// 'jig rten sngags bdag dregs pa can// gtso chen dbang sgyur khyed rnams kyang // nga dang dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// thugs dang ye shes
25a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis sa myed// gsung dang dbye ba byed ma yin// phul ma mang // yeg tan mags nyid du rdzogs// pri las gcig tu thun mang bstug// thog ma med nas d+ma lce'i bar// nyin mongs mas thAs thos// gnas ngan kyi phreng por ljin// ngardul/
25a3(rnying rgyud): dregs pa'i lus ngag sems// stobs dang nus pa dpag med rdzogs// che btsan dbang phyug ldan gyur kyang // yang dag nges pa'i don ma rtogs// don dam bden pa khong ma chud// spros bral dge la blo ma phyogs// rang rig rgyal ba'i stobs ma rnyed// kye med dbyes
25a4(rnying rgyud): kyi rtsal ma shar// bde chen gnas kyi gdeng ma thob// mtshon med bcud kyi ro ma myos// chos nyid sku yi gzugs ma mthong // ye shes glong gi sgom phyed// de bas rigs kyi bu rnams kyis// rang gi gnas la rab tu rtogs// lus la bdag tu yod ma 'dzin// ngag
25a5(rnying rgyud): brjod par ma smra cig/ sems la dngos por gang ma rtog/ gnas yul rigs khams sde dang dpung // brten rdzas longs spyod dbang skal rnams// nga dang nga yir gzung bya min// thun mong dang ni tha dad gcig/ de dag ma lus stong pa ste// stong pa nyid kyang de dag
25a6(rnying rgyud): go// de las gud na gzhan med de// gzhan las gud na'ang de med cing // ma skyes ma 'gags mtshan nyid med// ma phri ma bsnan ma bslad cing // ma bcos ma bsgyur ma byung la// ma skyes ma bsgrubs ma bshad pa'i// don chen de ni rang nyid las// phyi nang snga phyi
25a7(rnying rgyud): steng dang 'og/ phyogs mtshams 'khor 'das lus dang sems// kun nas rnyed pa ma yin te// 'di na'ang yod pa ma yin no// sha khrag bags dang rus pa dang // snying dang glo ba snod rnams dang // dbang po yan lag bcas pa la// bde chen dam pa de mi gnas//
25b1(rnying rgyud): dre bas gzhan na'ang gnas min te// gnas ma grub la gnas zhes brjod// gnas yod mnyam na der rtogs shig/ ci 'dra ci zhig ji lta bu// gang nas 'ongs shing gang du song // gang na 'dug cing ci zhig byed// dbyibs dang kha dog ming dang mtshan//
25b2(rnying rgyud): rigs dang khams la rab tu rtogs// de la de yis der bltas pas// mthong ba med pa blta ba yi// gang la gang gis gar bsgoms pas// bsgom dang bral la sgom zhes bya// ci la su zhig spyir spyod pas// spyod dgu mi gnas spyod pa che// su las sus jo rje
25b3(rnying rgyud): bsgrubs pas// ma grub rang gnas 'bras bu ste// ma lus med cing rnam pa yi// yon tan yongs rdzogs dbang phyug go// zhi dang rgyas dang mngon du spyod// dbang du bsdu ba phrin las yin// rang la rdzogs shing rang gis grub// theg chod pa dang bstan pa dang //
25b4(rnying rgyud): ldan mthar phyin la bzla dang // 'das dang ma 'das ston pa dang // bshad dang nyan dang sdud pa dang // gnas dus yon tan skyon rnams ni// rang gi de nyid rtogs pas 'grub// ces bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus brtsa ba'i rgyud las don dam pa'i gnas nye
25b5(rnying rgyud): par bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// dgos pa chen po 'di gsungs te// ye nas ma byung ma skyes pa'i// chos nyid don gyi snying po ni// gzung 'dzin mtha' bral don rtogs te// nga bdag 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog gis//
25b6(rnying rgyud): dregs shing gzir ba'i ru tra dwe// ma bsgral pa ni nyes pa ste// thabs dang shes rab snying rje gsum// mthun zhing mtshungs ldan sras kyis bsgrol// dam pa'i don de ma rtogs par// dngos por spyad pas 'khor bar lhung // mkhas rtogs ldan pas spyad pa yis// 'phags
25b7(rnying rgyud): pa nanyes shing sems can sgrol// tsho gas nyid rdzogs te sku gsum thob// rnam rig mthong bas la thag bcad// brtul zhugs drag pos bslab pa brtsam// dbang du bsdu dang gdul ba'i phyir// 'jig rten las kyis bsdus pa'i rgyud// de dang ston pa rnams
26a1(rnying rgyud): skyes pa shad // chos dbyings rang gnas du khrod du// dag pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis ni// sangs rgyapa bstan pa'i don du chud// stegs su rab tu badro ba'i dus// brjod cing btsugs las ltos pa'i chos// sman dang yon tan tshul du 'byung /
26a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa 'jig byed las ngan can// drag sngags skyabs kyis byesgril byas nas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur// dkyi le'i khor gnas pa'i rten yin no// lha dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin// rdzas rnams rgya dang rten du 'gyur// long gnya'ong mas
26a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i tid// ming rus bya bus nem shes dang // tha tsho 'khor ba'i rten yin te// 'gugs 'dren gyis ni de dag 'gugs// pheM nyas las kun sgrub par byed// sngags dang rdzas kyi dpal skyed cing // thun rdzas rnams kyis myos pa dang // rangs lpags mtshan 'bebs
26a4(rnying rgyud): rdul du tshugs// gnang du 'bebs shing snying nas 'dren// lha dang 'byed cing rtsa ba gcod// byang chub sems kyi dngos po nI// don po khrag gi len bu'i mgo// kun bzhi ti la 'bru tsam zhig gnas// rtse ba rlung gnas 'dra bas te// phur pa me sbal sa bu yis//
26a5(rnying rgyud): bsdus shing bsregs te gcad pa yis// dmigs pa rten dang bral bar byas// bkrag dang gzi mdangs rang la 'dus// phrin las rnam bzhis gzir ba la// dge sdig ngo ba nyid du mnyam// lha spyod ldan pas zhing bcus te// pha rol bla med gnas su bskal
26a6(rnying rgyud): dr-in do yi rnam shes ni// hU~M dang phaT kyi 'phro 'du yis// sbyang dang sbyar ba'i las rnams bya// phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed// phung po lhag ma tsas nyid ni// rten gsum gyis ni rab tu sbyang // chos sgra'i gzugs brtan bstan par bya// 'dris ni pha rol pa/
26a7(rnying rgyud): na med// sbrul pa dus gsum sangs rgyas dang // rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' yi// stong ba rlangs ched spyod pa'o// nis bka' // drag sngags 'dum pa rtse ba'i rgyud las sprul ba'i ting rje'i dzin gyi dmigs pa'i le'u rtsi lnga pa'o// / de nas rdo
26b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa pas// nas kyi than dugasas// / bags di la gas pa gnas// muthang babyung ras sus// rdzas gang gdug par gnas do // rlu gas nan nga rdzun pas// dmaman 'ad pa thams bya// sangs su rnags pan na /
26b2(rnying rgyud): mA yis// sngon du bla ma mnyes byas shing // lhag pa'i lha nyid stobs dang ldan// rdo rje 'dzin pa he ruka/ nye dang ldan pa gnyis su med// tshad dang ldan par gyur pa ste// yang dag nges pa'i rtags mthong nas// rab tu 'bad par bya ba ni// smin 'byor gdug ci
26b3(rnying rgyud): shis pa'i sa// las la mngag pa de dag la// dregs pa gtso 'khor dmigs pa'i rten// 'dom gang la sogs tshod dang ldan// lte ba las ni 'khor lo'i sto bus// bzhi 'am drug gam brgyad du 'god// bar khyams phyogs bzhir sgo bzhir bcas// rim pa
26b4(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi thod phreng ldan// rang gi rigs la sngags pa yi// dbyibs dang kha dog rgyan dang rtags// thams cad ldan pa nyid du bya// dregs pa can rnams sku yi rten// bris sam brkos sam brtsigs pa dag/ rang gi gnas su mdzes par dgod// gsung gi
26b5(rnying rgyud): snying po'ang de bzhin no// thugs rten rang rang phyag cha'am// sngon nas bsags pa'i rdzas yin no// rang sngags bsags pa'i 'khor lo dang // mthun gzugs srog gi rgyal mtshan rnams// nang du mtshon pa'i rten du gzugs// de dag tsit+ta so so ru// dmigs pa'i
26b6(rnying rgyud): snying po dril te gzhug/ gsang zhing sbas pa'i rten du 'gyur// de yi byang shar phyogs mtshams su// nga yis sngar bshang rgyud nyid la// e dbyibs bzhi dang brgyad cu gnyis// khru gang 'dzub gang thur ngu brko// gdug cing drag po'i rdzas kyis byug/ gdug cing
26b7(rnying rgyud): bsreg pa'ang de yis so// de nyid dgod pa'i rdzas rnams ni// rgyud med gzugs ngan ka pA la// seng ldeng gser shing yan lag skyes// dpal ldan drag po'i phur ba dang // shel nag gnam ru gnag po dang // gi ling dkar dang gdong dmar dang // zla mi gcig dang
27a1(rnying rgyud): srid shing dang // tsa ra ka dang mgrin snyan dang // sa spyod chu spyod rnams kyi lus// phyi nang par dang gsang bas brgyan// bsreg chen spyi yi mnyes pa'i rdzas// rgyan ldan gzugs dang rnga gling sgras// bsung chen dri dang sha khrag ro// tsha rtsu ba reg dang
27a2(rnying rgyud): bdud bshos// sha chen dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i tshogs// rab tu bstar zhing 'bad pas sbyar// dpa' zhing rtul phod skyes bu yis// nga yi sngon gyi phrin las bzhin// khro la khros pas zhi mdzad de// thams gnas pa'i 'byung chen lnga// drag po sngags kyi 'byung bar
27a3(rnying rgyud): bsgom// keng rus 'bar ba'i ri rab bam// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gzhal med khang // b+han d+ha gnas rigs gsum gyis brtsigs// sti ra gsar rnying tshogs kyis gtams// rak+sha dmar po brub cing 'bab// tshil chen dud pa 'khyil zhing 'gyur// dbang po don
27a4(rnying rgyud): snying 'phyo zhing 'brul// bdud rtsi bshang gci dri bsung ldan// yan lag nying lag rkang zhing snyil// shun dang pags pa brkyangs shing 'phyar// phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng dang 'og/ gcus dang 'phyang ba bskum dang batshangs// rgyal mtshan da'i ni zer tshags//
27a5(rnying rgyud): ba dan pA raM lhab lhub dang // phur pa dang ni ltab ma dang // yol ko ka ma la gtams ni// rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// gzhal yas 'bar ba de 'dra ba// rab tu sngags pa 'di las bshad// dregs pa'i bdag po yum dang bcas// sbyor zhing dgos pa de
27a6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis/ bdag gi rang bzhin yongs su bskyed// 'phro dang chas kyi khyad par dang // bsdu dang rang gi gnas su brtag/ skur gyur gang gi mtshan nyid ngo bo dang // byang chub sems kyi bya ba yis// yum dang bcas pa yongs su rdzogs// de yi las kyang sngar bzhin du//
27a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal mdzad rang gi phyag rten du// dmigs pa myur lhags de yi 'khor// bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang // gnod sbyin drag po'i klu dang lha// rang rang chung mor bcas pa dag/ ngas bshad bzhin du 'jigs par bsam// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag ste//
27b1(rnying rgyud): dang ma mo rgyal po ging // btsan 'gong chu dang mu stegs dang // rang gi sde dang dpung du bcas// ma lus dregs pa can gyi tshogs// 'di las rab brjod gang yin pa// de nyid du ni gsal bar bya// nga yi sku dang gsung dang thugs// ye shes rigs kyi dbang
27b2(rnying rgyud): zhing // byin gyis brlabs nas rgyas btab ste// de la rang bzhin gnas pa bstim// yongs rdzogs spu yis bstan pa bsgrub// phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul zhing bstod// rab tu mnyes pa rgya cher bya// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yis// bsdu dang sbyor dang sgrol pa
27b3(rnying rgyud): nga sa na // u ga gyu/ ky-i /
27b4(rnying rgyud): b+ha mi ched dang sa mo 'idrims// gan+d+har po ki kAng kA li drug/ tshe chang pa dang khri sror bcug/ ga tson gzan 'dzums dang lcags zlog tshung // nang dang mtshan nyid yang zhugs dang // dug 'thungs thug babs byazhin du drug/ bar zhes bya ba gdags su /
27b5(rnying rgyud): nim brtags srog la rgol// gshin rje 'khor ba'i 'kho po pos gcod// srin po la gri'i so yis 'gems// gnod sbyin gnam lcags thog gis 'joms// lha ni 'dod pa'i mdung gis sor// ma mo dpag med mda' bzhin 'bigs// gza' brjod
27b6(rnying rgyud): stobs chen sgrogs kyis brdeg/ kA ni sa 'og ral gri sogs// thams cad 'dul zhing gcod pa'i sngags// mun pa gli 'khrugs bdud kyi skad// ngu 'bod lta bugashin rje ste// ro lun rur ba srin pos 'gren// lce mdung drag po gnod sbyin no// bka'
27b7(rnying rgyud): drug sbrul lha yi dmod// ngu 'bod gdung ba ma mo ste// 'brug sgra glog 'byin gza' bdud do// klu yis sbrel nag drug gis 'joms// 'jig rten sgra srin rang sgra yis// phal pa rnams lang mod par byed// de ni drag sngags med pa'o// zhes bka' stsal to//
28a1(rnying rgyud): ga gas ma pa sa / na pa/ dzin / ga na nan pa ba su/
28a2(rnying rgyud): snying du nya 'o stsa la// dung khrod dab nag rgyal suM mngag/ tsa~M sna pA 'a shig sos pagying mo// gri rdzogs smyug ma sbyini kyang gi drug/ rungs ka spangs nag ti'i nag dang // rmi che shang tshe zer dang // cings kyigs rdo la bye ma dang // dug khrag dang dang bcas pa
28a3(rnying rgyud): rnams// suM pu ri ye bod par bsdu// bdud kyi srog tig sngags kyis mngag/ bdud po nag po la su ni de bsi la tsho/ ka lA mu d+hi mA rA ya/ dgra bo snying ling tse/ drung / dz+ra bak+kul khrigs/ bram tha ma rol 'dus/ zer sngags/ ro sngags/ bdud rjes tshang / bdud
28a4(rnying rgyud): chos rol/ bdud bus gtor/ baM khyigs/ pra ma ni/ sha druM ste ra ya rbad/ mun pa gling khrugs zhes bya ba// ma 'ongs bdud kyi rang skad de// rtag tu brjod cing spug mar brab// gang la dmigs pa de myur du// snang srid bdud kyis srog nas 'dren// mi nag go mtshon
28a5(rnying rgyud): bcas pa dang // sngags nag bud med mon dang ngo // khyi nag rte nag bya nag dang // nod dag dri nag shel nag dang // rin go mtsho nAg shel nag tshogs// dmag dang 'khrug dang 'bab pa dang // khrid dang gsod dang sha ba dang // las byed grub pa'i rtags su 'gyur//
28a6(rnying rgyud): den sha'o bstangs zhing bsgral// gri mtshon phur pa rnams kyis gtub// lhags bdud rtsi sha khrig skAr// ku ku nag po'i zas su sbyin// rol par mi byed bskur la bsgrub// ru tras myos shing 'thib nas 'chi// 'chi bdag gshIn rje'i drag sngags ni// rgyud meng
28a7(rnying rgyud): mopA pa// za ma tog tu kha sbyar la// nang du de nyid tsi d+ha gzhug/ po tha~Md steng nas spyi bor thug/ bcing dang dag ba pa drang ba dag/ sder bshad rdzas kyis thob cing brdeg/ ya~M ma ye ta T+Te/ ra tsas to me/ tsun mo ni/ rlo ma tsa ne/ sa ma rA dza/ mug snying khrag rkya /
28b1(rnying rgyud): rbang / yam dbugs 'jungs/ tsa la mya rAng / rAng ba ri la rbad / yam+ba pA la? k+shi b+h+ring gang chod/ ya ma snyi / yam khrag/ ya mdzu ba ris zang / gAshin rje bsdus shing dril ba'i sngags// rab tu bsngags to tsot+ta brug// shwa khrag chen pos mnyes par bya/
28b2(rnying rgyud): gsod byed nag po'i tshogs rnams kyis// don snying rlon par ster ba dang // snying dang thod pa 'bar ba 'byung // de nas las la sbyar byas na// gang la dmigs pa myur du skyol// gtum khro srin po'i dasod pa ni// gyur shi'i thod par de snying nang // dmigs pa rnams
28b3(rnying rgyud): gags sman de// se sregs ldan pa 'i coM b+h+yasate// ban di da kyi hrI // ma pa'i bdag tsug gi sting ga ga 'byel/ nyid du tshul gyi// phrin pa du da dug+sa/ pa malda
28b4(rnying rgyud): klung ga gyi
28b5(rnying rgyud): dang gsod dang don snying ster// las la sbyor ba tshul bzhin gyis// dgra bo'i don po myur du sgrol// drag sngags gnod sbyin drag sngags ni// rta dkar snying dang thod pa ni// nya'o gzhug pa'i snod du bsngags// rag chen la phug mu sa la// snying sna khrag snga
28b6(rnying rgyud): sbyar bas mchod// gnod sbyin srog tig do mod la brjod// yak+Sha ba hu da re dzaHma ga la bog sha dzaHru ru ma ru tra ma ti dzaHyAk+Sha snong la shad shad du dzaHyak+Sha srog la breng hUM dzaHming shir tshogs dang 'od dang swa// rlung ngamar dag dang pu yu gri 'ong /
28b7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rdzas kyis drag tu brde// lhag ma bsregs shing rlung gis gtor// de nyid khrag tu skyugs te sgrol// drag rtsal lha yi drag sngags ni// lha g.yag dkar po'i snying nang du// brnag pa'i gzugs dang ming rus bris// sngon dmar sdud pas ske nas
29a1(rnying rgyud): gdags// rje rigs zod pa'i drung du gzhug/ dar dkar gyis ni kha bcad la// tshon skud sna lngas bcing bar bya// bya rgod dang ma'i sgro rtsa ni// srog car bcug la dkyil du brtol// dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi la// dbus su gru gsum
29a2(rnying rgyud): thur du bla// lha rdo gsum gyi skyed po la// gong gi thod pagazhag par bya// mthun rdzas bshos gtsang rngon cha dang // ru dkar snying dang shel dkar snying // bya dkar snying dang ru mtshon dang // ba dan dkar po rten du gzugs// yungs kar sngags kyi mda' zhag ni// thun
29a3(rnying rgyud): kyi rdzas su gzhag par bya// drag sngags snying gi nang du bra ba// stobs ldan rdo rje 'dzin gsal bas// lha rnams 'dus pa'i sngags rnams sbreng // ma hA de ba ti dzaHti dzaH/ sa ma pra ma na rag shwa kaM ka la ya hU~M/ de pa rA dza ma hA ni dzaH/ dgra bo ma ra ya thun zad thun rbad/
29a4(rnying rgyud): shag sen dzaHdzaHshag sen dzaHdzaHhU~M hU~M/ tsa tur mu kha ragA sha ma naM/ kang ka ma ya hU~M/ ma hA de pa a mu ka mA ra ya sod/ 'jig rten grags pa mthu rtsal can// lha yi bod rbad gsang gsum dril// drag tu bzlas shing snying nas bra ba// rtags ni rgyal po rje dpon dang /
29a5(rnying rgyud): skyes pa stag chas dar ma dang // zhu ba can po tshogs 'ong ba ni// gsod gcod byed dang snying 'byin dang // dngos su snying phyung 'phang ba 'ong // rtags byung snying nas ling ga dbyung // mtshon gyis gtub la me la bsreg/ thal ba nya'o byas nas ni// thod par bcug la lha rten//
29a6(rnying rgyud): nas// 'jig rten lha chen gnas sar mnan// lha yid la yams dgra la phebs// nang bdag ma mo'i drag sngags ni// rdo dri'i mo yi thod pa ru// de yi snying nang ling gu gzhag/ mthing drug dar gyis khwa gcad la// thod pa tshon skud lnga yis brjings// dkyil 'khor mthing
29a7(rnying rgyud): dag gru gsum dbus// thod pa bcug la bsgrub par bya// spug nag gsum gyi snyig khrig gis// ma mo 'khor dang btsas pa mchod// yungs kar yungs nas rgya logs// drug po'i thun rdzas tshogs ched la// me mo rnams kyi dmod pa'i dgas// ma ma skyed
29b1(rnying rgyud): mam snying kha rag/ ma ma rak+Sha/ ma ma rag sha/ d+hu ga~M rag sha snying khrag la thubs dzaHsnyi khrag rtsa la dun dun/ trag rag sha ma ma dzaHdzaHdam dam dgra snying rbad bu nan ma ma nr-i snying tsi t+ta la thun/ tA ga rag sha tra rag sha mo thun thun/ mugs mugs phyogs rdzogs
29b2(rnying rgyud): rbad rbad dzaHdzaHma ma thun/ snying khrag thun/ sha ti ta ma ma rag mo/ sa ma ya b+h+yo phyo/ ma mo'i srog tig bsdus pa yi// gsad pa las kyi ngan sngags 'di// gri lcags las byas sbu gu 'im// bya rgod sgo rtsa'i nang nas bsngags// mi sring mon mo phal mo dang // phyi mo la
29b3(rnying rgyud): sngogs bud med tshogs// bya nag rgod nag tshogs chen lhags// dngos su sha dang mgo mug ster// tsit+ta dngos su 'phar ba dang // bsang rtags yongs su rdzogs pa dang // snying la phur bas gdab cing bsad// dug shing me la sbyin sreg bya// thun khrag
29b4(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa'i dgra la 'phang // thal ba bsdus la nya'o bya// dur khrod dbus su gnas par bya// rims nad dag gis dmigs pa sgrob// drag po'i gza' yi drag sngags ni// mon pa nag po'i ra rog po'i// thod par snying nang ling ga gzhug/ srog rtsar gri lcags sngu
29b5(rnying rgyud): gzhug/ yungs kar yungs nag zangs lcags phye// thun du sngags te thod par brab// mA ra pa sha mi ki/ du ru du ru/ ma ti dz+wa la ti dzaHtsa ba ma ni/ ru ru ra hu la/ a tra ta tra pad ma sha ra sha ra ba sta/ a mu ka mu ra ru phaT/ tri ling ka shan du dri/ dze&ShoHyag sha bu na/
29b6(rnying rgyud): bum dril shi ni pau b+ha ba hi/ kha yag khadun ti/ ru ti shu hi ti tri ga shu la pra ti/ mA ra ya dzaH/ dbang chen gza' yi drag sngags 'di// drag po'i rdzas la bsngags te brdeg/ sha rul khrag rul btsos dang rje na// dkar gsum dmar gsum rdzas kyis mchod// 1
29b7(rnying rgyud): klad la 'khor ba dang // mon pa nag po 'ong ba dang // sbrul che gshog can 'khyug pa dang // bar snang 'ja' yis khengs pa dang // dgra zo ngas su khrid nas ngong // nod dang ri dgas gdod pa dang // rdo snyi nang khrol sker zhing dang // de bu'i
30a1(rnying rgyud): // rtags rdzogs pa dang // snying dang long ka ho mer bsreg/ thun rdzas dgra yi yul du gtor// thod pa klu yi brtan sar swa// chu 'khyags ser ba drag tu dbab// hur thum nad kyis glo bur 'chi// khalkugs rkang lag rengs par 'gyur// gdug pa
30a2(rnying rgyud): kyi ri drag sngags ni// lung gsum 'dus pa'i dben gnas su// stegs bu mthing nag grwa gsum byas// dgra yi pha mes mgo bo'am// yang na mdze can thod pa rwa// dgra yi ming rus bris te gzhug/ gtsang ma'i snod du dkar gsum dang // mngar gsum klu sman
30a3(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs dang // d+h+r-ig tu mdzod cing mngag par b+ha// in g+ha bo ti po tsa ya/ nA ga rA dzaHdgra bo hi khu la pre sha na/ nA ga phos phos/ shig shig/ hu pa hu ye/ ti ya tI ya/ ti pa tsa ti paH/ a sha nag po ti pa tsa li/ nAM gA rA dza dgra bo mA rA ya nad/ shag ti
30a4(rnying rgyud): srog ti rbad/ snying ti rbad/ snying la ril sha ma sha ma rbad/ oM sha na nag po pha rag u da nA ga rA dza nAn/ bi li nAn/ pheM li nAn/ drag tu brjod cing bsgrub pa yis// me chen 'bar dang chu chen zug/ ba glang sbal sbrul sdom sdig tshogs// shing gcod sa snyil brag
30a5(rnying rgyud): ral sogs// lus la shu ba sgang lo byung // stobs ldan gnyen pos drag tu gtsun// de nas byang bltas chu mig tu// ba ling gtang zhing bden pa brda re// thod pa ling gar bcas pa mnan// klu tshul 'khor dang btsa sa la gtang // phung po lhag med btang bar bsam/
30a6(rnying rgyud): gnas su phyin la bsrung bar bya// dgra ni mdze dang rmugs pas 'chi// sde brgyad so so'i drag sngags kyis// 'jig rten las kyis mnar ba yi// bstan pa'i ru tra gdug pa can// ma lus rnams kyi gshed du 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa
30a7(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba'i rgyud las dregs pa'i sde sa so'i las la sbyar ba drag sngags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// 'jig rten dregs pa can rnams kyi// so so'i rigs dang gtan tshigs dang // sde dang las kyi byed pa bstan// sngon gyi 'jig rten
30b1(rnying rgyud): khams 'di nyid// phung po nyon mongs la brten nas// nga rgyal dregs pa'i dbang gis myos// rang gzhan kun la 'tsho zhing rtsod// gnas ngan len gyis kha khrid byas// legs pa'i lan du nyes par spyod// ma rig rtsa ba yan lag gis// gti mug mun thabs bdud
30b2(rnying rgyud): dang klu// nga rgyal stobs kyi dregs pa bdag/ lha dang rgyal po gol sar 'gyur// phrag dog gza' dang gra shin+da rje'i rigs// 'dod chags ma mo gnod sbyin rigs// zhe sdang btsan dang srin por gol// srog lus 'brel pas bdud ces bya// yi dgas gshin
30b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rdog rnams rje// phra mor rgyu ba snang zhing dregs// de yi don gyis srin por byung // gang gis gnod pa sbyin byed pa'i// de yi rigs dang mtshan nyid do// gang las bskyed pa ma mo ste// snod byed nus pa lnga yin no// gdug cing gtum pas mi 'chor ba// gza' zhes
30b4(rnying rgyud): bya bar brjod pa yin// blan zhing myos pas klu zhes bya// 'gro ba rigs drug so so la// bdud dang lha dang lha min te// gnod sbyin gza' dang rgyu skar bcas// rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha yi sde// ma mo srin mo ma yi sde// gshin rje yi dgas sde yin te// klu ni byol
30b5(rnying rgyud): song sde yin no// bdud ris pho dang mo yi rigs// ye nas gnas dang blo bur byung // 'thab dang myos dang dregs par byed// sred dang chags par byed pa ste// gshin rje las dang zhi bas ste// gzugs can gzugs med dbang can dang // dbang med phyi dang
30b6(rnying rgyud): nang khyad par// las kyis rab tu bsgrims pa yi// srin po sha za rgan mo can// sprul pa dang ni grazu lums can// rab tu rgyu dang gcig pu gnas// gnod sbyin gtso dang 'khor gyis brtags// grol ba dang ni rang rgyad de// tha dad rigs ni bcwa brgyad de//
30b7(rnying rgyud): gnod cing 'tsho ba'i bdag nyid can// lha ni 'dod pa'i gzugs can dang // gzugs med lha ma yin du gtogs// rab tu gadrug rtsub che bas ni// lha min mi mo yin du grags// gang las byung dang gang las srid// gang gis bskyed pa'i gzhir gyur pa//
31a1(rnying rgyud): sadz+dza zhes sna grags pate// las dang ye shes bsdus shing bye// phra dang rags pa'i khyad par gyis// me drung gcal dang 'khor du sdung // mkha la rgya ba'i drug thal tsamA// las kyi byu g.yona'o// rgyal po tha bram ze dang / dngangs
31a2(rnying rgyud): gdol pa can rnams kyis// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i yan lag 'gyur// tha dad rigs ni sde yin no// 'di dag thog ma'i las kyi dngos// dngos dang rang bzhi ni mtshan nyid kyis// ma rig 'khrul pa'i gzung 'dzin byung // bdag blta bag le nyal du gnas// g.yo
31a3(rnying rgyud): dgul phra mo'i kun nas ldang // 'khrug cing 'tshe dang rtsod par shar// bsod nams las dang dri ma yin// las rmyi mtha' gnyis g.yang sar lhung // gnag cing mi dge zag par bcas// kha na ma tho lung ma bstan// log pa lus ngag yid gsum gyis// gan
31a4(rnying rgyud): ngan len pa'i rgyun chags 'thud// dus gsum phyogs dang bcas pa yi// rjes su 'gro dang bzlog pa yis// 'khor ba brten gzhi dam po btsugs// so sor ma rig srog la gcod// longs spyod 'phrog cing rnam par 'tsho// gzi mdangs 'byor pa sde dang
31a5(rnying rgyud): bcas// gang yin 'joms shing rAg nus la// rgyud la sdug bsngal sbed byed pa// ma rungs nyes pa 'byin byed las// srog len tshe 'phrog gcod dang sha// myos 'thibs kyi nad rilus dang yams// gcog 'grel gdug pa'i nang 'bebs shing // rmi dang
31a6(rnying rgyud): 'khrug pacod pa dang // thor shod las dang dmod pa yis// rang gi sde los re re yang // kun la khyab pa brgyad brgyad de// drug cu rtsa drug yan lag bcas// las kyi dbye ba bsam mi khyab// dregs pa'i bdag po so so yi// rang bzhin dgos pa'i bye brag
31a7(rnying rgyud): gis// dus gsum sangs rgyas bstan pa dag/ tshul bzhin srung ba'i dam tshig can// drag sngags las kyi dmod pa la// brgya dang bcu gnyis bcu drug gis// nus pa rdzu 'phrul mthu la sogs// rang gi rigs la gang bsngags pa// de dang de la rab spar
31b1(rnying rgyud): bas// las kyi mtha' la gang dmigs pa// rdo rje can gyis yongs grub ste// nga yi stobs dang nus pa dang // mthu dang rdzu 'phrub yon tan tshogs// lus ngag yid kyis rab 'bad pa// gang yin de la mngon par 'byung // de yi thun mong yongs 'grub cing //
31b2(rnying rgyud): mthar phyin pa yang len par byed// 'di las ma 'ongs rnyog pa can// the tshom bskyed par ma byed cig/ nga dang rgyal ba thams cad kyis// 'di ni rab tu bsngags pa'o// zhes bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyu de las dregs pa can gyi sde rigs
31b3(rnying rgyud): dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// las la sbyar ba'i rim pa gsungs// dur khrod chu gling ri rtse dang // chu 'dus ngam grog 'jigs su rung // phung shul nags khrod ma rungs pa// dregs pa las kyi gnas yin no//
31b4(rnying rgyud): mi rus mi gsad phung shul sa// rngur zad phe ta rul chad sa// sa smin dri chen ma rungs khrag/ las kyi rten 'brel dmigs pa'i rdzas// rta nag dwe rdag ma he dang // chu grang dang ni stag seng dang // rta dkar ne le rgod dkar dang // do ma nag da mu rta pan glang dang //
31b5(rnying rgyud): 'brug chen rma bya rus sbal dang // bya khyi ku ku shel dang mi// rgyal mtshan thod pa snying dang khrag/ bdud rtsi 'bru bcud byang chub sems// rang gzugs snying po 'khor lo bcas// rgyan ldan shos cha mthun pa'i rdzas// dam tshig mchod cing brten pa'o// so sor sngags
31b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i las khung du// thod ngan 'bru nag dug khrag g.yos// rgyu gsum phus mtshon cha rnams// gsud pa thun gyi rdzas yin no// rme khrag gsum dang dr-i ngan gsum// srog chags gsum dang merngas gsum// thabs rdzas gsum dang bsreg rdzas gsum// rten sa
31b7(rnying rgyud): gsum dang dril sa gsum// bzhugs sa gsum dang dbangs gsum// kun rdzogs rtsol ba'i sbyor ba yis// chu drug dbab pa nges par 'grub// rigs sul sdong dang mchong rjes dang // gnas sbyong byang chub srid 'dor bris// thog grangs yo
32a1(rnying rgyud): spyad pas// gang la dmigs pa der gtad pas// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan rten khang la// steng 'og gnas gsum bdag po gsum// rgya mtsho'i gting dang ri rab zur// bar sdang khams dang nam mkha'i dbyings// bsrung dang bzlos
32a2(rnying rgyud): dang gsad pa'i las// dmag dpung bsdu dang dpal skyed dang // rab tu khros dang sbyor ba zhig/ las kyis pha rol dmod pas bzlog/ ngan pa'i thod pa snga gsum dang // shis pa ma yin sa brgyad du// rten cing 'brel pa 'byung sbyor bas// dmigs pa'i nus
32a3(rnying rgyud): stobs gnon par byed// khyad par las kyi bye brag gis// rgyal po ya rabs rje dpon dong // chung ma slob dpon mkhan po dang // rab byung khyim pa sngags sbed dang // phyi rol phyogs dang chos kyi grogs// che ba tsan dregs pas bsnyems pa dang // nga rgyal ldan zhing
32a4(rnying rgyud): skal ba bzang // kun gyis bkur zhing brjod pa dang // sems rgyud bsrel dang yun gyis drin// nye bar bstan cing slob sbyong gnas// lhag pa'i lha yis rab skyangs te// thun mong nus pa'i stobs rnyed cing // yon tan gcig gis rab bsdus pas// tsher gcad
32a5(rnying rgyud): dka' ba'i yul yin te// ma lus gang la bsngags pa yis// ting nge 'dzin dang dmigs pa'i grogs// rab sngags brtson 'grus can gyis bskal// gzhan yang zhi dang rgyas pa dang // dbang dang mngon par spyod rnams dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa nga dang gzhan//
32a6(rnying rgyud): mtshungs ldan rnams kyis bshad pa bzhin// thogs med nus pa'i stobs kyis sbyang // de dag gsang ba'i dmod pa yang // dregs pa sde brgya dra so so yi// ga la gnad snying po 'di dag go// ya ma du ha na ha na tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ru tra mya ma sod sod// kha tri dza ma tri dzaHdzaH
32a7(rnying rgyud): shog tri dzaHyag sha dzaHda tri dzaHsha tri ba tri dzaH/ tsi d+ha pram ya a mu ka srog l-i dzaHdzaHb+h+yo/ tr-i tsa pa la ag shug me/ a b+hi sha/ a b+hai shu/ tsag kra rag sha sa ma ya dun thum ril li li/ myags myags myags/ srog la thun zad/ rag sha srog la phrig
32b1(rnying rgyud): thig/ a ba ti li ki ni yam br-i ts+li k+Shi tri tan gro ma ri bad+ma srog la dun b+ho/ ma d+hA pAg sha zlumA ril rbang / sarba tse d+ha sha 'gri ba prA mA ling / gsod sgra gcod byed 'phrog byed kyis// ma sa las la bstsags par 'gyur// nr-i hur thams rbaH sha tra~M mA ra ya tang
32b2(rnying rgyud): a mu ka mA ra ya nu ma ka ma rA sod sod/ gsad pa thun gyi dmod pa'o// byi sha mi ki du ru mi tri ka ta dz+wa le a tA dz+wa la swA hA/ tsa pa ti rA hu la ma hA kro d+ha ka pa shaM ra shar ta shar ti hU~M phaT/ biM shu la du ma gi she dz+wa la an/ mu hA tsat+ta rag sha hi dwe nri ma so ru trAs
32b3(rnying rgyud): rA ka rA tsa piM ga a nan+ta ragra hi sar+b+ba rAk+ShIn tsit+ta b+ha mi ku ru/ mu Shi tsan+ta dus bu du ma bu/ kha la rag sha thu ma ri li lI/ ma ma sa ma ya trag rag sha trag rag sha ma tri ga na/ ma sa kha ya ku ru ti tse b+hA li mu ta da ra dA ra/ tri kar mi tri/ du le du la/ snying khrag la ril ri
32b4(rnying rgyud): rtswa la thun thun/ trag rag mo hri la hri laM/ shag sha ga/ sha ra shar zad/ ma ma tsa gA sha trag tu phrom/ a se lA mi byi ru luR+YA lum me tAg rag sha hri la hri la sha ra b+h+yo/ mA ra ya raM hri la shar b+h+yo/ she la tra h+ni drag tu rtsa ra shu tAM pr-i ka ra br-i/ phyir ma ti pa shad/ mi
32b5(rnying rgyud): ki rir hu la shag shag trai lnga pho pa/ khrag la tsa ra mu sha b+h+yo/ trugra ram thun shag ri la ra ma shar b+h+yo/ bdung pro ka ra shu ti phreM/ nag hri la se nA sha ga sa du ma yA hri la b+h+yo/ pre ta pa sha ya ya ma sI da ya ma khrag/ rA hu la hril hril shag shag/ ser se ra/ hug tug+sa/
32b6(rnying rgyud): yA ya/ phob pho ba/ mu ka ye/ ka pa ye/ a pa yau/ sti byi srin te/ dzo pa ti ra hu la ma hA kro ti ka bab ta shar sha la ta te hU~M phaT/ thig nig/ shu ti pro/ bdud phreM/ mthongs phye/ lcags sgog khrol/ mi reng sod/ chang rde chung mo rbo ru dzu ru/ ho/ pra
32b7(rnying rgyud): phreM/ mur mu ra sha/ du ru phreM/ thog hUM hUM sod sod/ rlung dang sprin dang rab rgya dang / phyogs dang rtags kyi tshad ldan pas/ dbab pa'i sbyor ba shes par bya/ steng 'og par gsum drag po'i las// gzhug dang gtor dang bsreg pa'i dang // bskol dang
33a1(rnying rgyud): dgug dang sbeng ba dang // bod dang dmod dang gdung ba dang // gzir dang skyor dang gzhig pa dang // gcad dang dril ba'i las rnams kyis// smin pa'i lo thog 'joms par byed// nag po ti pa tse yan rag sha/ rA dza d+he gu la phe shA rag sha nAn/
33a2(rnying rgyud): pos/ shi ka shig/ hu ya hu ya/ tir+ya tir+ya/ kA la nA ge bar+d+ha dgra bom+bA ra ya dzaH/ nAg pau ti pe tsa ya phe sha ra ga sha dzaHnA ga ka ka la phe sha rag sha dzaHdzaHi sha na nA ga ti pa tsa ya dgra bo ma ra ya dzaH/ nA ga rA dza sha ga ti srog ti la rbad/ snying la rol/ sha shed
33a3(rnying rgyud): nang / i shan nA na/ be sha rag sha u nana?/ nA ga nA ni thi yai nAn/ pi li nAn/ tsi ri nAn/ a par sod rma ba// dA la du laM kA la rngu bas myogs thibs/ mA ra ya 'dus 'dus/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ru ru/ ra ra/ ti ti/ dri mo ta ti/ ga ru gar gtor dza mar te gang /
33a4(rnying rgyud): man dzaHye sha na ra ga sha u ta nAn/ b+ha shi ni/ sha ri le/ shu ru mu le/ d+hA taM ma re na/ hu ya hu ya/ ra ti rA ti/ thi ri shag rtsig gi/ nr-i mA ra tri ya ma du ya ma snying ya ma khrag tshal pa bi ril/ nag po ti pa rag sha nAn/ khug ro la baM/ dgra bo mA ra ya dzaH/ nag po
33a5(rnying rgyud): snying lA dzaH/ shag shan dA ne/ khrug thum ril zad/ tsad dr-i rag sha ro nga khrag thun kA la spring la thu ma ril dang / kA la shwo ro snying la drag sha ha ra ka/ a mra kA s+phA rA ya thA ma ri la ra dA nAn/ lcags dang 'gri dang las byed pa'i// rang gi rtags dang ldan pa na/
33a6(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i las la sbyar bar bya// zlog dang ma grub 'khyil pa dang // 'byams dang sdug dang zad mthar gtugs// gnyen po 'dab ma sna sel dang // bsdu dang spo dang mi zad gteru// phyo ngas spyong thug pa med pa yis// dbyings kyi dang du gtod par bya// sde brgya
33a7(rnying rgyud): so'i ming gi sngags// rang skad dmod pa'i yan lag la// d+he ba a byaM sarba spyod zlog/ bral dun rtse phob/ badz+ra 'brog sho sa ma ya hri b+h+yo/ ba pan ti ma ru ru/ ya ma tri ga b+hu tak+Shi pa la hUM/ ba zlog bsgyur gdug pa'i drag sngags kyis// las kyi mthang
33b1(rnying rgyud): lus par// nga 'am nga dang 'dra ba yi// rdo rje 'dzin pa gzhan rnams kyis// phyi nang gsang ba'i las rnams kyis// gang la bsngags pa de dag sbyar// gzhan gyis the tshom mi bya ste// nga dang dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis// de la reg par snang ba yin// zhes
33b2(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las phrin las dmigs pa'i khyad par las sbyar ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// yon tan bstod pa 'di gsungs so// hU~M dur khrod chen po'i rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/
33b3(rnying rgyud): gtum drag me ltar 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na// gdug byed ru Tha sti ra'i khri stengs na// mdangs ldan nyi pra pad+ma'i gdon stongs na// drags pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtso// bcom ldan dpal chen stobs ldan nag po ni// sku mdog mthing nag rab tu 'bar/
33b4(rnying rgyud): sa dgu rdzogs pas dbu dgu bstan// stong pa bcwa brgyad ldan pa'i phyag/ zhabs kyis brjid pa'i bdud bzhi gnon// dbus mthing g.yas dkar g.yon dmar byas// khro zhing bzhad dang gtsigs pa'i zhal// ral pa kham dgra srid rtser 'bar// khams
33b5(rnying rgyud): gsum ma lus spyan gyis gzigs// shangs kyis srid gsum ma lus rngub// snyan gyis stong gsum 'brug sgras 'gangs// choms kyis gnod gdug ma lus sgrol// ljags kyis glog dmar 'jig rten khyab// dro gnyer 'od kyis dbang du sdud// drin las
33b6(rnying rgyud): rigs kyis dbul brgyan// bcwa brgyad phyag gi dang po gnyis// dbang srung rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// g.yas g.yon 'og ma'i phyag brgyang na// dregs pa'i lha brgyad b+han d+ha g.yas// tset+ta srog rtsa g.yon na bsdams// 'bar ba'i mas kyis sba la brgyan// bsrung
33b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i lha brgyad sku la rdzogs// g.yas g.yon zhabs kyis dregs pa gzir// ma rungs gdul dka' rnams kyi gshed// log wA ru tra 'dul ba'i dpal// 'byung lnga'i bdag mo gnyis med yum// dbu gsum phyeg drug zhabs bzhi sbyor// gri gug tri shUl bdud
34a1(rnying rgyud): g.yas// b+han d+ha zhang chen g.yang gzhi g.yon// mthing nag bod kyis kun du khyab// ched 'ga' rigs kyi sprul pa 'di// dbu gsum phyug drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // sku pa dog mthing dag khros shing rngam// phyag drug gapas ga'od
34a2(rnying rgyud): po yis// rdo rjes dung khrag dkrug cing gsol// g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi phyag bzhi yis// lha brgyad klu brgyad tsit+ta ro la// yum chen zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// sku mdog mthing nag zhabs gnyis sbyor// g.yas kyis nam mkha' stong khams
34a3(rnying rgyud): 'degs// g.yon gyis 'jig rten sa gzhi gnon// zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char ma// dpal chen yab yum byin rlabs las// sprul pa'i dregs pa pho mo gtso// bdud mo nag mo kha rlangs can// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // khram shing
34a4(rnying rgyud): shAl g.yas na bsnams// g.yon gyis kha T+wAM zhags pa 'phen// na bza' zhing lpags rlon pa gsol// zhabs gnyi sa gdug pa'i snying gar gzir// bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma// khram bi zod rlon phyag na bsnams// skra la zhing lpags gsar pa
34a5(rnying rgyud): nas// bdud rta nag po chibs su bcibs// zhabs kyis dgra bgegs pashugs kyis sgrol// 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog gnag/ phyag g.yas zong khrag gri gug g.yon// btsun mo yum chen zla byed ma//
34a6(rnying rgyud): gri gug thod pa byug ni bsnams// yab yum zhing lpags rlon pa gsol// ma he khros dang chu glang bcibs// zhabs kyis dgra bgegs pho mo gzir// srin po gsod byed sku mdog gnag/ phyag na ral gri zod khrag bsnams// yum chen garjod par
34a7(rnying rgyud): byed ma yang // gri gug mi thod phyag na bsnams// na bza' zhing lpags rlon pa gsol// stag seng rol pa chibs su bcibs// gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po yang // zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo// dar nag 'phyir zhing zhing lpags pa rdeg
34b1(rnying rgyud): can ga pa sa gzugs// phun dul 'dzin snyan pas// ga na bas// drug sa grug ga/ nga drug rgya banas sa// bdag / thAl sgru bdun 'ang// napa byu da ga ra byun gad
34b2(rnying rgyud): nam rgya dkar po bcibs// ba rA pa nag po 'i N+Di// mcho ga tong drug thun phyug na bsnams// zhing ljags gyon ti man na me rnaM bas// dmu bdud rje ba'i drug pa ni// ngar dag 'gyur zhing skor 'dred// bair nag gsol 'di sa ba cibs//
34b3(rnying rgyud): rA la ya ga sha ny+tsi// mthing nas/ khar+d+ha tri shwalpA 'dzin// zhing lpags bkris te mA he ba ci bas// khyab 'jug rog te nag po yang // khram zhing dkri hU~M ga gis 'dzin// sprin nig pagos te 'brug sngon bcoM bas// klu rgyal brda/ yi Ta// seng nag
34b4(rnying rgyud): rnas par gas/ rjes rtswa'i phyag gis dzin/ byas sas srin mag dgu bcibs// bral ba nyi mdzas zhes byag// mdog ku na der dgar 'dzin// skyes mchog 'bar po mi po / ma du mye g.yas la shin ma
34b5(rnying rgyud): sa prA sa dog dam ba// rjematshan dgras phyag gis 'dzin// la lag da 'byung ba dang // mdu ga gsur sdus pa'i lag dgu 'gyid// rlung gegs thegs shing srir gadzan// drag sngags bdag pa gtso 'khor yang // byig rigs kyi 'ang
34b6(rnying rgyud): 'dum ga/ pa so'i stsal pa bsam mo b+h+ya// gang par rjod du dun te// 'a byur bye shi / nas byeng gi sa slo // ba bzung ba zhin sbyin 'o// d+hag sa la rgya ba sa ste// dang gdon 'babs pam
34b7(rnying rgyud): rnam mapa' dbang sbyar ga zar me the// blod thugs gdug pa kri ma glai/ rje bcu ngamed pa'i drug sngags cen// sa sung nga rngu phrul bas po mi byag// 'khor ring sngo rigs brjid 'i rang // phrin 'as rje srungs meng gter// yod ta rus pa
35a1(rnying rgyud): med// zhe sdang can la ltos par ston// nga rgyal can la lhag par ston// 'dod chags can la mi smu ga ston// gti mug can la myos par ston// ser sna can gyis 'phrog par byed// phrag dog can la 'jigs par ston// khyod kyis mi 'dul
35a2(rnying rgyud): gcig med kyis// mchod cing bskang ba'i thun rdzas bzhes// bcol cing gnyer ba'i las mdzod cig/ bstod cing bsgrub pas las mdzod dgyes par mdzod// de nas rang gi snying po dang // 'jig rten dregs pa'i bdag po rnams// so so'i sngags kyi las
35a3(rnying rgyud): la sbyar// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis// byang chub sems kyi bsam pa yis// ltos dang re bkun spangs te// sangs rgyas bstan pa rab dmigs nas// drag sngags bdag po nyer bsgrubs na// nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa thob cing //
35a4(rnying rgyud): mas can rnams kyi ston par 'gyur// thun mong ba dang nye ba dang // mchog 'gyur ring ba'i dngos grub kun// dpa' bo de las mngon du 'byung // yon tan mchog gi stobs rnyed cing // 'jig rten chos las rab bsngags pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
35a5(rnying rgyud): sa chen po la rtogs pa yi// rlabs chen rnams kyang nus par spyod// mthu stobs nus pa bsnyems pa yis// gzhan gyis brdzi bar mi nus shing // rang gi dbang du khugs pa dang // bsgo brtsod pa med par 'gyur/ zhes bka' stsal to// drag
35a6(rnying rgyud): sa 'dus pa rtsa pa'i rgyud las bstod pa yon tan brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas badz+ran ldan 'angs rdo rje 'dzin pa chenas s+ho/ nyid kyi skye 'jigs byed chen po'i lugs su swA sprul te/ thugs chos nyid zhi bachen tha'i ting rje 'dzin la
35a7(rnying rgyud): mas par zhugs nas/ sku'i gnas thams cad las 'od kyi dra ba dpag tu med pa phyung nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dregs pa can gyi gnas thams cad khyab par mdzad nas// ma rungs shing gdug pa dang gtum pa'i sems dang
35b1(rnying rgyud): bsam pa thams cad kyang ma lus par zhi ba byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par gyur te/ phan pa dang / bde ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / brtse ba dang / yid dga' ba dang bcas pas phyogs der snang bar gyur nas/ thams cad kyis bcom
35b2(rnying rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // khyod kyi bstan pa gsang chen 'di// ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag tu// rab tu rgyas par 'gyur zhig na// bdag cag 'jig rten dregs
35b3(rnying rgyud): nan// zhi ba'i sems su gnas byas pas// rjes su spyod pa gang yin pa// de la rgyas pa phan par bstan// phrin las dang ni lta spyod kyis// khyab pa de las yongs rdzogs shing // grogs dang bran dang dmongs bzhin du// gang gis
35b4(rnying rgyud): bsgo ba de bzhin bgyi// dam tshig bsrungs pa'i yon tan dang // rol pa'i ting 'dzin ldan pa la// bka' las 'da' ba mi spyod cing // gsung bzhin bsgrub pa rab tu spro// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin khyod kyis// ji ltar mngags pa'i las rna
35b5(rnying rgyud): ni// bdag cag nus pas myur du bsgrub// byin gyis brlab pa gtsor mdzod cig/ ces gsol nas rang rang gi gnas su dengs shing phyin par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gyi bkod pa rnams rang gi 'khor gyi snang ba thams cad kya
35b6(rnying rgyud): sku'i dbyings su bsdus shing sku nyid kyang chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin du gnas par mdzad do// drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las phrin las kyi gnyer phul ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzog
35b7(rnying rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi po skyob bdag ze ro mo nas bskur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgyal po / khri srong ldo bo rkyed kyi b+ha'i phyag dpel zhal be yus pa las brgyad pa'o//
36a1(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kA la nA tha g+ha ya tsit+ta tsakra sid+hi ma hA hi ta ta nA/ bod skad du/ dpal mgon po nag po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo dngos grub chen po 'byung ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum po gzi byin can la phyag 'tshal
36a2(rnying rgyud): lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum po rngams pa'i rgyal po nyid/ lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog lhun gyis grub pa'i pho brang chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang bcas pa khro bo rngam pa'i rol pa dang / 'jig
36a3(rnying rgyud): rten gyi dregs pa can pho mo dmod pa'i mtshon cha can dang / lha dang mkha' 'gro ma mang po 'dus pa'i dbus na/ chos nyid las sku bzhengs te/ dregs pa can 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal mgon po nag
36a4(rnying rgyud): po zhes bya ba/ gsang ba'i yum dang bcas pa/ sbal pa'i srog gshed dang po nya'i las mkhan dang / sgrol ging shan pa po mo dang bcas pa de nyid du lhags te rab rtags srog gi snying po/ gdug pa'i dmod pa'i mtshon cha can/ rdo rje gtum po la mdongs
36a5(rnying rgyud): gsol du phul lo// smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM mI mai hA k+Sha la tri ya~M dzaHdzaH/ dgra bo mA ra ya nan/ mA ra ya sod/ nag po dgra bo'i sha chud sgreng 'di thon thon/ bdud po dgra bo'i srog la dzaH/ nag po dgra bo'i brtsa la dzoH \u0f7f/ nag po dgra po'i
36a6(rnying rgyud): snying rgyal po ho/ nag po das po'i klad pa'i rtsal dzA / nag po dgra bo'i snying cud dbugs la dza \u0f7f/ nag po dgra po'i nashud stsog la dza / hrI na hU~M/ ma hrI/ dzi hrI/ bas nir hU~M s+t+wa~M/ ma mtsholas la blo/ ha la ha la hU~M phuT/ ces
36a7(rnying rgyud): rgyun kyang song par phul lo// mgon po gsang bskang gi 'khor po nag pa'i byung ladu/ gleng gzhi dang sngags ston pa'i len dang par// den mi dpal mgon pa chen po rnam thos bris kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sar+b+barmA/
36b1(rnying rgyud): 'khras pa nas// al 'a 'ar ga/ tshul can// 'jigs drung mas pa paganas dngas can// thal byed kun pa rdungag grags// rnam par can gyim gan thar pa'o// thanan nga bsgrub na ngar byab// bas dbang sras sra gang tha ba dang // sras /
36b2(rnying rgyud): 'phrul dbab pa dang // drag po thugs kyis bskal pa dang // me tig jams pa la chags pa// las ri ma rdzogs pangs pa// des gsol bas/ rdo rjeg rgyas pas di ny-i ces gsungs so// sarba kA mas la cad// legs can dag pam
36b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgra// bdud 'dul rnams kyi dbang phyug ste// rnal 'byor kun gyi dgra bla yin// rig 'don kun gyi sog shing yin// gsang ba'i yum dang sbal par bcas// ri gsum rtse bdus dben pa'i sar// nags tshal rtsub mo gcan gzan 'khrims/
36b4(rnying rgyud): yid 'ong gnas su maN+Dal bsham// ku gsum mthing nag zla gam bstan// grum po thod pa bdun gyis bskor// mu chad sgo bzhi rdo rjes ni// dbus su gru gsum bsnol ma la// 'bub gnas bzhi dang ldan par bya// ga'u steng 'og ga
36b5(rnying rgyud): lo'i bar// hU~M srog ca dmigs pa gzhug/ kha skad spa shad thag pas bcings// steng du dgra bac+doMs nag po bzhag/ lug nag pags pa tsa kA li// mda' nag dar gyis brtan pa dgod// po rdzas drug dang mo rdzas khrag/ tshogs par dgra bo'i thun yang
36b6(rnying rgyud): bca'// mon mo chen po'i thod pa ru// gnag pa'i dgra bgegs bcas la gzhag/ zlum po'i thod pa re re la// dug shing phur bu re re dgod// gru chad la sogs maN+Dal te// mthun pa'i dam rdzas 'di dag dgram// sha sA lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga// dkar
36b7(rnying rgyud): gsum mngar gsum me tog spos// chang dang la phug tsan+dan rnams// zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs dgra ma// mtshan ldan thod par rag dang // gtor ma bshams la dbul bar bya// de nas bdag nyid skad cig gis// byad ni rdo rje gas 'byas nas// thug ga'is
37a1(rnying rgyud): bon 'od 'gros pas// khro bo mang pos gzir baphrad nas// gzhal med khang dag bsam dbus su// bla ma ye dam dkyil 'khor tshogs// bsod nams tshogs rdzogs stong nyid las// hUMlas bdag nyid khro bo'i mdun//
37a2(rnying rgyud): swat+ma kA la 'jigs byed che// sku mdog nag po mun pa'i mdangs// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste// skya la mtha' bar brtsegs pa gsol// chibs su dpa' bo stag la bcibs// phyag na tsa rjen ping chen bsdams// dam dang drang /
37a3(rnying rgyud): kyi.oM lnga 'dren cing // lcags kyi bu khra phyi nas 'brangs// ce spang nag po khrag rjes gcod// srog gcong khro bo 'jigs pa'i sku// spu gri mi snying thogs pa dang // tri shul rgyal mtshan dung 'bud dang // gsad byed mon pa bdun dang baHswa/
37a4(rnying rgyud): spyan drang mchod dang bzlas brjod cing // de tshe mtshan rtags byung ba dang // sgra dang 'od dang mon nag dang // brje nag po slob dpon dang // mi nag lo sogs byung ba dang // dngos su sku yang ston par 'gyur// dpal mgon po nag po gsang ba snying gi
37a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo nag po'i rgyud las/ bsnyen cing bsgrub pa ste rtog pa gnyis pa'o// / de nas rdo rje gtum po yis// bsang ba'i sbyor ba bshad par bya// bam chen mo yi thod pa ru// tshwa ba gsum dang lci ba dang // sra dang dri ma rkang rjes dang /
37a6(rnying rgyud): thag sa bangs dang dar khrag gis// dbang po chong pa'i 'dra 'bag bya// gu gul rgya tshil dud pas bdug/ thod pa sngags kyi 'khor lor gtum// gdug pa'i ri bas kha bcad la// bsad pa'i sngags la 'jug par bya// srod dang tho rangs gung
37a7(rnying rgyud): gti pa la// mngangar thun raM sngags ri zhugs// las rdzogs brar gang ba gris gtub la// der nag gsum pa dkar dag gis// mtshan ngan thod par bcug nas ni// karten lha yi khang pa'am// gdug pa gnas pa'i sa ru lanan//
37b1(rnying rgyud): mdzub rdzanas rje mamyong / dgra pa chag sar la tri phaT/ a hU~M can mo thal pa/ kaut+te spel pa/ mu ka trel ya/ hrId+hi ma skyes pa/ pata k+She bA ya/ oMrbatamarnam de la/ tAn Ta/ chug sos bat+tA Ta/ phung ba ga ba dang da dang
37b2(rnying rgyud): sngags// brjod dang rjod pa drag tu gdab// dpal mgon po nag po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ bsad pa'i sbyor ba bstan pa'i le'u gartog pa gsum pa'o// / de nas rdo rje gtum po yis// sprul pa nges pa 'ad
37b3(rnying rgyud): b+he/ rdo rjo dpe bai ma leng // phungs grasum dang gnyen mi gnyis// nang du sring rdum sngags bris la// kha mig drug dang khrag gis bya// gang miyang zlas na tha rjen 'babs// gzhan yang la spel bril sogs// sha la gzugs byas dang
37b4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// gcan gzan gdug pa p+pa 'byin cing // gnas yang 'jig dang grong khyer bskor// khra dang 'ug pa srin bya dang // kang ka ta bo mdzod la sogs// she khrag su la gzugs pas wa// 'dab chags bu gcan khwa 'debs dang // 'thab
37b5(rnying rgyud): dang brer 'dzings gnas khyeng 'bab// ka sbrul gdug pa k+Sha granasas// sha khrag bsres te gzugs byas su// sa bdag klu yi cho 'phrul 'bebs// dran sngags khri phrag gsum rdzogs nas// sbyor ba smin pa'i dus chen la// grong khyer phyogs bcu
37b6(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul 'babs// oM shrI ma hA kA la dzi yaM dzaH ngoH/ che ge mo ka pA le t+yas/ ha la ha la du ling hal pho ba/ bi sha rtse rlung sing / khra ma kham du ling has pho pa/ ling ling pu ta du na sham dun ling has pho ba/ nA ga b+ha nug du ling has pho ba/ rtsa ba dmigs pa mi dang po//
37b7(rnying rgyud): ga kyi byur ba bslab sa pas 'bru'o// dpal mgon pa nag pagasang ba snying tig gi khar ponag po'i rgyud las/ lus ngan gyi brog zlog pa bzhi ba'o// den pa rdo gtum po mes// lo tog 'joms pa'i las bshad pa/
38a1(rnying rgyud): na na / la na / sa /
38a2(rnying rgyud): ga sung dun na tsho dzig/ dgazugs kyang 'gas pa dang // byangs babye pa thag sagatur// 'atag thas cid/ b+h+ri du 'tsham par yi y-i/ ga
38a3(rnying rgyud): dang shib// de rje ma yin ga/ rje gdu dag rgyung yang la sebs 'dum/ 'a mi mthu dzim la stsu gang ga da ba nas mer ba dag tu na/ ganga'abyudu srin po stsa na// rang sngags kyis 'dabs gyu ma//
38a4(rnying rgyud): dan pan nyi shrI'i dzi 'a la/ ste byu bya ba'i ga ma pa pa dri dang gtum panas// byed par dag pa bslal pa bas/ 'byo 'a pa pa/
38a5(rnying rgyud): pa gta dang // ming ma rdzogs pa'i ras sa // rdul ma thug pa stong drag pa// myi gag tu la nam ma// mabyung gsum pab bdun byabs// rig pa sal gyi ngas du'o// gang ga ga nga po yaH/
38a6(rnying rgyud): yi byer// chu rtsos drug la 'dun// gri nang zid pa'i ning ngur// chung dkar cang nag ni mthag/ thun gyi rdzas su rab tu brdugs// drigi sngags mda' dang bcas gling bsreg/ theg sa mi sngags kyi bar du grangs// 'khor /
38a7(rnying rgyud): ngal bar zung // brgyam rgyardzogs nas sngags sur byu'o// dag sa masaskyong dang tsho pa dang ba 'jig rjegs kyil// rdzogs nas 'char ba'i dri byad/ bshing drirtsa 'an/ mdzan
38b1(rnying rgyud): rnying par mnan// de yis brlag par yang dag bshad// gal te lus la mthu med na// bzlog cing dgug pa rnal ma bya// thod pa mun pa'i 'od khung ngam// gdug pa gnas pa'i sa ru mnan// de yis las kun 'grub par 'gyur//
38b2(rnying rgyud): ya bgra sha ya yin pas na// kun la bya bar ma gsungs so// oM shrI ma tA kA la tI yaM dzaHdzaH/ dgra bo mA ra ya dzaH/ dgra bo'i srog la phyogs/ tsit+taM khas/ rak+ta thibs hUM li mA ra ya zad/ dgra bo mA ra ya hUM li ya li/ rak+ta
38b3(rnying rgyud): thibs tsit+ta khas/ srog la myog la rbad/ dgra bo m+ba ru ya srog la myog/ hU~M ling yi lid rAk+Sha thibs rbad/ ngan sngags skye ba rgyan gcod de// khyad par mchog gi las su bshad// mgon po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo nag po'i rgyud las/
38b4(rnying rgyud): khyad par gsang ba'i las bstan pa'i le'u ste rtog pa dug pa'o// / de nas rdo rje gtum po yis// rdo rje drag po 'jigs pa che// mgon po nag por mtshan gsol ba// las la phrin las 'di yis bskul// hU~M/ che btsan
38b5(rnying rgyud): dpe med mgon po nag po ni// sku la dang nag 'jol ber gsol// dbu la sbrul gyi ral pa can// mi yi thod pas dbu la brgyan// gdong mig dmar la mche ba gtsigs// stag gi sngar me ltar 'bar// snyan che mgur chu mi zod
38b6(rnying rgyud): dmyur// gser ka rin chen sku yi rgyan// zhabs la l+h+wam ti ldum po che// chibs su dpa' bo stag la bcibs// phyag na tsan+dan bing chen bsnams// gsor zhing klad pa'i rgyas su 'debs// song zhig khong gi snying phyung zhig/ lha chen
38b7(rnying rgyud): mgon po nag po khyod// nga la sdang ba'i dgra bo 'di// myur du sod la rnam par rgyob// skyo ru chug la 'bog tu chug/ lha chen mgon po nag po dang // lha mo nag mo gnyis mu med// lha mo nag mo gshegs su gsol// lha mo nag mo chen
39a1(rnying rgyud): po ste// sku mdog dasang nag ral pa can// g.yas na bdud rtsi khrum shing bsdams// g.yon na nad kyi rgyal pa thogs// chibs su dre'u r+d+ha nang gsum chi bas// dra ba dgra yi haM le bkal// khyod kyi thugs dam
39a2(rnying rgyud): dus la bab// sru yi sprul pa'i lam ma khani ni// mun pa dag po gtum bag can// skye mdog nag po mun pa'i mdangs// tri shUl yi rtse mo la// mi ro dmar po'i rgyal mtshan phyar// dar nag cu mtshon chen po yis// lha srid sde brgyang
39a3(rnying rgyud): dmag dpung sdud// mgon po nag po las la g+ho// gsung gi sprul pa'i las mkhan ni// mon pa nag po 'jigs pa'i sku// sku mdog dmar nag 'jigs pa la// ma he'i dA dung chen po yis// snang srid lha 'dre sgra yis 'bod// gtum chen
39a4(rnying rgyud): ga po las la b+h+rUM// thugs kyi sprul pa'i las mkhan ni// lcags kyi mun pa gsod byed de// sku mdog sngo nag rngas pa'i zhal// lag na spu gri tsi bsdams// spu kri'i dgra bo'i khong gshegs nas// hU~M zung nas gtsol rdzob// bdud
39a5(rnying rgyud): kyison pa nag po bdun// bdud nag 'bus kyi sna drangs nas// nyams pa'i dgra yul dmag gis 'gengs// lho phyogs gshin rje chen po brgyad// khyod kyi 'khong dang g.yog yin pas// gcan gzan mang po po zhir 'gyed// byang
39a6(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin chen po brgyad// lcags kyi byu khwa 'jigs par sprul// nyams pa'i sha dang nus pa 'jal// ngur khrod gnas kyi ma mo brgyad// lho dang dza yi skra sgrogs shing // nyams pa'i dgral zor thun 'bebs// lha chen mgon po nag po ste/
39a7(rnying rgyud): mahA s+dza mdzuN+Dal can// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra pa 'di// dkon mchog gsum gyi sru dgra yin// rnal 'byor yongs kyi phyid gra yin// sngags 'chang bdag pa banas btsugs so// sring mkhrod la phreng brdzogs mo// zhes
39b1(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa rgya// darnas pa dgang sa gsungs ba// gsang ba na ga sgrub pa// dbyung banan pa da 'as na / mun nan ba dngas/ na da// snron bdag shA na sangs bya//
39b2(rnying rgyud): khrur dpal 'bar chen po nyid// ma hA che bcan dpe med de// k+ShA la 'od 'bar dreg shul can// trizhis sgrol ging shan pa bskul// yaM ni drag po rkyang gi shugs// nga nyid dkrugs pa'i lcags bya yin// dmigs pa gang yin dgug pa ste/
39b3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba macag gi bdag po 'i// khams gsum mthu chen bdag pa ste// mad+hA kA la gyod la 'dud// gang dag gsung ba'i snying po la// myos sas yid la byed pa yis// khams gsus dbang du spyad pa dang // srid gsul zil gyis gnan pa dang // no
39b4(rnying rgyud): rgyal po chu dang cu// marungs gcan gzan la sogs pa// 'jigs pa che las yongs su thar// tshe dang dbang zang la sogs pa// longs spyod 'phel zhing dbul ba sel// dpag bsam sngon bzhin rgyas pa dang // nad dang lhag bsngal ra bzhinas// 'jig
39b5(rnying rgyud): rten mi ba rgyal mtshan du// grags pa chen po bla med 'gyur// mgan po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo nag po'i rgyud las/ mgon po la zin las bcol ba dang / bstod pa dang yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste rnyog pa bdun pa'o//
39b6(rnying rgyud): mgon po nag po mo rgyud gsang ba dngos grub 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ bod kyi ban+de khri btsan rdo rje la gtad pa'o// sa ma yA/ rgya rgya rgya/ kA zag bya/ rgya rgya rdzogs so// / de nas gnod sbyin chen po rnam thos sras kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'ja
39b7(rnying rgyud): skad ces gsol to// ma hA kA la khros pa che// rnal 'byor kun gyi mgon gyur pa// nyid kyi sgrub pa de ltar ni// sprul pa srog gshed las mkhan de// grol byed shan pa'i las khe gang // rdo rje gtum pos bka' stsal pa// ma hA kA la dza/
40a1(rnying rgyud): 'brar ba// rnal 'byor kun gyi dgra b+ha yin// de yi las mkhan lon pa dang // las kyi ma bdun po nya mngag/ las kyi mtha' ru bzhag pa yin// lcags kyi mon pa khrag 'azung ni// nag ma byang
40a2(rnying rgyud): sol du ma bang // de nag brag nag logs la bsngags// bya rog rta rog yon nag khrag/ g.yag nod brag nag sa la sgur// gru gsum mthing nagA khyi nag mgo// yang na mon nag rabs chad bod// a mu ka yaM gzugs dang bcas//
40a3(rnying rgyud): dngar nag gur dbub thun gyis bsad// gdug pa'i drag sngags 'di dag bzlas// dun du trag du thum b+ha ti srog breng breng du na tri dzaH/ bdud po dgra bo'i srog la dza dzaH/ oM ser phrum phrum la ga re khas ha he// sad ni smad ni dgra bo'i srog tse le tsa le
40a4(rnying rgyud): mA ra tsi d+hu dza hUM dzaH/ mA ra ya rbang / bror btegs phur gdab pa gris gtub la// mun pa'i gling du gnan par bya// mgon po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ lcags kyi mon pa spyi ring mngag pa las/ phyi ma'i rtog pa brgyad pa'o//
40a5(rnying rgyud): de nas rdo rje gtum po yis// srog gcod mon pa snying 'byin te// dkar po phywa sangs mngag par bya// dar dkar ras sam rgya shog pa// lha khang rnying pa'i ka rten sa// cong zi ha shig rgya tshwa dang // ra dkar rta dang byad kar khrag/ bsres te lte ba
40a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo bca'// 'brub gnas e gting ga'u bca'// dar dkar gur phub drag sngags bzlas// rdzogs dang 'khor lo ga'ur bcas// lha yi khang par sbas par bya// smyo 'bog nad kyis nges par na// myur du brlag par ngas bshad do//
40a7(rnying rgyud): rA tsatsa pa la a shug ma dA tsa srog la rdorje/ yung ba dbya sangs la sham sham tsirba ha la yang ti par med// thig sum mang gsal bar chad spangs// mgon po gsang ba stong gi 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ rlung gi med pa phrag gtsor
40b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u las/ phyi ma'i rtog pa ste dgu pa'o// / de nas rdo rje gtum po yis// mon mo lcags kyu mngag pa ste// rdo rje sder can gtum mthas// mngag pa'i pho nya las mkhan sa// dur khrod gnas su slab par
40b2(rnying rgyud): pre sha 'bun gdug gtor rten// las kyi thod pa mtshan ngan du// a mu ka yi gzugs dang bcas// dme khrag dug snga gnyen mtsho'i chu// sngags te thun gyis yong bar bstun// las rdzogs ling+ga skud pas dri la// ma mo'i gzugs
40b3(rnying rgyud): bas 'og gzhug/ klu mo nag mo gnas sar mnan// ma tra ga ra k+ka nag mo ting lam b+h+yo/ nag mo dun snying las la b+h+yo/ mun rag+ma tsa mur kha la b+h+yo// khrag 'thung khol po mtshan rtags yin// dang po dang mdog 'gyur rtags yin pas
40b4(rnying rgyud): dgra la zor 'phong brnag par bya// mgon po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo nag po'i rgyud las/ zag 'thung mon mo las la mngag pa'i le'u ste/ las kyi phyi ma'i rtog pa bcu pa'o// / de nas rdo rje gtum po yis// gdug pa mon pa ga
40b5(rnying rgyud): 'debs kyi// drag sngags dam pa bshad par bya// klu gnyen gdug pa'i dben gnas su// de yi sa la maN+Dal bya// dri spos sman gyis chag chag gdab// gnyen ra dgu yi shing sna la// 'o sngar byas te rten du gzugs// sbal pa'i
40b6(rnying rgyud): bar 'khor lo bri// sbal nag khrag dang sbrul dang ni// ba dmar da ta mdze khrag la// thun dang 'khor lo bri bar bya// dkar gtor klu sman sna tshogs bsag/ gdug pa klu yi gzugs byas la// gdug pa gnas sar de yis mnan//
40b7(rnying rgyud): yi gas sngags 'di dag go// sdu ga tu ta~M rA gdur te nA ga ru le he 'dus sa ma ya/ dgra bo'i rtsa la ha la ro gan na/ dro la ni dz+wa la ni shu khrim myags thib rbad/ zhag grangs gsum rdzogs 'khor lo mnan// kha so zor kha dgral bstan// dpa
41a1(rnying rgyud): namanan sadag po gsang bsing gi 'a khar ma'i rgyud las/ drug gison pasgral nag can gyi le'u las/ las phyis rtog pa ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de pa gtas pa 'is// dadu
41a2(rnying rgyud): pa mngag pa'i las// thag dmar logs 'byin nas kyang // mnga' dmar bshos dmar sha khrug rten// gong gsum sa mar rakas/ ga'u bcas te i gting bzhag/ de nas 'gal pa'i gzugs byas la// zhag dgur drug brte
41a3(rnying rgyud): gsum menan/ shu b.ratsaN+ye naM dzA yaM/ swa ma pa a b+hi shu ra rAk+Sha tshol pa a nr-i tri m+bA ra ya aM gu shwa dza dzaH/ a ny+tsi shu b+hU ma ya ra tsa be ni ma Na tA tri shaM rbad dzaH/ saM ha ra tsi d+hi b+ha kr-i ku ru dza dzaH/ che ge mo'i srog la tha~Mng phreng / bum tho dzaH/ dza ya/
41a4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsu// dpal mgon po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo nag po'i chud las/ bse mgon mon pa'i le'u ste/ las kyi phyi ma'i rtog pa bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas rdo rje gtum po yis// skyes bu ging chen mngag pa'i thabs/
41a5(rnying rgyud): co spun gsum sha khrag la// la bcos pa long rdob drug/ dang mda' za'u bshos bu rten// srog snying rdzogs dang dgra bo'i gnas// de nyid mthong ngam phyogs kyi rir// kha bstan sprul pa dpag med dbab// las ni srog la gan pa 'gyed/
41a6(rnying rgyud): de yi gsang sngags 'di dag no// badz+ra tA pa du kha dzum tri dza dzaH/ rU ba sarba gu yaM ka sa li ti rgyal ha la ha la du ling has pho ba ya/ zhes gsungs so// dpal mgon po nag po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ mon pa gtum bag
41a7(rnying rgyud): tsan+d+ra las la mngag pa'i le'u kyai/ las kyi phyi ma'i rtog pa bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas rdo rje gtum po yis// las kyi ma bdun mngag pa thun gyis sbyor ba bshad// rabs chad thod pa dri ma spangs// nang du khrag dang dug chus dag
41b1(rnying rgyud): gru gsum spa gA ma'i nang ral du// steng na a mu kA yi gzugs// khrag la dug gi thun brdeg pa// hung dkar cung nag ske chos bdeg/ lin thun thab gnan pa bya// khrag zor dgra yi gnas la dpangs// de yi dag sngags 'ang dag na// ngag
41b2(rnying rgyud): rak+Sha ha la dgra bo mA ra ya dzaH/ tsathAn mA ra ya thun sod/ sha thun song/ mA ra thun sod/ ru ru nag mo mA ra ya thun sod/ ma ma muk+ti 'grin thun song/ ma ma ka trun te ka sod/ ma ma rbad thun mA ra ya thun sod/ shag bA ga rag mo thun lugs mA ra
41b3(rnying rgyud): thun song / mgon po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo nag po'i rgyud las/ gcan gyi ma bdun gyi gsad pa ste/ las phyi ma'i rtog pa bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas gnod sbyin chen po rnam thos sras kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ma
41b4(rnying rgyud): bo nag po zhes bya ba// mtshan don ngo bo gang la bya// bsgrub pa'i tshul ni ji lta bu// las kyi bye brag bstan pa gang // rdzogs par 'khor la bshad par mdzod// rdo rje gtum pos gang gsungs pa// mgon po nag po zhes bya ba// rnal 'byor kun gyi mgo
41b5(rnying rgyud): gyur yin// ngo bo ye shes sprul pa las// ye shes sku ste rdo rje che// de las sprul pa dpal 'bar ba// dam chos bsrung ba'i srung ma ste// rdo rje snying pos lung bstan nas// bstan pa de la mngon sangs rgyas// las kyi pho nya mngag pas te// bdud
41b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal la sogs 'jigs pa'i 'khor// las kyi mgon po zhes su bshad// bgrub pa rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis// bstan pa'i bla srid nyer bzhag ste// dkon mchog bla ma'i don du bsrub// rtswa ba'i sngags la nan tan bya// de rdzogs pa 'u las pa
41b7(rnying rgyud): ra// de dgas sngon du 'ang ba yin// gal te las 'god dmachog bshags// las mtha' 'khor lo drag pasaH// ba srog dang de ga brjod med spangs// dbang po gcig pa bsgrub pa ni// hUM gri slong gi tsho ma yin// @
42a1(rnying rgyud): mar sgrub pa de// nag go hrIng chos can zhes bya// gnagagang gse'ang bsad // las kyi son gsus s+ho sgrubs pas// gsang sa gc-ig 'grub pa san// phyas gdang byad dag par ldad pa// na
42a2(rnying rgyud): cha sngags de la gdags// mtha' ru las gling gang yin gyi// yi ge ma byung gas pa'i nang// dmatshig ldan zhing lta brtogs// dbang babargyun du tham 'jur// de la nus pa dpag med de// rdo rje steng phongs gsungs me// zhes rdo
42a3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po la gsungs te/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams thams cad rjes su yi rangs te/ mngon par bstod do// mgon po gsang ba snying gi 'khor lo las/ 'khor la gdams pa'i 'arje ste bci lnga pa la// / dngos su ba chen po
42a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// / sam yA/ na ra kan/ lo ts+tsha ba garlabs sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskur cing lus te gtan la phab pa'o// / myug skad du/ mI mA d+hu kA la a ga ni rdo tro nA matan+da/ bod srung du/
42a5(rnying rgyud): dpal nag po chen po me lce phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ nag po chen po dang thabs cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig bcom
42a6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das bdag gi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po ni/ drar khrod chen pa po sa lci ba tshel ri'i tshogs dbus na/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' mang po dang / mkha' 'gro dang / shA ba dang / lha dang / bla dang / gnod gyen dang / dzaM za dang / gshin rje/
42a7(rnying rgyud): srin pa mtshogs dang babs cig tu bzhugs te/ ngo 'i co bcom ldan 'das la dpal rdeg po chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// kyem bcom ldan porba pa naH// bdag gis rgyas ji skang pags// bsnyen pa bsrung tshul ji ltar lags
42b1(rnying rgyud): phyir bas rnal 'byor bdun gyis su// rjes su zhugs nas bsrub na ji ltar lags zhes pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so legs ldan nag po khyod// khyod kyi don ni ngas bshad kyis// legs shing
42b2(rnying rgyud): gus pa'i yid kyis nyon// zhes pas/ gleng gzhi gleng bslangs dang bcas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod sngon dur khrod gtum par grags pa zhes bya ba na/ a suM ra'i shong ga
42b3(rnying rgyud): bdag po dang / dud khrod kyi bdag po dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'byung po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / 'dre la sogs pa gnas pa'i phyogs de na/ srin po'i rgyal po yag sha ha ri zhes pa/ rdzu 'phrul
42b4(rnying rgyud): kyi mthu dang ldan cing bzhugs so// srin po'i rgyal po des/ rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha'i rgyal po'i bu mo gcig brkus nas/ dur khrod der khrid nas rang dbang med par chung ma byas so// dus de nas zla ba bdun lon nas srin po'i rgyal po de tshe'i dus byas
42b5(rnying rgyud): nas 'das so// der lha'i bu mo de la srin po'i bu zhugs te/ der lha'i bu mo de srin po'i chung mar gyur pas sus kyang ma 'dod do// der mo gcig pur lus pa las srin po'i phug gu skyes par gyur to// der mo'i bu de snying rje bar tshor nas/ rang gi lus de'i lha'i rgyan
42b6(rnying rgyud): phog ste/ nor bu rin po che gcig dang / gling bar gyi nya pa la nye tshong byas nas gsos so// gling bar gyi rgun 'bu'i sa nas rgun chad byas so// gling bar gyi sgog btsong bskab nas de rnams kyis bu gsos so// de ltar gsos pas bu de yang skye drag la gzug
42b7(rnying rgyud): parang gcig srung ste/ ring por ma thogs par tshor bar gyur to// bu nges pade bslus pa/ ma gcig dag la pha med dam zhes dris pa dang / mas sbas pa/ badzin po yin te 'das so// bus smras pa/ de ltar yin nang cag ma spang sdug pa
43a1(rnying rgyud): rten med pa'i gnas dum zad/ ralangs shes bsad par byangs pas/ dumangad da'asu sgrogs na ris pA la ya na pa nga bags pa nas rgyad pa/ drag srung bad ldad dpam sa byas thab/ 'phags pa pa
43a2(rnying rgyud): dpa' the stsas pa 'id te/ shi pashin ma ni na mams kyi gas rdzun padas/ sa nyid rnam par dag pa jis dag pa 'didi na ma tshan ma zung bya nas na kyi ba rnas/ dra 'ong thag gisatshong ba
43a3(rnying rgyud): dang / 'ag sa ba na kyigs pacwa mdas nga gar du byas so// dpal bdub chen pa'i mngan rnams pa rtsod pa 'dzin pam du ma sa/ de 'di mdzub dam pa tshogs yang pa T+Ti/ nA la kyim rnam pa rdzogs
43a4(rnying rgyud): meng sa she bdun mas// ngan sa rdzing da / del thabs su gsil pa deng mtha'i thos bka 'don cig sang / nyid marnas pa dade/ sa cing grol mnan te/ de'i drung byed // der ma bang po rgyan
43a5(rnying rgyud): sman snga rang yod do// lha'i bu mo des rang gi rno bus mo de phag nas slob dpod de la phul te phyag btsal zhabs la spyi bos gang gas nas 'di skad ces sbas so// bdag rtse'i bu mo lags pas/ las kyi dbang gis srin po'i chung mar gyur te/ srin po
43a6(rnying rgyud): 'angs par gyur nas/ bdag la phung po'i bu thus par gyur tAM/ drug brje lazang par sbyang dus/ da ltar gyi 'di lags so// dri bdag cags sring sa na ma r+g+haMs pas/ me khe n+decan byed la mgo na dang skabs rnam
43a7(rnying rgyud): mjig sa kya nang 'a smra tshun gyilugs kyis 'i zung ba zhes ga me dang / cidru sangs ldan/ rnas gcas pa du partse zer bdags/
43b1(rnying rgyud): mchu'i dbang bskur nas/ chos nyid skye ba med pa'i don bshad/ de'i tshems ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don rtogs/ pus ni sprul pa'i sku'i rdzu 'phrul sgo tshogs 'dabang brtsu bas/ gdug pa can 'dul ba'i las kyi mnga' brnyes/ phyag yang
43b2(rnying rgyud): po dang zhabs dpag tu med par sprul nas/ phyag 'gyur zhing zhabs brdabs pas sa gzhi dang ri rab ldeg par nus so// de nas glob 'brangs 'khor dang bcas pa la dur khrod kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis nyin dang mtshan du bskor ba dang mchod pa chen
43b3(rnying rgyud): brjod par mdzad pa las/ srin po'i myu gu de la slob dpon gyis gsang ba'i dbang las kyi gnyer gtud do// slob dpon pade ldan dpa' bo'i rgyal tshob tu bzhag go// slob dpon pade ldan dpa' bo dang / lha'i bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
43b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis rdo rje dang dril bur gyur te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes su sangs rgyas nas bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la gshegs su gsol/ bde ldan dpa' bos phrin las kyi mdzad stod mthar phyin nas dbyings
43b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes gnyis bu med par sangs rgyas pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang slob dpon chen po skal ldan dpa' bo dur khrod chen po'i gnas na/ sngon gyi slob dpon gyis mdzad pa'i phrin las sna tshogs thams cad ni mdzad/
43b6(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i phrin las sna tshogs ni 'dul/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams la sngon gyi gdams ngag rjes su dran pa'i sgo nas chos ston cing / phrin las sna tshogs kyis gdug pa 'dul ba'i don mdzad pa las/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis nyin dang
43b7(rnying rgyud): mtshan du bskor ba byed cing / mchod pa byed de bzhugs so// de'i tshe mkha' 'gro ma rnams dur khrod du zas tshol du gshegs so// slob dpo ni zhal ldan dpa' bo gcig pu nyid dur khrod na bzhugs pa las/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu mngon par
44a1(rnying rgyud): phru na/ phyugs nga 'du tu smra /
44a2(rnying rgyud): rkyenas gzigs so// zhwa'i dbang ba nyid kyis dz+ra 'bral de sa la mtshan du kyang / 'dri rnam duseM rjes so// mgro na ngas ri ky-i kha la stang drang san kyis kyi dmag pa byas la/ skyepa yin ji'i jig la 'i TIg nags te/
44a3(rnying rgyud): zhes mkhyen po ma 'a 'grom rnams kyis 'dug par gzigs das/ la kyi ma nas na kyi drug pa'i gzugs can yin/ sgra'i bram rna ma sil yang dri nga na/ hA+eg gis byung bye bun gas ma pa/ snang pa 'i
44a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i bu b+ho bum de ba zhes bya ba gzugs mangs shing lhan drug pa gcig yod de/ de la skye moni rkyen lnga tshogs pas brgyan dus/ lha'i dbang po bcu byin gyis de la 'di lad ces bku' ba sngo'o// khyang mang las don skyes zung ba'ab rdul ma
44a5(rnying rgyud): yangan kyin ma shog ma// ma gang pa nardzas l+h+wa ma yin gyigayul pham par bya'o// ma khyes par du khyod rang ma 'ong bar rjod legs ma c-ig sa ba 'i ninas bta // de nga sa 'i skyeg nas /
44a6(rnying rgyud): me pa rjes bu la phyag byas nas nus pa dang / l+r-i kha 'grom bdag ka'i dbang po brgya n+dan gyi se mngags nas/ sdes ze khyed lha'i bcod gnas su swa dzin migs kyi / rab kyi sa phyi mas kyid blon po gshegs sugs phran
44a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa da mnga'i 'gro ba chos kyi mgan ste/ dbadum pa ba 'dra ba byanga'i rgyal rdzob tu bzhugs pa sum dayangs pa'i myi 'bu byeng bying du byer ba yim nga chu'is ba ga bre'us rgya gra gyu
44b1(rnying rgyud): min zhes zer nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis ma gnang ngo // der lha'i bu mo de lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mkhug kyi bar du ma 'ong zhig byas pas mo skyes bu chen po de yi rtsar chags so// der mkha' 'gro ma rnams dur khrod du song nas zas tshol ba'i bar du/
44b2(rnying rgyud): rtag tu brid cing mchod par byas so// slob dpon de'i thugs la gcags par gyur te/ skra'i bu mo de chung ma byas so// de yang bu bu mo 'di gnyis skyes so// bu la ni rus pa'i rgyan thod pa'i phreng ba byas te brgyan no// mtshan ni legs ldan
44b3(rnying rgyud): thaMd phreng can du gdags so// bu mo de la dur khrod kyi rlung gi khog ma gcig btags te/ ming ni dpal ldan dung skyong mar btags so// bu tsha ming sring gnyis la gling bar gyi nya sha de/ sgog btsong dang / rgun chang dang / sha khrag rus pas rkan bab stegasas
44b4(rnying rgyud): so// mos kyang lha'i dka' thub nyams te ngur khrod kyi zas ci za ba zos so// der mos yun ring por lon pa dang / de'i dus ni lha ma yin gyis lha'i yul phrogs nas/ rin chen sna lnga'i grong khyer sum brtsegs su yod pa dpangs cis kyang gshog thabs med par sgrol sotra
44b5(rnying rgyud): ba dam pa des lha'i khang bzang bas dpag tshad gcig gis mtho ba brtsigs te/ lha'i yul gtan shor la khad pa las/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ri rab kyi kha nas pi wang gi brdas bskul te/ lha dang lha ma yin 'thabs pa'i dmag dpon 'gugs su btang
44b6(rnying rgyud): na ji srid 'khor ram yul ni gtan shor la khad na/ bya bas bskul pa'i brda 'byung bas/ mos zos te skal ldan dpa' bo la bskul ba/ shad+hA ra bde byed stobs po che/ skyes bu dpa' bo khyod pa ngas/ ji srid du zhabs tog byas nas nga nga'i tshig tan dgo
44b7(rnying rgyud): byas nas/ shaM kar bde byed na re/ ji ltar bye zer te/ da lha'i dbang pos khyod 'gugs su btang ba yin pa la ji srid du mkhugs na/ da ni lha'i gnas su gshegs pa 'tshal zhes zhus pa la/ de gnang ste mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gsang ste/
45a1(rnying rgyud): shug gnyis thos byas te zhag bdun na 'phros par bya ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la pi wang gi brda' mar btang nas/ zhag bdun na shIng rta'i 'khor los spyan drangs par byas so// de nas lha'i dbang po sna la
45a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs mang po dang bcas nas shing rta'i 'khor lo mang po khyer ta dur khrod du phyin nas/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams dur khrod du zas 'tshol du song ba'i shul du/ skal ldan dpa' bo zhes bya ba de ri rab kyi rtse la spyan drangs so// der lha thams cad kyis tshas
45a3(rnying rgyud): bzang lha'i mdun sar phyag byas so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang du mchod pa byas so// de nas lha'i ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis tshal chen po bzhir mchod pa byas so// de nas byang shar du sheng yongs 'dus lanyes
45a4(rnying rgyud): gyi car lha'i bu mo byeg brag khrig gis mchod pa byas so// de nas lho nub tu rdo a mo li'i steng du lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig gis mchod pa byas so// de lang dang po dur khrod kyi gnas nas yab yum sras dang bcas pa spyan drangs pa ni/ dur khrod gnas na leg
45a5(rnying rgyud): ldan thod pa'i phreng ba can/ pad ma'i steng du hUM las sku mdog mthing na gzhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ dar mthing nag gi 'jol ber sku la gsol ba/ gser sked rin chen sru la bcings pa/ dbu skra kham nag ral pa'i thor gtsug gcig tu 'akyil
45a6(rnying rgyud): ba/ kho gnyer sbyin mtshams su brjid pa/ spyan gsum sdang mig tu gzigs pa/ zhal bzad pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ war mun ltar gtibs pa/ phyagan par bu nag po bsdams pa/ zhabs gnyis brkyang ba sum tshul du badzugs/
45a7(rnying rgyud): pa/ 'jigs 'jigs rngam rngam 'dra ba la/ rang gi gtso bo rgyan du 'dzin/ phreng phreng gi sgra sgrogs pa/ oM ma hA kA la raH/ du bo ni dzaH/ de skad hU~M phaT swa spogs shing // 'jigs byed lcam dral dung myong ma// sku mdog nag mo char ljin la
45b1(rnying rgyud): ra rnams gan phyug gam kyang grags pa// shAg tam thon 'dzan pa dgus na sa// gab hrung dbang bad+ham tshad dpa rtags sa dang cas// snyam dpa dgas sug cis ngas smrams// drung drung bang gan su da drags pa 'as// nga /
45b2(rnying rgyud): brgya byin la sogs lha rnams mdun gyis gsol pa ni/ d+haM/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs ma s+t+rai kA la che// tshur gshegs tshur byon dpal ldan mgon po che// 'dir gshegs lha mer g.yul rnams pazlog
45b3(rnying rgyud): byon// dbyings nas bzhengs pa mi mkhas yang // sangs rgyas bstan pa srung skad du// 'bar ba'i slar ston 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// 'dir gshegs bdag gri longs spyod mchod par bzhes// nag po ma bzang 'dir gshegs ma
45b4(rnying rgyud): bzhis// pha rol phyin spyod 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// 'bar ba'i skur ston 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// lha min g.yul bzlog 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// lce dmag dbugs 'byin 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// da
45b5(rnying rgyud): pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs ma hA kA la che// gnas ri rab rtser gshegs bzhugs su gsol// bdag cag gsol bde bas 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// oM shrI ma hA kA la dzaHhUM ba~M hoHhUM phaT/ ces pas lha rnams kyis gzung ba'i
45b6(rnying rgyud): dbyangs blangs pas/ rang dbang med par 'khor bcas bskyod de byon no// de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang du lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ gdan rin po che nyi zla pad+ma dang ldan pa phul nas/ dar mthing nag gi gur phub nas/ 'di skad ces
45b7(rnying rgyud): gsol to// hUM/ ye shes mkha' 'gro sngon po'i mdog tu gyur// sku mdog sngon ga dbyar gyi sprin lta bu// dug gsum ma lus mun khams 'jom mdzad pa'i// ma hA kA la byed nyid dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs// 'dir gshegs gdan la
46a1(rnying rgyud): bcwag ca// na / nga/ / / sa ga
46a2(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis phyag byas pa/ hUM/ mnyam nyid mthu mnga' gtus ched mi ltang 'bar// madrangs 'jom mdzad lha min dbang du srud // mthar byed ga zhon du 'jigs pa'i gdargyangs can// rgol ldan dpa' brjod la phyag lo// rta med dmed chags
46a3(rnying rgyud): yul bklog gi tsa// lhang mgu dkar po dbugs 'byin pa// rdo rje du mthong 'khor bcas la// dang ba'i sems kyis phyag 'tshal lo// bsod nams ga'i byin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// drag shul mthu chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes
46a4(rnying rgyud): khyed pa phyag 'tshal lo// sleb gnyis grangs pa khrod la phyag 'tshal lo// lung bstan po 'dzugs khyod la phyag 'tshal la// 'jig rte 'di na gang zhig gos// khyong kyi mtshan nas brjod bslabs na// dngas su basbya ster mdzadza /

46b6(rnying rgyud): g.ya tri stob byed chang / skye 'gro'i 'bru bcung/ bdud rtsi bcud kyi zas/ skyems 'phangs phud kyi mchog/ skal ldan dpa' bo gsol/ drang srong shi kar gsol/ legs ldan nag po gsol/ lha'i gnod sbyini gsol/ sel

47a1(rnying rgyud): !ts+tsha/ du la spyam pas dag pa'i bsod pa thul la// yangs sa ma na'i thas ma nargyunagan zhan gagags ga gangs 'jig shegs// srab gnasan d+ha

47a4(rnying rgyud): bdag cag rnams la slebs chen mdzod// oM mud+h+ya kA la rak+Sha ru pa ni // ma thi kA la dru ba ma hA gangs ldazhin// man+ta \u0f7f/ me b+h+ya ma/ mam kr-i Sh+Ta ti/ zhes ma dang // de nas ma ma li ka dza skang du lha'i burnam sa kyi mchod pa
