48a1(rnying rgyud): rlung 'gas la byas// thad nas byugs pa'am ldan 'dang // gangs nas bskul pa'i nag chubs// zhaganas pakas pa'i rdzus zlas/ sgra byed pa ga ponasang pa ra gsul la// na
48a2(rnying rgyud): sol lo// mgon po chen por mnga' gsol lo// dkar po'i dbugs 'byin mnga' gsol lo// zhes mnga' gsol lo// der rgyal ba'i bka' bden par brjod do// dkon mchog gsum la mnyes pa'i dbang gzug ste// 'di
48a3(rnying rgyud): d+hi/ mnyes ma mo gcu dang dbang // dkon mchog gsum po gzu dang dbang // dus gsum sangs rgyas gzu dang dbang // dam chos bdud rtsi gzu dang dpeng // phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gzu dang dbang // dkyil 'kho
48a4(rnying rgyud): chod pa gzu dang dbang // chos myong lum dral gzu dang dbang // phyogs myong bcu po gzu dang dbang // lha srin sde brgyad gzu dang dbang // klu chen brgyad po gzu dang dpung // rigs brda'i klu rgyal gzu dang dbang / gla zan
48a5(rnying rgyud): 'bring sde gzung dang bang // gnyen chen 'khor bcas gzu dang dbang // rigs bzhi'is bdag gzu dang dbang // sdang srid lha 'dre gzu dang dbang // bgegs rigs stong phrag bcud cug zu dang dbang // rgyal po btsun dang @
48a6(rnying rgyud): sa// gzu dang dbang por khyed rnams bzhugs// ded kyis mA lan khong gis lan// nged kyis mnyes khong gis nyes// legs nyis gnyis kyis stangs tshad la// yo gal gnyis kyi thog thob cig/ lha min 'dri la las
48a7(rnying rgyud): mdzo cig// ces lha rnams kyis grong brdungs/ mchis bton 'dod pos so// zhes pa me gyi phreng ba'i rgyud las/ lha min 'dus pa'i mdun du lha rnams kyis legs ldan nag po spyan drangs mnyes par byas nas/ dmag dpon du mnga'
48b1(rnying rgyud): gsol ba'i le'u ste gsung pa'o// / de nas oM mahA kA wAr zhwa dr-i bi d+hi dzI/ oM shrI ma hA kA la rU pa hUM phaT/ ces sgra rnams kyis gnad nas bskul bsdu/ legs ldan rtag bzod phreng can ni byang phyogs kyi gnod srin chen po brgyad
48b2(rnying rgyud): ni thugs kyi byam brgya du sbrul nas sngon du 'gro zhing / da mi chog tams pa'i klang pa rtom cing lha min rnams kyi gnyen po mdzad pa/ lha rgyags gshin rje'i ga geng po brgyad ni/ stag gzig de mjed ldeng gi brgyad du sbal nas phyir 'bring zhing lha min
48b3(rnying rgyud): brlag par mdzad do// dwai lta bu'i dpa' bod b+ha rnams kyis bskul ba/ dang po lha'i dbang po brgya byid kyis bskyal pa ni/ d+he/ bcom ldan phyag na rdo rjes ni// khyod kyi gsang ba'i mtshan btags pa// ngo rje ro lang sa dri mi thong ba dag/ drar khrong gnas par
48b4(rnying rgyud): rab tu mos// gsang ba'i mtshan nas 'bod do lha min g.yul rnams bzlog/ 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis mtshon btags pa// nag po mna' zan rnams kyi gshed// sha khrag pa la rab tu mos// gsang ba'i mtshan nas ngo bo de rdo lha min g.yul rnams
48b5(rnying rgyud): bzlog/ bcol lo bcol lo las bcol lo// rdo rje sems dpas mtshan btags pa// mthu chen log gnon rnams kyi gshed// log pa'i gang zag 'dul la brtson// gsang ba'i mtshan nas 'bod do lha mi ni g.yul rnams bzlog/ brjod
48b6(rnying rgyud): pa bcol ba'i las rnams bcol// dge bsnyen srung ma las mdzod cig/ lha rnams gnod pa bzlog pa'i las mdzod cig/ lha dmag a hA kA la'i tshogs ni srin ltar gtibs la gshegs// lus ni lha srin gnon pa'i dus la bab// rdzi
48b7(rnying rgyud): can lha min sgrol ba'i dus la bab// dkon mchog dbu 'phang spod pa 'di// sangs rgyas bstan pa lha min khong gas bshigs// dge 'dun 'du ba'i sgo yang khong gis phrog/ dbang po'i sul bsngo ba 'di// sdig can 'di'i su ci ma byas//
49a1(rnying rgyud): las dang jig can dudres sus // lus na ga na pa bang na 'i sems can de// lha na dam ga pang bskal pa shing brgya khyen pa smran// zlugathab pa'i'/ rlabs// gas ngan bskum pa byu dang /
49a2(rnying rgyud): 9/ sdig can bskal bar dam bcas pa// nag pa chen po mthu bo che// skom du mi khrag mangs mo 'brang // zas su mi sha ba shul mo za// gos su mi lpags rlon pa goni// 'khor du ngur long mi mes bzhed// mas ri la slong
49a3(rnying rgyud): nam shes gzhan du ltar la thong // srog dasar thub sdes thob la bong // lcags kyi bya ma chen por sku sbal la// sdig cad 'di yi klang pa'i sti rtol la// glang khrag rngon mo gzhib pa'i dus labab// lcags rtse sha srang rjen me m+b+ha sbrul ma/
49a4(rnying rgyud): phas ngan lha min srog pa'i rtsar zhugs la// srog rtsa drod mo gzhib pa'i dus la ba'// nag po chen por sku sprul nas// sdig can gsod pa'i dus la bab// tshe mchog gsol ba'i dus la bab// dkon mchog gsum pa srabs 'gro bas/
49a5(rnying rgyud): ma phul nas 'di zhus pas// sems can rnams la gnod byed pa// mgon po nag po khyod kyis gsol// lha min sha ni gcod par gyis// khrag ni bcus te btung bar gyis// yang na de yi phyi nang gi// nying tsam dag tu sha chod cing // dkar
49a6(rnying rgyud): srung ma las mdzod cig/ 'azlog cig lha mi ni ga yul bash+log cig/ lha min gdug pa gsad pa'i las mdzod cig/ de nas bzung nas skyes bu yis// lha rnams sungs shing bskyab smra ga sol// g+hany+dza lA ga na nas the spyod da re// lha bran
49a7(rnying rgyud): mtha' nas thags pa re// dzaM brang ngo mangs 'gyur bar// bslab la par gyun shing rnaM/ log 'dren lha min dbang du song ra ro// legs ldan nag po mthu ba che// mgon po nag po thugs dam can// rdzi dargya dus kyi tham la// shA~M \u0f7fthub
49b1(rnying rgyud): bstan pa la// bdun pa btung bar bral bzhes pa// dges byung ba'i thogs byanas// kyi ng+yas thang sa ngam pas pa// bdag cag tu mi rigs rnams pa// ba nga nga 'dus nga// 'dun du ba lnga bad
49b2(rnying rgyud): grong dkyil nas// yang dag skrag cig b+h+ya shA // mthing nag mi sun 'jigs pa'i grwa// nyid kyi khyu mdog 'jigs shing mthing nag chen po las// dbu ste kham nag zor tshugs gcig tu 'i khyil// sIhA sa nag po khrig te brjid pa
49b3(rnying rgyud): zhal// stan bzlog zhal gdangs mche ba rno gtsigs nas// dam nyams dgra bgegs rnams kyi snying rtsa gcod// shangs nas me dang dug gi 'tshungs ma gtong // phyag gnyis thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel// g.yas kyi phyag na
49b4(rnying rgyud): bing chen bsnams// gsor zhing gsor zhing klad pa'i rgyas su rgyob// tsan+dan ping gi stod shed nas// sprul pa'i pho nya 'bum bkye bas// stang gi lha bdud dbang du spyad// non dan bing gi zhabs shad nas// sprul pa'i pho nya 'bum brgya
49b5(rnying rgyud): bas// 'og gi srin tshan drung nas 'byin// tsan dan bing gi bar shed nas// sprul pa'i pho nya 'bum bkye bas// bar gyi dgra bgegs rdul du rdzogs// sdig can lha maun rdul du rdzogs// g.yon ni lcags par sku la brten// dang ser sngob
49b6(rnying rgyud): u la gsol// gser ka rin chen skul bcings// spyan gsum sdang mig gyen du bgrad pa yis// steng gi lha yang 'dar sha sha/ spyan gsum sdang mig thur du bgrad pa yis// 'og gi klu yang zil gyis gnon// spyan gsum sbed la phar
49b7(rnying rgyud): bzad pas// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad kun nas ni// gnas pa thams cad pho nya 'gyed// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul gyis 'byung po gnon// kye/ mgon po nag po'i bstan pa la// 'khrugs pa can la 'di yin pas// ga
50a1(rnying rgyud): sa pa ga // gag pa sa smrang// da // thegs sbyags/ tha ma na rjes// tsun ga // kunan /
50a2(rnying rgyud): oM maN+DakA sa dgras du dz+ran/ oM b+h+ra ma hA ka la rlab brengaT/ Sh+Ta b+he/ zhes mngags te zad pas/ lha min dang 'dres pa'i sol du 'thabs pas/ lha ma yin rnams kyi g.yul bzlog nas/ grong ze dadu ma rtsigs kyi ma hU~M /
50a3(rnying rgyud): de gro khyong sum bre tshogs de ni shin tu banyin lazang 'jig+sa sa 'i mam btsun pas thabs mdzod de/ yab zhal ldan dpa' ba zhes zla ba dang / shi ke bdi thaMd kyis ze ba dwe la/ seM c-ig rdzas rba shig sa pas/ ya ba dar/
50a4(rnying rgyud): dam par 'das pa'i lhag pa lardorje pa lam yod/ de dang gas tsho'i zhub dang rnas la chos brgya di nig b+ha rang shAr dang / der legs ldan gyis da ste bag bdun nang sa byed kyi gro khyeng chu brtse 'jig ga med dang bod kyis shig ces kyang ban pa 'dzin
50a5(rnying rgyud): btsung // dI n+ni d-i dmas ni sdug bcwapa depag tu med pas 'jigs nis yang can/ sems ldan ces rjes de rnams rngu 'phrul gyi tshangs nas// 'druga'i ci sa tha das khang pa par rnaMb pas ri'i las dag zung / 'dun pa
50a6(rnying rgyud): pa s+yai sa su kya rdul zhing meng // der yang dwe da de 'ang ba smin pa'i ri ba'i 'jig pa'i mtshan yo dang / da dung ngas bzar snyas pa tsam yi sa nas/ da dgu bdun nang rig gzus pas/ de gag rkyen gyi dang pa lci ba 'jug sa
50a7(rnying rgyud): mi tshon ma sa ma gcig 'jug pas// baM ye de'i 'dzin/ da de bas kyang drag pa yod zer bas mabyung ba langs spun bsul kha dang 'babs kyis/ 'on tang 'os nga ni ma thub/ dpar gribs mchod yod/ 'i bge 'as med/ dz+re
50b1(rnying rgyud): srid pa gsum du thos pa yod/ mdang go cha rjes kyang mi zung b.ri po mchog rab kyang phigs pa yod/ mdung shugs dang ldan pa yod de/ lag cha 'di tsas pa khol med pas pam mi srid cing / brgyal 'jam na dung ldan pa sum 'brang stsa
50b2(rnying rgyud): de tsam na grong khyer dum brtsegs bu cag gis shi gcig/ khong gis bshig na de rang snying mi dge 'a'o zer nas/ dpe'i rtags lnga dang g.yas su 'khor lo khyer/ g.yon du dung thog phyin tsam na/ khyab 'jug gis byin pa'i lam
50b3(rnying rgyud): rdzan kyis/ b+hag shi nAd+ha s+yA bArgya che ba 'brang mtho ba supa dang se ga med pa skor thibs med pa gcig gi car/ chu shin tu che ba rab med pa mdog pa skongs med pa ste tshun ring ba gcig gi bar du lam phra ma thed de gcig las med po ga tu yul ma
50b4(rnying rgyud): da'ing dran yon pas ma thos mig gis mi gsal ba gcig tu sbal nas bas rjes na/ kha'u la ThAng nas nanam par zung ze ba la/ gdams khyod su y-i ni byis pas/ dakhyab 'jag yin 'ang gnyen gyi khams dang sa thos pa
50b5(rnying rgyud): dam per// khye ba 'jug yin na kho la dpa' rtags kyi phyag kyi rnam pa lnga yod de/ ngal cha yod pa yin te/ khyod la phred yod dam khyod khyab 'jug cing yin nam byas pas// b+hab 'jug na re/ dpa' shegs kyi phyag rgya ldang la yang zer/
50b6(rnying rgyud): yod na dung bus dang byas pa ste/ khyab 'jug gis dung bus pas/ rgan mos ngas mthos byas pas/ der khyab 'jug so khros na pa drag po gcig bus pas/ legs ldan rgan mor sprul pa na re/ khyod la 'jug tu 'dug ste khyab 'jug gi rung
50b7(rnying rgyud): min nas// ba 'jug gi drung yi na kha'i dung shin tu gang che ba yin/ 'jig rten srid pa gsum du thos pa yin byam pas// thab 'jug kha rgyas s+ho/ kyai sa dang pa mog nas rdul gtad na rjen thog ga theg pan/ der chung mang 'am
50b8(rnying rgyud): kyir yi napa
51a1(rnying rgyud): song nas/ der los phyin can legs ldan lab sras mi 'dug nas log phyin tsam na/ lha min gzhan chos dung lin gsum byung bas 'pham snyam nas/ grong khyer sum brtseg ba shig nas drud pa long de byas 'jug
51a2(rnying rgyud): thab bzung der sdong bshig nas 'dug ste/ der lha min rnams la brten sa med nas bros te/ ri rab kyi khong gseng la thon nas rgya mtsho'i nang du khrul skyabs tshol te/ der lha min phung zhing brlag par mdzad do// der lha thams cad dga' le
51a3(rnying rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang du tshogs nas/ skyes bu chen po skal ldan dpa' bo zhes kyang byA/ shaM kar bde byed ces bya ba de dang / mgon po nag po ma hA kA la zhes kyang bya/ legs ldan nag po thod phreng can zhes bya ba de ya' sras pa
51a4(rnying rgyud): bcas la/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin gyi g.yul bzlog pa'i gtang ngag ni mchod pa chen po byas te/ sras logs ldan la yab skal ldan dpa' bo mgu ste bsnyad pa/ grong khyer sum brtsegs thabs kyis 'dzem pa yi// mgon po khyodal
51a5(rnying rgyud): bdag bstod do// lha min g.yul tshogs 'pham par byed// lha dmag dkar po dbugs 'byin pa// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bsam mi khyab// mgon po khyod la bdag bstod do// lha ma yin gyi g.yul chen bcom// lha yi brtul zhugs la
51a6(rnying rgyud): gnas te// bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad bcu brtul// ba~M nA ya ka'i gleng khrag 'thung // lha mon g.yul las rab rgyal ba// mgon po khyod la bdag bstod do// zhes yab kyis bstod do// lha rnams kyis bstod pa yang yod do//
51a7(rnying rgyud): srid bkod pas mthu bar byas so// gus par byas so// 'dun par byas so// phu dung du byas so// zhes me lce brang ba'i rgyud las/ lha min dpung bzlog pa'i be'u gyi bzhi pa'o// rgya ga gad du/ mahA de be ga nub ti/
51b1(rnying rgyud): bod da da du/ lha chen po tshogs kyi bdag po/ zhwa'i ded dpon zhes bya ba lha rnams kyis bsgrags so// de yang lha rnams kyi yab lha chen por gyur nas/ lha'i dka' thub la gnas par gyur te/ ngur khrod kyi skal ldan ri rab kyi rtsal spyan drangs nas/
51b2(rnying rgyud): lha ma yin thams cad btul te/ g+ha'i ded dpon chen po mnga' gsol ba'i dum bu ste dang po'o// // de'i tshe lha'i bu legs ldan nag po des/ sring mo dpal ldan dung srong ma dang gnyis/ lha'i dka' thub kyi zas dkar gsum za ba la mi dga' zhing /
51b3(rnying rgyud): sngon gyis pha mas rgan phab pa'i dud khrod kyi sha khrag dang / rgun chang dang / sgrog btsong la yid chags nas ming sring gnyis gros byas nas dur khrod bros so// der lha rnams kyis pi wang gi brda' stan po dang / rol mo dang dbyangs snyan pos spyan
51b4(rnying rgyud): drangs shing mchod pa las/ ha stong dus drug la sogs phog re 'byon par zhal gyis bzhes te bzhug pa su ma gnang ngo // sdod kyi yab la mchod pa ci byed pa de bzhin du bkur sti dang rim gro byed do// de'i tshe sring mo lha mo dung skyong ma khrag rul 'dod na
51b5(rnying rgyud): khral rul gyi dri bsdam pas de'i phyogs thams cad du phyin pas srin po lang ka pu rangs kyi phugatu phyin no// der srin po lang ka mgrin bcu khrag rul ba zangs gang ba skol ba dang 'phrad pas/ mos khrag bslangs pas khrag phor gang byin no// de
51b6(rnying rgyud): 'thungs pas mo khrag gis myos te mig dmar por gyur to// mo gyos ti gnyid log pa las srin pos rkang pa lcags sgros tu bcug skye chags pa spyad do// der mo gnyid sa tsam na nga'i chung ma bya'i 'dir 'dug zer nas/ kho sha khrag gi zas 'tshol du song ngo //
51b7(rnying rgyud): de cu lo la nyid na nas rkang pa lcags smig tu btsugs pas zos pa'i thabs ni med nas/ gdos 'gros byed zin lo'i khyim du phyin pas/ ngo'i bu srin phug lnga ba rgya nyin mo zheng shin su rtse brgyar bskal nas 'jug/ nub mo srin phug lnga brgya po'i
52a1(rnying rgyud): su 'dug pa mthong / srin zangs khal brgya rgyas 'gengs pa yang mthong / srin gyi zangs ma bsgo nas 'dug pa yang mthong / srin gyi long bud m+bAr po d+hU za ba yang mthong / der mamazin gyi ral gri thangasaH/
52a2(rnying rgyud): rkang pa'i ljags klog gi bar du brgyab nas bcang / srin zangs kyi chu brgol te srin phug rnams der thugs nas bsad/ bong bu gla dmar la zhon ral gri khyer nas bris pas/ srin po byung dam ma byung gyi mig bltas pas byung ste gyur du gros
52a3(rnying rgyud): mos ming po'i gam du rdol ba dang / srin po srin glang dmar por brdzus te rdol ba dang / srin zos ming po la ne'u le brgyab pas// legs ldan nag pos ne'u le'i lhag bya bcag/ sring mo lha mo dung skyong ma'i ral gri ming pos blangs nA
52a4(rnying rgyud): sbyin glang gemag pa bcad do// srin po lang ka bu rangs kyi grong khyer gtan nas brtag par byas/ der sring mo lha mo drung skyong mas/ ming po legs ldan thod theng can la bstod pa/ b+h+rUM/ srin lha la 'ang ku p+pa rangs dag tu gyod// pri
52a5(rnying rgyud): grong khyer brlag par mdzad// lang ka mgrin bcu'i mgo bcad nas// dpa' bo nyid kyi rgyan du byas// mgon po khyod kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod nas srin po'i yu gal snga ru byas/ srin po'i ma gal gyi ru byas/ bag
52a6(rnying rgyud): pas sgra g.yogs byas/ rgya mas gang thag gong rmed byas/ ne'u le nor gyi rgyal bu byas/ rapa gri sring mo'i phyag mtshan du byas so// me lce phreng ba'i rgyud las/ nag po chen po lcam dral gyis srin po lang ka mgrin bcu btul ba'i
52a7(rnying rgyud): le'u ste lnga pa'o// / yang de'i tshe tshogs kyi bdag po lcam dral gnyis/ dur khrod kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis dud rjod kyi sha khrag gis nyin mtshan du mchod pas dur khrod kyi ngo thams cad zad par gyur pa dang / rgya ga
52b1(rnying rgyud): yul grong khyer sum brtsegs pa'i mi rnams la mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis kha rlangs kyi dug btang bas/ mi thams cad nings nad kyis shi bar gyur nas de dag gi ro thams cad kyis nag po chen po lham dral la mchod pa byas so// de'i tshe grong khyer sum brtse ga/
52b2(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyal po tshangs pas gyen gyis gnas nas pho brang gi sgo gar phyir gshegs te/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la/ grong khyer du nam mkha'i nad dbab pa de bcad par zhu ba phul bas/ bcom ldan 'das
52b3(rnying rgyud): ce dbu'i gtsug nas/ gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo can bton te/ dbu dang phyag zhabs nam mkha'i 'od zer dkar mo dang bcas pas/ oM ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa dre hU~M hU~M/ zhes bya ba'i sgra dang bcas pas nag po chen po'i zad du rdo rje 'chang chen po
52b4(rnying rgyud): mngon par sprul to// de'i tshe nag po chen pos gzi byin ma bzod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ 'khor mang po dang bcas pa phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan
52b5(rnying rgyud): 'das bdag cig rnams la bskyab tu gsol lo// bdag la mgon po mchis pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rjes gzung du gsol/ bdag nang lha dang mi'i 'jig rten bde bar bgyi ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa yun ring
52b6(rnying rgyud): gnas par bgyid pa'i skad du bdag gi rig pa 'di 'bul na bAzhes su gsol// oM shrI ma hA kA lag na pa ti badz+ra yak+ka de ba hUM dza zhes phul nas bstan pa bsrung bar dam bcas so// gtsug tor gdugs dkar mo can ya de bzhin gshegs
52b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i spyi bor nub par gyur to// grong khyer sum brtsegs pa'i mi thams cad kyang rims nad chad par gyur to// dpal nag po chen po la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa bsrung ba'i gnang ba byin pa'o// me rtse phreng ba spyod pas
53a1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal mgon po nag po btul zhing ngam la btags pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / me lce phreng ba'i rgyud las/ dpal mgon po nag po lhas dral gyis srin pa btul
53a2(rnying rgyud): zhing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs pa'i dum bu ste gnyis pa'o// nag po chen po'i rgyud kyis gnas te dang po'o// gzhan yang yang dag bshad bya ba// khyod kyi lo rgyus de ltar de// bskrun pa bsung tshul 'di ltar lags// sangs
53a3(rnying rgyud): byas chos dang dge 'dun gsum// spong bar byed pa rlag par byed// sa dang lam la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' srung skyabs shing // dam tshig ldan pa can de srung // gzhan yang dben pa'i sgo 'phrog chos skor sbed// bstan pa sti dgra
53a4(rnying rgyud): gyur pa dang // dam tshig can gyi rnal 'byor la// spos kyi dgra bo byed pa dang // log lam zhugs pa kun kyang sgrol// legs nyes stang gzung dam tshig rjes gcod cing // srid pa'i rtse nas so tshugs byar gyis// zhes pas legs ldan nag
53a5(rnying rgyud): paTe rtse phreng ba'i rgyud las/ bstan pa bsung tshul gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // dum bu gsum pa gnyis pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// phyi rabs rnal 'byor rjes zhugs nas// bslab na don ni gsum du bshad// spyi gzhung phrin las ma
53a6(rnying rgyud): dag dang // log non man ngag rim pa dang // las tshogs khol bu rim pa gsum// phyi rabs mgon po bkol bar bya// phrin las spyi gzhung don bcu ste// zhes pas ye lce phreng ba'i rgyud las/ spyi sdom tshig gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
53a7(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dang po kho nar gnas btsal ba// dur khrod ri bo tsan dan tshol// brag dmar zla gam dmar nag gam// lha khang la sogs sa phyogs su// sa ni brtag cing bslang ba dang // gzung dang srang dang phur gdab
53b1(rnying rgyud): sogs// sa yi las rnams tshang bar zla// de nas gzhan yang dkyil 'khor ni// mda' gang gru bzhi bcas pa la// dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi// nag par byas pa de la yang // su khyad ser ba gu chad dmar// sgo bzhi dag
53b2(rnying rgyud): dang ldan par bya// dbus su mgon po'i sku mtshan dgod // shar du bing chen dbang bskur bzhag/ lho ru rgya spos dud pa btang // nub tu lhags par gtor thugs bzhag/ byang du rabs chad thod pa rtsa// thun sna tshang bar
53b3(rnying rgyud): bzhag/ dkyil 'khor dbus ma nag po le// bla gram dkyus su khru gang la// dpangs su lu gang yod pa la// yar phyed mar phyed par dag tu// mgon po nag po'i dam rdzas ni// mis ma mor ba sbas la bzhag/ rabs chad
53b4(rnying rgyud): thod pa ni// dum bu gcig gam yang na bzhi// gang rnyed pa yi thod pa ru// 'gro mchog tsi t+ta rtsa lag tshang // srog rtsa gsum du gtad gsum bya// chang phud a mr-i ta dang khrag/ nya sha lkog btsong la phug dang // dkar gsum ma
53b5(rnying rgyud): gsum thug pa ni// mthing nag srog 'khor can gyis bcad// mi mthong sba ba mchog tu bsngags// dkyil 'khor mda' gang gu bzhi la// 'phang du sor brkyang byas nas ni// dbus su khu gang zlum por bskor// de la thod pa'i
53b6(rnying rgyud): phred ba btang // dbus su gu gsum byas nas ni// nang ni rgya sol nag pos byug/ zla gam dbus ni dkar po bya// tha mar tshon rtsi nag por btang // de yi tha mar rtsang gis bskor// gdug pa'i shing gi phur bu ma// tshon rtsi nag
53b7(rnying rgyud): byas la// gzungs thag thabs kyi srin leg la// btags te bzhag pa mchog tu gsungs// yid gzungs la ni zhe gnag pa// khrims gtsang ma yi lag tu 'jug/ khyi ma rnams kyang 'dren med bzlas// chu rgyan lta bu ba
54a1(rnying rgyud): man par largyang sa// mdag sus tha rdzu // thugasas du / rnam kya 'granag sa // nga 'ad// ma pas
54a2(rnying rgyud): ma ning rnam pazhags pa'i 'a skye sumar/ de nas sa rnam sa da pa di ba drani/ bdun pa rlos// bgasu rnams dzin / byung// ngangan
54a3(rnying rgyud): g+hanas ste/ nga nga 'dom ba na// des ga rmugs badzad pas// sngags byas 'di ra 'bre bya ltas// bdun kyi khyim par dpeg sa rjes// bkren pa ses pa gyis paskyed pa na/ 'dzum /
54a4(rnying rgyud): zhes pa'i sngags kyis bsdigs pa'i// TIgs sa byas / dka sa // de de'i bded pa'i bka' ba \u0f7f// zhes pas mye s+ye b+h+re ba'i dun las/ ma thams bcad pa'i ba don sa ting nge dzin la rdzogs
54a5(rnying rgyud): parjid la yun ring bsgom// yi stong pog ma med nas slong // de ma rtogs pa skyed rje ba myed// de las skad cig ting 'dzin gyipa// bang ba cir langs pa las// pa dz+ra maN+Da be zhes brjod// shAn gden shA b+h+rUM/ gang ma
54a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin du bab par bA sam// d+h+r-i s+pha rA NA phaT/ ces brjod pas/ b+h+rUM las 'od 'thos don gnyis byas// tshur 'dus tsan dran ping du b+har// rdo tshu ba~M hoH/ ma hA kA la rak+ka du bing ni ts+tsha zhes mgon po'i sku bskyed pa// nyi
54a7(rnying rgyud): gcig sa rjod pa yi// sa mra kI la nyid kyi ste// phyag gis byung ba khon gyi// skye ma dag maming dag zhal gcig po// phyag gi nyis gso gi 'i su rags ci// da bri khe ba dag ris pa'i tshe tsug kyi du 'gyi'o// khri ga nyer drin mtsham
54b1(rnying rgyud): bar rung dzid// spyan ni rngang mig zhal bgrad pa// ma na rdzogs sgra ras gtibs pa la// byug g.yas can dan bang chen bsnams// g.yon pa par bu phral brten// zhabs gnyis bcang bskum tshul gyis bzhugs// 'jigs 'jigs rnams
54b2(rnying rgyud): rngam 'dra ba yi// mgrin me dz+nyAn po de bgos bya// zhes pas ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas d+ha ni dzang pa 'di skad do// hU~M/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshung gshegs tshur gshegs ma hA kAShache// tshung ga
54b3(rnying rgyud): tshur na dpal ldan mgon du che// 'dir gshegs gdugs pa'i dgra bgegs 'dul gyi brtson// dbyings nas bzhengs pa mi mnga' yang // sangs rgyas bstan pa srung sbed du// 'bar ba'i srur stod 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// 'dir
54b4(rnying rgyud): gshegs bdag gi longs spyod mchod pa bzhes// nag po mi zan 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// pha rol phyin spyod 'di du gshegs mchod pa bzhes// rig 'dzin srung ma 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// de dadapon chen po 'dir gshegs
54b5(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa bzhes// lha min ga yul bzlog 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// lha dmag dbug 'byin 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs ma hA kA la che// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i gnas
54b6(rnying rgyud): 'dir gshegs su gsol// bdag cag gapol 'debs gdug pa'i dgra bgegs sgrol// oM shrI ma hA kA la dzaHd+hU baM hoHhUM phaT/ ces pas spyan drangs pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas nyams myong brtag bya la/
54b7(rnying rgyud): rang dbang med par gyi zing zhing // 'jigs dang yang yong bar byed// de tshe dang kyi bur khang phug/ spos dang ku gul bsregs byas pas// bgegs rnams yin na bros nas 'gro// mgon po yin na dam tshig la// rko bar
55a1(rnying rgyud): dgangs nas can pa da// rdzag ma cag na/ nga nasan// nyam mgags gan byu ma/ dad ngag dang
55a2(rnying rgyud): phyagagi rim pa 'di gsungs pa// hUM/ mnyam med mthu mnga' gtum chen me ltar 'bar// marung 'jom mdzod dgra bgegs thal bar rdzog/ mthar byed gzhon nu 'jigs pa'i ga cings can// skal ldar dpa' tshe khyod la phyag 'tshal
55a3(rnying rgyud): lo// lha min dmag tshogs ga yul bzlog ci // l+h+wa dmag dkar po dbugs 'dzin pa// rdo rje du khrod 'khor bcas la// dang bas sems kyis phyag 'tshal lo// bsod nams gzi byi mabyung la phyag 'tsha la la// dreg shul mthu
55a4(rnying rgyud): chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes tshogs rdzo gas khyod la phyaga'i tshal lo// sgrib gnyis spangs pa khyod laphyag 'tshal lo// lung bstan po ba rtogs khyod la ga 'tshal lo// 'jig rten 'di na gang zhig gis/
55a5(rnying rgyud): mtshan nas brjod bsgru na// dngos grub byung du skyer mdud pa'o// mAM bab+bam+b+ha byams pa phyag 'tshal lo// legs ldan dge byed pa byegang tshal lo// oM mahA kA ladz+nyA ba~M b+h+r-i d+haT+Ta/ a b+hi / pra tIH/ sa ma yA hA/ na mog
55a6(rnying rgyud): ya/ zhes pa me lce phreng ba'i rgyud las/ phyag 'tshol ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas bzhugs su gsol ba 'di gsungs so// mr-i/ ye shes mkha'i 'gro sngon po'i mdog tu gyur// sku mdog sngo nag dbyar gyi sprin lta bu/
55a7(rnying rgyud): drug gsum mun khams ma khris 'jom mdzad pa'i// mahAk+Sha la khyod nyid dgyes zhing brtan par bzhugs// 'dir gshegs gdan la bzhugs nas cang // 'jig rten pa deng mthun 'drug phyir// phyog dang zhabs gnyis bso'i bar
55b1(rnying rgyud): mdzang // oM shrI mad+ha kA la dra bad+h+waM/ sa ma pat+tit+tA spyan A b+he sha ya yA/ shes pa kyi zeng bzhid las/ brtan par bzhugs sngagasal pa'i macwa bco rdza ba ga// / de nas yang dag bshad zab// gshegs zheg
55b2(rnying rgyud): dgas shig glenas 'dir gshegs// tha yi gnas mchog dam pAn// khyod kyi mthun pa di mardzas ni// 'gyor ba tshogs po thugs dum rdzas// chu thug la sogs thos te b+hu we lu// ga pur lce sogs sman lA m+b+hi'aM/
55b3(rnying rgyud): 'bru bcud chang gi phreng ni things mi phreng // dka dmar gyi rgya mtsho ki li li// har+d+ha rus pa'i tshogs ni khyA lA le// sha chen bdud rtsi'i tshogs ni tshangs ma tshang // mthud pa'i dam rdzas tshogs so gnas 'dir byon// rgyan k+She gtor ma
55b4(rnying rgyud): yo 'i rnam sa ba ma// de sum med pa dadag nga bang bya// phyog lamad pa 'phrul bani// ma nga ba dugs gyi// byed bsan pa 'arji mi tha ma// 'dini kyi ma
55b5(rnying rgyud): kun gyi gsos// sgrib sil ba shos gtsang das pa badz+rad rtsi bcas// drang sang shaM kar wa la mchod pa 'thul// u ma'i skul mchod pa 'bul// legs ldan dag po'i phul mchod pa 'brel// ma hA kA la'i mA la mchod pa 'bul//
55b6(rnying rgyud): dung srong srul mchod pa 'bral// oM maN+Dak+Sha la raH dro bo zing / prA do bkrA skAr Na a nA~M/ d+hU be/ prASh+Te/ s+thu lo kaM/ kr-in+te/ de weH/ sha b+ha ra d+ha b+hu mi zhes me dra swa raH sa ma yaM/ oM A r+g+haM/ zhes mdzod do// dmadzes kyi
55b7(rnying rgyud): po 'phrul ba ni/ lcags par gyi nang du dka gsum dang / mang rigs pa / ladung ngo // sgrog btsong dang / rgun 'thum dpa/ 'bru thub dang / 'bras chen dang / khu ba tri/ shing thogs snga tshogs rnams spya
56a1(rnying rgyud): pa/ dang mching dag gis l+h+wa na/ dwe skad bsngal la// \u0f88\u0f90/ b+hU toka nga ba la sogs rten TIg/ ladu la phrag la sogs med bzhin 'bras bu'iH// rdzogs 'atsu du pa mnyan
56a2(rnying rgyud): da byar// ris sum chad longs spyod rgyas par 'bul// dkyil 'khor mdzes pa des bdud// be shos gtsang me tog mar me gros sna tshogs// chun chang la sogs btung ba'i mchog/ srang rtsil pogs mngar ba'i dbyig/ tshogs
56a3(rnying rgyud): mchod pa 'di dag bzhes// dngos 'byer dang ni yid kyis sprul// gzugs dang sgra dang dri ro reg/ chos la sogs pa'i mchod pa kun// mgon po 'khor bcas su la 'bul// zhes pas dbul lo// nang gi mchod pa dbul ba ni//
56a4(rnying rgyud): rje myo byed chang / lce 'gro 'bu'i bcud/ bdud rtsi bcud kyi zas/ phyems 'thang phud kyis mchod/ skal ldan dpa' bo gsol/ drang srong shi kar gso la/ legs ldan dpa' bo gsol/ lha'i gnod sbyin gsol/ gser
56a5(rnying rgyud): na rten gsol/ dAr nag ral can gsol/ rig 'dzin srog shing gsol/ dug gsum sman pa gsol/ sgras bu chen po gsol/ lha mo dung stong/ gsol/ 'dod khams dbang du gsol/ zhes mchod pas mnyes par
56a6(rnying rgyud): gyur ro// de nas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'bul ba ni/ hUM// gshegs shig gshegs shig gnas 'dir gshegs// bu yi gnas mchog dam pa nas// ldod kyi mthun pa'i dam rdzas ni// 'byor pa tshogs so thugs dam can// rgya shug
56a7(rnying rgyud): chos lnga dz+ra lu waM// gsur la sogs sra / 'thu drung rlung gi lung du grangs sa sbreg/ dashA ba ng+ge kyi'i lo// the rus pa'i tshig pa ni thal le// bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i tshogs ni tshangs so tshang // shA
56b1(rnying rgyud): rgya tungs chags na srungs sa rung // mthun pa'i das rdzas tshogs so gnas 'dir byed// dbangs gtor ma 'di bzhes pa// sdig can dam pa 'dul du gsol// bdag cag rnams la skabs tshon mdzad// em hA kA la gan
56b2(rnying rgyud): du be d+hi dza/ ma hA mA~M saSh+Te hi/ ma hA rak+Sha b+hA hrI/ h+Na rba d+hiSh+Tha hi/ mahA ni d+ha khA hi/ zhes mchod do// dmardzas bdud rtsingamardzas tshang ba la// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis rab brgyan cing // ye shes lnga yis 'od zer rnam par dz+ra/
56b3(rnying rgyud): dbang po drug gi spyod yul 'gyeng // dri chen dri chu'i tshogs ni rba rlags 'khrug/ rag dmar gyi rang bzhin rgya mtsho 'khyil// mI sA sha yi rang bzhin ri ltar spangs// geng rus ras pa'i rang bzhin ri ltar spangs// dpal ldan legs ldan ye bsdus
56b4(rnying rgyud): yum dang bcas// gtso dang 'khor du bcas pa'i thugs dam bskang // zhes mchod do// de nas las la mnga' gsol ba ni/ hUM/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// ma hA kA lar mnga' gsol bas// dpral ba khro gnyer
56b5(rnying rgyud): gsum dang ldad// dkon mchog gsum gyis ma par gsol bas// khrims kyi cha lugs gsum dang ldan// rig gsum mgon pos mnga' gsol bas// zhal gyi malugs gsum dang ldan// rigs gsum khro bas mnga'o
56b6(rnying rgyud): gatho pa pas// zhal tho gnyung gsum dang ldan// lha phrin rnams gyis mnga' gsal+ya bas// dbu lnga kham nag ril ba can// kyu skar rnams kyis mnga' gsol bas// sku skad me yi lcags sus ka n+dan// srid pa gsum
56b7(rnying rgyud): pa yang bsgrer bas// sku yi skye bcung gsum byen// hU~M chen ba rgyad kyis mang gsol bas// yin pa bsngal kyi tshun pas 'argyan// saM ba dge rnams kyis mang 'gas langs// ni bza' tha bar mthing dag gsam// 'gyi ba
57a1(rnying rgyud): dun na 'gas// rtag na du sa gyu/ / sa smra nagyung//
57a2(rnying rgyud): po gsum dang ldan// rgyal ma bud kyis mnga' gastsal bas// sbyin pa'i gzhung drang stsal gsol// yi dwagis rnams kyis mngang gsal bas// rin chen dbang po'i dro shil can// dmyal ba rnams kyis mang gsol bas/
57a3(rnying rgyud): skal ba skal pa'i mchin 'byor// zhe sa nas bzhal po'i chu chen 'tha'o// lha yi dmag dbyen mnga' gsam la// chom stong chen po mnga' gsol la// bzhen pa rje bar mnga' gsal mo// dkar po'i bstan pa srung bar ma
57a4(rnying rgyud): rnas pas mnga' gsal la// de rtsal po'i bka/ bde pa rjod do// dkon mchog gsum la mnyis pa'i dbang gzug ste/ sadu rjod/ mnyas ma g.yog zungangang dbang // dkon mchog gsum mo gcung
57a5(rnying rgyud): dus gsum sangs rgyas gzungad nga dbang // phyogs bcu'i dge 'dud ge rje dang dbang // dam sa bdud rtsi gzung dang dbang // daMkyil 'i song na mi shes gzu dang dbang // chos myong ltas dral gzu dang dbang // sgyogs myong
57a6(rnying rgyud): gi zu dang dbang // lha srin sde brgyad gzung dang dbang // kle che c-ing brog zu dang dbang // rigs pazhi'i pra rtsa pa garngu dang dbang // klung na 'buMb sde gzung dpeng // gtan tshong 'khor bcas garje deng dpung // rigs ba'i
57a7(rnying rgyud): bdag gi slong yang // cid zhi drug cu ngang nga // bgegs gas slong byeg brgyad drug cu dang dbang // rje bcan da 'o // gzing nga dbang bar byeng cings bzhugs// jigs ma ma
57b1(rnying rgyud): mas mnyas kha mas sa// legs nyas gnyis kyis theg sa cag/ dam thu ga sad pa'i las mdzang cig/ ces ni gyi zeng ba'i rgyud las/ gtar ma dang mchad pa la sags pa'i ber+d+has bcu drug pa'o// / de nas
57b2(rnying rgyud): bskul ba bstan par 'gro// 'di nyid 'phrul lo// trAM/ bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yis// / khyod kyi gsang ba'i mtshan btags pa// rdo rje raM langs drar khrod bdag/ dung khyod gnas par rab tu mos// gsang ba
57b3(rnying rgyud): 'dod do dgra bo de skal cig/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis mtshon btags pa// nag po mna' zan rnams kyi gshed// sha khrag za la rab tu mos// gsang ba'i mtshon nas 'bobyod de dgra bo grol cig/ rdo rje sems dngas mtsha
57b4(rnying rgyud): btags pa// ma'u chen log 'dren rnams kyi gshed// log pa'i gang zag 'dul la brtson// gsang ba'i mtshan nas 'bod da tshur byed// bcol lo bcol lo las bcol lo// dge bsnyen srung ma las mdzod cig/
57b5(rnying rgyud): cadang pra bskol ba'i las mdzad cig/ ma hA kA la'i tshogs ni sprin lur gtibs la gshegs// lus ngan dgra bo mnan pa'i dus la bab// sdig can dgra ngo bskal ba'i dus la babA// dkon mchog dbu 'bang ngam nyesas
57b6(rnying rgyud): ye ljang // sangs rgyas bstan pa da ma nyams 'di yis bshig/ dge 'dun dkor yang dam nyams 'di yis grogs// slob de ban su la 'di yis ba sngos// sdig can 'di yis ci ma byas// las ngan sdig tud 'khor ba
57b7(rnying rgyud): sems can 'di// bskal pa'i zhing bcu yin pas na// shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la// las ngan bskal bar dam bcas pa// sdig can bsgral bar dam bcas pa// nag po chen po mthu bo che// skom du mi khrig mngar
58a1(rnying rgyud): mo 'thung // zas su mi sha ba shul mo za// gros su mi lkugs rlon pa gon// 'khor du dung khrod ma mos bskur// las ngan dgra bo da sgrol cig/ rnam shes gzhan du sbyar la zong // srog la thub kyis
58a2(rnying rgyud): thobs shog/ lcags kyi bya khra chen por sru sprul la// sdig can 'di yi klad pa'i spyi rtol la// klang khrag dron mo gzhib pa'i dus la ba ba// lcags kyi sha spyang chen por sku srul la// las ngan dgra bo'i srog pa rtsar zhugs la//
58a3(rnying rgyud): rtsa dron mo gzhib pa'i dus la bab// nag po chen por lha sbrul la// las ngan gsod pa'i dus la bab// sdig can gsol ba'i dus la bab// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro rnams// gtor ma phul nas 'di thus
58a4(rnying rgyud): pas// sems can rnams la gnod byed pa// mgon po nag po khyod kyis gsol// dgra bo'i sha ni ma nongs par gyis// khrag ni bcus te btung bar gyis// yang na de yi phyi nang gi// til tsam dag tu sha chod cig/ dkar po'i
58a5(rnying rgyud): srung ma las mdzod cig// gdug pa'i dgra bo 'dul ba'i lus mdzod cig/ bzlog cig dgra po dbarno gcig/ deng nas bzung nas skyes bu yis// bdag cag bsrung zhing bskyab tu gsol// slob dpon gdan nas bskyod da re/
58a6(rnying rgyud): slo ma mtha' nas zlogs pa re// pho brang dro mangs 'gyur ra re// grub pa bar chod shod ra re// legs ldan nag po mthu bro che// mgon po nag po shugs dam can// lnga brgya dus kyi rnam la// bdag cag rnal 'byor tshogs rnams
58a7(rnying rgyud): mang byed pa'i dus pa bag/ ba rtson 'dra bral yod pa'i stong dkris nas// yang dag byeg cigabyung ba// mazeng dag sa pas rigs par gyi/ nyid kyi tshul dang dag zeng chen gsas// dbus mas da
58b1(rnying rgyud): tshuchuges gcig tu 'khyil// smin ma nag po khro gnyer brjid pa'i zhal// spyan bzlog zhab gdangs mche ba rno gtsigs nas// dam nyams dgra bgegs rnams kyi snying rtsa gcod// shangs nas me dang dug gi 'tshub ma gtong // phyag gnyi
58b2(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab zung su grel// kAyas kyi bag na tsan dan bing chen bsnams// gasdor zhing klang pa'i rgyas su rdeg/ tsan dan beng gi skrod shed nas// sprul pa'i pho nya 'bum brtse bas// steng gi lha bdud dbang du srung //
58b3(rnying rgyud): ngam ring gi zhabs shed nas// phrul pa'i pho nya 'bum bkye bas// 'og gi sri ba tsan drung nam bgyid// tsan dan beng gi par shed dpa// sprul pa'i pho nyi 'bum bkye bas// bar gyi dgra bgegs rdul du rtogs// rga yon na lcags par sku la brten
58b4(rnying rgyud): dar ser sngo khri sku la gsol// gser ka rin chen mul bcings// spyan gsum snang mig gyed du bgrad pa yis// snying gi lA yeng 'dar sha sha/ spyan gsum skad mig zur du bgrad pa yis// 'og gi klu yang zil gyis gnon// stan
58b5(rnying rgyud): gsum phred la phang bkrung bas// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad mdun na ni// gnas pa thams cad pho nyar 'gyed// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul gyis 'byung po gnan// kye/ mgon po nag po'i bstan pa la// 'khrugs la can ni 'di
58b6(rnying rgyud): yin pas// gal te ring par drang bas na// gdug pa'i dgra bo 'di nyid ni// bzung bzung sod song khyer khyer chings// sreg sreg gtor gtor srol sgrol chings// skad cig gcig gis med par gyis// gdug pa'i dmag gi dpung
58b7(rnying rgyud): shig cig/ oM ma hA kA la raD+ga du beng rjing / oM d+hI ma hAk+Sha la rU paM phaT/ sUr+d+ha N+yai b+h+ya/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshung gshegs rtsong gshegs lha chen po// srog bdud chen po marungs pa// mngon shes rdzu 'phrul sna chu
59a1(rnying rgyud): nAn// mngan gas rdzu 'phrul thAbs/ dubs// rnam bya'o/ la gdang sagasas bla'on/ na rdzun pa ga nga na pa rnam pa// na ga sa dug sa ngan lcags car
59a2(rnying rgyud): srog du dbyugs pa mda' mdza pa ste// bdag me du ba'i dgra pa glegs ni// srog d+hA da grus la khyi Sh+Ta n+te// srog bdu chen pa'i rjegs des ngas la bag// nam a hU~M// nA dpal 'bar ba
59a3(rnying rgyud): srog gi stong pos gnas nas spyan 'dren T+Tig+sa/ btsal pa'i phrin las 'di la drugs byu tsig/ hUM/ rkye ma gan ma ga pa // mdzun shes rdzu phrul thabs dang lda// rlig pa'i tshul bzhabs kyin gyi// rgyas brjo
59a4(rnying rgyud): na/ // ma thugs rnal da gshegs sa gsa'o// ma dag gi blug pa'o// zhen pa gzhas shing // gtu gu dang thug sa byas/
59a5(rnying rgyud): mo marungs pa yis ni// dam ze'i chog dkrugs ma par 'phrul// !rkyen mgon po rlag pa ni// gnas 'dir ma lus gshegs su gsol// hU~M/ rga chen bzugs pa'i mu mkhar ni/ da pa'ab 'i skum 'di ga/ bye na pa kyi so pa/
59a6(rnying rgyud): shug su 'i na btsun ting // rkyen ma gan po gshegs pa mi// dmachog can gyi thogs la byon// du ma nyams dag pa bas tud tshod // mag sa dmang ga nga myo byin// bdud mo srem dang gnyis su meng // mtshugs thabs kyi sa
59a7(rnying rgyud): khyen la mgasa'i sa / ma pa'i miru sa 'dug ma dung cu gyu/ bdud pa ga pa tu shum dang rkyenagis mang/
59b1(rnying rgyud): khri steng na// lha chen bdud po 'khor dang bcas// zhal nas mi sharta sha tsa ra ra// chibs su dpa' ba'i sgyug mo bcibs// bdud kyi zhags pa nag po dgra la 'phen// dgra bo'i g.yul so rung 'joms pa// dpa' bo khyod la phri nI las bcol/
59b2(rnying rgyud): bcol ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// ces me lce phreng ba'i rgyud las/ phrin las bcol bskul gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / phrin las kyi dum bu ste bzhi pa'o// gnas gsum pa'o// de nas bsad pa'i rim pa 'i/
59b3(rnying rgyud): sgying rnam phrar pas bsad pa dang // thun gyis bsad dang sbyin sreg bsad// zor gyis bsad dang mnan pas bsad// drag po'i sbyor ba lnga ru bshad// de la gdab kas bsad pa ni// dkyil 'khor bsad khang nag bo ru// phu raraM baM dung
59b4(rnying rgyud): nga seng ldeng ngam// gla ba skyer pa tsher ma can// kha dog nag po sor brgyad bdun// bing dang bcas pa gsor zhing gdab// thog lcags mi bsad lcags dge la// mgar ba mon nam yugs sas brngubs// rnal 'byor
59b5(rnying rgyud): khrims ldan gtsang mas su// gzungs dang bcas pa de bzhin bya// dam tshig gtsang ma tshes spyod brtson// sgom rgyud ldan pas bcad byas la// sha thod nad nas ling+ga gdon// dgug pa gzhug pa drag po bya// gu gul dud pas bdug
59b6(rnying rgyud): byas la// bdag nyid mgon po'i skur bsgoms te// ber nag gon la skya brdzes la// ngo la khrag gis sre mog byug/ zhing lpags gon la phreng chen bgras// thod pa nag po rgyan du gon// drag po'i brtsal zhugs spyod pa yis//
59b7(rnying rgyud): bdag gi snying ga da ga nas 'od/ 'phros pa'i kho la phog nas su// kho yi ye shes 'khor lo phyung // bdag la bstim ste 'od du zhu// bdag ni gzi mdangs ldan par bsam// yang ni 'od 'phros khong du gnas// ling+ga dag la
60a1(rnying rgyud): bstim byas pa// bdag gis 'bang bad pas dag su mang+gal// dz+nyAn ma chud par drag par bzlas// yang sangam hU~M khong nas / d+hod b+h+yang+tha nas khad+ma stod rgyas par bsam+b+ha// yang 'a du rnam
60a2(rnying rgyud): dpag med gyis// phung pa'i cha phab pa sa par bsam// de nas phreng ngam zur ba d+hIm// drug zla'i khyod pas gnas bdun gdab// oM ma hA kA lA gdu 'od rdoro// A~M m+bi maN+Da kA lA d+hu ba ts+tsha ba/ chege mo'i dul
60a3(rnying rgyud): gad song / nag pa chen po shA rgyu snying 'di rten thon/ bdud bdaga'i grog+sa / rig so pa'i zla rtsal la ya~M/ drug po ng+gA'i klad pa'i rtsal pa yA/ nag po dga'aM snyid rgyud debu zhesal pa la/ zhes
60a4(rnying rgyud): phurapas gdabaza// phu phung gr-i bzhi rmas sarba// nyung dkar po chags drug zhag gis// rdzas rnams srung pa'i shul du gdag// de ltar phur pa gad ba pA yang // mgon pos dngos su gdab par dmigs// nges par 'gro la
60a5(rnying rgyud): ba sham ma med// ling na phung po'i las kha yang // phung dpa la rgya 'tshal bu me// thugags cu mug zug rgyas so// snrel mgri la gra gzugs zi// phung gas dmigs rje btub pasan// mgo la zlog 'bab tham ma med
60a6(rnying rgyud): yang na dag pa'i tshul pa 'o// dgra pa'i gzugs bris phu ba tu baH/ rdzu// drang ba ga pa po mdu gye ba rdu btud po'o// / thun gyis pas dpa di lta n+d+he// thod pa ma blugasas pa
60a7(rnying rgyud): dra// 'ag ni phyogs med bsag byas la// min rtsig sum med kyi drung // drug rje tshogs cad de bzhin hU~M// mtsho dang rgyutsho gri khrag dang // dri 'i lugs dang rdo rtse dang // che ba gsus bsag sngags 'di bzlas// oM mA ma hAk+Sha
60b1(rnying rgyud): dbul na dang / sprin thu badz+ra ba n+ti tin par/ khrag la hU~Mbs gtsu// sngags sunam sa m+bu yang / de sang yin dgra la zab// khyang pa'i ca lkugasus thA// des pas ba bya// brlang ma da ga 'byung / nam nag ma this pas
60b2(rnying rgyud): sbyin// bdag nyid mgan po nga sa// nga 'i gyu thos nas// kha la ba ga/ bdag la bstis// dpal ga'i slan pa rjo par 'anas// ga ra bcug te sgrungs/ kyis spyong bya sa/
60b3(rnying rgyud): byed ba'in lam/ thu kyis pas de pa'i le brgya dak+sha pA'o// / de na sa gzhan yang thozod kyis pas ng+ge// dkyil 'khor mda' gang khri bzhi la// grogs ma mthing dag gnyis brtsegs la// b+hI rim thag mangs
60b4(rnying rgyud): hUM/ y-i/ sa kyis sbyind// dang u ba da byed// su na gas da zlas te// dag na na ma /
60b5(rnying rgyud): brgyan pa dang // bal tshon sna tshogs brgyan pa dang // de yi nang du ling+ga gzhug/ dgra yi rgyu las phyer btags te// yugs sa mo yi dri chus spus// gzugs byas snying gar ming rus gzhug/ mang du byas te thod par ga la// dkyil 'khor dbus/
60b6(rnying rgyud): kyi zung la bzhag/ gru gsum nang ma phur ba drug/ dbus su phur pa gzug par bya// zlum po rtsang gis bskor bya ba// nyi shu rtsa gcig bsnol mar gzug/ sha thod ling+ga gcig phyung la// dbus su rang+ga rbad thod par bskul//
60b7(rnying rgyud): bud pa btang la bzhag/ bdag nyid mgon po'i srung bsgom la// dbye dang dgug pa gong bzhin gyi// mtshon cha'i char gyis bsad par bsam// thugs dam drag tu bskul bar bya// zor gyi drag sngags 'dis rgya'o// oM ma hA kA la
61a1(rnying rgyud): lag ni tshal pa bri ba la dzaH/ mahA kA la rmu ma rgya la bu la rbad phung rnying la ga / la buM rbad dza dzaH/ ces pas zor ni 'phang bar bya// de la bcu rtsa brgyad bzlas pas// de nas dbang gzugs zor 'phang ngo // drag/
61a2(rnying rgyud): po'i gdangs skad bton te bskul// de nas gong bzhin khrag sA la// drag sngags de dag bzlas byas nas// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis gdab las bya// zhes pas me lce phreng ba'i rgyud las/ zor gyi las te le'u nyi shu pa'o//
61a3(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dag ba shang byu ba// sbyin sreg bsad pa 'di lta ste// dang po zab gi bya na bas ni// klu gsum sum brtsegs byas nas su// nang du dri n+ti dmar sir te// me yi sa pa ni bri bar bya// kha khyer 'dadi mdo rje bri// bar mthod pa'i
61a4(rnying rgyud): wi// ting sa dag la ma// de lce'i ng+ge na// go gangs sum shing thun la// rabu khri la 'bring na snang // zas brgya du dgod par \u0f7f// dA ya rdzas ni sran ma dang // tha las nas dang 'di nag dang // ti la nas/
61a5(rnying rgyud): mu zi mi khrag kyi khrag dang // gdug pa can gyi shing gi 'bras bu dang // tshwa ba gsum dang bcas pa ni// bye sa btags te lugasas so// dri chus skus te rel bu bya// ling+ga'i grangs dang mnyam par bsas// de nas byab
61a6(rnying rgyud): rlung dag tu ni// byer pa kra ba zhir shing dang // se ba la sogs gdug shing brtsig/ mi ro bsregs pa'i lag la dum dang // dug shi tshogs rnams bsreg par bya// dbus su nyos skyugs tha mar btsod// de nas me chen mar ba ni/
61a7(rnying rgyud): rigs ngan shan pas ma thus te// dbus su maM sgram gan po bskyod// zhal gcig phrag gnyis bad dang bar bu 'dzin// 'gying dang khrob dang rngam par bzhugs// me lha dmar mir zhal gcig pa// phyag gnyis mi dang dbyug pa 'dzin/
61b1(rnying rgyud): 'ang ban bdang// dab gdas na pa dang / dag dag lta pa dang 'azlas na// ngas madra pasum padun/ da pa ga su dag 'dung dus pacug/ dung bdang zag 'angab ga/ bshad du
61b2(rnying rgyud): dang mchod pa dang // bzang dang zin la ma rdzogs par gyi// don sa sa su p+na d+mal 'di// dpral min ring // de wa rnyed pa ma gyi// mi ning pang tshul gabang bu yis// la ma nyung dgang chung dag dang / cog
61b3(rnying rgyud): de bded 'bul bar bya// dri tshe drag sngags 'di bzlas so// oM ma hA k+Sha la rakA dzu bi nI nA~M/ baM b+hI ny+dza ma chub hU~M/ mahA kA la rbad shwA d+haM r+yA badz+raM/ da hA da ta bcu btsod na me ken hUM phaT/ tshig mo mamAM sa la ShA d+hi/ tshig po gan
61b4(rnying rgyud): srab d+hA ba rnapas 'ani/ zhes pas 'jal la// de nas sa de pa / mgan pa bad nga tho la bcal// ti de 'dzin dang dbrog gzug gang bzhinan// demigs kyi sa mas bral bsregs pas//
61b5(rnying rgyud): yang med par bsam// dri nas lcag cad bkang ba da// ninA po ma tshogs dag dzin dang// bsnyen pa bdun cu gnyis lnga 'brel// ded pal ba cigasas pas/ shA dang byung la madreb dang //
61b6(rnying rgyud): nga 'bastsu pa'i ga cig pa/ danas pang dag cu sheg sa
61b7(rnying rgyud): na ma da/ nyid kyi pas min gas/ mtshang bye dan pa'i gso'o// khrag 'i suM sogags// mab ma dang ma sogs pa// thag su 'a byas pa la// po'i bden pa phyin
62a1(rnying rgyud): nang dom nag mag padang // lung ki 'i ma ga dang ma na'asag/ phag pa nag pa'i mgapo rnams// de rnams dag gi sam pa sna// 'di de la btab byas la// rabs chang gi thong nang du gajug/ rna tha nga
62a2(rnying rgyud): kha cad la// phyogs bzhir lcags kyi gzer bzhi gdab// skud pa sngo dmar shI sras bkyigs// gru gsum dbus su tri zas la// de ru bcug la bstim sna bzhag/ de steng dur khrod g.yam pa la// de dkyil rdo rje rgya ga ma pri//
62a3(rnying rgyud): dumanan la gzhag par bya// de'i steng dur khrod do sal// 'jir lo rtsibs bcad byis b+h+yAs la// lte ba mgon po'i gzhal yas khang // legs par bsam ste rtsibs brgyad la// mkha' 'gro gshin rje ma brgyad bgyid/ phyi ma gyibape 'di phyogs
62a4(rnying rgyud): skyong bcu// de yi 'khor du dpal mgon ni// bdun cudu rtsa gnyis bskyed par bya// 'khor la de la phyogs bzhi dang // mtshams bzhir laM las ri rab bskyed// des kyang mngon du mnan par bsam// chos myong bdun chur chang phud gtor// gtor ma na tod ni
62a5(rnying rgyud): da 'bod// brang brdung g.ya ba sros gdab par bya// de nas khro ba'i stangs stabs kyis// bcags shing gnan par bya ba'o// de nas drag sngags de dag bsdus// oM skaM b+ha rak+Shanan/ pA shiM ku rba nan/ dzunyaM kr-i d+ha nan/ shAn ti kudra nan/ tshi ga na na/
62a6(rnying rgyud): A sha mA ra yA phaT/ oM shrI k+ti nAn/ kA la dru ba/ shrI ra ga le tsakra dzi nan/ zu ru bas nan/ de skad mnan gtud bcol gtam bya// zhes pas mgon po me lce phreng ba'i chung las/ mnan pas bsad pa'i be'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//
62a7(rnying rgyud): bsting las lnga'i le'u dum budri lta ba'o// gnas bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad byab// log gnon man ngag rim pa ni// log dang rdugs dang sbrengs pa dang // 'byams dang las ma btub pa dang // mgon po rbad pa nang 'od ba na//
62b1(rnying rgyud): ma rba da sha 'di ltaraH/ man nam mag gyur ban// dngas dag lamag na pakri// snying gas pa ba ca dang // phig dgu pa thob // maTha gdam pa'i thag // dug da sa pa sngags cas pa// mu thang dang ma'agag 'a /
62b2(rnying rgyud): ma pe de btsu wa~M// mal ma 'phyog mnor gyi// de'i mang mang rdo rjes bskyod// rab gnas byas te mdun du bzhag/ dbus nas gzungs thag lnga lngas gdags// rang gis gzung nas ting 'dzin ni// bdag gi tshog kyig dren// shin tsug ze brji
62b3(rnying rgyud): ste/ ma du da ga/ rnam kyi sbyin la ba// dbaN+DI kyi nga nam rgyas du' sa smran/ byed pa sa byas/
62b4(rnying rgyud): les 'od 'phros nas// de ni gnyis byas te slar 'dus pas/ dorje'i bur dang ba dang // rdo tsho'i mig mangs ris su gyur// da'i phyir ma mtshon cani// dpal yang byer bstan mtshon ma phreM// de yi phyir ma me lce'// 'bar dang tshub pas gdon bzlog
62b5(rnying rgyud): bsam// mdun dumamin pa'i snying ga na// hUM nag gnas galcags kyu ni// bdag gi snying gnas 'phros bzung // de nas mtshan chas mu khyung bskor// de nas par mde nas dbus// rim pas drag min bral min bskor// dmigs pa gtung
62b6(rnying rgyud): kInA ga cig bya// de nas bcu ba zlog gsham la// dgu pa brgya ba bzlog pa drug/ dag par byas la rgya kun bzhin// bar mched par rab dmigs la/ mgon po drag tu 'khor bar bsam// bar snang mkha' la tri shar bzhin// mgon ma
62b7(rnying rgyud): chen dang ban hU~M/ phyigan da ba ba skyes te kyinas// de nas phrin ma ring ba bzhod// denas mchod pa las la bta // zhes pa me rtse phreng ba cud las/ lag gdon yang bzlog tu ga ba'i skya ra gsum pas/
63a1(rnying rgyud): na na na chu sa smrasas sug du /
63a2(rnying rgyud): dus / nga gas pa sa
63a3(rnying rgyud): ded / mad pa pa la ma pas mnan pa gsan kyi pa/ ni dag su/ byas bdug pas sa
63a4(rnying rgyud): du/ rnams pa kyi rjenas pa// deng 'i zag gis cag // dkri pa'i rdzogs pa sas na// rang zad na/ ga sa dag panas pa/ shes la la zhugasas
63a5(rnying rgyud): sa ste/
63a6(rnying rgyud): da ma // mnanas rgya sa dang she gas palasadan na mam sa/ byas par dan gas te 'a /
63a7(rnying rgyud): gas # lu ru/ /
63b1(rnying rgyud): r-iT+Ta du ba thang / prad+d+ha y-i hoH/ che ge mo la dmigs pa gtad// ces pa'i makye phreng ba'i rgyud las/ 'byams na btod pa'i ma'u skye nyer drug pa'o// / las ma btub nA shes bstan// dkyil lakho ba bu sor bzhiH// dbus su bum par
63b2(rnying rgyud): bskor byas la// phyir la sgo bzhi dgod par bya// dbus su bad+ma 'dab bzhi la// log 'bru brgyab dgod par bya// de la mgon po'i sgru bzhi dgod// rdzas rnams kun yang tshang bar dgod// de nas ting 'dzin gsal ba yis// spyan drang phyag
63b3(rnying rgyud): bya mdzod pa dbul// de nas bstod pa tshang byas nas// dbus kyi gru gsum dag la ni// mgon po nag po rab dmigs la// e h+ye hi dza hU~M ba~M hoH// de nas bsgral pa 'di btang ngo // dz+riM las kyi rigs mchog dpal ldan gos sngon rgyan// mgon pa
63b4(rnying rgyud): 'dul gyi sku mdog 'jigs tshul can// de yi stobs kyis mgon po 'dul mdzad pa// las kyi rigs mchog thugs dam dus la bab// ces pas lag g.yon na mgrin la// g.yas pas phyag na rdo rje bsgom// thal mo'i bar du srog 'khor ni// mag
63b5(rnying rgyud): bzlog bcug ste bsdam bzhin du// drag sngags 'di dag srog sngags ni// go bzlog pa la gdags par bya// oM ni ye sa r-i ngi badz+ra pra marta ya ma hA kA la shi yon lo yo ni na/ tad+ya thA bI ga~M s+t+rai b+ha ni nan swA hA/ zhes pas rta mgrin dang phyag na rdo rjes gzing par
63b6(rnying rgyud): bsam/ de ltar sbyor ba spogs byas pas// mgon po dkyil 'khor 'jug par mkhyen// 'khor rnams shi sa bstan mthong ste// rang rang nus pas las byed do// me lce phreng ba'i rgyud las/ mgon po shes bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//
63b7(rnying rgyud): de nas gzhan yang nang 'gras nas// mgon po thams cad byung nas su// mgon po nang cha de kha 'dom ni// khyi tho dar thod wa thod srung thod bzhir// khyi thod po lha'i dpal sngags dang // lo yi ming rus bro gar bris// nang du bstsal te gu gul bdug
63b8(rnying rgyud): po bra pram/ kya
64a1(rnying rgyud): su du na tu na 'anam na kun smra
64a2(rnying rgyud): da du na/ na sa ga sa
64a3(rnying rgyud): nga stsa drang bas brjog/ sa byu gang pa ba sa su// thaMd na sheg/ rkyen mi gzug zig+sa la/ la dpa' byu sa la zlags/ nyan zhun pa pa mthugs sa pa 'do
64a4(rnying rgyud): garna pa 'du sa na sems / gag / dashi sa sa / na sa ma
64a5(rnying rgyud): ma sa/ srog thog shi she/ kha seM ga saso na spangs su pacwam brjesade ma dang // da de na// pan dag
64a6(rnying rgyud): au brAr+thi bsung/ de ba ig bul pa pa? tra s+ya 'i wa~M Ni te ma rgyung/ ma kA lar \u0f89\u0fa4 sha r+b+hid+hi ltar yadzad/ de skad thod pa dang du sil// rang gi lkug lang blang du bcu// ra g+h+ri/ yus la mardor bzung // sngags ni thams cad nga zas par bya// bsrungs pa de bzhin gdags par bya// yig sngar na rje
64a7(rnying rgyud): byung na bden pa padang // pud gtor gtor ma sbyin par bya// des kyang thub par ma gyur na// ting 'dzin gsal la sngags 'dir thang // oM maN+Da kA la sarba duSh+TA na sa zag sa rba ta na phaT/ s+yad+yaH/ badz+ra pA Ni hUM Ta/ a gro sha nung / ro ta rtag bla ma ri la/ bdag la
64b1(rnying rgyud): rgyu dus su rdzun tu tu rgyu na rna na
64b2(rnying rgyud): na na
64b3(rnying rgyud): gnas lnga pa'o// // de nas las tshogs rim pa bzhin// gtor ma'i man ga ma / sa yanas// zhes pas mngo khom gyi zed pa'i chud las/ mgon po log na mnan pa'i le'u nye nyer brgyad pa'o// / log non gyi byam bu ste ga pa
64b4(rnying rgyud): rlung g.yos me sbar thod pa khol// be gis dkrugs te sbyangs pa las// gas
64b5(rnying rgyud): yang yang 'bul sngags 'bras kyi bar// badz+ra'i lag pas gyen du bstag/ tshim rte ma
64b6(rnying rgyud): nga sum
64b7(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dag pashad kya/ las kyi sa dpa nag // khyod lasogs pa sa dag// 'dug
65a1(rnying rgyud): yid ma ting dzin gyis// du bzod ras ni drang ba la// oM ma hA kAl che ge mo ma ya// gr-id+ha kr-iH/ b+han+da g+hA trA~M tra~M Ta baT/ de skad ces ni dag chus bri// gzugs sor bcu drug byas nas su// de yi snying gar gzhug pa /
65a2(rnying rgyud): bya// de nyid mi grir shi ba yi// thod pa gnyis kyi bar du gzhug/ srud pa nag pos rgya gra ma dkri// gru gsum dong nang ro so la phyug/ de ru se phur gsum btsug la// de nas thod pa btsug byas nas// rigs ngan khyi ma ma ma bshan pa'i khyim nas me blangs
65a3(rnying rgyud): dri yi tsher can me bus la// rlangs phyin par ni lan gsum bsro// de rang nyid du dam du sba// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan yang 'chi// zhes mgon po me lce phreng ba'i rgyud las/ las tshogs las kyis bsad pa'i le'u ste sum cu ba'o// // de nas yang dag bshad byas//
65a4(rnying rgyud): gnod byed dgra bo lha dang dbye// lha la rnam pa lnga bshad de// 'tsho bar byed pa yul lha la// gu gul nag pos bsreg par bya// skyob par byed pa dgra lha ste// rta bo na sa yi dud pas bdug/ grogs byed pa ni ma lha ste// khyi lud dag gis bskrad par bya// bsrung ba'i lha ni srog lha ste// sha chen dag gis smod par
65a5(rnying rgyud): byed// 'go bar byed pa zhang lha ste// bud med dor rtas bskrad par bya// ces pas me lce phreng ba'i rgyud las// lha dang dbye ba'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o// // gzhan yang dbye ba'i cho ga ni// mi dang lha ru dbye ba yang // po dang mo ru dbye yang rung // bya rog dag gi pags pa la//
65a6(rnying rgyud): sman gyis lha yi ming byang bri// 'ug pa'i pags pa dag la yang // dug chus mi gzugs mid byang bri// bya rog pho rog rkang gis te// 'ug pa jug pa'i rkang gis spos// de bzhin stug gu byas nas ni// rjes dang sa gtsang dag la yang // bya rog 'ug pa
65a7(rnying rgyud): byas nas su// gong gi de dag de ru gzhug/ bya rog spyang ki ngag la bskyon// 'ug pa lug la bskyon byas la// mgo la pho rog 'ug spo gzugs// dbye ba'i drag sngags thun byab// khro bo gnyis ni gsul byas nas// ri dgas rtsub spang dag
65b1(rnying rgyud): lnga yang // drag po'i khang pa khu re'i ched// nang du dug khrag ro sol byug/ de ru gnyis po so sor phral// kha sbub dag tu rgyagra ma mnan// gang yin ming rus ngan mtshang can// phyir phyogs pas yid 'khrug par 'gyur// 'thabs te dbye bar 'gyur ba
65b2(rnying rgyud): yin// rta lpags dag la rtsibs brgyad pa// dbye ba sol bas ming spel bri// rta lpags dag dang skye sha dang // khams dag la rta gzugs bri// snying gar 'khor lo bcug byas la// ma he'i pags pad ma hi'i gzugs// lta bar dbye sngags
65b3(rnying rgyud): phyogs phyogs bskor// ma he'i lci pa khams la// ma he zal po'i gzugs byas te// 'khor lo snying gar bcug byas te// ting 'dzin mi dang dbye ba'am// lha dang dbye ba bsam nas su// dbye sngags thun gyis drag po yis// khang par bcug
65b4(rnying rgyud): ste brab par bya// seng ldeng phur bu dag la dbye sngags ni// nang du bskor te phyi ru rta yi yang // sog pa'i phrag tu gdab par bya// lcags phur dbye sngags phyin phyogs bskor// ma he dag gi sog phrag gdab// g.yas pas bcad cing phyi la bor//
65b5(rnying rgyud): g.yon pas dbye zhing phyi la bsgyur// mi 'phrad dbye 'gyur the tshom med// ces pas mgon po me lce phreng ba'i rgyud las/ dbye las kyi rim pa'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o// // gzhan yang bskrad par bya ba ni// gnod byed bskrad dang gzhan
65b6(rnying rgyud): par bskrad// rnga mo dag gi phags pa la// dam tshig ldan la brnag thub pa zo// dang ring brtan pa'i dad pa yis// ldong ros dag gis rtsibs bcu gnyis// bskrad pa'i sngags kyis brgyan pa la// dbus su kho nyid sbod phreng mdzad// rnga mo'i steng du de
65b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin pa gyon// de bzhin legs par bris nas su// bdag gi sogs byed mgon po ni// khro bo rdo rje bzhin du bsgom// kun gyi mchog dang rab gyur pa// rnga mo'i steng du bcan dkyil du// brjid pa'i 'gying bar rab bzhugs te// 'dogs par byed pa
66a1(rnying rgyud): sa / rjo gyusapa shang lanyas par// rgyu ga/ gas na// sas ma// ga ga gnas // lum
66a2(rnying rgyud): banan pas 'grub par 'gyur// zhes pas me rtse phreng ba'i rgyudags/ bsrud pa las tshogs kyi le la ste so gsum pa // de nas dbab pa'i rim pa ni// bus pa gtsang mthus byas la// dang dam dgung pang ga nga zhag// mar me'i phreng
66a3(rnying rgyud): pas mthar bskyor la// mgon po'i ti 'dzin gsal ba yis// stong pa'i klong du gzhu rgyud gang // rkang brdugs shes pa bsgrims byas la// oM ma hA kA la rak+sha du ba ni rdoH hUM bi hoH// ha~M ma~M tIny+dza ldan lhan/ ces lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dgug cing bstim// 'dar
66a4(rnying rgyud): dang rdzangs da rgod pa 'thub// de dag sa tsho ga sa tsa// mdong nanges par byebs par 'gyur// ag ru mabarjid pa tung // gtong ma chang dang bas rbang de bzhin gyi// skyes pas mgon po mi thong bdi ts+tshed las/ dngab pa phyis phyogs kyi ste so zhir /
66a5(rnying rgyud): de nas beng gi bcas dag ni// tsan+dan sed lding shing shing dang // seng lding marngo mgrapa dang // rgya shug dag la 'dom gang dam// mda' gang tshad du byas pa la// logs brgyad chang zung bya mdud gnyis ldan pa// mgo bor no bu me bar ba// rdo rtse mo
66a6(rnying rgyud): ma'i dpal// kha dog stug po yang naganas// phyogs brgyad lha srin sde brgyad d+hi// srog snying drag sngags bcas pa gzhug/ dar dmar cod pan rta mgrin dang // phyag na rdo rje'i sngags dang bcas pa gdags// rgya mdu gong ma 'bod pabris// rog mdzad
66a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin na// tshe me pal labs pa'o// nang du yang stod thus pa ni// ma sa te dag pa yang // byis ta dang bcas pa yang // thog can da // nga ming dang na de bdenag tu/ thugs ca // dab
66b1(rnying rgyud): ldan pa // yang na mi thul lus pa bcang // yang na med gi khang me dag/ le bkun phyog 'bad na duste// de na rjor banas paH// bcung dus bzugs teg pa ga gdags// zangs dpal dpa' brtan dril// bsad nga ma jil zhing gas zhing gang

67a2(rnying rgyud): phyar ba dang 'phan 'phyar dang // me lce chen po ltob pa dang // grogs po dang ni rngo mon a tsar dang // dom stag spyang ki 'phar ba dang // bya khwa 'dzums shing skad 'don dang // 'khor lo bskor dang skra grag dang // 'thib dang zil dang spyi zing byed// med bar

72a3(rnying rgyud): ma pra na po d+ha na si skr-i t+ta dang / ye ts+tsha ba gror ba ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar ska du/ maN+DakAl ta d+ha ma ga lakA la nA mA/ bod ska dang / dpal nag po chen po'i rgyang drang khrod nag bzhis bya ba/ dpal kun bzang d+he ga pa rgyag batshal lo//
72a4(rnying rgyud): des de bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dur khrong bsil ba'i tshal nu/ nag po chen po 'khor ma mo'i tshigs dang bcas pa la chos sgron te bzhugs so// deng cho bcom ldan 'das pa dag pos gsol pa/ bdag gi tI kyad ji lngar lags/
72a5(rnying rgyud): thang don ni ji skar lags// rtags deng mngon mji ltar 'grus// sgrub pa'i rdzas ni cil bya// grub pa'i dkyil 'khor de ltar lags// de skad ces sbas pa dang / bcom ldan 'dres kyis bkang stsal ba// na ni dur khrod be ta // pa ni dga' rab
72a6(rnying rgyud): dbang thug le// sras byin phyag stod khrag 'don// phas byin thAg gI gri khrag las// thams cadas na la 'tsho bar byed// bcom ldan phyag da rje yis+thA// lag tu do byin nas ni// 'das dang mabyon dpur gyi// bstan pa bsrung bar de
72a7(rnying rgyud): badz+ren myi dang mi dgas g.yos dang // grib gdonas sur rje// nag po chen po sru btags yid// ma sri the'u dzun du// shing thog rnam pa snga tshogs dun/ kyog rnam tshogs dang // 'dug dus drimachog ldan par/
72b1(rnying rgyud): bzang sha dang rta sha dang // khI sha dag dang sha chen dang // glang chen sha dang rnam pa lnga// grA tsi dri rgun ldan gnyis// gar tsan sngar ba ni// de dag grub pa'i dmardzas lags// tha bal rim pa gsum// rim bzhin phyagasar gsum pa'i tshad// dbus na
72b2(rnying rgyud): par ni nag po ste// de yi rgyar ni zlum po ste// gyar ni zu gsum dmar por bya// rtsi bas brgyad phyed che nag por bya// mu khyud sor gsum dang po dmar// gri gug dmar skya'i phreng dang rim// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor de ltar lags// phyag gi thod pa skor
72b3(rnying rgyud): rags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shin tu zlum la tshang chag gcig// spyi bo cung zad 'brar ba dang // shing lo gnyis dang zil 'brur ldan// gri gug mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// ser ba
72b4(rnying rgyud): yu ba can// yu ba'i rtse bar b+h+rUM gnas par// so ni zla phyed lnga bur bya// thang ka bri ba ji skar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ras chen shin tu gtan pa la// ro yi skra yis thig btab la// 'og tu rdo rje'i brag steng du// dkyil 'khor mthing
72b5(rnying rgyud): gzu gsum bri// de steng zhing gnyis bsgrol mar bri// ki ma'i dkyil 'khor ser por bri// de steng su tshad khru geng ba// kha dog nag po spyan gsum pa// mche ba nga gtsigs pa'o// rab pa nag po gyen du g.yengs// brgya phyed pa bcu'i do shal byung //
72b6(rnying rgyud): thaM lnga yi dbu rgyun byas// stag gi bgase pas spang dkris shing // nag po sbrul gyis lan lag brgyan// kha nas khrag 'angog sbyin mig dmar// g.yas kyis gri zug phyang ba dang // thod pa snying gi thad dkar 'dzin// sra ni steng gi phyogs su gzer
72b7(rnying rgyud): ste/ gar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// dbus ni su gsum nyi mar bcas// de dbus rdo rje gri gug bri// phur bu'i cho ga ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dur khrod shing ngas seng lding la// ma hAkA la'i sku bya'o// rab tu gnas pa
73a1(rnying rgyud): ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// a las byung ba'i thod pa lnga// nag po'i phyag gi thod pa bstim// mdun du nag po chen po bskyed// sngags stong bzlas la rab gnas bya// hUM las byung ba'i gri bug
73a2(rnying rgyud): la// yu ba'i hUM las 'od zer 'phros// sngar 'dus nag po chen por babyed// rang bzhin mgon po spyan dang gzhug/ de nas sngags bzlas rab gnas pa// thang kar bcu gnas pa la// dang tshad ldan dkyil 'khor brtsigs// dam rdzas sna tshogs 'byor ba
73a3(rnying rgyud): bsags// nag po bskyed pa sngon bsnyen bya// 'brum drug bzlas nas spyan dbye ba// oM ma hA kA la tsad+ha pa la mdze/ zhes brjod do// de nas rang nyid de bskyed do// rang bzhin mgon po bzhugs par bya// de nas zi nga'am thung dkar la// 'bum bzlas nas ni
73a4(rnying rgyud): rab gnas bya// phung bu rab tu gnas pa la// yi ge hU~M las nag por bskyed// rang bzhin mgon po sbyin drang gzhug/ de nas sngags kyis rab gnas bya// oM ma hAkA la kI la ya phaT// stong rngu brgyad kyis btags pa brjod// dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud dung
73a5(rnying rgyud): khrod nag po las/ gleng gzhi dang rten rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / wA bskyed pa ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' spel pa// dang po hUM las gzhal yas khang // zung gsum zung du sgo yod pa/
73a6(rnying rgyud): shing gi ka gdung gA ba dral la// thod pa sam dz+nyAn rtsig par ldan// gri brag yuHna mi ris mtshan// de yi 'og tu rdo rje brag/ mthing dag shin du gtams pa'i steng // de snying gu gsum thugs gsum// 'khor po rtsibs brgyad mthi dag la// gri phyag mthing
73a7(rnying rgyud): gang rang pa bkong// de steng ngaganyis bsngal snyid du// nyis dkyil la khor bsam par \u0f7f// bdag nyid thugs gang tubyung nas// nyi ma'i byung ngaganas pa bas ma// depas bri brag rdzo gas patshan// da da byung// bdag dag ga
73b1(rnying rgyud): gzu dang // kha nas thag cag pas pa // dug padung gshas 'ang// rtagag stan pa 'ob ba cad/ ba pa pa yang ma pa dang/ dpa tsug padu pa 'thams bdud/ danams sa ga gan 'a dus gas pan ga
73b2(rnying rgyud): gri zug g.yon thod khrag/ stag lpags rlon pas skad dkris shing // gtum pa spyan gsum gsus pa 'phyang // yan lag thams cad sbrul gyis brgyad// mche ba gtsigs shing stan mig bzlog/ skyal nag pa grangs med 'gro// de la thugs kar
73b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsam// de snyed nyi steng gri phyag las// rdo rje'i rtsa bar hUM gnas la// 'od 'phros rang bzhin mgon po dgug/ rdo rje 'chang gi spyan snga ru// ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas 'di ru// drag po'i las
73b4(rnying rgyud): la kun 'dren bzhugs// zhes brjod pas gnyis su med par gyur// gzhan gyi khyad par ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' skal pa// nag po chen po khyod nyon cig/ sngar bshad pa yi dkyil 'khor du// dbus su nag po chen po ni/
73b5(rnying rgyud): drag byed tshul du bskyed byas nas// rtsibs brgyad la ni go ma bzhin// gshin rje pho nya ma dang / gshin rje mche ba mo dang / gshin rje be con ma dang / gshin rje dus mtshan po dang / gshin rje lcags kyu mo dang / gshin rje zhags pa po dang / gshin rje lu
73b6(rnying rgyud): rgyud ma dang / gshin rje 'bebs pa ma dang / dur khrod ma mo 'di dag kyang // g.yas na gri gug mtshan ma dang // phyag g.yon ne ni thod khrag 'dzin// gzhan me cha lug gtso dang mtshungs// de yi phyi rim brgyad po la// gdan gyi steng du bsam bya ba/
73b7(rnying rgyud): los kyi gshin rje bgyad po ni// shar phyogs su ni yang ni// sgo phyogs su ni rgyal po'o// nub phyogs su ni til ba ste// byang gi phyogs su blang bgo tsanaM// byang shar ral pa tshang dgu ste// rung byang gshin rje theg pa bsam// lho nub gshin rje
74a1(rnying rgyud): gya sangs brjod// shAd sgyu ma rnams su mig dmang dgad// de dag bdag dzA m+b+hal// gre dang zad pa zhugs par// stan drang chag gang dang mazungs// nag pa zan pa'i rgyud bung zad dag polas rgya
74a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / dbang baspyang cho ga ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngang bshad pa yi dkyil 'khor du// tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshams byas pa/
74a3(rnying rgyud): nag po chen po spyan drangs la// de yi mdun du bsnyen pa ni/ 'bum du byas nas spyan phye la// sngar bshad pa yi bris sku rten// de la gri gu gzod pa dang // thang kas dbang bsrung tshogs la bshad// nag po chen po'i rgyud dur khrod nag po las dbang bsung
74a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / nag po'i lha rgyud ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// rtswa dang gsung dang bugs byi ni// nya rgyad bstan gyis mnyan par gyis// hUM srin pa'i gzugs kyi gdug pa can// tshang gcod
74a5(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa' ste// grong khyer gsum brtsegs 'jigs byed badrag/ gsum po khyod la bdag bstod do// skye mdog nag gzugs zung gzi brjid che// gtsug pa tshang gcod gri bug g.yas// g.yon na thod pa khrag bkang sdong// dzod phrang can la dang
74a6(rnying rgyud): bstan// hU~M khros pa'i zhabs brdabs su gzhi ga pas// 'jigs pa'i gdams rI rab bsgril// dam tshig nyams pa'i snying 'byo dngapa // dmatshig can pa bdag basbyin na// nag pa chen po'i byang chu khrod dag po las/ lha drung bstan pa
74a7(rnying rgyud): nas// gtong med chog ji ltang lags// bcom ldan das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkang sgrub pa// skyon mnyes par byed pa dang // bar cha kri par bya gyur// gtor ma bshad kyis men dpar bya/
74b1(rnying rgyud): alas byung na zad pa'o// nang du wAng ba shad rdzas rnams pasas// 'gatul las rlung bsam la// dkrung ngalas ma'abar bas// gtang ma gang duta ma bsas// de sted rgyulas thugabs pa/ dpas 'ang bang gnyis su dzug+sa// ragams/
74b2(rnying rgyud): gtor ma bdud rtsing bskrar// rlung gis me sbrang thod pa bsros// sngo dang dmar dang dkar bar bsgyud// de nas steng gi 'od zer gyis// rang bzhin sgrub pa'i bdud rtser gyur// gr-i grog nyi bcas 'od du zhu// de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya// oM pAtrak+Sha
74b3(rnying rgyud): a mr-i ta oM AHhUM d+hI maM/ de nas sngags kyis dbul bar bya// nag po chen po'i chung ngur khrod nag po las/ gtor ma'i cho ga bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / sngags rnams thams cad bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
74b4(rnying rgyud): pa// las rnams thams cad 'grub par byed pa/ drag byed thams cad gnon par byed pa/ bgegs thams cad drug par byed pa/ gdon thams cad stsol bar byed pa/ seng ba thams cad gcod par byed pa dang / char pa dbab pa dang / bcid pa dang / yi dwags
74b5(rnying rgyud): spong ba dang / me mo dang 'byung po thams cad dbang du sdud pa dang / rig sngags tshod gtong gcod pa dang / nag po chen po'i snying po dang 'bod zad bsad gsum gyi snying po dang / 'khor lo'i sngags brjod par bya yis nyon cig/ AM shrI ma hA kA la hU~M phaT/ oM
74b6(rnying rgyud): la shA sa na u pa kA ri ne/ er+d+ha pa/ shrI ma ma kA pa hr-i ya mi dAM rat+nA tra yA yu u pa hA ri NI ya ti pra ro+o/ s+phA ra si tad+ha/ i daM durl-i kha kha khA hi khA hi/ mA ra mA ra/ gr-ih+Na gr-id+d+ha/ b+haR+tha b+han+ta/ da stA dang/ patsa pa tsa/ di na me ke na hUM phaT/ oM a mi rA dza sa dA ma~M ya/ ya
74b7(rnying rgyud): Na yo da ya/ ya da ya ni/ ra ya ShA ya ya~M k+Sha paN+Do ni ma pa hU~M \u0f7f/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-it+panan hU~M phaT/ oM ya mAn+ta ta ha na hU~M phaT/ nag po chen po'i rgyung ngung khrod dag po las/ sdigs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// thugs pa bcul 'ji lta pa
75a1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// nag pa chen po las la bskul ba ni// ngalas bshad kyi khyod kyis nyan// 'das dang sa gyon da ltar gyi// bstan pa srung ba skyed byed pa// nag po chen ma/ myong na len pa sa/
75a2(rnying rgyud): gdug pa tshang gzod 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ral pa nag po gyen du g.yeng // steng gi lha tshangs 'jigs par byed// spyan bgrang ljags 'dril bar gyi lha gdon pa sdig/ g.yas pa gri grag gnod sems tsanA la sdang // g.yon pa thod khrag gnod sems
75a3(rnying rgyud): grang gsol// zhabs brdab gnod sems can gyi las la nyed// gang gi dkon mchog gsum khro dang // bla ma brtas byed sems can 'tsho// bdag gis bsgo ba kun khug la// ling+ga 'di la myur du chud// 'di yi sha zo khrag 'thung la/ rus pa klad pa nang ngol gro//
75a4(rnying rgyud): rigs rgyud zad nam chod la shog/ mdza' bo kun dang grol la thong // bdag gis bsgo ba mnyan na// nag po khyed ni nyams par 'gyur// zhes bskul lo// dpal rnag po chen po'i chung ngur khrod nag po las/ bskul bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//
75a5(rnying rgyud): ing+ga bcang ba ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sbal ba// 'bru nag sna tshogs phye ma la// tsha ba gsum gyis gzugs brnyan bya// dug dang ske tshe lan rdzo dang // rgya tshwa ba tshwa rdzabs ru tshwa// sngags dang dgra ming spel la bri// shi ga'i khrag dang
75a6(rnying rgyud): sa byed kyis// khyad par du yang dgra ming bri// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bris nas ni// rtsibs dang rtsibs bar rnams la ni// snying po dgra ming spel la bri// mu khyud 'khor bar sngags ring dang // bsang bcas sngags dang dgra ming spel// dril nas
75a7(rnying rgyud): gang gakhrug par bya// de nas 'bod zad bsad gsum ni// stong rtsa brgyad kyi bar du brjod// de nas nag po grangs med 'phros// gri gug gis ni lus bkug nas// sngags kyi ling+ga dag la gzhug/ snying po'i sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// sems

75b3(rnying rgyud): drang myong byachog bsnyed pa'i 'a bye ba cad pa / / sen pas ga cig ltung lags/ bcom ldan 'dig kyis bkang sprul pa// dzad bshad pa 'i zag byu du// gnag cing rtsub pa'i shing brjing sanas// 'jug pa ste
75b4(rnying rgyud): dbras byed pa pa d+ma tshogs dang // drug gi rib pa cang thong dang // phyogs sa pazod par blags nas ni// mechod pa rdzas dang g.yin du dbas// man pas rgyas pa'i dgang thugs dang // sil rjen bu dmang mdza du dab pa// de nas rjen
75b5(rnying rgyud): bram nyas gzhag pas// rjer bshad pa mchog yis// dgra bgegs bkug la bzugs la bcug/ de nas phyag gi gre zug gis// ma badzad nas ni gtub par gyi// de nas thab khung de nying // las rma gis dang/
75b6(rnying rgyud): kyis btsun pani// bre brag zigs mtshan dar gyur// de la sa wA bskum pa ni// mdog nag gdong bzhi lag pa bani// g.yas kyi dang po bri thug le// g.yod pa na ni thod pa bsnams// 'og gnyis brtson lang // snying gang phy-i
75b7(rnying rgyud): hU~M ga sbrulas 'od zeng 'phros// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drang bzhugs// de nas me sbrang nges bzhin mchod// oM a g+na ye chen mo pA ra ya hU~M phaT/ de'i thugs kar dag pa bsam// 'azod pa la te sreg pa'i sngags// rdzogs da
76a1(rnying rgyud): ledrung de ldan// oMm can pas rba shad+d+hoH/ dkad ta/ ba pa gdon makon/ yang na sngar bstan sngags kyis dbyung // nag po chen po'i rgyung dur khrod drug po las rkyen sagag 'ang skad byung //
76a2(rnying rgyud): nagra pa chen pos gsol ba/ man pa'i tshig rje lta lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkang sprul pa// phanan pa chog pa zhed par bya// theg bzhi pa myu mig dag// thog slo tis kyis bzla ba the// de nas yig zis nas ni/
76a3(rnying rgyud): ba sngags rnyedabus su bri// nga mau rtsal byed ma bri// tha ba brda b+h+ru~M ba kri// 'thang ba rgyags bcad zhes nas ni// 'bade na gnyis ni thabs par dgan// yi ge bzhi dang snying sbyin// maung dang sgral nas dang dz+ha'i// bas dpang byed de rje
76a4(rnying rgyud): ga sa ste ga 'a // dag kya pags stsag podapa/ sa nas dedang d+hAg // denas nyam ba sbyi // byung bzhin pa rnags // denas nyi ngal// ma sa pa/ med kyi
76a5(rnying rgyud): yi sa m+b+ha / haM stegs pa pa la/ yang yin papa ky-i la chag so ga tsa yA sa ya pa/ nyim bzhi pa la/ yak+Sha ma ts+tsha d+ha nga macag ma mA la r+dz+nyA/ yab nyi da byu sangs dang / gshin rje 'byas pa ma dam pa ni bsgru rgya'i yod brjeg
76a6(rnying rgyud): ngamag cin dang / sdig pa ga shin rngom nyag// gshid rdumacheb ma rnams ni/ bsgrub bya ba m+b+ha bcug pa'o// gshin rje ral ba dang cho sta kyi rgyal po dang / gshin rje lcags kyu ma dang / gshin rje zhugs pa son med nA~M/ bskub rgya khrag tu
76a7(rnying rgyud): ba // ral pa chang dgu dang / mig da mar dang / gshin rje mtshan mo nag mo dang / dus mtshan nag mo rnams ni gsod pa'i lis byed/ nyim lnga pa yi ge bcupa'o// nyis drug pa la yi ge bdun pa'o// de dag ni bsad pa'i las la spying
76b1(rnying rgyud): na bdun pa 'dag pa can par thugs bdud das nga ngas pa' / yang na da byas nas ca dums nas chud pa sa pa gyung // kha sa rgyags pa rgyang byas das // zlab rgyad pas nas pa man// thal druganas smrams kya / rAn/
76b2(rnying rgyud): lo las mi 'da' bar// gang la bya ba 'chi bar 'gyur// khri 'phang brgyad pa'i mchod rten gyi// ling+ga lag nas bcug byas te// rtsa ba'i sngags kyang gzhug byas na// de yang gang dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gang 'dod yul gyi lha rten gnas// nag
76b3(rnying rgyud): basbed la gtor ma sbyin// sngon bshad bsnyen pa tshang bar bya// yul 'dir sred pa myur du phog// bsgos nas rab 'babs par byed// der ni gtang sa gtang du sras// yul lha'i snying gar khung byas gdab// des n+ni thAtsam sa ma ci med// thon
76b4(rnying rgyud): ba nyen gong du song ba yis// mang po spu can dkyil 'khor sngags// stong ngam khri phrag ba snyan pa bya// de nas chu g.yas pa ru// 'bum phrag bzlas nas chung dkang bsags// la gcod nas ni gnas sra swa// oM kr-i li shag ser tri lAr+g+ha/ oM
76b5(rnying rgyud): da ti/ shar po dril b+h+yo// oM pra ma ya kar gri phab b+h+ya/ de nas min du skyed bu'i steng du mardol thod btsug/ de yi nang du 'om dang / glo bu dang / drug khrag sna tshogs bskol/ rabs chud thod pas kha bcang / 'og tu drug ma 'thung / oM bor ma'i
76b6(rnying rgyud): thugs bya/ ragasob gdab/ skyed phrang wa la ga dang lags sa oM dz+nyA khrisAl bsrungs sku bats+tsha// rbang bskul bya// rtsi li thod pa la snga ba'i sbyang ba byas lce khang sdad du sbas dgang bzlo ba 'grub bo// thal ba'i thad dkar la bzlas te gdun ser ba chung /
76b7(rnying rgyud): ba byung // de nas drang khrod shing ngas la// drug dang rdzam rdzas rnams kyis// 'khring la rtsibs brgyad gnyis bris la// rtsibs pa theg shin bdu chug hU~M// dbus su dgra pa ming rdzas sgra la nag pa mag badra yadapas dkris/ dpe na/
77a1(rnying rgyud): !/ shA / na nan su na/ bad na// sa s+ho// spya na//
77a2(rnying rgyud): bdag pa \u0f7f// rtswa zlas pad+ha rgyus tha // sa bdag ma la bkya gas pa'i// sgyus nas smra seM // sang dzin pa la byeng // theg pa tshig ni da rnaMmarnams 'an / mang ma bas
77a3(rnying rgyud): nas/ bram tha~Md kyi ma la bdug cing / sngags kyog nas bzlas na nges par 'gyur ro// nag po chen po'i rgyung dra zod nag po las/ las spong basbyin pa'i lacwa brdeb sa// / sngags rnams bdu baji ltang lags// bcom ldan 'das
77a4(rnying rgyud): gyis bka' stsal pa// sngags rnams btub ma byas na// don rnams log par 'gro bar 'gyur// sngags rnams slobar ma byas na// dngos grub 'grub par yongs mi 'gyur// sngags rnams bsgribang ma byas na// rang dgar 'jug pa
77a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// des na sngags rnams ngas bcwa yis/ nag po chen po nyan par kyis// drug pa'i dang po dang / lnga pa'i lnga ba dang / drug pa'i gnyis pa dang / dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyang ba dang / gnyis pa'i gsul bal/ dbyangs yig gnyis
77a6(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa dang / brjen pa'i gsas pa dang / bzhi ba'i gsas pa la/ dbang sa yig bcugasam pa sbyang bdung/ wa ba'i lnga pal/ dbyangs yig badrug cig bzung kra/ drug pa da gnyis sna gang ba dang / suba'i lngab la/ dbyangs lag
77a7(rnying rgyud): gcig pa gnan pa'o// bzhi gsul pa la/ dbyangs yig brgyag sum pa dang ldan pa dang / drug pa'i gnyis pa la/ dbyangs yog sa dang ldan pa dang / gsum pa lnga ba dang / den rlung gos pad sbyid/ dbyang leg cugasum pa spyong ba
77b1(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa'i gsub pa pa/ de nas rlung gi sa bon sbyin/ drug pa'i dang po dang / bzhi pa'i gsum pa dang / de nas rlung gi sa bon sbyin/ dbyangs yig bcu gsum sbyin pa dang // bzhi pa'i lnga pA la/ dazungs yig gsum pasbyar ba dang // de nas me yi sa bon sbyin// rgya
77b2(rnying rgyud): sa bod de bzhin no// de nas yi gzam byin// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang sbyar// de nas rlung gi sa ba ni mchog/ drug pa'i dang pa mchog/ de nas pi ge tha ma sbyin// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang sbyin// de nas chung she sa bon la/ gnyis pa'i dang /

77b5(rnying rgyud): pa le/ bzhi pa'i dbyangs yig gis sbyar te// gsum pa'i dang pa lA/ me yi sa bon 'og tu gdags par bya'o// de nas drug pa'i mthar gdags par bya'o// drug pa'i bzhi pa la/ dbyangs yig bzhi pasbyar/ dang po'i dang po la/ dbyangs yig brdud pa
77b6(rnying rgyud): byung / bzhi pa'i dang ba dang / dbyangs phyug gnyis ba spyad/ bzhi pa'i lnga pa la ni/ blo dang ldan pas la na ga nyes brjod/ ye shes lnga ldan dang par banag/ yam bzang kyis bon la// dbyangs pag drug pa dang ldan pa// sde brkyen cig las brgya
77b7(rnying rgyud): lnga pa'i gnyis pa dang / gsum pa'i dang ba'o// snying po'i sngags btu 'o// drug pa'i dang pa dang / lnga pa'i lngab la/ dbyangs yig gnyis pas dbyeb 'o// bzhi pa'i dang po de nyid las rdza pa'i dang po dgod do// dang po'i dang po dang / thog mar nam sngang

79a1(rnying rgyud): rgud dang dam rdzas ni// sprod min pa la bstan mibya// nag po'i gru brtags byung gyur na// las la byung ba ma byas na// nag po'i dmachog nyams gyur te// sngags pa de ni 'cha bar 'gyur// bskal pa'i zhing du bgyur pa'i/
