82b5(rnying rgyud): dam dus la bab// dri zag shin rje mo d+ha dang // bden bral du lha rlung gi lha// gnod sbyin dpang ldan sa bdag bcas// lho'i tshogs dang rtswa 'i tshogs// srin po la sogs gnod sbyinam// klu yi bu mo'i tshogs dang bcas// gnod ldan bu mo 'byung ngo'i tshogs/
82b6(rnying rgyud): sha dang khrag le dga' ba dang // thams cad kun nas 'dir skyon cig/ mdos kyi bdag pos mdos pazhes shig/ gud kyi bdag pos grung 'di long // ma hA kA la'i rgyud las/ mdos btad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas byin sreg bshad par bya// gang dmig
82b7(rnying rgyud): len bcas pa de// lcags grus snying drangs rlung gis btogs// rnam par shes pa de la bstim// rdo rje rung ba de la brdeg/ bsad nas dal sbyin pa theg bya// las da'i 'tshams pa'i thab khung du// de dang mthun pa'i me lha bas ma// de ltar mgon po bkram pa dang // tsha ba
83a1(rnying rgyud): sad na can/ nas sa smras// ga can zugs // mas da na pad/ sa bya// maN+Dal ldan du
83a2(rnying rgyud): khrag sna sto dang dug sa stong// thod pa'i nang du bug par \u0f7f// gzungs thag dag gis
83a3(rnying rgyud): gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // da ni zod 'phang ba bshad par bya ste// thod pa bya rog rjes can du// gang dmigs yin gzhug par bya/
83a4(rnying rgyud): smra rjegapa ma da/ nga ga y-i nga / bya chu
83a5(rnying rgyud): gdags byas nas/
83a6(rnying rgyud): oM ma hA kA la mA dang dzu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra yad de ba
83a7(rnying rgyud): marje pa'i rgyud pas/ zong 'thang ba'i min sa pa// da ni sngags bshad par bya'o// ho// e tsi ma la dzani/ kA / oM maT+TaN+Dal han tan badz+ra \u0f7f/
83a8(rnying rgyud): mi nyaM la ma ba sta// mihAska la mar mi Ta/ / @
83a9(rnying rgyud): han tan/ maHlam / daha ha/ man+t+raSh+Ta pam+b+hi ma byung/ bcaH/ lamang pa zla/ @
83a10(rnying rgyud): ma hA kA la'i rgyud las/ drag po sngags
83a11(rnying rgyud): mAr la oM ma rje'i tshig mo mA bi shaSh+TA m+b+ha bad/ oM ma kIkyil / mAr mA gri / te/ brtsa/ don ma
83a12(rnying rgyud): ga ma nar 'doms pa'i nyi ma la// dug dang ge chos ming dus bri// 'amang po khrag chen dag gis
83a13(rnying rgyud): kyi rtsA 'o// / de nas 'kho lo bshad par bya// dur khrod ngas sam shog shig la// yad na rdo sngon dag la
83b1(rnying rgyud): gang dmigs dgra 'i 'angs la// rtsibs ldan mu khyud gsum ldan bri// rtsibs brgyad dag la dag dung ni// gnyis po lnga dang ra rag sum// gang ras dag la ming rnam bri// mA ra sha thun Ta ma ba rnyed // mgrin par tshul snying ga /
83b2(rnying rgyud): 'doms su pa nArnams brib na// rdzogs pa las su rung ba dang // lha bang nga khrod kyu yi gnas// gnod sbyin gnas pa'i sang mnan ni// rmongs pa'i cha dang ldan pa 'dzi/ blo byung dad kyis byung nga gyi//
83b3(rnying rgyud): las/ 'kho la bri ba'i 'i'u kye bcu gcig pa la// / de nas gnan pa pa shad pa rje/ thod pa mags mchag pa// ma hA kA la'i snying babri// bzlas byas cung dka do byug/ yad na kyi sbrul dkar
83b4(rnying rgyud): samapa'i sa
83b5(rnying rgyud): babreng shig sod/ lung le shig sod// dri ril shig sod/ phred la tsho shig sod/ zhu tri shrIg sod/ mthu shig sod/ srur la shig sod/ tAg rAng tsod+hAdz+wa la yanan nan/ maN+Da kA la'i rgyud las/ mnan pa'i
83b6(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas ser ba dbab pa bshad par 'o// khyi ma rabs chad thod pacu// 'khor long be'u chung ltar byas te// btson dug nyung dkar gu gral yang // thod pa'i nang du thug par bya'o// zangs dang 'khar
83b7(rnying rgyud): brjid bye mang sa khrag gsus// gas na da/ thas kyi nga pog bya// phyi nga chu me mas// khyo ba dab 'bring / khyangs bu'i ga nas sa sadz+ra// gas bdus pas
84a1(rnying rgyud): oM mahAnam gyi yang nisang nas / dgaH/ ngal me la// babyed du thaMng pa dam// b.ram thong ma dun / ba bya nags nan
84a2(rnying rgyud): de nas mer ba bsrung bar bshad pa raHste// seng sde par bubacu dgal// te na ta ni'i sngags bzlas la// 'ong ba'i mthang ma bsko bar bye'o// rang nyid mgon po nag po yis// drung dkang blag ska ma nag po la// sngags 'di bzlas shing /
84a3(rnying rgyud): rgo thun dag tu bad+mog/ oM tsaN+Da ma hAkAl brjod bri hrI hrItrAM/ phaT baTal/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ s+t+wa~M b+ha la s+t+waM b+ha ya hU~M phaT/ mahA kA la'i rgyud las/ sre rab 'asrung bang ma bye cu zhi pa na// de nas sprul gtang
84a4(rnying rgyud): bshad pa gya'o// thod pam la pa la mthal ba// tshe ba gsum la gzugs byas la// ming 'bras su bcas pa yang / thod pa da 'i na dru gcig/ dmangasarigs sul rdzogs 'a nas/ oM mar+d+hakA la nag gi la lag ya/
84a5(rnying rgyud): bai rA swA tsa le/ sarba nisan ni nang/ nA ga krar nA ling tsi t+ta badz+ra mA ra yang nga/ mahA kA la'i kyad las/ thal gtad pa'i ledre ste tsA la?// de nas sri thugaso pabe shad par bya ste// ri
84a6(rnying rgyud): lU'i skye zlum// gsang ba'i sngags kyi la gzug/ gang bzung med dang sgo'i ti // gra gral bu rtse bra dag kyang // 'dzor mi de yi nang dru gzug/ mod ci lnga po tsho pa ni// rdzas lnga lnga li rba rgyas byug/
84a7(rnying rgyud): ban pa rkyen nubs te// gang bsrung mthul du btags nani// nas ni gnod pa thams cad bsrung // kyi thag zang bras bsrung ba ni// bal tshan lnga lnga'i byung du d-i// 'a rig pa rang mi \u0f7f// 'ji byung phreng brang nga
84b1(rnying rgyud): dag la// gsang ba'i sngags kyis btab nas ni// gang bsrung lus la btags pa na// des ni klu yi gnod pa spang // gang bsrung ma brtab par du ni// grwa lcags dkar po tshigs gsum so// bya rgod sla ba gron mnga' dgal/
84b2(rnying rgyud): bal tshon sA lnga gdags par bya'o// mtshal dang spos kyi drang ba btang // sngags pas mgon por byin brlabs nas// gang bsrang sngas su btsugs nas ni// da ni gtan gyi bsrung ba yin// ma hA kA la'i rgyad pas// pri waM g.yo ba'i
84b3(rnying rgyud): ste brgya drug pa'o// / de nas klu yis zin pa gso ba bstan te/ phye tshang ku ba'i nang du ni// k+Sha yi nor ba rgyang blugs nas ni// sngags pas byin brlabs cher byas te// gang 'dod gnas su bcug pas ni//
84b4(rnying rgyud): da par mi 'gyur ba// drag pos 'dum deni// de rnye par bus rib rgyad la// gra bral tsha ba'i ma gyis byugs// gang gnod gnas sre btab pa ni// bya gnas pang 'joms pa myed// 'di na nag pos
84b5(rnying rgyud): sngags yin// oM ma hA kA la nA gzhung zun/ hU~M la dz+wa la/ ts+tshin+ti dz+hin+ta/ b+han+ta b+han+ta hU~M phaT/ nAg sa ra ya nA gdung drung ngong / mahA kA la'i rgyud las/ klas zin pa gso ba'i le'u sna bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas yang
84b6(rnying rgyud): gzudung don cing smon lam gdab par bshad par bya'o// tshe rabs sngon nas kyil bas dbang bskur nas// tshe rabs brgyud nas bstan bsrung ba mdzad// mgon po thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo lo gan+d+hi/ na mo ti gi ni/ tad+ya nA/
84b7(rnying rgyud): mi ti li/ ki totsati/ ni ti ye swA hA/ tshe rabs sngon nas da lta yan chad du// rgyal ba'i bstan pa bsrung ba zhal ba zhes pa'i// de ring dus 'dir bstan pa rgyas par mdzod// ma hA kA la'i rgyud las/ gzungs 'don cing smon lam gdab pa'i le'u ste brtsa
85a1(rnying rgyud): brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'khor lha ma smin rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das phyag rdordo rje dang / rdo rje sems dpa' la bstod pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje ye shes chen po'i mchog/ phrag
85a2(rnying rgyud): rdorjem du stobs pangag/ gsang pa'i byang kho ma// ya mtshan drang byung myong la jug mtshal bstod// thitheg byung las// 'khor gyis gtsam la bstod nga'i le ste brgyad sa sto// / de nas mang la khong kyis gtso byal btod pa/ bras
85a3(rnying rgyud): me ltar shong ba yi// ngur khrod chen po'i grong dkyil nas// gdug par gyur pa thams cad kun// 'dul byed mgon po nag po ste// su ni mthing nag chen po la// dpa' bo stag gi skrag pa can// bdud kyi zer nag su la gsol// thal ba'i mchod
85a4(rnying rgyud): makaM lus byugs pa// g.yas na gcong pa'i gri kug bsdams// g.yon pa b+han+ta'i khrag chen gsol// zhal nas khrag dang zhag kyang 'jig/ mche ba zla da chos pa'i tshul// rkyen gsum skad mig klog ltar 'bru// ral ba kham nag gyer du 'khyil/
85a5(rnying rgyud): logater bsdus pa'i gzi bajig can// b+han+d+ha'i phreng bas do shal byas// gsum khyims che zhing gsus pa 'phyang // mi zung khro gnyer drag po yis// mchu dang sol khrag kyang 'jog/ mi ro s+tha zhi rgud pas dkris// bam chen sted na btson dkyil gnas/
85a6(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid cen// dam pa'i gtsug lag srung ma ste// ke dus brtsegs pa'i steng na bzhugs// las su sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung // zas mu sha dang khrag la za// dur khrod gnod kyi kun gyi gtso bo mdzad// nas
85a7(rnying rgyud): po hrI/ sa byed srul phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo 'khor lo'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dmag dbugs 'byin byed la phyag tshim mo// lha dang klu la sogs pa yis// dpal ldan mgon po nag po la// dam pa'i na stong pas bstod
85b1(rnying rgyud): rung te// sa sa dang dang gnas sa dngas// mnan rnas pas 'khod kyi srin rdzo brgyad lab/ tu su pa/ mas lhag shin da dag// 'de sa ma go// / ny-i dab nas dag srogs// gas dang rdzogs
85b2(rnying rgyud): srin po ro longs gsod byed ma// klu yi bu mo'i tshogs bcas dang // gnod sbyin bdud mo 'byung po'i tshogs// shwa dang khrag la dga' ba rnams// thams cad kwin nas 'dir gshegs shig/ 'thung po'i shu ni bza' bar zhim// 'byung po'i khrag ni ba
85b3(rnying rgyud): par zhim// 'byung po'i rjes pA zhim pa skye// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i rdzid// tho thig 'thungs shig myang du spol// mgor po man drag kri gug rtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor gyis gtso bo la bstong pa'i lerje ste ti shA pA'o//
85b4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po'i rgyud 'dri 'jig rten gyi khams su grags par spyon cig// cud 'di rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi srog yin no// rnyed 'di ni yul trA na kro shA'i gling mkha' 'azo mthong po tshogs pa'i gnas su bab par gyur cing / phyag na rdo rjes ri rab ri hU~M mon 'khor lha srin sde brtsa
85b5(rnying rgyud): bshad po'o// de nas kyad kyi sku mchog chen pos ma hA d+he'i mchod rten gyi b+har ma bdun la bshad/ de naswa b+ha'i gtso bo rnams kyis rdo rje gdun du 'dud brgyad la bshad do// de nas rgya gar gyi yul gseng myig bya ba chu chen du sbas so// de nas kyis ba
85b6(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa can rnams kyis rnyed de/ rim gyis brgyad pa ljags so// mgon po nag po man ngag brtsegs pa'i rgyung lngas/ bcud pa'i le nyi shu gcig pa'o// / sngon gyi las dang sman lam da lta'i skal bar ldan
85b7(rnying rgyud): de lce 'u byung 'di 'brang bar shog// mchings kri phyogs pa ldi rdzogs so// / bla ma dam pa mi rje gan pa'o// rkyen sa zhus pa las/ dge slo tshul khrims rgyal bas pagyur ba
86a1(rnying rgyud): ga ga d+hAs/ TIkA lam hA sa/ k+korgyu tan rnam/ bdan dan/ dpal naman po ga pacan gtsugasung chug sa thom pa'i spyang mas byub/ khrag lang 'dus pa'i g.yan ca lunag kya
86a2(rnying rgyud): lo// 'di skad bdag gis bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ chos nyid rnam par ma phye ba'i zhing khams rgyan yongs su bkod pa/ dkar ser dmar ljang mthing ba'i e gru gsum 'bar ba jag po'i gzhal yas khang na/ gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gci byi na tho/
86a3(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung rig pa'i he ru ka lnga kro N+Di shA rI rig pa'i yum lnga dang 'khril cing / mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang bcas te ye nas lhun grub tu bzhugs skad do// bzhugs so bzhugs par 'gyur ro// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ khrag 'thur
86a4(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i rtsal phyir 'khyams pas ma rig bdag 'dzin gyi rU tra lngar gyur te/ gshi nas dang / gshin chu dang / gshin mo dang / gshin rlung dang / gshin e nag po lnga dang / de rnams kyi chung ma srid pa sha za/ srid pa khrag 'thung / srid pa drod
86a5(rnying rgyud): 'phrog dang / srid pa dbugs len/ srid pa'i rgyal mo ma kha l-i dang lngas khams gsum kun gyi srog gcod cing sprul pa dang yang srul sna tshogs par bkye ste/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / da rgyal phrag dog dpung bskyed nas sa chu me rlung nam mkhar
86a6(rnying rgyud): la gnas bcas te sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs nas 'gro ba sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa de'i tshe de'i dus na khrag 'thung rig pa'i he ru ka lnga las/ thugs rje rang byung gi 'od zer snyeng 'og phyogs mtshams med par 'phros so// ma rig pa bdag 'dzin 'joms
86a7(rnying rgyud): ma'i mtshon chas ni khengs/ drag po sngags kyi rang sbra ni drag la ldir che/ 'jigs byed khro ga tum gyi sku ni che la mngabs ma rig bdag 'dzin gyi nu tra lnga dang srid pa srog gcod kyi chung ma lnga/ sprul pa yang dang sprul pa sna tshogs pa rnams lhor gsal 'dzin
86b1(rnying rgyud): med du brgyal te ye ji bzhin par brgyal bsangs nas khrag 'thung yab yum lnga rang du shes so// oM sku'i dbang bskur bas gshin rje chung ma dang bcas pa khrag 'thung lnga lnga yab yum du bsgyur te/ 'jigs byed phyag bzhi pa yab yum gyis sangs rgyas
86b2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i mgon byed par khas blangs so// AHgsung gi dbang bskur bas zhi rgyas dbang drag bzhi ru bsgyur te/ 'jigs byed chen po'i phrin las kyis grub pa po'i mgon byed par khas blangs so// hU~M thugs kyi dbang bskur bas skye med 'od gsal
86b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin med du sangs rgyas te sems can kun gyi snying la gnas bcas pas sems can kun gyi mgon byed par las blangs so// mu brjod las 'das pas nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'o// gsung brjod las 'das pas 'phrin las bzhi las 'dus pa'o// zugs brjo
86b4(rnying rgyud): las 'das pas bsngal tshad byang chub pas so// mtshan yang ye shes mgon po phyag bzhi pa zhes grags skad do// grags so// grags par 'gyur bas/ nag po'i phyogs kyi ma mo dang / lha dang / klu dang / bdud dang / gza' dang / tshangs pa dang /
86b5(rnying rgyud): gshin rje dang / btsan dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi sun pa du ma lhags te/ da ni sangs rgyas 'byung ngo // 'dis bstan pa srung bar 'gyur ro// da ni chos dar ro// ha la ha la zhes mi dga' ba'i tshig tu ma smra zhing nad rigs du ma'i rlung 'tshubs so// der khas/
86b6(rnying rgyud): blangs rjes su dran nas dregs pa zil gnon gyi ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ oM AHhUM kro d+ha mA ra na mA ran zhes pa'i sgra bsgrags pas/ shar du sa g.yos/ lho dra glog 'jug/ nub tu 'brug ldir/ byang du thog 'bas/ sku khros pas zhal gyi dkyil 'khor
86b7(rnying rgyud): gzugs med kyi khams nas khro zhing gtsigs/ sku lus gzugs khams na 'khyil ba phyig bzhini snying dang / ral gri dang / zod khrag dang / tse gsum bsdams pa/ zhabs gnyis byed skyil du bzhugs te pad+ma ti zla'i gdan la 'dod khams rigs drug
87a1(rnying rgyud): mnan nas khro bo dang khyung gis 'jig rten gyi khams bkang ngo // gsung khros pas oM AHhUM ma hA kA la e ka dzA ti ma ma hU~M hUM dgra bge gA mA ra ya mA ra ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ ces stong gsum du bsgrags so// thugs khros pas gzi brjid
87a2(rnying rgyud): bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar te log pa'i dgra bgegs zhel bcangs na skye med chos sku'i zhing du sgrol bar dam bcas pas mi srun pa thams cad brgyal rengs khrag tu skyugs so// dkar po'i phyogs kyi lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te
87a3(rnying rgyud): mdzod pa'i sprin gtibs shing bstod pas b+h+r-i raM/ dmar nag mo yi dkyil 'khor nas// pradz+ra nyi zla steng du// dpal ldan ye shes mgon po ni// mu mdog mthing nag gsus po che// zhal gcig phyag bzhi phyed snyil ba zhugs// g.yas
87a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis tset+ta ral gri bsnams// g.yon gnyis thod khrag khan+ti bsnams// zhal gdangs ljags 'dril mche ba gtsigs// khro gnyer spyan gsum dmar la 'khyug/ ag tsam smin ma dbu skra ser// thod skam rin chen phrul gyis brgyan// mi mgo'i
87a5(rnying rgyud): do shal stag lpags dkris// 'jigs byed chen por lcag 'tshal bstod// ces dpal nag po chen po'i sku gsung bugs khros pa'i rgyung las/ 'byung 'khrul rang shes gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas 'og min b+han+ta 'bar ba'i gzhal
87a6(rnying rgyud): yas khang na ma rlon gyi mi mgo'i rtsig pa brtsigs pa/ khrag dang zhag tu 'khyil ba/ zhing ljags kyi bla re la zhing chu rtagi 'phan 'phyar ba/ rak+ta'i mtsho la tsiSh+Ta'i me tog bkram pa na/ e ka dzI ti dkar mo dang / dmar mo dang / ser mo dang / ljang bu
87a7(rnying rgyud): nag mo 'bum gyi gtso mo thod mkhar brgya'i bdag mo/ srid pa las kyi rgyal mo dang / srid pa las kyi 'byung khungs ma zhes bya ba'i bu mo con ti dbang phyug ma zhes bya bas rus pa'i rgyan gsol/ rak+ta dmar gyi skyems drangs nas phyag dang bskor ba byas shing yaM
87b1(rnying rgyud): gis mgon po nyid la 'brel te/ dgyes chen suka ma hAn mr-i ta/ e mngom tshwang rab 'jigs so// ma dungs dregs pa'i tshogs rnams la// zhing bcu grol ba'i las bcal gyis// thugs rdzas dgongs nas brgyal rangs slong // khrag sngags
87b2(rnying rgyud): phrin las dag la bkod// ces ni zhu bar rab zhugs pas// 'jigs byed ye shes mgon po yis// gtum khros dgyes pa'i 'dzum bton nas// d+harmA kA la shan ting ku/ zhes pa'i sgra yis brgyal bslangs nas// rang rang phyogs kyis
87b3(rnying rgyud): la 'khod// de nas seng gdong gis gus pa'i tshul gyis 'di skad gsol// hUM gtso mchog 'bar ba'i phyag bzhi pa// mthing nag rab 'jigs ye shes mgon// bregs pa'i tshogs bdag skyabs su mchi// brgyal rengs khrag lcags zol mdzad cig/
87b4(rnying rgyud): na la dzin che lha mo'i sku// yum mchog tsa ti dbang phyug gtso// sku mdog nag mo khro tshul can// zhal gcig phyag gnyis thod skam brgyan// phyag g.yas gri gug dgra snying 'byin// phyag g.yon thod khrag gtso la stob// mche gtsigs khro gnyer spyan
87b5(rnying rgyud): gsum dmar// gcer bu skra grol rus pas brgyan// zhabs gnyis yab la 'khril cing sbyor// gnyis med bde chen he ru ka/ khrag 'thung yab yum phyag 'tshal bstod// che mchog nyid kyi spyan snga ru// khas blangs khrag 'thung yab yum gyi/
87b6(rnying rgyud): bka' nyan las byed srog 'bul lo// sind hUM phaT tri hring dza/ bsad pa'i gtor ma bdag la zhu// gar rbad rlag byed pa grub mchog skyong // sa ma ya/ srin po ha la pha ri dang // DA ki sha za nag mo'i bu// sha za khrag 'thung bya rog gdong // gus pa'i
87b7(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis 'di skad gsol// tshe mchog sprul pa khrag 'thung rgyal// dregs pa'i tshogs bdag skyabs su mchi// zhe byas dbang drag phrin las sku// dkar ser dmar ldang mthing ba yis// las grub rab yum phyag 'tshal bstod// bstan srung gtso
88a1(rnying rgyud): po yab yum gyi// bka' nyan las byed srog 'phrul lo// kA ka mu ka dz+ha sa ma ya prog dung rngaH/ sha chang dmar gyi gtor ma zhu// bstan pa bsrung zhing bslab mchog skyong // zin mo thag 'bar mi thod can// 'ju
88a2(rnying rgyud): rje'i bu mo ni// 'bar mnag mos 'di skad gsol// tshe mchog sprul pa phyag bzhi pa// bka' nyan las byed srog 'bul lo// ma ma nag pa rna li du rdzing dza rje/ rag ta sha khrag gtor mthu// tha tsho 'phrog nas bsgrub mchog sbyong // bum
88a3(rnying rgyud): nga bar ma dang // srin po rag sha ha li'i bu// dAku lA yis 'di skad gsol// chos su 'gyur med nag po che// phrin las lhun grub phyag bzhi pa// gnyis med pade chen yab yum gyi// bka' nyan las bgyid srog 'bul lo// rak+Sha rA t+yA
88a4(rnying rgyud): brjid de/ khrag 'di la gtor ma zhu// bla srog 'byed cing bsrub mchog skyong // ku chen brgyad kyis 'di skad gsol// khrag 'thung khyung gi tshogs rnams la// gus btud bka' nyan rang srog 'bul// nA ga nA ga rA dza phu shring dza// dug rlangs 'byed cing
88a5(rnying rgyud): srul mchog myong // shar phyogs rgyal pos 'di skad gsol// bdag ni khrag 'thung bka' la nyan// ngang srog 'bul zhing dam nyams sgrol// king kar da ra ra hring dza/ bshos bu gser skyems gtor ma zhu// skyo 'bog gtod zhing bsgrub mchog skyong /
88a6(rnying rgyud): sam yan dgan/ lho phyogs gshin rjes 'di skad gsol// bdag ni khrag 'thung bka' la nyan// rang srog 'bul zhing dam nyams grol// ya ma rA dza hring dza/ snying sna dag gi gtor ma zhu// srog rtsa gcod cing bsrub mchog spyod // nub phyogs btsan gyis
88a7(rnying rgyud): skang gsol// bdag ni khrag 'thung bka' la nyan// rang srog 'bul zhing ngam nyams grol// badz+ra sa du tsa hring dza/ bshos bu sha khrag gtor mthu// gzer thabs gtong zhing bgrub mchog myong // byang phyogs gnod byin 'dis gsol// bdag ni
88b1(rnying rgyud): zung bka la tan// dang srog 'byul zhing dam nyams rlol// ya k+Shan ga pa dun nga/ byud myur ga/ zhag gtang ma cu// chanagasu cing rla margyag stong // sgyu ma yan kan/ dpral nag rgyan pa sgrag sung 'grus thos pa'o/ las/
88b2(rnying rgyud): pAlA khas blangs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / ti nyid kyis yang gsol pa// tshe srog sprul pa rdzogs pa'i gtso// mgri smin byed dbang ni gang // dam tshig bsrung tshul ji ltar ba gyi// khyed ni 'dul byed sbyin ci// spyi ba grub bsnyen pa
88b3(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi las mkhan dpung // mnyes shing 'dra ba'i bsrub rdzas rnams// 'dus pa'i 'khor la gsung du gsol// nag po chen pos bka' phul pa// kye kye 'dus pa'i 'khod tshogs nyon// rin chen bdud rtsi'i sa dag la// dkyil
88b4(rnying rgyud): khor mda' gang gru bzhi bya// chos 'byung nyis brtsegs pad 'dab bzhi// de yi phyi rim 'khor lo bzhi// yang na pad+ma 'dab brkyang bya// thod phreng rdo rjer bar bcas// me ring mar nag bskor ba la// pad+ma 'khor lo phyogs kyi tshon// gtor tshogs
88b5(rnying rgyud): lha mthong sin+d+hu ra// mchod lnga gsur chen lhag slong gling // legs par skya gon tshogs bcas te// spyan drang bzhugs gsol mchod gtor dbul// zhi khro gzhung bsrang dbang bsrung ngo // zhes snang srid drag po dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa'i
88b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du gyur te tsa hi dbang phyug gis yang gsol pa/ dpal ldan 'jigs byed chen po kye// 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni// dregs pa pho mo slar gzhug pa// dpa' bo bla mas gsung du gsol// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal
88b7(rnying rgyud): tso dpal ldan khrag 'thung yab yum gyi// 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs legs// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// drag po'i phrin las grub par mdzod// oM ma hA hA la e kad+hA tI/ A be sha la ma ma hU~M tA/
89a1(rnying rgyud): gos pa sa zlog pa dang / sa na// nan sngag 'am rkyen pa 'dapas/ ma nga thams pa 'dasan// ga na nga /
89a2(rnying rgyud): krogs hA// nga bka' ta na rigs pa'i tshogs// 'jigs byed dkyil 'bang 'di la spros// bdag ni yab wam te // 'jigs pa'i ngang mo 'da'ab // dpa' deng ldan pa'i dbang 'i phred // oM badza 'ang
89a3(rnying rgyud): man+t+rarnal na tsi ti ya b+hI ShAShA ma~M/ dbang thob sangs rgyas kun zhal ma dz+dza// bAka'anyan bstan pa byung pas thangs so// phyag g.yon thod par bgatad do// byang sems dkar dmang bye ka'i brjod// bdud rtsi wami zag 'byung ngaste// da
89a4(rnying rgyud): kyi dab ba n-i/ maH/ la e ts+tsha Sh+Ta sa? sa ts+tshaSh+Ti/ ya n+ti rtsA/ dbagro brdzag s+yA pa dam n+tag da// gas kyi gang zhugs pa lhung dgas// ma dzangs d+hA g+h+nAn+d+raH/ mi shes grang pa dzin sems
89a5(rnying rgyud): na za ming gzugs rgyun pas// ba sum gnyis mi ga/ gsuM nga pa na kyang ngo // oM ts+tshal y-i/ hU~M/ na // dpas na rgyagags lagan sa// chos byed thugs dmamasagyis /
89a6(rnying rgyud): mchis shig d+has sh-ig sems la ltos// mus TIgs su stong 'i bri// drug ni ga rgyang yi gsad// sems ni dag snyi nga yi nags// raban thang na bang med// rang bzhin mamang nasangs rgyas yin// sa rje rjeg pa'i las nas
89a7(rnying rgyud): ni ba byung pa'i sa langanan// thag 'byung rig pa'i drugs// nga ya di spyong sbyin par byas// sku ga sung zugs thos pa'i rgyud / dbang gi le ste gsum pa'o// ti nga drug yang gsu pa// dbang gi rim pa de sbyar na//
89b1(rnying rgyud): dam tshig bsdu tshul gsung du gsol// khrag 'thung chen pos bka' stsal pa// spyi ru mtshig 'bum sde de// yan lag grangs ni dam tshig dang // bslab pa'i dmachog nyi shu bsrung // rtsa ba gru gsung thugs yin no// tha ma yid ma rang re dang /
89b2(rnying rgyud): ched lham sems can mkhre bsrung // zla dang zhar dang sku gsung thugs// lan lag grangs kyis ma nyams na// dam can 'go bas mdu rtsal 'byung // mang pos bkur bas grags pa ste// yid du 'ong zhing sangs rgya'o// dam tshig nyams par gyur pa na// rdo rje dmyal ba chen po
89b3(rnying rgyud): mi bzad drug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pa'i snga ltas su// rims dang yams nad 'tshe ba 'byung // dbang po 'gag cing mdze shu dang // yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pas// dam tshig nyams pa rlag par byed// des na phyag dang bskor ba
89b4(rnying rgyud): dang // sngags bshags ting 'dzin dag la 'bad// dam ldan bsnyen bsrub re ma la ni// sprin ltar 'du zhing bu ltar brtse// ci bcol phrin las kun sgrub pa'o// sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud las dam tshig gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// /
89b5(rnying rgyud): nyi dbang phyug yang gsol pa// dam tshig rim pa de ltar na// 'dul byed lha ni gsung du gsol// khrag 'thung chen pos bka' stsal pa// nga yi 'dul byed lha nyid ni// khrag 'bur rig pa'i he ru ka/ ma bskyed dbyings na gsal bar bzhugs//
89b6(rnying rgyud): 'bral ba med cing gnas pa med// rang gi sems nyid rtogs par gyis// nga la skye ba'i yul med pas// 'chi ba zhes bya mi 'ong ngo // nga la 'gro dang 'od med la// 'du 'bral zhes bya ming nas med// nga la gsal dang 'grib pa med// nga la dgyes dang
89b7(rnying rgyud): kyis med// ngal bsrub pa'i rdzas kyang med// bzlas par bya ba'i sngags kyang med// thams cad rang gi byed pa yin// me long gzugs brtan ltar shes na// snang phrag 'dul byed lha yin no// drag cha la du shes pa yin// tshig rnams 'du byed
90a1(rnying rgyud): wA yin no// rig pa'i don nyid rtogs pa na// thams cad 'dul byed rgya yin no// ni khro bskyed rim gsal ba na// nga nyid 'dul byed rgya yin no// nga nyid yang yum gsal ba na// grags pa 'dul byed nya yin no//
90a2(rnying rgyud): dpa lnga'i snying pos ni// nga nyid 'dul zhing thams cad bklag/ mchog dang thun mo dngos gruba'i byung // su gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud las 'dul byed d+ha'i le'u rtselnga pa'o// // ti nyid kyis yang gsol pa// 'dul byed khyen de ltar na/
90a3(rnying rgyud): skyob smrab rim pa gsung du gsol// phyag bzhi pa phyis bka' skal pa// dkyi wA 'bor dbang dang mthun pal// phyogs mtshon sgo dang bcas pa kyi// dbus su thod pa kha sbyar nang // gri snying zla dag da la lding dang // 'khor lo bcus pa dang nag zil/
90a4(rnying rgyud): nos kyi tshem bu gtong mar bcas// yab yum gtso 'khor nyid yin no// he drug srid rgyal gyis// lding gang srog phul sngags pasams te// 'od phreng dmang pos dbang brdzus la// gsal ba'i sems kyis 'bum du bstsal// oMm bAk+Sha la ye
90a5(rnying rgyud): na sprul ba sasu badz+ra/ sam la srogadu dzad/ mam ngag man par zing / sman nga rdzing/ ro tu rjid da/ gling ga rji / ya NA ma~M/ bcam byed / bganas babyed/ tshong na tha~M gas
90a6(rnying rgyud): ribi 'i na ci thog brel lo// sgribs ma 'grub cing bsnyen pa bsrung / drug dug com pa'i spyad las kyi bachub ci'i na drug pa'o// nyid kyis yang gso / phyi bcu ba'irim pa de sad du// gisung mas
90a7(rnying rgyud): 'i ni gsung // nag po chen pos bka' stsal pa// tshe mchog khros pa'i drus ma yis// sa brtul skye smra gyur// chungs ni bdul ba yis// gtum pa'i dbyang phyug can ti// thog ba nga gcig gzam// nas
90b1(rnying rgyud): bdagangarapa zhes// bstan bsrub sems nam basmra// rigs pa 'du gyin// zin mas pasgrub kyi gas rgya'o// sangs nas nong gas na// gshos mganapa la ba sam pags// nyid byung ba nyid ngabya/
90b2(rnying rgyud): de nyid gsal 'tshor kun nyid sdug/ nga nyid kun khyab pade chen 'i khyil// sku yi las mkhan b+ha 'og gdong // bka' dang bstan pa khyod kyis srungs// gsung gi las mkhan 'bar mnag/ bka' dang bstan pa khyod kyis srungs// thugs kyi las
90b3(rnying rgyud): dun dashul// bka' dang bstan pa khyod kyis srungs// chos byed bslab mchog dam pa yis// bos pa'i dus na snyan ma sra// g.yab pa'i tshen spyan ma brtul// lus dang grib ma bzhin du 'grogs// brten pa'i chan phrug ma dog/ rbang
90b4(rnying rgyud): 'i tshen mthu ma chung // gsod pa'i tshen dang ma ring // tsit+ta gtor ma ltag slong lnga// dar nag gling bu gser chen du// sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga tshogs na// sha la spring bzhin byed rnams 'dus// chos byed dmatshig can la ni// ci yang med las
90b5(rnying rgyud): 'dus// sngags pad ma tshig mi bsrung na// bsrungs kyang rgal nyams las ma byed// bya roga'abar ma seng ge gdong // gza' bdud kyal po ga shin rje btsan// gnod sbyin klu dang mi sun tshogs// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i bka' 'di srungs// rnal
90b6(rnying rgyud): ra mongs kyi dam bla mdzad// dag 'drin rkyen gi srog shing dri la// dam nyams kun gyi srog tu chod// bdud 'dum rnams kyi dbang phyug che// gtsug lag khang gi srung ma rnams// legs nyes kun ci ltang 'dzi che// nag pa rlung gi tshogs kyis
90b7(rnying rgyud): bskor// shaza 'bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor// gnod sbyin du ma'i tshogs kyis bskor// bdud po nyi khri'i tshogs kyis bskor// mi srun drag po mthu chen rnams// bstan 'jig dgra po zas su gtad// de ma nyams shazo zag ni 'thung //

92a3(rnying rgyud): srung mthu bo che// yab yu ma 'khor bcas dgongs shing gshegs// bdud kyi bar chod bsal ba dang // gdug pa dgra bgegs bskal ba'i phyir// drag po'i gzhal las dkyil 'khor 'dir// gnyis med gdan zhugs 'phrin las mdzod/

92a5(rnying rgyud): sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg/ bdud rtsi sha khrag gtor ma 'bul// dgyes par dgongs la bzhes su gsol/ ma hA kA la DA ki nI sa ma ya/ d+h+ya pe pu kle gar+b+he hUM/ ni bi \u0f7f A lo kI sha rba NAM/ ma hA kA la sa ma ya sarba pA dza ho/ b+ha ling ta hi ma hA b+h+yAM sai ShA hi/ maN+Da
92a6(rnying rgyud): t+ta ShA hi/ ma hA sU ra d+ha ti/ pra be kam/ sarbA ar+tha bi d+ha ye swA hA/ de ltar dus bzhir mchod cing bod// su gsung thugs thos po'i rgyud las/ bod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / yang ni bshud gyis legs par nyon/ oM ma hA kA la ya
92a7(rnying rgyud): katsau ti kun trita dgra bi e ku shaM mdzang badz+ra maN+Da hA la sa du kaM/ des po'i srog rtso zad// bal rag sha rbad/ sbyi ba la rag shi zad/ srog la ga sharbad/ snyig drug pal mo ba la dag pa zad/ dza lA rI/ oM laM/ ldeng ldeng / dzamajam/ lhang rtang /
92b1(rnying rgyud): dgra 'i chog la zlu mari la rbad/ ru ru shi tI kri ma du sod / brums ma dag du sa sod// bdug shaSha ma sod/ dgra po'i srog la thums thang song rgya ya d+hi yi tsa dun sod/ a mu ka~M sa ka bud mA ra la srog la thun b+h+yo// dgra be che ge mo mA ra la rba sod/ ram ta
92b2(rnying rgyud): de'i bde ba gyi nu tsan tA ru pa ni rA hu la dgra po'i snying la khrag zad/ he ka li ma hA tsan d+ha tsan d+hA mA ra ya rbad/ 'bar ma seng gdong gza' bdud kyis// dgra po gnas pa'i sa phyogs ste// khaM bltas nga ro drag pos zad// bsul 'di gtang lding mi sngags
92b3(rnying rgyud): hUM// mi mngon dbyings nas bzhugs pa yi// bstan srung dpal ldan nag po che// rigs lnga khrag 'thung khrul pa skye// chos rkyong mgon po mthu bo che// bka' srung chen po dam tshig can// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'jig

94b3(rnying rgyud): tshil sa sur+b+ba dkar rje dmar chi bas// sba lnga dang dkang 'jol bar gsol// stug shubs g.yas la gzigs thubs g.yon// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// bshos thugs byems 'di gsol la// bstan pa 'jig pa'i
94b4(rnying rgyud): dgra po dri// lho 'bog nad kyis sod la shog/ gi shA das po'i thog 'phreng shag da po/ dpal ldan mgon ba nag po maM// skyortogs grol gang mnu che// gshin dmang po 'gong po // lho phyogs gnams rnyed kyi bdagra// dmar
94b5(rnying rgyud): ro zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa spu gris dgra srog chod// g.yon pa btsan zhags dgra la 'debs// chibs su btsanar dmar po chi bas// rgyab na ba se yi phub dmar khur// steng na bse yi ma khwa lding // khyod kyi thugs dam dus la
94b6(rnying rgyud): pAb// snying sgra'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra bo 'di// shan pa'i spu gris gtubs la shog/ ya ma tri ling rbad/ dgra po'i snying la dgu rmugs rbad// dzA/ dpal ldan mgon po nag po yi// nub phyogs grol gling ma
94b7(rnying rgyud): btsun gyi skyil po cu 'phrul can// nub phyogs gnams byed kyi bdag/ sngon gzhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa do dbral gsor/ ga yon pa dgra snying dpe po 'dzin// yul ni 'og zer rkye nag so re// rtsibs su seng ga nga
95a1(rnying rgyud): sa rgyun na su dun /
95a2(rnying rgyud): dzin ga / sa su ma su
95a3(rnying rgyud): su
95a4(rnying rgyud): ga/ ma sa sa
95b1(rnying rgyud): sa yong na su su rdzu sa / // sgyu sa sa du gyu// rnams
95b2(rnying rgyud): nga brtson gyis gtubs par com// rdzag zung gas thos pa'i chung pasugs dpa'i dubye bdu gnyis pa'o// pa shing kyis regs pa ton// nas skab byang btas ci rtog nga / nga mashAm po / thog pa sdugs myed nga
95b3(rnying rgyud): sa nyid cung tho Na zang // thams tha~M dag pa 'du chung / ma hAs la ris pa krog la myur yazad/ ha~M bta cu thab sa mdag mita bta thu bathabs mA wA hraH/ 'i ta bzug/ dag ga yul ta bte rje 'jug/ ga ka t+ya btu thub drug/ lam sa rgya ba ta
95b4(rnying rgyud): dung / badz+ras ru h+ya ba ha badz+ra bahrub/ yag ku nag po ha ba hA ba chub rngub/ phung pa brdab cing gi drug gtubs/ oM ma hA kAl+ya ka Sha yul/ dAgra po'i snying lang ma/ log la ma/ ya ma/ maN+Da kA las ma pa zang / dub da ha dang dz+wal paM btsab tsadz+wa la / bar+b+ha ba d+ha m+b+ha badz+ral ge mang+ga da di thogapa
95b5(rnying rgyud): dgra pa'i snying la ya / ngal po mAr la trA~M phaT las kyi dkyil 'khong 'brung khung can// drag po'i ma sba li rjod bul// yo pAk+Sha la kun rdzing/ dag bo ga dang ma ha la nan/ btsa tsa mr-i ta ya naH/ pa ma yim las maHla nan/ ma hI ny+dza paM ka 'grub mi rgyas ma yan na/
95b6(rnying rgyud): da/ dad+yaH/ gzugyur pa/ snam d+hi md-i phaT/ ming ro bsregs pa'i bang ba // 'tha ba'i gzug nus kyang // mchod tenag mdas so/ na/ dbajog su pa'i tshogs dag tu/ dzong rjeng na pong med/ gsung byag khros pa
95b7(rnying rgyud): ga tub bsreg gnan gzing las mtha'i 'i'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// pa zhi ba shang kyis leg par nyon// ra tu sbyin kyi chos nyi gnang // lus bdeta mang nga rig pa dang // gtso bo bshes ga yum grwa// dngosas ma mi' nyams spang nga // dang ston gyi rlo ming bang da
96a1(rnying rgyud): thag tu rig pa 'i// nyal banyis nas mngon sa ngas rdzus// rtsi bslabs tu gas ni di ltar thung // mi nag zad med bya gnon// dadang bang masbyin // tan gagonan se ga gdong// gas mangs thob drun
96a2(rnying rgyud): ga/ #// 'dams pan na / na padang// kyi ma na su/ rdzo stsa/
96a3(rnying rgyud): drang bya ba dang // kyang ki ga yag nag la logs lhags/ ban sngags ta nag min ga dang // matsar dang bya 'og dang // bud med rtsal mo mon mo dang // thog 'tsho ga zug choms 'di yis 'ongs// bdapo dus kyi/ gas yin no// dmaga'
96a4(rnying rgyud): grong bsgyel btson bzung dang // ta rmugasar lug dam brid dang // bya ro / khra mis sems can gas // thad pa bus kyi rtags la yin// rtazugasar yug ri dag sa gsad// dmar gsod nad khol steng dang ba// mgo brgyad snying phyung ngo dang ni/
96a5(rnying rgyud): sa debs nas thag ji ba ma // dang yang 'grangs shing shes pacur// gsad pa dus kyi rtags yin no// 'igs shing skams pa dang // phyag du lardzun pa zhe gzugs mi gsal/ gtu ba rnams dus kyi rtags yin no//
96a6(rnying rgyud): snyed rang gsal 'bar skyen na// bsreg pa dras kyi rtags yin no// klong de rmyi lam nya' song na// gnan pa dus kyi rtags yin no// 'ur rdo skad che me stag 'gro// zor 'phen dus kyi rtags yin no// snying dang lag med yang
96a7(rnying rgyud): la su mi 'gyur rtags yin no// bya rog 'thab dang dmag sogs 'dzings// mi nag khro dang bud med 'du// 'tshob nag thag nag mi ba dang // tshig pa za zhing mi dga' dang // khro tshog byed na la khu rdzog tags// mda'
96b1(rnying rgyud): mdung rdo dang ser ba ba'as// skyes pa byad med la sogs pas// gos dang lag tshwa med pa dang // yang na tshogs cung byed dang // / thal 'dod rgyun 'gyed shugs 'grad dang // rang yang rtogs shing zhom pa dang // b+hA rog sa
96b2(rnying rgyud): g.yag ru chag/ dar nag mdung bsnyil rmis pa dang // zlog pa byung ba'i rtags yin no// dang po 'phrul che bar du lhangs/ mtha' ma sha yi longs spyod rmi// nus pas bstan pa srung 'a byed// grags pra kun gyis 'khur
96b3(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// rnal 'byor dam tshig ma nyams nas// las kun 'grub par the tshom med// sku gsung thugs zos pa'i rgyud las/ rtags kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / yang ni bshad kyis legs par nyon/ oM ma hA kA/
96b4(rnying rgyud): ka tsa ti mun gri ta hU~M phaT/ ma hA kA la ka kha mu kha ru tra ti ga nan rtsa khra ga tset+ta rgyas/ sreg khri khrag hud zhums dza/ ma hA kA la dgra po'i rtsa khrag tsit+ta hur srog la thu ma ril zad/ nr-i zhums thu mas tsit+ta chud rbad/ srog la rmugs/ tsit+to hud dzad kyog
96b5(rnying rgyud): dwA kAklu le nAng / rmed yam/ hru zlums/ mdar/ zung rdzogs/ rmad lam rdud phyogs/ chad lam thung myag la/ dzad mang sngal dum po'i thog 'phyogs bums ri thang/ rtags dang ldan pa las 'god na// rang ting nye drug byab zhos
96b6(rnying rgyud): de khro srul zhing sgram rkun pra ba/ lce dril drag sngags mgo gzhug bzlog/ nyin par sngags des rlu tra gsad// the tshom med pa'i drag sngags 'di// blol mi gzung rang la gzan// sku gsung thugs thos pa'i rgyud las thogs pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//
96b7(rnying rgyud): yang ni bshad kyis legs par nyon// nad gdon zhi ba'i las byed na// rje 'bangs 'khor bcas dkar por bsgom// rgyas pa'i dus su ser po ste// dbang gi dus su dmar po la// drag po ljang nag 'od zer 'phro// 'angam zhing rgyas shing dang
97a1(rnying rgyud): dang // drag pa'i shid rnams bsags ste/ num po zla zhin pa dang// zug sa ma dkyil tho byu ba cig/ babyed pa pag nasungs kyi // /
97a2(rnying rgyud): b+h+yaH/ skra na rdzu / lan sas mas las spyan 'grug/ tsug yis la ldog byus// dang 'ogaganan pas ban ma chings// rten rjo bcas pas mithun sa/
97a3(rnying rgyud): 'phangs na zad 'dre 'azlog/ phyung ba'i rtse yis ser ba thub// rnge'u dkar nag no chung srung // tsha tshas gzhan gyi ngag ni non// bum pas ngag mnan byas pa khrol// rdzas sna bzhi yis lhas dran 'grub// rdzas snga gsum
97a4(rnying rgyud): su / g+sa kya su su
97a5(rnying rgyud): gtor bshos bus phugs dam skongs// gang byed rtsa sngags sham bur bsgyur// phu gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud las/ las tshogs kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / yang ni bshad kyis legs par nyon// hU~M dang ma
97a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis rje yi phyog// yang yum dbyings nas shangang ste// he ru ka dang gnyis su med// hU~M drA hrIs las mkhan thog// gtsul ma ga yum gnyis med ni// gnyis su med pa'i sprul pa'o// par+b+ba tse du shing 'dzing po
97a7(rnying rgyud): 'brag med srog gi gnang pa // thig sa na pa dan// gab dam gis pa dang dang/ rlag pa kyi ma bzlapa'i las byed// sas rgyas 'am
97b1(rnying rgyud): dbang ldan bsrung ba ma srub de// zhes sku gsung thugs thos pa'i rgyud las/ dngas ma thog gi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / yang ni bshad kyis legs par nyon// nag po thos pa'i gsang rgyud 'di// g+hi gtsun
97b2(rnying rgyud): ngag tu khur nas kyang // klog dang 'chang dang kun chub kyis// mchod pa'i tshogs kyis rab mchod la// sangs rgyas bstan pa rgyud 'dis srung/ chung 'di bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs su// dregs pa'i tshogs rnams rab 'du zhing /
97b3(rnying rgyud): 'di la bsrung zhing bsgom thos na// sha la spang bzhin 'du bar byed// bu ltar brtse zhing las kun 'grub// thogs med nus pa'i rtsal skyed do// dpal nag po chen po sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud las/ klud gtad pa'i le'u ste bco
97b4(rnying rgyud): brgyad pa'o// / sku gsung thugs khros pa'i chud le'u bco brgyad pa gsungs pas/ lha dang b+hi dang / lha ma yin dang / mi srun drag po'i 'khor rnams yi rangs te/ nag po chen pos gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
97b5(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs khros pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// // e ma ho// u rgyan pad+ma bdag la yang // sku gsung thugs ni khros pa'i rgyud// bsil tshal dur khrod mgon po yis// gsungs shing 'grol nas bdag la gtad// ye shes 'tsho
97b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal phug sna la chongs// phyir bas don du gter du sbas// las can gcig gis rnye de nas kyang // sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar shong // gsod byed gri gug gi rgya yod do// sa ma ya/ rgya r+b+ha rgya/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad
97b7(rnying rgyud): 'o/ 'di dab don nyid dag do'i 'as chung le ju sul/ dngo grang brtan gzigs cu gcig brgyad rte rtsod/ 'don non nying gi ngos su bstan rig rtog pa rnang ci'i gnye yon nams 'ongs dgos kyang dpe ma 'byod/
98a1(rnying rgyud): ga zhu na sprul sa na / na/ da shu dang / dpas mgon nag khyod mang na pa la dam tshan nul ba po zhes zla ba'i rdzu/ bAm ldan das da 'a gyu
98a2(rnying rgyud): po shin tu rnam par grol ba nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bgro ba bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje de sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
98a3(rnying rgyud): bcu mdza ya sa mu med pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bye brag du man ston pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul thams cad nas thams cad du yongs su dag pa dang / rgyal po lnga ltar rdzogs longs spyod pa dang / bub pa'i dbang po lta bu la sog
98a4(rnying rgyud): ma gyis mi khyab pa'i drung na rang rang dang mthun pa'i sku dang / mtshan gyi bye brag du ma ston cing 'khod de/ sku'i bye brag de 'dra ba re re'i 'khor na yang 'dun pa sems pa dang / rigs chen 'byed pa dang / dbugs chen 'byin pa dang / lung chen thob pa dang / rnal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal
98a5(rnying rgyud): byod kyi bye brag grangs bzod kyis mi ldang bas bskor nas bzhugs so// de dang de nyid 'byung ba'i dus kun tu/ rang gi stong pa la nyan cing rang gi nye 'khod na chos ston to// de yang gang zhe na/ sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ gsang sngags kyi po de nyid do// sprul pa'i skude
98a6(rnying rgyud): ga 'das nas kyang 'byung ba'i dus de'i 'khod kyis rtog pa sol zhing gsang sngags ston to// de'i dus na thub pa chen po de nyid dgongs pa gsum gyi phyir mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul ston to// de'i dus na rdzu phrul can bka' 'gro ba mdzad nas 'khor bsdus pas/ gang nang
98a7(rnying rgyud): par brtog pa lnga ma gtogs pa 'dus nas rang rang gi the tshom bcad do// 'khor 'dus pa'i da da rgya po nyid kyis gsang 'dam pa'i bsnyen pa byas pa nam gyur/ sangs rgyas nyid kyis gsang sngags mi ston nam zhus pas/ gsang sngags dus bcu
98b1(rnying rgyud): kyi dus su byung / 'byung 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ltar ngas tshogs su rgyas par ma byas kyang / dam pa'i rigs rtogs pa gsum ldan la sogs kun la rgyas par bshad pas nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya dang bcu gnyis kyi dus su 'byung zhes lung bstan nas 'das sa sa na
98b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzad rnams ni kyal ka'i tshig grogs par 'gyur la/ de la byis pas so'i skye bo phal ched mya ngan gyis gdungs shi kyi bud kyi hrung du tsho ngas 'dengs so// rang gi don la sems dpa' rnams ni 'da' ba med pa'i don chung de gnas so// de nas de'i dus pa bab pa'i tshongs pa'i rigs can rdzani 'di
98b3(rnying rgyud): blo gros thabs dang ldan pa dang / zab pa dang / dri ma med pa/ mtha' las pa/ blo gros gsal ba/ rang gi mngon par shes pas mkhyen te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis lho phyogs kyi gling tan tu'i tshal drag shul can gyi ri la tshogs te/ ston pa 'das pa dang / gras sngags
98b4(rnying rgyud): kyai theg pa mabyung ba la/ gdung pa dang bcas te smre ljags cher bsgrags pas/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsan nas/ gsung ba'i bdag po la/ rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsigs dang ldan pa'i dbang bskur nas gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa shod cig par
98b5(rnying rgyud): bka' braga'o// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos zhal gyis bzhes te/ phyugs rje'i rngu 'phrul gyis rang bzhin gyi sbyar mdza nas/ ri ma la ya'i rtse gyon na// de dam pa'i rigs can rtswa bo di rje yin snyam ste tshom dubyar na rdzis pa/ em to// don tshar gyi /
98b6(rnying rgyud): byas du chen gcod su nig yin/ gang nas byon/ gdung dus la ma yin gang li rten/ don nu na pas dris pas/ gsung ba'i bdag pas bka' phral ba// ngani cis kyang mi bskyod de// 'gyur med do rje sems dpa' las// ye shes thabs
98b7(rnying rgyud): ngos 'grod na la/ byon pas gsang bdag phyag rdong yin// srid gsum 'gro ba'i gtan gcig yin// stong pa chen po'i dbyings nas 'ongs// pa ni da tshogs ma 'gags zabs// ma ni shes rang brjod dang bral// rdo rje rigs chen pas
99a1(rnying rgyud): rus// bshes gnyen phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// dbang bskurd 'gro ba'i tshig la brten// khyed kyi blo tshom sel du 'ongs// 'pho ba skrag dum la thams pa la// ye shes blon ma thor du 'ongs// 'khor ba'i
99a2(rnying rgyud): byab la// 'bas kyi phrag zungs byed du ngas// ma rig le tog slongs sprul// ye shes gra mas 'byed du 'dzes// lamatho rdzob tu thams rnal// mdo las rdzu 'dren ngas// btsugs don gyis da shA // rang ga
99a3(rnying rgyud): pabadzin 'don du longs// rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin sgo lcags la// 'phrul gyi lde mig 'grol du 'ongs// ston pa mya ngan yongs mi 'da'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// ma rig smin mdzad 'dul ba'i phyir// 'byung 'jig dar nub thugs
99a4(rnying rgyud): tshe yin// zhes gsungs so// dam pa'i rigs can lnga pos dang ba'i sems kyis phyag btsal nas bstod do// e ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ bka' yi 'grel chen gsang ba'i mdo// chos kyi me long bdud kyi dgra// A na pa'i rgyal po yi
99a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin nor// sangs rgyas kun dngos khyod phyag 'tshal// zhes phyag btsal lo// de'i dus su mi mjed 'jig rten 'dir// mngon sum mtshan ma'i lhas sna tshogs dang / 'pho 'gyur dang cho 'phrul la sogs du ma yang byung ngo // de'i dus su gsang
99a6(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi rigs can lha'i tshogs dang / drang srong dang / gshin rje dang / bdud dang / gnod sbyin dang / dpal mgon po nag po la sogs pa ma mo'i tshogs dang / lha ma srin sde brgyad kun 'dus te/ rang rang gi srog nyid phul nas bran du kha
99a7(rnying rgyud): glengs shing brtan pa bsrung bar dam bcas so// dpal mgon po nag po dur zod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor lo'i drud las/ gleng ga'i rjod kyi gtam rgyud kyi le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas 'khong de'i nang na srin po'i rgyal po 'ang ka
99b1(rnying rgyud): mgrin brgya zhes bya ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la bya ba byas pa/ thub pa'i dbang po las gsang sngags kyi nges brnyed pa des/ ched du rang gi stan las langs nas/ e mthugs rdo'i mnga' bdag mchog/ sangs rgyas thos pa'i sku mchog dpal// nyid kyi bka
99b2(rnying rgyud): yi las mkhan mchog/ smyon pa nag po gtum bag can// bde mthong thar pa'i lam rnyed kyang // sems pabyed dbang gis gzhan don du// bzang po dus tshogs sun pa de'i// lha sgod dkyil 'khor rnam grangs dang // dbang dang nge mtshig sub zabs dang //
99b3(rnying rgyud): rdzas dang snying po rtags// las la bskul dang mtha' sdud dang // phrin las bye brag 'bras bu dang // mu chen gtan la dbab pa rnams// 'dus pa'i 'khor dang phyi rabs kyi// don du bdag la bstan par mdzod// ces zhus pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyis
99b4(rnying rgyud): bzhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo ba mdzad de ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// skyon pa nag po gdub rtsub can// sangs rgyas stong rje byin 'arlabs pas// babul te sgrib sbyangs thar lam bstar// phrin las rdzogs ngag lung bstan nas// rang dam sems bskyed
99b5(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i phyir// bskal bzang rdzogs par bstan pa bslang // de nyid lta ba spyod pa gnyis// dkyil 'khor dag ni bdun du nges// ji bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dang // phyag rgya dngos grub dkyil 'khor dang // byang chub sems dang bsod nams tshogs/
99b6(rnying rgyud): bka' rjod po nya dag po las// gtad khram gnan pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// dbang bsrung ba dang dam tshig bcu gsum dang // mchod rten rkang dang drag thun rdzas// bsnyen bzhu ba las sbyor sngags rnams dang // rtags dang bskul ba'i bye brag gsu ma/
99b7(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i thabs la gsum du nges// dpa' bo kyang du grub pa dang // rtsa ba bdud ltang sgrub pa dang // drag po gzhin rje ltang slub pa'o// lha ni zhes ge ga/ gnyen pong bye brag gsum// chub pa'i thabs gsum du sa// dpa' bon mgrin dpa
100a1(rnying rgyud): sa / rgyu // su smran dgu smra/ sa bla
100a2(rnying rgyud): na/
100a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa
100a4(rnying rgyud): sa nga // gas
100a5(rnying rgyud): sa na
100a6(rnying rgyud): sa // sa
100a7(rnying rgyud): na ga smra ste du sa sa su susu su ga ma
100b1(rnying rgyud): gau& tan+t+ra 'byung gnas nyid du sngags// mi dmigs dang las kun 'byung bas// ngo bo nyid ces brjod pa'o// de la gnyen po med pa dang // 'pho 'gyur skye 'gag med pa yis// mtshan ma'i bdag rtog 'joms pa'i phyir// rdo rje zhes su bshad pa yin//
100b2(rnying rgyud): ra zhin ma bcos pa// gsal skyong rig pa'i ye shes sems// dngos po kun bcos dpal zhes brjod// 'gran zla med pas bla na med// gsal la mi g.yo byang chub sems// phyogs ris bral zhing ma bcos pa// rjes rnams kun gyi de bzhinagyi
100b3(rnying rgyud): ma nga ma drang grol snying po nyid// de phyir mtha' las 'das pa dang // dbu mar mi dmigs pa zhes bya// gang ltar mos par snang bas na// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos gzhi yin// 'gro 'od med bzhin 'dul snang bas// sprul pa kun gyi 'byung gnas yin// de la
100b4(rnying rgyud): brten nas de 'byung bas// kun gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin// de rtogs mun pa sel bas na// zhing khams kun tu smon me yin// ci yang mi 'gag kun 'char bas// thugs rje thabs kyi 'byung gnas yin// chos rnams ma 'dres rang snang bas// kun gsal
100b5(rnying rgyud): me long 'od pa che// de lta bu yi don rtogs na// rang bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ro// bdag gzhan cha yis spyod pa yang // lta ba'i phyogs su dbyung ba dang // de las mi 'da' dam tshig bshad// gtad nas ma rtogs sems can la// phan pa'i spyod pa
100b6(rnying rgyud): tshogs pas// sgrol ba nyid dang sbyor la sogs// mkha' la khyud dang tshu la nya// dbyer med thogs chags med par lhod// longs spyod med bzhin thams cad spyod// mi 'gog mi 'dzin tshogs gnyis rdzogs// shes 'jug kun dang gzhan don du// lam
100b7(rnying rgyud): bsgoms skad cig cha bsgoms nas// bsod nams dkyil 'khor mos slob cing // rang bzhin phab rdzogs mchod bsnyen kun// ji ltar spyad kyang nyid du grol// dpal mgon po nag po dur khrod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ ji bzhin nyid
101a1(rnying rgyud): sri dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas phyag rgya dngos grub kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas par// gsang sngags 'aman
101a2(rnying rgyud): babyed pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing rlag par 'gyur// yi ge slo btags ming tshogs la// brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te// khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// 'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi// 'bras bu lam du gyur pas na//
101a3(rnying rgyud): snod ldan dang tshul bzang la bstan// lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin// gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya// rmongs la 'phyar bas gal te sbyin// dus min par ni srog zad nas// bsregs dang slebs par yun ring gnas// nyams dga' phun sum tshogs pa
101a4(rnying rgyud): yis// gnas mchog dam pa yid 'ong bur// tshul dang mthun pa'i rjes rnams bsogs// maN+Dal la sogs mdzes byas nas// khrus byas lha bsgom snying gar hUM// bgegs bskrad phyogs bsrung dkyil 'khor la// 'od zer 'pho 'dus dbang po dgug/ phya
101a5(rnying rgyud): btsal mchod pa 'di yang 'bul// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra shrI he ru ka badz+ra kro d+hi d+ha ra ma hA dz+nyA na maN+Da la hUM/ yon chab spos sogs mchod pa dang // gtor ma bdud rtsi rak+ta rnams// rim pa bzhin du sngags kyis dbul// thugs las phung la gnyis med rol/
101a6(rnying rgyud): brtag 'dra log pa'i stobs ldan gyis// thog mtha' med pa'i dus mtha' nas// srid pa'i 'khor lor 'khyam par des// skye ba mang po'i lus blangs pas// sus kyang ma byas rang gi las// de tsam cha gcig don spyad na// de tsa me don gyis sangs rgyas zin//
101a7(rnying rgyud): rab lum stong par ma phod cing // chags pa'i mtha' la mngon zhen pas// zug rngu'i nad kyis zin pa yin// srid pa'i bzon rang chud pa 'di// mkha' la mdud pa brgyab pas nyes// 'khor ba'i rlung sgor khyer ba 'di// las kyi rlung gis ded pas nyes// dus
101b1(rnying rgyud): gsum N+Dal ba ma lus pa// 'di dag mi 'chab mthol lo bshags// oM/ rdo rje sems dpa'i yid spobs shig/ rdo rje sems dpa' nye zhing bstan par mdzad// bde bar gyur cig kun tu bde bar gyur// shin tu bdag la thugs rjes khyab par mdzod//
101b2(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid shin tu bde bar gyur cig/ dngos grub thams cad bdag la myur du gsol// phrin las thams cad dag par mdzod// sems nyid dpal du mdzod ci gzugs dges bde// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun// rdo rje sems
101b3(rnying rgyud): gyi dkyil du bdag 'dril cig/ rdo rje 'byung po chen po'i dam tshig gis// sems dpa' phye med klong du dag par mdzod// oM ti kaM ta kau phaT/ gro ta po tA raM taM sA tig khaM ha la ha lA yaM/ dang po 'dzin pa stong pa nyid dag par bsgom mo// dbang po 'od hru Ta
101b4(rnying rgyud): mchad pa'i ngas rnams pan+d+ha/ oM ba~M sa s+t+rait+ta ma hos sats+tshaN+Ti hrIH/ oM ma sa biSh+TaM/ oMsaSh+Ta / d+ha tAn trAs s+yA maN+Dal hU~M/ zhes gaspangs s+ho// dpal mgon po dag po yod mngon pa ma pa mngon pa ma'ang
101b5(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ sngon du 'gro ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas sgrub pa'i rim pa 'di gsungs so// oM ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // skye ba med las thams cad gyes// skyes pa
101b6(rnying rgyud): na 'ang skyes pa med// stong pa nyid dur bu gsal ba'i// snying rje'i yul ni bsgom bya zhing // thugs la 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khong bsam// hUM las du mthod 'jigs pa'i gnas// rang bzhin gyi nang mtha' dbus bral// snang skyong gar yang myam chad// duH/
101b7(rnying rgyud): khrod thod pa'i rgyu las grub// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer 'bar// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud dang // gru chad par byams sgo gnyis brtsegs// bsrel pa me ri rab tu 'khrugs// dregs pa khyo shug bsnol ba dang // dri ba srin po gshen rje bdud// dom dang /
102a1(rnying rgyud): ma gas/ sa// na sa // sa bag // sa na / yongs nga sa// ga
102a2(rnying rgyud): dbug su pa phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrang // g.yas g.yon dkar dmar dbus mthing zhal// kham nag dbus khro rtags brgyan// rdo ma 'i rje chung ga yas// b+haN+Da d+ha zhags dung khrag g.yon// dung khrod zas rdzogs gar dgu'i d+ha bas// ru
102a3(rnying rgyud): dge 'brel chud stong// thugs las hU~M bzhi gdan lngas smros// spyod skyes yul du rigs bzhi skyong // zhal gcig phyag gnyis khyo tshul 'bying // srog ser dmar ldang rtsa gdag/ 'khor lo ratu dbyug pa da // pad+mad gra
102a4(rnying rgyud): hrI'abyur// grong tha~Mga'i nga zhing mupa dang 'khyim// ye shes ma yi byung du bsgom// gas pa'i rdzogs kyi 'ad bar las// sngags da pa rdzas smras pa rloms brjed// ci skye brgya rgyad la// de rji po rjod //
102a5(rnying rgyud): byed sras mo thAm+b+ha nA~M// s+thAg tsunas brgyad pa bsgom// khams kyi phyogs mtshams rim pas// ming sdug pa dag sdigadong tshigs// bshad dang gang gakya rab sa// mam sa su dgod du 'jig pa gcugs// sring 'gro gdong 'gro 'jig rten
102a6(rnying rgyud): gsul// r-i la sa marnams sgo ba zhir bsgom// srin mo drug nag la rdzogs te// ngag sa nying bcad kyi rnams pa'o// brgyad pa dbang bskur byin parlab \u0f7f// rang byung ye shes dkyil 'khod de// rlung gi snying ga'i 'od zer las// dbyang sa dang ldang pam
102a7(rnying rgyud): go sa// cog/ padus kun nas sman rdungs te// phyag bcol dbang bsdu bkrug bstims nas// dang po thun meng rdzas lngas mchod// de nas khyad par rnam gsum dbus// sman gyis mchod rjes dngos phub thang // gtor ma dbul zhing gsang nani sbed //
102b1(rnying rgyud): gsas su gyu// ga/ su// rgyun na na tu chos su spyo du
102b2(rnying rgyud): myo nga tshul dang phung po brteran// yab yum zha la gro tshul gyis ni// 'bram mam bye ba rdzogs par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// dpal mgon po dgra po dru khrod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha khor lo'i gyad las/ yidam gyi lha phyag rgya dngos grub kyi dkyil
102b3(rnying rgyud): mdzo bstan lnga'i me la ba ma?// de nas bskyed pa ti yi 'di gsung 'o// gnyer po 'aM dang gnyis yir// / skyed pas seM gta bya'o// b+hi ring hrI gsang ba'i bdag/ mi tog 'dul mdza rdzogs su// mthing dag
102b4(rnying rgyud): gcig tug gnyis brjid// ngo nga bo tshul sdigs badzab rngam// drung khrod ces rdzogs me dbang zong // nyid dang 'dra ba'i gnod sbyin tshogs// dums bskor bar gsal bsgoms nas// snying po 'di dag rtag tu bzlas// oM ni las d+hi tir brjod 9 ma dz+nyA pA ya ta
102b5(rnying rgyud): gag brda hrI~M dz+rad ya~M dz+wA phaT/ drug po ma nig she skye zhi // mning dag zhas gsum rgya ga drug brjid// g.yes d+hag dag / yod dmar dra khrod nas// 'khor lo ngam gri pa g.yas// thod pa rdzogs mdu bzur pa g.yod// yum dang gnyis sra
102b6(rnying rgyud): med par bas ma// hrI pajig shing rjegadang // dram mod pa yi rgyad ngapa// gas ga gas 'di dag chud du gyus// oM la po ti ka lA d+ha ke tA r+'u shA d+hal / dpa' bo ca pa ta chog dbang // dmang phyug ga lags ma theg drug brjidz+ra// da
102b7(rnying rgyud): kA nal ldan d+ha mag byung // pa rdo rje mede 'bo gas sa// bod jig dpal badrug phre 'dzi dgayon// dri yod can ldan yus dang 'bri // nyid kyi la chu ba dag gang nas bzang // gsang sngags 'di dag rkun du bzlas// oM badz+ra krod+ha ha yA
103a1(rnying rgyud): ba d+hu/ ha hA hi hi hu lu tsu lu hU~M phaT/ bdud 'dul rdo rje srin por bsgom// sngo nag dbu dgu phyag brjod rgyad// spun ni 'bar ba nyi shu dgu// kham nag ral pa srid rtser 'bar// rdo rje'i gshog pas bar snang khengs// bsu
103a2(rnying rgyud): lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra// sdom dang sdig pa dug sbrul 'phro// 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis sa gzhi khengs// rdo rje thod stsogs tir dbyug zhags// nyi zla khyung dang 'ug pa khwa// rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dang // za ma tog dang rdul g.yab dang // rnga chung ring
103a3(rnying rgyud): men// grang skye sa ste// myu / dus// rjen nyi nga bya napa sa na// mau pa // mas sa// gang gas
103a4(rnying rgyud): yang rtag tu bzlas// oM rak+Sha shrI he ru ka rU tA ma ta ma tA ha taM kro d+ha dz+wa la hUM phaT/ oM b+hu kur i tsi ki yi udz+dzas+sa kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de ltar bsnyen pa'i snying po de// chos myong mgon po'i drag sngags yin// rab tu gsang ba'i phreMH las yin// zhes gsungs so// dpa
103a5(rnying rgyud): mgon po nag po dur khrod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ gnyen po stobs kyi lha bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// e ma'o 'khor du 'dus pa rnams// rang gi yid bzhin
103a6(rnying rgyud): rin po na// yod pas ma shes stong bas dran// zol bar 'dod na ji ska rtsol// dzin tshong ye shes gnyer mchog/ thams dgad dam bzhig gis bstan// e ma'itshad kyis mi shesas so// blon nas rgyag zung gser tshol ltar// gsang ba'i phying po
103a7(rnying rgyud): mdzod pa rtol nas// thig leg cig gis kun la khyab// thams cad nges par 'dus chen ston// 'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs kun// khrag 'thung lnga bcwa brgyad du gnas// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i chos// btsal med ma bcos rnam par
103b1(rnying rgyud): gsag dang ma garlab// dang na nas da // blas pa sa / ya su sas ng+ya sapa// ngas dpa sto/ spyan du da // ngas
103b2(rnying rgyud): ma snying dgas pa// jigs pa 'i nga byas kyang ba// dun mi ma pa'i rgyu'i drung // blang pa'i ba 'drub bzhibasam// dbyu ba me rje dang / rnam pa dag bden tu dang / pa nga ni ni'i ni/
103b3(rnying rgyud): sa sa
103b4(rnying rgyud): ba ba gcim padzig/ ying nam kying 'arnam pa lnga// bad man sum // brtan pa'i zug pa phyug sa// yangs spyod 'dzi na te/ rnams pa mig pa// steng ga ba // 'du ba de 'dzin

103b6(rnying rgyud): thos// gam pade da la khrimapa y-i// babyang med du zhi gas hrI/ dubastas Sh+Ta/ glen na sa/ la ga pa // byed dred pa
103b7(rnying rgyud): sa pa sa ngas da gtsum mabs nga/ ba blang ba chu brji pa // ga sa pas ni// mim da seM mad pa'as// sang rgyas nyid dang drugs da pa// rje gas
104a1(rnying rgyud): bdun pa'i dus na rigs kyi sa// yid la byed pa thob zhes te// sems gsus kyi zhing mtha' kun tshul// rten pa gzhi yi rnam par gnas// rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor byas// 'gro 'dugs ma stong ting 'dzin thob// sems na//
104a2(rnying rgyud): te mtha' bcu shes// dbugs chen 'byin pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'jigs pa lnga zal khyad par gsal// yongs su mi tog ting nge 'dzin// rmi la ma ga bur chos lung ston// 'jig rten nor bu rin chen gyis// gang bar spyod pa'i lhas mthong 'gyur// grul/
104a3(rnying rgyud): skyong ba'i skyes bu de// 'khor los skur ba'i cha thad du// rin chen bdun dang dpung tshogs kyis// dbang sbyar thabs kyi thug pa ston// lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// seng ge dag la khron nas ni// thams cad gnon pa'i rtags mthong 'gyur// sba brtan 'dra bar gyu
104a4(rnying rgyud): ston 'gyur// 'bras bu nyid la la ma shis pas// lam gyis ni bde rdzogs te// gzhan dag sbyin par bya ba'i phyir// ji ltar 'dod ltar thabs sbyor mchog/ tshul chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// kun sdung ting 'dzig nyid thob pas// sdang byed nyi bla'i 'khor lo brko/
104a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad gsal byed ltas mthong na// gdeng du gyur pa'i ngo bo yin// de nas rgyal tshab skyes bu des// chos kyi rgyal po gang de yi// gdung 'tsho ba dga' ldan theg chen ston// mi gnas bcu rjes tshe 'phrul snang // sa bcu don la gnas nas kyang // gsang
104a6(rnying rgyud): sngags don mchog ma rnyed na// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen mi 'gyur// rnyed ma thag tu de rnyed 'gyur// grol bar 'dod na bla ma bsten// rig pa rang byung ye shes nyid// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// dpal mgon pa
104a7(rnying rgyud): zhig po ngur khrod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ thabs lam byang chub sems kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bsod nams tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kun// bsod nams
104b1(rnying rgyud): sa kyi dkyil la mang ni// zhing thams rin can yang bcwa// stan pa gan bzang ba yis// sras ma tshag 'jam dpa' can pa la// bshad pa bzhin rtags surgyan// gang sa rdzas kyang la ma rdzu grags// dpe dpe la gang ba bku// /
104b2(rnying rgyud): spyod gsum po gdeng ldan nas// rnal 'byor spyod lam tshul gyis rol// de ni ji lta bu zhe na// 'byor pa sa yi rnal 'byor lnga// bza' ba tung gos rgyan bro gAr dang // gru tshe gtan lhan rnam lnga'o// skye shi med par mdzad spyod dang // 'chi dri grol med par ma
104b3(rnying rgyud): spyod dang // mi 'gyur rol pa'i mdzad spyod do// de yi bye brag rnam gsum ste// snang ba lha la lha rol dang // rang snang ye shes rol pa dang // rang bzhin nyid la rol pa'o// de la yon tan rnam lnga haM// bza' dang btung ba'i longs spyod kyis// bde chen/
104b4(rnying rgyud): lU dang bdud ci 'grub// rgyan dang 'gro po'i phongs spyod kyil// 'bar ba'i rgyal po makI stobs 'grub// thog rabaskyod bskul longs spyod kyis// sul 'dzul dang stong la chug/ gru chog sgra yi yongs spyod kyis// rdzam+b+ha kyi dngos gru' thob par 'gyur// ta na
104b5(rnying rgyud): stan longs spyod kyis// rang 'byung ye shes thob par byed// de phyir 'byor pa'i longs spyod kyi// sems nyid rang sdang 'dod yin brlabs// bde gshegs de cil 'khor rgyan drangs la// ting 'dzi rjes kyis rim bzhin mchod// srogs tu tshig rgya ma
104b6(rnying rgyud): ro/ hU~M stegs rol dkrug/ bskal ba'i shes pa gnas chen skar// yau baM yu ma mkha' lasras su byed// des na bsod nam ma tshogs chen lda // skrag mas 'jig rte ma pa' 'gro mchod// ces gsungs so// dbul megan ba drug pa
104b7(rnying rgyud): khongasangon par rnal pa mdzad rgya 'khong po'i rgyud pas/ tshogs kyid kyis 'khor gyi le'u ste brjod par/ nas pag ngas ni kyi la las di gsungs sa// de sang ga dang lda sngags pa yis// du thod ma lags cho //
105a1(rnying rgyud): ri rab ri yi rtse mo'am// nags chal rtsub pa'i sa phyogs sam// sbrul dang gcan gzan gadrug pa rnams// gnas pa de lta bu yis dgra la// maN+Dal 'dom ga gru bzhi pacig/ bdud rtsi khrag gis chag chag gdang /
105a2(rnying rgyud): du pa?'i rus chen thig btab la// dur khrod tshon gyis dkyil 'khor bri// lcags khang lnga dang bar khyams zlo// lcags ri nag po khor yug phyi// khrag dang bshang gcig chen dang // rkang dang klad pa klad rgyas dang // rdeg dang chu ser la sogs pa// 2
105a3(rnying rgyud): rje phra pa brgyad kyis bskor// dbus su yang yum mchog phung dgod// mkhar bzhi sprul pa rdzogs bzhi la// lcags sam gdug shing phur pa dgod// lho skor skrod pa mtshan ldan du// dpal bshos khrag sa snying gi che// la phug la du stsa
105a4(rnying rgyud): yi// byang du thod par gtor ma dang // thod dus rkang rus klad pa dang // 'bru mar sbyar ba'i mchod pa bsham// shar sgor 'bru yi phung po snang // nub d+ha shAlnga snying lnga bzhin// dbus su thod pa mtshan ldan gnyis// steng 'og bsnyen bslang
105a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi bri// snying gsum bdud rtsi dang bri gyi// bam gyi shA khrag rus pa dang // zagasar rdzas kyi rongs kyis// byams la sogs pa gra bzhir dgod// tshil cheni ma mar chen po dang // rag gsang nad rgyung kyis sbyar// zod pa'i changang dang gi rung /
105a6(rnying rgyud): shun gyi rgyal mtshan phyogs bzhir dgram// zhing gi bla re'i maN+Dal dbub// bdag nyid khro bo ma rung bsgom// thugs ka'i hUM las 'od 'phros pas// rdo rje ra ba gur du gtams// me ris brgyan pa'i dbus nyid du// 'od las gyur pa'i gzhal yas
105a7(rnying rgyud): bsam// bla ma dkon mchog yi dam lha// zla ba'i gdan la sngon bsam la// sngon bzhin mchod la gsol ba gdab// 'od zhung dag gi sgrib pa sbyangs// mchod gtor rgyan rnams byin gyis brlabs// lha gsal thugs las spug nag hU~M
105b1(rnying rgyud): gro'adu sa thugs pa nga thod pa nas// gang ni tshul 'ang gas// snang gas mgang shing yangs par brgyad// mi ta la sa gas na to// gang ltung ngamamasas pa // mthung bang mthags na/ drug ba
105b2(rnying rgyud): hA/ mgon po tshogs bdag chen po ni// ljang nag zhal gsum phyag drug ste// gA yas ser g.yon dmar ljang nag 'jigs// kham nag dbu skra gyen du 'khril// spyan dgu sdang mig skar ltar 'khrug/ shun gos thod pa'i phreng ba can// steg
105b3(rnying rgyud): dang glang chen thal ba zhag/ gdug pa'i rgyan tshigs chas kyis mdzes// g.yas kyi dang po gsal shing 'phyar// bar pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa// tha ma lcags phur 'drile zhing 'debs// g.yon gyi dang po thod khrag 'thung // bar pa rjod pa la shun gyi mdung
105b4(rnying rgyud): za ma srul zhags srog la rngam// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor thabs can// nye gnas kro d+hi shwa rI ma// 'jigs tshul zhal gcig phyag gnyis rngam// zhing dang re lde thod sbrul brgyan// g.yas pa chu zhags yab la 'khrud// g.yon pa zod stsogs khrag gi
105b5(rnying rgyud): bkang // dus bcung rkang dang klad pa dang // 'bru mar chang gis gyur pa yi// rtag par rang gis lo dra spyod 'dzin// 'khor bzhir khro bo gnod sbyin dang // srin mo mtshogs 'jig pa bskyed// phyi rim nye 'khor nyi shu brgyad// srin po nye garas chen
105b6(rnying rgyud): no brgyad// ki ri tsau r-i pra mo ha// pe ta sI dang pu ka sI// g+haswa ri dang s+kha sha nI/ tsaN+Da li la sogs pa sun// mas shing rngam pa'i mtshogs kun// shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs su bsgom// srin po'i bu mo dri zla ba rkyang // seng rtag wa sbyang bzhad kyi ma
105b7(rnying rgyud): karA ka bya rog 'ug pa'i tshogs// zhing la rngams shing ston pa'i tshul// dur khrod pa yi sgo srung bzhi// brtson mo gdong mo gar log mo// 'jug par byed pa'i ma mo bzhi// gsang sgo 'dzin cing bka' sgo sungs// dur khrod bdag mo gru 'degs bzhi//
106a1(rnying rgyud): sam d+hAN bska la dang // dadom dang zhag 'aldang ba// chags pas ga nas drugs// ngasams dang tha mdzan// mam sa ga byu ga/ skad ltag lag 'dzag pa// bdud pas byung/
106a2(rnying rgyud): dun mo// blon mo dmag dpon sde dpon mo// ru dpon po tor mngag par bya// ci bgyid bka' nyan rdzogs pa'i 'khor// dzod gtod dam pa'i tshul du bskom// nad kyi bsgral pa tsub mang gtong // gdug pa'i mtshon cha lus la 'gyed// mkhar dang dzo \u0f7f/
106a3(rnying rgyud): pad rol na// 'bru dang shin tu 'bru chen po// skang ma spang rgod pung ba dang // srul dang sdig pa rngom la sogs// kang ka dre rtse thug pa kha// b+hag NanA sha zan tshogs 'phur zhing // ce spang stag ser do mdzod 'phar// ngur khrod ro yi longs spyod la// ba
106a4(rnying rgyud): chug cing rol 'phen// rgya ma 'dren cing rus pa 'cha'// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang // rang bzhin yul nas bkrug cing bstim// phur pas bskal zhing zhal du gsol// phyal dbyangs la gnas su gdon// labang pa'i sde sngags bka' 'khor dbul/
106a5(rnying rgyud): rang dam bca' zhing dam tshig dpong// mna' bor las la mngag par bsam// brtan par byas la mchod pa bstab// mngang gsol phrin las gzhol ba dang // bsnyen dang nye ba'i bsnyen pa bzlas// zhes gsungs so// dpal mgon po nag po dur khrod
106a6(rnying rgyud): mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor lo'i rgyud las bka' sdod pho nya'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di gsungs so// traM/ lang ka yul gyi grong rdal gyi// dbus kyi ri pe ma la ya/
106a7(rnying rgyud): ka za dmar rgya mtsho'i do// bran lag ma tshang rig nam lcags 'bar// drag shul can gyi rtse mo na// rdo rje thabs kyis blta ba'i yul// chos 'dzin rigs kyi bsrub gnas su// dpal chen rdo rje srin po yis// bdud kyi lnga rnams btul nas cang//
106b1(rnying rgyud): gsung sngags 'khor la bskor ba \u0f7f// ming gi dbang bskur man srabs blangs pa// rdo rje langs dur chungad tshogs kyi bdag/ mgrin po dag po chen po dang // nyeganas gro d+hA thA nImA// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i 'jar// ra
106b2(rnying rgyud): 'i bdag po la sogs pa'i// 'dus pa rnal 'byor ma na'i tshogs// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// gnas 'dir ldan 'dzin gshegs su gsol// mr-i b+ba kur ma the kA la gau d+hi ka ni dag mo ti la ma e a ra li dzing rdzing na/
106b3(rnying rgyud): oM nin+d+he rukab+de sh+tsa badz+rab d+ha dzA la maN+Dal pa rdung tu gal hU~M phaT/ takr-i ti ka phu TI d+hakra d+hi ha har me ti pa k+Sha tig rmA 'o/ sa po d+hi ta ga rbA d+hi ti th+liM b+his mA yA maN+Da la/ mthus pacoM/ pha big pa/ bad+h+yes
106b4(rnying rgyud): lo ma yi/ ma me mer mdza / em dpa'i bathugs chung // shin tu bde ba'i gnas dag rag// rnam pa 'dzin pa thugs rje chung // dayang ci mdza krung du dzad// sredang bsngal na lu byeb // 'bangasas
106b5(rnying rgyud): lus 'bral// 'brangs lanan tan ma chung shig/ sman chad dka' ba'i dus su rjod// gal te bka' bzhin pa ba sgris na// das pa'i phung las 'gal 'a ste// bdag cag rnams kyis blo sa da// dum rgyag gnas
106b6(rnying rgyud): zur cig/ na rten pa ban pa dreng+ga 'i lan mya gtid nas mA yang gshes te bi na ba dz+ra ma mr-i ba~M tA na dkan/ mthing bu ma chung bya mas+ho// 'bangs su 'bul pa cos mazung // 'jam pa sha paslob pa sa theg pa/ ng+ge/ rje ma rje ma
106b7(rnying rgyud): lasu gyud/ 'a mi kyi thong maba'i smon/ la tsho ma lam rgya bya// 'gal zhal gabyer ci// benas gadrung 'i mtho rdu ro// de nasargyal ba gra' mi byas/
107a1(rnying rgyud): mkhan te// bka' yi las byung myung du skabs// bdag kyang deng ljon las log snang ba yis// dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal brgyud// da ni las 'phrog nyid sad pas// bde ba rngan ci zhing ngachur/
107a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba'i// rjes su bstan pa'i bka' las nyams pa de// ji ltar ma byams bu la gdung ba bzhin// dam tshig can la dung dung gdung bar gyis// gang zhig srid byams mang la gdung ba bzhin// yal dam can la lhang lgang brtse bar cisra/
107a3(rnying rgyud): mdza' mo ji ltar grogs la gdung tshul bzhin// rnal 'byor can gyis kril kril brtse bar gyis// ji ltar g.yog rnams dpon la brtse ba ltar// dam pa rnams la yid bzhin nor ltar khur// brtse bar byed na ma ru bya// gdung bar byed na srid du
107a4(rnying rgyud): bya// brtson par byed na bran du bya// rigs rgyud 'dzin na bu mor bya// 'du 'bral med na slob mar blta// bskul bar mgyogs na pho nyar bya// bka' bzhin byed na bka' la gdags// zhes sngon gyi tha tshig bstan pa'o// dpal mgon
107a5(rnying rgyud): po nag po dung khrod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ spyan drangs shing sngon gyi tha tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas de dag la mchod cing mnga' gsol ba 'di gsungs so// hUM/ dang po bstan pa bsdu
107a6(rnying rgyud): bar zhal ba zhes pa'i// bdud 'dul dbang phyug ma hA kA la'i tshogs// sbyin yul lang ka pu ri yi// grong khyer gtan nas brlag mdzad cing // lha ma srin gyi bu mo ni// glog ma srin 'dul zhal ba zhes pa'i// lha chen mgon po rna
107a7(rnying rgyud): po khyed// spyan 'dren 'dir spyon phrin las mdzod// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi gnas 'dir bzhugs nas kyang // rnal 'byor bdag gis bcol pa'i phrin las mdzod// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ lung lo can gyi ma hA b+ha na d+ha ru// byang chub sem
107b1(rnying rgyud): dngams ga dang // ji can gas naste/ rnam pa la// gnyis snang ba po pa sa sa // / nag btsun pa mkhor dang bcas la 'bral// pa mas masmranaH/ ba ling ka hU~M/ num myong gan rtsod pa la bganas ca/ brgyad da /
107b2(rnying rgyud): ba' bar zhal bzhes pa// ma hA kA li me thu rtsal can// dka' thub chen po tshur gson cig/ legs ldan nag po ma rungs pa// sha khrag dmar gyi mchod pa bzhes// rang gi rgyal srid la gnas te// khram la btab pa'i dgra ba pyugs
107b3(rnying rgyud): rnams// rol cig dgongs shig dam tshig gtso// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab// bse srung khram la btab pa yi// gshed ma bzhi la las gnyer gtod// mA dang sring mo chung mA la// dpa' bo khyod kyis rol par mdzod// da/
107b4(rnying rgyud): tshig chen pos ma gtong zhig/ zhe sdang can gyi bdag po rnams// sems can kun gyi tshe 'phrog pas// dab bo nyams pa'i srog dang grol// sha dang khrag la longs spyod kyis// gnod sbyin chen po ma rungs pa// bse spyang khram la bta
107b5(rnying rgyud): pa yi// gser dngul dbyig nong kun long la// rang gi 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyis// sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor bdag nyid lnga// yid bzhin lta bu'i dngos grub rtsol// rigs pan smye sha can ci tshogs// baglang khyi sha~M rta sha dang //
107b6(rnying rgyud): glang chen la sogs pa zhes// srin mo khrag 'thung ma kun la// bsad pa'i khrag ni drod mor bcas// bzhes shig dgra bo'i khrag la 'thung // sprul pa'i phra men chen mo rnams// thod rus rkeng dang 'bru mar dang // nang dang a mr-i ta dang
107b7(rnying rgyud): sbyad// rdzur grul grub pa'i rdzas rnams pazhes// rigs ngan gdug pa'i ma mo rnams// sha chen bshang gtsi khu ga khrig/ dmardzas 'ber ba 'di bzhes la// bdug gi rang rnams bzlog tu gsol// dpogs pa'i dpal rims
108a1(rnying rgyud): nadu thong // sred pa'i bud med ma drungs rgyud// b+h+yo gar gtsug mchod par byazhes// dmigs bya'adzi rgyal stabs kyis thogs// shor ba gzhan nu bdud ma chags// rna lA byar ldan ma'i bad zung
108a2(rnying rgyud): bas// sngags spa drag po'i mchod pa bzhes// dgra bo'i phung po rdul du rlog/ log 'dren can gyi tshogs kun nyon// yang dag nyid du kun rig na// me chu las gnyis gang byas na// gnyis kyi dbang du mi 'gyur zhing // rnal 'byor
108a3(rnying rgyud): pa yi las 'di sbubs// gsang tshig ston pa'i tshogs rnams nyon// bshang ga mi zag dang sol khwa yis// brgya'am stong du gso nas ni// ling+ga bcad nas sangs rgyas 'jig/ dam rdzas mchod pa bzhes su gsol// bcos pa'i
108a4(rnying rgyud): las rnams grub par mdzod// mnga' bdag chen po ma rungs pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa ste// khro bo'i rgyal po gying chen po// mngang bdag bdud kyi rgyal po zhes// bstod cing mthun pa'i rdzas 'di 'bul// sngon gyi bskal pa bzang po
108a5(rnying rgyud): nga grang pa dam bcas mna' bor ba'i// sngon du rigs 'dzin gong mas bsgrubs// da lta rnal 'byor dam la ston// ba ma ril thod pa mkhar gyi rtser// ru mtshon nag po pu ru ru// mtshon ma mang po char du 'bebs// bdud bya nag po
108a6(rnying rgyud): zhing 'dum// dur khrod rgyan cha mang po rnams// mche gtsigs rngam pa'i zhal gdangs nas// khro bo khro mo sprul par 'jigs// srin po zin mo rkan skra rdebs// gnod sbyin po mo 'brug sgra spogs// za byed po po klog ltar 'azhug/
108a7(rnying rgyud): mo pa ni dang pa'i// dam rdzas mchod pa 'di bzhes la// ji ltar bcol pa'i phrin las mdzod// mAM e rak+ta go do tsan pa su ta g+ha na tsit+ta khA raM khA hi/ phrin las gzhol ba gang 'dod sbyar// bsnyen dus smon lam 'di ltar gdab// /
108b1(rnying rgyud): mgron po khyed mchod byin brlabs kyis// phyogs dang dus ni thams cad du// sems can legs don 'byor pa la// dgra bgegs rnab pa kun med shag/ t+yA dang ba klang nor dang 'bru// bu tsha ba ma gnyen bshes rnams// dag dang /
108b2(rnying rgyud): tshe ring nad med par// thams cad 'byor pa ldan par shog/ 'gro ba nyes med pa de gyur cig/ nad dang mu ge kun bral nas// rgyal po dge zhing des pa dang // chos kyi rgyal srid spong bar shog/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di//
108b3(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu kun tu rgyas pa dang // myur du sems can thams cad kyang // chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar shog/ dge ba thams cad spyan bsngo zhing // mgon po khyod mchod byin brlabs kyis// bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// longs
108b4(rnying rgyud): spyod rnam gnyis rdzogs par smon// bdag cag byang chub mchog thob nas// khyod dang mi 'bral 'grogs par shog/ ces gsungs so// dpal mgon po nag po dur khrod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ bsnyen pa'i las
108b5(rnying rgyud): gzhung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gsang sngags bstan pa 'di gsungs so// oM b+hu kur ma hA padz+ra rnge gud tsi gyur byig ge b+he ma nas se/ e ho sho mos kro d+ha hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/
108b6(rnying rgyud): ku rurmA a rmAr+tha/ bud N+ye grI gyi ma se kha sho kro d+ha d+h+waM b+h+rUM phaT+Ta phaT/ bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsten no// oM d+ha ru ku ru i gyi lud+d+hoHkro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM byang ku ti paTasarba sid+d+hi ba la hU~M a/ oM badz+ra tsit+ta sa ma ya a mr-i ti hU~M phaT/ oM
108b7(rnying rgyud): rag ta gr-ih+Na kr-i t+ta ra ga ma hA kA ru Ni hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra gr-i d+hi rA dza ya han ha nad da da ha pa tsa ba tsa br-i d+hA mi ge na hUM phaT// sbub dang spring chen blang ba dang // mthing nag dar chen nang du ni// yungs kar rgyal po khrig snga dang / tsan+dan dmar po spa /
109a1(rnying rgyud): nga// na na// smras / pa / // sa gsapa da/ rnan/
109a2(rnying rgyud): ldanan pa'i sngags// oM brda man rje las ma man+te/ yaganalas ma y-i/ rag bral sum y-i/ so dz+wal sa mas hU~M phaT/ phyogs pazhi sprul ba bskyed pa'o// de nas dA ga dang skye pa 'jug/ oMt+ta ma k+Sha tham la
109a3(rnying rgyud): da bya dag pa'i sbyid la y-i/ gyur ga/ zus rnaMm da/ das T+Ti m+b+ha 'dug d+ha \u0f7f/ zad pa'i gsang krug sas chog yi na// dmigs pa'i rnam skyes dra sa pa smin// oM ma thA kA ni nyid la thas la dri bi la/ zang blong/
109a4(rnying rgyud): ga gi ti yind/ sa shig nying dung / ngas ni dang / ga blog thoms the sadade/ rnam shes pas de pa'idi sbyi 'u'ang yin/ drug pa'i tha ba skabs pa byungag/ yim na' ra
