109a6(rnying rgyud): ma na sa/
109a7(rnying rgyud): zhin su / dbu sa 'i byi 'i ngam sacom nan ma chung pami bang rdzogs nyin 'i kyi dris// de sa pa nyid myongs pa 'dreg sum sa// bdun
109b1(rnying rgyud): yi rgyal gyis// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi phur ba la// dkar nag dmar ba'i gzungs thag skyil// mthing nag dar gyi phur ma gsum// bskul dang chags dang gzhil ba'i rdzas// bawang dag la hri hri dza dag bri// hUM dang bcas pa'i yungs kar lA//
109b2(rnying rgyud): khrag la mchod sgong hri dang ma// de bzhin lcags thig yi ge bdun// yum dang spel ba'i bla rdo yin// sman la yi dam snying po'am// dpa' bo 'bru lnga bris la gzhug/ gzungs thag sbrel la chad par bya// thugs kar rdo rje srin po 'jigs// mtshon
109b3(rnying rgyud): che 'khor lo bskor bar bsam// sngags kyi 'od zer rno la myur// lcags kyu'i tshul du spos nas kyang // rang bzhin mgon po'i snying ga nas// snying dkyil sna lnga 'od dang 'brel// dun las rang gi snying pos bskor// de nas bzung nas mi gtong
109b4(rnying rgyud): byar// gnas nas bkug la rten la bstim// bdag gi bka' nyan gsung sdod pa// zhi ba'i zhal dang ldan par bsam// 'bum phrag gcig tu rdzogs par bya// de nas nye ba gnas kyis bsnyen// thun gyi sngags kyi 'od zer nyid// rdo rje
109b5(rnying rgyud): srin po'i mtshon char spro// mgon po dbang med bklag nas kyang // rang snying sog nas drod langs shing // lus dag yid gsum tsha zhing bsreg/ dbang med drung 'dug las rnams byed// 'bum phrag gcig tu rdzogs par bya// de nas
109b6(rnying rgyud): nye ba'i rtags ni 'byung // sman gyi zlum po bdud rtsi yis// sku yi tsha ba gzhi la phyir gtor// sba gsum rang bzhin rnal ma ni// bdag la nye zhing las rnams byed// tshogs dang bdud rtsi gtor mas mchod// dngos grub bdag blang bya ba'i
109b7(rnying rgyud): skyed// bsgrub pa'i rim pa bag tsam sbyar// ragaden rten pa gtong// zugs rjes chags pa bskyed phyi byas ma// 'ad zer sngags kyu dbang gi mchog/ 'phros ter ba bzhin mgon po la// dmachog bskul zhing mchod pa \u0f7f/
110a1(rnying rgyud): si d+hi d+hag pa'i mdog sta hA// bsdus shing dang la bstim paraH// byed gas tsam gyis gnad la skabs// rten gyi thod pa/ brgyal// rgyas bu'i rdzas dang tha ma dang // bdud rgyam ba skal zhem nas dang / dashAn/
110a2(rnying rgyud): mchod pa kun dang bstar// de mar byeng dang gyi bri// rjes ljid bdud rtsi brlabs rgyas kyang // nang du srog gsum yi ge bsgom// mgon po'i gzhung bsrung snying po bzlas// drugra gi grags kyi 'od 'gro zhing // badz+ra kyis
110a3(rnying rgyud): mthu byin bsgre// 'brum phrag rdzogs nas srog gsum bzhu// sid+hi rdza sa la bdag nyid rol// dam can gtor mtshogs kyis mchod// spyan gyi mchod pas stobs ldan 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i rdul tshon zhal gyi la// drag po'i las la sngar/
110a4(rnying rgyud): par bya// dpal mgon po nag po dur khrod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor lo'i rgyud las// bsnyen bsrub gnad kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas 'brug khung drag po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// maH
110a5(rnying rgyud): 'dom gang gru bzhi pa// rak+ta khrag gis dmar por byug/ dbus nas mnyam pa'i shing gzhag la// maN+Dal zlum po bskur nas cang // mtho gang tshad du gyen du 'artsig/ dbus nas khu gang gu gsum la// nang ris gsum ldan thur/
110a6(rnying rgyud): dra bre// za mthod pa'i phreng byas badz+rAn// drug shing mang dmyur nyi shu brgyud// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dbyug blo rgya ga ma lngas// 'og ma dag la bskor bar kye// dmigs pa dag yi rjes rnams dang // bge gyis sbyin bsres pa'i
110a7(rnying rgyud): gzugs// bcu gnyis sor chad mi rus mngag// kaR+tha'i shing la drug gis zla// dred mo'i sgra thag sngo meng kyis// becings la gzugs brnyan rtsing la gdags// se dral 'bong rten dang ga gas/ dung 'od ga lam bzug pa pa// dbus nas thog
110b1(rnying rgyud): Sh+Ta myu gas das rgyus// du byu // das mas byung nga btad// marnam sa pa sa// ma su/ rmugs// / cag su rgyas pa ga stong dang/ rdu
110b2(rnying rgyud): kyi na skyes// yin da // sri pa'i sa pags s+ho// rlung rte la// yang na bku rten gcigangam med pam pa ga zugs rgyas la/ na gyis bsgyur la lcag ma tshan ga
110b3(rnying rgyud): sgra bzhid na mtshon dgu pa panaphyogapa bgang bdud bye dag pa stong // skyeg cig 'i mang 'du rtag pa// me dag pa bduganas snang // mye rgong myur bya la// gru bgron yang ya dung nagu ga gas// ba kyi
110b4(rnying rgyud): mig nas mkha' nag po la// rgod kyi sgo gsum da kyi so rkyed// dbus kyi l+ya ba ste gzhag par bya// g.yas g.yon yab yum gtor ma gzhag/ snying gsum dang snrel lus la bcang // kying ge mkhar gyi steng 'aglags ma/
110b5(rnying rgyud): phyung bcu gnyis dang gyis brgyadan/ ngamathe mthi gang gi khrug rgyu// ji snying lda gas kyi tongs bca'// rtswa phyogs gdod sbyin ma kha dastengs su// byas mdung smug pa dang gyis brgyad// zor mdan man thong g.yas g.yon dag /
110b6(rnying rgyud): sgrogs dud mardzas pasan// ma ca na// ma la skyed 'i mngag// ra ba'i dung rgyu ti ba sham/ nubagyogs pa / mkhar stengs su// sbrul gangag/ dang dag tu sbyar// skyes mgog
110b7(rnying rgyud): ldan gakyil po bca'o// kar+d+ha'i dgra gzugs steng du gzhag/ g.yas su sha rdul khrag rul dang // snying sde tshogs dang thod pa dang // g.yon du pa dmar 'o ma la// klu sman btab la 'khar gzhong bzhag/ byang du rje byed ma
111a1(rnying rgyud): stangs sa// tshon drug rnam mkha' dang nag brgyan// gto ma mol chen sbyin khebs can// mirnamapa'i gdugs dang pa rgyas// ma bar rnams kun me r+g+ha dag ni// bka' rton rgyas khring pod dang // gan
111a2(rnying rgyud): sub dang rgyal po'i mkhar// phyug po'i bang mdzod rimatho rtse// sa sna bdun la klu chus spu// byan glag mchongs kyi ri bo la// dug shing yal ga phur khrod kyi// sha rul la sogs pa cad phor dgram// ko ka thang dang mtsho 'gram la// dang
111a3(rnying rgyud): gtor bdud rtsi rak+ta dang // spos chen snum chen la sogs dgram// gru bzhi ha ta'i rgyal mtshan te// zhing gi bla re maN+Dal dbub// mon thod nang du dug sna dang / khrag sna phye gsum mtshon dpal brdar// chang gis sbyar la byang du dgod// de bzhin rigs
111a4(rnying rgyud): na dod pa ru// yungs kar yungs nag ske tshe dang // tsha ba sna tshogs lho ru dgod// de ltar bca' gzhi rdzogs pa dang // phyogs bcing gsol ba sngar bzhin gdab// dpal gyi las gzhung rdzogs par bya// de brgyad 'bru brgyad rngad bsad bskur/
111a5(rnying rgyud): ke gsungs so// dpal mgron po nag po ngur khrod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ drag po 'brub gzhung bca' gzhi'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang rim pa 'di gsungs so// bdag nyid lha yi
111a6(rnying rgyud): dargyal la// zhugs kar rim pa lnga rim du// baM lAs rgyan glagA khro ma las ri// stan g+ha tI dung khrod gnas// hUM las thod pa'i mkhar lnga pa skyed// dbus su dmigs pa'i ngang stengs su// dun las rtsa ba'i sngags brjod pas// legs
111a7(rnying rgyud): ldarnam pa yum sngon bzhin bskyed// yang ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis ldang // gsal shing phyar zhing shun gyi mdzung// dur khrod chas rnams rdzogs par bsam// dud+ha da las kyi bka' srod ni// drag po gri gug thod pa 'dzin/
111b1(rnying rgyud): phyogs bkang gca zar 'od smos la// thags bskyed la khang dang bcas pa bskyed// gangs san nu b+h+ring kAr// mthing nag mamon cha'i 'khrur ma byagar// snying khrag 'thung shing dmigs pa gnan// rtswa ras mi pog rgyas kyang /
111b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rje bu chos dang las// rin chen myug 'khor lo tsa la// tha ba'i rtsal dang nyi ma'i mdangs// yi ge nam mkha' sbyang kyi dang // dus mtshams phyogs 'dul dung khrod padag/ srin kyang rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ngur zod chud ldan
111b3(rnying rgyud): gr-isebs rlag/ zangs pi phyar zhing glo snying za// 'dzin cing gsod pa'i sprul pa 'gyed// lho ru ya lus gshin rje'i gtso// dmar nag zhing gyon ral pa khrag/ gser gyi ral pri bdud dmar 'dzid// yu ni kyang thag dang rgyal rjem
111b4(rnying rgyud): skyes bu bzhi drang bas mo bzhi// mi dmar kun pa bzhi bcug nyis// 'jig rten myong ba'i malugs rdzogs// nub tu dza las rA bul// dung kha mgo dgur skad sprul// mgo lus bu gas la ral pa zag/ baM gra gzod pa paskam
111b5(rnying rgyud): pA yi// srin po bcu dang srin mo bcu// mtshon mdzod pal longs spyod 'dzin// byang dum las bu byed ma// mthing nag khrag ral drug rlangs can// shun kos ru l-I chu phreng zhags// bse yul nyi rnams kun rdzogs// pa ya
111b6(rnying rgyud): nad rtsal g.yon// rnge' drug zhon nas ma chung 'i chubs// rigs bzhin la 'pho 'bus kyis bskor// gzhan yang mchogs 'bum gyis bad+mod // sngon bzhin 'dir yang 'dus par bgom// rang bzhin gnas nas smad
111b7(rnying rgyud): phras ma// du mthong gnas su rten la basbyis// dam tshig sbyin pa 'di la brjod// sngon tsho dpa ma chen khro ba'i rgyal// bdud 'dul rdo rje srin po yis// jigs pa bcom napa sgrib pa spangs// dbang bsrur ming brtag sa
112a1(rnying rgyud): yig phul// pho brang kun la dam tshig sbyin// phyi yi mtshan nas bos pa'i tshe// mgon po legs ldan nag po bya// nang gi mtshan nas bos pa'i tshe// bdud 'dul dur khrod srol ba'i gling // gsang ba'i
112a2(rnying rgyud): maman nas bos pa'i tshe// rdo rje sgrol byed drag po rtsal// mna' bor khas blangs ma bsnyil bar// sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor ba// pho brang dkyil 'khor mnga' bdag 'dir// rtag tu dam tshig tshul bzhin gyis// oM AHhUM badz+ra
112a3(rnying rgyud): pa ya/ sa ma ya/ de nas mchod pa tshul bzhin dbul// de nas rten la gzungs thag gdags// sgrub sngags drag po bcu bzhi pa// dpung med srog yig tsha ba bskyed// myur du bkug la rten la bstim// skabs su smin gyis
112a4(rnying rgyud): tshad gzhi la// gtor ma sha khrag mchod pa brtag/ dgongs ka rten la yungs kar brab// gdug sems tshor bskyed dag la bskul// bcu bzhi'i mtha' la rbad sngags gdags// skabs su sprul pa'i sngags bzhi po// 'bar ba'i dam tshig
112a5(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa yi// srog la b+h+yo gyo sbyar ba phrab// yungs kar khro bo'i dpal gyis brab// sde bzhi sprul pa 'khor bcas kyis// dmigs pa'i dgra yi yul khams bkang // bA dang shes pa bkug cing bstim// lha tshogs bskul dang pho nya rbad//
112a6(rnying rgyud): sa kyi thun 'jug rak+ta yis// phur ma khag spangs sgra la gtor// thugs rje chen pos chags pa skyes// dmigs pa'i 'brub khung khram la gdab// kun kyang gyi ru'i mdog ltar gsal// d+haM/ thugs rje stobs kyis dgra 'joms
112a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi gru yi las mkhan po// dpal mgon ljang sngon drag po gsal shing can// khyod kyis bstan pa bshigs pa bskal ba'i phyir// gnas 'dir 'jug la bka' yi dam tshig spangs// sgrub pa'i grogs kyis dgra la rtags
112b1(rnying rgyud): sa// / dag pasasarnam sa // gas pa sa bya gas // srin sus pa ng+gA jam das bgegs pa / zung// kun nga na can dag ku nadu du// gas pa //
112b2(rnying rgyud): dpal phrag po dag po drim med mngon par rol pa mtshon che 'khong ba'i rgyud las/ drag po phrin las sgrub pa'i lahUM ste brdo lnga pa'o// / sgrub pa nyams su lon pa dang // rdeg pa pa sad las byu ste/
112b3(rnying rgyud): dpal gyis bsgral// tham bdud rtsi'i chab gzhil// dkyus las zhin drag po kun// srub pa'i skabs las 'dir shes bya// nyin mo thud stod zad rnying dkrugs/ thun spad bsrad pa'i drug sngags sbrel// wa dang dbral gyir ma rdzas gdang //
112b4(rnying rgyud): dgong sanas mi gi spyod kyis// ma thung rdzan phreng dang ba s+hos// mchog kyang nang nas gang pe pang b+ha// dregs pa po rnams thog la jug// ba kA'i khrod las kyi shan pa pos// sriphrag khyog ga shegs te thung nas// gtsob ni'i
112b5(rnying rgyud): pang bas ma// gnod sbyin tshogs dang mchog shig gis// gakhrag za zhing rgyam 'byed// pogashed gnang kyi regacod kyis// dragra po bskal bu'i phrin lus so// mtshan mo sla sngags gnyis pol// bas de grags zlar la drag tu pan pa/
112b6(rnying rgyud): ngas pa yi reg cid kyis// drag drug gsheng thun drug tu bajug/ ma ma grin mo gnad sbyin mo// bdud ma rdzogs ser ma gatshogs kyis// dmigs pa'i lus lend mngon mar// 'od cing brag dgu nas 'dus// sdod par dug gis rje sa
112b7(rnying rgyud): ngas// snying la 'dus nas dngas ga rgya// dus ma chis nyid par dang gyun// po ga zug ma tshogs rab// zhag grangs dgu 'i nying 'dzin bgyur// rdzu rdzoms dang sa dang 'brel pa'i gzungs// byang shing rgyags ma ba she za dang //

113b3(rnying rgyud): rten la drug mda' ya// mr-i ma~M hA kA la dgra ba srog zig thrig chus chu mtha bur gro snying khring zang / dam dam la mang kyi tshwa tsho dag gas co tso// zhes 'phang ngo // dpal mgon po nag po du khrod mngon par rol pa mtshan cha 'a khor la'i rgyud las/ drag pa/
113b4(rnying rgyud): gnad kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas gtang lam gnan pa'i las 'di gsungs so// sa sna bdun gyi 'dag pa la// chad dang ldan pa'i mkhar byas la// nang du legs ldan su gzugs rten// steng du les kyi gya byung bzhag
113b5(rnying rgyud): drang khrod rongs khrag la// dag po'i khrims thug byas la// phul nag 'thil pa'i lto ba ru// drug dang khrag gis 'khor ma la// mu b+hung bzhi ru bskor byas la// dbus su myi mar sbyar ba'i khrag/ dmigs pa'i gzugs zi myang rus dgo
113b6(rnying rgyud): ga sa sub nyen po / bAr g+hA// chub rgyas bdag 'doms srabs// 'dzung yo ga pazhi dmigs pas gzung // da kyi sngags mi 'di dag ni// phyag mag nang du bsnyen la 'i// rnagadu dag du nyel te la dus 'dus/ oM a dza NA dzA d+han
113b7(rnying rgyud): thul pas thas shig no// chus cus/ ma tshigs pad pad gan da bugs pardzam du / da nga nga sa pa// rdzogs kyis pa mi nga rdzis/ sdug du dag du nas
114a1(rnying rgyud): na 'das 'das rnag po bam naHla// ngag zung kying la 'dus rgyags rmugs ba kri sa sa/ gtsugan srog la kun/ thud bar gan ga pa myed nga la 'dus 'das/ rnamadun pangs ma yadum dmangan nag sa
114a2(rnying rgyud): che ge mo/ ga kha khA ti/ de mthar ma hA kA la yi// bsnyen bsgrub bsad thun nang bstan bri// lha chen mgon po nag po ni// 'chi bdag klu yi ded dpon yin// 'khor lo dril nas ka na mA ra ya// gA ku ka yi su bu ru/ tse ta dz+wa la'i zod pa ru/
114a3(rnying rgyud): ma 'tshong blo chu'i rgyas gdab nas// mun pa nag po'i klong du dz+wal// dkar nag sbal gyi zag pas bsdam// nag po gdol pa'i srang na yang // mda' gang btsal bar dong byas la// phyogs bzhir mchog ga phur pa bzhi// gshan rje gshed dang rta
114a4(rnying rgyud): mgrin dang // gsang bdag nyid kyi sprul par bsgom// rang nyid mgon po nag por bsgom// nag gsum thag dang mA ci dug/ dri gros kya la lus la bcangs// lha srin kun la gser skyems gtang // rten bdag de la rtsi sngun gyur// thod pa nang rje 'dug
114a5(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // snying po de gnyis bcub tu bzlas// mangs na glu srin rang la 'ju// de steng khams gsum gru rnams kun// mo rnams chags pa'i tshul gyis 'ang // pho rnams rngam pa'i zas su za// khra bo'i rgya khar dang khung gis gnan// ngur so la rgyu
114a6(rnying rgyud): bram sted nas dag pa// nyi shu rtsa gcig phyir bskyed la// tho gzug rgyal ba'i dal du ba skom// bskur ba sbyin ka log tuH// drug gi glo ba gtan par du// dgA khAg byugs pas rjes gcod bya// slar log tshogs mchod pakra shrIsaH// des ni las

114b1(rnying rgyud): 'dug mas// dngamag dang gra sngags pa 'is// dragazang rgyan par ba 'jigs pa'o// nags gyur ba rab turtsug/ gdug pa gas sus srin yod// skar ga mor srungs pa'i gnas// ngag dang na tu jus grub de//
114b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi yi mang rlom// sngon 'groms ldan rdzogs byas nas// dra khrod gnas sa maN+Dalda ni// 'dos gang bya bzhi chag chag gdag// rabs chad phrad kyi ma chis la// 'brug nga sngags pang rtse gsum zan// rlung drung zed zer me rdA ga/ drug la gadrang po che
114b3(rnying rgyud): sbya thugs la// dbus su mo thod nga ril dra// srab ma'i lo ma zhing chen ras// sbyin thang chu thal du tshe phub// gangs dus rgya mchong srub la// thog mkhangs dang rang gi myakhar// swa/ khrag s+yas la ling+ga thaM// kan rta'i shing la drug khrag gis/

114b5(rnying rgyud): dang // btsun drug bcwa thang du ga/ men gyi ga nga 'i khag/ gcan gzar mche ster mtshon rtsa'i dpel// lcags rgod zangs rgod du kyi byed// gsul nag po'i tsha bskyed// chang gis myu la dang sngagangags// sngags sa mthong pa'i rjod drung du/
114b6(rnying rgyud): dbul bshos khru gang rakris brgyad// dag gsum khrag dang snying gis bar+d+han// nod par ba sho g+sa bu zhugs ma dang // gru bzhi mkhar babs zur gsum brtse// rtan gar dag pU gam+b+ha gyi snying // ra Na'i ga khrag brgyan pa bzhag/ dem dag to tshe chen
114b7(rnying rgyud): smin khebs can// dkar gtor gyi sman grel ba sham// phyogs bzhir mchod pa'i bye zag tshogs// gcan ga zan tan rnams bdung ltar bya// stong nying dang las gshin rjeban so// las lcags khang ste god du// 'od las gyur pa'i gzhal
115a1(rnying rgyud): khang // gzas pa'i gdan la stag chen khri// me dpung 'bang ba'i klod dkyil du// dran las yi ge bcu bzhi pa// 'chi bdag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// mthing nag dbu smra ba ma nag 'tho// srul ber dag brtsegs pa
115a2(rnying rgyud): gsol// g.yas na tsa n+dan ping chen la// g.yon pa thod pa zag gis bkang // yab yum gnyis med 'khril bar bsgom// 'khor gyi ded dpon shan pa jug/ kun kyang khro bo'i tshe lugs can// sdig pa'i khri la brlang bsum 'grad// rAg
115a3(rnying rgyud): zhags pa thogs// dkar po shel gyi 'khor lo 'phyar// nag po ban dmar dung can 'jigs/ ldang nag sbal zhags sbal 'dzin kyu// dmar mya btsan zhags mdu dmar 'dzin// ljang sder rdo rje skying 'dzin gyir// phyi rol ma mo rnams pa ltar//
115a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin gnas nas bkug la bstim// gyi nang mchod pa sngags kyis dbul// zhes gsungs so// dpal mgon po nag po dur khrod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor le'i rgyud las/ gshin rje'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u skye gtso brgyad pa'o//
115a5(rnying rgyud): de nas de yi rim pa yang // yab yum gsang ba'i srog sngags bzlas// bsnyen pa tshad la phegs pa dang // yab yum bar du drags pa gzhug/ bskul dang dmigs pa ting 'dzin gzhug/ thun la dmar nag yi ge ma// sngo nag ha dang sto s+ya tsa/
115a6(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi 'od zer dregs pa'i zhal// phun la bstims la yi ge zhu// nad dug mtshon du gyur par bsgom// dmigs pa zhugs pa'i rtags srung na// drag sngags thun gyis thun du dbab// zhag bdun rdzogs nas phur sa gdab// ling+ga thod pa

115b1(rnying rgyud): dus kyang thum pa ti nang \u0f7f pa la a thug sa/ mjug dgra nag mo ting lam ma / rtagaha tis twA gA nga rgya shul badz+ra shA dza oM/ badz+ras tsa na ga dran / grogs tham ngal/ sbrul zeng byu// hrIk+Sha thun chugs lag thibs zad/ le shan na

115b3(rnying rgyud): dpa' po ging gi sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// bstan pa k+Sh+mI yi glo can gyis// rta mchog dbang du bsgoms nas kyang // mtshan ldan dur khrod gnas bzung nas// las bzhi tshang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri// tha mar dmar nag ro nyes bsnam// dbus su thum du
115b4(rnying rgyud): bung ngatha// nang ris gsum ldan mtshon cha rtsad// mi thod drug dang chang gis sbyar// khrag snga ma che ltar mtshon dpal brder// dar nag gur phug ro nyes bsdam// dgra sog g.yas la dmigs pa gzugs// thun gyis de la brgyangs la bzhas/
115b5(rnying rgyud): dung g.yam ro sol rgya bram zi// thun khung kha bcang steng du dgab// gri bo'i thod pa dmar chod du// dpa' bo'i snying dang zangs thig dang // srog snying bcug la dar gyis gril// brase por shras+t+ra snying sna/ khrag/ rin chen 'bru yi gtor ma bsham/

117b2(rnying rgyud): shing // sdom pa rim par blang bar bya// chos kun rang bzhin dag pas na// bdag kyang rang bzhin rnam par dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// thugs dam dbyings mchog rnam dag cing // sems can 'byam klas ma
117b3(rnying rgyud): lus kun// mchog nyid sgrub par sbyor bas na// rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun 'dus pas// sku yi dbyig tu bdag phyed cig/ ye shes rin chen dbu rgyun can// gzi brjid phung po bla na med// sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ba yis// rnam par rgyal la phyag
117b4(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// dbyig gi ye shes gtso mchog nyid// rdo rje dam pa mchog 'dzin pa// khyod ni dam tshig gtso lags kyis// dbang phyug rgyal por dbang bskur ro// bcom ldan thams cad mchog ni bdag lags te// mchog nyid grub phyir rdo rje blang bar
117b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rgyal po khyod bzhugs pas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste// rdo rje dam tshig mchog nyid kyis// phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par bgyi// chos kun rdo rje'i mtshan nyid de// rdo rje la yang mtshan nyid med// rdo rje lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas// don kun rdo rje
117b6(rnying rgyud): bur gsol// 'di ni sangs rgyas gsung dbyings nyid// ye shes sems dpa'i dam tshig rnams// rdo rje sems dpa'i dka' thung dam// rtag tu bdag gis bcangs par bgyi// brgya pa'i tshul gyis sgrib pa sbyang // mgon po'i gzhung bzad
117b7(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa rtsa// de nas 'jug pa'i chos bya// kye/ rdo rje chos dbyings kun gyi gtso// mi rnams chags pa chen po ste// ma lus kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ bde ba mchog ge dam pa lags// khyod de dmachog gur gyigatso// rdo rje sems dpa'

118a2(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// smya pas brdan tu thal maHla phan phaT sa ti ma hrIn rnan kau / u sa pa / med skye nga/ byang da la/ ri'i da / skye pa / sa d+hag
118a3(rnying rgyud): grang nas 'phel po mo// bdag gi nyi gnas gang lags pa'i// las kyi 'byong thug s+ye rtse'i // de gtid du babs byu tsog// hU~M tra~M thab rje/ oM lo gas rgyu kyis bu'o// pra di yenas rang sangs nyis// d+ya byang chub ma
118a4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khod rnapa gsum dbyed med pas// ha zhes mthong bas yongs su dag/ ma 'dzas yongs sa rdzogs pa mdzod // rdo rjegs su yi tigs dam// rdo rje theg pa'i gas slong ba zhug/ hU~M mdu de byeng su ba dag zab pa chen po ni// dang
118a5(rnying rgyud): mgon po'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bzhugs// gnyis med ye shes byang chub sems rtags rgyas// dri ma kun sbyangs khams gsum zil gyis gnan// byin brlabs mthu yis dbang rdzogs thob par shog/ oM b+hung gur ma hA kA la ma hA la/ a d+hi
118a6(rnying rgyud): b+hU hUM/ dngos sam bdud rtsi bum pa la// rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum gyi// byang chub sems kyi bde ba bzhin// dz+haiM/ dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dbyer med don// yab yum gnyis med bde ba'i don// byang chub sems te thig le 'dis// bde chen
118a7(rnying rgyud): thibs kyi rgyas por dbang bskur ro// oM badz+ra a mr-i ta a ti sarba man traH/ de nas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// drag po'i rdzas rnams thams cad la// mgon po 'khor bcas bskyed bstims la// yon tan brjod la sbyin par bya// bsnyen srub rim pa

119a1(rnying rgyud): par gyur na 'bras gnyis stong // ngan song gnas su ya deng // masnyungs na dngos grub rnam gnyis po// yid bzhin nor ltar rang las 'thung // zhes gsungs so// dpal mgon po nag po ngur rgod mngon par rol pa mtshan
119a2(rnying rgyud): cha 'khor lo'i rgyud lam/ dam tshig gi le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// / de nas bsrung zhing phan gdags pa 'di gsungs so// mdzod bdag mgon po yid bzhin sku// yo byad spel bar bya ba yi// dben pa'i gnas su mnal bya// khams dang
119a3(rnying rgyud): snying rje sngon btang la// 'gro drug dbul sel sems bskyed de// mchod sbyin bya phyir nor bu bsgrub// bka' rten chos kyi rgyal po'i mkhar// phyug po'i bang mdzongs rnams la// maN+Dal byas la legs par byug/ rin chen dri yi sman gyis jug
119a4(rnying rgyud): 'bru dang me tog tshom bu dgod// rin chen zur brgyad lte bar ldan// dbus su ny+tsa ta'i shing dag la// bzhog la rin chen sna lnga yi// dpal mgon legs par kun ldan bri// ljang ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// rin chen phreng ba bum pa dang /
119a5(rnying rgyud): yid bzhin no'u le'i rgyal ba bsnams// 'khor dang de yi rang bzhin bskyed/ gter 'chang ne'u le'i rgyal pa bsnams// nang du ci 'dod rdzas kyis dgang // mdzes pa'i rgyan rtags gdugs kyang dbupo// rab gnas byas la dbus su gzhag
119a6(rnying rgyud): bskyed dang spyan drang bstim mchod dang // ji ltar 'dod pa'i gsol ba gdab// sngags 'di 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas// 'grub par 'gyur te gdon mi za// rmi lhas bzang po gyung pa dang // 'phral snang bsam pa 'grub pa dang // 'bru phyugs
119a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'phel bar 'byung // mchod pa bzang pos mchod byas la// nor bus gang ba'i dngos grub blang // oM g+hu ru ku ru i gyi uts+tshus ma gro d+hi dz+dza/ ba su d+ha ra rat+na si d+hi pha la hri dza \u0f7f/ de nas nor rdzas bang mdzod dang // rta dang glang po ba glang 'bru
119b1(rnying rgyud): yo byad bsod nams rgyas par 'gyur// rigs dang rgyud 'phel grags snyan 'thob// gzhan yang gnad kyi rim pa bshad// mgon po'i bsnyen srub rdzogs pa dang // bsnyen dang rje bsnyen sgrub pa gsum// dril nas gong gi rdzas la bstim// sar/
119b2(rnying rgyud): ba phung pa lnga la gdags// yul khams phyogs bzhir tho gzug bsrung // gnod byed bgegs kyi ling+ga la// dug sna gu gul mu zi dang // brun gsum tshil gsum gzhob gnyis bdug/ yungs kar dug khrag phur pas brdeg/ mgon po'i
119b3(rnying rgyud): 'od zer gnod byed bsreg/ gsang sngags 'bum phrag rdzogs pa dang // bka' rten mgon po'i 'og tu gnan// gzhan yang gong gi rdzas bkod rnams// thod par blugs la snying po bstim// zho chang kha zas gnod la bdug/ 'bru btud phyogs
119b4(rnying rgyud): bzhing dud pa btang // mi phyugs srung ba sge ru gdagras// klu gnyan sa bdagra gnod pa la// rdzas dang phag tshil gla rtsis bsrung // dri spos sbyar la lus la byug/ sman dang ba dmar 'o ma la// bsngags la khong du gtang bar bya// bsnye
119b5(rnying rgyud): pa rdzas dgod dud pas bdug/ drag po'i sngags kyi dpal gyis bskrad// sri'u rin chen rnam lnga la// sman lnga lnga la sbyar la gdab// rtsa ba khyad par sngags gsum la// gsang ba'i sgra gri 'di dag gdags// sarba du stan trig nan/ myag
119b6(rnying rgyud): thum ril rbad/ e hur thum dza/ ha na ha nad ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na ha ra ha ra/ mA ra ye rgud/ stobs deng nus pa thams cad stam b+ha ya nan/ zhes gsungs so// dpal mgon po nag po dur khrod mngon par rol pa mtshon ma lajo

120b5(rnying rgyud): sha dz+wa la sa ma ya phro ma phob/ raka sha dz+wa la sa ma ya phro ma pho ba/ tsid tra dz+wa la sa ma ya phrom phob/ oM badz+ra rag sha sa ma ya sIng ya ma khrag rA hu la phroM phreM hril hril shar shar/ mA ra ya rtsa sha thibs ru sing traM hril/ srog se tri thibs rgyo/

124a7(rnying rgyud): las dug ga // sa / das ga da // /
124b1(rnying rgyud): chos bzang lha yi 'dunas rba// lha yi dmag dpon chen po ra// sdang nag lus la tshe 'phrul car// rdo rje las rab drug poHla// mi thogs ging chen bco brgyad 'byed// nam gyi phar byed rlung byed na// kyis pa dang ma'i srog gtsad kyibya// bung byed
124b2(rnying rgyud): rang la phrag sring ba sdoms// sngags glu len cing 'khor los gcod// rdo rje brtsal mthu bo che// gri thogs chen po'i dus bab// skra mdog dmar gsal khrag gi mngon// ce spang mang po'i sbal po 'gyed// mi bzad lag rings chen po ste// rdo rje nyi ma
124b3(rnying rgyud): mdangs chen po// gri thogs chen po'i dus la bab// rngam pa'i nga ro drag po ni// nam mkha'i khams nas 'brug ltar stsogs// mche ba jam pas dgra snying 'byin// rdo rje seng chen mthu bo che// gri thogs chen po'i dum la bas// nagu po mi bzad sman
124b4(rnying rgyud): gsum po// shwa na khyi gdong 'jigs pa'i gzugs// lcags kyi snying po mgo dgu zhon// rdo rje lcang ki mdzu bo che// gri thogs chen po'i dus la bab// mi rtog pa la gnas pa'i sku// thogs pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis// mtshon chasna tshogs
124b5(rnying rgyud): char du 'bebs// rdo rje nam mkha' mthu po n+ya// gri thogs chen po'i dus lnga bab// ljang sngon drag po gsalnga zhing can// phyogs bzhi dag tu tug byed cing // phyogs mtshams skyeng ngos rnam par 'joms// rdo rje phyogs 'dul mthu bo che// gr-i
124b6(rnying rgyud): thogs chen po'i dus la bab/ mthing ni khro bo'i cha byad can// mi mgo sbyong gi phreng bas brgyan// mi ro bam pa'i gdan la bzhugs// dur khrod bdag po chen po bya// gri thogs chen po'i dus la bab// gri thogs gling chen bcu gnyis po//
124b7(rnying rgyud): khrag gi thig le can// la la zhag gi po ris can// pa la thal chen tshom bu can// phyag na lcags kyi rnon po brdar// blo snying 'byin cing nad krol za// dmigs pa'i dgra la blo tshogs chos// dpal mgon po nag po durakhrod mngon par
125a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ rol pa mtshon nu 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ khro ba'i tshogs bskul ba'i leb ste nyer dgu pa'o// / de nas gnod sbyin gyi tshogs bskul ba 'di gsungs so// b+h+yo/ nyi ma nub phyogs pa gin// brdze
125a2(rnying rgyud): dong khra bo'i nang shed na// lcags mkhar sngon po gnam du ldems se ldem// g.yas na yo ser brgya ni kha yang 'thab// g.yon na mo seng brgya ni mche ba bdar// 'og na zhe sdang dug mtsho'i rba rlabs me re re// sbyang na ba se yi bya grag brgyad khri bzhi
125a3(rnying rgyud): skyel rje / bab byed da / 'asu
125a4(rnying rgyud): kun gyi gtso gyur pa// yab gcig gnod sbyin rgyal po zangs thogs bzhengs// sku mdog dmar nag brjid pa la// dbul rgya mdud 'khor lo brtsegs// ral pa dkar po smin ltar gtibs// spyan mig dmar po dam nyams dgra la glog/
125a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i zhal ni bgrad pa la// mche ba gnam lcag ma dgu brgyas gtams// sku la shun gyi g.yang gzhi gsol// phyag na gser gyi ral gri bsnams// g.yon pa bse yi mdung dmar bsnams// ba den dmar po glog lha'ang byug/ 'jigs su
125a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i dpa' byang can// sngon du zhe sdang las la grub// do nub drag po'i dus la bab// de yi yum chen bran mo ni// ban+de gdong zangs mgrin rdzu 'phrul can// sngon dmar lus la 'ja' yis brgyan// ral pa sngon po bu yug 'dzub// ga
125a7(rnying rgyud): khyang zag dgra la 'phrin// g.yon pa sngon dmar bgegs la 'debs// kha rlangs sngon po ngu bar 'thul// 'jigs pa'i sngags glu tse re re// srin po 'bum tshogs dmag tu bskul// sngon kyang 'dod chags las las grub// do nub drag
125b1(rnying rgyud): po'i phrin las mdzod// khyod kyi bka' nyan las byed pa// bse yi gyang chen dmag dpon bzhi// lha srin sde brgyad las la bskul// nyams pa dgra yi gshed ma gyis// sa bdag bse yi lha mo bzhi// bud med sde bzhis dmag snga drongs// 'du ba rnam
125b2(rnying rgyud): bzhind mtshon rgyob// snying zan srog 'dril srog len sogs// 'khor gyi ging chen bzhi bcu gnyis// bse khrab pase rlog 'od du 'bar// stag ral g.yas la gzig shubs g.yon// phyag na ral gri rno 'joms thogs// srog rtsa bcad nas snying khrag
125b3(rnying rgyud): 'thung // bse phub dmar po me 'od skad srid 'gengs// srid gsum lha 'dre 'khrug cing bskul// hUM chen drag po gang gi tshogs// gakhrag sna tshogs gling la mchod// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par gyis// zhes gsungs so// dpal mgon po nag
125b4(rnying rgyud): po dur khrod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ gnod sbyin gyi tshogs bskul ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// / de nas rag sha srin po'i tshogs bskul ba 'di gsungs so// b+h+yo/ drag po lcags mkhar nang shed na// rak+Sha dz+wa sa glog phreng can// ham
125b5(rnying rgyud): sham pase gdong gdug pa'i bu// khyab 'jug chen po kun turgya// 'jigs byed chen po kun tu rgyu// lhas po gcig la mgo bo dgu// mgo lus med par mig gis khengs// ngo stod srin la ro sprad srul// sku mdog brjid pa'i dung kha ba// g.yas pa rdo rje gri gug
125b6(rnying rgyud): gis// nyams pa'i khog gshog snying nas phyung // g.yon pa chu srin zhags pa yis// zla grog zung zhig dam du chings// nyi ma zla ba sto ru za// nyi ma'i rjes gcod shang du TIg// zla bo'i rjes gcod rub tu rgyu// nyin mo rgyug cing blo srog srung //
125b7(rnying rgyud): mtshan mo rgyu zhing sog dbug gcod // dmag dpon chen po'i dus la ba ba// gza' mchog chen po'i dus la bab// dbang phyug chen po'i dus la bab// nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'jug bsgrags shing // bar snang khams nas glog chen 'khrug/ sa li
126a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ dkyil dumag rkyen 'bebs// rgyamatsho'i gting du ser chen sgril// dam nyams dgra yi yul 'khor choms// yol khrag gi se ba bab// srog la sgo zung ma 'jug zung // rgyags bzhin ma mkha'
126a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil yangs nas// ngan sngags bdag mog dang mo bzhi// tshe 'phrul sbal pa dkyil 'byud // wa thug nad stsogs nad mtshan rdzob// phyogs bzhi mthams bzhi seng 'og nas// srid pa'i rgyal po chen po badz+ra// mdog ni sa nges kham pa
126a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'khor lo sbyar// bstan pa bsrung bar dam bcas pa'i// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// dam nyams srog rtsa dmar po chod// dri rab g.yo bstil lu ru // rgya mtsho zho 'tshal chi li li// gnams dgug pa'i
126a4(rnying rgyud): la bab// srog tu tshong cing snying mgo chod// mdze 'bras skyo 'phrog la sogs kyis// dgra po'iHlag rlung la sbyar// zhes gsungs so// dpal mgon po nag po dur khrod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ srin po'i tshogs la
126a5(rnying rgyud): lde mngag pa'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o// / de nas za byed ma mo'i tshogs bskul ba 'di gsungs so// d+yo// nyi ma byung shar pha gI na/ brag dmar mtsho khol me ra re// dug rlangs na bun phya Ta rA// mtsho chen sngon dmar na rlabs
126a6(rnying rgyud): bsre ma smug po ga nam du zangs se zang // dur byA kang ka sna tshogs lding zhing 'dum// ce spyang li du'i tshogs rnams di ri ri// nad kyi mtshon sprin sngon dmar thibs se thib// ma gcig dpal ldan ra ma ti// ya mtshan bud med rngam pa'i mdog
126a7(rnying rgyud): dog pa dag 'jigs pa la// khrag gi sa pa zan ga ga bas// su ba'i gzugs sreg ma gsal// ke ba'i dbus ngas tipa 'char // mad ga bre la bri dgas lags na// sbyar gyi sa k+kul dzi'i bus pacan// thams cid rimagan dun/
126b1(rnying rgyud): 'dul// pra stod zhing chen g.yang gzhi la// rus phreng khrag dang zhag gis brgyan// sru skrad moTa'i sham thabs la// srul dang thod phreng dril bus brgyan// chibs su rnge'u ha nang gsum chi bas// drag momaman cha'i ske la can// gA yas nag shin/
126b2(rnying rgyud): rje'i khram bam bsdams// g.yon na nad kyi rgyal pa bsnams// btson gyi shA rdel phyogs bcur 'thor// tshub nag stong dkyil nang na bzhugs// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// shar phyogs khams kyi za byed ma// sangs rgyas rigs kyi rnal 'byor ma/
126b3(rnying rgyud): dkar mo ral can 'bum sde rnams// khyod kyis shAr phyogs dam bgegs thul// lho phyogs rigs kyi tha byed ma// ser mo ral can khros pa'i gdong // rin chen rigs kyi rnal 'byor ma// khyod kyis lho yi dgra bgegs thul// nub phyogs khams kyi za byed
126b4(rnying rgyud): ma// dmar mo ral can pho nyar bcas// pad+ma rigs kyi rnal 'byor ma// khyod kyis nub kyi dgra bgegs thul// byang gi phyogs kyi za byed ma// ljang nag ral can rngam pa'i tshogs// las kyi rigs kyi rnal 'byor ma// khyod kyis byang gi dgra bgegs rdul
126b5(rnying rgyud): tshe gsungs so// dpal mgon po nag po ngur khyod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ ma ma'i tshogs bskul ba'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o// / de nas drag po gshin rje ltar bskul ba 'di gsungs so// b+h+yo/ ngu bzod rten po
126b6(rnying rgyud): gnas mchog nas// raka'i rgya mtsho'i rba klong 'khrug/ thod mkhar sgo med nad shed na// mi ro rta rog cal du bkram// gzas pa'i gdan la stag chen khri// me dpung klong nas su byung ba// ma hA kA la mgon po che// bdud 'dul dbang phyug 'dul ba'i ging //
126b7(rnying rgyud): sru ma dog drug chen bkyil ba 'ang // spyan gsam sdang mig le skar 'bar// das pa'i bris srog dbang po byin// gang nas rims ngas rlung dmar g.yod// skyong khams thams cad da kyis khengs// 'al gang ngas rjod pa la mche ba gatshogs/ das
127a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i dal po ril med byed// rnam pa'i nga ro thug skang rdzogs// bdud dang mu skegs brgyal bar byed// sprul bar dag brtsegs pa gsol// dpa' brtul stag gi skrag pa la// dar lce me to/ 'ja' tshon 'khrung //
127a2(rnying rgyud): nga brtul dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// g.yas pa tsan+dan bing chen gyis// dam nyams dgra bo rdul du rlogs// phyag g.yon thong khrag dmar chen 'thung // drag po'i rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// de yi yum chen
127a3(rnying rgyud): srinu mo'i sku// mthing dag brjid pa'i tshul gyis 'khril// sbrul nag ral pa mun ltar gtibs// dur khrod na bza' sru la gsol// g.yas pa rgya zhags bla srog 'gugs// g.yon bzod khrag dal yams 'bebs// mon pa nag po'i tshogs kyis
127a4(rnying rgyud): bskor// 'od zer glog stong skar mda' 'khrug/ khyod kyis dgra bgegs myur du spel// bdud yul khar ga mgo dgu nas// bdud nag ri nag spungs pa yang // bdud mkhar nang nas 'dir byon la// dgra la thibs rang thong la spol// chu yul
127a5(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i gyad pyod nas// srog bdag 'od lha dkar po yang // shel mkhar nang nas 'dir byon la// dgra la spyo bog zong la sgrol// mang yul byang shar mtsho gling nas// ma mo rdo rje sder mo yang // mthing dag gur nas las la chos//
127a6(rnying rgyud): dpral dal yams thong la sgrol// klu yul na sing chen nas// klu gzhan nag po srog len yang // rin chen mkhor nas su bgyod la// dpa la mdze bu phol 'bras zong // btsan yul zangs thang dmar po nas// brjod rje 'u po lag rings kyang /
127a7(rnying rgyud): bsem khar nang nas sru bapyod pa// dpal khri zabs grong le sgrol// shar phyogs rin chen gling zad nas// ging chen rdo rje legs pa yod // lung zang mkhar nas 'dir gyon la// dpal zo lkog kur thu mthong // zhes gsungs mo// dpal
127b1(rnying rgyud): mgon po nag pa ngur khrod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ sgrol ging chen po las la bskul ba'i ludus so gsum pa'o// / de nas dpa' bro gang chen gyi bskul pa 'di gsungs so// !/ dum zla zad pa'i sum par nas// gsang /
127b2(rnying rgyud): bdag thugs kyi sprul pa ni// gsod byed ging chen las la bsrul// su mdog dmar po khros pa la// gdug pa'i me 'od lam se sel ma// dbul bse rmog dmar po gsol// nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer 'phro// le ba rgan dar gyi cod pad+ma la// sprul pa'i 'od zer
127b3(rnying rgyud): mang po 'khrug/ spyan mig dmar po bzlog pa yis// bdud dang mu stegs zil gyis gnon// khros pa'i gang mo rgan brdabs pas// ma tshogs srin po 'angar smug spyug/ gsang ba'i spyugs pa tshe re re// sgrol ging dmar bro las la 'gyed// phyag g.yas zangs/
127b4(rnying rgyud): gri rno dpal gyis// nyams pa dgra bo'i srog lus 'grol// g.yon pas tsita phyung nas gsol// ye shes ging gi 'khod kyis bskor// srul pa'i ging tshogs stong gsum sreg/ las kyi ging phran las pa 'gyed// dpa' bo ging chen las la chos// shar phyogs
127b5(rnying rgyud): srin po'i yul rtse nas// pra ma rA dza srin po'i gtso// sku mdog dkar po shel 'od 'phro// shel gyi zangs gris dgra la 'debs// tsit+ta phyung nas zhal du gsol// srin po'i 'khor tshogs las la chos// lho phyogs gshin rje'i yul rtse nas// ya ma rA dza ga shin rje'i gtso
127b6(rnying rgyud): sku mdog nag po mun ru ma dadra// lcags kyi zangs yi dgra la 'debs// tsit+ta phyung nas zhal du gsol// gshin rje'i dmag tshogs dgra la chos// nub phyogs srin po'i yul kye nas// ha nu dpag du bdud kyi gtso// su mdog dmar po me 'oda' dra// zangs kyi ral gri da
127b7(rnying rgyud): 'debs// myong nas nal du gsopa// bdud kyi ba tshogs dpa la mo// byang kyi/ sa ga du rkyen du cings// yag shag pa du ga // spri dog thang da ma yod 'drar// gas kyings mi dpal 'debs// skyeng sa zug so/
128a1(rnying rgyud): da ma rgyags sa snam // na// nga ma A/ ba gyu / /
128a2(rnying rgyud): tri/ kyi le'u 'di bshad do// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba'i// bskal pa rdzogs ldan thub la// mi bskyod shing khams mngon dga' ba'i// b+h+yo phyogs 'dzam tha'i sring de ru// khyim bdag klo'ug po zhes// bye bde la bu gcig yod// de ring thar pa dag po bya//
128a3(rnying rgyud): 'i mas g.yos te// yul phyogs de yi dgon pa ni// dge slong thub dka' gzhon nu zhes// thub gsang sngags don rtogs pa// yon tan khon des zos te// dan bag g.yog dang bcas pa yis// de dung sbyin te gdams pa zhus// de nyid kyis kyang gdams pa gnang // rdzi
128a4(rnying rgyud): gzhin nyid dem bcos na// dngos po bzhi la spyad byas kyang // rnam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin te// de nirdul 'byor dam pa'i lam// de skad gdams pa jog pa las// lo bdag dga' mthu ga nas su dengs// don gyi bden thob ma rnyed par// brnyed 'dod yo pa de/
128a5(rnying rgyud): nam zhig dpor g.yog ma mthun te// rtsod bur dge slong dpon pa jis// thub dkris rang bzhin so so nas// dan drug bden no nyes gsungs pas// zar pa nag po khams 'khrugs te// gnyis ka'i dpon du 'thab la// mnyam zhes kyang mi skyod par// nges pa dang ny-idas
128a6(rnying rgyud): thung ngas// khams 'dir mchags pa stan ste/ dri nas dpon g.yog gnyis drug btang // gsang jugs rdo rje'i bka' bsgo log/ sla bzhin spyad cing 'ad du kur 'joms// lgang thams cad log par 'gyur// thams cad log pa'i rgya mchod zhugs// log pa'i
128a7(rnying rgyud): rdzob drug po dang // mog pa'i dus thugs pon po pas// brjod pazhing lpags rlung phyod// gab 'jag pa ming bsogs te// thabs cid pas cing na slor bros// rig byed sngags kyi bdang spas te// mo rigs phrad ba thams cad gyur// dngos pog gis las 'das shis
128b1(rnying rgyud): 'jum// gnas sa dus med memed nas// sre bu wu brgyar bye skang pas su skyes// gtan pos pas rtsong mas gyur// dang sngags kyi mi spri ba dang // mogatsang nang gishin pa gyis// gtsun pas pas sa 'gyur// rang nga thag ldan s+ho// d+ha
128b2(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i srog chags gyur// de mthar mngal kye srin bur skyes// na rag rdo rje dmyal bar gyur// tshe tshad tshe lo bkyad khrir gnas// thub pa chos kyi rgyal po yis// las su bstan pas dang shes te// 'gyod pas rim bzhin tshad myal brgyad// rim bzhin gong nas grong
128b3(rnying rgyud): 'phos// bde ba zal zhing yun ring 'khor// de nas bsad cing zon thar nas// nang mtshon mu ge'i bskal pa brgyud// gzhan gyi mongs spyod phyi rabasad de// gshin rje'i 'jig rten 'jungs pa dang // shaza ma dang srul por skyes// de ltar skye ba brgyud pa'i mthar// nu
128b4(rnying rgyud): la ka pu ri li// slad 'tshong me yi mngal du chags// bu thon pas mdo' tshe// yul phyogs de yi mi dag gis// pha med rdo du r+b+hu // bzhag na sris phyogs de zis na// ma yi ma cha gzug pa dab sgos// dug shing das bya'i rdza bsnga la// 'dis ma mam
128b5(rnying rgyud): de mas// sa sgrub nas gas na ma du / rje // ri dwags pa sa
128b6(rnying rgyud): dur khrod gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro rnams// rlung ma smas dang bran du byas// ma than d+ha tra de yi ni// kha nas tsha ba'i dbugs byung bas// nang dang rims kyis thams cad gsod// sna nas grang ba'i dbugs byung bas// phyogs bcu kun tu mas 'khrug byed// mi
128b7(rnying rgyud): gadrug zhing thams cad gsod// sngags kyi zer mas thams cid grol// rang sus thal la 'jigs pa la// mag gsum la gadrug gshog pa can// mig gsum srani me ltar 'bar// gnam la bya bzhi nas le bye// tshul nya bzhin 'gyi bar byed// seMn mo gang ka'i
129a1(rnying rgyud): sar+b+ba b+hU gyis// gang nag rgyas chags pa bad// rang shing rgyal na ga// ngan sgrub thams cad kyang // logs ska san la la brtad// ngargyal cha ba'i mthus rnams pas// 'ang+ga
129a2(rnying rgyud): grod rdal bcom// ko ka thang dmar mtsho yi do// byan lag mchod rim la ya// gnam lcags yod pa'i rtse mo ru// srin po'i rgyal po dbang du bsdus// ru tra ma tra mA ra tre// rang gi gtum skad drag tu bsgrags// srin po'i rgyal po chen po des// mngon
129a3(rnying rgyud): shes gsang sngags 'byung bar mdzod// kun kyang 'a di da gajog rje rdzas// deng dponam ti kA rung // rang ging rgyal che btsam// A si de bau dr-i ka ru// da thabs che ba'i dbugs kyis ba srid// rang 'jam bu'i bang du brla// dge gnas mchod
129a4(rnying rgyud): brgyad dung da // 'di rnams g.yig bzhig tso mo dang // ci dang zin mas pa nya'athod// g.yo la mas cad dbang duthas// ba ma ri sa khyad pa'i ma pa gardzogs nas// bdud brgyal ma mthums su 'jugs/ bdud kyi mabyon ci 'gyur/
129a5(rnying rgyud): ma sa / nga sa// sa sa na
129a6(rnying rgyud): sum sa sa
129b1(rnying rgyud): rlung lda bzhengs// go 'phreng phyag rgyas kun bsdus nas// bde gshegs dgongs pa mthun par bkras// rnam bzhilas kyis bskos bta dus// bcom ldan shAg thub can du gshegs// b+hu 'bras las kyi ge sdig brjod// brdul bas mthul kho dar//
129b2(rnying rgyud): thub pa yi dag smras te// bu chung rang gi gnas su dengs// sngon khyod lta bus nga ma thul// de bas rang gi dka' thub kyis// zer bas gtsang rigs slar log go// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rta mgrin dbang bskur thad du gshegs// rdo rje rta thabs 'or
129b3(rnying rgyud): yis// kho rang nyid kyi gtam skra bsgrags// mgrin bu rang gi zas zo dang // des ni rta mchog slar la gshegs// / ba nas khong du rta mchog mid// dpal gyis bzhengs te hUM sba baspags// kho mis skad ngan gdung pa bton// gnyen po rdo rje hUM bsgoms pas//
129b4(rnying rgyud): de la skyabs nyid tshol cig gsungs// rta mchog spyig zug 'thon te gshegs// de nas 'dus pa chen po kun// dbang drug gnyis kyis 'dul bar dgongs// de dag thams cad kun 'dus nas// dus d+mod dkar gyi phyag gyur bzhengs// khyod kyi ni rkyen 'bras pa
129b5(rnying rgyud): dang // gyon dang yon tan kun dris pas// sangs rgyas kun gyis 'di skad gsungs// rgyu ni lhug po'i rolas byung // rkyen ni log pa'i dka' thub kyis// 'bras bu sdug bsngal bo dzin// rigs ni dman rig pa 'khor ba migs// ngo bo me dwags kyi
129b6(rnying rgyud): poni// ma btul 'khor ba'i mtha' 'phel bas// bdud rnams btul na ba/ na pa dang // las ngan 'phro ba cing dmyal du dazung // thugs rjes bzung na bsod nams rlung // stong gsum me lus bton sangs// 'bum gyi char yang mi 'ong gsungs/
129b7(rnying rgyud): nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// nga mthul cig pa ru bskum// khams gsum tho rgyu sngon mangs// dbang gi khebs par snang dgang // ba ma ri la zod pa ma'i byi gyi// bshul bya rdzobamachen bkyang kyis 'dor// sngon du bshad pa'i 'thong tshogapa dang /
130a1(rnying rgyud): sa na/ / sa sa/ sa su smras // / na
130a2(rnying rgyud): cad bdud phyi bsgyur// thams cad stod nyid bdud rtsi sbyangs// nye gnas bu mo la sogs pa// mchags thabs kyi rtsor ba yis// rigs dang mthun pa'i sras de mthong // de bzhag gzhan rnams ring du spad// ye shes sprul pa'i khong du ldan// 'dod pa'i
130a3(rnying rgyud): dbang mo bskams ma la// 'dod pas zhe sdang the tshom skyes// dpal gyis srin skad gsungs bsgrags pas// the tshomachod de srul 'khril// 'jig rten dregs pa'i srog tAg // ye shes lha yi snying por brlabs// sru bas sre rdo rje srin po bzhag/
130a4(rnying rgyud): dngal chen gshegs nas po 'ongs pas// gnas dang 'khor san med bzhin 'jigs// bdag ging bang mo 'dor rnams kun// sngon dang mi 'dra nges snyam pas// chags pa'i dbang mos padi skad brjod// e ma dpa' ba sgeg pa khyod// bdag gi mngal maM
130a5(rnying rgyud): mi bde bas// khyod kyi dngos po phyin pa las// 'khor gyi nang du 'di gsung ngam// brjod pas mdangs la chags gyur te// dga' ba'i thabs kyis gnyis mid 'khril// de nas bu rnga 'dron byung nas// kho rang lta bu'i rigs su byung // dag po dpon g.yog yi rang /
130a6(rnying rgyud): dga'/ myur bar pU d+ha lus bltam ste// srin skad thang gsum bsgrags pa las// dpal gyi rnam sra drag po des// drag po drug mo labo tshogs bkyil// sangs nas bltas las ma lugs 'gyur// nag bu dgu bco brgyad phyug// sngon du brjod pa nyid
130a7(rnying rgyud): sbyasgyur// deg pa gyings dang dang ci rdzogs// de nas drug pa rnaMs// rang shing rgyal hU~Mg kyis// ra bdud byid gatshogs bsdus// 'du 'a du ma mthar 'di lathung // mang ba gas tag par rjed na// byed pa'i grogs kyi mi nebs//

130b3(rnying rgyud): bya/
131a1(rnying rgyud): dbang bsgyur gas pa'i mi rnams pa zlas// bsgral par stan rnags pas// dgas pa byung na 'das kyi bar// 'jig na rnal gyis brgyan dkrung // 'das pa'i spyon ni// papas byal bas 'angs par
131a2(rnying rgyud): la ba'i dbang po dbyangs zhes byar// lung bstan thob ste 'tshang rgya'o// de phyir dpal mgon nag po yi/ rabs rgyud gtan tshigs rgyas par bshad// ces gsungs so// dpal mgon po nag po dur khrod mngon par rol pa mtshon cha 'khor po'i rlung las/

131a4(rnying rgyud): gas su bzhengs// sprul pa gang la gang 'dul ston// gsang sngags thugs rje rol par shar// rtags dang thugs rje sbyin bdag dpral// de yi phrin las 'phro ba'i mgon// gnas lugs rtogs pas 'gyur ba med// chos nyid dang du mtshan pa yi
131a5(rnying rgyud): ma rtog paslus bcom dur khrod yin// gnas lugs mngon par rdzogs sangs rgyas// ye shes rol pa cir yang 'char// zhen sdang rtog pa'i bag chags dang // zhing bcu gcod pa'i mtshon ma yin// 'khor lo rnam pa gsum yin te// gnas pa rtsa ye bo ga dang /
131a6(rnying rgyud): rten la srid pa'i 'khor po dang // las thab sngags kyi 'khor lo'o// drang po 'di chen longs spyod dang // chos dang stsal pa phyi gnas lnga// gnas lugs chos bu'i 'khor la'o// sems kyis de tog de nyid po la// ten 'brel ba pa'i 'khong ngo'i/

132b2(rnying rgyud): srus nas// zhes zla pa ji ltar legs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bke 'phrul pa// skugasung thugs kyi rje ni// lha yi m+ba ni rnam par drug/ gnyis su med par snang ba yi// ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs// de las nag po cher po y-i// chacheng mthun par thul
132b3(rnying rgyud): mdzod nam// bdag gi thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis// gnod sbyin nag po drag po yi// gdug pa rnams ni 'joms mdzad do// 'od ni gri gug dgur gyur// rdeg tshal bslus pa gnyis med gyur// bdag gi thugs ka nas spros pa'i// gsung ba gsum las byung ba/
132b4(rnying rgyud): yin// khyod ni nag po chen po yin// rdo rje gsum gyi bdag nyid kyad// de ni 'jigs rtsed chen por bshad// khyod kyi rgyud ni rab bshad bya// de nas dpal nag po chen po 'od kyi grong bu'i nang du su mtho gang gi tshad du gyur te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i 'od zer gyis brtul nas
132b5(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpal dag po chen pos gr-i gug lcags kyu'i tshul du bzung nas/ oM mahA kA la ya hUM hUMphaT+Ta swA hA/ lcags kyu'i 'od zer dang bcas nas brjod paste/ mdun gyi nag po chen po ting nge 'dzin las mang
132b6(rnying rgyud): bar gyur to// de nas nag po chen po dga' bar gyur te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad rjes gsol to// bdag ni gtso bo'i 'od zer zhes// phog nas shin tu bde bar gyur// gtso bo bcom ldan nag po che// bdag ni bde ba chen por
132b7(rnying rgyud): gnas// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyod ni gsang ba gsum gyi bdag/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan pa bsrung bar byin gyis brlabs// khyod ni dpal ldan nag po che// bstan pa bsrung

134a6(rnying rgyud): bya'i gzugs dug dang ske tshe dang bya rog gi khrag dang dur khrod stug chas bdag kha shar phyogs su bltas la bya rog gi sgos smug gu byas la bri/ bsgrub bya'i dpral bar rus/ snying gar ming / rkang zhabs su yaM bri/ lte bar dza/ yan lag bzhi la klu rigra bzhi
134a7(rnying rgyud): snying gar klu nag po mgo ba gsum pa mgo ba rgyad lus la nub pabri/ de nas zangs dang lcags dang gser dang dngul dang / mtshal la sogs pa bar du bzhig la/ kha sbyar du bya'o// de'i phyi rol du ngung khrod kyi sa kyi srung bas brtsom par byas te/ mdun du 'a /

135b3(rnying rgyud): bzlas la gang ba par b+ha ste/ oM ma hA kA la ya/ su pra tI/ a mu ka mo ha ya mo ha ya hU~M hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de bzhin du cho ga 'di dus gsum byas la/ bslab bya'i nya la sar blas na rmongs par 'gyur ba'am/ gzhog byed skam nas 'chi bar 'gyur
135b4(rnying rgyud): de nas yang ut+pa la'i me tog dang tsan+dan dmar po dang a pa ra dze ta'i khu bas snag tsha byas la me tog dmar po la/ oM ma hA kA la ya/ ShId na a mu ka A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bris/ kha lho nub tu bltas la dpal nag po chen po'i bsam gtan da
135b5(rnying rgyud): ldan par byas la me tog la mngon par bsdigs te/ skyes pa'am mo btsun gyi lus sam grib ma phog pa tsam gyis de ma thag tu 'gugs par 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang lo bcu gnyis ma'i thod pa chos bcoM lnga'i nyin par bdud rtsi lngas byugs la/ me tog
135b6(rnying rgyud): dmar po'i yu ba la smyug gu byas te/ rgyal po 'am blon po'i grong khyer du kha bltas te/ nag po chen po'i bsam gtan dang ldan par byas te/ 'khor lo rtsibs brkyang pa bri bar bya'o// 'khor lo'i rtsi bas la yi ge hri bkod par bya/ dbus su/ oM ma
135b7(rnying rgyud): hA kA la ya/ su pra su taSh+ma da nad da re/ a mu ka pa shi kar na/ bA shi kAr hUM hri hri hri swA hA/ zhes bri bar bya'o// de nas me tog dmar pos thod pa bkang la dpal nag po chen po'i bsam gtan gyis mngon par bsngags na/ thod pa'i me tog dri dang ldan te g.yo bar
136a1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ro// de'i tshe thod pa'i me tog de dpal nag po chen po'i bsam gtan gyis/ rgyal po'am blon po'i lag tu byin pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang las thams cad grub pa'i yungs kar ci cho ga la brtsam
136a2(rnying rgyud): bya ste/ de lathod pa dum bu gsum par dur khrod nas sa blangs la/ dpal nag po chen po'i bsam gtan gyis bgegs bskrad de/ sgo nub mtshams su ba bltas te thod pa la 'di bris la/ oM ma hA kA la ya/ pa ras pa'i d+hi b+ha bA ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/
136a3(rnying rgyud): gti thugang tshad dus/ de'i snying du bu gang chos 'byung gzugs su 'dug par bya/ de nas nag po chen po'i thugs ka'i sa byan las 'od zer yungs kar la thim par bas mAl lpags 'di lung sA kAr la lan bdun namang ru ba zhing ma nyi shu rtse gcig gso brtsi rtsa brgyad
136a4(rnying rgyud): bzlas lA/ nyi ma'i zer la gzug par bya'o// de nas bskor ba lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya zhing sngags pan+d+ha'o// gtong ma dang mchod pa yang bya/ zhag bdun bdun zhing de ltar bya'o// oM ma hA kA la ya/ u ga te hUM phaT/ ces bzla' zhing yungs kar
136a5(rnying rgyud): smin pa'i dus pa/ dpal dag ca pababs megata dang ldan pas spangs kar byung bar bya'o// de nas du khyod kyi gnas sa maHla thug sa ma thag ga cid du rgyas te/ bdud sbyinam pa lngas thugs te/ rdo'i shing rjod par lung sa gang drugs pa panas
136a6(rnying rgyud): par bya ste/ de la mchod pa dang gtor ma la sogs pa byas nas zhag gsum du sngags kyis bsnyen pa byas na/ des las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas nag po chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las thams cad
136a7(rnying rgyud): 'thu par gyur nas/ sa kyi sa ba sa pa gyu / pa ma ma ma bya/ gra pa khrigs ga su du mas// ga ga nga cad /
136b1(rnying rgyud): log pa'i mtha dang ldan pa rnams// de dag 'jigs par 'gyur ba na// yangs kar cag 'di yis so// oM mahA kA la ya/ b.ras papa dag na/ b+had+had+haH/ hraSh+TaH/ a krug na/ thAd+hagaH/ sam nyanagapa tud tshus tu hA/ dAl cag du/
136b2(rnying rgyud): kar la byas na dmag dpung rengs par 'gyur ro// oM ma hA kA la ya/ saM ga nA d+hA/ ha na ha na/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de'i tshogs seng ge la sogs pa'i gcan gzan gyi tshogs 'jigs par 'gyur ro// oM ma hA kA la ya/ sarba bu d+hi bi shi ma/ dre ta a ti ga
136b3(rnying rgyud): na/ sta ma b+ha ya stam b+ha ya/ tra sa tra sa/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ bi d+h+waM sa ya bi d+h+waM sa ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de'i tsho gas bgegs kyi tshogs 'jigs par 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang bye la nag mo'i ril mi dang / mi'i lhag rtsa bskor dang rdo pha bong long
136b4(rnying rgyud): bu dang / gu gul nag po dang / 'chad pa'i sa dang de rnams bsres la nad pa'am/ gdan gyis zin pa'i mdun du bsreg la bdag lag tu gri gug thogs te bdag nyid dpal nag po chen po'i dgul du byas la thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis mthun gyi dpal nag po chen po
136b5(rnying rgyud): bkug la/ de yang spros pas bgegs bkug la nad pa la bstims la/ oM ma hA kA la ya/ a mu ka ba ta yA pa ta yA/ sA ma b+ha ya stam b+ha ya/ sarba bud+ha ma hA kA la ya/ a ran dza ya hU~M/ des gri gug la btab la nad pa'i thog tu bzhag la/ yungs
136b6(rnying rgyud): kur dang lcags kyi phye mas yang dang yang mi smra ba'i bar du gdab bo// de nas smra bar 'gyur te rang gi 'dod pa dri bar bya'o// de yang dam la gdags pa dang mna' bsgag pa dang gnad la dbab pa'i cho ga byas la bskrad par bya'o// oM ma hA kA la ya/ bus pa mi ti mi
136b7(rnying rgyud): tutrUM/ me tog 'khrugs pa'i sngags so// oM ma hA kA la ya/ ri bai rab ya~M ka/ a mr-i te ku ru ku ru s+yA hA/ brgyad le byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// oM me hA kA la ya/ d+hU ba pra ti gr-ih+Na/ u pA ya pa ri kra ma/ ba ri pA ra ra ni d+hAb
137a1(rnying rgyud): ti/ na ma ba sahA/ dpal nas panan pa'i sras kyad kyi sngags so// em hA kAl ya/ bar ri / ma yon/ mam ma ma sra pa sa ka ga yAn/ ni kun na pha sun/ ba kyang bye ba sung/
137a2(rnying rgyud): sngags so// oM ma d+hu kA la ya/ b+hi sha pa dang \u0f88\u0f90 sha/ ha ra na/ u ba pra te ha ra trUM hU~MhUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sbrul gyi drug bsal pa'i sngags so// de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// dpal nag po chen po'i rgyung ngur khrod chen po zhes bya ba la
137a3(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas dpal nag po chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang zhig sngags kyi sbyor ba rnams// stobs dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba yi// de yi chog bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das
137a4(rnying rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po lha yi rnal na b+h+yor gyis// sngags kyi stobs ni skyed par byed// rtag tu lta yi rnal 'byor dang // ldan pas sngags kyi cho ga rnams// brtsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// de phyir lha yi rnal 'byor ni// chung
137a5(rnying rgyud): kyi don ldan yin par bshad// de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// de nas dpa' nag po chen pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das/ rgyud kyi don dang ldan pa yi// lha yi cho ga ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyi sra bka' stsal
137a6(rnying rgyud): ba// deng po sa gzhi bsung ba dang // bdag dang rnal 'byor ba spang bar bya// de nas lha la chog ni// rim pa bzhin du rdzogs par bskyed// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// de nas gzhan yang du khrod la sogs pa 'byung po 'du ba'i gnas su song
137a7(rnying rgyud): la/ lus bdud kyi lngas byugs la bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste/ oM ma hA kA la ya/ badz+ra ka pa tsa hU~M hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ la ni gsum du bsrung bar rtse'o// de nas de ma thag tu dpal nag pa chen po'i bsam gtan dang ldan par bya ste/ de'i ting gar
137b1(rnying rgyud): rI las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du du nag po bsam par bya'o// drugi 'od zer gyis srid pa gsum gyi gdug pa bsal byar byas nas/ bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dpal nag pa za por rang bzhin du dmigs la rang ge mang du
137b2(rnying rgyud): ste/ me tog dang spos la sogs pa mchod pa'i khyad par gyis mchod nas/ sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o// de nas dpal nag po chen po'i stobs kyis byams pa la sogs pa tshad med pa bzhi la dmigs par bya ste/ dngos po thams ca
137b3(rnying rgyud): rdo kho na nyid rjes su blta bar byas la ji ltar bzhin gsal ba'i dngal bzhag go// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' smrab to// de nas dag po chen pos gsol pa/ bco ldan da dngos po thams cad kyi khon nyid ji ltar lags/ rang bzhin gsal pos ci zhig bshad/ bcom pa
137b4(rnying rgyud): lag/ ma pa lngas kya med/ sa rnamapas / sopa/ nga nga ba / sa pa skyes ba ma / nga rnyed dadapa' ba / ma maldan ma gyis ga
137b5(rnying rgyud): bu nu dz+r-i Ab ut+ma N+ye/ gnyis su snang ba'i dngos po rnams// gnyis med le shes chen pa'i// stong ba nyid du ba sgom par bya// de nas dpa la ldan dag pa babyed// stong nyid pas mi ga // dA rbog+sa bad+yA ti mar brgyas// de yi steng du thuganas pa// 'od du zhu nas gri grag gyur// yu bany+dzi la
137b6(rnying rgyud): hUMgs mtshan// hUM gi 'od zer phyogs rnams su// gri gug 'od dang bcas par spro// 'od kyis gdug babasal byas nas// gri gug gur dang dra bar gyur// de yi dbus su chos 'byung bsam// nang du sna tshogs pad nyi ma// de steng ro yi gdan nyid
137b7(rnying rgyud): ni// snying gar zla ba nyi ma ni// A li kI lis rnam par brgyad// ba skyod dbus su hUM gnas pa// 'od du zhu nas gri gug gyur// gr-i grag su bahUMgs mtshan// spro dang bsdu ba'i cho ga yis// dpal ldeni dag po chen pos zhengs// zhal gcig pa

138a3(rnying rgyud): dang // byang chub sems dpa' la stsogs pa// dpal lhan nag po'i rang bzhin du// bkrug nas gnyis su med par bya// dzaHhU~M baM hoH// 'di yis gcig tu byas nas ni// thugs ka'i 'od bar las byung ba'i// ye shrIs chu yi dbang baphrad \u0f7f//

138a6(rnying rgyud): kun nas// las kyi cho ga ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyad par las kyi cho ga ni// rnam pa bzhi ru shes par gyis// gnas dang ling+ga bca' ba dang // dus dang gsang ba'i sbyor ba'o// bsam ga tAn sngags kyis shes par gyis//
138a7(rnying rgyud): zhon bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// de nas gzhan yang byang phyogs kyi chu 'gram gyi ngur khrod ngam/ shar phyogs kyi shing rkad gcig gam/ lho phyogs su ro bsregs pa'i dung khrod dem/ rngubaphyogs su mkha' 'gro ma'i khang stong ngam/ nub zung
138b1(rnying rgyud): mtshams rgya mtsho'i gling ngam/ byang shar mtshams ri'i ze grobam/ shar sgo mtshams mdza ba gnas pa'i sa'am/ lho rngub mtshams gsal shing yod pa'i nag tshal la ma/ gnas de dag tu dag pa chen po bsgrub par bya'o// de nas rdul tubyu nga
138b2(rnying rgyud): bsgrub bya'i phyogs su bu bltas la tshub gsu pa dang bsgrub bya'i nang pa g.yon pa'i sa dang / spyi tshil dang bgazan la sogs pa rnams la/ bskyab bya'i gzugs sar brtang pa'i tshad du ngas la/ de nas ngur khrod kyi skyeg tsang thu dog ni khrig gis ring
138b3(rnying rgyud): rgyayi ge dang ldan par byar// de'i tshe lus ni thig la 'iganas snam dracu gnyis su gsal shing gi tsor mas dgang bar byas nas/ de'i bar she na nga kyang dkar rung ba drug gis kyang bstud par bya ste/ dpal dag po chen po'i bas ma gtan
138b4(rnying rgyud): gsad par bya'o// dus ni zhag bdun nam sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bsnyen pa dang las g+hor thun mong du 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang dpa' nag po chen po'i skad cig ma'i bsam gtan du bya ste/ oM mahAk+Sha pa la// du dus ri kra ma/ prA hU~M d+hi bi d+hi me hAk+Sha
138b5(rnying rgyud): la ya hUM hUM phaT phaTaswA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis drug gri la dul gtor ma b+ha ste/ zhag gsum du bsrub na dpal nag po chen po'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang khrag dang / drug dang zlog pa dang yungs kar dang / rga chen dang /
138b6(rnying rgyud): g+ha sbrul chen po dang cha bskams la 'od zer can dang / suM shing de rnams mang nas chen pos bsreg la/ dpal nag po chen po'i mdun du 'asreg l-i zhakA k+Sha ba sgrub pa byas na dpal drug po chen po mngon sum du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang
138b7(rnying rgyud): rma kyi mgal pa dang / dpal nag pachen po'i gzugs macig pa tshang du byas te/ du dzod kyis pa maN+Da la grugasum pa byas pa'i snying na// dem tham 'byor ba'i thugs ka'i ring zer kyis dpal nag po cher brgyan ngas te bsgrim par byu/ tra~M

139b2(rnying rgyud): kyi lA la~M thig le byas nas/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis sngags kyis cin gyis brlabs te/ oM mahA kA la ya/ sarba ya ga~M nA~M/ kA ya bAg hota/ tirje ba dz+ra tho ba sha yad+d+he hU~M phaT pATe swA hA/ de nas sgo rab mtshams nas spa nga ngas ma
139b3(rnying rgyud): sablangs nas/ oM mad+h+ya kA lA ya/ hUM b+hiSh+Ti na N+Da ya trA~M tra~M phaT barba swAhA/ zhes sngags dang bdud rtsis kyi kyis brlab par bya 'o// de nas dra khrod kyi phreM bu la sogs pa dung rjong kyi khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ze bar b+hahU~M/ me sgra'i bla pas cig ga dag pa
139b4(rnying rgyud): bya'o// thod pa dkar po dang bri grag nag po dgod par bya ste/ de nas gzhan yang rnal 'byor pa dpal nag po chen po'i busam gtan dang ldan par byas nas chog gsum gyis drag po zer po dang mkha' 'gro ma 'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la na
139b5(rnying rgyud): mkhar las byung ba'i dkyil papo ba stim pa kya // de nas la tshang ba dang gta pa'i tshogs pa pa rgya T+Te/ dmachog la migs rje sa shes kya ba sa la ma pe yang bkyai/ de bzhi du dus gsam byas pa gta dang ldan par byas nas/

140b1(rnying rgyud): can pathob kyag/ danas dpa dag sa can pa dras kya nga ldan pas than du bsnyen pacas/ gargyan mthab pa'i rnal 'brang bas/ dpal dag pacan parabatu gnas par dun/ dang gnas nying du bad rtsor pa cwa gapa dbyung
140b2(rnying rgyud): da ma pa dgas pa te/ dernaM bya pa 'ang sa pa dang ldan par byas pa/ dadage 'ad gyi del kyi theb pas ma chags brjid byung dzarab sa nyi ma 'a kyil la ra du'i tu 'a ga khri thagag sa pab ba pa rgyal/
140b3(rnying rgyud): zer rdzob dang 'arla bas rje btsun nag po chen por bzhengs te/ zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa/ su mdog char sbyin gyi mdog 'drab/ yan lag zung ba gzi brjid kyi gzugs shin tu thang ba/ yan lag thams cad gadrug pa sngab kyis bcan pa/

141b2(rnying rgyud): oM ma ThakA la ya/ a ru ta a mr-i Shin+da buM/ brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs su 'azlas pa bya'o// de nas gzhan yang ni sh+tsa tra yi phur bral sngags zis la thod pa'i nang du bzhag ste/ bdag nyid kyi thugs gang dzi na gyis dpa la nag po chenang spyan drangasi la/

142a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgyun ji sgyur lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// bla ma la ni bus pa dang // dbul ldan nag po' rnal 'byor brtan// cho ga yan lag thams t+ya // the tshom med par sgrub par byed// rtag tu
142a2(rnying rgyud): lung byed na// dngos grub gnyis zo the tshom med// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' phul to// de nas dpal nag po chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// dpal ldan nag po chen po ni// grub par 'dod pa'i rdul 'thor pas// chog
142a3(rnying rgyud): khyang ba'i ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// dpal ldan nag po chen po la// cho gar 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// sngon du gtor ma'i chog yis// dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur// zhes bsnom ldan 'das kyis bka' thal

142a6(rnying rgyud): pa// 'od zer rnam pa gnyis su 'gro ste// steng dang dog gi tshogs dag r+b+ha// chu shis me skar thod pa dzas// gri gug gis ni dbyug par bsam// thos pas dam chog bdud rtsir gyur// steng gi 'od kyipha ye shes kyi// bdud rtsi bkug nas bstim paraH/
142a7(rnying rgyud): 'di yis byin gyis brlab par bya// oMs thAka la ye/ dz+nyA na a mr-i ta oM AHhA/ bdun kyi nag po chen po la// lces gtor nas 'bras tsam// rtsa kha'i sngags kyis dbul par bya// stobs kyis dus mtshungs bdud rtsi myang // de nas gzhan yang
142b1(rnying rgyud): rab bshad pa// las 'gyur ba bslab ca// gang nang sa thon lugs skyabasas// thulas khri thu ga zugs pad+han// ral rtabs kyig zag 'a ba da// granas dag pa'i 'od par song // sngags kyi kyi thethug gas// tul tsapa gcab
142b2(rnying rgyud): bzung bar bas ma// sngags brtas dus su ming mig gzhug/ mdzan cigator ma dpral pa bya// yang ni dag pa'i thod par ni// ban+d+ha baH'thag nas/ khrag bskyed pa// rgyag thung banas jug de dag pa// rgun ming can nga bsgos par \u0f7f/
142b3(rnying rgyud): yis nag pazan tsam// ngas zlab nye bar bdag gis bkad// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te// dpal nag sa chen po'i rlung ngu khyud chen po las dkyil 'khor gyi loT bzhi pa'o// / de nas dpa la nag
142b4(rnying rgyud): dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// stobs kyis gadrug pa 'thul byed cing // dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan pa srung bar byed pa yi// cho ga'i/
142b5(rnying rgyud): par ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bdud kyi tshogs rnams sel byed cing // sangs rgyas bstan pa srung byed pa// khyad par ma 'ongs 'jig pa'i dus// dpal ldan mgo/
142b6(rnying rgyud): pa zang po yis// bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs pas// gsang ba'i bar bu chen po yi// chog bdag gis bshad par thA// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// de nas dpal nag pa chen pos gsol pa/ bcom snyan dpal ldan nag \u0f7f
142b7(rnying rgyud): yaM// gsang ba'i bar bu zhes bya ba'i// de yi cho ga ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// gsang ba'i bar bu chen po yi// cho ga rnam pa bzhi yin te// gnas dang par thu bca' ba dang // khyad par sgrub pa'i cho ga dang // drung hU~M/
143a1(rnying rgyud): cho ga 'grub par bshad// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// de nas dpal nag po chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sgrub pa'i gnas ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
143a2(rnying rgyud): lho nub mtshams kyi rdo rje brag/ srin po'i gdong 'dra 'jigs pa yi// steng du bar bu sgrub pa'i gnas// bsam gtan sngags kyis brtsam par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// de nas dpal ldan nag po che// rngam pa'i zhal gdangs
143a3(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i sku// drag po'i stobs kyis 'di skad gsol// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// sgrub pa'i gnas ni ci zhig bshad// bsam gtan sngags ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkang stsal pa// dur khrod kyi ni pha gu dang // dpa'
143a4(rnying rgyud): bo zir shi'i keng ras la// sgrub pa'i khang pa zur gsum bya// zod pa'i nang du 'khor lo bri// tshogs khang pa'i zur du gzhug/ steng du dur khrod shing dang ni// mchod pa'i sa yis bla gab bya// sgo ni bslab bya'i phyogs su bstan// bsam gtan sngags
143a5(rnying rgyud): gyi sbyor ba yis// dus gsum mchod dang gtor ma byas// 'di yi sngags kyi myor ba yis// sgrub pa'i gnas ni byin gyis brlab// oM ma hA kA la ya/ badz+ra dzi kharaSh+TA na a d+hiSh+Tha na/ gi ri ga ra/ hUM hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ dpal ldan nag po chen po yi/
143a6(rnying rgyud): cho ga'i gnas dang ldan gyur na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// sgrub pa'i gnas ni de ltar bshad// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// de nas dpal ldan nag po chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan
143a7(rnying rgyud): 'das/ gsang ba'i bar bu chen po yi// bca' ba'i rim pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// par bu bca' ba'i rim pa ni// rnam pa gsum du shes par gyis// dkyil 'khor dang ni
143b1(rnying rgyud): par tha \u0f7f// dpal ldan nag pa can pa hA// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te// drinas dpal dag pa rgyan pas gsopa pa// dkyil mkhor dang dpa byung na// nag pang smyan rjes pa 'gas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bral ba
143b2(rnying rgyud): chu 'grams dang dur khrodas// ri yi rtse mo gsum gyis// bdud rtsi lnga yis bsres nas su// dkyil 'khor zur gsum khru do'i tshad// dbus bu khru gang brko bar bya// ske tshe yungs kar ba tsan drag dang // khyi yi khrag dang ngur khrod kyi// sol ba la sogs hA
143b3(rnying rgyud): bya// dkyil 'khor stag tshas nag por bya// de yi dbus su gri thug dang // thod pa 'bung du btod par bya// steng du zhing gi bla re dgod// khang pa'i phyi nang bdud rtsis thugs// dkyil 'khor zur la mchog pur gsum// btsugs la mi sba'i spyad pas bskos
143b4(rnying rgyud): lha nub mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor zur// dpal ldan nag po chen po'i sku// zhing gi gdan la bzhugs par bya// shar gyi dkyil 'khor zur la ni// thod pa dum bu gcig pa ru// sha chen khrag dang nya sha chang // dug gil du la sogs pa// mthun pa'i dam thas
143b5(rnying rgyud): gzhag par bya// nub byang dkyil 'khor zur la ni// gri dang thod pa sreg rdzas dang // ni rang su yi phur bu bzhag/ dkyil 'khor zur gsum bgram logs su// thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bzhag/ dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// par bu'i dkyil 'khor de ltar bshad//
143b6(rnying rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka s+thA te// de nas gzhan yang / mchod pa'i sadang sa rmongs// de bregs thal ba 'gags pa'i sgra// drug rgyas bkris la pa b+ha// tshe shing bdapa ma khris bzegs// mi yi thag dang na dru // tshab gsum pa sogs
143b7(rnying rgyud): byo bathugs pa nga tshu // nga thos pa mig dag // da drun pa gakris/ thun / sa pa da byas// rgyabs kyi bar rdzu bgrang pa// lcags kyi thug pas gyir
144a1(rnying rgyud): nang du bsgrub ba li// lin tshogs gzhag par bya// tshab gsum dang bzla ba b+hA li// rdzas kyis dang phye ma gsum// bag rtse dug gi phye mar bsre// lin sor bzhing tshad dubya// bdag nyid po rub la brnyas la// lin mngag la
144a2(rnying rgyud): ge rnams// dpal ldan nag po'i bsam gtan gyis// mi smra bar ni zhi bar bya// b+ho rub tshugs ma'i shing lo la// spyi shu rtsa gcig grangs kyi tshad// 'khor lo'i rdzas kyi ming yig gzug/ ping+ga yi ge gcig tu \u0f7f// de nyid mi'i nus pas dkris// dpal
144a3(rnying rgyud): sman stobs kyi bar bur gzhug/ mi skra'i skud pas bcing bar bya// de nas thod pa'i bar bur gzhug/ thod pa kha sbyor byas nas su// dug dang til phye tsha ba gsum// bsregs pa mtshams rnams dgag par bya// thod pa par bu'i nang du gzug/ par tha dkyil 'khor dang
144a4(rnying rgyud): sra bzhag/ dpal ldan nag po'i bas mgatan gyis// mchod rten nag po zung gsum brtsegs// bum pa 'khor mo gzhug par bya// rngar khrod sol ba zhi tshe dug/ mchod rten rol byug par bya// dang pa ldan nag po chen po yi// bar gra bcang ba de ltar bshad/
144a5(rnying rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// lho nu ba ngur khrod ro bsreg shing // kha dog nag po'i tshogs slob// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// bsam gtan sngags dang ldan gyur nas// b+ha gang tshad dam khyad par du// pa/
144a6(rnying rgyud): gang nag pu'i sku gzugs bya// rnal babyor skyobs dang ldan pa yi sa// sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas ni// de la rab tu gnas par bya// mchod pa gtor ma la sogs bya// khyad par cog kun kyang bya// dkyil 'khor lho ru zur la ni// nang gyi steng du bzhugs su gsor//

144b2(rnying rgyud): thod pa 'dzin// kha dog nag pa dur khrod gos// rnal 'gyor pa yis gon par bya// de nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis// lho nub mtshams sam bsrub bya'i phyogs// khab lhas zhing gi gdan la 'dug/ de nas dpal ldan nag po yi// bsam gtan sngags
144b3(rnying rgyud): kyis mtshams bcad la// mchod pa gtor ma la sogs pa// mchod pa'i khyad par kun kyang bshad// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa rnams// thog mar bdag nyid ldan par bya// mdun gyi dkyil 'khor lho nub kyi// bur pa
144b4(rnying rgyud): dpal ldan nag po'i sku// gang du gnas par bya ba la// rnal 'byor stobs dang ldan pa yis// nag po chen po bskyed par bya// de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis// bla ma sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpal ldan nag po chen po dbug/ cho ga bzhi yis gnyis
144b5(rnying rgyud): med bya// mchod pa gtor ma la sogs pa// rnal 'byor pa yis brtson par bya// dpal ldan nag po chen po dang // rnal 'gyod pa yi thugs ka nas// sngags kyi phreng bas bskor bar bsam// shin tu drag po'i stobs kyis ni// bsam gtan sngags kyi
144b6(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa bya// de nas nyin mtshan dus gsum du// dpal ldan nag po chen po la// mthun pa'i dam rdzas dbul byas na// des ni nag po chen po yi// mtshan ma rnyed par rab tu bshad// rnal 'byor mtshan ma thob pa yis// par bu'i cho ga brtsa
144b7(rnying rgyud): par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// de nas dpal ldan nag po chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ par bu'i cho ga ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// par bu nag po chen por bskyed// de yi sgo bar
145a1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa ni// par lung sbyor rim pa gsum// de yi dbus su bsam pa ni// pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma hUM// hUM las gri gug thod par gyur// cho ga gsum gyis nag por bskyed// de yi thugs ka'i gre gug gi// bu ba'i hUM las rmi

145a3(rnying rgyud): dbul pa'i bya// rdul 'byor nag po'i bsam gtan la// zhugs nas drag po'i bsam gtan gyis// sngags kyi 'od zer spo bar bya// zhags pa lcags kyu'i gzugs kyis na// bkug la bar bu'i nang du bskum// de nas 'di dag brjod par
145a4(rnying rgyud): bya// thamardo rje 'dzin pa dang // 'khor lo'i bdag po la sogs pa// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams// de bzhin bdag la dgongs su gsol// thams cad bdag pa dgongs su gsol// 'di na ma

145a6(rnying rgyud): nag po chen po dang // chos skyong mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs// bar bu'i bsrungs mar bzhugs pa rnams// 'di la bsad pa'i las mdzod cing // ces brjod// nyes pa brjod cing dbang gzu dang // de nas dpal ldan nag po yi// drag po'i bsam

145b3(rnying rgyud): ya/ a ti them la/ mahAkral ya/ phungs ma ya/ lab+h+yAMtraM/ mtshan mo'i dus su brjod par ni// mthun pa'i dam dzas gtor ma bcang // deyi sngags ni rab bshad pa// oM mahA 'aM Sha ya/ ma mas rba sha d+d+ha mI sa rak+tako nI ru me med/ bta/
145b4(rnying rgyud): a mu ka tsit+ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma hA kA la ya/ a mu ka mA ra ya phaT/ ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nas dpal nag po chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gsang ba'i bar bya chen po yi// de yi sngags ni ji ltar lags// bcom
145b5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// oM ma wakA la ya/ smr-i tu kA la ya/ ma hA yak+Sha shas na k+Sha lo a yaM/ a mu ka b+ha shi ra/ mA ra ya m+b+ha ra ya a ma ga ts+tshetsirta ya/ tsA ta kats+tsha ta ka mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 'ad ni par bu chen po la// 'khor lo yi ge/
