147a7(rnying rgyud): dang ldan gyur nas// bsgrub bya rtag tu dgug bya ste// sngon du rab gnas byas pa yi// phur bu dang ni yungs kar cis// gsad pa'i sngags kyis brdeg param// oM ma hA kA la ya/ dza yi dza lan ta ha/ at+ma ga tra/ d+ha han d+ha ha na/ phreM dun maH
147b1(rnying rgyud): ma/ tha gapa rgyun pa/ A R+tha d+hA na/ sa/ sa/ nam na/ sa sa/ sla na pa.A ru/ rnam par/ // dz+nyAn na na
147b2(rnying rgyud): bA ra ya/ bruM hUM phaT swA hA/ de nas las kyi thig le'i gnas// sum cu rtsa gnyis dmigs nas su// phur bu yungs kar gdab par bya// thod pa'i 'khor lo kha sbyar la// dpa' po sgra yi srud pa yis// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// bas ma gan
147b3(rnying rgyud): sngags dang ldan gyur nas// thod pa rgya gram bcing bar bya// oM ma hA kA la ya/ a mu ka/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ hUM hUM phaT/ de dag bzlas la 'khor lo bcing // 'khor lo mchod rten nag po yi// nang du bcug nas dur khrod kyi// me thab tu ni gnan byas na/
147b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// yang na chu dong rnying pa yi// nang du gnan par byas gyur na// bsrub bya chun ni 'gag nas 'chi// yang na dur khrod khang stong du// sbas na mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis// tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor byas te// bslab/
147b5(rnying rgyud): bya khrag ni sdug par 'gyur// yang na mchod rten lha khang gi// them pa'i 'og tu gnan byas nas// kha lkugs mig ni long ba dang // gzhogs phyed skam nas ngachi bar 'gyur// yang na 'khor lo bsgrub par bya// rang gi lus pa brten byas la/
147b6(rnying rgyud): bsam gtan sngags dang ldan gyur nas// gang zhig bsrub bya dmigs la de// zhag bdun gyis ni gsod par byed// 'dis ni las rnams thams cad kyi// bsad pa'i sbyor ba shes par bya// oM ma hA kA pa ya/ rab tu stug sha ma rag tu/
147b7(rnying rgyud): ma hA kA la ya a mu ka mA ra ya a pa ri b+hi sha hAM/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// de nas dpal nag po chen pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang 'khor lo ci zhig bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsang sa/
148a1(rnying rgyud): num zad ci ni g.yas pa la// gan bsan can dang // bzla'i matog la sags pas// brda 'dab brgyad thobar bya// nga 'phrul ba da/ drab bya/ tan pa sa dzu ba dang // drar zad stag rgyas sbyar nas sa// dbus
148a2(rnying rgyud): su gri grag thod pa bri// rnal 'byor nub tu kha bltas la// bsam gtan sngags dang ldan gyir nas// nag po sbrul dang bcas par bskyed// de la mchod par byas nas ni// bsam gtan sngags kyi bzlas pa bya// oM ma hAkA la ya/ A ra nA
148a3(rnying rgyud): ga gu ru ni shig ni ri ni dri/ ma tha ni shig/ maSh+NI d+hA ri nA ga rAng / de ban ri sha ya hUM hU~M phaT swAH/ dus gsum du ni bsnyen pa \u0f7f// 'khor lo 'di 'i cho ga ni// chu mig shing ngam ri yi rtse// gang zhig ku ni gnas pa'is// der ni tshig 'di
148a4(rnying rgyud): brtsams na// klu yi rgyal po nor bu can// tshi ga 'di dang dus mtshungs su// char gyi rgyun ni 'bebs par byed// gal te des kyang maphebs na// nag po'i spos dang bu gul gyis// 'khor lo 'jug par byas gyur na// char ni shin tu 'bab
148a5(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// 'khor lo bzlog pa bris nas ni// de yi steng du sbyin bsreg bya// sngags ni bzlog nas rab bzlas na// bsgrub bya shin tu mi bathun pas// rdo yi ser ba 'bebs par 'gyur// yang na kya rnams thams cad ni// a dza ka ya 'bras bu
148a6(rnying rgyud): wAr// mag po lus po 'gas par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// de nas gzhan yang rang bshad pa// thod pa dum bu gcig pa p+ta// la ti kha yi 'khor mo TI// de yi phyin 'dud rtsis thugs// cod pa'i nang du yungs kar
148a7(rnying rgyud): dang // sbyin pa rtsegs thal pa ba gas ni// kyi // byab sngags ni bzlas pa la// 'di ni shas thang ga dgas par na// oM marba la la/ shang nga ba dang/ phaH/ 'di mi bzhin pa
148b1(rnying rgyud): no na// gang nagasul bung byed pa la// das cugs pacu gzhug par \u0f7f// dab la ldan nag pa can pal// bsam gtan sngags dang ldan gyur nas// mchad dang gta ma pastsags na// kla gnad ldan pa lags pa// gnan badzad da//
148b2(rnying rgyud): drung bar 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang rab bshang ba// bdud rtsib yi rnam thapa// sogs maHla \u0f7fsa nas ni// bcu 'dab mab kya bze/ der ni dpal ldan nag po dang // dmargal nigs la babyed do// rdza gar rtsal nas dbu 'chag sal// 5/
148b3(rnying rgyud): sa / ma rgyu sa// ga na sa rgyal ba bya// sam gtan drugs dang ldan gyur nas// nyin na myigasams// gtsang ma'i rnamam pacad pa // oM maHk+Sha ya~M/
148b4(rnying rgyud): hA/ 'di mi rgyab kyis // 'ag rte kun stan thams ga/ da'i rnab / rtag tu rdzun pa da/ bcom ldan dus klu nal te/ dpa' nag pacan par chung
148b5(rnying rgyud): rgya sa ma 'a na pa // de nas dpa sa nag bcan pas gnal pa/ brnamaldan das/ pa'i na ga pa can pa sa// de ny+dza meng cag shA // gnan papag nga dpa ga ngas pan/
148b6(rnying rgyud): ga / sbyin das rgyas ka'agyur pa// da nas pas dang ldan pa dang / kwa dang// rkyen pa mags pa'o// ban pa'i 'tha sman rnams// gan ga
148b7(rnying rgyud): nga sa sa / rgyan ris pa 'ad dag bkud// tham pa dri bris paka du s+ho// da pa dreg pa zin pas na po ba// babye 'das/ 'angs rgya bstan pa bri bad// nag zu'i rtsi ga
149a1(rnying rgyud): pa rnams// gnan pas gsad pa'i sbyor ba yi// de yi cho ga ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dur khrod dben pa'i sa phyogs su// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// ting nge 'dzin dang ldan gyur mas/
149a2(rnying rgyud): bsam gtan sngags kyis mtshams bcad la// thod pa dum bu drug pa gnyis// bdud rtsis phyi nang bkru bar bya// ske tshe nyung dkar btson dug dang // nim pa'i khu ga khA yi khrag/ dur khrod snag tshas sbyar nas su// thod pa'i nang du 'khor lo bri// da
149a3(rnying rgyud): gIr shi'i ro ras la// dur khrod snag chos bsgrub bya yi// ming dang yi ge ldan par bri// bri dus gnam stong hi na nam phyed// 'khor lo'i nang du gzhug par bya// phyi rol dur khrod ras kyis gtum// mtsho dpa' sa dang mtsho 'grams// ri yi rtse 'o
149a4(rnying rgyud): gyis// bsres la nag po'i sku gzugs bya// mi yi rus pa sra shad kyis// nag po'i gzugs skra'i ru shing bya// zhal gcig phyag gnyis khru gang tshad// lto bar 'khor lo gzhug par bya// lus ni dur khrod snag tsha yis// kha dog shin tu gnag
149a5(rnying rgyud): par bya// mdun gyi nag po'i gzugs kyu la// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// bskyed pa'i rim pa tshul bzhin bsgom// bdag nyid thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis// bla ma sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa/
149a6(rnying rgyud): po chen po'i rang bzhin du// bkrag la nag po'i gzugs la bstim// nag po nyid kyang bkug la bstim// de nas bdag nyid rnal 'byor pa// nag po'i bsam gtan ldan gyur nas// mthun pa'i dam rdzas la sogs pa'i// mchod pa'i gtor
149a7(rnying rgyud): dbul bar bya// de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis// bsam gtan sngags kyi bkris pa bya// bzlas pa rdzogs dang thugs ka ye// 'od zer lcags kyu'i tshul su khro// bsgrub pa gsa' bar bkug nas ni// nag po'i sngo bar gzhug par bya// lcags
149b1(rnying rgyud): klu'i phyag rgya sngags dang bcas// thun rer bsdu ni rtsal kyang du// bkug la nag po'i sgo par gzhug/ gri gug zod pa thogs nas ni// thun mtshams phyin phyogs bskor bar bya// nyin mo mtshan modus drug tu// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// rnal 'asbyor nyid
149b2(rnying rgyud): la brtson par bya// de nas dur khrod dbus su ni// khru ngo tshad du brko bar \u0f7f// nang du nag po'i sku gzugs bzhag/ de yi steng du 'khor lo ni// dur khrod kyi ni pha gu la// u tsin ti yi khu bas bris// sngags ni dur khrod snag tshas dgod// oM ma hA la
149b3(rnying rgyud): ya/ badz+ra tsakra ba ra ra ti/ a mu ka staM b+ha ni staM b+ha ni/ mo ha ni mo ha nI/ khe tsa rI b+hun d+haM/ b+hU tsa rI b+h+yan d+haM/ bA tA la b+ha sa ni b+han d+haM/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 'di ni 'khor lo ra dgod par bya// de steng sbyin sreg thal bas dgang // de wA dag bdun bya
149b4(rnying rgyud): na// gnan pas gsad pa'i sbyor ba rdzogs// khyab 'jug ma hA de ba dang // tshogs kyi bdag po la sogs pa'i// 'dod pa'i lha rnams mnan rus na// gzhan dag spos kyang ci zhig dgos// de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to//
149b5(rnying rgyud): dpal nag po chen po'i chung ngur khrod chen po zhes bya ba las/ mnan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas nag po chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mtshams med la sog pa byed pa dang // gdug pa thams cad bskal ba yi/
149b6(rnying rgyud): ga'i khyad par ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sbyin sreg las rnams kun gyi mchog/ khyad par du ni gsad pa yi// sbyin sreg 'di ni shes par gyis// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// de nas dpal nag po chen
149b7(rnying rgyud): pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das/ gsad par bya ba'i sbyor ba yi// sbyin sreg cho ga ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sprin sreg cho ga'i rim pa ni// khyad par bdun du shes par gyis// bdag dang gnas dang mchod gtor dang /
150a1(rnying rgyud): thab dang lha dang rdzas dang dus// rnam pa bdun du rab tu bshad// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// de nas dpal nag po chen pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das/ cho ga 'di yi rim pa yis// bslab par bya ba
150a2(rnying rgyud): ri ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po bdag nyid rnal 'byor ni// bsrung ba'i 'khor po bsgom par bya// chos 'byung nang du rdo rje brag/ pad nyi'i steng na ro yi gdan// de steng hU~M la pa pri brag gyur// de las nag po chen
150a3(rnying rgyud): bskyed// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// dbu skra kham ser gyen du brdzes// spyan gsum sdang mig me li 'od// g.yas na gri zug g.yon thong ba// ngo shal thad pa'i phreng bas brtsad// brkyang bsku mar yi gdan lang gying //
150a4(rnying rgyud): dbus na dam tshig bskyed// ye shes spyan drang gnyis med bya// dbang bskur mi bskyod dbu la brgyan// mdun gyi nag po chen po yang // de ltar dus mtshungs rdzogs par bskyed// mchod dang gtor ma byas nas su// gnyis med thugs ka'i
150a5(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa bya// des ni nag po'i mtshan ma rnyed// de nas sbyin bsreg brtsam bya zhes// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// gnas ni dur khrod chen po yi// ro sreg me tha khang stong ngam// rdo rje'i brag
150a6(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa yi// 'jig pa'i gnas su sbyin bsreg bya// mchod pa gtor ma sreg pa'i rdzas// de dag tshogs par byas nas ni// me tog spos dang mar me dri// sha chen lha bshos sreg pa'i rdzas// khyad par gyi ni mchod par bya// chan dang
150a7(rnying rgyud): gi la du dang // sbrang rtsi chun 'brum se 'bru'i chang // sha chen nya sha bdud rtsi khrag/ 'di ni dpal ldan nag po yi// khyad par gtor ma yin par bshad// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// dur khrod sa dang chu 'grams// me thab sa la thab
150b1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f// thaban mamang nag/ ma ya dazabs// tsa la Tha nang thabs pa zad // sa u mad bangs pa ma gsams// mi 'das thug zad pas brtan// dbus pa thug nas pazla// thabargya ma pas dkar ba shang // nga nas gzhan yad rab sha
150b2(rnying rgyud): dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// bsam gtan sngags dang ldan gyur nas// thab kyi nang du ba ts+yai Sh+kaM// raM las me lha bskyed par bya// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// phyag gnyis me tog bzang phreng 'dzin// mdog dmar spyan bgrang dpa sa
150b3(rnying rgyud): pa// khro gnyeng mche ba gtsigs pa'o// rang bzhin me dang ye shas maM// phyag rgya bzhi yi sbyor bas bstim// gnyis med gyur pa'i lce la hUM// bsam nas yin bsreg rngab rnams// pan badz+ran rab tu myos pas dbul// oM mahA kA pa pa/
150b4(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kro d+ha a ga na yaM/ hUM me ma sarba sha hu~M a mu kaM/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ a mu ka mA ra ya phaT/ de nas 'bar ba'i ngo bong brtag/ me yi gzhal yas khang du bsam// de nas dpal ldan nag po ni// cho ga rdza ngam gsum gyis bskyed// bad
150b5(rnying rgyud): dang dam tshig thugs ka yi// 'od zer phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// de yi cho gas bkug la bsgrim// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ hrI srid gsum 'jigs par byed pa yi// dpal ldan nag po chen po yis// dus gsum rgyal ba
150b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad ci// bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs pa'i// dam tshig chen po'i stobs kyis ni// 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// drag po'i stobs kyis gshegs su gsol// me yi dkyil 'khor 'dir bzhugs la// gdug pa'i dgra bgegs
150b7(rnying rgyud): bsngal du gsob// de nas bdud rtsi k+ta yis// dpal ldan nag po'i zhal du dbul// mchod dang gtor ma'i rim pa rnams// dbul ba'i dmardzas la sogs pa'i// mchod pa'i khyad par kun kyang dbul// de nas pin bsreg rdzas rnams// rgya
151a1(rnying rgyud): da bajugs pa'o// dab dpa yigagazug pa na// bas gsurdzugs da na sa// rkyen ga nan pa'i shapa du ga// drug dang bgang/ ldan 'das ma ga /
151a2(rnying rgyud): yang rab bshad pa// li rna rdzas kyi rim pa ni// rkang rjes sa dang swa shad dang // ro bsregs thal ba dri chem brag/ bdud rtsi lnga dang chus spyas la// bslab bya'i gzugs ni sor bgyid pa// snying gar mang yig gzhug par bya// mgo lus tsha ba'i
151a3(rnying rgyud): kyis byugs// bsam gtan sngags dang ldan gyur nas// bsrab bya bkug nas de la bstim// sngags kyis dbye ba'i cho ga bya// mgo nas rkang pa'i mthil gyi bar// bsang sngags tshor mas 'bum phrag brdeg/ de nas nag pa chen po pa//
151a4(rnying rgyud): rab gnas byas pa yi// mag nas thabs su til gyi tshad// gtab nas nag po'i sbyin bsreg bya// zas ni mi dang las byung ba'i// tshogs dgang gzang byug gzar \u0f7f// dur khrod las b+hung tsha shes pa// tshor ma tshogs rnying ba'i// yam shing so na

151b3(rnying rgyud): ni bcu gnyis brgya rtsa brgyad// dpal ldan nag po'i yam shing bshad// de nas thod ba dum bu drug/ nang du dug gi la du bya// ling+ga tsher me'i me yis bsros// rnal 'byor thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis// bslab bya bkug la li ng+gar bstim/

151b6(rnying rgyud): 'od zer nag po'i gzugs su sngo// de yis bsrub bya dgug byas nas// rkang pa gnyis nas bzung nas ni// dug gtor du ni sbugs byas te// gzhan yang nag po'i zhal du sprugs// de la bdag nyid rnal 'byor pas// ro yi gdan la
151b7(rnying rgyud): 'dug nas ni// mig ni zur gsum mi bzad par// byas nas sos ni so 'cha' zhing // bdag nyid drugs ka'i 'od zer gyi// rno ba'i gzugs kyis bsgrub bya bkug/ me thab nang du gnas pa yi// dpal ldan nag po chen po la/ snying po'i
152a1(rnying rgyud): sngags kyis dbul ba \u0f7f// dkar brgyan tu brgyad par// mdun byas nabasgru' byar// dem thag thugasod par byas// 'grub 'gyung 'dis tham ma meng // ces bcom ldan dadas rgyas bka' gyul to// dpal nan/
152a2(rnying rgyud): po'i chung ngur khrod chen po zhes bya ba las/ sprin sreg gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas dpal nag po chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mud 'di nges par gsal ba'i phyir// sngags kyi don dang ldan pa yi// yi ge'i dam 'ji
152a3(rnying rgyud): lhar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sgra gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// yi ge rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur// rtsa ba snying por nges bshad pa// sngags dang rgyung kyi don ci phyir// yi ge bcu pa bshad par bya// zhes bcom ldan
152a4(rnying rgyud): kyis bka' stsal to// de nas dpal nag po chen pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das/ yi ge btu ba ji ltar pags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang por dag byed rgyal po la// dang po rje pa yan lag ring // gnyis pa'i lngapas
152a5(rnying rgyud): snga ldan mchod// dang po zag le bcas pa bzhag/ gnyis pa'i lnga pa'i lnga ba ni// sna ldan ring dang bcas par gnas// dor ni brgyad mthar gzhag par bya// gnyis pa'i dang po med dang ldan// gnyis pa'i drug pa'i gsum pa la// gnyis pa'i
152a6(rnying rgyud): drug pa'i dang po bzhag/ brgyad mtha' gnyis ni sgra ldan mchog/ dang po'i gsum pa gdags par bya// gnyis pa'i dang po'i mtha' can nI// dang po gnyis dang bcas par bzhag/ gnyis ni ring thung sgra yis badzad// bsad na tshig drag ldan par
152a7(rnying rgyud): bya// gnyis pa'i sba pa'i gnyis pang // gnyis pa'i gsum pa'i dang por bcas// drag po'i sgra dang bcas par bshad// brgyad pa yi ni gsum pa la// gnyis pa'i lnga pa'i gsum pa gdags// der ni brgyad pa'i mtha' can ni// ring ba'i spang
152b1(rnying rgyud): ldan par bzhag/ rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te// de nas dpal nag po chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dpal nag po chen po drang // mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas pa yi// rang gi don dang ldan pa'i sngags// de yi yi ge rnams kyi
152b2(rnying rgyud): mchog/ btu ba'i rim pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po don gyi yi ge la// dang po lnga pas yan lag brgyan// gnyis pa'i lnga pa'i thig le dang // dang po thung ngu gzhag par bya// gnyis pa'i lnga pa mthar ldan pa/
152b3(rnying rgyud): ring ba'i grwa dang bcas par gnas// bcad pa'i mtha' can yi ge ni// cung zad ring dang bcas par brjod// gnyis pa'i dang po ming dang ldan// gnyis pa'i drug pa'i gsum pa la// gnyis pa'i drug pa'i dang po gdags// rig byed gla dang ldan par ni/
152b4(rnying rgyud): rung bar 'jug dang 'argyas pa 'arjod// la ba'i lba parda ldan mchog/ brgyad pa'i mtha' can ga dgas par bya// dang po gsum pas rab tu btsun/ chog dragang thag dang brtab par brjod// gnyis pa'i bdun pa'i gnyis pa ni// tshig byed ma 'ad ldan
152b5(rnying rgyud): par brjod// gnyis pa'i lnga pa'i mthar ldan pa// zla ba mig dang bcas par bzhag/ gnyis ka'i 'brel par gnas pa yi// chags pa'i yi ge bdag nyid can// gnyis pa'i gsum pa gzhag par bya// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa dang po la// dang po gsum pa
152b6(rnying rgyud): gdags par bya// gnyis pa'i lnga pa'i mthar ldan pa// ring ba'i sgra dang bcas par gnas// rje tshan brgyad pa'i mthar gnas pa// cung zad ring ba'i sgra dang ldan// gnyis pa'i dang po ming dang ldan// gnyis pa'i drug pa'i gsum pa la// 'thug pa
152b7(rnying rgyud): sgra dang ldan par bya// gnyis pa'i thug pa'i dang po ni// g.yo byed spa dang bcas par gnas// sde tshan gnyis pa'i dbu ma ni// chags pa'i yi ge rab ldan pa// gnyis pa'i gsum pa 'jug por ldan// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'i dang po ni// dang 'o
153a1(rnying rgyud): gsus pas yan lag brgyad// dang po'i dang ba yan lag dang // gnyis pa'i wa ya pon// cung zad 'jug pa dag dang wan// gnyis kang 'thal ba chags pa gnas// gtang bya dz+ra ba'i gsum pa Ta// dag
153a2(rnying rgyud): bsag nan paraH// cung chung rang dang bcas par gnas// mtha' yi brgyad pa'i gnyis pa ni// chung zad log pa'i shugs dang ldan// sde tshan bcad pa'i mtha ldan pa// big le zla ba mig dang bcas// dang po yi ni gsum pa na// ring ba'i zlam
153a3(rnying rgyud): grobs dang ldan// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// de nas dpal nag po chen pos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ kyai rtsi bir bkod pa yi// de yaM sngags kyi khyad par ni// yig btu pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis
153a4(rnying rgyud): kar stsal pa// sngags kyi ni rnams gsapa byed pa// de la mtshan nyid dang por bshad// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa dang po la// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'i gsum pa bzhag/ gnyis pa'i drug pa'i dang por gnas// gnyis pa bzhi pang gnyis pa ni// de nyid
153a5(rnying rgyud): po'i tshig da dzin// dang po likri 'bru rnams kyi mchog/ dang po lnga pas yan lag dgod// gnyis pa'i lnga bas sna ldan mchog/ rig byed thung du thog yeng bcas// gnyis pa'i lnga pa lnga par raM// snga dang ring dang bcas par gnas// dar ni
153a6(rnying rgyud): dgapa' gzhag par bya// gnyis pa'i dang po mying dang ldan// gnyis pa'i drug pa gsas par // gnyis pa jug pa dang ste/ g-i tshul ba'i bya dang dran// zung mama'i nyis pa tes kyis// rdzing zad 'breg dang nga por brjod// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'i mthar gnas dag
153a7(rnying rgyud): drug pa dang da// dang po 'dapa lung \u0f7f// gnyis pa'i rtsa ba'i dang ba gnas// gnyis pa'i dang gzhag pa rje// gnyis ka 'brel ba man nas// chags pa'i sgog yi gang rjod/ da tha gnyis pas gdadapa
153b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'i gsum pa'i lnga pa thig ler bcas// cung zad ring ba'i sgra dang ldan// dang po bzhi pa ring por gnas// brkyang pa'i mtha' can dang po la// gnyis pa'i lnga pa thig ler bzhag/ tsheg drag drag po'i sgra dang ldan// dang po'i dang po gzhag par bya//
153b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'i lnga pa'i dang po ni// brgyad pa'i gsum pa'i 'brel par bzhag/ cung zad 'thug pa'i sgra dang ldan// gnyis pa'i gnyis pa dang po la// dang por rig byed gnyis par mnan// gnyis pa'i lnga pa'i lnga pa la// dang po lnga pas yan lag brgyan//
153b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'i dang po rab tu bzhag/ gnyis pa'i drug pa'i gsum pa ni// dang po'i lnga pas yan lag bkod// gnyis pa'i drug pa'i dang po la// gnyis pa'i lnga pa thig ler bzhag/ gnyis pa'i gsum pa'i dang po pa// chags pa'i yi ge yan lag ldan/
153b4(rnying rgyud): dang po'i gnyis pas gnan par bya// ma ning chags pa'i sgra la ni// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'i gsum pa bzhag/ gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'i mthar ldan dgod// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'i dang po la// yan lag chags pa'i sgra dang ldan// cung zad ring ba'i yi ge
153b5(rnying rgyud): brjod// gnyis pa'i drug pa'i dang por ni// bye brag gnyis kyi sgra dang ldan// bung dang ring du rnam par bshad// gnyis pa'i drug pa'i dang po la// tsheg drag gis ni bkod par bya// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'i dang po la// dang po gnyis pas gnan par bya//
153b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'i lnga pa'i dang po la// chags pa'i yi ge gdags par bya// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'i dang po la// dang po'i gnyis pas gnan par bya// gnyis pa'i gnyis pa'i bzhi pa la// gnyis pa'i lnga pa thig ler bzhag/ shugs kyi ring ba'i sgra dang ldan// brgyad pa'i
153b7(rnying rgyud): mthar ldan gsum pa bzhag/ gnyis pa yi ni lnga pa ni// cung zad ring ba shes par bya// der ni chags pa'i yi ge dgod// brgyad pa'i mtha' can gsum pa la// dang po gnyis pas gnan par bya// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'i gsum pa'i gnyis// mthug dang shin
154a1(rnying rgyud): rgyubathus pas dang// gle dang ba ga pa ban na sa 'a na pa gsus byan/ sa 'ang tha 'jug pa sa/ gnas ga gag gru su dug// dgasas bya' ban lagag sa// bad
154a2(rnying rgyud): 'ab ba gnyis pas// gnyis pa'i gsum pa'i dang ngo gdugs// gnyis pa'i gnyis pa drug por \u0f7f// tsog draganas na shes par bya// sdem na btung po mtha ldan pa// dang po gnyis pas gnan bar bya// skyobs par byed pa'i sgra gnyis than
154a3(rnying rgyud): ring dang shin du ring bar brjod// gnyis pa'i snga pa'i lnga pa gnas// bar du chags pa'i yig ni// shin tu drag pa gnyis su bshad// gnyis pa yin pazhi pa bya// chags pa'i yi ges yan lag dgod// dang po gnyis pas gnan par bya// shing
154a4(rnying rgyud): tu drag po gnyis ldan// bzad mtha' yi ni gnyis pa la// gnyis pa'i gsum pa'is pa gdags// chog drag bkod pa'i sgra gnyis ni// shin tu drag po gnyis su bshad// gnyis pa'i lba pa'i bzhi pa pa// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'i lnga pa bzha/
154a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'i sgra dang ldan par brjod// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'i bzhi pa ni// shin tu ring ba gnyis su bshad// brgyad pa'i mtha' can gnyis po ni// chog drag ldan pa gnyis su bshad// gnyis pa'i gsum pa'i lnga pa ni// 'brug pa'i h+la ldan ga nyi
154a6(rnying rgyud): su bshad// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'i gsum pa gnyis// shin tu ring ba'i sgra ldan gnyis// brgyad pa'i mthar ldan skra gnyis ni// shin du drag pa'i sgra dang ldan// gnyis pa'i phra pa'i dang po gnyis// thung ba'i sgra dang ldan par bshad// gnyis pa'i
154a7(rnying rgyud): dang po gnyis// drung zad drag po'i sgra dang ldan// 'di ni 'khor lor rab bshad pa// de yi yi ge btu bar bya// gnyis pa bzhi pa'i gsum pa la// dang po gnyis pa gnan par bya// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'i wa ba bzhag/ gnyis pa'i lnga pa'i lnga pa la// dang
154b1(rnying rgyud): po'i bzhi pas yan lag dgod// gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la// dang po'i bzhi pa dgod par bya// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'i lnga ba bzhag/ brgyad pa yi na mthar ldan pa// dang po'i gsum pas yan lag brgyan// dang po thung ngu zla ba'i mig/ gnyis pa'i lnga pas
154b2(rnying rgyud): thig ler bzhag/ cung zad ring ba'i sgra dang ldan// gnyis pa'i lnga pa'i gnyis pa la// gnyis pa'i gsum pa'i dang po bzhag/ shin tu drag po'i sgra dang ldan// brgyad pa'i mtha' can gsum pa la// gnyis pa'i lnga pa'i gsum bag dang // sde tshan
154b3(rnying rgyud): brgyad pa'i mtha' ldan pa// cung zad ring ba'i sgra dang ldan// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud dur khrod chen po zhes bya ba las/ yi ge btu ba'i le'u ste dbu pa'o// / de nas dpal nag po chen
154b4(rnying rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ su gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis// dpa' ldan nag po chen po yi// dngos grub nges par 'grub pa dang // cho ga'i las rnams rdzogs pa yi// 'grub pa'i d+ha ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
154b5(rnying rgyud): stsal pa/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang // dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// dngos grub nye bar 'grub pa'i chu// dam tshig cho ga 'di dag la// gnas par byed pa'i rnal bskor pas// dang po bsam gtan thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das
154b6(rnying rgyud): kyis bka' ltar te// de nas dpal nag po chen pos gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das/ dam tshig ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bla ma sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpal ldan nag po chen po ni// rtag tu yid la gnag par/
154b7(rnying rgyud): bya// dpa'i dran da po chen po pa// sngags dang phyag rgyabasam gtan pa// yid kyis som nye med par bya// yongs su ma smin sems can dang // bla ma rdo 'dzin spong ba// dam chog 'dral bar byed pa dang // rgyab pa'i bsan pa 'jig byed/
155a1(rnying rgyud): pa// dpal ldan nag pa can pa'o// bsam gtan gas dang ldan byar nas/ lhung rdzas bsgrul par mthas sa// rnal 'thar ngas par byung bar bshan// dpal ldan nag ba slab padas// sa dang shA brags na/
155a2(rnying rgyud): dang // mthun pa'i dmarngas la sogs pa// de dag rtag tu sra bar bya// sngags dang chud kyi don rnams dang // nag po'i bsam gtan tshe gar bcas// kun la bstan par mi bya ste// bdud rtsi lnga dang bsreg rdzas dang // sha chen ta sha chang dang ni// du
155a3(rnying rgyud): la du la sogs pa// mthun pa'i dam rdzas thams cad ni// rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis bsten// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// su dang gri gug thod pa dang // ni rangasu la sogs pa ni// bla mas rab tu gnas byas te// dus gsum mthun pa'i rdzal
155a4(rnying rgyud): kyis mchod// rtag tu tshogs kyi 'khor los mchod// dpal ldan nag po srub 'dod pas// bla mas rjes su gnang bar bya/ des ni dpal ldan nag po 'grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan pa gnas par byed pa ni// dam tshig chen por
155a5(rnying rgyud): rab tu bshad// kun pa bstan par mi bya ste// gal te rmongs par bstan gyur na// ardza ka yi 'bras bu ltar// mgo dang lus po 'gas 'gyur te// dmyal bar nges par lhung bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// dpal nag
155a6(rnying rgyud): po chen po'i chung ngur khrod chen po zhes bya ba las/ dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu pa'o// / dpal nag po chen po'i chud drag po brtag pa dur khrod chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// snga nam rdo rje bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
155a7(rnying rgyud): rgya gar thad du/ ma hA kA la rU pa bi kran ta tan tra nA ma/ bod gad du/ nag po chen po gzugs can gcer bu'i rgyud ces bya ba/ rdo rje mgon po nag po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa bus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjer
155b1(rnying rgyud): rab can pa glang / byang byugs ldang sa can gyi po zang na bzhugs te/ nga 'char rab kyi bung shang lha ma yin gyi grang byur sum brgyags nas tha bar+d+ha/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal ba ha na pag shu gas tha ba gnaswA ta/ lha rnams pa 'thun ta// 'gran pas na
155b2(rnying rgyud): rnams pham par gyur to// lha phal cher lha'i yul las 'phos par gyur to// de rnams kyis bsams pas lha'i bdag po chen po dbang phyug chen po'i bu legs ldan nag po zhes bya ba/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po 'dul bar 'dra ste/ legs ldan na
155b3(rnying rgyud): po ga la der lha rnams 'dus nas smras pa/ lha chen po legs ldan lha'i gnas 'dir/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa ngo pa mi shes sam/ 'di dag gis ni lha'i rgyal srid kyang pham la nye'o// de'i phyir khyod kyi mthus soms shog
155b4(rnying rgyud): ces smras so// lha chen po des bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po 'di ni mtshon chas mi shigs pa yin te/ dug dang 'byung ba chen pos kyang mi lci ba/ drang srong gis dmod kyang bsdig par mi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di thabs ji lta bus
155b5(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur zhes bsams pa/ rigs sngags kyi mthu 'ba' zhig gis mchog tu 'gyur bar shes nas/ lha'i bu chen po de rang gi gnas ga la ba der dong ste/ lung lo can gyi pho brang na/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan thar 'dug nas lan
155b6(rnying rgyud): gsum du gsol pa/ kye/ nag po'i tshogs can lha min 'dis// lha yi bu rnams pham par byas// dkar po'i phyogs kyang nag por gyur// 'di don bdag la dbang bsrur stsol// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang
155b7(rnying rgyud): chen po des/ lha chen po nag po de la klu dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang / phrin las kyi dbang bslar / drag sngags 'bru bdun gyis kyang dba' bskur/ srid pa gsum 'dul ba'i dbang tho' ba'i rtags su lagapa g.yas pas khan+d+ha

156a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i bdag po chen po lags// lha chen 'di ru dbang bskur ba// ci don lha min gcig pu 'am// gzhan don dgongs pa yod dam ci// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// 'di ru lha min 'dul ba dang // ma 'ongs bstan pa gtad pa'i phyir//
