158a2(rnying rgyud): yi ge la sogs par// dur khrod dpal gyi rgyan char ldan// 'bar ba'i gar dgus brjid pa'o// rdo rje mgon po nag po yang // nag po raM gyi ngo bo las// nag po gcer bu 'jigs pa'i sku// sbrul dang thong dron phreng bas brgyan// kha gdangs mche ba dam
158a3(rnying rgyud): po gtsigs// lce 'dril dug gi kha rlangs 'thul// me dang dug gi skyug rtsupa skyugs// spyan gsum me 'bar tsha tsha 'gro// g.yas na kha T+wAM bdud rigs 'dzin// g.yon na glo snying dgra bo gsod// gsod par byed pa'i mchog tu bsgom// spyan drang
158a4(rnying rgyud): bzhugs dang mchod pa ni// sngags pa'i ting 'dzin gsal bar bya// oM ma hA kA la hUM hUM ru dza ru tra hriM/ a gad dza sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ oM ma hA kA la mAM sa la khA hi/ rak+ta tsit+ta ba su ta/ b+ha liM ta khA hi khA hi/ tsaN+Da ma hA kA la di lin d+ha b+ha li/
158a5(rnying rgyud): khA hi hUM phaT swA hA// de nas srog gi snying po ni// khri phrag gsum gyis las rnams 'grub// rdo rje mgon po nag po nyid// 'gro ba'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// bdud kyi rgyal po chen po nyid// thod pa'i phreng ba can du mdzad// oM ma hA kA la ru tra
158a6(rnying rgyud): sid d+hi yaM dung // gong gi sngags 'di bzlas pa de// sdang ba thams cad gsad pa yi// dngos grub chen po snang ma mdzad// gsang ba'i bdag po'i mthu dang mtshungs// nag po chen po gcer bu'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i tshul du mgon po bsgrub
158a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas lha'i bus zhus pa bsten pa'i thabs ni gang la bgyi// gsang ba'i bdag po chen po yis// mgon po bsten pa bka' stsal pa// phyi rten nang rten gsang ba'i rten// g.yag dkar lug nag tun byas
158b1(rnying rgyud): pa// gyi yi rtan du gzung bar \u0f7f// mkha' nag gos nag brgyan pa ni// nang gi rten du gzung bar bya// seng ldeng 'am ni tshor ma can// ba shing nag pa 'dam gang pa// rtse mo dag nam lcags mda'u gzugs pa// rtsub cu rgo myo yi rgyan// rjend cing /
158b2(rnying rgyud): la dang nag brgyan// dri zhim spos dang sman sna tshogs// gzhan yang snying gi phreng ba dang // bsad pa'i srog gi snying po dang // bdag nyid gsang mtshan a mr-i ta// gzhu'am gab cor stsal te gdags// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas gzugs te/
158b3(rnying rgyud): gzhan la bstan pa ma yin no// nag po chen po gcer bu'i rgyud las/ rten thams cad bsten pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas lha'i bus gsol pa/ de ltar bsnyen cing bsgrub pa yi// rdo rje mgon po nag po de// bya ba de las la
158b4(rnying rgyud): ji ltar sbyar// 'dod pa'i dngos grub ci ltar blang // rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa// 'di la phyi nang rnam pa gsum// phyi ltar dngos grub grub pa ni// pad+ma chen po de dbus su// rdo rje mgon po spyan drangs te// zhal zas sna tshogs mdun bsags
158b5(rnying rgyud): he// gsang sngags rgyal po rdzogs pa de// dngos grub sngags ni khri phrag gcig/ de ru bzlas pa byas pa yis// yid la ci bsam 'grub par 'gyur// oM ma hA kA la de ba sid d+ha yan dza/ ma ma sid+d+hi gu ru/ zhes bzlas so// 'di bzlas pas kham
158b6(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi rgyal por 'gyur// bu dang bu mo'i rigs kyad 'phel bar 'gyur// nad dang sdug bsngal zhi bar 'gyur ro// yid la bsams pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// nag po chen po gcer bu'i rgyud pas/ dngos grub sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad
158b7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas nang gi dngos su'i dam pa ni// bstan pa 'jig pa'i dru thal// phas kyi mgon po rbang pa no// rab sa chad thod pa mtshan nal// gshegs te leg par stug pa dang // eg pa srog bdud chen po yab// khrag dang
159a1(rnying rgyud): drag gis bri b.raH// lte bzlog gi 'khang por bcas// sna tshugs rdong thod pas brgyan// srog gi sngags dang spel bar bya// steng gi lI khang bdud mo zhum// sna tshogs pa d+ma zad dron dang // thog gi sngags dang
159a2(rnying rgyud): bcas pa bri// yab kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la ni// las kyi mgon po dregs pa po brgyad drag tshig bri// yum gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la ni// dur khrod ma drug bdud mo dang // bdud mo bdun gyi sngags kyis brgyan// yab yum zhal sbyar 'a
159a3(rnying rgyud): lo'i bar// bstan pa 'jig pa'i gzugs bcug la// de nas byad thag nag pos btags// sngags pa bdag gis gzung bar bya// nyung dkar rgyal po lag tu thogs// bdag nyid ye shes rdo rje can du bsgom// mdun du mgon po 'khor dang
159a4(rnying rgyud): bcas pa skyed pa ni/ mgon po nag po chen po ni// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // srin po bdud dang ging du bcas// lag na gri re thogs pa re// kun kyang bos na 'ong bar bsam// lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo//
159a5(rnying rgyud): srin po bdud mo sgrol ging mo// dpal ldan lha mo nyid dang ni// kun kyang zhags pa thogs pa re// kun kyang bos na 'ong bar bsam// gtor ma byin te thod par bstim// bdag nyid ye shes mgon po yis// las kyi mgon po thams cad gzir //
159a6(rnying rgyud): oM ma hA kA la smai bAn byin no snying la ya/ su hriM tsita rbad b+h+rU~M hUM phaT phaT/ ma hA kA la tri yang b+h+yo/ b+ho no tshol pa tri yang ngo / las kyi mgon po zad pa'o// oM u dum ti hUM phaT/ oM a sha ma hU~M phaT/ oM a ke dun hUM phaT/ oM ra tri sha ma hU~M phaT/ sA
159a7(rnying rgyud): shan hU~M biTe/ oM a sho mu~M hUM Ta/ oM ma hAk+Sha la bru~M phaT/ mngang bdag mgon pa nyid dang ni// sgra dang klu yi dag tshig 'di// po yi rbag sngags bdun pado// mo g+ha he ga ri ga/ ta ni ga/ oM gro shon ni shag/ oM ga tri ga ni shaH
159b1(rnying rgyud): dgag/ am thA mu na shag/ oM mad+hU dzanag// ngas pa sa rdzas nam bdun ga gas bdun pa'o// gu shelas kyi mgan na// gapas padang da// dganasanas shing 'gas gas// stsog
159b2(rnying rgyud): sa ma ya lo ki nu sa b+ho// sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ zhes bya'o// de ltar drag sngags rbad byas la// da ni bsad pa'i las sgor ni// 'khor lo'i bar gyi dbu pon// khri yi thod par bzag byas la/ dkyil 'khor zla bar 'thub khung bya// de ru tshe tho dadang ba cis
159b3(rnying rgyud): bcug/ dbasad pa'i sngags 'di re re zhing // tsha ba'i rim gyis 'debs pa'i rdzas// sha khrag dang ni bong bu'i gcin// dug chu yungs kar rgyal por sbyar// tsha ba'i rims kyis 'debs pa'i sngags/ po dang mo dang thams cad dril// nag sngags/
159b4(rnying rgyud): bdun pa re re la// bsad pa'i sngags 'di re re zhing // btags te thun gyis brdeg par \u0f7f// che ge mo dza mA ra ya hUM phaT/ bsad pa'i drag sngags 'bru bdun po// stong phrag gcig tu rdzogs pa dang // de nas khyi thod gnan par bya// srog gi 'khor
159b5(rnying rgyud): rten bcas te// de nyid rab tu mchod par bya// las rnams ma thub par du bcang // de nas phyis kyang khrel li b+hA// nag po chen po gcer bu'i chud las/ nang gi tshul du thun gyis bsad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / bsad pa'i drag sngags
159b6(rnying rgyud): bdun pa ra// dbang ma thob par bzlas na ni// sngags kyi nus pa mi thab pas// byed kyi shing ni mi thub bzhin// chu yang 'pho zhing snod kyang 'chag/ de bzhin dbang bsgyur rdzob pas bzlas// ri rab chen po'i steng nyid du// bcom ldan rdo rje can de yis/
159b7(rnying rgyud): med nga napa// brgyad pas rgyag ga grub pos// sumagrin pa'i byas pa / kye smig nga sa gyug/ rdos dun // dres bdung thul ba// gzhan la nub da
160a1(rnying rgyud): phyag la gtad pas// bdud rtsi drag sngags mthu bo ste// bdud kyi yul yang dar 'jig snyam// lus kyang rul pa nyid du dogs// rdo rje can drag nyid la phul// de nas klu yi rgyal po ni// chul rigs chen po la
160a2(rnying rgyud): gtad pas// klu yis drag sngags ma thug ste// rgya mtsho chen po skams par 'gyur// ku yi lus kyang dul bar dogs// rdo rje can dganyid la phul// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen des// lha yi mgon po nag po la// sragasung thugs kyi dbang bskur na
160a3(rnying rgyud): ga sngags bdun pa de la gtad// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung du bcu// de nas 'ang mabring byang tshugs kyi// rang drung chun gyis thub pa yi// ma hA po d+hi'i bstan lung mdzad// nag po chen po gcer ba'i chung las/ sngags rtse le'u ste bcu ba'o//
160a4(rnying rgyud): nas nag po shin tu gas du ba'i drag sngags 'di// rdo rje ye shes mgon po yi// bu gsung thugs la byung mdzad de// las kyi mgon po nyid la btung // oM ma hA tsat+ta/ oM ma hA kA la trag shwad/ oM mA hA kA la yag / oM ma hAk+Sha la ru dza/
160a5(rnying rgyud): oM ma hA kA la sid d+hi/ oM ma hA kA la yaM du / oM ma d+hu kA la nring / zhes ni rbad pa'i drag sngags bdud// gas pa'i drag sngags bdun po ni// che ge mo rje zi la war ya phaT// che ba'i nad dkyis bsad pa'i mchodag// gang la dmigs pa'i gzugs
160a6(rnying rgyud): zas te// bsad pa'i thags kya rdzas snga gsum// mtshon cha dag ni rnam pa la// zangs rtsod kyi lpags rtse dang // zir yungs kar mtshon dbye bsata// jug cang rngang grom bgrub pa'i 'jab// tshab gsum gyi thun gyis brdeg/ ti bung mtshan
160a7(rnying rgyud): gung lan gsum du// bdag nyid gcer bur byung nab ni// nag po chen po'i ting 'dzin ni// zhing gi dkyil nas g.yo bcad 'jug/ pri na rnon po shad pa'i zis// dgra gzugs gzubs te me pa 'asreg/ yang ni pad+ma bcang byas te// de bzhin
160b1(rnying rgyud): zhug ni bdun bdun pa// gsang sngags pakyu phrag re re bzlas// bsad pa'i sngags dang spel byas na// myur du 'pho bar the tshom med// bsad pa'i mchog tu rtsu ba ni// sha dang rus pa khrag las sa// byas pa'i dkyil 'bar chen pa yang // dzad
160b2(rnying rgyud): po bdun rtsegs dag tu bya// drag sdigs bdun gyis zhag bdun du// shin tu btud de las bya'o// nag po chen po gcer bu'i chud las/ drag sngags bdun gyis gsad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas lha'i bus gsol
160b3(rnying rgyud): pa/ legs so legs so legs par gsungs// bstan pa bsrung ba'i don du gsungs// gzung ngo gzung ngo dam du gzung // bstan pa gnas par bya phyir gzung // de nas gsang bdag bka' stsal pa// nag po chen po drag po 'di// gas
160b4(rnying rgyud): sngags dam pa gnas pa dang // bstan pa yun du bsrung ba'i phyir// lha yi bu nyid khyod kyis gzung // dkon mchog gsum po 'jig rten du// nub par mi 'gyur bya ba'i phyir// bstan pa bsrung ba'i rgyud mchog 'di// sku gsung thugs la
160b5(rnying rgyud): mdzad de// las kyi mgon po khyod la gtad// las kyi mgon po thams cad kyang // mthun par rjes su yi rangs te// bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// nag po chen po gcer bu'i chud las gtad pa'i leng skye bcu gnyis pa'o//
160b6(rnying rgyud): nag po chen po gcer bu'i rgyud rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ e kA da ti ma hA yo bI shwa rI tan+da/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor dbang phug chen mo ra la gcig ma'i rgyud/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
160b7(rnying rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang bzhin gyi gnas/ yum gyi b+ha ga rnam par dag pa'i dbyings na bzhugs so// nyid la' mi gzhan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pad
161a1(rnying rgyud): mangs pa'i ma mtshan ma ka rI d+ha/ tsa dang / dzAm da / bat+tA li dang / than ste dang / nyas r+thadang / wan dang/ 5!/ lI la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang bdag nyi pagacan dang / de bzhi du sag dang /
161a2(rnying rgyud): dang / srang ki dang / tha rgod dang / kang ka'i mgo dang / bya rog gi mgo dang / thug pa'i mgo can la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang lcags kyu can dang / zhags pa dang / lugs srog dang / rdal bu can la sogs pa dang ldan par gyur to// gzhan yang
161a3(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'di nyid ltar rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi yum gyi b+ha ga rnam par dag pa ma ma thong ba rnam
161a4(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / srin po dang / srin mo dang / ma mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ni/ khrag 'thung ba dang rus pa la sogs pa 'cha' zhing / srog 'phrog par byed pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ste/ gzhan gyis ni 'dul ba'i dus la
161a5(rnying rgyud): bab par ma gyur pa dang / de'i tshe de'i dus na gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje he ru ka la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ sems can gyi don du dbang bskur ba dang /
161a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang / sbyin bsreg dang / dam tshig 'bog pa dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / mngon par byang chub bstan pa dang / sems dpa' gsum gyi khyad par bstan pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bstan pa dang / lta ba
161a7(rnying rgyud): pa dang / spong ba bstan pa dang / gsang sngags bstan pa dang / dngos gru ba thob pa'i tshul bstan pa dang / las phra mo rnams bsrub pa thob par mdzod du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so// phyag
161b1(rnying rgyud): par shes na/ khrod sbyor ba gnyis dang ldan pa ru/ rgyud yongs su gzung ba'i sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rnam par 'dzin pa'i bdag po byos shig/ de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos tshul gnyis ma snyoms par zhugs te/ gcig pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa
161b2(rnying rgyud): pad du thal mo gyur srin mo'i tshul du sgor dbang nod par sbyar te// gnyis pas ni ston pa la rgyud kyi don yang dag par dri bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas nyi zla'i steng lha mo bcu drug bzhugs nas ha dang ter gyur pa rnams yig 'bru
161b3(rnying rgyud): bldag pa dang / rgyu dang rAH dang cag mtshan rnams rim par rdzogs te/ thug pa'i mgo la thug pa rnams gsang sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs so// badz+ra ka d+h+r-i tsi rI pra ma ha be ta l-I puk+ka l-I g+ha swa rI pA sha d+hi tsaN+Da lI/ sit+ta mu ShA/
161b4(rnying rgyud): bu'i/ shA na sa wa~M/ ba~M ta pra mAM/ kan tra b+h+yAM/ kAka pu we/ u lA ka mra khI/ a hU~M/ zhes gsungs pa dang / dam tshig gi lha mo dgra bcu bdun phyug sam cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par gyur to// gsang ba las zur di da pa/
161b5(rnying rgyud): des rnams kyis dbang bskur ba// rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis phyag rgya che// byin rlab gnyis med thob par shog/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de'i dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/
161b6(rnying rgyud): mu khyud dang bcas pa// rnam par dag pa dag nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor lha yang byin gyis brlab// ye shes 'bar ba'i 'khor lo bzhi// dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i gnas// gzhal yas khang gi bar khyams ni// bu chad rtsibs mtsham sa
161b7(rnying rgyud): bcas pa'o// yul dang shes pa rnam par dag/ dkyil 'khor lhani sgo bzhi'o// 'di lta ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba dang / 'khor lo dang / ba khyams dang / sgo khyud dang / lcags ri dang / rdo rje'i phreng ba dang / me'i phreng ba dang / drab
162a1(rnying rgyud): dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / mtsho dang / bya dang / shing dang / gcan gzhan dang / ngur khrod pa sogs pas kyi rol brgyan pa'i nang na/ ma mo dang / mkhang 'gro dang / srin pa dang / srin ma la sags pa rnam par dag pacanam
162a2(rnying rgyud): yin pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi lhar mi gtogs pa rnams kyis bskor ba'o// de'i dbus na dpal ral pa gcig ma dbus kyi lpags rlung 'tshub ma'i nang na/ ze'u rkang gsum zhon pa/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs par gyur/ kham nag ral pa gcig tu zil
162a3(rnying rgyud): rje dru ngag ba shA ma thags rnas pa/ skul rtson rgya dang / se gas brgyan gyi/ skye ba gling shi sa ng+yas rdzun na mas ba/ spyan gsum dang ldan pa/ lag pa g.yas pa nga nag gnang nas rab khri byin pa/ dwags
162a4(rnying rgyud): pa rin pa zar na tshwa po 'dzin pa/ gzhan yang du khrod kyi tshangs pa/ mi'i nu ma lpags kyis bkang bzhal rdugs la ba/ gzhan yang theg pa dang / dbang ba dang / spro ba dang/ rgod pa dang / khra ba dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / rmad byung ba dang /
162a5(rnying rgyud): smai ji che ba dang / zhi ba la sogs pa dang ldan par gyur to// do na 'dis ste/ mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// ral zin le yang dag 'dzin// mthing nag ko rI da rtags ca/ tsau d+hi 'brel ba mda' gzu 'gongs// za maM g.yas na
162a6(rnying rgyud): gyur// ba tA nag ma rdon 'char// dzak+ka lagan ts+tsha zhags 'dzin// g+h+nAm+b+haH thag can 'thang zhing dbyug/ ga tsug tug kyi ting \u0f7f// N+Da ba'i bgo zas 'thal// mi dgra gag gis phyag snom te// khwa la phyag gis dab snyib \u0f7f
162a7(rnying rgyud): ka mag yis stong pa 'thad// rkyen da Sh+Ta na// gnam nas shing thag gcang // Tha r-i thaM 'dzin// chagasas lpags kyu drug/ sna pa phyogan chags byed/ bzhin co mdza
162b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis ka gang sgos rdzogs pa'i phyag/ su ni thams cad dbyings su gcig/ dkyil 'khor 'di yis las rnams byed// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po ral gcig ma'i rgyud las/ dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//
162b2(rnying rgyud): denas gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin sreg gi las kyi sbyor ba ji lta bu grub pa bstan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po 'di lta ste// dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar lho 'am// yang na byang
162b3(rnying rgyud): shing nyid kyang rung // de bzhin lho dang nub tu yang // gzung 'dzin bdag po zhal bri ste// mdog ngan kham nag ra la pa can// shel mig khro gnyer kha zur gsum// tsher ma can gyi shing dag la// dug shing brtsegs pas yam shing byas// gnod pa'i mi bdu
162b4(rnying rgyud): ma rnams// re re'i sngon du gsang sngags ldan// bdag nyid 'dod lha'i nga rgyal gyis// rang bzhin gnas nas dgug dang gzhug/ gzhan yang byas te rten 'brel ni// glang chen klad pa mi dbang sha/ bya rog 'ug pa shwa tshil dang // sha khrag ro yi dur khrag
162b5(rnying rgyud): sogs// sbyar nas btab pa'i sngags 'di yin// oM tsa ba la a shug me// sarba sha truM a mu kaM da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hasmiM ku ru ku tsu hUM phaT/ me ni sngo nag dmar ba yin// ljang nag dud kha gtsug tu 'khyil// kham pa'i tshub ma lu byed 'dra/
162b6(rnying rgyud): chub ma tshe zhing tsaci 'gro// bab pa'i megye lte zla ni// drag zor sbyin bsregs pa yin// drug bro kyi yi zhi gnas la// bdun nA gang gi sbyin bsreg 'grub// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo ral pa gcig mi'i spyad pas/ spen bsreg gi 'a'u
162b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa'o// / phyag ni rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnapa 'byor chen mo ral gcig ma'i dang chog 'i lta bla la gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ gsang ba'i bdab pa la pa gcig pa'i dbachog ni na tu ste/
163a1(rnying rgyud): bden pa la the tshom mi za ba dang / chos nyid la the tshom mi za ba dang / mngon par dga' ba dang / sring pa la mngon par chags pa dang / bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum la blang dor mi byed pa dang / gsang sngags kyi sgra mi gcad pa
163a2(rnying rgyud): gsar sngags kyi lha spyod dman pa la mi brjod pa dang / dkon mchog gi skyabs na 'dug pa la byams pa dang / gsang ba'i dam chos dang ma bral ba dang / bla ma slob dpon gyi thugs 'dzin pa la gus pa dang / dam tshig gis 'dzes pa rnams lags ba'i
163a3(rnying rgyud): nas da ba ni du chu' kyiste byegadu byu / gzhad gang gas gcig / ma ba rgya dang/ brid ba bad pa/ mas cangs phrag tu smyan pa dang/ rtag pa
163a4(rnying rgyud): rgan ci lhar mi byed pa dang // rtag na rje rje'i mo mtshan 'dzin mi byed pa dang / phrag na tsaka khams pa 'debs pa dang / sa mnon par lus ngag gi dga' ma spang ba dang / dmatshas chags par mkha' 'gro 'bod pa dang / wang zhin gshegs
163a5(rnying rgyud): pa la bzang ngan du 'du shes med ci dang / snying rje'i sems yod pa dang / dam bcas pa'i dge ba yod pa dang / 'di ltar dmachog nyi shu rtsa drug ma yin pa dor te/ yang dag par blang ba dag blangs na/ dkon mchog gsum gyi phyag rgyang ba la ral pa gcigs mnyes nas
163a6(rnying rgyud): dngos grupa thams cad dus 'dir dbub par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'anas dam tshig nyi shu rtse drug mnyams par byed 'ji gang zag de pho nya bdag gis bgyis te/ ji ste bdag gis ma bgyis na/ bdag kyang mgo a dza ka yi dog pa bzhin
163a7(rnying rgyud): tshul de ladun du lags pa dang / mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen por rtag tu 'gyur te/ sengs rgyas thams cad bdag gis bslus pa lags so// rnal 'byor dbang thug zem tsha la pa gcig pa'i rlung las/ ngamachog bstan da'i 'du gsum ngo //
163b1(rnying rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen mo ral pa gcig ma la/ bachod pa dbul ba'i thabs dag bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po 'di dag ni phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi khyad par te/ byang shang kyi ri rab kyi steng
163b2(rnying rgyud): yongs 'du'i shing la gnas pa/ gnod sbyin mo dam can gyi tshul du gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'khor mang po mthu che ba/ de rang bzhin gyi gnas nas bcug pa bstim pa dang / gnyis su med par bya ste mchod pa ni/ spyan drangs te mchod pa dang / 'dir
163b3(rnying rgyud): gas rjo / g+hu na / gas ya sa/ rna la ladun smra pa bathun gi sa / dkyi ga
163b4(rnying rgyud): ma rig mun ba sel ba'i rtags// lte ba'i dkyil nas hI shar bas// shes rab nyi mas sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skams// spyan ni skar chen shar ba 'dra// lhan rtsa dmar la thang mig can// phyag g.yas tshub ma pa snams pa ni// rlung dmar nang nas ral gi 'ab+h+rid//
163b5(rnying rgyud): mur mgyogs rdzu 'phrul 'gro ba'i rtags// g.yon pa'i ne'u le bsnams pa ni// mi mgo bcad nas sbed pa'i smod// yan lag bzhi ni bskum pa'i tshul// ma gcig thugs dam zhal zas snod// ma la b+han+d+ha bcud yangs pa'i// 'khor yug bcas pa'i 'jig
163b6(rnying rgyud): na ni// gsol lo rol cig dgyes par mdzod// ma gcig thugs dam zhal zas 'di// bsad pa'i sha dang myos pa'i chang // bcos pa'i sha dang khu ba khrag/ bsregs pa'i gsur dang rlon pa'i sha/ glo snying nang ro ya mkhal mar bcas// chu ma rkang dang rus pa dang /
163b7(rnying rgyud): dmar gyi a d+hi rgya mtshor bskyil// gsol lo rol lo dgyes par mdzod// du ru ro ru tsa pa la a shug me// sarba sha truM mAM sa tsit+ta go ro tsan kha ri khA hi/ mi dbang 'bras bu smin pa'i shachen dang / shi ka'i mtshab nyig dmar po dang / shing lo rlung khyer sa yang reg dang /
164a1(rnying rgyud): na chung gzhon pa'i byung tshad khrag/ mthun pa'i mchod pa bzhes par mdzod// de nas gtor ma gtang bar 'dod na// rtsa ba'i yig las srung brgyad nas// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs nas/ yaM las rlung dang / ra las ma/
164a2(rnying rgyud): dang / a las thod pa'i nang du/ dam tshig gi rdzas kyis bkang nas/ de nyid kyis sbyangs te/ gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa rol pa chen po'i tshul gyis dbul bar bya'o// me tog gi rnam pa dang / shing thog gi rnam pa dang / khur ba'i rnam pa dang / la
164a3(rnying rgyud): pa dang / bdug pa'i rnam pa dang / sha yi rnam grangs dang / sha chen po'i rnam grangs dang / khrag chen po'i rnam pa dang / 'o ma dang zho yi rnam grangs dang / de la sogs pa dag dus bzhi'i rgyun du brtson par bya'o// gdul bar bya ba gnod sbyin mo dam can mthu
164a4(rnying rgyud): yang dga' bar byed cing / de'i 'khor yang shin tu 'dul ba'i las byed pa dang / rnal 'byor ma gcig pur grub pa yang mnyes par 'gyur ro// de nas bsgrub pa'o// mchod pa dang gtor mas dngos grub ster bar byed do// rna ba 'byor ma gcig pu grub par
164a5(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ mchod pa dang gtor ma btang ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa'i tshul gyis lha'i dkyil 'khor ba skyed par bgyi ba ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ bya
164a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad chos nyid gnyis med skyong // de bas stong pa'i byang chub ni// kun rdzob rnams kyi sngon du 'gro// gzugs smras 'gro don bye ba'i phyir// sems nyid zla ba ltar bskyed pa// gdan de gzhi las byang chub yin// gang dag gsung gi gdul bya'i phyir// sa bon
164a7(rnying rgyud): rgyu ltar brtag pa ni// mngon par byang chub yi ge yin// dbang po rnon pos gdug pa yi// thugs kyi yang dag de myong bas// so so'i phyag mtshan de las 'byung // lus ngag yid gsum dngul cing na// sku gsung thugs su rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya ni// zhi
164b1(rnying rgyud): gnas sgrub phyir bstan pa yin// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' gsum gyi tshul du bsrub pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis// dag
164b2(rnying rgyud): gis sku gcig rdzogs pa ni// dam tshig nyid la sems dpa' yin// de grub gnas nas de 'dra ba// spyan drangs thugs kar zhugs pa ni// ye shes de la sems dpa' yin// de yi thugs kar teng 'dzin ni// sku gsung thugs kyi
164b3(rnying rgyud): gdan stengs su// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyal ba ni// gsung gi 'khor lo ting 'dzin sems// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo ral gcig ma'i chud las/ brtag pa'i bskyed rim bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas
164b4(rnying rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams med pas/ de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor mthong dar dka' ba lags na/ de dag gi don du bsod nams kyi tshogs bsag pa bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ gsang
164b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag po 'di lta ste// ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od zer las// 'phros nas dag pa gnyis byas bkug/ bsod nams kun gyi sna la 'gro/ ting nge 'dzin la phyag 'tshal ba// 'di ni bsod nams dang po yin// ye shes 'khor lo de nyid la// ting
164b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin mchod pa yan lag gnyis// bdag gzhan sdig der bshags pa ni// bsod nams de ni gsum pa yin// gzhan gyi dge la phrag dog med// rjes su yi rang dge ba'o// dam tshig de rnams yang dag la// dge ba bskul ba bsod nams
164b7(rnying rgyud): yin// mya ngan mi 'da' gsol ba ni// bskal pa bzang po'i smon lam yin// de dag dge ba gang byung yang // ma rig pa la bathos pa ni// yan lag bdun pa rdzogs pa yin// bsod nams tshogs kyi yan lag ni// slob dpon bla ma dag la bslab/
165a1(rnying rgyud): de bas theg pa chen por 'gyur// chos rnams thams cad sems pa yin// sems kyi byed pa med phyir thabs kyi rgya// phyag na rdo rjes gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ bsod nams de bsags pas/ ye shes pa
165a2(rnying rgyud): pa bstan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa// gsang ba'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ phyag 'tshal bas ye shes ni// maM long lta bu thob par 'gyur// mchod pa'i bsod nams chu las na// 'bras bu mnyam nyid ye shes skyed// bshags
165a3(rnying rgyud): pas stong nyid stong pa yi// stong nyid ye shes thob par 'gyur// rjes su yi rang bskul dang gsol// bya ba la yang nan tan gyi// ye shes thob par 'gyur ba yin// gsol ba btab pa'i khyad par gyis// chos kyi rgyal por bdag 'gyur nas// 'jig rten
165a4(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba 'dul ba'i zhing // rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po ral pa gcig pa'i rgyud las/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi bsgrub pa/ rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyud
165a5(rnying rgyud): 'di'i theg pa la brten nas/ lta ba ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ phyi rob kyi yul ni 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur par mi blta ba dang / dbyings rnam par dag par blta ba dang / rang bzhin gyi ba med pa la brten nas
165a6(rnying rgyud): sgyu ma tsam du yang skye ba med par mi blta ba dang / tshig tsam du yod kyang rtag pa ma yin par shes pa dang / bdag nyid kyi phung po mi gtsang ba dang / dman par mi blta ba dang / bud med shes rab kyi rang bzhin du blta ba dang / sems can rnams sems cad du
165a7(rnying rgyud): ma~M blta ba dang / sems can rnams ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas su blta ba dang / thag pa 'og ma dang / dman pa rnams pa mi gshe ba dang / theg pa 'og ma dang / dman pa rnams la snying rjeb ngalta ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams gzugs ca
165b1(rnying rgyud): mi blta ba dang / sgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems rtags kyi phyag rgyar blta ba dang / gnyis su brtags pa rnams sems can ma zad kyi bar du/ glu ma tsam du yod par blta ba dang / sems can gyi dug rnam par dag tsam nas/ tha skad kyang mi gnas par blta ba ni/
165b2(rnying rgyud): thun mong gi lta ba'o// gsang ba'i bdag po 'di'i khyad par gyi blta ba ni/ dpal ral pa gcig pa rnams gnod sbyin mor mi blta ba dang / dpal ral pa gcig ma gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje blta ba dang / gsang ba'i bdag po las dpal ral ba gcig mA byan
165b3(rnying rgyud): na yod par mi blta ba dang / dpal ral pa gcig ma rang gi sems de ltar byin gyis brlab par blta ba dang / dpal ral pa gcig ma'i gdul bya dpal ldan pong zhon ma gnod sbyin mor mi blta ba dang / dpal ldan pong zhon mas brgyad pa'i
165b4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpar blta ba dang / dpal ldan pong zhon ma'i 'khor ni byang chub sems dpar mi blta ba dang / dpal ldan pong zhon ma'i 'khor dregs pa bsod nams can du blta ba dang / dpal ldan ral pa gcag ma la brten nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
165b5(rnying rgyud): go 'phang thob par mi blta ba min pa dang / dpal ral pa gcig ma la brten nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i go 'phang dus lta ba dang / dam rdzas med kyang dam tshig mnyams pa/ sngags dang ting 'dzin yod pas bdag gis grub pa thob par 'gyur bar mi bltang
165b6(rnying rgyud): ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / sngags dang dam tshig ma nyams kyang dam rdzas med na dpal ngal gcig ma'i gdul bya/ byang shar gyi 'phags ma bong don ci 'khor gdug pa can bsod nams las grub pa rnams bdag pa mi dga' bas thun mong gi dngo grub rA ra
165b7(rnying rgyud): mi 'ong bar blta ba dang / chos 'di sa bu snod rigs kyi mchog/ tham tha rigs yin par mi bsdu ba dang / gsang ba'i 'dag do ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdu na du tshogs pa ba pa dang / mang dzinan mongs po gsod pa rab sa dang /
166a1(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs pa cung na ni kun mang gi mthus nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / tshul mi bying ba dang / gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang / rgan pa las gzhan par rus pa dang / gzhon pa nyid mi 'grar ba dang / tshe rang ba dang / ma la sags pa
166a2(rnying rgyud): sems can gsod par 'gyur ba dang / mi la sogs pa'i sems can sos par 'gyur ba dang / char pa dbab par nus pa dang / char la sogs pa gcad par nus pa dang / gzhan yang spang dkar med pa dang / gnyer ma yang nub ste sdum pa dang / shes
166a3(rnying rgyud): ba dang / gzhan gyis dbang byas pa'i rdzas mthong ba dang / sems can mthu bo che rnams dang dril yang mnyam pa las skrag pa'i tshul ston par nus pa la sogs pa yang gang zag cig nyon mongs pa chung ba'i mthu'i shugs kyis song bar gyur te/ 'di ltar blta bar bya/
166a4(rnying rgyud): napa 'byor chen mo rab pa gcig ma'i rgyud las/ thun mong dang khyad par gyi lte ba bstan pa nye le'u bdun pa'o// / de nas phyag na rdo rjes gas pa pa/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa 'di'i rdul 'byor gyi spyod pa ni/ ji ltar skad pa
166a5(rnying rgyud): ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po spyod pa ni 'jig ste/ dam chis bra zlogasubla med par rjong pa dang / darigs pa med pa dang / dga' 'a / nong pa dang / rked nga chen po dang / shaphral longs spong bdang /
166a6(rnying rgyud): phyag la mkhas pa dang / 'jigs pa'i stabs kyis skabs la mkhas pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lus la mkhas pa dang / thebs dang shes rab kyi spong pa la mkhas pa dang / bro gar la mkhas pa dang / 'du 'gro la mkhas pa dang / gru la mkhas pa dang / gang /
166a7(rnying rgyud): la mkhas pa dang / mtshad pal gosas pa ni kun mdzeg spyod pam no// khyad par gyi spyod lamani/ drar khrod na drag pa dang / gcen tha pa dang / bodagra can chags don dus pa dang / ribartson pa dang / gcer bur byung ba dang / sa ma ya yi sgral mkhas
166b1(rnying rgyud): pa dang / ma dbang me mar du bltam ste 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / bskor ba dang / zhing gi pags pa rtson pa dang / rma bya'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa dang / dung chen 'bud pa dang / rus pa'i phreng ba 'dren pa dang / dpal ral ba gcig ma dang / 'phags
166b2(rnying rgyud): bong zhon ma gnyis su med par mchod pa la brtson pa dang / khra bo'i ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pas 'khor 'dul la mkhas pa dang / tshil chen gyi me mar 'bul ba dang / sha chen gyi lha bshos 'bul ba dang / khrag chen po'i ak+ka 'bul ba dang / bdun
166b3(rnying rgyud): bri zab 'bul ba dang / sha chen po'i bdug pa 'bul ba dang / dbang po rnams kyi me tog 'bul ba dang / lci ba la zhi ba'i spyod lam shes pa dang / rgyas pa la rgyas pa'i spyod lam shes pa dang / dbang la dbang gi lhod lam shes pa dang / 'dug pa'i khyod
166b4(rnying rgyud): lam shes pa dang / nyal ba'i spyod la ma shes pa dang / 'gro ba'i spyod lam shes pa dang / ngal gso ba'i spyod lam shes pa dang / bza' ba'i spyod lam shes pa dang / gshang gci ba'i spyod lam shes pa dang / btang ba'i spyod lam la sogs pa ni/ khyad
166b5(rnying rgyud): par gyi spyod lam de thams cad lha'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang / sems dpa' gsum gyi tshul gyis bsgrub par bya'o// rnal 'byor ma dbang phyug chen mo ral gcig ma'i rgyud las/ spyod lam bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das
166b6(rnying rgyud): dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba mang po dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pas/ sngags 'chang dang rig 'dzin rnams kyi skyabs dang rten du gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dras pa'i lam du bsdu ba/ bdud dang srin po la so zla pa sreg par byed pa/
166b7(rnying rgyud): rang gi sems zhi bar nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur pa/ mthuthams cad 'byung ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po 'di ni zab pa/ chu che ba/ 'jigs pa/ skrag pa/ mi thug par 'alta 'ong med
167a1(rnying rgyud): 'phrul par byed pa/ mi gdung bar nyan par byed pa'i rna ba gcod par byed pa/ mi dga' bar zad pa'i snga srabs par byed pa/ mi skrag par byed pa'i lus rengs par byed pa/ ma 'os pa brjod pang gyi chad par byed pa/ lag+sa
167a2(rnying rgyud): snying dgas par byed pa/ bar du gcod pa thams cad thag ring du bskyod pa/ bsod nams gso bar byed pa/ smyon pa rnams dran pa rnyed par byed pa'i mthu chen po/ nyon cig rab tu nyon cig yang dag par nyon cig/ shin tu yang dag par nyon cig/ oM ru ma 'o
167a3(rnying rgyud): shug me hUM b+ho dza dzaH// ye shes lnga dang yang dag ldan// kau rI la sogs brgyad dang ldan// de yi stobs ni/ sa brgyad phyag rgya dpal ldan yin// ma bdun a shug me dang ldan// dkyil 'khor sgo la yang dag tshang // dbang phyug nyi shu brtsad dang /
167a4(rnying rgyud): dang pos lha rnams spyan drangs te// gnyis pas bsgrub bya dgug pa yin// bco lnga sngags kyi phreng ba yin// ming chen dang po ye shes dag/ mgo la yod pas mgo can yin// rnam par snang mdzad hUM dang ldan// ru ru srin me'i tshul gyis 'joms//
167a5(rnying rgyud): srin mo khyad par ni// tsa ba la zhes bsgrub bya'i ming // a shug me ni ma bdun dang // hU~M ni dkyil 'khor bcu phyir brko// phyo zhes dbang mo las la bsul/ de nas dza lis yang dag 'gugs// de nas dzaHyis bsrub bya dgug/ bco rdza sngag kyi phreng ba ni// rgyal ba rnam kyis byin
167a6(rnying rgyud): sa brlabs// 'dis ni zhi gnas thob par byed// de bzhin lhag mthong skye bar nus// 'dis ni bsod nams 'phel bar byed// de la ye shes rnams kyang tshang // 'di ni de bzhin cu zhes bya// gang zhig 'di la 'bras bu 'dod// de phyir de ni 'bras bu'o//
167a7(rnying rgyud): rten na las kyang 'grub// phyag na rdo rjes gso pa/ bcom ldan das gsang sngags 'di 'bras pa'i thabs kyi sems dpa' gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das cig gsungs pa/ bdag nyid dam chog rdzogs pa'i sgra// thabs dang shes rab ldan
167b1(rnying rgyud): thos pa// dgra yo zang mnob d+ha nga nas// pang na thags ma thag tugags// rnal gcig cagaganyis rab tu shis// rang bzhin gnas nas dngag dang gcu/ gnyis med 'a ba smra sa nas kyang // na cipa stod kau / nam nga na ma pa 'bab
167b2(rnying rgyud): mtha' ma sngags kyis bskor ba'o// bzhi 'bum bton na las rnams byed// khri phrag las ni dngos grub 'byung // bye ba dag gis tshad dang ldan// man ngag can gyis yang ston// skyon du ston dang lus ston 'gyur// gang zhig dung phyur rdzogs pa ni// sbyin pas
167b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi lhan nub ste// zab mo sbyor ba rdzogs nas kyang // rin chen zhing der song ba yin// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mor la gcig ma'i rgyud las/ gsang sngags dngos grub kun gyi 'khor lo bstan pa ste le'u dgu pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
167b4(rnying rgyud): kyi tshul gyis dngos grub thob pa dang mi thob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po dngos grub thob pa'i tshul ni/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'i khungs byung ba dang / slob dpon man ngag can gyi gdams ngaganod pa dang/
167b5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig bsrung mtshams yal par mi dor ba dang / yid ches pa'i dad pa yod pa dang / brtson 'grus che ba dang / gtong phod pa dang / zab mo'i lta ba shes pa dang / rgya che ba'i spyod pa shes pa dang / mthun pa'i dmA rmo s+ya dang mi 'bral ba dang / sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga
167b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa dang / yid dam gyi lha mi spong ba dang / snying rje'i sems yod pa dang / spyod lam gyi ting nge 'dzin mi brjed pa dang / dgon pa la brten pa dang / sems pa dang / gsang thub pa dang / cho ga shes pa dang / sems can gyi srog mi gcod pa dang /
167b7(rnying rgyud): bdug pa la dga' ba dang / 'jigs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas la che chung mi 'dzin pa la sogs pa dang ldan na/ nam yang dngos grub thob zin pa yin no// de dag dang mi ldan na rnams ca dngos grub thams cad mi thob bo// rnal bgyor dbang phyug chen mo la
168a1(rnying rgyud): gcig ma'i rgyud las/ dngos gung thob pa'i tshul bstanang ste le'u bcu pa'o// / de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ dpal ral gcig ma'i phyag cha na ma gu ma la mngon par bstan pa/ nam gu khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni/
168a2(rnying rgyud): bzang bdag gis bshad par bya// nor bu'i rang bzhin khyod kyi lus// rgya ba ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser// khyod kyi gdong ni dngul yin te// lto ba'i phyogs ni rdo rjer mkhregs// ming po mdzad dang mdzod gsungs gnyis// khyod kyi pha ni rlung zhes bya//
168a3(rnying rgyud): kyi sa ni kun slol ma// skal ldan shing rta khyod kyi lus// ba ra hi sti khyod kyi lus// lha yul dag tu grags pa yin// na moHbadz+ra ni s+yai/ dzi li dzi li/ bin+d+ha bin+ta/ muny+dza mu lpa/ hi b+ha la/ sha na swA hA/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/
168a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i sngags 'di la brten nas las phra mo'i dngos grub thob pa ji thabs ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ phyag na rdo rje 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags 'dis zhi ba'i las 'grub par 'dod na/ maN+Dal dkar sa zlum par bya ste/ me tog dkar po
168a5(rnying rgyud): la sogs pas mchod cing / lha yang dkar mo sprul ba'i pho nya/ zhi ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan par bsgom na/ las thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing / zhi ba'i las phra mo 'dzub par 'gyur ro// rgyas pa'i las 'grub par 'dod na/ maN+Dal ser po gru
168a6(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa bya ste/ me tog ser po la sogs pas mchod cing / lha yang ser mo chen mo mkha' la bzhad pa/ rgyas pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par bsgom na/ las thams cad rgyas par 'gyur zhing / rgyas pa'i phrin las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//
168a7(rnying rgyud): dang dgi pas thams cad 'grub par 'dod na/ maN+Dal zla ga ma dmar por bya ste/ me tog dmar po la sogs pas mchod cing / lha yang dmar mo chen mo dbang chen gtum pa mo/ dbang gi rgyan gyis brgyan par bsgom pa/ las thams cad dbang du
168b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur zhing / dbang gilas tha ma grub par 'gyur ro// dag pa las ma ma grub par 'ad na/ maN+Dal nag bcu gsum pa'i 'og tu thod pa gsum dang ldan par 'gyur te/ mad+hag nag pa la mags pas mchad stong / g+ha yang nag ma tshon ma bya
168b2(rnying rgyud): gcig mjag po'i rgyan gyis brgyan par bsgom na/ las thams cad drag por 'gyur zhing / drag po'i las phra mo 'grub par 'gyur ro// de dag gi sngags kyi sha mthu naM/ dza/ pradz+ra~M ga rba/ pa sha~M sarba/ sbyar ya/ zhes brjod 'a
168b3(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyi thun mong gI las su tha'o// gzhan yang dgrag par 'dod pas/ che ge mo A karga ya b+h+rUM/ zhes par du bcug ste/ dbang du 'gyur ba'i yan lag go// bskrad par 'dod na rlung gi rnga mo du pa'i steng du bsrub bya bston nas/ che ge mong
168b4(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod par bya'o// gnan paza par 'dod na/ rdo la ba la ri rab sdi gzugs ji'og tu bad+hU ba tha'i ming dus gzugs dang ldan pa/ gser gyis gzhi gang na bzhag nas/ che ge mo la na daM/ zhes bslab par bya'o// seMn pa sreg
168b5(rnying rgyud): bla bar 'dad na/ drag po'i rdzas la sngags dang mi dkyang ri ldan par bya ste/ mar bor ba dang / cho ga~M ma b+ha la khA hi/ zhes brjod par bye'o// dbye bar 'dod na/ thag pa dang ca rag gi khrag gis bsgrib pa'i gzugs byas pa/ skyo gnyis la
168b6(rnying rgyud): sngags bzlas pa/ mA rA sa mar ya phaT/ rgyas tha ba'i sngags kyi shAm tha dang ldan par byas te/ slob dbapas nye ba mkhon cing sur du dbya bar 'gyur te/ yul gzhan du yang 'thab par 'byung ngo // kye 'dul bar 'ad da na/ gang gdon gyis rdu
168b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i skye pa/ sngags kyi mdzad pas btags te bzang la chags par migacod par gleng ba di na pa dang na pa gtod nacan pa yang dang yang brtan par // tshigag cad par 'dun/ yul gang tsam bzung bar 'dod pa'i bring nas/ gang da
169a1(rnying rgyud): hA/ grangs te/ yang dang yang du sbyin pa zlog byas na/ sbyin batheg gi rdzas gang nas 'dus pa rnams srung srid du cag 'byung bar mi bgyur ro// rnal 'an bang drug can mar lagaci sgyu ma'i chud pas/ pas ma ma 'grub par
169a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i li'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lus dag sems bden pa'i thabs dang / rlung ni gang lags/ gsang ba'i bdag po 'di lta ste// oM zhes bya ba 'jug pa'i rlung // AHzhes bya
169a3(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i rlung // hU~M zhes bya ba 'byung ba'i rlung // 'jug pa de ni gang du'o// de nas gnas pa nang du gnas// de nas 'byung ba phyir yang 'byung // nang gi snying ga'i dkyil na yod// gnas pa de nyid nam mkha' rgyang // yul 'gro ba ni phyi rol yin//
169a4(rnying rgyud): oM zhes bya ba ser po ste// AHni dmar por bshad pa yin// hU~M ni dkar por gyur pa'o// AHni nyon mongs gyur pa yin// de ni hUM gi mtshan mar gnas// oM ni de la tshang ba yin// ser po rnam par snang mdzad dang // dmar po snang ba mtha' yas
169a5(rnying rgyud): ldan// dkar po mi bskyod yang dag yin// dmar po de 'dra shes rab ste// dkar po yang ni thabs kyi rgya// g.yas kyi rtsa ni la la nA// g.yon gyi gnas pa ra sa nA// a wa d+hU ti dbus na yod // sdang mdzad bdag gi lus kyi rtsa// sdang ba mtha'
169a6(rnying rgyud): yas ngag gi rgya// ma skyong de ni sems kyi rgya// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya yin// sgyu ma tsam du cir yang sdud// gdod byas rnam rtog ma yin te// ye nas gnas pa shes bya yi// dbugs dang rtsa yi sbyor ba las/
169a7(rnying rgyud): la zhi bar rnam spangs nas// rdzogs pa 'dod phyir bskyed pa ste// rnal 'byor cho ga gsum po yin// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo ral gcig ma'i rgyud las/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa bskyed pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//
169b1(rnying rgyud): de nas cag nang dus gsalapa// bcom ldan 'das dbang pa rnon pa rnams canan sa dgas 'a'aros pa bstan gas pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsangs pa/ klasang pa bdag pa 'ad sgyun// ga nan mas nag nas pacas// rngam
169b2(rnying rgyud): bcol brdal tsam med// m+b+hi lakhrul bas gnyis swA // don ngas pan la snang ba rjed// gang du chags pa bskyed bdang // bskyed pal sogs bsnyad pa ni// dbang po rnamapa ga la hrI// dang pe do bye na gnas ldan/
169b3(rnying rgyud): tshadags la snying ka mye ky-ipa 'amar na// 'gyur ba med cing shes pa spangs// har maud la zhes grags pa// nam mkha'i de nyid rang la yod// 'di gar khyab byed maHshis bya// rdeg dan rgyu na na// ma shi pa da gas pa// thab cig gami
169b4(rnying rgyud): dral byin// stong nyid mtshan med smon pa man// chos rnams tsam du snang bayin// 'ding bas mdzad yin 'di gnas// 'dags pa 'dir de ny-id na dza// rnapa byang dang chug can mar ma gcig mang tha mas/ rdzogs
169b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phug chen mo'i rjes su rdul 'byor gyi spyod yul du ma gyur pa/ rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor kyi tshad bstan pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o// / e ka tsa ti ra la gcig ma'i rgyud las rtse ba'i rgyud chen mo rdzogs
169b6(rnying rgyud): so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'od gsal nyid ji ltar lags/ snying rje zhes zla ba ji ltar lags/ de'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar 'gas// mi 'gyur ba nyid ji ltar lags// nyes pa med pa ci yi phyid// d+ha ra mod
169b7(rnying rgyud): ma sa byung nas// / mig sang 'dun/ shi nibang
170a1(rnying rgyud): phra mo yang ni ji ltar lags// ji ltar zab mor gsungs pa lags// gcig dang dra ma ji ltar lags// stong pa nyid ni ji ltar lags// mtshan ma med pa ji ltar lags// smon pa med pa ji ltar lags/
170a2(rnying rgyud): sa rtag bgyi ba ji ltar lags// 'dir bsam 'di nyid gang gi lags// 'di yin gsungs pa ji ltar lags// 'di na gnas pa gang dang gang // 'od gsal ba ni ji ltar lags// de nyid gsungs pa ji ltar lags// de kho na yang ji ltar lags
170a3(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje he ru kas gsang ba'i bdag po la 'di skad ces gsungs so// rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes ni// rang la snang bas 'od gsal yin// chos rnams brten pa'i dran pa ni// snying rje zhes bya yin par bshad// de yi
170a4(rnying rgyud): dbus na rang bzhin stong pa ni// 'gro ba rnams kyis mi shes pa// ci yang med pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// de ni thog ma tha ma'i bar// mi 'gyur gnas pas 'gyur ba med// de la chos can rnam rtog gis// bslad nas nyes pa med pa ni// de nyid nyes
170a5(rnying rgyud): pa med pa yin// chos can 'byung ba'i gnas yin pas// d+ha rmod ya dbyings kyi don// de nyid ngo bo nam mkha' yin// brjod pa rnams la gnas pa yin// brjod med khyab byed a ni gzugs dang mdog/ yi ge rnams dang bral ba ni// don ni skye
170a6(rnying rgyud): med stong pa yin// de ni ye nas gnas pa yi// don de shes pas ye shes yin// de phyir de shes shes pa la// yang dag pa zhes btags pa yin// yang dag de yi ngo bo ni// kun tu zhi bar gyur pa yin// don de brtag par dkara' phyir dang /
170a7(rnying rgyud): phra mor gyur pas phra ba yin// de phyir de la zab ces bya// sems kyi spyod yul yin phyir ro// sems pa gcig dang du ma med// de yi phyir na grangs las 'das// gcig dang du ma spangs pa yis// gcig dang du ma rnams spangs
170b1(rnying rgyud): pa// stong pa nyid ces de la bya// de la dngos po'i chos med pa// de phyir mtshan ma med pa yin// mtshan ma med pa de nyid la// smon pa me dgos rang la yod// de phyir smon pa med pa yin// de ni grags ma rang bzhin te//
170b2(rnying rgyud): rnam par thar pa gsum pa yin// chos de mtshon pa'i rtags pa ni// de phyir chos rtag phyag rgya yin// dus gsum d+harma de dbus pa// 'dir bsam pas na bsam pa che// bsam pa med pa'i phyag rgya yin// de ltar bsam pa de nyid ni// slo
170b3(rnying rgyud): dang bral bas de nyid yin// spos dang bral bde ba ni// gnas pa nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// de bas 'od gsal zhes brjod de// 'gro ba kun gyi rang bzhin gnas// phyin ci log tu rnam brtag kyang // dgro ba'i rang bzhin de pas yin// de yi phyir na rtsa
170b4(rnying rgyud): pa dang // 'khrul ba mnyam par de nyid gcig/ de pa gang zhig mabs ldan pa'i// so so rang rig ting 'dzin gyis// nam mkha'i dkyil ltar chos mthong ste// gnyis su med pa de kho na// rdzogs pa'i rdzog pa mkhas pa'i rgya// rdzogs pa chen po dpapa dang ldan
170b5(rnying rgyud): snying gi nam mkha' rang la yod// de nas phyag na rno rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos zab mo yang dag padza da na/ thun mong ma yin pa bdag pa bstan pa de mtshar to// bdag gis kyang mngongs pa na/ thun mong ma yin pa rnams pa bstan par bgyi'o// bcomaldan
170b6(rnying rgyud): 'das kyis gsungs pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po/ chos chen po 'di 'dzam ze gling du skyes pa/ mkha' 'gro ma'i zug rgya yod pa/ tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin thob ste/ bram ze mchog seng ces tha ma/ sman gyis grub pa'i sal 'gro ba/ de'i lag tu 'brang bung
170b7(rnying rgyud): dgyur te/ khyod kyis zung la chongs shig/ sdod ma dag pa rnams kyi rgyud byung bar gyis shig/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo ral gcig ma'i chud pas/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa phye ma ste la dra bcwa bzhi pa'o// / rdzogs so//
171a1(rnying rgyud): zlag gad du/ lekA// rnam pas nam/ bad skrad du/ med pa'i bam zhes byab/ rgya nag dang / bde da dang srung 'dud/ da spyad du/ sdod pa na nas chen po smrab/ 'a thang nadang / mul sangs bdu na
171a2(rnying rgyud): ya sangs/ bod skad du/ srid pa'i ha sa zhes bya/ bcom ldan 'das he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon 'di skad thos pa'i dus gcig na/ rang snang gi dngos po ni rigs lnga/ 'byung ba lnga ni yum lnga ru snang ba las/ srid pa'i cham la dbab pa'i
171a3(rnying rgyud): smos bdag/ srid pa'i rgyal mo 'khor lo rten cing 'bel bar dbyung bas thams cad sdud pa las/ de'i thugs ka nas skos bdag chen po brgyad skul nas 'jig rten cham la phab ste gnas pa ni/ nag po 'dzum med dang / thom po yong po gnyis srid pa byang du bskos/
171a4(rnying rgyud): skos rje drang dkar dang / thod pa'i bring ba gnyis shar gyi sgos bdag tu bskos/ yagra de wa dang / yag+na kro ta gnyis nub kyi sgos bdag tu bskos/ 'khor lo bcu gnyis pa dang / yab rje nag po gnyis byang gi skos bdag du bskos/ de thams cad kyang
171a5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra he ru ka'i sku pa 'khril ba'o// bdud de rnams kyis skos btab pas/ nam mkha' dang gling bzhi ri rab tu bcas pas kun tu gang bas khyab pa ni/ ri rab khri daphang bzhi pa/ bang rim dang bcas pa ni/ dpag bsam gyi shing la brten pas yang dpag tshad bzhi khri
171a6(rnying rgyud): mar dpag tshad bzhi khri ste/ brgyad khri ni thams cad 'gro 'i gla drug gi brten pa ste/ 'og gi bzhi khri ni ngan song gi gnas gsum mo// steng gi bzhi khri ni mtho ris kyi gnas so// gser gyi ri bdun ni rol pa'i mtsho dang 'brel pas nam mkha' pa yang mun sel gyi glog 'gu
171a7(rnying rgyud): de la 'dzam bu gling bzhi ma bzhi brten te/ gling bzhi'i bya bas mi mthun pa dang / sprad pa dang bskyed pa dang / kha dog kyang mi mthun pa yin no// der ni rab ni srid pa'i rgyal mo'i stob ste/ de la ni rten 'phel bcu gnyis dang / dus gsum dang / lha ma yin gyi g.yul
171b1(rnying rgyud): nga da dang/ dma'i gas drugag zo gyum dgas gas sa du dang / phyag sa zug gapas ga gnyis nas sa/ gsus sa mchog ta bachu sa gnas dpa/ ro kyang 'dru/ blang zhis
171b2(rnying rgyud): rgya mtsho yang dakhrugs pa las/ 'jig rten stongs la khad nas/ badz+ra hi rbakaShi dgongs pa la 'di la ting nge 'dzin gyi gzer gcig ma btab na 'jig rten gongs par dgongs pas zil gnon gyi phyag rgya bcas nas skra lte ba min chad bsgrubs te/ mo'i b+ha ga la sleb par byas so//
171b3(rnying rgyud): do rirab kyi zung bzhi'i lcogs chen po gnas pa pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa bzhin de dang pon chen po bzhi gnas so// lha bded dpon na khor lo bcu gnyis pa padan dkar po bsnams pa/ she' khrab dang / shel chog gsol pa/ chibs sra ba na grang dkar po gser gyi
171b4(rnying rgyud): sgra tshul/ dar gyi sna thag can bcings pa'o// lha bran dang bcas bdun bdun gyis g.yog byas pa'o// lha ma yin gyi ded dpon ni/ bse khra ba dang bse rmog gsol ba/ lha ma yin gyi g.yog bdun gyis bskor te ber nag can bdun no// bdud dang gnod sbyin
171b5(rnying rgyud): myod da dpon ni zangs kyi 'phar ba la zhon pa/ sbyod zangs pa smad lcags kyi khrab dang / lcags mog gso ba/ 'khod mang pos bskyor ba 'apo rnams dam nag tung drag pas bskor ba/ mamo'i ded dpon ni su phrag yu ba dang ga su mog gsol pa/ dar mgu rkye
171b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdan bskams pa/ zangs ma mo ge ring la zhon pa byang shar la gnas pas so so nas 'dral lo// lha ma yin ni bad na dkar po lce dmar pa'o// bdud dang gnod srin ni dar sna lnga'i bdan no// phyogs kyi rgyal rgyal mtshon bzhir gnas te/ stag dang garig dang bu nod dang
171b7(rnying rgyud): mabyang rgyal mtshan gnas so// den dag pa'i tshal la sogs pa pa'ini dres pa tsal dul ba zang/ de rin zhing 'ongs 'dus pato gnas yon/ migs dang ldan pa'o// de na ma srid pa'i rgya blo / badz+ra na rdzogs brgyan pa gzhal
172a1(rnying rgyud): yas bdag ser gyi 'khor lo 'od 'bar blta ba kha dog sna tshogs pa mdzes pas brgyan la mu khyud dkar po dang bu chad ldang su/ bar khyams ni shar dkar ba/ lto baDUr ma sdong po/ nub gAg dmar po/ brang 'i la ldang
172a2(rnying rgyud): ku de'i phyi rim na sgo snam dang / sgo khyud drag po lcags kyis byas pa/ gru gsum sum brtsegs ni nag po dmar po ser po'o// yon tan sna tshogs dang ldan pa gser gyi 'khor los byas so// de rgya ma chad pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// thod pa skam rlon gyi rtsigs pas
172a3(rnying rgyud): brtun par byas pa/ do thams cad khrag gi zham chu 'bab pa/ ngur khrod kyi ci spyad mang po khrag la stod cing 'thung ba/ keng rus dang sha khrag mang po ri rab tsam srungs pa/ zhing chen gyi rgyal mtshan dang 'phan gdugs dang bla res bres pa/ kang ka la sogs te/ rngar
172a4(rnying rgyud): bya'i tshogs mang po yang lding ba/ gnod sbyin pho mo mang po 'dub/ nyi zla'i mthongs khung dang / gza' chen po brgyad kyi ka zhu dang / zhing smug po'i ka ba dang / dar nag gi lnga ldi dang / phel ka che chung dang / mchog phran gyi gral byam dang / rgyan sna tshog
172a5(rnying rgyud): kyis brgyan pa'i gnas na bcom ldan 'das badz+ra he ru ka rang lum srid pa'i rgyal mo la/ gnod sbyin po mo mar pos bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/ dbyings kyi yum jug la/ bde ba cha snyoms ma yid kyi rtsa las bskyed pa dang / yid bong rgyal mo b+hag sems kyi rtsa las bskyed pa dang /
172a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba tshor byed ma nyon mongs pa'i rtsa las bskyed pa dang / 'gro ba sgrol byed ma mkha' lding gi rtsa las bskyed pa dang / thod byed kyi rtsa las yid 'phrog ma bskyed pa dang / sdom byed kyi rtsa las chags byed rgyal mong skyed pa dang / drug ni dbyings kyi yum drug ces bya'o//
172a7(rnying rgyud): yum drug ces pa ni/ ma mo thams cad de drug las bskyed pas yum jug ces bya'o// srid pa bde 'grom bde bacha snyoms ma yid las bskyed pas rtags su 'khor lo dang byad+hA bsdams pa'o// yid 'od rgyal po'i sems las rnam snang gsal bskyed pas/ 'byung ba nam
172b1(rnying rgyud): mkha' la dbang byed pa'o// 'khor lo tshimu byed ma'i nyon mongs pa'i rtsa las bkrag gsal 'bang bskyed pas/ 'byung bas la dbang bsgyur ba dang / 'gro ba sgrol byed ma'i mig gi rnam shes las 'od gsal 'bar bskyed pas/ 'byung ba me la dbang bsgyur ba'o//
172b2(rnying rgyud): yid 'phrog ma'i na ba'i rnam shes las gnyen gas la 'bar bskyed pa las/ 'byung ba chu la dbang bsgyur ba dang / chags byed rgyal mo'i sde'i rnam shes las yang gsal g.yos bskyed pas/ 'byung ba drung la dbang bskur ba'o// de yang dbyings kyi yum drug ma dpa'
172b3(rnying rgyud): pos ming gi dbang bsgyur ba ni/ dga' ba'i me tog mdangs ldan ma zhes bde ba cha snyoms ma la dbang ba'o// yid 'ong ma la rin chen lcug ma zhes bya'o// 'khor lo tshims byed mal 'bar ma 'od chags ma zhes dbang bskur ro// 'gro ba sgrol byed ma la ri rab brjid ldan ma zhes dbang ba
172b4(rnying rgyud): yid 'phrog ma la 'khor ba chags pas tshim mdzad ma zhes btags/ chags byed ma la rgyal mo kun bskyed ma zhes ming gi dbang bskur ro// dbyings kyi yum drug po de ni dbu gsum gsum ste/ dga' ba'i me tog ma zhal dbus ser g.yas dkar g.yon ljang
172b5(rnying rgyud): nag go// rin chen lcug ma'i dbus sngo g.yas ser g.yon dmar/ 'bar ba'i 'od chags ma'i zhal dbus rAg g.yas mthing ga g.yon dmar/ ri rab brjid ldan ma ni dbus dkar g.yas ser g.yon dmar/ 'khor ba chags pas tshim mdzad ma ni/ zhal dbus
172b6(rnying rgyud): sbeng / sa dam ga 'on dashing/ chags byed rgyal yon gal dadus me dag yas dag g.yon na ming 'dishA pa/ de zu ga ga las dang 'dug na mA ga gis bgang ba rje sa pa'o// g.yon gyi dang po kun na da dag gi du mtshon bya bang // ba ma tham na tshogs kyi
172b7(rnying rgyud): mtshon rnga phyar ba'o// rtag pa'i rgyal mo drug kyang dbu gsum gsum mo// phyag mtshan sku mdog kun gzhung dang mthun/ rtag pa'i rgyal madrug ni rnam rna gas la ni 'gro ba'i sems la dbang gyur/ bklag gsal babar ni sha la dbang sbyar/ gnyen gsal dbang
173a1(rnying rgyud): ni 'gro ba'i zug la dbang sbyar/ 'od gas lang bar ni 'grong 'drod la bar myur/ yang gas la g.yos ni 'gro ba'i dbugs la dbang spyad/ srid pa pa da rdzun 'gro ba'i mdangs pa dbang sbyar/ bskyed pa'i khyo bor drug du/
173a2(rnying rgyud): mo// cir mi 'ong ba'i kun dug yin/ zhes gco mo dru gsum pol bya'o// de dmas ni gtso ma'i dathong ngo // de nas pa 'i ma dang po lanin pa 'byor ma pa 'i thos pa'i ma bzhi 'u byed byas pa'i me zhe dang / nyinatho cing / phra mo rgya mtsho rnam zhing /
173a3(rnying rgyud): gsum mo// gzhan zhal gcig zug gnyis sa// ki b+hu stong gi thod phreng ni zhal dbus dkar g.yon sngog yas ser/ phyag drug gi dang po na thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams pa/ par ma na gser gyi 'khor lo/ tha ma na ga yung gzhu/ phyagag/ yon dang na
173a4(rnying rgyud): par man ga yukhra/ tha man k+Sha ma'i zhags pa bsnams pa'o// phra men rgya mtsho dbus sna tshogs kyi zhal g.yas dkar g.yon dmar/ g.yas dang po na du d+he dkar po khrag gis bkang ba/ bar ma zhing gi ru mtshon/ thu mne'u lo rgyal pa/ g.yon dang pon
173a5(rnying rgyud): tera'i dbyug pa/ bar man srul nag gi ru mtshon/ tha ma na lcags kyu bsdams pa'o// de ni rnal 'byor ma bcu bzhi'i 'khor ro// srid pa'i sman mo'i 'khor ni/ ma mo bdun dang / sring mo bzhi dang / rgyas 'debs bzhi dang / dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi dang /
173a6(rnying rgyud): e ka dza Ti sun drug dang / gru 'degs bzhi dang / bya ba mo dang byed pa mo gnyis dang / dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyang dang / de ltar shar gyi dkar mo shel gyi bu mthogs ma shel gyi khang pa na gnas pa/ de ni khri 'phang yang 'phags mang nub kyi rtsa la gnas pa'o//
173a7(rnying rgyud): na mo 'i Ti bye'i bu mthogs ma bzhi tu Sh+ya'i bang pa na gnas pa'o// nub na dmar mo bye 'u'i bum pa rdzogs pa bzhi gnas so// byang ngan ser chogaser ci dmang thogs pa pa zhi gnas te/ phyogs bzhi sring mo bzhi ba ni yin/ rgya mor chug ce bu'o// lcag
173b1(rnying rgyud): ngadu gyu / / dag man ta nga 'das// tsugs// ga rnam na/ dang nag das// rnamamams da kyilas gas
173b2(rnying rgyud): 'i ma dzinan// dbas 'byeng sa dpa sgyu // ga sa du mami ma / bdag tu' dang btu byung myig kyi ba kyi kyis mas mi min 'a/ de mthan myong 'ang sa
173b3(rnying rgyud): gang 'di ba / pa ji na ga ma migs pan kyi bya ma// 'a phyin pa da
173b4(rnying rgyud): zhed/ nagasong po na la grus pa dza po namamo// mngon mi ni dang / ga dang / nyid bdag pon ga gyu gi yang de/ bshas ma dang / da/ mi chen du ma tshogs sngal pa
173b5(rnying rgyud): nga/ dang gam bya ma sa bya mas// ma pa du ga mi
173b6(rnying rgyud): ba tas cu 'acug // rangs ci gdug pa'i gyungan/ sa kyi sabadu gnyisasu tshong pa'i sa byadang / ga / drags zhi ngas su 'ang za
174a1(rnying rgyud): mnims kyi dbyings yin te// moni rig pa'i ye shes yin// chos kyi spa thams cad rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// ma masrid pa'i 'amapas/ gleng gagi gas su nyi 'a / sa yang du
174a2(rnying rgyud): rung gis 'di skad gsol to// yab cig 'jig rten 'joms pa'i lha/ sgos bdag brgyad po ji ltar legs// srid pacha ma 'ji ltar dbab// yab cig dag la bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol pas bka' bral pa/ rje da
174a3(rnying rgyud): grogs 'argyad// srid pa pyod zlog ma dros kyi sgos// shar lho ru 'byang phyogs bzhin sa// 'dod pa'i rdzas rnams skos kyis 'grems// bka' blon sgom thams cad byed// ma mo rnams kyi mngag gzhug yin// srid pa cham yang bab pa yis/
174a4(rnying rgyud): men ga/ yul ngo ba zlog pa ste// srid pa'i'i rab bcas nas ni// steng du srid pa'i rgyal mo'i zhal// gzhung dang mthun par byung bar bya// dbyings kyi yum drug gzhung bzhin // yang nagasang phye dgal gyi// spug nag sngonag ldang nag tug/ gzhung dang /
174a5(rnying rgyud): mthun pa bri bar bya// dri nas bskad rdzas bsngag pa ni// gzugs mdzes bring ma 'bur du btod// mkha' lding rgyal po shang shang dug// rigs dang 'dog mtshungs par bya// khyung chen druka dang mdangs ldan cha ba drug/ de bzhin mdzes par btsun mo drug/
174a6(rnying rgyud): drug dang skyes pajug/ rigs dang mthun par bris pa drug/ sna tshogs dang kyis brgyan nas kyang // gtso ma drug ni nyung la brtson// gyes padrug ni gnor la// sug gcig zas kyi 'ug la brtson// rgyal mo drug ni 'khor dang 'acas// 'gye bka
174a7(rnying rgyud): bcas te gling chen drug la 'askyon// dbyings kyi yum la dbul bar bya// shing nges drug ni tshogs mdzes pa byin gyis byud// rigs dang 'thun nyi mdzes par gyon gyis rgyu// gnyis paM hwags rgyal po shi 'drug/ bud med drug kyang bri bar bya// byadang
174b1(rnying rgyud): rgyud du byas thos// mang tsun su can pa jugacad pa// b+habyug gasmang snyan dug dang dpag bsas shing yod ldan// mdzes pa'i da pol ba yin// chog pa dadus su rgyas thug pa'i nga jug/ sa kyi da /
174b2(rnying rgyud): bye'i b+h+yo ladongs kyis brgyan// maung gas dang mthun 'jug/ rdzogs dang gyis brgyan par bya// gco mo dri nam me kun rgya zhal// drug la khong ba nag pa skye// ser po sngon po dkar po sa// bu rgyags da kyis btsunan sa kyang /
174b3(rnying rgyud): yis brgyan par bya// mangs pa'i yum lung sbrel bar bya// 'di la mdab rnams ma gsungs te// 'khor la gnas pa'i mamo gsul gsum po la rnam mkha' nag pogaser gyi pa cag can brdo brgyad la ma ma sngon dam dang / non gyi 'o kyis

175a1(rnying rgyud): skyes pa chas sra bcug pa drug bston pa dang / khrung drug langar skas brgyan pa dang / rgadrug pa brdzun mog za can zas su bcug padrug dang / ma mo mdzes mjug lagasar gsus brgyan padrug pa 'gror ba zhus pa dang
175a2(rnying rgyud): rim dang po la dgod/ da sna lnga la rin po che sna lnga btang / spos dang shra ba la btang / bse mgron bu yong tang dung / zangs ma phyugs de rnams la/ dar glad khru gang pa gcig byas la/ bza' mi du yod pa'i ming 'o ma dang mtshal slar la bris pa/
175a3(rnying rgyud): rus kyang gzhug mgro la g.yo ga dgas pa lag tu nor lhag dang / zangs lcags dang dbu'i bang dang shog bul bris la ci yod pa'i rdzas bslar/ gos dang rgan sna tshogs gdags so// da nas shing ris 'phan bzang drug paM/ rdo rje dang pad+ma rin po che 'khor lo rtsa gram
175a4(rnying rgyud): rang ji ze/ khrung re re/ rma bya re/ ne tsho gsung snyan ri re/ shing po'i kha nas skad snyan pa sgrogs pa bri/ bdan lce lnga pa re re br-i/ ri dwags rgyal po d+hug pri/ nyi zla 'og nas 'char ba bri/ mda' rigs dang bstun pa drug bri/ nam mkha' kha dog rigs dang

175a7(rnying rgyud): phreng can dang / dbugs pa dag la gcig ma dang / nag mo mchu byung ma dang / sdug nag mag gsum ma dang / dkar mozhi ba'i 'od 'gro ma dang / nag mo chen mo na phyogs mardung nin ma dang / spug nag can mo can mdas/ dmar po dzod

175b4(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang sa'i 'bras bu kra lan ta/ sha sna tshong ba 'i gtor ma bzhi/ stag chas gzig chas dar zab khang bzang gser g.yu go mtshon dang / mi la yod pa'i rdzas kun tshogs tshad du bsog/ de nas mda' gzhung dang mthun pa bcu bzhi/ shing ris lnga/

179a8(rnying rgyud): spangs nas ni// spa dag bkun pan// lha mog yu yi byi'u can bcos// lkog nang 'bras dang po la byung na// lha mo nag mo ched du bcas// gag 'dreg po byu rmed// gtso mo eg kyi te bcos// khrag nad myi gze byung gyur na// nag mo sun
179b1(rnying rgyud): khyil ba yang / 'ab de yang
179b2(rnying rgyud): gsum bcos par bya// 'brum nag drag po byung gyur na// rgyal mo 'khor bcas nyi shu rtsa bzhi bcos// bal nad 'dar bu byung gyur na// sring mo bzhi ni bcos par bya// sbrid pa'i sran mo rnams la mchod// spangs nad be mabu byung gyur na/
179b3(rnying rgyud): reg ma 'od ldan bka' bkyon yin// rgyas 'debs bzhi la mnyes par mchod// bas ldag shu ba'i nad byung nas// shin tu tsha 'brab cha gyur na// rma ri rab 'byams bkang bkyon yin// ma mo 'dus pa'i gur mdos bye// rus nad gzor ba dzu
179b4(rnying rgyud): gyur na// rgyal mo bcu gsum bka' bkyon yin// smre sngags drag pos bskad gso bya// gzer ba drag pos thebs gyur nas// brgyal zhing 'bog pa'i tshul ston na/ skos rje drang dkar gsang mdos bya// skya rengs dang po shar tsam na// 'phe
179b5(rnying rgyud): cing 'phrig pabyung gyur na// srog bdag mched lnga'i bka' ba kyon yin// dkar po bcu gsum mdos kyis bskang // de nas rgyal po'i gsang bsrub bsham// gzhung dang mthun par bsgrub par bya// de nas lcam mo e ka tsa ti dang // lha mo nag mo
179b6(rnying rgyud): lcags ka mdos// mjug la btags na byas gyur na// nad rnams zhi bar gdon mi za// des kyang zhi bar mgyur na// nag spug gnyis kyi bslab pa bya// nga yis nges par bshad pa yin// shin tu kha sgra spro gyur na// gnam sngan bcos par shin tu
179b7(rnying rgyud): 'ashad// gnam sman dkar mo yang dag dpal// bu mo dam tshig g.yu sngon ma// gtung mo 'od chags g.yu yi ral gcig ma// de yi gcung mo pa rA shA ba ri// de yi gcung mo g.yu yi thod gdengs can// de yi gzung mo nam mkha'i khams kyi ngo d+hi
179b8(rnying rgyud): deyi gcung monam mkha'i dpal mo btsan// gnam sman mched bdun gzhung bzhin bskang // dkar mo nyi khri bdun 'bum gyi// mched bdun kun gyi gtso mo yin// bya thul can zhes bya ba ni// ci byas ci rum btub pas// log tu thugs dam gzhung
180a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin pa nga / mdzod ba na na ldanas gnas// stag bdag sum pa rnabs 'arjog/ pa mdwags pa// gan gtag sa sa bsta// nam stug gagatas pa gas/ rgan ma
180a2(rnying rgyud): srog pa bzhin// phra zhing la chu ngang bar dgyur// de 'i bcos thabs bstan pa ni// nag smag gnyis kyi mdos dang ni// lo mdos mo mdom spel la rgyas par bya// sgrub pa ma mo gzhung bzhin pa// donas nag sdug sen ba seg // de yis nang
180a3(rnying rgyud): gyur// de yang gajug pa'i klu yi nad rnams ni// grang zangs smos mi b+hang du ldan// rigs ngan gdol pa'i nad rnams yin// dri dang sna tshogs nang rnams dbyung // sa bdag tu mnad rnams kyang // zhage slong myo bzhin rdzogan// #
180a4(rnying rgyud): pa bcos med// de lta nga les bcos pa bya// zhes gsungs sa// ma ma sri pa'i bamachen pa pas/ gnan gyi dang gas ngos gzung ba'i 'a skye zhipas// de nas yang lhag zu dang gis d+he da ces gas te/
180a5(rnying rgyud): garten dang masra pa'o// ma mthong ma das chen po sa/ bdang pa nas rnam pa 'i lta dgas// zham ga sam nyid tan ci grang las bdu ba // bsrud pa dam brtags sa da
180a6(rnying rgyud): dgas ldan kyang gcig/ rdzobarjog bzhin du bsgrag par bya// rnam 'byung na/ man bzhis// nam ma khang ldan bzhin du bya// mdangangs lnga yang byab ste// dka rdzog ras ma khang / ngas pa// gong nas 'chang baH// nya ma thang
180a7(rnying rgyud): bya// sreg so sumig bsgrim // mkha pas nyis stong 'thur// shin ta mangs 'a brab rgya/ rgya kyang drug tud ba// dbang byed parnal nga gangs// mkha thabs te gang nas 'chang// de yin pa can
180b1(rnying rgyud): dbul// dgyes sde bzhi yi mda' ris ni// sngon mo bzhi la nya mig ris// shin tu mdzes pa bri bar bya// mkhar thabs nyi zla rtse nas 'char// dgyes sde bzhi la dbul bar bya// phung byed bzhi pa chu mig nges// gdan ni phyogs dang bstan pa dang /
180b2(rnying rgyud): mkhar thab nyi zla 'char bar bya// 'khor na gnas pa'i ma mo stong rtsa brgyad// grangs kyi gnas pa ma bsdus te// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis la gong ma bzhin du mchod par bya// gtor ma bzhi yang phyogs bzhir bzhag/ shing ris bsdus pa snga ma bzhin// ldang
180b3(rnying rgyud): bu dar gyis mtshan pa gsum// gtso mo nyid la dbul bar bya// lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa la tshon la// tshom bu gsum pa bya bar bshad// ring bung kun kyang lus kyi tshad// de yang ma mo 'khor bcas glad// stag gzig la sogs bcu bzhi dang // srog chags/
180b4(rnying rgyud): tshan pa btu bzhi tshang // dbu bya 'bru lug grub tshad rnams// rdza bcu rtsa drug glud du dbul// de yang sna tshogs dar gyis brgyan// de yang srid pa'i sman mo la// dbu bas byas pa'i sems can sna tshogs dang // ljang bu lnga bcu rtsa dgu dang // nam mkha'
180b5(rnying rgyud): lnga bcu d+ha dgu dang // ma mo bdun gyi nam mkhang ni// khong pa gnag pa kha chag sar// rma bya sgo yi zer gyis brgyan// sring mo bzhi yi nam mkhang ni// phyogs dang bstan pa'i khod pa la// kha chag mdzes tsho na gtang bar bya// mda' ni zar yag lham mkhris
180b6(rnying rgyud): btang // phyogs dang mthun pa so so'i mda'// sring mo bzhi la dbul bar bya// e ka tsa ti spyan drug la// gzhung dang mthun par dbul bar bya// gsang ba'i yum bzhi'i nam mkhang dang // sna tshog rdzas rnams bsag pa kun kyang mthun// de nas ri rang bcang
180b7(rnying rgyud): ba ni// sna tshogs dbru sna'i gsang phye la// ri rab bang rim bzhi pa bya// ljang bu khru re 'phang kyang de bzhin no// ri rab thog tu nas dang nga bra yi bang ba bya// de nas lha rdzas sna tshogs bad ba bya// sha mar gsur dang sha sta sna tshogs bsham// ri rab steng du gzhag
181a1(rnying rgyud): par bya// gser dngul zangs lcags rin chen dbyig/ ri rab steng du gzhag par bya// de nas mngar sna tshang bar bzhag/ de yi steng du za 'og gur chen dbub par bya// gra bzhi dbus su rma bya lnga// gzhung dang mthun par gzug
181a2(rnying rgyud): bya// de nas bar rim dang po la// mthing nag gur chen dbub par bya// de nas ba rim gnyis pa la// ljang sngon gur chen dbub par bya// de nas pang rim gsum pa la// le brgan gur chen dbub par bya// de nas bar rim bzhi pa la// sna tshogs da
181a3(rnying rgyud): gyi 'ja' ris bya// dar dang ras ma ljags bu rnams// khri rkang bzhi la rim par bskor// de nas gzhung bzhin bskar bar bya// ma mo srid pa'i bem chen po lam/ gur mdos chen po bskang ba'i rdzas bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas ya
181a4(rnying rgyud): lhag yung drung gis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o// yab cig 'jig rten 'joms mdzad lha// sarba ru pa zhes bya ba// thams cad bskang bzlog chen mo'i mdos// 'di yi bskang rdzas ji ltar lags// zhes gsol te de nyid na 'khod do// dan
181a5(rnying rgyud): yang nyon cig 'jig rten skos kyi g.yung drung lha// dbyings kyi yum drug rdzas rnams mthun// rgyal mo drug kyang de bzhin no// ye shes rje mo bcu bzhi mthun// 'khor rnams 'di ru ma gsungs pa// srid pa'i rgyal mo'i zhal mang phyung // ljang bu shing ris
181a6(rnying rgyud): kun dang mthun// srid pa'i sman mo rnams la ni// shing bu ma gsungs ljang 'u bya// bskyed pa'i khro mo rnams la ni// ljang bu nam mkha' shing ris rnams// dar gyis sna tshogs 'gyud par bya// nam mkha bya'i sgo yis brgyan// nal 'byor ma
181a7(rnying rgyud): brdung zhi yi// gtso mo gnyis la dar gyis brgyan par bya// khyung ni sna tshogs dang gyis brgyan par bya// srid pa'i sman mo'i tshogs la ni// nam mkha' bsag pa kun kyang mthun// snang zhing srid pa'i sems can zugs// sna tshogs ngar spos brgyan pa
181b1(rnying rgyud): bya// gtso bor mi gzugs pa mo spel pa la// phyogs bzhir bdun bdun gzhag par bya// po rgyas lo chas mangs par brgyan// khrag sna yang pos brgyan pa'i phar bu brkyang // phyugs pa'i mtshams bzhid gzhag par bya// rin chen snod mchog dum pa bzhi/
181b2(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi 'dza'i gad sman gyis dgang // tshe ye 'brang rgyas bzhi yis kha bcad de// gtsang ma'i stan bting phyogs bzhir bzhag/ gtsang ma'i mda' bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag/ btsun mo chas bzang bzhi yang phyag gis 'degs pa'i tshul// de nas dang por sna tshog
181b3(rnying rgyud): kyi phreng bas bskor// de nas ras ma dkar po'i phreng bas bskor// dmar po ser po sngon po dang // pags pa'i phreng bas brgyan zhing bskor// lding yang dbyar chas dgun chas dbye// skad snyan bya dang nor bzang lug/ gser g.yukhra ba dang zangs dang lpags// dar
181b4(rnying rgyud): dang ba 'og gos dang rgyan// sna tshogs tshang bar bsags nas ni// gtsang ma'i gnas su dkar nag spa phub ste// zhag gsum bsnyen pa phul nas ni// slob dpon gsum gyis so so'i las// ting 'dzin gsal te gzhung bzhin bya// slob dpon chos gos
181b5(rnying rgyud): rab ldan pas// mdos la dang por spyan drangs shing // bar du byung khungs gdon par bya// tha mar skos kyang gdab par bya// de nas bskang gso drag tu bya// de nas chad lhag nor ba bshags// de nas gtso ma yum la gyer// de nas yum drag rtag pa'i rgyal
181b6(rnying rgyud): mo la// rim gyi tha le gcad par bya// dbyings kyi yum dang rtag pa'i rgyal mo drug/ rje mo bcu bzhi sman mo'i tshogs// kun kyang mdos chen gsum la gcig/ dbyings kyi pha mo'i 'khor bcas dang // rgyal mo drug gi 'khor bcas dang // sman ma
181b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// b+h+yo bzlog mdos las gzhan na med// sgos bdag brgyad dang cha'i lha mo bcu drug ni// bar sngangs dang bco brgyad pa'o// gzhung ni gzhan las grags pa med// zer bdag bzhon kun lag ces// tshe 'i lha mo ban
182a1(rnying rgyud): dgas// dedang dpon pazhi po gzhanan myed// rjes gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i bamakhyen po las/ skas kyi gsung dung lnga bstan pa'i le thug drug pa'o// / de nas yang lhag sung gas 'dis ces
182a2(rnying rgyud): gsol to// e ma ho 'jig rten 'joms mdzad lha// srid pa'i gtoni kun la shes// de nas rgyal mo bcu gsum mdos// de yi rdzas rnams ji ltar bsag/ ces gsol te de nyid na 'khod do// de nas bka' stsal pa/ rgyal mo brgya gsum bskang

182a4(rnying rgyud): ser mo ga yu'i kha chag can gsum/ dmar mo la nag mo'i kha chag can gsum/ khong nag mo la tshon sogs kyi nam mkha' gcig/ 'phang bcu gsum la me long so sor mdzes tshon btang / de'i tshe g+han ni sna tshogs dang snas brgyan pa'o// dar glud bcu gsum
182a5(rnying rgyud): ni dar chas su bcug la kha dog ni nam mkha' dang mthun pa lag ser g.yus brgyan pa'o// gcig ni che ba la dar mthing nag gi go thug ser gyi rdo rjes kha chag byas pa la nyi zla'i phur sgrogs byas pa bskon pa la/ mthing gri go lcog la gser ga yu'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa
182a6(rnying rgyud): mgo la bskon pa ni rgyal mo la dbul lo// snying gar me long mtheb gad ba yang gdags so// de yang rgyal mo zhes bya ba ni/ dper nas bdag rgyal pos dbangs mnga' bog bsdus nas bka' bsgo ba nyan pa bzhin/ srid pa cham la 'bebs pa'i gtso mo srid pa'i
182a7(rnying rgyud): mos dbyings kyi yum drug cha ma la phab nas 'khol te/ de yi nang nas chags byed rgyal mo dang / rin chen 'bar mdzod kyi rgyal mo dang / dga' ba ting 'dzin nyul byed kyi rgyal mo dang gsum gyis rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'khol/ srid pa'i bde 'gro rtag pa'i rtsal mo dang /
182b1(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro'i rgyal mo nam mkha'i dbyings phyag ma dang / mkha' 'gro ba thugags pa 'od 'bar rgyab mo dang / de chos rnal 'byor ma mo bcu bzhi 'khol/ 'dod pa'i rgyal mo phra men thugs kyi gzer chen ma dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal mo bdud kyi gcom kha mthogs ma dang /
182b2(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i rgyal mo rdo rje khros mas ni srid pa'i sman mo rnams 'khol te/ de yi nang nas 'dod pa'i rgyal mo nag mo kha rla na mche ba can dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal mo bdud 'dul rab gcig ma dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal mo dkar mo g.yag thod ma ste/ de ltar rgyal mo bcu gsum po des ni
182b3(rnying rgyud): ma mo'i rigs stong rtsa brgyad 'khol lo// srid pa'i rgyab mos mi 'khol ba ni med do// de nas sngags pa dam tshig nyams na/ snying mun rum du sros nas nyams lci ba la lus ber ba langs nas dran bam gsal na bya/ khrag gi phor bu bcu gsum ni/ thams cad 'dus
182b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i zor kha bzlog pa'o// tha ma mdos byang shar mtshams su chu la bskul lo// gtang ba ni srid pa'i rgyal nyid la gtong ngo // khrag gi phor bu ru khrag sna yod tshad las shes rab ma'i mtshal med du mi rung bas bskangal ba la tshon sna lngas kha bcad la sha chen gyi gtor ma cha gce
182b5(rnying rgyud): dang / dpal gyi gtor ma dang / phud dang zhal zas kyi tshogs dang rnga gling dang / swa s+pha ra ma ti dang / mar me dang / mchod rdzas rnams dbul bar bya'o// de nas rnga chen brdung zhing 'di skad gyer // zhes gsungs so// kye 'dod khams rgyal mo tshur gson cig/
182b6(rnying rgyud): khyod kyi ming dang mtshan gsol ba// rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma// pad+ma gar gyi legs ldan gnyis// dpyid bla ra ba'i nya shed ta// gnyis med sbyor ba byas pa las// zla dgu dang ni ngo bcul// phu tsha ming srid dgu zhig bcos// sring mo chen mo mthu che rtsal
182b7(rnying rgyud): drag zlas// sa rim pa dgu'i 'og tu sbas// ming po skos kyi bdag po brgyad// gleng bzhi yi ni bdag mor bskos// ming srid de ni dgra ru srid// sa dgu'i steng du sbas pa di// ro langs sku gcig 'gul 'gul byung // 'dzam bu'i gling yang 'bul 'phrul
183a1(rnying rgyud): smra/ su / shigs //

183a4(rnying rgyud): gcig la// rgyal mo ni sru bzhengs la/ mdos kyi ni phrad la sbron/ s+pha ra ma ti'i mchod pa bzhes// sha chen gtar ma ni 'de ba zhes shig/ mdzes pa'i sgra snyen 'di la skyon// 'od ldan gsal ba'i me bong dang / mda' bzang dang ni bya rgod ma/ dpal dang ni ru mtshon

183a6(rnying rgyud): kha ra ga rak+ta ti badz+ra b+ho/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hAM/ zhes spyan drangs la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dpal chen po'i mdun du bzhugs te mdos la byin gyis rlobs par bsam mo// de nas rim gyis spyan drang ba ne/ 'di skad ces brjod do// kye 'dod pa'i ma mo
183a7(rnying rgyud): tshur gson cig/ chags byed rgyal mo rin chen drod byu byu tshul mo dang // ting 'dzin nyul mdzad rgyal mo'i tshogs// sngon gyi bskal pa dang po la// sangs rgyas mabyung sngon rol bu// mnga' mdzad rgyal mo bcu gsum byung // chags byed ma dang rin chen 'od 'bar
183b1(rnying rgyud): ma// dgang ma ting dadzin phul byed ma// srid pa'i bde 'gro rnam mkha'i dbyings phyag ma// bklag gas pa 'od 'bar gsum// phra men thugs kyi gzer can dang // bdud kyi gtso mo la mthogs rgyal mo dang // 'dod pa'i thal mo rdon khros mdang // gtu m+ba
183b2(rnying rgyud): sogs bcu gsum mo// 'dzam bu gling la dbang gyur ma// 'jig rten mthu dang dpal mdzad ma// do nub mdos la spyan 'dren no// mnga' bdag rgyal mo gshegs su gsol// ri rab kha 'phang dang po las// chags byed rgyal po rin chen 'brar ba'i 'od kyi rgyal mo dang /
183b3(rnying rgyud): dag byas ti ngo dzad rnapa rgya mo gsus// da can pa nga ba kyipa dzi nas// phun kya mi bad bar ba sa// gsang ba mangs kyi dkyipa 'dzun gas sa rnams pa gnas ni// dkyi sa kyi rtsal po ldan denan// mngos partson gyi thob
183b4(rnying rgyud): bsgrud pa'i dus chen latshad pa na// gas shing dag par gyu ma/ ma chog dan cad // gos dang can mangs padzidzi// na pa rnam na ga da // nam mabyung chupa po spyod pa// mi mthan can che lta
183b5(rnying rgyud): bzlog/ srid pa'i bde 'gro rtog pa'i thul mo dang // nam mkha'i rgyal mo mkha' 'gro'i dbyings byugs// mkha' 'grong thag gas pa rgyal mo gsam// bang des gnyis pa zla bzhugs te// 'od chags mthing gad kyil 'khor nas// gsang ba mdos kyi dkyil
183b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'dir// mthun pa rdzas chen bsog pa pas// sun 'dren mchod kyi gshegs su gsol// kun kyang mthing nag 'bar ba'i sra// mdos la byin gyis rlob cing gyon// bskang ba rdzas chen mchod pa 'di// gtsang zhing dag par bshams pa la// bdud rtsi
183b7(rnying rgyud): matrog dang nor gyi dbyig// gos dang rgyan dang mdzes pa nor// snyan pa'i sgra mchog 'di 'thub kyi// rnapa 'thor mthu dang dpal rjed cig/ mimathun rtsen chen tharang ban// mdang thang gyen du bzhes sug sol// kye 'dod pa'is mo ra gson ga/ blangs/
184a1(rnying rgyud): cig zang chen 'dod pa'i rgyal mo dang // bdud mosan rtsegatso ma ma mthogs rgyas mdang/ nan ma pa chad ma rgyal mo rnams// sa so // kyai myal mos bya// der babar rim gsum pa la bdugasapa// sun du thongs
184a2(rnying rgyud): sa dang mdos bye kyil 'khor du// sna tshogs mthun pa ngas bsoganas// napa 'thor rgyal mo spyan 'dren no// mdos pa byed kyis spyo rtson// gtsang zhing dag pa de shams pa la// bdud rtsi mchog dang na gyi dbyeg/ gos dang tha nga sa bya
184a3(rnying rgyud): snyan pa'i sra mchog 'di 'arul gyi// rnal 'byor mthu dang dpal skyed cig/ mi mthun rkyen chen slar la bzlog/ kye 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ nag mo kharlon mche brtan// 'dod pa'i ma mo bdud 'dul ral gcig ma// 'dod pa'i ma me dkar mo g.yag
184a4(rnying rgyud): can// ri rab pang ri mtha ma las// khrag mtshod dmar po'i dkyil 'khor nas// kun kyang dmar nag 'bar ba'i sku// gsang ba mdos kyi dkyil 'khor du// sna tshogs mthun pa'i rdzas bsog ste// sran mo'i rgyal mo spyan 'dren na// mdos la gyi gyis rlob cing
184a5(rnying rgyud): bskang ba'i rdzas chen mchod pa 'di// gtsang zhing dag par sbyar ba la// bdud rtsi mchog dang nor gyi dbyeg/ gos dang rgyan dang mdzes pa'i nor// snyan pa'i sgra mchog 'di 'bul gyi// rnal 'byor tshe dang dpal skyed la// mi mthun gdug pa'i rkyen chen bzlog/ mnga'
184a6(rnying rgyud): de dag rgyal mo bcu gsum yang // gsang ba'i dam rdzas 'di na mthun par bsogs// bzang dgu bsdeb nas sku grung 'bul// rgyal mo bcu gsum thugs dam bskang // ma mo bye ba 'bum phrag 'khor du skyong // 'dir gshegs mchod pa dam pa nas/
184a7(rnying rgyud): spyan drangs pa/ de nas khungs byung tshul nas 'di skad ces brjod do// sngon gyi bskal pa dang po la// mdos byung de ni ji ltar byung // grung byung de ni gang nas byung // rgya gar gyi yus shed du/ mi nad ni chu ltar 'khrugs/ phrug nad ni drung lhur 'tshungs/ ci bgyis la
184b1(rnying rgyud): maphran/ pati ta ma chod gsum gyis/ thugs rgya ni smon lam btab/ sana'i maskor nas/ gsang ba 'bum tha'i nad shed nas/ sred pa'i mangs le'u chen po bcus/ yadang na mo'i mangs la/ shrI na gsum ni chags sru bstsags/ mtshan gsum
184b2(rnying rgyud): bkyer/ cha gcig ni ring ba rtse ru bstsal/ chag cig ni lung gsum mdo bamyal/ cha gcig ni zab kyi gzhung la bsngal/ de nas mdos byung ni gang nas byung / glud byung ni gang nas byung / bal po'i yul du byung / bal po ni dri mdzad kyis/ bal ba rgyal
184b3(rnying rgyud): du mdzad/ rgyal po bcu gsum gyi klung du phul/ sprul pa'i/ un nad byang der sangs so// de nas lados byung gang nas thung // zhang thung yul shing du/ zhang thung gi rgyal po la/ mthis pa ni sha yas zin/ rtsi babyed ni ces ma sman/ lun dun shags kyis phra rab
184b4(rnying rgyud): pas/ hor tu lcam po bcu gsum la// ung dang ni thab ci gaphul/ rgyal po'i sman dang deng sangs so// zhang thung pon po khri lur skyong gis ni/ dka' dguni bgrogs bsogs nas/ mthun dgu ni spabs nas su/ rgyal bcug sum pa lung du phul/ kun dang
184b5(rnying rgyud): kyang de sangs so// de nas mdos byung nigang nas drung / klang byung ni gang nas byung / 'di yul gyi dbus sa byung / su rgyal ba chen po'i kun gyis zin/ ci bgyis ni ces ma sran/ rgya gang kyi yul nas sa/ grong khyer nigs la ldan nas/ dze yi sen spyan drangs
184b6(rnying rgyud): nas/ pra phab ni yu bskor bas/ ma bdud rtsal mos brtson na skad/ rgya bo mkhas pa ni mang pos brjod/ nyin gsum nib sogs su bas pa// mtshan gsu mo khyer du 'akyer/ chagacig ri gsu rjel bstsal/ chagaci ga lung gsum gyi mdo du bstsal/ chu gceg

185b5(rnying rgyud): kyi nga drung ga chen ngul// nam shes chu dbu ma thugs mad rtsi dbul// rgyal po rnams ni mi ga 'thul sa brtse // ma ga drug chags sel mdzang ni// drang sri gas lnga pa'i me khyong dngul// rgyal mi rnams kyi bka' chang bzlog pa'i /
