186b2(rnying rgyud): dang bcas// 'byung ba nam mkha'i mnga' bdag mo// 'dul ba'i rnal 'byor ma mo 'dul// mdos len ma mdos long la/ grung bdag ni gud bzhes shig/ kye 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cing // mkha' 'gro'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal 'od// sku ni ser na ga bar ba la/
186b3(rnying rgyud): ser nag ral pa zor tshugs can// lag na rin chen byan+ta bsnams// zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs pa na// nyid kyi 'khor rnams ma lus 'dul// khro gnyer bzhad pas rnal 'byor ma mo 'dul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos bzhes shig/ grung bdag chen mo gud bzhes shig/
186b4(rnying rgyud): cis phud gtong ngo // kye 'dod pa'i mamo tshur gson cig/ phra me na thugs kyi gzer can rgyal mo ni// su ni spug mthing chen mo la// dbu sra rma lo mdzes pas brgyan// me dpung dmar po'i dkyil na bzhugs// sbal rnga men go zu gsol// gzang chen brgyad kyi kha
186b5(rnying rgyud): ga can// nyi zla shar ba'i go mtshon can// phyag g.yas rin chen ga'u mdzes pa'i chun 'phyang bsdams// me mo bdun la mnga' mdzad ma// 'dul ni srid pa'i tshogs rnams 'dul// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pa zhes la// gud bdag chen mo kyang bzhes shig
186b6(rnying rgyud): kye 'dod pa'i mu mo tshur gson cig/ khra mthogs bdud mo gtsom rgyal mo ni// khram pa skyor yi dbang sbyar ba// dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi pa mnga' mdzad ma// du 'di srid pa'i mchog sa la// thi dag pa shal// ni bzang dang nag go zugasol/

187a5(rnying rgyud): babyin// sring mo sa dbang bltar zhing // gsang ba'i ma myo zhi las dang mdzad pa// rtswa 'degs bzhin rgyad kyis 'job// mnas bdag rten mo mdos 'ongs// blang bdag cin ma gleng ba nas smyig/ gsang nga mdzas byed kyi pa khor dang bral gyi// cang yornams

187b4(rnying rgyud): pho klud mo glud la 'di skad brjod do// kye rin chen spos kyi mi po che/ yod bdag ni pho mo'i glad/ rin chen ni sna lnga'i gzugs/ lung thang mig la mgron bu'i so// rus pa dkar po ni mi la mchis/ rus pa'i glung du ni/ dring khang ni bya rus dbul// mi la ni sha mchis te/

188b6(rnying rgyud): pas// klu bran 'bum sde ni dbang du sdud/ bar sdang khams su ni 'byos pas na~M/ lha bran mang po dbang du srud/ srin po'i yul du ni phyag brgyad pas/ srin po rnams ni grogs su byas/ mi yi yul du zhal gzigs pas/ sngon dmar pi li yul du khrag nad ka R+Sha/

189a3(rnying rgyud): wam la thob la rta brgya srang la 'jal// mdos bdag chen mo mdos long la// grung bdag chen mo grud pazhes shig/ dbyings kyi rgyal mor gshegs su gsol// dbyar gyi rgyal mo mdzad pa'i tshe// me tog kun gyi mdangs 'phrog ma// ston gyi rgyal mo mdzad

189a7(rnying rgyud): dos gtong ngo // sring mo rdo rje mdos longs shig/ sgo ba'i las su sgo phye la// 'phrang ba'i las su 'phrang sol cing // mdos cha gcig ri gsum rtsel bskyal// bdag cag rnal 'byor grub pa po// ri bobs kyang spyan sdug pa// bkra shis dam pa'i mchog
189b1(rnying rgyud): g+har cig/ mdos cha gcig gtsang chab gzhung la bskyal// mi mtha' chu yi rgyun bzhin 'gyur// chagacig lung gsum gyi mdo stsal// longs spyad rdzogs rnams 'du gyur cig/ ces mdos bdag bstsal rdzo grags phrag gi dro bu bor bdag bzhil bsngal mthor du thab da/
189b2(rnying rgyud): mo srid pa'i bem las/ rgyal mo bcu gsum gyi mdos kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// sna tshogs sdigs pa'i ltas ngan ji ltar 'azlog/ sdigs pa'i lhas ngan gang la bgyi// zhes gsol
189b3(rnying rgyud): pas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig khyod kyis dri ba legs// 'khor bdus kyi cha 'di la// dus kyi ltas ran mi labab// 'ug pa mkhar la tshang bcas dang // srod la bya skad sgrogs pa ni// ma bdud bya sman ltos ran yin// srin bu byung zer pa dang /
189b4(rnying rgyud): lha bya gong mo khyim du zhugs pa ni// sman dang 'gong po'i ltas dran yin// bya rgod mkha' la sder 'dzings pa// ya bdud rgyal po'i ltas ngan yin// yug sngas pho mo'i sder 'dzings pa// 'brog srin sun bdun ltas ngan yin// rta ga yag mtshe ma byung ba ni// sgri ba 'gong po'i
189b5(rnying rgyud): sa pa yin// mi go chub log pa'i sems can yang // de yang b+hi ba 'gong ba'i lhas dun yin// ming spring bsnol dang bag shong ba// dam sri nag mo'i ltas ngan yin// glang po che yi mche 'dzings pa// zag btsan rgyal po 'i lhas ngan yin// sha 'dzings 'dud
189b6(rnying rgyud): ma ngan yin// mi dang byol song bslad pa ni// gnam spyan mched bdun ltas ngan yin// sprul pa khyim du tshang bcas sgrog smra 'don pa ni// sa ba dag bzhi yi ltas ngan yin// sbrul gyi gshog sgra 'phur ba mdzod// grol song klu 'i ltas ngan yin// sre mo kye
189b7(rnying rgyud): rdo sdi du bsgyur// mabadud rgyal mo'i sgras ngan yin// bya gzhug pa ded nas kyi mdu bya// mi byin par kyi lhas ngan yin// bud med sus mi gyur la// lus la// yun mi ba ro// sbubs deng rdzu byung bani// 'byin par gyi skyes ngan yin// de 'phrog
190a1(rnying rgyud): pa ji ltar bgyi// 'jig rten stobs ldan bka' stsol cig/ nyon cig 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// mi da byol song bslad pa ni// 'bru bya dkar mo mched mar bdun// lug dkar mo bdun/ khyi dkar mo bdun/ dngos su med
190a2(rnying rgyud): kyang shel myug gcig la dang du chags brtson ma / rlung se bas mgul nas btags la/ de san ca mug mig dmar gyis snarnangs la bshe/ dang dgar gyi rtag sted na pa brgyang la bzhag na// ngos gcig nas shibs la da ma de dag gyi rtag brgyang
190a3(rnying rgyud): gzhan / na nga sa de rdzas sa ba kyis jig kyi snang sa la// nga'i ste na rdzog na badz+ra rgyas pa bzhin ga/ dang kyil shag myo dbyas pad nga dang ngos pacad/ rnam papa dgang thog gong d+ha d+han dzan pangs padag
190a4(rnying rgyud): mo dang / gong mo'i sgo dang sna tshogs kyis brgyan no// 'bang bdun la gser g.yu'i modo lo can sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa gzug go// de nas yas stags ru la ston la/ spos dang me dang 'brang rgyas bdun dang / phud gtsang mas rin po che'i snod bltams la bzhag

190a6(rnying rgyud): zin tsam na phud gtor/ bya lug dang yas stags g.ya ri dang gangs ri la bskyal lo// hUM nam mkha' khams kyi dkyil 'khor nas// gnam sman dkar mo rdo rje yang dag gsal// gnam sman mched bdun spyan 'dren no// dar dkar slerus g.yab 'dor ro//
190a7(rnying rgyud): dr-i zhi ma spos kyi nabun gtibs// gsal ba'i me long mda' bzang bya god rten// rin chen mdos mchog 'di la spyan 'dren na// gnam sman mched bdun gshegs su gsol// gnam sman dkar mo rdo rje yang dag dpal// su ni 'od chags ldam pa la// na bzang
190b1(rnying rgyud): sprin dkar gzugasol// mtha' ma gser gyi khachag can// nyi zla mdzes pa'i go mtshon can// dbu la g.yu yi go lcog gsol// tshabs su sman sha yu chung chings// gser gyi skra srab si li yi// g.yum thur sngon po grangs se brer// rol du khung khud dka
190b2(rnying rgyud): khrid// mdos bdag lags kyi mdos long la// thugs nad sangs la bka' chad bri// bya skad snyan te tongs so tong // lug dkar mig dmar 'ba' dang di ri ri// khyi dkar shel mig 'dur dang zhungs se zhung / sman sha yu chung yang dkyus dang drangs me dwed
190b3(rnying rgyud): dang dkar tag thag kyang sku la ring gis 'char/ rnal 'byor bdag gis brten cing khyod mchod do// sring mo dam las ni ma 'da' zhig/ de'i ni gcung mo ba/ dam tshig ni g.yu sgron ma/ phra med ni mdzes pa'i sku/ dbu la dar dkar gyi lding zhu gsol/ mu tig
190b4(rnying rgyud): mdzes pa'i 'du na// zlab thuman rgyagacigasapa// su so ga na sa// thaman pangs pa'i gang lagacan/ ngas su thu Sh+tsa dang pa ga// ra d+hAs na ga byung cing// ga can tha byin 'chub kyi ga ba mas/
190b5(rnying rgyud): na dngul dkar gyi me long bsnams// mu tig khu 'phang yang shwa ra ra/ nor bu gong sreg ni mang po bsrel// sman mkhar rtse lan bun 'thung / gzed mo grong ngadun ni 'khor du 'khol/ mi mthun ltas ngan yang slar la zlog/ mdos bdag ni mdos lo la/
190b6(rnying rgyud): 'bog nang kha yang slar la zlog/ bya skad gsung stan yang di ri ri/ sha dgo dkyus dang ni brengs se dreng / sman lug dkar mo yang 'phang dang di rI ri/ nam mkha mardo lding yang / bkrag mdangs sogs se sig/ dung 'phar me long yang / mdzes pa'i chas su bsku
190b7(rnying rgyud): rma bzang thod sgro yang zer dang hU ru ru/ mdos bdag ni mdos long la/ grud bdag ni blud bzhes shig/ ces phud gtsang gtong ngo // de'i gzung mo la/ 'od chags g.yu'i rang gcig ma/ sku ni rin chen ldem pa la/ rma lo mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol
191a1(rnying rgyud): brobram
191a2(rnying rgyud): mu men mdzes pagi bachag can// spyan sha yu chung ni chibs su bcibs/ rol du dgo ba du sngon khrid/ g.yus na sha zhags za bo bsnams/ g.yon nag yu li kha thug bsdams/ gsung snyan ni tongs se tong / mdos
191a3(rnying rgyud): bdag ni mdos longs la/ glud bdag ni yud bzhes shig/ mi la ni than mtho/ bya la ni snyim 'dogs/ sna tshogs ni sdig la zlog/ de'i ni gcung mo ba/ par+Na sha bi ri/ su la ni ci gsol na/ btso ma gser gyi ni go zul/ phra man mdzes pa'i 'chag can/
191a4(rnying rgyud): chibs su sma na shA ni yu chung bcibs/ rol du stan po ni ru sgor khrid/ phyag na phra men ni bum pa bsnams/ g.yon na gser gyi ni zor ba bsnams/ nang du skyo nad ni gzer ba gtong / gsung stan bya skad kyang tongs se tong / dmu lug 'ba' skad ni di ri ri/ logs pa sha dag
191a5(rnying rgyud): dag kyang brengs se phreng / dri zhim spos kyin bun kyang thu lu thu/ nam mkha' mtho lding yang bkra dang sigs se sig/ mo 'phang dung dkar yang ni si li li/ mda' bzang bya rgod kyang mkha' la ldems se ldem/ sman mkhar stod na g.yu yin bun 'thul/ mdos bdag ni mdos
191a6(rnying rgyud): bzhes la/ glud bdag ni klud bzhes shig/ ces phud gtong ngo // de yi ga cung mo ba/ g.yu'i thod gdengs can/ sku ni rin chen 'bar ba ya/ sku la men dkar gyi go zug sol// rma cho ga yu'i ni gong lag can/ dbu la g.yu yi go lcog gsol/ chibs su khyud chen dar ma
191a7(rnying rgyud): bci bas/ sku la rab la lcags kyis bskyod/ rgya long mdzes pa'i mu men can/ g.yas na shel gyi bya khra bsnams/ g.yon na g.yu'i seng ge bsnams/ 'od dang ni 'ja' tshon ris/ lha bya ni gong mo yang / skad gdangs ni tongs se tong / bya bzang ni gar byung yang /
191a8(rnying rgyud): mkhar kyi ni rtsel lding / chu ldan ni mched kyis bskor/ dzags bzang lug dkar la/ mab khyu dang me re re/ dri bsung spos kyi naphun bu lu lu/ dar dkar nyag brkyang yang / 'od dang brengs se phreng / sman phran gshegs kyi shul/ dar dkar gyi sde'u chen yang / sran
191b1(rnying rgyud): phran pa zhugs kyi gur/ mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes shig/ glung bdag ni grud bzhes shig/ ces phud gtong ngo // de'i gcung mo ba/ nam mkha'i khams kyi bo de ma/ sru la ni ci gsol na/ bya rgod po'i thul pa gsol/ chibs su ni ci bcibs na/ seng ge ni
191b2(rnying rgyud): dkar mo bcibs/ rol du ni g.yu yi bya khra khrid/ phyag na bya rgod ldem bu bsnams/ sman phran ni 'bum dang bcas/ mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ de'i ni gcung mo pa// nam mkha' khams kyi dpal mo btsan// srul
191b3(rnying rgyud): dar dkar skrag pa gsol// ba ti smug po'i sham bu gdags// phyag na gser gyi zangs gri bsnams// g.yon na bdun dkar po bsnams// chibs su dgu tshigs skya mo bci bas// skar ma mda' ru 'phen pa'i rtsal mo che// 'khor du sman phran 'bum gyis bskor//
191b4(rnying rgyud): mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes shig/ grud bdag ni grung bzhes shig/ ces rigasum rtsil bskyal lo// byol bzlog pa dang / nyams lci ba dang / skyo 'bog dang / brgyal bu dang / dmu rdos phog pa dang / glu bro rtse zhing skyong dang / snying mi dga' zhing mi gseb tu
191b5(rnying rgyud): 'gro snying mi mnod pa dag la 'di'i phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// sbal ba tshang 'chas nas bdag gi yo bcos bya/ grul klu'i mdos kyis bcos bya/ rgyal po 'gong po spun dgu bzlog/ dkar po bcu gsum rab/ shin tu skyo 'bog la phan no// ma bdud kyi ltas ngan rgyal mo
191b6(rnying rgyud): bcu gsum mdos kyis bzlog/ sman dang 'gong po'i mtshan ngan la pho mdos mo mdos rgyas par bya/ ya bdud kyi bdud zhal bsgyur bya/ yugs sa pho mo'i mtshan ngan la gling bzhi kha lnga'i mdos kyis bzlog/ phyugs nad thams cad de yis bzlog/ bying ba 'gong
191b7(rnying rgyud): po'i mtshan ngan la// srid pa'i rgyal mo'i sgos mdos bya// dam sri nag mo'i mtshan dan la// lha mo lcags khang mdos kyis bzlog/ brag btsun dmar po'i mtshan ngan la// rgyal po 'gong po spun dgu'i mdos kyis bzlog/ shin tu lam shwad dmar po bcos//
192a1(rnying rgyud): sha ba bdud kyi mtshan na la// lcags mda' badrug sum mnas kyis bzla// rtse mom bdud rgyal ma'i mtshan da nga la// mnga' ba ni phyogs bzhi'i mdos kyis bzlog/ byangag/ mi byin tur gyi mtshan ngan la// de yang yug
192a2(rnying rgyud): mkhar mdos kyis bzlog/ de yang blo ba zlog mdos kyis kun grang bzlag// ces gsungs so// mtho sring ba'i be ma las/ ltos ngan bzlog pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas ga/ yung drung sgra yis 'di skad cis gsol to// kye maho 'jig
192a3(rnying rgyud): rten stobs kyi lha// mda' bzhi rdzogs pa'adi ltar bca'// ma pa chen po ltar bac+doMn// ces gsam te// yang bka' stsal pa/ nyan cig gnod 'dul g.yung drung lha/ 'khor po tha ba zhi ma krud la// sgo bzhi sgo rnams ldan par bri// de nas mang ban
192a4(rnying rgyud): ma long ban+de// dar lnga ldan pa 'a kho la ni la gtsug/ 'ug pa po rag tha dang srin b+ha ba Ti// mkhas pas sgon brtson par bya// mda' ltung ba'i zur gsum gzug/ de yang bdag byung la khrig pa shAr// ma ni lho la srin bu drug// khrag d+hA'i lor bu
192a5(rnying rgyud): grogs bzhir bzhag/ khyi chu bo'i snyid khrag/ glang rig po'i snying khrag/ sa bdag rgyal po'i snying khrag/ bud med kyi dus thag de rnams med du mi rung ngo // gzhan yang khrag snga yod tshad blugs no// glang gi khrag byung // shar bus bdag rgyal po'i zag/
192a6(rnying rgyud): khri khrag/ nub tu dus khrag/ de bzhin lhang lo mtshan ldan du// phud gtsang sman dang sbyar la bzhag/ dar skad 'dzub gang tshad du bya// btsun mo bzhi 'i chus su gzhug/ nam mkha' khod lnga 'ja' ris ni// khang gis pa rgyar la rma bya sgo yis brgyan// de bzhin
192a7(rnying rgyud): phung byud bzhi la dbul// lha yi chog gzhung yang bsrang // nam stod lha 'ang ba dbul bar bya// nam slad ma mo'i bsnyen pa dbul// zhag gsum par du bsnyen pa dngul// sngags 'di ni pa'i snying gcig tu dril ba'o// tra ga ra shA bi dra ma ma snyi pa dag ma mdzam/
192b1(rnying rgyud): ma mang ba/ rag pa byung khrag la mdun dun/ rtag / da ma nyid teg ma ma dusas laH/ benas ma bani bu mo bzhi la baspyad nas cha 'thugs/ de nas phyogs bkor mtshan dan dang thob 'azlog/ khrag gi sor bar dang mang bar bslags pa/ mad dzangs pasam pa
192b2(rnying rgyud): byas la zong bdag bzhi la bskur btang ngo / ma bzhi bu ma bzhi gzhan dang mthun/ mda' dang me 'ong dang dar sna dang chas pa ni tshi ga yang dgug pa'o// dang po 'khor lo la 'jug tsom na ma bzhir bskyed pas/ sngags bzlas shing mchom la dbang bslarang ro// tsha blan//
192b3(rnying rgyud): maN+Dal bsdu/ zong bdag mi'i bskul thun// da ni mda' 'phen sprul 'phen/ dA ni stsogs 'phen sa la 'byin// nye ma shar phyogs pa ke nas// mtshan dan thug pa gad mo dgo // dur bya srin bus thung zer// tho radas s+ho/ khyi zhing drug/ phra mos byi nga
192b4(rnying rgyud): byung // de ni mda' 'ben de dru 'di/ dari grogs bajug de 'ardeg/ steng gi rgyal mi bajug go// 'og gi rgyal me brdeg pa// bar snang wAl bI brdeg go// bar snang lhayis shul mtshan cig/ thale bral mi 'phen no// 'og gi rdul mi 'ben no//
192b5(rnying rgyud): br-idang chung mnor gyi dbyig la me 'phen no// thug pa glad me ga cing srin byas ro byung zer// go nas kyi du me mong byid bltar// nyi ma shar phyogs pa kring 'phen// shar phyogs rgyal chan bka' bsgyur la// mis lhas mtshan ngan sar la zlog/ zong ba
192b6(rnying rgyud): la stsogs lta gyur// shang nas gan+d+har yi bu mod na ting shags/ sgyogs// myur la zor bzlog/ bstan da 'jig pa d+ma la thog/ zong kha mda' li snrel longs// khrag zor dmar po dgal ster// khrag nad drugazer dgral byeng // da ni mdang 'dzin
192b7(rnying rgyud): gdung+gA hrI/ nyi ma lha grags bgi nas// drug pa gad ma dan cing yin byas dbyung zed// a ma bye ro 'ayang du bskur// zo dngas bye dudanang // shes ba thabs kyi gzhu bdungs nas// be shes thabs kyi mda' dzin gyis// thozo ba zlog la phyogs brgyas/
193a1(rnying rgyud): zag par dmar po dgra pa chub// sgo phyogs gral rgyun bka' sbyar la// mdang na rtsor kha dgrapa b+h+yo// sgrogs kyi kha la pa khaH// nyi ma g+ho thugs bka nas// btsan gyi bu ma kha pa me par gyi dbum// phyogs khang byung
193a2(rnying rgyud): la zang kha zlog/ bstan pa 'jig pa de la zlong // dam nyams dgra bo'i snying la kyob// khrag zor dmar po dgral rgyob// las kyi thun gcig dbab tu gsol// da ni mda' 'phen gang du 'phen// da ni stsogs 'phen gang du 'phen// nyi ma nub phyogs pa kaM nas//
193a3(rnying rgyud): drug pa gad mo dkod cing srin byas ro byud zer// tho rang sgo khyi ngu zhing sre mod kyi ro phang du bskur// da ni mda' 'phen de ru 'phen// da ni sgyogs kha de ru sbyar// mda' yi rtse la zor ba sgyur// sgyogs kyi khapa dal kha zlog/ nyi ma nub kyogs pa ki nas// klu yi bu
193a4(rnying rgyud): yid 'od dge// zor kha bzlog la stsogs kha sbyar// bstan pa 'jig pa de la zlog/ khrag zor dmar po dgra la kyob// da ni mda' 'phen gang du dben// da ni stsogs 'phe nad du daphen// nyi ma byang phyogs pa ki nas// 'ug pa gang mo dgod cing yin byas ro nyung zer//
193a5(rnying rgyud): zer mo khyi ru zhang sre mod byi ro 'phang du bsgyur// da ni mde'a'aphen de ru 'phen// da ni sgrogs 'phen de du 'phen// byang phyogs rgyal chen bka' bsgyur ma// zod kha zlog la sgrogs kha sbyar// nyi ma byang phyogs paki nas// bdud kyi bu mo mig gcig rkang 'dags ma/
193a6(rnying rgyud): zor bzlogal sgrogs kha sbyar// bstan pa 'jig pa de la zlog/ khrag zor dmar po dag la slar// mdo'u'i kha la zor kha long // zhes tshe blan no// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ mda' bzhi spogs bzhi'i gdos kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//
193a7(rnying rgyud): des g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// mtsho sman mched kyi bskad mdos la// de yi mthun rdzas ji ltar bsog/ dpa' bo chen pos bkang stsol cig/ ces gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa/ mtsho sman mched kyi
193b1(rnying rgyud): bad cas ni// mngang ngas gang sa ma gsungs te// dang por dam mkha' bsog par bya// gsar ga khong cung btang ba pa// rag mog yule bcug can// sna tshogs dar dang bu'i sdo mas brgyan// sdug mod bu lnga'i phyag tu dbupa// nam mkhang sngon logs
193b2(rnying rgyud): chag can// mthing nag dar dang ma bya'i sgo yis brgyan// ma btsun mthing gi lha ma phyag tu dbul// nam mkha' drung gi khong chud la// gser lag yu yi/ bcag can// dkar mo dbu dgu'i phyag tu bul// khong pa skrag la gyid ma ser// gA y+ra yi khacha
193b3(rnying rgyud): mdzes par btang // tsa sun tre me phyag tu dbul// khong pag pu laphyi ma dmar// gAyu yi bye'u can phyag tu dbul// nam mkha' sngon po blang pag la// drang gi kha chog gtams pa ni// rgya mtsho gling gi dbang mo che la dbupa// khong bdung pa phyir ma dmar/
193b4(rnying rgyud): kha chag ga wal byas pa de// mar rabang thams phrag tu dbul// khong pa gnag pa bI rim dkar// kha chag gi yu yis byas pa ni// rdodade ring mo'i phyag tu dbul// nam mkhang 'ja 'dis 'od po che// sred po brgyal mo phyag tu dbul// kun kyang dar dang mabya
193b5(rnying rgyud): su brgyan// mtsho sbyin mched dgung bskang zas ni// dbang sngon dgral mdzes pa'i mo thong stsal// dar phyogs sngon nas sugazug/ brar ma mamo dang spang gi mno// mar nag mamyo nga tsam mtsho// 'o ma'i mtsho dang khrag gi mtsho// ci sran mtsho dang rnams ba
193b6(rnying rgyud): rdzi kam tho tshun // tha dkyi pa dag pa de bsnyen// byang med mangs ma dgra la gzugs// phyag lags ga su mdzas pas pa// mthong dag dang gzabs na// pyang byi seM nga ya bstam sa// gta das
193b7(rnying rgyud): yang bshams nas na// slob dpon pas sakrugs nas kyang // nam rkyen rgyapa por bskyed nas kyang // mtsho ldan rgyal mo dgra 'gyer// de nas ca dbugag yang byan pa// Ta/ spun tshul gad kyil gtam / tshe ngas su
194a1(rnying rgyud): sa pag da// dol na sa dang s+ho// rkyen sa ra// do byu zal po// kunam pang nam mnapapa/ sa gagasas ga/ mangs na la pa/ ma nga gapangs so/
194a2(rnying rgyud): ni bzhin// mchos par de ni mor re/ gser gyi ha s+thA pa yang shigs so shig/ kla bu po mang di 'i/ gtan bya ma chu sngon skad stan rtongs sa / ngar drang ldams dral yang dar mdir/ gnam sngos sngo yang sangs sesang / mthu gang byed kyang ska dang / ding na/
194a3(rnying rgyud): gtan mob/ ma btsun mthing gi lha mos byas/ kumatsho chen po'i nang shed na/ g.yu yi sbrang ma bathal pa/ de'i nang shid na/ g.yu mkhar sngon po yang ldems se lde ma/ mkhar stod ga wa yinA bran 'thapa/ mkhar slang gawa'i bu khrag tshab/ de'i nang shed na/
194a4(rnying rgyud): gser kyi khri la gsung gdan steng ni/ ma btsun mthing gi sgra mo zhugs/ sba la mthing gi ber men gsol/ dbul dang glanag po gsol/ rtsibs su chu kyang sngon po brtsi bas// phyag nam bu'i rtsab mtshan bsdams// mkhris pa sha yang mngang bdag mo// ba
194a5(rnying rgyud): dra ku mran 'bras kyis bsko// pho nyar bcub can sngon mo bskyed// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes pa/ glang bdag ni srud longs shig/ gsum tsho sngon mon mi ri/ de'i nang shed na/ g.yul lar ljon pa ni rjems sa ldem/ dong nang shad na/ ma'adu kyi bdag rmo
194a6(rnying rgyud): pagla yi pho mo 'od de ring mos byas/ sga la sbrul sngon gyi skrag pa gsol/ dbul mthing gi go phyog gsopa/ phrag na rus sbal nag po'i bar bu bsdams/ g.yon na sbrul zhags ni khra bo ba snams/ chibs su rbas sral nag po bcibs/ mdos bdag ni
194a7(rnying rgyud): mdos bzhes pa/ glang bdag ni krung myod sa shIg/ sa bdag klu dang ni ma sdong par/ ming po na la dbyod kyi mngang bdag ring gakhor du/ sring mo rnam dbrir dam ma ngadang / phyogs phyogs de ni bzhin/ yul bas kyis mabang na/ tshababs kyim gzug na/
194b1(rnying rgyud): ding ding gi nang shed na/ mthing gur sngon mo ni bI ri ri/ gser gyi re thag ni rgyangs se rgyang / g.yu yi tshon phur ni si pi pili/ de'i ni nang shed na// kha bdag chen mos bya/ klu yi bu mo yid 'ong dag/ skal nang sgribs sngon mo gsol/ sbal skyong 'bum gyi ni kha chag can/
194b2(rnying rgyud): sa su chu sri na dar ma bcibs/ rol du sbal pa nag po khrid/ mdze nad shu pa'i mda' bdag mo/ phyag na sbrul gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams/ pho nya chu bcon sngon po dgyed/ mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes la/ glud bdag ni glad bzhes shig/ mnga' bdag deng
194b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor du/ mtsho sman ni mched dgu la/ glud dbul khab 'jal po/ mibs glad re dga'/ rdzas pas khab re dro/ rgya gar yul gyi tshu rol nA/ kha che yul gyi ni pha rol na/ gzeb be ti'i gling shed na/ mdze nad btso brgyad gtong ba'i mnga' bdag mo/
194b4(rnying rgyud): lha po ga yu yi bye'u chung can/ sbrul mgo dgu yi go zu can/ sbal lhong 'bum gyi kha chag can/ rma bya'i la chom pu ru ru/ klu rgyal 'bum gyi lhas gcig ma/ phyag na sbrul gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams/ mdos bdag ni mdos phod la/ grud bdag ni glad
194b5(rnying rgyud): bzhes shig/ dung mtsho dkar mo'i nad shed na/ klu 'od zangs kyi lha ma gcig ma/ sbrul dang dkar gyi go zla gsol/ dbu dgu'i thor tshugs ni gcig tu bcings/ chibs su gser phrul ni gi yu ga shog bcibs/ phyag na dung gi rgod ni legs pa bsnams// kha
194b6(rnying rgyud): rlangs sngon dkar 'jang tshon dakhyug/ ljang sngon drag po'i srin mo ste/ yak+ka nag po'i btsun mo yin/ pho nya ma bdud rgyal mo 'gyed/ mdos bdag ni mdos pod la/ glud bdag ni glad bzhes shig/ mnga' bdag ni ding 'khor du/ mtsho sman mched dgu
194b7(rnying rgyud): la glang 'bral lo/ dog nems nebs kyi ne dog/ mtsho mer gyi nang shed na/ gser mkhar ser po pa/ g.yu yi bad btags pas/ gtan gyi ni ring po rdzing / rin chen ni sgo zhi brtsal/ g.yu'i rgyal mtshan ni bkra pa la/ deng nang shid na/
195a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ phyi la kha bdag mo// mtsho sman rgyal mo hul lem// sru ba mthing nag per chen gsol// dbul ma bya'i mthing zhugaso la// rgya long ma yong tA la la// tshabs su r+g+ha sen mgo dgra bcibs// rob du chun sngon po khrid/
195a2(rnying rgyud): khri sngon mo shel mig gi mngang bdag mo// nad sun gram pa za baphrag gtong / mdos bdag na mdos song la/ spang bdag ni grad ba zhes shig/ mngang bdag ni dang 'khor du/ mtsho sman mched la grung dbral po// khrag mchod dmar pong khrol ba'i nang shed na/
195a3(rnying rgyud): dmar mog yu yi ral pa can// khyod kyi spu lus mthong bas sngo// g.yu yi ral pa dod du 'bar// ral pa'i zar ba tag ma re re la// gser gyi nya sbal shig las shig/ khyi dmar po shel mig gi mnga' bdag mo// 'khor du dung 'phen re mkhar nag mo khol// za phrug
195a4(rnying rgyud): gtod pa'i mngang bdag mo// 'khor du dmar mo dbum gyis bskor// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes shig/ glud bdag ni glang ba zhes shig/ mnga' bdag ni ding 'khor du/ mtsho sman mched la glud 'bul po// mchod mkhar stug po'i nad shed na// dung gi rgyan ni khral
195a5(rnying rgyud): la// g.yu yi khri la gser gyi gdan stengs na// skrag nag chen mo dbu lnga mo// sru la le brgan ber chen gsol// rol mchog yu yi kha chag can// dung gi sdom sdig nyi pi li// bud med dmar nag dbum gyis bskor// chibs su rba blang sngon po bcibs/
195a6(rnying rgyud): g.yas na dpal dang smug po bsdams// g.yon na mchong gi gang bsnams// sbal tag gcig bsgod tsam na// skra ma ring la thams cad dra// khyi skrag mo shel mig gi mngang bdag mo// mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes pa// glud bdag ni smad bzhes shing // mnga'
195a7(rnying rgyud): bdan ni ding 'bor du// mtsho sman mched la klud 'bul lo// ri rab chen po'i rmang shed na// rgya mtsho chen po'i nang shed na// rma'i rab dbyams lha mo grags mo rgyal// srid pa gsum gyi thod gdengs can// gser dang shel gyi rnga mo la// g.yu yi sgra bstad zangs se zang /
195b1(rnying rgyud): mu men gur chen khyi li li// mu tig khu 'phang sha rar// srul ma bzangs ber che na gsol// phyag na glang brug dar 'dzin// sus kyang mi bskyod mi shigs yang // rnal 'byor dmatshig can la dgongs// bran grwa spags pa tsor re// zhabs gcig rgya mtsho gting drub kyang //
195b2(rnying rgyud): klu pran mang po phran du gsol// zhabs gcig srin po'i yul du bzung // srin po po mothon du 'khol// phyag gcig ri rab rtse la bton// l+h+wa ma yin gyi g.yul ngo zlog/ phyag gcig b+ha yi lul rngub byung // lha bran mang po bran du 'khol// mdos bdadug ni ma nos pong
195b3(rnying rgyud): la/ glad bdag ni glad bzhes shig/ mnga' bdag ni ding 'khor du// mtsho sman ni mched dgu la// rgyal du glud 'bul po// mi mo ni rin chen bdun/ mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ rnam shes ni dbang por ldan/ mi yi ni klad lags te/ mtsho sman ni mched btu
195b4(rnying rgyud): pa 'bral/ nam mkha' ni sems kyi glud/ mi yi gud du dbul po// mo dpang thang bzangs ni gzug/ gzugs kyi ni gyad lags te/ gsal ba'i mar mi dgu/ ranga' jig ni gas pa pa'i klad/ sems nyid snang ba'i glad du 'bral/ rma bu ni mdongs chen dgu/
195b5(rnying rgyud): mdangs dang bsreg gi glad/ bkrag dang mdangs kyi glang du 'bul/ mtsho chen dngas ma dgu/ yul dang ni mkhar gyi glud du 'bul/ dbul dkar me long 'od po che/ dbang po sgo lnga'i glung du 'bul/ dar sna mang po yang / na bzang mdzes pa'i glad/ gos kyi glud du
195b6(rnying rgyud): dbul/ zangs lcags gser g.yu dang / byA khyi mdzes par kha dog bsgyur/ nor gyi ni klud du dbul/ spyan gzigs ni zhal zas yang / zas kyi glud du 'bul/ rin chen spos kyi mi po che// mched lam su yi glang du 'phrul// sha chen gtor mer k+ta rnams
195b7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dam rdzas mchod par 'bral// mtsho sman mched dgu mnos long la// mo dang gud du brje bar Ta// rdzas dang zhabs srung rje 'akra// ma mo'i bkang chad sbar pa glog/ mi bas klung bzang 'bral/ zhes mdos 'di skad ces btang ngo // mchogs ni
196a1(rnying rgyud): so la yang // gtan mchod do// mtsho ldan de mched dgra mchod/ mdos ni gang du gtong / phyogs phyogs ni pag na/ mtshom bang ni mi ro/ bskyod pa'i na thabs krung rtsipa~M paM/ de'i nang shed na/ mdzes kyi bdugs pa/ sa btsun gyi d+ma/
196a2(rnying rgyud): ngags/ ma btsun ma btsun mi ba gyi rba/ mubazangs tha mo'i lham mo lags/ gru bod ldan gyi btsun ma lags/ gyal mo rgyal mo mi bgyi ru/ kla rgyal 'bum gyi lham mo ste/ mtsho sman mched dgra'i rgyal mo lags/ do rlu ni gli 'bral lo// danub ni mdo
196a3(rnying rgyud): ratang ngo // chu n+ya tho po dar kyis brgyan/ mdos kyi drongs pa/ ma btsun gyi spyan snga ru/ mu tig gi \u0f7f bas mdzes/ ma btsun gyi spyan star+tha/ srin mi babs kyi bu bas mdzes/ de'i mdos la ni tshe gcig 'don/ mdos kyi ringab kyang / rin po cing cig
196a4(rnying rgyud): pap+ta/ hU~Mg phreng bani dra brgyas/ srung la ni ma tsam/ dam pa yul gyini skyed pags so/ mdzem khang kyi k+Sha dpags so// mtsho smin ma ched dgra dang me brje ba'i mdas/ deng spanal du chags bsags/ mthun dbu ni mtshang du sangs/
196a5(rnying rgyud): btsun rgyam mad sbyin sngar dbum/ kye mu btsun rgyal men tshur gson ga// lung ni kra yu la ding ban/ mkhang tram khang ni nya la mkhang / stod tig pa pa rba srin gra gtams/ de'i nang shed na/ klu yi tha mo mde lham gcig ma/ smrab skal po'i chom tshom
196a6(rnying rgyud): sol/ zhal pa gsu ngag sngon goston/ phyag na sbal stong gdong bu thogs/ rked du mdzo dang nu ba pa bras kyang ba ThA/ ma brjin mtshan ma zhugs par/ mangs ni phar longs ni dag pa mang na/ tshon tshur 'og ne mna'am tha/ tshe dang rig yang ma 'thos/ mdo
196a7(rnying rgyud): pa bla bas/ rnam cid kyang thugs sa sa/ bla gas na / ga me rme / mdas pa sa / gas pa rgyam tshum la// bang dpral mdas/ gdang naman pa das/ bam
196b1(rnying rgyud): mdas/ donabs dngas ye ma dos/ mtsho sman ma ched dgra dang / yon pa dag nakyi sbyor bdas/ bzlog pa ni mdos kyis bsdu/ dka' dgran pasog nas dprapa/ mthun dag sbrebs nas dbu'/ sra ny-i nga kya 'ang ba/ slob pa sgo sa shig/ dgrang ba dang /
196b2(rnying rgyud): 'phrang sol cig/ sgo ba la btsas su 'bul/ 'phrang pa la bcos 'bul lo// zhes phung bar ma btang / lug sna la khrid du bcug/ yas dang ni 'grogs pa/ da ni gshegs so sha ra ra/ nyi ma byang phyogs pa gi na// byang gi sngon mo khro gnyer las mkhan ma// ming po rdo rje mdos btang gis//
196b3(rnying rgyud): sri mo rdo rje mdos long la// tshe dang g.yang gcig tshur pa gsol// da ni mdos gtong gang du gtong // nyi ma shar gyogs pa ki na// shar gyi spyan gsum mche ba can// ming po rdo rje mdos gtang gis// sring mo rdo rje mdos phong la// tshe dang g.yang gcig tshur pa gsol// da
196b4(rnying rgyud): ni mdos gtang gang du gtong // nyi ma lho phyogs pa ki na// lho yi ser mo spyan gcig mche ba can// ming po rdo rje mdos gtong gis// rdo rje srid mo mdos longs shig/ tshe dang g.yang gcig tshur la gsol// da ni mdos gtong gang du gtong / hi ma nub phyogs pa ki na/
196b5(rnying rgyud): nub kyi dmar mo bye ru'i lan tshar can// ming po rdo rje mdos gtong gis// srid mo rdo rje mdos longs shig/ tshe dang g.yang gcig tshur la gsol// mdos 'di phar song 'gab ma ngan// tshe 'di tshur shog mnang ma za// mdos la phra dang g.yang ma 'bros// zhes phyogs
196b6(rnying rgyud): bzhir phud gtang / mdos byang phyogs su bskyal lo// de nas tshe bla na bshags pa bya'o// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ mtsho sman mdos kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye maho 'jig rten stobs kyi lha/
196b7(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug ma yi bor mdos pa// rdzas rnams mthun pa ji ltang bsog/ ces gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa/ rdzas rnams mthun par bsog pa ni// mda' mtho gang bzhi shu rtsa brgyad/ dbang bu nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ nam mkha' nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ phyogs dang bstan pa
197a1(rnying rgyud): gzug ba nyi rjod/ zan nga ny-i su brgyad/ thad \u0f7fbrgyad/ khrag gapa ba nyi su brgyad/ khan gzugs dang brtan/ gas pa'i gtatam pa'o// snang du nyi tha cad thug sa 'ad
197a2(rnying rgyud): dang ti shwa nga / gtsang gshos gru gsum nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ bya nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ kyang nyi shu kyi brgyad/ phyi rim du gzug go// de nas maN+Dal grang gi lham pa la/ zur bzhi cha yis bgos nas ni/ b+ha kle shuH brgyad/ rtse ma bzhi la dz+ra ba'i/ de ltar ba shams
197a3(rnying rgyud): sa gto dul rnams la/ las kyi chog gzung bsang / rag spangs shing shin po sgra ba dag nas drug tu bskul/ de nas tshogs kyis mchod/ skrag ye shes kyi dbang drug pa 'brid/ de nas snying bzhi dzas dang yas bgasal/ ts+li shing kyim 'dun ga dang /
197a4(rnying rgyud): ma bdun sto bya// nub kyi ma bdun nung s+ho// byang gis bdun drung du // zhes kyang phyog su yas sngags ro sas ma// ma ma sred pa'i bam la sa/ dbang phyug pa sbyim mdzes kyi la du sru cu gcig pa'o// / de nas gzung drung lhayis 'di skad ces

197b1(rnying rgyud): khang sngonam la dmar mos phyi ma byas pa gcig g.yas su drug/ nam ma kha gzang dkar po pa b+h+ya ma ldan pa gtsug pa zla ga yan pa gzug/ khang dmang po papyir ma dkar pos byas pa gcig yogagayas par gzug/ khod sngon mo ladar gyis tshom pa sbyar brgyan/
197b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i ljang bu lnga nam mkha'i 'gram du gzug/ dar nag gi gur dbub/ 'ja' tshon sna lnga'i b+ha br-i/ sha chen gyi gtor mi cha gcig pa sham/ bya kha dog lngar byas la gzug go// de nas rim gyis thugs dam bskang ba dbyings kyi yum jug nas/ spyan mo yan chad
197b3(rnying rgyud): bdang / lha rim mo dgas pa zhi snang / skos dpangs kyim thob bskang / bskang pa rdzas ni mdos dang / lcag nag sa cig pa can dang / thag dad dum grangags bskang / rngasring dang ga tam dza ga dang / zhab zas rtogs dang / mdang bu ga ma myo nga
197b4(rnying rgyud): nyams pa dang / me bong dang dar yod tshad kyis bskang ngo // de nas mdos bsgral ba dgra phyogs su bskal/ ma mo'i zhal khang gral bsgyur// thugs kyi gnag padagra la mdzod// zhabs kyi rten ma dag pa mdzod// phyag gisor gdu ba dag la dpangs/ bdag cag
197b5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos/ dmachog nyams nag sa dragaso pa// mdas bdag ni mdas bor pa// glad bdag ni glang ba zhes shig/ zhes dang pos dgrang gting na bzugs zhes bdud do/ me mo sred pa'i bem chen po pas/ srid pa'i rgyal mo'i mdos sgom pasang /
197b6(rnying rgyud): chen po pabri ska bcu gnyis pa'o// / da nas yang gi lung drung gis 'di skad nus gas pa te// kyi mtho ga tan stobs kyi/ sgra mo nag ma zugs dam paska pa // ljags pang nag ma mdas pa/ mthun rdzas na sa bsas
197b7(rnying rgyud): gas sa// / sang ka' sprul pa/ sgra ma dag sa rdzags dpa bka bab/ mtha rjes ni sngags pas yang pagazung bzhin // drang ngan sdug pa legs pa da pa// dkris pa ni ba gzhag pa bya// ra bzhigs dpa' bdags// tshon
198a1(rnying rgyud): khong mig dgra da dbyug/ de nas gas dbye bral gang pa/ bod nag gzugs byas gzung bzhin sgra yang bskyed/ sra ba dang mthar yang gzung bzhin ga zhag/ sna ma'i sgra gzugs bstod pa dang mthun par bya/ bong thal brtson mang po sadzad/
198a2(rnying rgyud): nang du lha mo bzhugs pa la/ bong bre sgo drung gdags par bya/ nam mkhar khong nag po la gser gyi phyi rim bya/ kha chag ni ga yu/ sna tshogs der dang ma byas brgyan pa dang / dbang zhag la gser gyi mi bong byas la mkhar gyi gdong du sring phran gcig la gzug go//
198a3(rnying rgyud): lding gi phreng ba gcig la/ dar lnga lnga btags la de yang gzug/ de nas phud snyir bu gang gi kha rung thang rgyas gcig gzhag/ gya nAg mo gser gyi mgrin pa can nam/ lug nag mo mig ser ma la rten bcang / dar nag po lce lnga pa'i daphan gzug/ mi dung srong chen gtang /
198a4(rnying rgyud): rkang gi gling bu 'bud/ rnga chen brdung zheng sun drangs/ khong pa'i nang nas byon nas/ gleng phran steng na bzhugs pa la/ ma mos ma ya tid+haspyan/ zhes brjod pas/ phrar pa dang gnyis su med par bstim pas tshul dang cha byad ji bzhir gyur pa la/ bdag badz+ra hi ru ka ru bsgom pa'i
198a5(rnying rgyud): p+lak+Sha ka nas trag nag po gcig ma mo'i thugs gar 'phangs pas/ shin tu gzi byin dang ldan par gyur te/ de la srog gi snying po brkyang ma stong rtse brgyad dbul bar bya'o// A~M ru ru ro ru tsa ba la a shug me ba hUM ma b+ho dza dza/ zhes pa'i yi ge bcu bdun pa/ des srog bsdus nas
198a6(rnying rgyud): gzhung dang mthun par mchod pa rim gyis dbul/ me tog mang po bcal du yang dgram mo// de nas bskyod pa kun yang gtang / dam pa dang phrad gtang bskang ba drag tu bya/ bshags pa 'bul ba dang / de kun thu na re re ster bya zhing / hUM bdag ni ye nas ma chags byang chub
198a7(rnying rgyud): sems// dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs dang ye nas mnyam// gsang pa'i dkyil gakhor gnyen pa 'di bu gnas// mi pha ma sgra ma khyod dang mthun slebs na// dras 'dir mi 'dod dgra langs pas// d+ha ro khyod kyimathu dang byin rlab dam chung // gangs kyis ge bzhin du tsha/
198b1(rnying rgyud): mar dag gi/ bslabs// nags kyi sdug/ gru bzhin drugacig pung bdag gis bslabs// zag par rdzas spa bzhin byang chub sems dang ldan par bslabs// b+ha T+yag khra byug brka du dam chog padag bskyad na// don med ga le ba par ma gtong sa mo khyod// ma /
198b2(rnying rgyud): mgon thugs rjes bdag la dgongs su gsol// 'di dus ngan bskal pa'i tham pa// bde gshegs bka' yi bstan pa bsrung dgongs kyis// khyed rnams ma g.yel thugs dam spangs// grogs so cog kyang grogs min gyi// rnam 'byor grogs mchog
198b3(rnying rgyud): bdag ma tshangs// sgrub po cog gung dum me bsrung // ri la ma chud dam tshig spangs// khams gsal 'khor ba'i gnas 'di rtsa// ma mo mkha' la mang gro bar// nam mkhang stong pa ya gau ni// mamo rten du ma cha' dang // de ni ma ma'i chags sa min// de bas gzhal ya
198b4(rnying rgyud): 'dim spangs// chu bong khyel pa'i bkrong la// don ma mchis par ma mchod zhig/ ma mo rten dang mtsho mi 'gyur// dak+ta'i ma klong 'di ma spangs// dur khrod gnas su ma gshegs shing // ma bsngos 'tsho ba'i zas ma yin// de bas dur khrod rdzas chen 'di ma spangs// nags
198b5(rnying rgyud): tshal la ger ma gshegs shig/ gshegs kyang ma mo de bzhugs sa min// de bas byang+tha ljang po 'di ma spangs// ri bo la gi lhan sdug kyang // ma mo 'chags kyi rten ma mchis// de bas bdag gi srid pa'i ri bo 'di ma spangs// mamotsho khyod kyi dam 'khor yang // dge ba'i don
198b6(rnying rgyud): pa mi dgongs kyi// sdang bde dgra pa srog dang grol// 'chi mad don gyi las bstan gyi// sde med byang rdzob ma spangs nyug/ sring pa gsum po lal med do// don mkhams nyid ma spangs shig/ de bas dang dmang gis spangs// ma mo khyod pa gleng gsol ba// sbre ba 'di dang ldan ma

199a8(rnying rgyud): sa su sa/ sang
199b1(rnying rgyud): tshogs gyi bachag can// ram dul phyag tu dul// 'phang yang zhin bdog mthun// gan mad kyi ldang bral// gsum la bral can ldang ba// shing ris mam bdun dang mthun// 'brub bzhi 'dra bdag sbrum bzhin// lug nag pa lkug cu khrig can//
199b2(rnying rgyud): de rnams dngos sum dngas kyis bskrang // gtso ma'i lag pa g.yas ral mi// g.yon du 'phrul gyi ma long bsdams// dar nag go Ta mthing nag ril bya// spyi gtsugs su za g.yas na khyung // g.yon nasang ga de bzhin bldang // dang krung bzhi yang gre nga ba nga/
199b3(rnying rgyud): me mang kha lnga btang nas kyang // de bzhin spos chen dung pa dang // me tog sna tshogs sha chen gtor ma mi dbang 'bras bu dang // go ro tsAn snying sde'i phye ma rnams// dbang po lnga la mchod par dbul// bstod pa tshul bzhin kun kyang mthun// bsad pa'i mdos rnams 'di yis ni// 2
199b4(rnying rgyud): mar dgra po'i phyogs su bsgral// sngags pa'i dam tshig nyams pa'i tshe// mdos rnams kyis ni bskang bar bya// spyod ra 'bog dang rims dang shi ba yang // dam tshig nyams pa'i chad pa yin// mdos rnams 'di yis bskang bar bya// krung ka gson ma shin tu ga ces// de yis thugs/
199b5(rnying rgyud): dam pa skang bar byung // ma mo srid pa'i ba ma las/ lha mo nag mo'i mang gi gzugs mngos thugs dam bskang ba'i leru ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas gsung A r+d+ha lis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye man 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// ma mo'i khrag mdor rten
199b6(rnying rgyud): mol// bdang ba'i mamo gang ga lags// da yi ngas rnams ji ltar bsog/ ces gsalato// yang bka' sprul pa/ bskang ba'i ma mo bstan pa ni// rnal 'brang mamo bcu ba'i dang // mam bdun dang snying mo ba ne// e kadzan sun drug dang // gsang ba'i yul bzhi sbed
199b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i bu 'degs bzhi// dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi dang ni// ma mo las la grub pa nyi shu brgyad// grub mo dang phyed pa mo// bkang ba'i mamo yin par bshad// bskang ba'i rdzas rnams bstan pa ni// med du mi rung khrag sna gsum yod// gzhan yang sna tshogs khrag sna bsog/
200a1(rnying rgyud): ma mo bdun du do nag snam la// rnal dbyor ma mo bcwa bzhi pa// shing res gzhung bzhin kun kyang bya// ljang brab tu bzhid pas bya// gzhan no ba la chen sAlnga ho// nam mkha' kun kyang gcig pa yin// pho glang mo glang dang za
200a2(rnying rgyud): mdzes par bya// stug dang seng ge dkar po'i khrag/ gyi ba mang zil pa skyes pa dang ma'i khrag/ rnal 'byor ma mo bcu bzhi rdzas// ba glang khye dang rta khrag mi khrag rnams// ma mo bdun gyi dmadzes yin// ri bong ta khrag srin mo bzhi yi dam rdzas yin// dmag gi rgyal
200a3(rnying rgyud): mo gsang ba'i yum bzhi dang // gru 'degs bzhi pa khrag sna tshong bar bsog/ ma mo bcu gnyis dam rdzas yin// e ka dza Ti spyan drug dang // dbang gi lha mo nyi shu brgyad// bru byed ma mo'i dam rdzas rnams// khwa dang dug pa pho rog rnams// gcig tu dril bas khrag sna bar+d+ha
200a4(rnying rgyud): gsum yin// ma mo bdun cu rdzu gsum la// mnyes pa'i mchod pa dbul bar bya// gzhan yang ma mo bcu gsum tshon pa la// rnal dbyor ma mo bcu bzhi pa// gtso mo gnyis pa re re tshan pa gsum re re lnga/ ma mo bdun dang sring mo bzhi pa re re gnyis// bzhi//
200a5(rnying rgyud): tshan dang glud bcu gsum bya/ de yang gtso mo gnyis pa dar gyi go zu bskon// brgya gcig gang mdzes chas su gzhug/ khrag snga'i phor bu bcu gsum bya// so so'i tshan dang ris su dbye// cho ga mdos tshan gsum dang mthun// de nas mdos gtong tsam nangar glad
200a6(rnying rgyud): gsum khrag gi phor bu bcu gsum du bcug pa gtang ngo // de nas gling bzhi bca' ba ni// gling bcu gsum bya ba ngam// yang na dgu ru bu bar gsungs/ rnal 'byor ma mo bcu bzhi la gcig/ de ltar bya bar mdos bsdus chen po'i nang nas gsungs/ mdos gtang ba'i tshe
200a7(rnying rgyud): gakun mthun/ gtang ba ni byab mo dang byed pa po gnyis la gtang / cho blan thugs dam bskang / sngags pa dam tshig tams nas khrag nad kyis thebs na bya// bstan pa bsrung bapa byed pa rang gang bsgrub la/ mtshan dang ldan pa'i yas lug gis thugs dam bskang /
200b1(rnying rgyud): spyir skong pa mkhang pa rdzing dgra dang / sa pa 'dral dgu'i mdangs kyis bskad // med na 'brulas grub tshad bya// rnab dbyor ma mo brtu bzhi la// gzhung dang mthun par bsag par bya// zhes gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ ma mo khrag mdos thugs dam bsla nga//
200b2(rnying rgyud): dang las dang zor du 'phang ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye maho 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// thugs nad dal yams babs pa la// de la zlog thabs ji ltar bgyi// 'jig rten stob kyis bkang stsol cig
200b3(rnying rgyud): ces gsol to// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ da la yams phyugs la babs pa'i tshe// de yi cho ga 'di ltar bya// gleng bzhi rdzas dang ldan pa la// mdongs ldan rma bya'i sgo yis brgyan// sna tshogs lha rdzas tshang bar dbupa// ra sa ma sna tshogs bkor chas brgyan// de nas
200b4(rnying rgyud): yang phud gtsang ma dbul/ srid pa'i rgyal mo dang / smyug ma ral pa gcig ma dang / rak+ta tsa mun ti dang ma mo bdun la drag tu chog byas pa/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga la stsal/ de bzhin du phrad gtsang mas mchod nas zhag gcig gi nang par gzhan du 'phos pa/ satsha
200b5(rnying rgyud): lA pa sgreng / sngags nga'i bgrang nas dal mi chod mi srid do// e dbur 'bud ma hA sa ma tsi dbur byam nas o to shi mo kro ta hUM hU~M phaT swA hA/ zhes brjod na phyags nad gdon mi za ste/ mdos de ni dbyings phyags lha mo lnga di mdos zhes bya'o// ma mo srid pa'i be ma las/
200b6(rnying rgyud): dbyings phun/ ma lnga'i mdos kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas yang g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho 'jig rten stobs kyi lha// lo tog bsrung ba'i cho ga dzaM ltar bgyi// 'jig rten 'joms pas bkang stsol cig/ ces gsol //
200b7(rnying rgyud): yang ba// 'a stsal pa/ zhing la bong za ba dang 'bu sren zab dang / gdon rnams bsrung dang so srin bsrung ba dang / mdzor pa bsrung ba rab tu gces// sri du gso dang lhag pa dang // gag pa bsrung ba dzi ltar lags// ser ba bsrung ba dang / shwa kha bzlog pa dang / pir tog
201a1(rnying rgyud): dmas na bsum sa/ ga so s+ho// bka rtsas pa/ pa song bas san/ dAt+ta sa shA ga ba gnas/ pa lag/ du / ma thags par
201a2(rnying rgyud): sAH/ br-i thA le le saH/ tharbasaH/ des dong bong bzengs par 'gyur ro// zhing pa bru min zan/ rlan pang drag yas par ram tha da nga shing gi blang rtsa'i nas khra ba dang / dbum go dmar po'i rigs dang / mgon gapong ngogs dang / maung dran rnams so// rang
201a3(rnying rgyud): ta/ zhid dkyil du sras la sngags 'dis kha bcing ngo // oM pra pra bu ba lel ye la ber ber/ man dag pa bre du bu zad/ ces kha la tshwas brjod nas sras na gdon mi sdug go// gdon lo brang la gdon na/ stod gang yin pa pa/ shung dkar pa sngags 'dis zab pa nang du
201a4(rnying rgyud): blugs na myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// so nab la rigs gsums// khrag srin dang rlung srin dang / srin bu rang dang gsum las rlung srin ni mi thub ste rtags med na drang srin yin pas mi thub ste/ khrag srin dang srin bupa sngags 'dis gdab po// oM g+ha b+ha b+hang b+hang l+r-in bum ru ba ti
201a5(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ zab bra bo shig tse t+ta ku la nan log log kas kas sA d+ha/ des ni myur lu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gang na ba'i thad dkar gdab bo// de yang khyo ba d+hi ba mas dang po mdzod pa gang byung ba la drug cing sngags 'dis gdab par byung // oM b+ha ga pa b+ha ga la ci dar nan sa hA/ bla ba mang dza/
201a6(rnying rgyud): la tang na/ gyo ma'i yang ngol sangs tsher 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sr-inga? gson rus bla gog mo rdzags bar bcug pa/ 'bra na dang skang ma de blugs/ d+ye nas thal bas kha bcad do// phrar bu gcig dpal ba'i dbyes sa gdab/ gcig snying la gdab/ gcig
201a7(rnying rgyud): gsang ska gdapa/ la du sang ma dang so pa bathal brdugs// dag sngags 'dis brdeg go// sreb sha mar yang / bu da nes sra gang shi bar// oM a kro ta ka ya ma n+ta ka ha na ma tha b+haR+tha hA phaT/ zas theb pa'i ngog gam/ mapa dbangs su panan/ rab thab
201b1(rnying rgyud): dngas su gto stong ba na// rtog pa dgag pa pa gang bathang ba dang bya drug dpa pa gtas te/ gdang bsod na/ thud pa sna rdza basmram pa/ sngags 'das gdapa/ mdud pa ti d+hA gtsug gdang/ de nas byung bas gas/
201b2(rnying rgyud): dgang blang sa gdababo// oM grang ti ti tig gra dang / kra shig ta ya taHla~M hU~M ka hU~M phaT/ de nas 'dis kyang gdabab/ oM shrI maN+Da la ma d+he n+ye ma ma e ka dz+nyA nr-inI dzang / zhes kyang gdab/ pra khrung gi snying pos kyang gdab bo// dngos panan/ grol song pa na
201b3(rnying rgyud): bad nga / da gang byang sa rab sra dzAg/ mkhas ma la byang na chubang sdig nang pang tshab/ mtsho rab pabyung thang ba nag gsus kyi snying g.yon du dang / sgrib 'byung nag sumachog gi sA ru su klog/ mtshan pa lathung non bye dang tham pa// gob pa byang na rna/
201b4(rnying rgyud): gi bas gson // snying ba snong namig rgod/ phreng gi zim ga las g.yon dang bzhag sha 'dang su rdzog pas sngags cag cagadab/ ma~M pa ngos payinan/ dri ma gang log bcug/ gang du brdzog pa gad ba/ TIg pa dkang po nang ga dang /
201b5(rnying rgyud): g.yas g.yon pa / dang badris grang tham gyu sa cing / steng mi dga' bar dang / dgang byung yang snapo skye gtsug stong ba/ lce ba dang mthel lag mtho ba rje chung g.yas g.yon rnams pa gdab/ de nas gang byungs ma 'angs pa dang / den nas pa po
201b6(rnying rgyud): pa dang badrang du ma 'dod na/ bros pa yin pas gang du song bstod// dad pa drim pa sdams des mamyod na/ ming rdul ze bags pa po gyis pa bsta'o// na byung ba'i spyod kyis can rnon mo ngo ma dang brdzis pas kyi// der ma 'i ga nang bu mar byeng ba yang ngong / der gdub
201b7(rnying rgyud): da/ mas sa srung bdas pa/ sngags ga ga pag// dag nga na cugata dzan/ gro mamatshams da no// sngags ga dab nga mchung // ngo ga thas pa ba cwa zlog/ de ga nam thung ga gags kyis pa sad pa
202a1(rnying rgyud): pang // ser baspang bar 'dod na/ seng lde dgazar byas bzhib ma spyod ba ga rlung la kres pa pA la gangs khri cho gcog bzlas pa/ phyogs bzhing zas dang ldanagazag/ thobacig krung dkar ba sngags mang pobazlas pa/
202a2(rnying rgyud): gzung du lnga'u thugs thog seb tu gzhug go// de'i snying po ni/ oM bur bur ma hA pad+ma rngernga 'bur rtsi dpur gyi ge bi ma nu se/ oM ho shaM mon kro ta hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ des ni ser ba zlog par 'gyur ro// shwa bzlog na rabs chad kyi thod par sngags bris pa seng ldeng gi phrar pa la btas
202a3(rnying rgyud): 'thod pa'i nang du bcug la sngags bzlas la/ shwa sgor sbas na shA bzlog par 'gyur ro// ling thog la ni kyai phug ron gyi dong rung g.yas pa ma sngags 'di bzlas nas btags na gdon mi za'o// pra pra druM pa yer yer tog mang bun la song dam byung phur na yer yeng swAn+ta/ rims nad bsu
202a4(rnying rgyud): nagang du bsrung bar 'dod na mdo gdon tsha tshe dang chu gtor btang / gling bzhi kha lnga'i mdos btang / gnod sbyin gyi sngags bzlas/ de yis rims nad thub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ 'jig rten nyin gdags pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//
202a5(rnying rgyud): de nas ma mo rnams ni las la grub pas/ de dngul ba'i thabs ni ji ltar bgyi/ zhes dgongs nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho 'jig rten 'joms pa'i lha// 'di la nan tan ji ltar bgyi// 'jig rten 'phoms mdzad bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to//
202a6(rnying rgyud): yang bkang stsal pa/ ma mo nag mo thub pa// rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya// ye shes cha las skyes pa dang // 'jig rten pas la grub pa'o// ye shes cha las skyes pa ni// dbyings kyi yum drug sbas nas byung // rtag na rtag pa'i rgyal mo drungag// rigs lnga kun
202a7(rnying rgyud): bzeng phrag mtshan dang // dbu gsum phyag drug rngam par byung // dbyings kyi ye shes ma mo dang // pas kyi ma mo'i cha 'dzin pa// dkar mo dbu gsum dbyings kyi cha// phra men rgya mtsho las kyi cha// phra men zhes su bya ba de// bdud po thod pa'i phreng ba dang // srid pa'i
202b1(rnying rgyud): bad 'dra thos pa pas// tha mon byam tsho mkhang pathon// des na byings kyim mo dang // bdud chos pas ye shes pas ma byung // tha min thas sa dpathu// dkar rdzogs sa byab na// gsang bdag phrag nardo rje yis// smang pa'i rgyab mo nyid 'a grags ye shes bya/
202b2(rnying rgyud): mdang gcig 'phangs pas/ mo las sras gcig bltams pa las/ skyon gyis ma gos pa'i rtags su dbu gsum skya ni dkar mo ldem bag tu byung ngo // phyag na rdo rjes nyi zla gnyis thod du bcings nas/ khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi khyod kyis thul cig ces bsgos so// de bzhis
202b3(rnying rgyud): rung byed ma bzhi btul lo// des ni dgyes sde mo bzhi btul lo// des nam bdun min chad ni las pa grub pa ste/ 'jig rten pho mo'i mdza' na las byung ba'i ma mo mang po'o// ma mo bdun cu rtsa brgyad ni skul pa'i ma mo'o// bya ba mo dang byed pa mo ni dbyings kyem mo'o// gnas
202b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi ma mo dang / tshe'i lha mo bcu drug zor bdag mo bzhi ni nyi shu gnyis te bdud mo'i rigs so// las la grub pa rnams ni/ gong ma rnams ni rje bo lta bur blta'o// chos 'di la ni gzhan med de gong ma rnams yod par blta'o// de yis bsgo ba rnams kyang nyon//
202b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin du rnga bo ltar blta ba'i rnal 'byor pas kyang shes par byang// sprul pa'i ma mo dang dbyings kyi ma mo dang / las byed ma mo dang bdud mo'i rigs so// ma mo bzhi po de ni ye shes kyi cha dang pas kyi chabs bskyed pa ste/ ma ni thabs mchog 'dod med mkha'// mo ni shes
202b6(rnying rgyud): chags med klong // ma ni nam mkha' dbyings kyi mkha'// mo ni sems kyi sems nyid klong // ma ni zos nyid zab mo'i klong // mo ni nam shes hUM du 'bar// sems nyid thig le hUM du dus// de las ma mo thams cad 'dus// de las dbyings kyi ma mo ni// sems te
202b7(rnying rgyud): mkha' la dbyings nyid thong // thams cad sems 9/ dag par blta// bdud mo rigs kyis 'di ltar blta// gang zag rnam gyi bdag med cing // chos la phyogs gcig yod par blta// srul pa'i ma mo rnams kyis ni// bdag dang bdag gi byed pa po drug ste/
203a1(rnying rgyud): mdzad sto sa / na pa sa na// da / du sa/ gas sa // pa ga rmo sa// /
203a2(rnying rgyud): na po khyog nan ma dor bstan 'an// zhag gsas s+ho// mam med pa ngas pas/ mamo mas kyings pas song bstan pa dang sgrub do brtan pa'i 'jigapa dpang// de nas gsung rdung ga yas 'de sa da ces gsol ta/
203a3(rnying rgyud): dbregarten stoms shes// ma mangs kyis ji ltar gang dag gang gis brtsal// ji skang dul bar ba shang dru gsopa// ces gas // / rlu ba bstam pa dang / ye shes thig po chen po dang // gsang chen pa bde la sa mdzag dang/ yang gachags
203a4(rnying rgyud): chen pa // rang gsang ma tho drug ngo ste// 'od chen mdog snga tshogs kyis// srid pa'i rgyal mo chen mo yis// dbyings kyi khrum drug bskyed pa las// rtag pa'i rdul ma drug tu snang // de nas srid pa'i bded krig tsom yis// te bathod par gdan du ti
203a5(rnying rgyud): byin pa'i rgyan papas// rgyas pa ba rten zhib dang // bcas pa 'di tho ga // med pa'i rgyab thobasdumapas/ sa ma ga pa dang // na sa pa // mdza su pa gdan da nas
203a6(rnying rgyud): dakhor 'ding // srid pa'i chags byed ldan gnyis mnan// sri dpa 'ang sngags skrag pa yis/ e ka dza rje wAn drug panani// rnabs dang nas bang bzhin kyis// chags pa dbang byed dam ma yis// 'did la mas da dang rten sma gnyis ya // mr-i dang
203a7(rnying rgyud): dang gyu gyi'o// dam sa sun zhes 'an// dang na tu ma dbugs / chen bdun po gdanang mdan// ga'asagayo bapas dang gas bcas// dpag gi tha yod pas
203b1(rnying rgyud): te shuHbrgya dgan rgyal mnan// de ltar gdan du bting nas kyang // snying 'dren phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // drag po sngags kyis bcing bar bya// tA+e mu kha t+ta leng ha shA ha sha phaT/ kri ya shaN+De nan/ su r+ya pa taka rag sring 'gro nan/ su ti shin dun ti nan/ ke ma ta ke ma ta ni la ta nan/
203b2(rnying rgyud): ma ma hA b+h+yo nan/ ma mduSh+TA nan/ ma ma duSh+Te phaT/ me rag tA pi ba ga nan/ zhes brjod pas/ gdan gyi rgyu rnams bsgyel nas/ de nas bdud rtsi dmar chen kha ru blags/ oM badz+ra a mr-i ta a d+hit+te/ tsit+ta nan/ ta Ta phaT nan/ nan ti ni nan/ srog 'phrog pa yin te/ bdag gis snying khrag zhas
203b3(rnying rgyud): du rngubs// sde yi steng du gsal bar bzhag/ sgyid ni khrag 'thung kun gyi rje// nga ni khrag 'thud kun gyi yab// nga ni srid gsum snying rje'i bdag/ nga ni ma mo kun gyi rje// thams cad kyi ni snying khrag bdag/ khyod rnams snying khrag nga la yod// nga yi las rnams khyed kyis
203b4(rnying rgyud): sngags// tsa du ne wi oM mo d+ho/ ru lu ru lu rag mo b+h+yo/ ye shes rtsal 'phang thig le yis// bsgom bya ma mo bcu gsum la// drug cu rtsa brgyad dkyil 'khor rdzogs// bdag nyid bla na med pa yi// ting nge 'dzin du gas pa byas la// sems pa dbang po las bskyed pa'i//
203b5(rnying rgyud): ma mo chen mo bcu gsum la// ma mo drug cu rtsa brgyad srog gi snying po bsdus// 'khor du ma mo gzhan yang bzhag/ de nas 'byor tshogs mchod pa bsham// khro ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams pa mchod// hUM thig le'i dbyings las bskyed pa'i kho rgya laM yum// gnyis
203b6(rnying rgyud): med ha ha bzhad cing rnam pa'i d+hi s+tha dbyin// mche ba dkar po gtsigs shing snying 'dren rkan sbrang de// ma mo'i tshogs rnams dngul mdzad dkyil 'khor mchog/ ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya bstan pa ni// rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las// oM dang sna gnyis rgyab bsnol bakhyud/
203b7(rnying rgyud): dbu gsum rje sprad sku gsung thugs// ma mo rdo rje khrag gi rtsa// rdo rje khu gyur dam du bcings// snga gnyis rtse sprad gyen du bsgreng // oM gnyis rtse sprad tha dkar bsgreng // snga gnyis rtse sbed thugs kar ba kan// dbu gsum thugs kar dam du bsnol// @
204a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ yazugs kar bzung ba ni// ma ma dang ma yiH// oM gnyis chub bsnolu lag chud// 'brug sum sor mo thu bsnol ta// TI gnyis drag sdug yab pa ni// maman ma khrag gi na// rdong thal mo brkyang ba las// nga
204a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis las// shes rab sA yis mtshon par bya// shes rab oM dang ha gnyis la// thabs kyi hU~M gis bstan par bya// shes rab hUM dang a brkyang ste// thabs kyi a dang sA ba kan nas// sems kyi dkyil du brkyang bkan pa// ma mo ye shes
204a3(rnying rgyud): 'gro'i rtsa// rdo rje rin chen rdzogs pa yi// phyag rgya bzhi zhes dpa' bos bshad// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ phyag rgya bstan pa dang lta ba bstan pa dang ma mo 'dul ba bstan pa'i skabs kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas g.yung drung lha yis 'di
204a4(rnying rgyud): ces gsol to// 'jig rten 'joms mdzad stobs kyi lha// phyag rgya chen po ji ltar lags// zhes gsal to// yang bka' stsal pa/ thig le chen po'i phyag rgya ni// rdo rje khu tshur kha smad nas// shes rab mchog gi phyogs nas su// oM AHhUM gsum
204a5(rnying rgyud): skad de// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rgya// thabs kyi hUM dang sgo gsum rgya// rang rtags ye shes phyag rgya yin// shes rab sA yis su gsum 'khril// thig le byang chub sems kyi rgya// shes rab hUM'i rtse mo ru// thabs kyi sna yis sngar mnan mas// thabs dang rna
204a6(rnying rgyud): rab phyag rgya yin// mig le chen po phyag rgya bcings nas su// ma hA su par bsdams gyur na// bla na med par gsal 'gyur bas// dus gsum nyes dmigs sel bar byed// dus gsum mgon bshad// dkyil 'khor bsgom dang lu mdog dang // thag
204a7(rnying rgyud): ma bstan pa dang / skye shi rtsa ba gcod cing bde klong dbyings su chud// kun kyang spu mdog jo ror zhugs shing dbang chen dkyil rdzogs/ khyag nas sprul par byed cing drug su spong// ma me'i 'khor du 'dus shing b+ha ga'i mnga'am
204b1(rnying rgyud): b+hag+sa bcad namathun pa mdan// rnalas brjod na du // nam rtag gnas kyi thal la pa da/ na te pa mas ma// stsalal // ny-i stsa/ sa dag stsu nas // dkyil labar dag pa sa 'a sa
204b2(rnying rgyud): maman mo da snrel 'bar nas// ku byu dkyil la bar mda' bdag po// bani cang thabs bcad pal ldang 'bang // mkhajal ba grong byings dgas la// mkha' 'gro srog gi mad ming dam// dkyil 'khor gtso bar gshegs su gas la//
204b3(rnying rgyud): chen mo byung bdag mo// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i mu mdog la// zhal gsum shar gyi mkha' 'gro ma// drim mo chen ma dbugs kyi bdag/ sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// zhal gsum nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro ma// yang sras drug gi dkyil 'khor nas/
204b4(rnying rgyud): thug dam chen yod dgyes dgongs la// bcol pa'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// rnal 'byor ma bcu bzhi bskul// dang por ma mo bskul ba'i thabs dang / dbang du sprad pa dang gsang ba'i gnas bstan pa ni sngon du bshad zin to// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/
204b5(rnying rgyud): me phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas 'bru lnga'i don lag gi 'du byed bsgom pa ni/ g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las// rdo rje gang du bskor ba ni// shes rab mchog gi snying gar bstan// sbom po dbang mo rtse sprad de// thabs
204b6(rnying rgyud): phyogs mtshams bskor ba ni// mamatshogs kyi rdul mo'iH/ rdo sbyir mang ma bsngal te// abasbed rnam kya cings pas// mamadzo dras pa'i rtsa// dag bu rgyar bcid pa las// dri dag gnyis kyi bzlas nas// 'brugasam brgyad nas gshog pa'i rdza
204b7(rnying rgyud): nar ni zer bzung ba ni// phyag rgya grub par bstan pa yin// ma mo srid pa'i bim las/ rin po che gter gyi le'u kye nyer gcig pa'o// / g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig rten 'joms pa stobs kyi lha/ 'jig rten 'di ltar dang
205a1(rnying rgyud): pa// rim pa gang zhig gangags pag// yang dag dpa' bos bkang stob TIg/ dak+Sha snul p+ta/ 'jig rten 'di ltar dang byed pa/ med pa ma kha pas bgying pa'i dbyings kyi lumadrug dang / med pa ba 'gral mgang
205a2(rnying rgyud): brdza pas bskyed pa'i bu mo sran drug dang / dbyung ba lnga'i chags 'dzin sman gnyis dang / dus bzhi rdzogs pa'i gtso mo sum gyi mkha' la gnas/ bras bzhi dpang byed ma ni bu mo spun drug dang / nye grwa khyod phreng ngo // cha snyoms mni khros pa'i dbang mo che bani dang /
205a3(rnying rgyud): ste ga // dus kyi thub lam bzhin sring mo bzhi'o// ma mo rang rang gi bkol thabs ni/ yul chen mo'i mkha' la rgyu ba'i mamogs ma dang / dbyings las shwar ba ma mo gus ma dang / yid pa bsgom legs pa dang bdun pa khob po// mamo bdun ni rnal
205a4(rnying rgyud): byo kyi drod phul bas nam gyi gung pachu'o// yum chen mos nyin mtshan phyed mar nyul zhing gzigs te/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad la mnga' mdzad do// de nas khros pa'i dbang mo che bani/ yum chen mos gtso byas/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo la sogs te/ ma mor grags
205a5(rnying rgyud): pa dang l+r-id pa kun pa dbang mdzad/ rgyal mo chen mo sgo nas sred pa thams cad 'char/ bcu bzhi zhes bsdu brje dang 'bangs lngab sa drug yod/ de ba ni nang skyon dang gung sngon dang / zlon dang bar mtshams rnon po zhes kyang nga // nyi ma dang bcwa rtsa gcig/ b+hab dang 'a
205a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyis/ ri rab kyi byor lan yod pa'i snang sring thams cad che gnas ci yang mi sred pa pas/ ri rang kyi rang thung nas yang dpag pa sum gyi ni yongs dus ta byung ni// shing gi rtse mo rab kyi tham pa nang na/ yum chen mo sa dang 'bral med/ snga mdog mthing nas/
205a7(rnying rgyud): 'bang ba las/ dbu dang phyag cir yang ston pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi ral pa can/ spyan gnyis g.yas nas khrag gi mchi ma bangag/ g.yon nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchi ma 'dzag pa/ yang na bdud rtsing mchi ma zhab nas 'bras bu rnamar pa lnga'i brgyad 'dzag pa/ sbas
205b1(rnying rgyud): pang drug gnyis na/ g.yas spyod pa thams cad kyi stong bzang nas rirab pa 'dus pa/ g.yanan dzu dang / zla bathung nas sa pa zlas pa/ smras pa gabs gnyis nas na/ g.yas pas bangagatan na dbang pa rnams kyi smra bas pa/ gas bang/
205b2(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten na dbang che ba thams cad kyi steng rdza mnan pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' ges kyi dbus nas skad srid thams cad 'phel 'grib mdzad pas/ ye shes rang rig pas ma gtogs pa kun kyang mkhab steng du spyad pa/ d+hU bo ga cig nas khrag gi ras pa gcig
205b3(rnying rgyud): gis sring pa'i ma mo thams cad dbang du sdud pa'o// de nyid kyang badz+ra he ru kas spyigatsug tu nub par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de ni ri rab kyi rtse bum pa'i nang na bzhugs pa'o// de'i mdun rgyab na srid pa chags byed ma dang cha snyoms ma gnyis gnas so// yum chen
205b4(rnying rgyud): mo'i khol mo srid pa zhig 'dzin ma dang / srid pa'i byan byed gnyis shing gi rtsa ba na gnas te/ ri rab kyi phyi rol na snang zhing srid pa skye 'gro thams cad gcig kyang mi snang ba las/ yum chen mo'i sku'i sprul pa srid pa'i bde 'gro mas sdang srid bsdu ba'i phyis
205b5(rnying rgyud): dablang ba lnga 'drod pas skal pa'i bra mo dkar mo la ga yu'i ral pa can/ dpral ba'i dbyes na mig zur gsum pa yod pa gcig/ ljags dang zangs kyi mkhar nag la/ snying bzlas pa'i phreng zhags can gcig skyes pa des/ nyi stong rjod du bcings na te/
205b6(rnying rgyud): b+hA zung gcig btang bas/ gdong srid pa cha snyoms mo// de ni nang par nyi mA'i zer la zhon nas ma mo lnga bcu rtsa drug dang bcas nas/ dgra srog cha ma la 'bebs pas/ de'i dus su gtor ma gtang ngo / de nas nyi zla stong gi thod phreng ma mo hi dgasang gnas/ r-i rab
205b7(rnying rgyud): gyi ring dra smras pas/ kA la ya byang gdang sa can gyis tshor nas/ bye ba'i mor yid kyis spyor pa gcig byas pas/ glang gi po la bum spun bzhi skyes pa dang / khol mo srung ba cha snyoms mas skye ba bcad pa dang / bu mod bzhims sa di btags te/
206a1(rnying rgyud): dmar ma dbang bsgyur phrag na bsdams// dum bu gnyis pa yod pa'am// dorje gya gra ma rjer bajug pa// ser mo las mkhan phyag na bsnams// de rnams rten du bcas pal// ra ma mad na rgyan gas pa/
206a2(rnying rgyud): rigs ni mtshan ngan 'dir mi gtogs// b+han+ta de bzhin ldan pa la// shel gyi rgyu bzhi yang dag rdzogs// gzhan yang dam rdzas ma bzhi bsog/ de nas ma bzhi dbang bskur ba'i ngan sngags bod pa/ 'bod zad gsod pa gsum du dril la bzlas/ dang
206a3(rnying rgyud): por bzlas pam ma snying kha ra ka/ ma ma rak+Sha ma ma ngan/ raglo steng khrag la ma mdun dun/ trag kram snying he ke ma ma ma ru lu ru wa b+h+yo/ zad pa dril ba/ khog sbub ro la gcig ma ma snying khrag pa sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzadza snying rtse byung zhig/ ma ma sting tsit+ta la thun/
206a4(rnying rgyud): snying khrag ma mdun dran/ shi ti Sha ma snying la ya ma mabyo/ bsad pa dril ba la/ mA mA sha sha ma mthing rdzing / dgra bo ma ma sa ma ya/ dgra bong tsit+ta ma dz+wa la mA ra ya dAM/ tsit+ta tsa la rol tshwa bru~M pi li/ ma las myur du mdzod cig/ ces drag tu bskul lo// hUM shar
206a5(rnying rgyud): kyi dkar mo mig gcig ma// na bza' shun chen rlon pa gsol// b+han+d+ha rlon pa'i dril bus brgyan// ral phran zhag gi thigs pa la// dung chen mche ba gtsigs pa yis// shar phyogs srid gsum phur pas 'debs// rin chen shel gyi thod gdengs can//
206a6(rnying rgyud): zhag gi lan phran bsigs pa yis// steng du ya bdud rdungs shig che ma// bar du dgra bgegs thal bar rlogs// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i lho phyogs na/ zhag mo chen mo mche ba can// mi lpags rlon pa'i go zu can// b+han+d+ha skam po'i dril bus brgyan//
206a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje lan phran dril chen 'khrol// lcags kyi mche ba gtsigs pa yis// lho phyogs dgra bgegs phur pas 'debs// gser ga yu spe la ba'i thod gdengs can// dril chen ral pa gsigs pa yis// steng du lha chen 'ching bar byed// bar du dgra
206b1(rnying rgyud): cagag dpying zlar ba'i zla ba nyal bu lce chu gcig skyes pa dang / jo ma nyim 'thod phreng can gyis rgom rdza drang dkar du meng btags te gos bdag tu dbang 'gyur ro// de nas gos rje drang dkar dang srid pa ma sbyor gnyis ci shug tu 'dus tu srid pa'i dos btab bo// de gnyis las bu mo sman drug gyis te 'igatsun /
206b2(rnying rgyud): drug yin no// kho rang yang bdud/ e ka dzA Ti yang bdud mo las bu mor ma byas/ ming srid du byas te/ ngo mo nyi ma'i thod phreng gis bstan pa bsrung du bcug ste sngags srung lcam dral du ming btags so// de nas yang rta'i lo la bye byas pas lug gi pho la bu mo spun drug skyes te/ gzhi na khros pa'i ga @#
206b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi'o// skos bdag drug gis chung mar blangs so// shar gyi sgos bdag gcig ni bar snang gi ma mo dang 'dus so// srid pa gru 'degs mar ming btags so// gcig ni e ka tsar mang meng btags so// thugs kyi dgyes sde mo bzhi'i khol mor yang thob bo// yang lug gi lo chos brgyad kyi nung ma
206b4(rnying rgyud): byas pa ma/ spre'u lo khyi zla ba'i tshes bcu gsum dpyid zla ra ba bdud kyi nyi ma la bcos pas ci byed ce ru la btub bo// dgyes sde'i khol mo bzhi'i ming ni/ dkar mo chen mo mche ba can dang / ser mo rkang lngag ma dang / nag mo kha glal ma dang / dmar mo mchu 'jib mdang bzhi'o// de bzhi'i ring la ni/ pha
206b5(rnying rgyud): sgos rdo drang dkar gnod sbyin gyis lcags thag la brgyus/ ma yugs kyi gson mor las nas der skye ba'i chud chang / gnod sbyin gyis kho'i mgo yang bsgyur nas seng ge'i mgo byin pas lus nag por bskur nas bstan pa srung du bcug/ 'khor du 'gong lo spun bdun btang ngo // de na lug dang sde
206b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis gnyen bu du mi rung ngo // lug dang spre'u gnyen byas ni rabs chad kyi lo bra ba yin no// phag dang byib gnyen byas na po'i sa ru rab chad kyi ro ngur 'debs/ glang dang 'brug gnyis gnyen bu mi rung ngo // kha smras deng sgo khri yang mi chags/ bar du lha mi 'chags te/ ri ba rnyi las krung gi lo bya ba yin/ stag dang
206b7(rnying rgyud): sbrul gnyen mi bya/ khang rdibs dag khang khyim la zhugs pa'i lo yin// rtag dang phage gnyen mi bya/ srog gi lus gtor gyi lo bya ba yin/ bya dang sbrul du 'dus la kha yan gyi lo bya ba yin te bya lugs sa byed pa bya ba yin/ bya dang spre'u gnyen byas na/ phog pas spangs/ mo g.yon stongs bya ba yin// khyi dang
207a1(rnying rgyud): chos thug nyen byas nas ram shing zad kya bya ba yan te/ skrag dang thag tu byas nas shishing zad thub yin/ de ni rang ba phyag bya ba yin no// ma mo srid pa'i bamangs/ kye rgyud ma spang gi pa'i macan nyid medade tsam bsten pa'i yang ste nyer gnyis pa'o// // de nas pa sngags
207a2(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// lha chen po bdun gyi chung ma srin mo chen mo bdun 'jig rten du rab tu gnod pa las/ yum chen mo'i thugs kyi sgrub pa dbyings kyi yum jug gi srul pa nang blon drug/ gsang ba bsdus pa'i ma mo// de ltar btul nas nang gi blon mor byas so// gsang ba bsdus pas ni tizla bong rtse
207a3(rnying rgyud): rkyen no// de nas rgyan gyi rgyal mo dang la bdud rtsapa mo gnyis byi ba'i lo pa nas byas pa las/ phag gi yo bu btsas pa las/ lo yang myur ba las/ yang la shod kyi phyes tor dang / 'dod lams lha'i gtso mo gnyis mtsho mar skyes pa las/ de nas yar la shod kyi skyes to ri zhes pa dang / bdag nyid ma gnyis
207a4(rnying rgyud): shishi napa byis la'i rtse mor lug gi lo la mdzad na brgyugs pas/ bdag nyid ma'i rnyeng pa ya khrag tsa re 'dug pa mthong ste/ phyag zo nas mchil ma gcig khrag la bor bas// khrag dang mchil ma 'dres pa'i bu ming sring gnyis skyes pas spre Ta'i lo pa gan ma khyi dkar po skyes so// sring mos bdag pad+ma'i phreng yin te/
207a5(rnying rgyud): rmugs/ pha ri ma la yang thos pas bu ming sring ni dam sri dang rgyal por gyur to// yang la shod kyi skyes to ri sbring na gnas long na pa lug dang spre'u po byi byas pas/ lug gi lo la ming po shel ging dkar po skyes so// sring mo ni pad+ma gar gyi dbyings phyug ma/ de nas shel ging dang pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma
207a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis ming sring nal byas pas/ bu dgod po spun dgra skyes so// des na mi rung ba yin no// de nas e ka dzA Ti'i ming ni ma mo yongs kyi tshogs bdag mo zhes bya'o// gru 'dags ma bzhini nyar ting dkar mo dang / dran ting nag mo dang / shan+ti dmar po dang / grab ting ser mo dang bzhin nyi ma phyed na rgya ste/ de'i
207a7(rnying rgyud): dus su gtor ma gtang ngo // skying ma mo dkyil 'khor brgyad yod de/ sram chen mo'i dkyil khor ni sbrang srid rdzogs ldan mchog kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// dkar mo mig gcig sa ni te sgra 'od ldan gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// thos pa'i dbang chen bzhini nyid rje thams ldan gyi dkyil 'khong sa/
207b1(rnying rgyud): dkar po ming // gcig la sogs bzhi ni gsang ba dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// dbyings phyug ma ni phung byed sbas pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi ni skye 'gro yongs su spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de ni bdud rtsi bum pa dang 'dra'o// thugs kyi dgyes sde ma bzhi ni ge sar yongs kyi dkyil
207b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor zhes bya'o// srid pa cha snyoms ni mnyam byed chen mo'i tshogs so// srid pa'i gru 'degs ni gling bzhi spyi'i tshogs so// e ka dzA Ti ni pho nya kun gyi tshogs so// dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi ni dri za la sogs pa'i rigs so so'i tshogs so// 'dod khams b+ha'i gtso mo ni bud med nag mo'i
207b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang pad+ma gar bye dang phyug ma gnyis nyul byed chen mo'i tshogs so// rin chen srid 'degs ma dang gleng bzhi spyi phud ma ni sman phran gtso mo'i tshogs so// e ka dzA Ti'i bu mo/ e ka dzA ra bsam nas/ jo mo kun gyi nang na bdag gi jo mo pa'i khud par dbang chung bas/ khol mo'i nang na 'ang
207b4(rnying rgyud): chag dbang chud pas nang 'thab cig bya snyam pA las bu mo gcig pu mas byi sna byas te rgya mtsho gting nas chu srin gyi rgyal po ku be ra ma ka rab bkug ste/ dug shing gdug pa can gcig gi gam du nyal po byed du bcug pa'i bu/ dbug gi lo la bu dkar po mig gcig pa bya ba skyes te/ srin mo nag mo tha
207b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzag ma bya ba skyes/ nad gtod pas ming ni lha mo nag mo zhes bya'o// de nas ming pos ma'i mthu dang gzi byin phrogs te 'jig rten yongs kyi mthu yang chu bar bgyis pas skra mo e ka dzA Tis tshor te jo mo khros pa'i dbang mo che la zhus nas/ rjes 'bangs pa bsgral ba'i las byas pas mi gcig gi khor nas
207b6(rnying rgyud): tsit+ta bcu byung ba las/ gcig snying gi bdag po la sbyin/ dgu pa gsum rgyal ze'u khra bo dang / tri shang ka ra dang / gnod gtor dang gsum ste rgyal po'i rigs la gnod de/ gsum la bar ze'u spug po dang / legs the'u khra kho dang / sa ze'u nag po gsum ste yongs kyi mi la gnod do// gsum ni phyogs bzur/
207b7(rnying rgyud): gyur te brag srin dang shing srin dang chu srin gsum du gyur to// dgu car rkang pa ya de bcag nas/ gnam khyi dkar po 'khol du bcug go// de nas i ka dI Ti 'brug gi lo pa lus ma bde nas mnyes btsir ba las/ bu gdong sog po mig bong ba la/ lus sbyang ki la khog pa na snying gsum yod pa gcig skyes pa las/ de
208a1(rnying rgyud): nisra pa dang ba med papas/ dam thong sted dbyen pa/ bums pa la sa na rjod pa zhig pong snyam nam/ sa pa pang med pa rlang rtswam nas dag 'a zhing 'drug 'apas/ jom ta ma thod gang gis tshor nas gang gi gatha par byen nas gtang ngo // mamo med pa'irim pas/ sa dang po dang mo khyad kyi la te ter ga
208a2(rnying rgyud): pa// // g.yung drung lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye maho bajig rten 'joms pa'i lha// dadren cing dgugs pa'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags// zhes gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa/ hUM hUM badz+ra nan ti phaT/ ma ka dun ting b+h+yo/ oM mu ting b+h+yo/ ba sha na ti ni ga mu dun ti ni/ oM a su rba pi to ma to ye
208a3(rnying rgyud): to a to yi/ kha rag byi to a to ye// sring 'gro byi to a to ye/ oM badz+ra ka ma ke ma/ oM badz+ra ta ke ma ta ke ma/ badz+ra nI la/ badz+ra na le/ badz+ra da pa/ badz+ra man+t+ra/ oM badz+ra gra ma bu la/ mur shing / oM badz+ra snying kha rag kha ran sting / tra ga rak+Sha mAr tsag sha/ thA ga rak+Sha mu tra baM/ khung mu ta ma/ tra ga ra thA/ pra
208a4(rnying rgyud): ka ra/ ka tiSh+Tha b+h+yo/ pra sha b+h+yo/ phra shi shad gyi sha b+ho/ d+h+r-i ka ra ka ma ro/ nam la tshwa ra mi ta kha tong ta/ da la tsang pa tsa la/ pad+ma tsan+na b+h+yo/ gu mu rak+to/ ting si dang saM/ e a ra li bu byi ru ru lu ru lu/ d+hudz+ha b+h+yo ru rak+Sha/ oM a mr-i ta b+h+yo/ ting b+h+yo ti b+h+yo/ pra ting b+h+yo/ mu ti b+h+yo/ shan ting b+h+yo/ du na ting b+h+yo/ rak+ti / ha
208a5(rnying rgyud): tid b+h+yo/ grub ting b+h+yo/ te ye ti d+ya ta b+h+yo/ a par b+ho/ da la dun b+h+yo/ ni pa ma ma ka sa dam b+h+yo/ dbang phyug ma bskyed pa ni b+h+yo nyi shu rtsa brgyad do// de ni ma mo'i 'gugs 'dren yin// zhes gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i bem pas/ 'gugs badren sngags kyi leru ste nyer bzhi pa'o// // de nas g.yung
208a6(rnying rgyud): drang lha yis 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten 'joms pa'i stobs kyi lha// srid pa'i dbang chen 'di dag kun// bsnyen bsgrub bcol na ji ltar bgyi// zhes gsol to// yang bka' stsal pa/ bsnyen bsgrub bskul ba'i tshigs rnams kun// ngas gsungs kun grags the tshom med// hUM srid pa'i
208a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo sgrubazhengs shing // dbu ni dpag pasam shing gi bum pa la// sku ni ri rab gtos yin te// ma mo khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'byung ba lnga las grub pa mo// khyod kyi sku yi dkyil 'khor nas// 'gro ba rigs drug khyod las 'char// khyod kyi sku stod g.yas g.yon nas// lha dang lha min g.yul po
208b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyed// mtshon cha go cha na bun la// lha dang lha min 'thab mo dgyed// lha rnams rgyal te lha min pham// do nub mi dang 'dre ru 'thab// lha yi mthu dpung ma chung zhig/ ma mo khyod kyi lta ba nas// dug gsum 'khor ba gti mug phag/ mun ltar gtibs pa'i na bun las// 'khor ba'i sdug
208b2(rnying rgyud): bsngal nyams su myong // de yang ma mo khyod kyi lto// gti mug las kyis ma rtogs nas// 'dod pa'i ma mo thugs dang 'gal// srid gsum nad rnams b+h+yo zhing zlog/ b+h+yo bzlog chen pos kha sbyar la// rde'u thabs cig kyang der bzlog cig/ ma mo khyod kyi lte ba nas// zhe sdang chen po me ltar 'bar//
208b3(rnying rgyud): ltar 'bar bas snying po tshigs// ma rtogs 'khrul pa'i zhe sdang mes// 'dod pa'i ma mos bka' bkyon skad// srid gsum nad kyis sdug bsngal 'bar// nad rnams bzlog la zor kha byol// ma mo khyod kyi sku yi lte ba nas// 'dod chags 'khor ba chu ltar 'khrugs// 'dod chags gzugs
208b4(rnying rgyud): su bya bung ste// ma rtogs bakhyal mas rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams// 'dod pa'i ma mo thugs dang 'gal// srid gsum nang rnams dbarlag cig/ zor kha bzlog la byol kha sgur// dmyal ba rnams kyang srog la chags// ma mo dam la mi chags sam// yi dwags rnams kyang gza' btung
208b5(rnying rgyud): gos la chags// ma mo rdzas la mi dgongs sam// sgo le mi yang 'dod pa'i rdzas la chags// ma mo mdos dang yas la mi dgongs sam// lha ma yin yang go mtshon drug la chags// ma mo mdos dang yas la mi chags sam// lha yang longs spyod rdzas la chags//
208b6(rnying rgyud): ma mo mdos la mi dgongs sam// 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ bde ba che snyoms tshur gson cig/ dbu gsum phyag kyang drug pa ste// g.yas na b+han+d+ha lhad lo bsnams// g.yon na dra dar rtse la 'gyur// sku la mu men shel gyi go zu gsol// yid
208b7(rnying rgyud): las sprul pa'i ma mo'i tsho gas// dbyings kyi yum chen mdangs ldan ma// khams gsum 'khor ba'i zhen chags thong // mdos bdag chen mi bde ba'i cha snyoms ma// de yang rgyal mo khyod lags mod// mdos bdag ni mdos long la/
209a1(rnying rgyud): klung bdag ni blud ba zhes shig/ 'dod pa'i ma mo rgyur gson cig/ yid 'ong rgyal mo skyed pa skye 'gro'i bdag/ sku mdog g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus sngo zhing // na bzang rma la
209a2(rnying rgyud): mdzes pa gsol// g.yas na b+hin+d+ha lcang po bsnams// g.yon na b+han+d+ha smug po bsnams// da yang rgyal mo khyod lags mod// mdos bdag ni mdos long la// glud bdag ni glud bzhes shig/ 'dod
209a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ 'khor po tshams byed 'dod chags ma// spa ni rin chen min+d+ra nAM// g.yas sngogayon mar dbus dkar zhal// phyag na b+han+ta lhung po bsnams// g.yon na pa dan dmar po 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs dam bskul// de yang
209a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo khyod lags mod// mdos bdag chen mo mdos long la// krud bdag ni glid bzhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo tshur gson cig/ dgro ba slol byed mkha' 'grom// g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus dkar zhal// na bzang chu srin
209a5(rnying rgyud): g.yang gzhi gsol// g.yas pa b+han+ta lcang lo bsnams// g.yon na dar nag ru mtshon 'phyar// 'di yang rgyal mo nyid lags mod// mdos bdag ni mdos yod la/ grung bdag ni klud bzhes shig/ 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ 'khor ba chags
209a6(rnying rgyud): gyis tshim mdzad ma// skul zhing chen ga yang gzhigasol// kun kyang mi bzang 'bar ba'i sku// g.yas dmar g.yon dkar dbus ljang zhal// khrag chen 'bar ba'i rab pa can// g.yas na b+han+ta ljang lo bsnams// g.yon pa ba ngan ljang nag 'phyar/
209a7(rnying rgyud): de yang rgyal mo khyod lags mod// mdos bdag ni mdos long la/ grud bdag ni klad bzhes shig/ 'dod pa'i ma mo tshur gson cig/ sgra ni mi bzad mthing nag spu// na bza' zhing che ni g.yang gzhigasol// g.yas nag g.yon mthing dbus
209b1(rnying rgyud): si napa// g.yas nanan+ta sbyang la ba skams// g.yonan bu dan lta ba bsnyams// ma mo tshan mjug pa yang // gdan shing chen pasngob ma tig// pan kyang me'i smug na gnang na bzlugs// rgyal ma thugs pas sprul pa'o// kun du brgyar ro
209b2(rnying rgyud): lags te// 'khor ba jom pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod// dbyings kyi tshul mo drug po la// 'dab chags rgyal mo mkha' ldeng drug/ gar dang bcas te rgyal mo drug la 'phrul// gshog chags rgyal mo khyung chen drug po la// mdzes pa'i btsun mo drug
209b3(rnying rgyud): pa// rgyal ma drug la klung du 'bral// gcan gzan rgyal po ga dor drag pol// skyes pa chas bzang drugazhon pa// rgyal mo drug la glud du 'bul// lha yi sprul pa rgyal po drug/ 'khor dang g.yog bcas glang chen drag zhon pa// rgyal mo drug la gla
209b4(rnying rgyud): 'bul// shing ris kyai 'pha ne bzangs la// mdzes pa'i ri dwags rgyal po d+hu // sna tshogs ngar snas mdzes pa brgyan// skyon po drug dang bcas pa las// nyi zla mdzes pa bkra yal yal// bya lding ni nam mkha' lang gyo// shang shang ni gar bsgyur ba/

209b6(rnying rgyud): slar dam+b+ha bcas nas// 'dod pa'i gter la spyod do skad// srid pa'i byol bzlog mdos 'di bzhes// dang po dmu dang phya ru 'thabs// der yang rgyal po dod lha yis// dmu yig yul ngo der bzlog go// de nas lha dang lha min 'thabs// lha ma yin gyi g.yul ngo
209b7(rnying rgyud): drung bzlog go// de nas myi drang 'dre ru 'thabs pa 'o sa?/ mi khe lus bzlab kyi srin sa ma// do rlab 'dri yig yu ngo ba rlog/ zhe sdang rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// de snang sbrul gyis drugs dam pa dang // 'dod chags rtsod nas bcad pa'i phyir// 'dod chags

215a6(rnying rgyud): skum gcig ma// dkar mo nyi zla stong gi thong phreng can// gra gsum dbar ba'i spyan gcig ma// ga yu yi rab pas srid pa spol// chags pa'i spyan gyis pad+ma 'dzin// rin chen mchi mAM lce dgr-i ngag so// tsit+ta zhags pas dgra bo slob// sngon gyi
215a7(rnying rgyud): mchod ji bzhin du// bdag dang gnyis sa med par gyur// zhes bslad do// sgrub pa de sngon nas/ gang sgrub pa la jug ga/ gtor ma maN+Dal ba tsog pani/ dbyis kyi ma mon rgyal byed cha/ dbangs su dam gang drug chog
