215b2(rnying rgyud): he ma'i zer la zhon nas rgyu ba de'i gtor ma btang ngo // mes mi mthong bar med nus dakhong mo'i dog tu bzhag go// badz+rad mo rigs kyi grags ma brdeg/ dpangs dang rtsa kran gcig/ maN+Da la dur khrod kyings pa gragasum bsngol mang bri/ tshangs pa gzi can
215b3(rnying rgyud): bu mo nam mkha' mtha' pa rgyabs// nam lang ba pa btang / las byed ma mo rnams kyis gru gsum la kha khyer bar gsum brtsig pa khang seng du cig/ dgram du pid bskur/ bdud yak+ka me sreg gi bu mo nag mo rkang gcig skar re mdang bzhon nas rlabs/
215b4(rnying rgyud): nam gyi cha smad la btang ngo // sprul pa'i ma mo'i gtor ma ni/ nyi mgrang la zla ba'i sras mo N+Da la zhon nas chubs pa/ de'i dus su btang ngo // bdud khyab pa lag rings kyi bu mo nam gung pa rgya ste/ 'dod pa zan khrag bzung sbran gcig yin pas/ der yang btang
215b5(rnying rgyud): stegs ni gru bzhi la mdog ser nag tu ba/ 'khor lo ro ngos lam mod snying po gang byed kyis mthang ma bskor ba/ dbus su ming dras bris rtags mthon pa gzhug gtor mde'i steng du sgyings/ de ni gtor ma'i byas so// ma mo sred pa'i bem las/
215b6(rnying rgyud): gtor ma btang ba dang skye yi bslab pa'i ledra ste sa gsum pa'o// / da ni bumo bzhi pa las dag po bkol ba pra/ chos bcu bzhi pa gnas dben par bsham/ de nas yo byad brtsam/ dkar mo mig gcig ma pa b+han+d+ha bAm la pad+ma chags pa
215b7(rnying rgyud): dang / dang ma pa'i mthong ba btsal/ dkar momachi ba'i phyag na bsdams// datsho ris skrag pos rab tu ba can// sngon gang po yod pani// dag mo chen mong phyag na bsdams// pad+mang dab bgrang yod pa la// dkar pa tshor bar gyur pani/
216a1(rnying rgyud): dmar mo dbang bsgyur phrag na bsdams// dum bu gnyis pa yod pa'am// rdo rje rgya gra ma rjer bajug pa// ser mo las mkhan phrag na bsdams// de rnams rten du bcas pal// ri mo med na tshan gyis bri/
216a2(rnying rgyud): rigs ni mtshan na 'dir mi gtogs// b+han+ta de bzhin ldan pa la// shel gyi chu bzhi yang dag rdzogs// gzhan yang dam rdzas ma bzhi bsog/ de nas ma bzhi'i dbang bskur ba'i ngan sngags bod pa/ 'bod zad gsod pa gsum du dril la brkyang / dang /
216a3(rnying rgyud): snor bzlas pa ma ma snying kha ra ka/ ma ma rak+ka ma ma ngaH/ raklo snying khrag la ma mdun dun/ trag rak+ka ma snying he ke ma ma ma ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ zad pa dril ba// khog sbub rol gtsig ma ma snying khrag pa sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dza dza snying rtse phyung zhig/ ma ma snying tsit+ta la thun/
216a4(rnying rgyud): snying khrag ma mdun dran/ shi ti Sh+Tha ma steng la ya ma mgyo/ bsad pa dril ba la/ mA mA sha sha ma mthing rdzing / dgra bo ma ma sa ma ya/ dgra bo ngi tsit+ta ma dz+wa la mA ra ya dAM/ tsit+ta tsa la rol rgya tha~M pi li/ ma las myur du mdzod cig/ ces drag tu bskul lo// D+ha shar
216a5(rnying rgyud): kye dkar mo mig gcig ma// na bzang shun chen rlon pa gsol// b+han+da rlon pa'i dril bus brgyan// ral phran zhag gi thigs pa la// dung chen mche ba gtsigs pa yis// shar phyogs srid gsum phur pas 'debs// rin chen shel gyi thod gdengs can//
216a6(rnying rgyud): zhag gi lan phran bsigs pa yis// steng du ya bdud rdungs shig che ma// bar du dgra bgegs thal bar rlogs// hUM ri rab gling bzhi'i lho phyogs na/ nag mo chen mo mche ba can// mi lpags rlon pa'i go zu can// b+han+d+ha skam po'i dril bus brgyan/

222a4(rnying rgyud): ga gas
222a5(rnying rgyud): dang / 'ang pa dazhanapa / rgyudan/
222b1(rnying rgyud): dang / mngar sna tshogs pas bran pa ni/ rigs bzhi kun la gtor ma dbul/ shing ris dang mda' dar gzhung bzhin byas la/ sna tshogs shing sA la nam mkha' dang bcas la gzugag/ nam mkha' ni 'dra ba gnyis rgyal rigs la/ bram ze'i rigs la 'dra
222b2(rnying rgyud): bubazhi/ rje'u rigs la 'dra ba gnyis dang dmangs rigs 'dra ba bdun no/ maN+Dal la ba yi rnam lnga dang / spos chus bri dong legs par byas la/ gzugs lnga dgod do// gtor ma cha bzhi dgod la bzhag go// 'o ma'i bor bu bzhi yang bzhag go// swa
222b3(rnying rgyud): tshogs spyos chus nad pa bkrus la/ kha shar du bstan la g.yas phyogs su/ nas dkar mo gsog med pa bre gang bzhag da ni budu dri tsha'i sbyin pa'o// g.yon du sran ma nag po gsog med pa ze gang bzhag/ de ni gung dang 'thun bcad pa'o// mdun du nal
222b4(rnying rgyud): zas sna tshogs dang / 'brang rgyas dang phud bltams la bzhag/ de ni bkra shis gsol ba'o// lag pa g.yas par mtshal 'i khri bskur/ de ni bkrag dang gzi mdangs skyed pa'o// g.yon du ngung bskur/ de ni rus nad gso zhing tshe brtan par byas pa'o//
222b5(rnying rgyud): de gnyis nas gtor dum re thugs/ lhag ma'i snying gar gdags so// de nas klu mchod la chu sngo bzang po can du yas stags bstsal lo// nag po rkang gcig ni bya khyung dang / phyag na rdo rje'i sngags kyis na bya'i smos thab cing gtubs la/ nang pa'i ma la 'og tu mnam
222b6(rnying rgyud): smonang pa'i lag tu thogs/ bya khyung sbyang po zlos su gzhug go// ma mo srid pa'i bla ma las/ klu mdos kyi skabs sa// / de nas yang rnal 'byor las su rung zhing / bkra shis par bya ba'i phyir ma mo rigs bzhi'i dbang bsrung ba'i
222b7(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// de yang dang por gnas bkra shis pa'i sar maN+Dal gzhung dang mthun par brtsig/ spyi sgrub dpe chung dang mthun par bris/ zhing chen gyi 'phan gdugs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang dur khrod kyi rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs dgram/ de nas mchod
223a1(rnying rgyud): la migs pa pa shams pa/ maban pan sa dang rjid spyugags/ sngags pa sngon masapa/ gnyen pa sgrub kyi dzin pa zhugs te/ ma 'arigs pa las rgyad d+hAg/ zhwag grA ma /
223a2(rnying rgyud): nagasum yang ru bas/ spyir bsnyen pa dbul/ de nas dbang bskur ba ni/ dbang gi lha mo spyan drangs te/ lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas te/ badz+rad tsa tri sa ma la dza zhes sman drangs te/ 'di skad ces baspyod do// nr-i dkar mo byung thogs no rje'i gshog bcan/
223a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' la yid bzhin sprul pa'i char 'bebs ma// a la la yi dngos grub gsol mdzad ma// ma gcig gtsug gi rgyan 'byams ma// yid bzhin sprul pas mkha' la badz+rad ni'i char 'bebs ma// de nub dbang dang dngos grub stsol// zhes byon par 'asams la/
223a4(rnying rgyud): slob ma nubasgor bzhag go// de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod do// nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi bu// khyod ni skal mchog rab tu ldan// yang gsang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// 'jug pa'i skal bar ldan pa ni// de ni skal ldan rnal 'byor te/
223a5(rnying rgyud): lus ngag yid gsum dang bas 'dud par gyis// langs stabs thal mo spyi bor rdebs// 'di nas bzung ste dam par gyis// zhes brjod pas/ rig pa'i me tog thogs nas/ rigs kyi des 'di skad ces zhu'o// rnga ma ye shes dam pa kun gyi bdag/ wa gsum
223a6(rnying rgyud): bder gnas dngos grub dag/ ma nor mtshan pa'i lam ston pa// bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'dir 'dug kyi// bdags dngos smrab bstan du gsol// zhes rin po che'i me tog gtor nas de nyid na/ // de nas yas tu lus 'di spyad ces gsungs so// nyon cig
223a7(rnying rgyud): skal ldan rigs kyi bri// dad pa'i mchog ni nying bzhag nas// blam la mos dang bskyed// dbul ba'i mchog tu 'gro yid// bsgo ba'i bka' rnam nyan par byes// zhes gsungs so// de rjes yang 'di rtse bu'o// da rdo rgya ma to gathogs pa/
223b1(rnying rgyud): ho dgongs su gsol/ lan ga sam brjod nas/ bdag ni dad pa'i thagra bskyed nas// bla mdza rje'i slob dpon la// lus ngag yid gsum dad pa yis// bdag ni skyabs su gsol lags kyi// dkyil 'khor lha la skabs su mchi// sna ma rigs
223b2(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du// bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal lags kyi// bdag la gsan cing dkyil 'khor ston// zhes me tog dor nas/ de nyid du long bu dang thal mo sbyar nas 'khod do// de nas yang gu rus 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig sbrul ldan rigs kyi bu/
223b3(rnying rgyud): rigs bzhi ma mo'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dad pa'i yid kyis khyod 'jug na// slob dpon ngal dad bskyed// 'khor dang yul dang bu smad tshogs// dad pa'i mchog tu dbul bar gyis// gus pas thong na dkyil bar bya// gal te dad pa'i stobs med na// dam
223b4(rnying rgyud): tshig nyams pa'i rgyu yin pas// bstan par bya ba ma yin no// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rigs kyi bu des/ bdag ni dad pa'i shugs dang ldan// bla ma snying rje rab ldan na// bdag kyang dam tshig gtso lags kyi// rdzu 'phrul mthu yi dngos
223b5(rnying rgyud): grub phyag la stsol// bdag la dbang mchog dam pa gsol// de nas yang gu rus 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi gtso// khyod ni dam pa'i tshul 'dzin no// rigs bzhi ma mo'i dkyil 'khor du// khyod ni yis gzhug par bya//
223b6(rnying rgyud): sdom pa gasdam la gnas par gyis// nyams pa gnyis la 'jom par gyis// bla ma la ni gus par gyis// gang ltar dam bca' byas pa la// dor bar bya ba ma yin no// grub pa'i dam rdzas dang du blang bar gyis// des ni thun mong dngos grub rdzob// de
223b7(rnying rgyud): nas yang ni rigs kyi bu des 'di skad ces zhu'o// sdom pa gsum la gnas par bgyid// bla ma la yang gus par bgyid// yid ma lha la mthun rdzas dbul// yang bla mas gsang bar 'os dang 'da' dka' bsrung // srog las nyams pa mi bsgo zhing // chos
224a1(rnying rgyud): kyi dam tshig nyams pa dang // bra ma mched lham la 'khrus pa// 'di ni nyams pa chen po yin// de yang yi ge byed mi 'dri// chos dam 'dres pa mtshig nyams// chos skad gcig 'dres bu 'khor srog dang bral// dmacan
224a2(rnying rgyud): chags na de ltar yin// gal te chos nyid don 'chol na// rdo rje dmyal bar gdon mi za// bu khyod dam tshig bsrung bar gyis// de nas yang 'di skad ces gdams so// ma mo srog gi 'khor lo ni// thams cad srog gi rgun 'chang pas// bden pa dor bar ma byed
224a3(rnying rgyud): lar// rtag tu srog gi snying po thon// 'on tang bu gcig ma byams 'dra// zhes pas ro rdzas bskams la khrom// dbang mchog 'di la dad pa skyed// de nas rigs kyi bus 'di skad ces zhus so// khyod ni dam pa kun gyi gtso// bdag ni rig pa mchog lags kyi//
224a4(rnying rgyud): dang du blangs pa'i dam rdzas rnams// dang du de ring bdag len gyi// ging chen rnams kyi dbang mchog stsol// b+han+d+ha lcang lo / kha bad can// 'dza' gad bdud rtsi sman gyis bkang // dngos grub 'phel ba'i rdzas mchog 'di'i// de ring bdag la dbang mchog stsol//
224a5(rnying rgyud): mchog chen g.yang gzhi ru mtshon 'di// ma mo mkha' 'gro ga yab mo bas// thams cad 'du ba'i rdzas mchog 'dis// de ring bdag la dbang mchog stsol// tsit+ta rin chen 'bar ba 'di// ma mo rnams kyi rten yin te// ma mo mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i dbang mchog stsol//
224a6(rnying rgyud): rtsis mchog khram pa ma bdud las rgyal// lha smin sde brgyad bdud las rgyal// dgra dpung 'joms pa'i dbang mchog stsol// kha T+wAM rtse gsum 'bar ba 'di// drag po mtshon cha rno dpal te// ye shes mtshon chas kun 'dul bas// dgra bgegs 'joms pa'i rdzas/
224a7(rnying rgyud): mchog 'dis// dgra bgegs 'joms pa'i dbang mchog stsol// dam rdzas bdud rtsi rnam khri 'di// kun gyi zas mchog dam pa ste// dngos grub 'phel ba'i dam rdzas 'dis// de ring bdag la dbang mchog stsol// mthing nag dar gyi cod pan 'dis// thams
224b1(rnying rgyud): chub pa'i tha ba te/ mdus mamatsha can dug/ ngan bye 'du sa// dag nga gnas// ba sa y-i sa/ na / ca drugatu pa bangs 'a
224b2(rnying rgyud): shis mi tog phreng ba 'dis// de ring bdag la dbang mchog sngos// lha mi bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// kun kyang 'tsho ba'i rdzas la brten// zhal zas ro mchog sna tshogs 'dis// dngos gru 'phel ba'i rjes mchog ste// de darje brib snrel ba'i dbang mchog tu
224b3(rnying rgyud): ning nas btags nas chags pa skye// 'jig rten 'dir ni mi nub phyir// ming gi grags pa'i chu yin pas// lha mir bcas pa'i dbang mchog stsol// de yang dang po dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i dus na/ gdong g.yogs la sogs pas dkris la/ me tog ning
224b4(rnying rgyud): ba ni kun dang mthun/ de nas slob dpon la yom phul la/ gangams ngaganod do// de yang tshis chad cing dadang snying nas mardzogs na/ dbang mi thong ste/ shin tu brtson 'grus bskyed par bye ste/ de yang slob dpon ma dngag dang ldadra zhing dang pa chel
224b5(rnying rgyud): pa ni slob dpon dam pa skye/ de ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra'o// de la ni dbang 'di nod par byal/ slob ma yang smras pa btsan te chad pa ltar byed cing gsang ba'i gtam rngub na dbang bskur bya'o// mA mo srid pa'i bem las/ dbang sbyin pa'i skabs so//
224b6(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dran tshig gi skyabs 'di gsungs so// sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'arjod pas// ma sgo rnams kyi dmajig bsrung bar bya// sngags dang 'phor dang nyams dang 'dres// 'di dag mtshi gang sung nga gces// gas kyi dang tshig bsrung bani/
224b7(rnying rgyud): dang po drug gi spring ba mni bang / bod migazug gis la zhugs nang // yin yin pa gsong na// dardzi chog can pa'i gadzin yi na// mad dang ni nga lhag par yang // de yang dmachog sngags kyi badzod// don rtags kyi 'od dgas
225a1(rnying rgyud): mamangs can na gsung na// dwa cig gcig pa 'ban pa dag/ rmug pa sanyams pa dang ma padan// rnams brtson panas lasu ma sas te// mas myed dan tsheganyams pa dang / dan mabs kyis gdung rla//
225a2(rnying rgyud): 'di dag ma mo'i dam tshig sa// bsung na shin tu dam can te// rang gi dam tshig thub par bsrung // 'din chos khrims dam tshig ste// mkhas pa rnams kyis bsrung bar bya// skragasung thugs kyi dmachog ni// kha la mi bsrung sems la bsrung // sra me
225a3(rnying rgyud): tshig bsrung ba na// bla ma rnams kyi sgra mi slad// grib ma 'gong pa ma yin te// rkang brkyang phyogs char gom pa dor ba min// steng phyogs yongs su 'gro mi bya// ming nas 'bod pa ma yin te// yul gyi phyogs nas 'bod par bya// bka' rnams bcag pa ma yin/
225a4(rnying rgyud): te// ra rob rnyid myos pa'am// sman rnams mi gsol bka' bcag min// gzhan ni nams kyang bcag pa min// de ni spu yi dmajig go// thugs kyid mtshig bsrung ba ni// gang yin bstan pa'i yi dam lha// gsal bar bsgom zhing dam par bzung /
225a5(rnying rgyud): gsung gi dam tshig bsrung ba ni// gang la byed pa bzlas pa'i sngags// mi tshig par mchod par bzlas// sel rnams ma shor shin tu gces// dam tshig rtsa pa gsum po ni// gang bsrub pa yi srag yin no// de nas yan lag dam tshig ni// dam can srub par
225a6(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa rnams// dmatshan brten pa'i dmardzas rnams// shin tu dka' yang btsal bar bya// srub pa'i dam rdzas mchogs na// nye bar byed kyang dam mi skang // drag po'i rdzas rnams mtshogs na// las rnams myur du 'grub pa yin// shin tu nyams pa rnams
225a7(rnying rgyud): la 'jom// de ni ma mo'i dmatshig ste// srog pas gces par dam tshig gzung // ma mo srid pa'i bem la/ dbang dang dmachog gi skabs so// / de nams bdag gi bstod pa 'di gsungs so// shar gyis bdag tal gyi ni/
225b1(rnying rgyud): mdog dkar po gangs ri 'dra// su ni rin chen 'bar ba la// 'od zer dmar pa stong gsum 'gro// phrag na gser kyi mda' gzhu bsnams// shar gyis bdag dam shing la// gtsang ma mdas kyi mtshad pa 'bral// wA yis bdag rkang ba nIni// swa ni rin chen 'ab /
225b2(rnying rgyud): la// su mdog mthing ga 'od zer 'bar// phyag na srud pa nag po bsdams// dam shing sprul pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// lho mis bdag dam shing la// gtsang ma mdos kyi mchod pa 'bul// nub kyis bdag dam shing ni// skra ni rin chen 'bar ba la// swa
225b3(rnying rgyud): mdang / dmar la 'od zer 'bar// phyag na sbrul gyi zhags pa bsdams// nub kyis bdag 'khor bcas la// gtsang ma mdos kyi mchod pa 'bul// byang gis bdag gtam shing ni// sru mdog rin chen 'bar ba la// rin chen thor chugra mdzes pas pargyan// s+ya mdzad//
225b4(rnying rgyud): rdzang du 'od zer 'bar// phyag na rdung dang pung buM 'dril// byang gis bdag 'khor bcas la// gtsang ma mdos kyi mchod pa 'bul// sa bdag chen po khyed bzhi yang // phyag na rdo dza'i bka' bzhin du// son gyi sngags dam dzes dgongs te// btsal ba'i las kyi
225b5(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu ma chis par mdzod// rdo rigs btsa ba kyang slar la bzlog/ sa bdag byed kyi thugs dang 'gal ba bskang bar bya// tshod kyis bka' chad bral bar mdzod// shar rdzas pa dag 'azor sbyong ba// stag mag can dang las mgo can// shar phyogs shing la
225b6(rnying rgyud): mnga' mdzad cing // sra mdog dkar po 'od zer 'bar// phyag na bla ma dang rin chen par bu bsnams// de la gtsang ma mdos kyis bskyung // lho yis bdag 'khor skyong ba// mi lus rta dang sbrul gyi mgo// dz+ha ye phyogs na mnga' mdzod ma// u mdog spo sangs 'bar/
225b7(rnying rgyud): la/ ga sa / / rgyagasas ga na / cugs / thamangam 'thu / gas/
226a1(rnying rgyud): mnga' mdzad cing// sum dag dmar mdzod zer 'bar // phyag na sdig pa nag pa dang // bangs kyi srog la kha kru bsnams// gsang ma mangs kyis byag das bskang // nub zugasas padag ma bsan cig/ byang gis
226a2(rnying rgyud): bdag 'khor skyong ba// ma lus phag dang byi ba'i mgo// byang phyogs chu la mnga' mdzad cing // sku mdog ljang grwa 'od zer 'bar// phyag na ral gri so mangs bsdams// rin chen 'bar ba'i dbyug to bsnams// gtsang ma'i mdos kyis thugs dam bskang // byang gis
226a3(rnying rgyud): bdag ma ba kyon cig/ shar lho'i mtshams kyis bdag ni// mi lus 'brug gi mgo bo can// sku mdog mthing ga 'od zer 'bar// phyag na rin chen mchod rten bsnams// gtsang ma mdos kyis thugs dam bskang // lho nub mtshams kyis bdag ni// mi yi lus
226a4(rnying rgyud): la lug gi mgo// sku mdog stobasangs 'od zer 'bur// phyag na rin chen dbyug to bsnams// gtsang ma mdos kyis thugs dam bskang // rung byang mtshams kyis bdag ni// mi yi lus la khyi yi mgo// sru mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'bar// phyag na ga'u che
226a5(rnying rgyud): po bsnams// gtsang ma mdos kyis thugs dam bskang // byang shar sa bdag chen po la// mi lus glang gi mgo bo can// sru mdog dud ka 'od zer 'bar// phyag na dgra snga 'bar ba bsdams// gtsang ma mdos kyis thug dam bskang // mtshams na gnas pa'i
226a6(rnying rgyud): sa bdag bzhi// 'byung bas la mnga' mdzad cing // mi yi gnas su gnod ma sbyor// sa bdag yul nas ma 'degs shig/ yul ba dag mtha' nas ma 'khrug cig/ sa la gnas pa'i sa srin yang // brag la gnas pa'i brag srin rnams// thang skam pha bor
226a7(rnying rgyud): lu brten pa// sa bdag 'khor bcas khyed rnams kyang // gtsang ma'i mdos 'di phar long la// sngon chad gnod pa slar la rdul// phyin chad gnod pa ma byed cig/ shing la gnas pa'i shing srin dang // sa la gnas pa'i sa bdag gis// mchod pa dmapa
226b1(rnying rgyud): 'di shes pa// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par mdzod// nyon cig sdig chen las ngan thod// nga yi bkang las 'da' ma byed// gal te bka' las 'das pa na// na da ka dmyal ba'i gnas su s+ye// zhes gzhung bzhin bya'o// de nas rdzas rnams pasal /
226b2(rnying rgyud): bya'o// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ sa bdag / yo bcos kyi skabs te dang po'o// / de nas su rnams kyi bstod pa 'di gsungs so// gzhung dang mthun par ba sogs nas ni// 'di skad rjes gsol to// shar phyogs kyi rgyal dung spong ni/
226b3(rnying rgyud): sku mdog dkar gas la 'od zer 'thos// srul mgo gsum gyi gdengs gcan// chibs sadung gi sbal pa bcibs// phyag na dung sbal lhod mo bsnams// rigs ni bram ze'i rigs su gtogs// bram ze'i rigs kyi 'khor gyis bskor// kun kyang nad te rtsal pa
226b4(rnying rgyud): thogs// kha rlangs sdod mar 'od du 'khyug/ khrag nad chu ser char ltar 'bebs// mdos bdag mdos long la// klud bdag grung bzhes shig/ nA ga yu yu nu pra ba de ba u s+pha traM/ mang gsum mchod pa 'o mas mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs
226b5(rnying rgyud): kyis mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor mas mchod// gus pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mang gsum dang // rtsi sman sna tshogs spos kyi mchod pa yis// klu chen rnams kyi pho brang du// spos kyi srin lding bdud rtsi'i
226b6(rnying rgyud): bab nas// zha gum nad rnams sos gyur cing // de bzhin yon bdag 'khor bcas kyi// kA nad thams cad pas la gyur cig/ nr-i g+ho phyogs kyu rgyal rgya mtsho ni// spu ni rin chen 'bar ba la// sbrul mgo lnga yi gdengs ka can// sku mdog mthing nag 'od zer
226b7(rnying rgyud): po// phyag na lcags spel khyong mo'i rgyal mtshan bsnams// chibs su zu glang sngon po brtsibs// rigs ni rgyal po'i rigs su gtogs// rgyal rigs gtsang ma'i 'khor gyis bskor// kun kyang lag cha sbal ba'i rgyal thogs// gdug pa'i las
227a1(rnying rgyud): kyi mngond paco brgya dag tang// mangs bdag mdus 'angal// glang bdag grang ba zhes shig/ sre dag na rjod pa u su s+ya swA hA/ mang gsum mdzad pa mas mdzad// gzu rjo nga da
227a2(rnying rgyud): mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor mas mchod// gus pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs snyan gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mdar gsum dang // rtsi sman sna tshogs spos kyi mchod pa yis// klu chen rnams kyi pho brang du// spos kyi sprin rdzing ba
227a3(rnying rgyud): char bab nas// zha grum nad rnams sos gyur cig/ de bzhin yon bidag 'khor bcas kyi// klu nad thams cad bsal gyur cig/ hUM nub kyi klu rgyal gzi brjid ni// sru ni rA ga 'bar ba la// skul nag bdun gyi gdebs ka can// sre mdog dmar
227a4(rnying rgyud): ser 'od zer 'bar// phyag na dung gi sdig pa bskams// chibs su zangs kyi chu srin bcibs// rigs ni rje'u rigs su gtogs// rje rigs gtum pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// kun kyang zangs kyi sdom sdig nyi li li// mdzen dbaco brgyad tshang ba 'bebs//
227a5(rnying rgyud): mdos bdag mdos long la// grung bdag grud bzhes shig/ hUM nA gang b+hu li na kha hA ya hU ya swA hA/ mngar gsum mchod pa 'o mas mchod// gdung pa'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor mas mchod// glas pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs
227a6(rnying rgyud): sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mngar gsum dang // rtsi sma ni sna tshogs spos kyi mchod pa yis// klu chen rnams kyi pho brang du// spos kyi sprin lding bdud rtsi'i char bab nas// zhwa gum nad rnams spos gyur cig/ de bzhin yon bdag 'khor bcas
227a7(rnying rgyud): hUM// kun thams cad pas la gyur cig/ dri byang gi klu rgyal mtha' yis ni// su ni rin chen lnga dgul// srul mgo dgu yi gdengs ka can// sru ma dog ljang gu 'od zer 'bar/ rigs ni dmangs kyi rigs su gtogs// phyag nag sumi sdom sdig
227b1(rnying rgyud): bor ba yang
227b2(rnying rgyud): 'asrungs// g.yus la sun mothu nga// chibs su grang bu mar ba bcings// 'khor dmangs rigs su yis bskor// kun kyang sgral nag thod pa brnams// ma lkog sang thabs car babs// ngas bdag ma da 'ang la/
227b3(rnying rgyud): bzhis shig/ rkye gnag 'badi 'ab gang yid du swA hA/ mang ga sum mchod pa'oms mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mtshid pa gtor mas mchong // gus pa'i mchod pa tshogs sun gyis 'arjod// dag ngag sa dpa
227b4(rnying rgyud): gsum dang // ci sman sna tshogs spos kyi mchod pa yis// klu chen rnams kyi pho brang du// spos kyi srin ldi bdud rtsi'i char bab nas// zhwa gum nang rnams sos gyur cig/ de bzhin yon bdag 'khor bcas kyi// bya nad thams cad pas 'gyur cig/
227b5(rnying rgyud): lurgyal 'jog po ni// hri ni mi bzang 'bar ba la// srul mgo gnyis kyi gdengs ka can// sru mdog dkar ser dod zer 'bar// phyag na yid bzhin bum pa bsdams// rigs ni bram ze'i rigs su gtogs// mdos bdag mdos po dA la// grur bad
227b6(rnying rgyud): bzhes shig/ rnyeg ba ru che na te swA hA/ mang gsum ma nod pa'o mas mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor mas mchod// gus pa'i mchod pa sa tshogs kyis mchod// rang dra gsum dang ni mngang gsu mad
227b7(rnying rgyud): smos kyi mchod pa yis// badzin rnams kyi mazung du// zlos kyi sbyin lding badzi ci'i char ba ba nas// zhasus nad rnams sos gyur cig// depe dang gon dag 'a khor bcas kyi// thad mas cadang pa nga cig/ shang rgyas
227b8(rnying rgyud): rjen ni bya sngon pa'i// hrul mgo gnyis kyi gdengs ka tsun// gtsug na yid bzhin no dus / na// A mdog mthing na ga'od nga // phyag nag yu'i bu yang bsdams// rigs ni kyi dgas drams gtogs// mdos ba dbar sa sor la
228a1(rnying rgyud): klung bdag grang bzhes shig/ nA ga yu yu nA ga rA rdza b+ha li swa thA/ mngar gsum mchod pa'o las mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor mas mchod// gus pa'i mchod pa tshogs pa
228a2(rnying rgyud): gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mngar gsum dang // rtsi sman sna tshogs spos kyi mchod pa yis// klu chen rnams kyi pho brang du// spos kyi sprin lding bdud rtsi'i char bab nas// zha grub nad rnams mos gyur cig/ de bzhin yon bdag 'bor bcas kyi// grwa
228a3(rnying rgyud): nam+bi
228a4(rnying rgyud): mdos bdag mdos long la// grung bdag klung bzhes shig/ nA ga be na ga b+hA li nA ga hUM ya ya swA hA/ mdar gsum mchod pa 'o mas mchod// gdung ba'i mchod kyi dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mchod pa gtor mas mchod// gus pa'i mchod pa sna
228a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mngar gsum dang rtse sngun sna tshogs spos kyi mchod pa yis// klu chen rnams kyi pho brang du// spos kyi sprin lding bdud rtsi'i char bab nas// zhabrum nad rnams sos gyung cig/ de bzhin yon bdag
228a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor bcas kyi// klu nad thams cad bsal gyur cig/ nub bung klu rgyal nor rgyas ni// su mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'bar// srul mgo dgu yi gdengs ka can// phyag na sprul zhags rnga bo bsnams// rigs ni dmangs kyi rigs su gtogs// nag rdul can gyi 'khor
228a7(rnying rgyud): gyis bskor// mo log glang thabs khros na da gtong // mdos bdag mdos long la// kud bdag grung ba zhes shig/ rAg be b+ha ga per nAg su pra ste hA/ mang rag sum mchod pa 'oms mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// bla med mched pa gtor mas
228b1(rnying rgyud): myed// gus pa'i mchod pa tshogs sun gyis tshad// dka ga tum dang nimang dgasus dang // mi ldan dachags rgyas kyi margyad pa yis// klu chen rnams kyi byung // thos kyi srin rdzing bdu rdur ba ba nas// shAng mnang ngams nas kyang na da
228b2(rnying rgyud): yon dag 'a bar bcas so// kun thams cad pas 'gyur // de nas grumo bzhi la mchod cing bstod pa// thogs su mchu'i bzung nas// nga mami tshu bzhi babab// 'das kyim tog chol gyi cid/ bab ga dkyil 'bor das/ rigs kyi
228b3(rnying rgyud): sum dog dam mo mdzes// zangs sprul 'khyil ba'i nang na zhugs// phyag na dang dbya dmar po bsdams// rin chen gser gyi cod pan can// mang dkyi mchod pa 'oms mchod// gdung ba'i chod pa dbyangs kyis mchod// tha med mtsho dang gto
228b4(rnying rgyud): ma bzhes// gus pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs ldan gyis mchod// / dkar gsum dang ni mang dgasum dang // rtsi sAn dang ni sna tshogs spos kyis mchod// sha ba za zol mig 'bras dang rgong pa rnams// 'jig rten gnas na zhibar mdzad// mdos padag 'dos tshong la/
228b5(rnying rgyud): sa chub sal / ga gang la byang /
228b6(rnying rgyud): na largya bcugs/ na ga ga swA smra/ cinags rjod na // 'od myu rgyu pa ma mim band// mab gyi na sa da/ gzub khyod pa dang ga
228b7(rnying rgyud): gr-i po'i mchod pa sna tshogs sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum ning ni mngar gsum dang // ji sman pa ni sna tshogs khros kyis mchod// sha kra po la mig 'bras dang gong pa rnams// 'jig rten gnas na zhing mdzod// mdos bdag mdos long la// du bad
229a1(rnying rgyud): bzhes shig/ shar phyogs rgya mtsho'i pho brang du// ngo mtshar chu bo bzhi 'babs pa// 'dam bu mo tog sbed mos tshal// bram ze'i rigs kyi bu mo ste// klu li bu mo drung skyong ma// sra mdog shel dkar 'od zer 'bar// sbrul ma
229a2(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi thod gdengs can// phyag na dung chen 'khyil ba bsnams// rtag tu sprul 'khril nang na bzhugs// dung gi cod pan thod gdengs can// 'khor du klu sman 'bum gyis bskor// mngar gyi mchod pa 'o mas mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod
229a3(rnying rgyud): bla med mchod pa gtor ma bzhes// gus pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mngar gsum dang // kyi sman dang ni sna tshogs spos kyis mchod// sha ba wa phol mig 'bras dang rgong pa rnams// 'jig rten gnas na zhi bar mdzod// ma
229a4(rnying rgyud): bdag mdos long la// gud bdag grung bzhes shig/ byang phyogs rgya mtsho 'pho brang chur// ngo mtshar chu bo bzhi 'babs pa// me tog mdadzes ldan dga' ba'i tshal// pad+ma brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// klu yi bu mo gzi brjid can// sprul mgo dgu yi
229a5(rnying rgyud): gdengs ka can// phyag na srul nag rgyal mtshan bsnams// sbrul nag 'khyil ba'i nang na bzhugs// dmangs rigs kyi ni bu mo ste// 'khor du klubran 'bum gyis bskor// mngar gyi mchod pa 'o mas mchod// gdung ba'i mchod pa dbyangs kyis mchod
229a6(rnying rgyud): med mchod pa gtor ma zhes// gus pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs sman gyis mchod// dkar gsum dang ni mngar gsum dang // rtsi sman dang ni sna tshogs spros kyis mchod// shab kra po la mig 'bras dang rgong ba rnams// 'jig rten gnas nizhi bar mdzod// mdos
229a7(rnying rgyud): bdag mdos long la// gud bdag grud pa zhes shig/ de nas srin la 'di skad brjod do// nyon cig gdug pa gru yi bu// e pha kru dang a ma stag/ srin mo ni tshogs pa'i bu// khyod ni brag srin khra bo ste// mgo la sbal nag rmog zhu gsol// lus la zhal nag phrag bal klog pa ga
229b1(rnying rgyud): lag na rgya zor khug pa thogs// khyod ni rab tu mi bsrungs te// glang thabs sgro 'bog khyod kyis gtong // rdo rje 'chang gi bka' nyon la// gnod pa'i sbyor ba rgyan chod cig/ chu la gnas pa'i chu srin dang // brag la gnas pa'i brag srin dang // shing la gnas pa'i shing srin dang // sa la gnas pa'i sa mi
229b2(rnying rgyud): nga / de ring rngan dgas 'di long la// sngar byas gnod pa slar la rdul// da slan chad gnod pa ma byed cig/ ces nad pa'i lus zan gyis dril la/ gzugs mgo dgu pa'i khra bo gcig byas la/ 'bru yi gtor ma btang / sran ma la phyophyogs bzhir bya khyung gi snying po bzlas la gtong ngo // de ni byad 'grol ba'o
229b3(rnying rgyud): nas dkar mo ni nad pa'i gos la dril lam rgan du gzhug/ bsnyen pa'i snying po bris la mgul du gdags so// mdos chu mig tu bskyal lo// de nas bkra shis gsol/ nad pa rung nas zan bya/ mi la byin mi rung ngo // ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ klu mdos kyi skabs so// / de nas srid pa pho
229b4(rnying rgyud): rgyud las/ mchod pa 'di gsungs so// yud ma nyams par rin chen brdar la 'di skad ces brjod do// kye phyogs phyogs de ni pha ki na// nyi ma shar phyogs pa ki na// shar gyi dkar po spyan gcig pa// khyod kyi pa dang ma smos pa// gnam khyi dkar po spyan gcig lags// ma ni srid pa'i byin no
229b5(rnying rgyud): ste// / klu ni dkar po mu tig la// bzhugs ni nyi ma'i dkyil na bzhugs// sprul pa zla ba'i zer la 'gyed// 'gro ba mi la gnya' zung byed// chibs su dkar po 'o la chi bas// chibs kyi snga khod la/ shel gyi slob btags// chibs kyi phyi long la/ rtsis kyi khram bam bka la// skye 'gro
229b6(rnying rgyud): kun gyi bdag po ste// srog bdag chen po de tshur byon// 'khor du 'gong po sun brgyad 'khol// mdos bdag mdos la byon// khyod kyi thugs dam dgyes sde mo// shar kyi dkar mo spyan gcig ma// chibs su sha ba dkar mo chibs// u la dar gyi le'u gsol/
229b7(rnying rgyud): tig mdzes pa'i lan phran can// g.yu yi lan phran tse re re// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i khri la bzhugs// mdon kyi phud la datshur byon// g.yon nas sprul srad 'khrug cing byon// srod la byol zhing tho rangs nyul// shar gyi dkar mo spyan gcig ma// sngon ni bdag dang
230a1(rnying rgyud): u // na/ la/ / byung na sa na//

230b4(rnying rgyud): rnams gsod na gyu// zag ts+tsha nagams pan// na sngagag/ sol/ gsum rtseg 'dus panas/ gnas sa 'dig/ tha dig ni/ kyis ci rnams/ pa zugasags
230b5(rnying rgyud): smra gsolan/ ma sto chag sa/ 'ang med pe shus gas// rnas ri pa // phrul pa dag gsal/ khrig dgi sas pa pa la 'jug// gzhon sngags kyi drang pa 'ams/ ldan pa
230b6(rnying rgyud): dgang pa pa nyi gyid// mchod dogaser byams dngas du mchod// de chen gser kyis mchong bas nga// dag po cag su ma/ da kyis ched gyu// pang na gnas leb na// tshul shi dkyi lag dgu dang / ni ni yu
230b7(rnying rgyud): nan na/ nga / da na/
231a1(rnying rgyud): gser gyis mchod// bskang ni dkar po bcugasum mdzes kyis bskang // rgyal po dpon g.yog 'khor bcas kyis// rmongs po tha med zug sol cig/ dbul po nor med nor gsol cig/ nor dang sring rnams 'phel bar
231a2(rnying rgyud): ya // rga' ba'i su ni na chen sra// rin chen sus ni 'dod 'byung // rgyal po'i thugs ni mam pa'i thu ma// mar khwa'i thugs kyis bsam pa 'grub// lha dram chod dod pa la mdzod cing// gsusus cad dadung du 'bud// dar du 'phel lo mgon srung
231a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad// gnod pa'i bas ma sbyor ma mdzad par// bdag cag bsam pa mtha' ru phyung // dka' bar ba sogs pa'i mdos chen dang // gsal bar bltams pa'i mar me dang // gser sgong g.yu skong nyi skong dang // rgal po'i mnga' thang sems thad dang // bda'
231a4(rnying rgyud): bar bya ba'i zhal zas rnams// khyod la 'bul lagra bzhes snga gsol// sri thug sos la rigs rgyud spel// nor phyugs spel cig nyi 'phangasad// zla bsad kyi dus mdzod cig/ shos pas de dang nyi 'phangs // ma hA rA nga li byin har/ ma hA An ting ku ru swA tra/
231a5(rnying rgyud): dkar po shel ldan dkar po 'dis// bskrad ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // rgyu mchog shel ldan dkar po 'dis// rgyal po shel ldan du tsho la// ma ni sad ste rgyu dkar gnyis// bshos shing yid kyis sprul pa'i sras// dung gi sgong gcig tu byung //
231a6(rnying rgyud): gcig 'byung sor lon pa dang // kha ru mardol zhabs su lug/ de nas lug tu btags pa yin// ru gnyis gyen du 'khyil ba yis// gnam lha dkar po gyen du 'degs// mig gnyis 'bred la tshig tshig blta// ma rig mun pa'i smon la blta// thams cad//
231a7(rnying rgyud): gsal bar go 'byed do// sgra rnams dag pa rarab tu nyan// na ba'i dbang po grong de krong // / ba mngar rol lce myong bas// ro mchog brgya ldan gsang ba'i dbyings// sna yi dbang pos dri ma sgom// ljags kyi mig bzhis la 'thab/ bdud bzhi
231b1(rnying rgyud): mams zil gyis kun / klu drang ba gsol pa / mas na nardzogasas sargya// nga dang shA shang bar brgyas pas// smra ban rje ba dashes par dngas// nang thas gnyi sa// gzugs
231b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan bcas// mdzes pa slob mchin pa snying // mkhal ma po bgrod pa dang // sul mangs gan shan/ khrag bcas pa rnams// srog bdag 'khor dang baHsa pa la// lhag ma med par 'phral lags kyi// bzung ba ba dul ba rnams pa sha la/
231b3(rnying rgyud): dkar po phyag ga gsung stan 'dis// bskad po rgyal po mched la bskad// byagag 'di yi rjes shul dang // tshe lug ni seg 'khor bcas rnams// 'khor gyi srog bdag brgyad la 'phrul// khyod kyi thugs dam pa skang gyur cig/ mthutsha la ldan
231b4(rnying rgyud): skyes bu khyod// thugs dang 'bad pa'i mkha' lding 'dis// bsang ngo khyed kyi thugs dam bskang // pra yi po smos pa/ gser bya rab tha le lags/ A ma ga yu yi bu mo gung mngon lags/ de gnyis pashos pa'i sras/ grong gsum
231b5(rnying rgyud): ste// gsuM skom 'od/ dma' yang mi dma' ste/ bar snang khams gsum gsos// sha zan ma mu gra gzung / zangs slong dmar pa ste/ mtho yang mi mtho ste/ rgya mtsho'i steng du rgol/ 'dam zan maN+Da le bzung / dung srong dag 'arjod/
231b6(rnying rgyud): mtho mi dma' ste/ ri rab kha ru brtol/ spu mthun mchu phru ma byung / sngam thun brgya ni mi dang chad ma byas/ bdud dang btsan gyis bskor/ swa na dang gzeng kyis bskor/ bar snang khams la 'gyos te song / mi bu rigs la phan/ ris phan res mi phan/
231b7(rnying rgyud): de yi nang shid na/ ze bzang bya yi rigs/ rig pags la dngas pas/ nyin mtshan sha na yang 'byed/ dbyar dgun drod yang 'dzin/ de yis mi dang chad byas so// mi yis bya gsos pas/ bya yis mi yi gud du chad/ de yi nang shed nas/ bya dkar zed
232a1(rnying rgyud): natshan das na// da yang rgyal pa shAs thom/ ga su 'a // gas // ga sa/
232a2(rnying rgyud): gsam parang bslab pa de/ srid pams yang chags payin/ mig dmar padas pa 'di/ sre pa'i gyur ba khrag shes pabyed pa yin// thams tham par dag pa ni// phamazas larigs pa'i
232a3(rnying rgyud): dag pas ma gang shes lag ldan// su nyag pa/ dang byang ba'adi// zag chags thugs nim ra bathun// byam na me lagrag pa ni// bka na gas ma 'gyur ba ma// rnam rdza ngas padang / sa
232a4(rnying rgyud): sbyar byed pa yin// de ga du yi mkhu gling du// mdas 'dis thugs dam paskang ngod gyes par mdzad// mtshan ldan shel mdogar dkar 'dis// thul la dpo na g.yog 'angang bcas la// brags dam na gshegs phrag dang // ba
232a5(rnying rgyud): nig shan du dang len// mni rtsi ma ring yin/ bshas dngag nam kyi las/ rab zin pa bam pa dang // mang nga ldan dam gnyis sa zad// byin dgang pa gnas byas// me le krud dang tham la//
232a6(rnying rgyud): pa thugs la rtse shi myong // mi 'gyur brtan pas spyan dang thal// ru gnyis dkar la ldem pa la// dar tshon swa lngas brgyan pa 'di// rgyal ba'i du mtshon yin par bshad// 'a nas sgra sngags pa ni// don rnams 'thub pa byed pa men//
232a7(rnying rgyud): na ldan pa pan// phyogs pani su mos mdags pa'i rtags// sranag zung la ring ba ni// rgyal po'i bka' 'ab mas pa 'byed kyir lags// yagacom sa dang na pa 'di// babs kyis nga 'dul ba rtags// gsal khams dzid//
232b1(rnying rgyud): rnams bran du 'khol ba'i rtags// g.yas dang g.yon du sgom byed cing // khris drug pa lpags pa ni// che ba'i mchil la skrag par skyugs// drag tul nas bla sgra sbags// sha ni khrag dang bsres nas gsol// bskang bskal la phrag padag dang dang bang
232b2(rnying rgyud): pa mnyes par mdzod// mdos bdag mdos long la// grud bdag grud bzhes shig/ de yang dang por mdos la spyan drangs shing snyan gsan dbab pa 'di skad do// gtsang mar sbyar ba'i bskar rdzas mang po la/ 'dir spyan drang ba ni/ phyogs bzhi mtshams
232b3(rnying rgyud): brgyad so so'i mnga' mdzad pa ni/ shel ging chen po srog gi mnga' mdzad pa/ khu le lag dgu dang / a ga ge dang / ug ge dang / drang se dang / shang se dang / de khod dang ni ni khod dang // nyi bla la sogs srog bdag chen po brgyad// rang rang gi 'khor g.yog mar
232b4(rnying rgyud): po'i tshogs dang bcas te/ bdag cag gi lasam pa 'grub cing / khyed kyi thugs dam paskang pa'i phyir/ spyan 'dren mchod pa 'bul gyi gshegs su gsol// 'khor na gnas pa'i tshogs bcas kun// spyan 'dren mchod par shul gyi gshegs su gsol// e h+ye hi ma
232b5(rnying rgyud): hArA dzad tri tri sha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ badz+ra sa mA dza/ badz+ra aM ku sha dzaH/ badz+ra pA sha hU~M/ badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/ badz+ra g+haN+De hoH/ rgyal po dpon g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ mngon sum du byon par bsam mo// de nas slob dpon dang / yon bdag 'khor bcas kyis phyag gus par ba
232b6(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ na mo stong khams khyab par sems can don la dgongs// nga dang bdag med srid 'phrog srog la dga'// na bza' dang dkar 'arol ber gsol// khyod la dang ba'i yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo// kun la khyab pas dang bdag tu med// zhe sdang gdug pas srog la
232b7(rnying rgyud): par chad byed// sems can kun kyang rtsod la rab tu mchod// srog bdag sri kun khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor spong bstan pa'i don la rang tsamos// khams gsum sems can rnams pa lnga tshogs gnod nga byed// phyar dang khrag gi dri tshor dngag cha dag tu 'ing rgyu
233a1(rnying rgyud): gas sa ba na gnas pa rnams partsag la ma// gdo smrarnanas pan na na// dngad ba tu dgas pa/ 'thab rnams sanas// da ca can gdu sa dang// rnam pa ba
233a2(rnying rgyud): ga // drang dang ga med mas kyi'i byed// ngas cag bdag 'am yangs pa rnags migapa'o// ldan/ de shes pa'i 'dzin/ gdams myang 'i rgyabag / ga gags nyis mas ba ngas
233a3(rnying rgyud): la gas pa zhin do// tha bdud ma ma ya // pa da / sa yid dupa ngas pas/ gas das pam // la sa bas can gyul//

233a5(rnying rgyud): 'di bzhes la/ bdag cag la mthu dang spangs dang ldan ma 'chad pa'i da spel dugasol// de nas 'a bsung du// gnam ldan pa pagi chang de cid// drin chen gsar kyi r+g+hAt+patal la// gza' dang b+has dmang po sogs paso// na san tha rma kyi sa ma /

233a7(rnying rgyud): rgyun ma cad/ ga ldan pa na 'apes tshogs dpam// dang can tu dngagal laso// sel 'aspa pa // thugs pa'ang // gdugs nang pa sangs pa dang / 'ad yang dzad dkar ba
233b1(rnying rgyud): dab can dang // suchags pas pa'i'adas nams ngan// dga'adadags pas 'thapa 'gas sa// dbanaganags sa dang can pa bshasasasnyam pa/ ma mad pas shal gyung ba/ sa na na pa/ ga dag 'jug tu na dus
233b2(rnying rgyud): laganas pa'i byang chub sams dpa' ste// thugs rje dbang gis 'gra kun sangs pa stobs// sba la da ba dgar dag gsol// drug na gdug/ pa'i dbyug pas 'dams// tshangs su nga dkar mdog ser brtsi bas// rin chen lha thar dgros 'dod nings// rlod kya
233b3(rnying rgyud): bar gang byed pa// de la nad rnams smra 'dren cing // dang gcig tsam la phrang bar byed// de dru rgyal ga rtsod pa ba spyod// rin chen gsheg pa gdengs pa yis// sra rnams 'dral 'phrag 'tshal bstod// rma pra rab tu mdzes pa'i thul bas brgyan// 'thob ma
233b4(rnying rgyud): lus nga pa nyid btsams spyad// de dka rab tu mangs pa'i gzul// gsusran mdzes pa'i sham thabs can// pra phral can lachag 'tshal bstod// 'khor na gnas pa srog bdag brgyad// shail dang drad ltar rab tu dkar ba'i sra// mog bdag dkar ba
233b5(rnying rgyud): brgyad pa btsud// spyod zag brgyad pa'i bgegs rnams mang ba yang / ma rung dus pas rgyal ba'i thun du byas// srin sngar gtibs pa de ring yas dang lcags la byin// mngos bdug mnas yong la/ gang bdag kyang pa nas shig/ ma sa
233b6(rnying rgyud): na// rga pa gcig rin chen dung gi mkhad// 'gram ni lhags 'gram ston pa gas// sman na chen pa sam // gle 'bar ba'igatan bsal// 'ad ni gsu ba sngon po la// mabangs bris gnyis kyi mthong sa// zung ni mchod cing skrag pa ra/
233b7(rnying rgyud): sa phel pa chags// sram par phyogs bzhi tha gan// mapar tha / don mi slong // dam 'angs kyi phyim 'phral// ba ngag nyen pa sgral ni 'thil// legs la gar ba sgral mi 'ag/ de dra 'is par lamatshan gsol ba// srog
234a1(rnying rgyud): she le ru 'dod lags// nang na khri gcig khri bzang po// dung khri dkar po byab lags// bse yi rkang bzhi par te bar// dar dkar grang bsten nems se nem// / yas na tA skad lha lgang ba// dang dkar gser mdog rgya
234a2(rnying rgyud): pa lags// srab ni gser la mthur ne g.yu// stan ni za 'og dngul stan can// sha thag g.yas la tshon drub btags// sha thag g.yon na nad kyi rgyal pa btags// g.yon na byi zug dang ma dir// nyi mig seng sbar bya ba lags// shel gyi khyi la ga
234a3(rnying rgyud): ral can// mche bdung gi phur ba bzhis// skye 'gro thams cad rtsad nas gcod// so ni lcags kyi phur pa bzhin// zangs kyi spar shang gdengs pa yis// skad cig tsam gyis phyogs bcud phyin// mjug ma dung gi zhags pa yis// brdabs pas lha srin
234a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad brgyal// ske la gser gyi a long btags// g.yu yi dril bu 'bum gyis brgyan// dkrol bas phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes// kha nas du zug gsum bsgrags te// dang pos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'jig/ bar bas rgyal chen rigs bzhi badrag
234a5(rnying rgyud): ba mas sa bdag gdung zhing 'bod// sru ni nyag ma re re la// sna tshogs 'od chen 'phro bar byed// dbus kyi dung khri dkar po la// srog bdag shel gling dkar po bzhugs// su ni gadra'i chags pa 'dra// ga yu yi srin mkhrugs se khrug/ bse yi sen mo shad de
234a6(rnying rgyud): shad// dung gi so bdar bems se thi ma// sbrul dar dkar ra lag gsol// dbu la brjid ldan 'gyid thod bcings// tsal chen seng ge'i kha chag can// dpa' rtsal stag gi thod kha can// rkang lag yu ris chags yul// gyi men dngul gyi sgrog bu can//
234a7(rnying rgyud): gser gyi sgra chen mdzes pal// rin chen ga yu yi tshar tshar can// sru la ring la lcibs shing bzhugs// stag ral g.yas la gzig shubs g.yon// sra lcag dkar po g.yu 'bras can// gnam la bskor zhing chibs la bgyod// thugs ni meja la ma mer 'bar//
234b1(rnying rgyud): ni thog tum drag rtsal can// mdos bdag mdos long la// gud bdag grung bzhes shig// tshangs bdung gi zor tshugs can// yul sprin dkar spag pa gsol// phyag na rdo rje ba con bsnams// rgya gar chos kyi mtshan gsol ba// tshangs pa dung gi thong tshogs/
234b2(rnying rgyud): nano// phyag na rdo rje rtsi dgu bskams// rgya nag dag gis mtshan gsol ba// rgyal po chen po 'i dun shan gyi bya// za 'og 'phar chen skrag pa gsol// bse yi mdung chen dpal ring bsnams// sum b+ha'i yul du mtshan gsol ba// sum ru 'gro zan bgying lag+sa
234b3(rnying rgyud): pags bu dkar po'i skrag pa gsol// phyag na dngul gyi byi la bsnams// zhang zhung yul du mtshon gsol ba// de yang srog bdag shel gid lags// sbal man tri ralag gsol// phyag na tsan+dan be con bsnams// gtsug lag pon gyis mtshan du gsol/
234b4(rnying rgyud): phangs kyi mtshan gsol ba// srul dngul dkar ras ka gsol// phyag na tsan+dan dbyug pa bsdams// skye bo yongs kyis mtshan gsol ba// kar te yam pa spyan gcig pa// sru ni ma bcos dkyus mar bzhugs// phyag na ral gri stobs chen bsnams// li
234b5(rnying rgyud): yi yul du mtshan gsol ba// a ka d+ha da skyes gcig po// sru la dar dkar thul ba gsol// phyag na ga shog pa'i sog le bsnams// hor gyi yul du mtshan gsol ba// ga gon gser slag can zhes bya// sba la matong shel gyi skrag pa gsol// phyag na
234b6(rnying rgyud): sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams// mon gyi yul du mtshan gsol ba// bdud kyi rgyal pos mun rje// dgod kha nyi ma'i zer la rgyug/ phyag na nyi zer zhags pa bsdams// mdos bdag mdos long la// grung bdag grud bzhes shig/ de nas lham mo bskul te/
234b7(rnying rgyud): hU~M/ rgyal po thugs kyi dgyes sdem// gsang bzugs kyi yun gcig ma// lu lus shel la smin mgasu// sothogs dung ba nidang bu mchod// ngag gi gsung stan tongs sa tong // gser gyin ma grangs se zang // sume na gur chen mi pa'i// thos
235a1(rnying rgyud): the sbom pa khrugs sa byag/ bas yi srin ma grangs sa zang // sul byagad thul ba la// mabya'abum kyi mdangs kyis brgyan// gsar gyi skar mda'i mtha' bskar can// gzha 'artson 'bang pa'i 'chag tan// nang bar mangs
235a2(rnying rgyud): bde gsal nas// sems can kun gyi srog la dga'// phyag g.yas shel gyi bum pa ru// brjid dam pa'i marbad dathu nas// gtsob mnyes byed rnal 'grong mo 'phel ma// phyag g.yon gser gyi zangs zeb rnams// dgranga'i badran chud cad nas can/
235a3(rnying rgyud): zhal gyi rlangs pa dug tu sprul// mi nad sna tshogs char ngu 'bebs// mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ glud bdag chen mo klad longs shig/ ces gser skyems gtong ngo // de nas 'khor srog bdag brgyad kyang zer/ 'gong po spun dbu la 'di skad
235a4(rnying rgyud): pa yul lo// shar gyi phyogs nas gshegs pa ni// rgyal po chen po khu le shong // gser gyi mi pho chen po la// lag dgum rgyal khams yongs la khyag/ la las srid dang mang pa la sra// la las yul mkhar rtsenas 'bebs// la las srog gi nan pa
235a5(rnying rgyud): byed// la las dbang gi lha dang 'bral// la las sgo yi lha dang 'bral// la las sgo yi nor dang 'brel// la las nyin gyi hod pa byed// la las srog gi 'jab bu byed// la las na chung kye rgyu na gcod// sbal sha ba'i skrag pa gsol// mdos bdag chen
235a6(rnying rgyud): mo mdos phongs shig/ sred bdag chen mo grud langs shig // lha mi phyogs nas gshegs pa ni// rgyal po chen po ag gi yang // su ni ga wami 'tsho rab gcan// za 'og blo za'i bar chen gsal// sngon po dang gre 'gying zangad bcings// phyag nab sa
235a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i mda' gzhu ba snams// sha la dga' deng khrag la thos// mdas bdag can ma mdas longs shig// bla bdag chen ma gra dang zhes shig/ nub kyi tshogs nas gshegs pa ni// rgyal po chen po yu ge ni// rba ni zangs mdog dmar thal// mdzag/
235b1(rnying rgyud): dmang tha' bar can gsos// dmar pa la brgan 'akyang zad bcings// mug na lpags su ma da ngag zlab snams// shadang drag la dadang \u0f7f// mdas bdag can mam das mangs shig/ kyang bdag chen mo kru pa zhes sheg/ nga gaphyogs nas gshegs pas
235b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba gyin baphreng po ni// su ni ming nag sdang phul// zabasag thabs gsol// ljang ba da kyi gyi zad bcings// mad 'gazu gags pa phyag na ba snams// mdos padag chen ma mdes 'angs shig/ srad bdag chen po chung ba zhes / shAr gyi
235b3(rnying rgyud): dgang son// 'di dag na byung la// tshul ma bdagasal/ rdzun gyi tham pa bcags/ dpa' dun mgyul 'o// rang rdzi'i rlu sdug na snyams/ dpa na pa pamang bdag can mdas sa
235b4(rnying rgyud): sma bdag rkyen mgung ba zhes shig/ nub rgyal yang ba ni// su men thal gyi pa la// dbul ba gyis na sran gcig gshegs// sngon pog su'i bar na pa s+hol// dpa' sdug sa rgya gzugs 'o// gnas dang gsus gri bskams// sha
235b5(rnying rgyud): byigags tshad na// dang cig tsam thos sto gsum brjod// mdas bdag rten ma mdas yangs shig/ klud bdag rgyun ma kla nga zhes shig/ babyang rtsal pa ni yo ni// byed par ba'i la// min khridadamar pa'i gagasal// zangs kyi ro

239a7(rnying rgyud): bdag gi sred pa na pon// doni de bzhi bde mchog lags// bdag gi dpagasas sa shing bani// de ni mamo'i chu gnas lags// bdag gi srid pa'i mad sprad ni// de ni ma ma'i 'chags sa lags// bdag gi dbang po'i mad ldad ni// de ni mtsha
239b1(rnying rgyud): da pa lags// bdag gleng ngasam banog ni// rnam pa da mangs dgas// bdag ga ma// / nga brgyud gnyis med 'o// / bkud gnas ca sa// ma kyims nas gnan// sre mam lasum 'dun/
239b2(rnying rgyud): rten pa ma tshogs kyimasrid pas bzlas pa'i dam can ma/ gnyis su med pa na dzum/ ma bzhin pagrangs nas kyang // gzhan gyi dring lam bzhes par// bdag gi las 'di 'gal par mdzan// ma bcos dkyi nga/
239b3(rnying rgyud): mo rigs pazhi'i thugs dram paskang dgongs pas// snang ba'i dgrabs ma ste ga// mnyam pa nyid kyi zhing khamasas// khyod kyi spyad phral pa gyi dgongs pas// ba zod rgyan gyis ma ster // 'byur ba med pa'i 'brang na// gnyisasu med pa gang nganangs
239b4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa rdeg pas ma ster ro// byang chub chen po'i gshegs lam bya// g.yel ba med par gshegs dgongs par// dra ba'i dgra pas ma sted do// bka' dang gzung bzhin rdo mthogs// yul bar tshad ma mchis la// dmyal la rdza ldog mas chis na// @#
239b5(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i dam can ma// sman gyi man dag phog pa bzhin// las la dab po mthu ma chung // dus lab pa bo ga yel ma mdzod// srog la bab/ bzugs ma ring // 'aco' ba'i las 'dri ma mdzad na// dgung la shar ba nyi ma la// lha smin zhugams kyang
239b6(rnying rgyud): lakhad// klung ngu 'dril pa'i chu bo la// klung 'dor stsogs kyis bzlas pa lang// rgyun du 'ong ba'i rgya bo la// mi gtsang ngag gis bskrad la khad// dras su skyes pa'i ha lo la// gyen gyi sad kyis bsade la khang // rdo rje brtan pa'i ri bo la// gte mug gzung ga
239b7(rnying rgyud): btab / khang// shes rab gsal ba'i nyim la// bag chags grib mas smib la khad// dan dang ldan pa'i skyem bral// mnongs stabs la bcad dmaH// tshe rabs snga ma las 'gro dang // 'jig rten 'di me ma tshig gnyis// mthun na ba dag gi
240a1(rnying rgyud): bskon/ la yang
240a2(rnying rgyud): 'dim dzu// mi mthun ne ldang phyir ma g.yel// bsnyen pa thams cad bskyabs pa lags// snang ba thams cad bas pa lags// mchad pa thams cing batshal ba lags// san po gdug kyang sbed na gdung // srin pog
240a3(rnying rgyud): kyang pos na 'od// s+ye shi'i lam yang bzlog na zlog/ sra ba'i brag kyang brkos na phred// rba drag klung yang bcad na chod// 'khor ba'i lam yang bkag na legs// rdo rje'i spa yang bshig na shig/ tshogs la ma gzigs las 'di mdzod// bskang ba'i dmachog
240a4(rnying rgyud): bdag myong gis// nyams pa'i chad pa sgos na tshad// dus lam g.yel myur la mdzod// bdag gi gzugs kyi phung po la// snang ba med pa'i gos gyon cing // nazad pa med pa'i rkyen yod na// sdang ba'i dgra bo las ngan pos// nyes pa med par ska/ bas la
240a5(rnying rgyud): bcad// chags pa med par thu lon gnyer// bsad pa med par srog la rgol// 'khor ba'i lpags las kho yis bzlog/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor lo yis bshig/ rgyal ba'i pho zang kho yis pa shig/ byang chub dz+nyAn lam po yis bcad// bdag gi
240a6(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyi phung po 'di// sol ba'i sdong po 'gyel ba 'dra// bdag gi rnam par rig pa ni// me stag babs te shi kha 'dra// bdag gi dbang po lnga po ni// ston pa'i me tog rnyed pa'adra// sdug gi zug cig 'dir 'bod do// 'phong gi bu gcig 'dir sbed de//
240a7(rnying rgyud): skam pa'i med po 'dir theg na// dmangs kyi thug cig 'dir skyon no// das ni mnyes logs ka myur du rjod// pham pa'i spang ma myur ba dang // seng ge brjid dang mthal cig/ nad de gshog pa ma pa ca cing // stag pu ris dang mabral rdzo
240a8(rnying rgyud): bdud kyi rkyen lamam gcad cig// rdo rje gzong 'am sgril cig/ bstan pa dpung pang ma skad cig/ me togs dkyis ma gsod cig/ gsang ba'i gnas sngam spangs shig/ rgyal ba'i bka' gyu ma pa cad cig/ bstan pa 'dzin pa'i masring /

240b2(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi che ba ma srad par// bsnyen pa gnon pa myur du sungs// don dang ldan pa'i skyes bya'i// bdag dang 'ga' las ma gtogs pa// nal 'bror kun kyang dam mi bsrud// phred thogs mangs kyang srog mi 'dzin// sngon gyi bal ba zhes gang lags pa//
240b3(rnying rgyud): bsung phyir rang dam srungs// rba klong 'khyil ba'i chu bo la// don ma mchis par ma mchongs shig/ nam mkha' ye nas stong pa la// don ma mchis par ma gshegs shig/ ched la ma bab las 'chol la// srog la babs kyang ma gshegs shig/ gnang ma shes pan
240b4(rnying rgyud): skar 'bod kyang // ched byicha par ma bzung cig/ shis ngan rgyu mtshan mi shes phyir// gzhung tshugs go rim mi shes par// rang nyid tom tom dkrug pa la// brtul thugs phrin las ma mdzad par// don dang ldan pa'i skyes bral// klong ni mkhar bzhin dashi sa
240b5(rnying rgyud): slong // 'gegs ni shes pa'i 'khrul khungs 'gegs// gcod ni 'khor ba'i rgyun lam gtsad// snying srog brtan pas las 'di mdzod// ma mo srid pa'i bem las/ spre ga mdongs gsol gyi skabs so// / hUM mi kye mi 'gag ces kyi
240b6(rnying rgyud): dbyings// skyon gyis mgos gzugs kyi sgra// skyon dang tan mongs mi mda' yang // nal 'byor dam tshig bsrung ba'i phyir// sral gshegs bzhugs mi mnga' yang // srul bas 'gro don mthar phyung zhig/ lus dag bslang du gyur pa rnams// khyed kyi 'dul sbal
240b7(rnying rgyud): de lags kyis// phrin las myur du mdzad du gsol// chu bgrang men 'byung ba la// lam du re nas ma gshegs shig/ gshegs dus lags kyang phyag tu gshegs te mchis// nam mkhar stong pa'i bar snang la// yul du ri nas ma gnas shing // gnas kyang mdzo

241b7(rnying rgyud): mapo rje yul du 'i thams// phrin las bcal btu dmags na// brags dam mtshags dbang phyug bskang // trag skal blo/ dras cas snying par ga mo b+h+yo/ drag ra/ sung mAr ya/ khye bu ma ril kha waM/ mug dgra po khams rmugs/ ma ma sbeng khar ka mamar na/
242a1(rnying rgyud): ma ma dag mdun bya/ mam srid pa'i rim las/ sbreng gsol ba dang sbeng bshags pa dang sbeng ga paton te bskang ba'i cha ga skabs so// / de nas mas rnams las la'ang mangs kyangs btub na/
242a2(rnying rgyud): nang 'i gting nas dkrug pa ni/ phrin las kun gyi gnyen non no// de yang dur khrod nas lo mo gang yang rung ba la/ mtshan dang ldan pa'i ro btsal la/ rnga de'i snying gar/ gang byed pa'i snying po shing shun la bris la gdags/ de ltar gnong byin kyi su'i dkyi
242a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor rol bris/ ma mo'i snying po la gnod sbyin gyi snying po gzhug tu btags la/ stang rtsa brgyad bzlas na thugs dam la 'byon par 'gyur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor ma srub par ro ba shas la/ rdzas rnams mchod par dbul/ snying gi nang du ma mo'i srog snying bcug pa/
242a4(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyid kyi thugs kar gdags/ gnod sbyin dang ma mo gnyis ka la mchod pa drug tu dbul/ des bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub par 'gyur ro// ma mo srid pa'i be ma las/ gnad lam mo gnod sbyin gyi su yi dkyil 'khor du dad pa pa'i skams so//
242a5(rnying rgyud): de nas ma mo rigs bzhi la bstod pa 'di gsungs so// hU~M dbyings kyi ma mo'i gtso mo ni// srid pa yongs kyi mngang bdag mo// srid pa cham pa 'bebs mdzod ma// bzhugs ni sa dgu'i steng na bzhugs// sa dgu'i steng na bzhugs tsam na// klu kyal 'bum

242a7(rnying rgyud): srang chen po bskams// phyogs su gnod sbyin mang po brten// las su srid pa/ zam la 'debs// srog chags mang po srang la 'jal// keng dus sha brag mang ba lho ru gsol// nga dang bdag tu bltabs 'jig rten las la 'bul// 'khor 'dul
242b1(rnying rgyud): gshegs su gsol// zhes blugs dam bskang ngo // hUM khram kha stong gi dbang mo che// su ni mi bzad 'barab la// phyag na bdud kyi khram shing bsdams// mthing nag per chen srul gsol// rak+ta chags byed theg le spyan// bdud mnyes brgya lnga bcu gnyis kyis
242b2(rnying rgyud): bskor// mgyogs byed bka' yi pho nya mo// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // ri rang gling bzhi'i dbang mo che// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// zhe sdang ral pas sa gzhi khebs// ser nag 'bar ba'i na bza' la// g.ya ba na mdzes pa'i kha chag
242b3(rnying rgyud): phyag na zhing chen rgyal mtshan bsdams// 'khor lo mtshon chas dgra sdang 'joms// bdud 'dul chen mo 'jigs byed sba// 'khor du pho nya nyis brgya lnga bcu gnyis kyis bskor// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // theg chen sa yi dbang mo che//

244b7(rnying rgyud): pa ni je ltar gong ma rnams la blta/ rang gi rig pe ye shes kyi sems sunag zhi'i rgyun dngos po dag pa tsam du brtags nas/ zhing ni 'byung ba lnga las grub pa'o// de rnams ni gong ma la je mo ltar blta'o// de yang bcu bzhi'i nang na/ nyi zla stong gi thod phreng gis srin
245a1(rnying rgyud): pa cham la 'bebs pas/ 'dod chags kyi rgyal mo des sred pa pha mo skye ba'i rgyan tsam la phab bo// phra men tu mchos smos btab ste/ ma mo bcu bzhi gtso mar dbang bskur bas/ de na dza ma'i yang ngo mo/ dbyings kyi yum jug gis
245a2(rnying rgyud): kyang dbang ba skur bas/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo dang khyad med de/ dbyings kyi yum drug la ngo mor blta'o// las skal du ni ma mo kun 'khol ba'o// mthun rdzas ni dpe chung dang mthun no// gsang ba'i dam rdzas ni sna tshogs snying sna dang / dur khrod kyi rdzas kun mthun no//
245a3(rnying rgyud): blta 'i mtshan ma 'dul ba'i gnyen po kun/ de bug sum phyag drug khro bo rdul snyed kyi bka' nyan par blta'o// sred pa cham la 'bebs pa bka' bsgo ba bzhin nyan pas/ ma mo nyi shu yongs dus mkha' nas bsrung mtshams kyis bskal pa 'ad 'dis na/ dmyal ba mi sa
245a4(rnying rgyud): dwags su 'gyur te/ de ni tshe tshad med do// dam tshig ni bstan pa bsrung bar dam bcas pa'o// sman mo rnams ni mi'i chu ma dang nang khrol rnams la dga' ste de ni dam rdzas so// dus mthang nas kyang / mthun pa'i bskad rdzas ni/ gnam la lding ba dang / saM la 'dzul ba'o//
245a5(rnying rgyud): gnas ni ri rab kyi rmang na gnas so// lta ba ni dpal chen po lta bu gcig la dbang byed kyi je bo lta bu gcig tu bltas nas/ bka' bsgo ba nyan no// dmi tshig ni mchod cing brten la dam tshig tshul bzhin du bsrung ba'i rnal 'byor gyi bka' byed pa'o// las skal ni
245a6(rnying rgyud): med par sha khrag la dga' ba dang / gnod pa sna tshogs byed pas gnod sbyin mo zhes bya'o// de yang bya ba mo dang byed pa po gnyis kyis/ de rnams gdug pa can 'dul dka' bar gzigs nas/ ye shes lha'i tshogs la gsol pa btab pa/ dza ma kha

245b2(rnying rgyud): kyi bskang ba'i le'u la sa/ gsang ba zugs kyi bskang ba dang / sru yi thugs dam paskang ba ni/ spyir bskang ba dang srer sgos bska pa 'di gsungs so// spyir bskang ba la yang rnam pa bdun te/ gsang ba mdos kyis thugs dam paskang ba dang / ma mo skye bslab chen zas
245b3(rnying rgyud): thugs dam bskang ba dang / rtswa chen po sgo bzhis thugs dam bskang ba dang / pam mtshan dang ldan pa la/ spos chu dang gur gram gyi chu gtsang mas bkrus te/ gos dang rgyan gser g.yu la sogs pas brgyan pas pa skang ba dang / mdangs bzhis skong ba ni/ me long ge ma dang sadan
245b4(rnying rgyud): rma bya'i sgo mdongs dang / chu mig dngas ma'i mdangs dang / me dmar gyi mdangs bzhis bskang ba dang / rnal 'byor pas yum mtshan dang ldan pa la sbar ba'i byang chub sems kyis bskang ba dang / dngas ma lnga yis bsang ba ni/ me yi dngas ma me shel dang / chu'i dngas
245b5(rnying rgyud): ma chu shel dang / khrag gi dang sa ma bud med kyi mtshal chen dang / sems kyi dngas mkhu ba dang / sbu gu spu spa'i dngas ma dang / za 'og ber gyis bskang ba'o// de ni ma mo spyir bskang ba'o// kun kyang de 'dun gyis mi bskang ba ni med do// ma mo sred pa'i bem las/
245b6(rnying rgyud): ma mo spyir bskang ba'i skabs so// / de nas yang ma mo rigs bzhi'i sgos bskang la/ der ma 'dus pa med pas/ de yi bskang ba'i rdzas mdos bstan pa 'di gsungs so// dang por dbyings kyi ma mo'i bskad rdzas bstan pa ni/ rma bya'i tshul mtshan dang /

251b2(rnying rgyud): dmacan rgyal mo bskang // sems na 'di ni 'byung bas sred// 'byung ba yi med spong pa ste// 'byung ba lnga la sgo shi med// byang chub sems la skye shi med// skye shi med pa'i dbyings phyug ma// bskang rdzas chen po 'dis bskang gis// thod ce
251b3(rnying rgyud): dam bad krur cig/ lha mad rtsal rab 'bar gyi thugs dam bsang // rgyal mo khyod kyi thugs dam paskar gyur cig/ shes rabags la ba'i dbyings chen nas// rgan byed chen mordo rje kha' bar kongs can// dus bzhi snyoms pa'i rgyal mol// bas
251b4(rnying rgyud): rang dbyings kyis bsku // thob tsang la ba te shan rdzas hU~M D+ho// ma mo srid pa'i be ma pas/ ma mkha' ba kong sra can gyi thugs dam paskang ba'i skabs so// / rmugs pa'i dbang phyug las ci pra menam// mkha tho rnam
251b5(rnying rgyud): par dag padzan tso ba bar nas/ dbar bayi ba pang khrag zin 'khrugs pa'o// nam dag ning sa bsnyad pa'i tshul ston pas// bskyed pa med par sla 'brang sa drug gsal// shes rang bying chen sum can gsang par// seMngs chen pa ma ma'ang
251b6(rnying rgyud): sred gsum 'gran bla med pa'i rgyal mo rtsod// zhabs gnyis lapar pos rab brgyan te// snying ba kun kyakhyab par thal// khyod ni stong pa'i dang las 'ablangs// stong pa bltar med ye nas mtshon med// ye nas mtshon du med pa'i rgyal mo khyod// dzi/
251b7(rnying rgyud): rten thub par 'gro ba'i dbang phyag ma// raba' bar sgra can ga zor rdzogs can/ don du dbyings kyi mam drug 'gron mdzad// gser mkhar thob rjeng gi nang shed na// zhal ba sgos rtag pa'i rgyal mo lnga la mdzad// nyen ma tshan med par mkhar gyi rtsil btsugs/
252a1(rnying rgyud): bab bdag can pa rab bar ma// nagamatshogs 'thun mdzud// ye shes 'byung ba'i dang las byu// sems nyid yo ma san myed// mtshon du med pa'i du las srang thangs te// sems can las kyis rgyad kyi sbrul mtshon// srong
252a2(rnying rgyud): gsum dbang bsgyur rab 'bar mazhu mo che// sems can las kyis khyed kyi sru mtshon te// rtog med khang par rtog med khyod bzhugs pa// skyob pre ta'i klong chen ye lung nas// sru mdog spug gu g.yu yi lan phran can// zhabs la gser gyi 'khor los btogs
252a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling bzhi khyab par nyul// las su spro 'bog nad chen btang // sngag pa dam nyams 'khor du nad chen gtong ba'i dbang mo che// sngon tshe drar khrod bsel tshal du// gsang ba'i mtshan btags rdo rje kha ra la can// gser mkhar zor ba gdong gi nang shed na// las kyi kyal
252a4(rnying rgyud): rdo mu bzhugs te// gser gyi nyag zag brtsegs pa la// g.yu yi bad btags yal la// ma mo'i nang na 'khu ldog che// gnyen mo yi pha ma khyod kyis kyang // skyo ba be ta'i gling chen nas// sngags pa'i 'khor du skyo 'bog gtong // nyams pa rnams la chad pa chod// dam tshig
252a5(rnying rgyud): nyams pa'i gnyen du che// spyan rdzi ba sru nyag re la// gza' skar rgyug cing rgyu skar 'gyed// skyo 'bog gtong ba'i dbang mo che// bskad rdzas sa pa sha nas bskang // bsgral ba med par tshim gyur cig/ sems can 'di yi mdadra chen 'dis// nam mkha' stong pa'i ngang dang mnyam// bya yi/
252a6(rnying rgyud): dge bsnyen 'di yis thugs dam bskang // sems can 'di la dbugs yod de// gzung du med pas rlung dang mnyam/ gzugs med dbugs kyis thugs dam pa skang // sems can 'di la gzugs yod pas// kha ra la rdo rje rtsal gyi thugs dam bskang // skyo 'bog gtong ba'i rgyal
252a7(rnying rgyud): mo la// mtshon du med pa'i gzugs kyis bskang // skyo ba be ha'i gling chen du// dam tshig nyams pa'i sngags pa la// skyo 'bog gtong ba rgyal mo khyod kyis gtong // khyod kyi thugs dam g.yu skem yis bskang // bskang bas tshim ste bskal ba med// stong pas spong ba bslal ba la//
252b1(rnying rgyud): bskal zhes bya ba'i gdags gzhi med// bsgral ba med par tshim gyur cig/ skyob na she tre ma tra ta mgra se hU~M ha he b+ho/ ma mo de ni bu ron gyis bskang ba ste// nag monan ltar khros na/ bya phra ron gtsor byas la dbyings kyi yum drug nas mar rdzas tshogs tshad kyis bskang ba'o// 'di ma mo bskang ba'i
252b2(rnying rgyud): le'u chen mo ste/ sgo nas gnas kyi cho ga nyi shu rtsa gnyis po dang / yang sgos skong yod do// de yang sgos skong ni/ dkar mo nag mo sug mo gsum du phye na/ ze cho ko la ni spos skongs so// srid pa'i byo brog gi sa bskrang ba ni/ ma myo spyi'i spongs so// gling bzhi dang gur yang spyir bskang ba'o//
252b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi bsdus te bskang na/ spyi bsgrib chen pos bskang ste/ sngag pa dam tshig nyams nas 'khor du ma btub pa dang / rang nad kyis gdung ba la/ spyi sgrub la spyibaskang gang 'grub pa btags nas drag tu bskang zhing / slob dpon la dbang nos nas 'gyod pa skyes nas bshags na 'di dang phyi ma
252b4(rnying rgyud): kar mi sgrib par 'gyur ro// ma mo srid pa'i be ma las/ ma mo bsdus pa brgya rtsa brgyad dang stong rtsa brgyad kyis bskad pa dang / pho 'dus pa dang sa bdag dang / klu'i bskang ba le'u chen po'i skabs so// / ma mo srid pa'i be ma las/ gu ru dpal bzhad pa rtsal
252b5(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa rdzogs so// // skad kyi gu ru 'phrul pag gi thugs kyi dgongs pa'i bem zhes bya ba 'di/ gu ru 'phrul gyi gshog rgod rtsal dang ba na chung yang dbang gter gyis bsgyur ba'o// bdag 'dra ba na rlung sangs rgyas kyis// 'dzam gling sems can tog can la// lung chen bskang ba le
252b6(rnying rgyud): ti// shog ril dpe chung nyi shu rtsa bzhir spel// shog bu ldan po yi bcos thabs yin// dgos pa de yis tshong bar 'gyur// 'dzam sring sems can grol gyur cig/ pha tshogs mtshogs mkha' 'gro ma// thugs dam bskang ba 'di 'asgyur bas// bdag la rtag tu stso gyur ci
252b7(rnying rgyud): ma mo srid pa'i bem chen 'di// mthu chen byin rlabs bkra shis shog/ ma mo rnams kyang 'dra bar shog/ dbyings kyi ma mo 'di mchod pas// tshogs gnyis rdzogs te spring gnyis kyang // tshe 'dir bar chad thams cad 'brog/

253a2(rnying rgyud): ril ba'i tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po chen po bzhi la chos ston pa'i tshe/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu nyid ma hA kA la bya rog gdong can du sbal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dus ngan bstan pa 'byung ba'i tshe// sangs rgyas
