264a6(rnying rgyud): mo'i las rnams gru pa'i rtags// sgren yang lam nag 'phang bgod nas// 'byug cing ser ba du mthar dong // 'thab nag rkyen pogayo bar byed// gang dmigs rten la brdeg pa'i sngags// oM trag dgra snying nga dag/ dzag ma ma ngag mo d+hi la/
264a7(rnying rgyud): shwag rbad/ gre la shar blo/ TI mA ma hU~M/ phung byed las 'di gsang ba'i mchog/ sr-id pa sgrub par btso ma med// dmar por mtshon ma sna lnga dang // nyi shu rtsa lngas mi na zlab// lag su gnas pa phyogs dge tu// sdang meg pa ga zhing sdigs dzu bsgrer//
264b1(rnying rgyud): tsam gyis zang bar byed// brgyad pa nang tsam cod byas pa// dgral ki kang dbab par bya// chos grangs dgra yi gradra la// lag g.yas dgra gra'i thal mar sprul// sha ma tshams nas nub brang du// drung brang gi kang rgya byed ngas// yid ming dus bla dgas pa/
264b2(rnying rgyud): rgod ga dang dmar chen du// s+yar la nub byang mtshams su bzhag/ hung dkar bya rig gshog phur dang // gser bye dag la drag sngags bzlas// shar lhomatshams nas pardeg par bya// oM trag rag sha as me ru ru ma ma du lu ru lu d+ha bum/ ma ma trag rig sha sril shar
264b3(rnying rgyud): phrom ni/ mA ra ya b+ho rbad/ 'di bsad las grub rtags rnams kyang // nam mkha' dpal skya thabs sangs nas// sprin yang yug gi lto tshil 'dra// ser ba nya mig tu 'ong zhing // thog ser bu yug mur du 'bab// brtsam pa tsam gyis las grub pas// sum cu rtsa gcig
264b4(rnying rgyud): sngags rgod la// nam yang the tshom mi bya'o// bcu gcig kor tse mchod byas nas// bcu gnyis ki kang dbab par bya// chos grangs bcu gnyis nam 'jing la// chu so bdud du sprul nas kyang // byung nas lho ru rgyu byed pas// ling+ga lhor bzhag dmar dang skrag/ byang nas lcags
264b5(rnying rgyud): phu blang drag dang // nyung nag ske tse shang tshe dang // phung byed bdud kyi drag sngags bzlas// oM pa sha mi ki yag sha bor bdu ka la/ rA hu la hur zlum shar hri la rbad su/ ru ru pra pra zums thums/ nr-i mA ra ya rbad la/ phung byed dmong mo 'di grub rtags// sprin ya shing lo
264b6(rnying rgyud): gshib 'dra dang // mthing nag sems can gzugs zad dang // ser ba kham nag zur gsum dbyibs// drag tu dbab cing rlung slebs ljang // lugs thog 'brar bas myur du 'joms// phud byed drag sngags 'di btag nas// ri rab chen po 'jig 'gyur na// dzad ser
264b7(rnying rgyud): las la spos ci dgos// bco lnga gang com tshad byas nas// bcu drug gi kang dbab par bya// chos grangs bcu drug nyin byed na// mgo po srin por srul byas nas// lho rnagam tshams nas byang shar du// srin po 'i cu byed pas// len kyang shang mtshams dag tu// bcos
265a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ dang rngan gsung la bzhag/ nub na pa'i tshogs dgun// shasul khrag nas b+harnas dang // gnam dag sha'i bran dag gis// thal rangs dag brdeg par bya// oM san san dag lag/ khrag la bur thams/ mug tsathun/ dung chu
265a2(rnying rgyud): nr-i mAr ya rbad a/ rag+ha'i sngags rgod 'di 'grub rtags// sprin pa kham nag kun tu 'khrigs// g.yag dang mdung shing shar ba 'dra// rlung dmar pog dang ser ba yang // btsan dmar zad kha ma mchongs shing 'ong // nyi shu rtsa gsum drag sngags 'di// bzlas pa tsam gyis
265a3(rnying rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// brgya byin nyid kyang drug par byed// bco brgyad kong co mchod byas nas// bcu dgu ki kang dbang bar bya// chos grangs bcu dgu'i nam phyed na// mdug ma dmu bdud chen por srul// shar nas nub tu rgyu byed pas// ling+ga dmar bcas nub tu bzhag/ shar
265a4(rnying rgyud): nas gro dang til dkar dang // nas sngon rma bya'i snying thag dang // dmu bdud rol pa'i drag sngags bzlas// oM tr-i traM shi gri na rA tsa dun te/ rA tsa dun te bshag dril hrI la/ rbad su re shar ha li nan po// nr-i mA ra ya rbad/ dmu bdud sngags bzlas grub rtags ni// sbyin pa rtsi
265a5(rnying rgyud): pabarkyang 'dral// kham nag lan 'ga' 'khrug cing 'ong // ser ba gong gsum gcod byed cing // bya 'bur 'dra lte gong gsum gcod// lce 'bebs rgya mtsho 'khrug par byed// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang 'jig par 'gyur// sa g.yas dmu rdo kun tu 'bebs// nyi shu gnyis//
265a6(rnying rgyud): la gong tshe mchod// nyi shu gsum la kI kang dbab// nye shu gsum gyi sngar chen la// lag pa gshin rjer sprul ba yis// nub byang mtshams nas lho shar chu// ling+ga dmar bcas shar stong bzhag/ sha khrag tse/ ra bcas pa la// pu byed ma mo'i drug sngags bzlas//
265a7(rnying rgyud): byang mtshams nas brdeg par bya// AM ya ma dAHsa do ma yaM bya tsa ye/ sing ga ye ru tsa du tsar ma tril shar la ma 'i b+h+rUM/ nr-i mA ra yadzad ya/ bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur bas// lung byed sngags rgod grub pa de rtags// srin pad ma nag hral hral po// sems can sa
265b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs gzugs su snang // chub nag drug por bcas pa dang // ser ba bu lam che med kyang // sngon du 'bab pa tho tshom med// log sred yul du man 'ang zhing // rigs mdzab bsgrengs nas la bstaska pas// thog sar tsam 'dod par 'gro// nye shu lnga la gang tsamatshad/
265b2(rnying rgyud): nyi shu drug la ki kang dbab// nyi shu drug gi tho rangs kha// skra rengs dang po shar tsam na// dpung g.yon klub tsan dgra lhar sbrul// lho nas byang du chu byed pas// lin dkar dmar bcas pa dag/ byang phyogs dag tu gzhag par bya// dkar dmar rdzas dang til dkar la// grwa
265b3(rnying rgyud): brtan dgra lha'i drag sngags bzlas// lho nas phung byed chen po bskul// oMn+ta gsen sen dum pa le/ shag pa ku ba tsa badz+re sa d+hu sa ma ya/ brel shar byo// dri mA ra ya du rbad du ya/ 'di gsang las grub rtags rnams kyang // sbyin pakyar kye dril 'dra dmar// rlung dang 'dres
265b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i ser ba yang // skra tshugs dril ba bzhin du'o// pog dang yus rlung nag kyang // sum nu rtsa gsum sngags kyis 'grub// log sred gtan bung sngags 'di la// tog dpyod med gnyis gang thabs// demi dngas gra pob mi srid// sngags pas the tshom med na 'grub/
265b5(rnying rgyud): nyi shu dgra la kong tsho mchod// gnas stong gi gang dang pa par bya// gnam stong nyi ma sgur chang la// steng dang mche ba mig dang gsum// byang shar mtshams nas lho nub bya// bi nA ya kar sbal te rgya// lit+sA sha rul khrag rdul dang // ram chen bcas pa lho nub bzhag/ dza 'chen/
265b6(rnying rgyud): b+hag deng dung dkar la// sgragacan 'dzin kyi sngags dazlas nas// sngags pas brang shir mtshams nas brag// mA ma snyid / ya mthag/ ya madra/ rarba la/ bur thar/ pra car lung nan/ dgra sring rasang ni/ des lenan/ zil shag se na macoM// dz+r-im
265b7(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa tsam gyis grub pa'i rtags// smin bdud ka mgo bo che// lkug pas par snang kun khebs nas// 'khrug cing thog ser myur du 'bab// 'brug spa drag pos stong gsum khengs// de ltar grub pa'i rtags byung na// thog dang ser bkang yang rung // dam
266a1(rnying rgyud): 'a6/ pa'i rten la byur bar bya// grub nas dngos grang dang brangal// bdag dang gnyis su me par byar// pog ser gtong ba 'das su yang // tsog gang yang kang ni// brtson ldan sngags pas shes byas pa// dzas la sngags
266a2(rnying rgyud): babrus zor du 'phang // zong 'phang mdzub ris gar byas pa// nyi ma re res 'joms par byed// sor bzang kham du 'ong bas// sngags pas drag sngags grub par bzlas// rog ti nag po 'di grub na// ring ba chen po'ang 'jig pa dang // gyamatsho chen skem pa dang // 'gran
266a3(rnying rgyud): mdzo'u ltas ngan dang // thog ser las rnams ci 'dod bu// dus med par yang 'begs par nges// srog ser las rnams gang tsam yang // sa dgu pa yi sngags la sogs// sde tshan brgyad po'i bran gyis dbab// sde tshan brgyad po'i sgrub bran la// drag por nyams rug
266a4(rnying rgyud): len pa// da ni nga yi ga dang chud 'dzin// bdud bya rog mgo brtsegs rog ti nag po'i gsang ba sgrol byed kyi rgyal po ki kang ragA'i mdo/ snying gzer drag po'i sngags rgyang chen po las/ bshad pa srog thun thog ser gyi rtog pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de na
266a5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan gshed chen gyis// lngabargya dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas gnyen gyi bstan pa la// 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i phyir// zung byed drag po'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ dpa' bo chen pos rab bshad pa// stong gsum mi mjed 'jig rten 'di//
266a6(rnying rgyud): gcig sring bzhi sgrub pa ni// ga dang tshor drod ldan rdal 'byor gyis// pog mar gnas rabang rtag zab// ri brag gnyen zhing dgon pa dam// ri mtho thebs pa pakra mi shis// gcanag zan gdug pa'i Sha lal dang // e dbyibs 'dra bar mkhas pas gtag/ de nas
266a7(rnying rgyud): bslang pa'i las chen ni// snang dang mi sdang lasogs pa'i// gang dag bdag por gyur pa las// mtshad sbyin gtor yul 'digad brjod// dgangs shigs pa dag sde dpung bcas// dan ldanan la 'byor bang gnyid kyis// 'jig rten log sred 'dul ba'i gyur/
266a8(rnying rgyud): bar den ram/
266b1(rnying rgyud): brten pa gnas kyis spang na// rten gnas bdag par gyur ba byed// mthag phrag dag ma skye bar// gdug 'dul las kyi grags thos shig/ de nas lham dran zab// sman co bcom spyan gshed chen gyis// thugs rjesas la gshegs nas ni// rlu drug shin
266b2(rnying rgyud): kun bsrel nas// bstan gyis 'gro drug smin pa ltar// rnal 'gror dbang phyug bdag nyid kyang // 'dir gnas log sred kun 'dul bas// sa bdag 'khor bcas dbang mdzod cig/ de nas sa ni sbyang bya ba// khwa gang brkos te gter stsal la// sa yi rdo lnga gang byang dang /
266b3(rnying rgyud): mi sgo drag po'i dkyil 'khor ni// khru lnga pa yi tshad du bya// dri dang ldan pa'i rnam lngas byug/ steng du bdag nyid rab gnas la// gzung zhing kyang tshul rngam stabs kyis// rdo rje keng rus gtams pa dang // gru gsum drag po'i gnas su brlab// de nas dkon mchog 'khor
266b4(rnying rgyud): bcas la// mchod sbyin rgya chen bsngo bya ste// phyi nas bskang bshags drag tu bya// de nas gdug byed rab bcing ba// rnal 'byor gshed chen thugs ka nas// mthing nag hUM gi khyad par las// stong gasrem khro bor rab gsal te// rngam sgras 'jig rten kun bkang
266b5(rnying rgyud): nas// gdug pa ga yo 'gul ming yang med// gnod mdzes gsang sngags drag po yis// gang dmigs log sred ma gtogs pa// gdug pa ma lus mtsham bcad do// oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ An ya ho b+ha ka wAn
266b6(rnying rgyud): bid+yArA dza hUM phaT/ de nas drag po'i dkyil 'khor du// brtul zhugs ldan pas 'di skad brjod// gdug 'dul drag po'i dkyil 'khor du// 'gal byed ma lus bsgral slad du// dkar gsum dme khrag dam rdzas 'dis// phung byed dkyil 'khor chag chag 'debs/
266b7(rnying rgyud): oM ma hA dro la maN+Dal hUM/ de nas tshon dang ku ku ra// phag chen rgyu ma gsum sgril la// thal chen bug la 'di skad brjod// dur khrod drag po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'gal byed gdug pa bsngal slad du// srin po rol pa'i thig btab pas// srid gsum dkyil 'khor nyid
267a1(rnying rgyud): dugs la// A ma hA dz+nyA na maN+Dal hUM/ bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dbus su su gsum e bskyed la// 'khar la rtsibs bzhi mtha' bskar du// gdug pa sbrul gyis bskor bar bya// bar khums sa son da/
267a2(rnying rgyud): gshed po nyid kyi khong par bri// e zur gsum gyi rtse rnams la// skyed rdo dkar dmar nag po la// gsum btsugs gshin rjer dbang bskur ro// rtsibs la srin mo'i mtshan ma dgod// bar khyams dag la dgod bya ba// drang srong rnams kyi mtshan ma'o// de ltar dri ba'i
267a3(rnying rgyud): las bstan nas// de yi steng du bsgrub bya'i rdzas// zangs sa mthod pa mtshan ngan du// khrag sna snying sna sna tshogs dang // dkar zab ra yi mchin pa dang // ba yi 'o ma dme khrag gsum// chu bdud tshang ba dag dang ni// sa rdo dra bas dang gong bu dang // sngo sna phal dag ci 'byor
267a4(rnying rgyud): stsal// mA ra ya yi yi ng+ga dang // yul gyi pho nu rdzi pa dang // yul gyi ming yang bris la stsal// tsang rog po 'ag la kha ba// chas su gong bzhin gsal byas la// stegs bu'i rtsar gdags gnas sngo bya// klad phor bzhi ni khrag bkang nas// gdong mo bzhi yi mdun du
267a5(rnying rgyud): bzhag/ kla por de dag rnams su ni// ya mad ma sri'i ling+ga dang // yul gyi ming dang srub sngo kun// sngags kyis btab pa khor bar stsal// de la srin mo bzhis brten bsgrub// thod pa mA ra ya yi bod par bya// zang bu ma ra'i ba sring dag/ gzed mor shi ba'i thod par bya/
267a6(rnying rgyud): dang mdza'i thod pa dang // smad la bslab nas mnan pas 'grub// lih+la dang bcas bod pa dag/ de rnams dgug cing drang bar bya'o// hUM gshed chen la ma bA tsa ni// ya ma dam sri nyams pa'i gshed// bstan pa rgya mtsho bsrung mdzangs// gru gsum rtse la gshegs su gsol//
267a7(rnying rgyud): srog bdud dmang po dud kyis// gshin margyal po ma rba co// bstan pa gnyan pa bsrung mdzad lha// bu gsum rtse la gshegs sugs la// gshin rje nag pa dgra yi gshed// nag po rag srog phred can// bstan pa rgya mtsho bkrung mdzad lha// gru gsum rtse la gshegs
267b1(rnying rgyud): sru gsol// oM gr-ita bi tsi rAHthA/ oM hi te ba ga Na T+Te/ A ya ma hAtsas ta ma ya d+ha~M/ zad pa len drang zlab// dang la mnyes dbang bzhugs pa// de nas drag pa'i las la gzud// bskrun pa jog pa grags mngadapa// nyams pa'i phrag ga shid
267b2(rnying rgyud): srog gi gshed// ya ma dA tsa'i dus la bab// thugs las gshin rje 'bum 'gyed cing // rol pa'i stabs kyis ma mo 'dul// srin las dam nyams thatsha 'gugs// dgra pa'i rmi khyed la shog/ gang dmigs rten la byung du snyems// nyams pa'i grag
267b3(rnying rgyud): gshed srog gi bdud// ma ru co yi dus la bab// thugs las gshin rje 'bum 'gyed cing // rol pa'i skabs kyis ma mo 'dul// phrin las nyams pa'i tha tsho gugs// phrin las phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad nas// dgra ba'i blo tsho khyer la shog/ gang
267b4(rnying rgyud): dmigs rten la myur du snyims// dgra bo'i srog len srog gi bdag/ gshin rje nag po'i dus la bab// thugs las gshin rje 'brum 'gyed cing // phrin las phyogs pa'i mtshams bkrud khyab// rol pa'i skabs kyis ma mo 'dul// phrin las dam nyams pa
267b5(rnying rgyud): 'gugs// dgra bo'i bla mo khyer la shog/ gang dmigs rten la myur du snyims// sprul pa'i gshin rje thod pa 'dren// drongs shig snyims shig myur du snyims// U kar sha yon hUM dza / bstan pa 'jig pa drang bkug nas// dmigs pa'i rten la bstim byas la/
267b6(rnying rgyud): gtad dgatad do'i chog sgra dang // shor ra de yi dag byung ste// rnam gsum phyag tu gtad zlas la// ri bo gsum gyi rtsal bstsal// bskal par bar pa'i dus med pa'i// gshin rje yul du bskyal ba las// sdug bsngal mang po yi reng // ki kang mang pos
267b7(rnying rgyud): srog bcad nas// gshin rjernams kyi lto du sbyin// rAt+pa la yis bur ming bu// bdud mo bzhi yis rngam zas bya// lhag ma lus pa med pa cu// gshin rje rnams kyis bzhes su gsol// thod pa'i ng+ga la sogs pa// dmigs pa'i rten kun drangs byas pa// skyed pa
268a1(rnying rgyud): gsum la ba dung shAr bya'o// ban gtan nab kya gamag bcags gsang ngazla' thad pa la ba ke ka klu'i mang bying ga par drug pa'i tud ldan papas/ dkyil ga bar shA gzhi'i gas gnaganang kyi la ga pang/
268a2(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan gshed chen gyis/ lngabargya dus kyi tha mamaH// sangs rgyas gnyen gyi bstan pa la// 'gal byed tshim la dbab pa'i phyir// bung byed dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// chas dbyings mi mngon nam dag dbyings kyi lha// bstan rgya
268a3(rnying rgyud): malus bsrung ba'i D+hid// srong nyid dang las lko ga tum sbya ba zhengs shig/ 'khor dang bcas pas spyan 'dren gyi// bla gsum mthir nag ri bo gsum 'dus pa'i// gnas 'dir stan 'dren tshul bzhin gshegs spags la// sr-i pra ng+ga rna mas dge b+h+yaH/
268a4(rnying rgyud): tat+ya \u0f7f sa ra we/ sebs ma 'i si d+huH/ dbyings dang mi shes ral pa'i dkyil 'khar nas// grags ma mthong nag a yaM gnas mchog 'dir// la A n+teg pa ga khram gshegs sugs pa// zhesang ma ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// y-in tsal 'ab ba
268a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs su gsol// 'dod chags khrag mtsho khol ma'i dkyil 'khor nas// klu mo rdo rje glog 'gyu gshegs su gsol// chang skong rgya mtsho klong dkyil gting du man// ma mo las la 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// zung bri wang rnon drug po gshegs su
268a6(rnying rgyud): sa ngonas// mong sbyi 'a gag shegs gsu/ thang rnags 'dudu byug pa shi banas/ bdu ga ga ba bag shegs sa gsas// dzin pa ma mi
268a7(rnying rgyud): gshegs na/ ga ma zugs mun// zung cigagags ga g+sa// nga / gsogs srinams/
268b1(rnying rgyud): klu btsan 'khrug pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// me bsrungs khyab mjug chen po gshegs su gsol// byang shar bgegs chen gtum khro'i dkyil 'khor nas// bgegs dpon gza' bdud sgra gcan gshegs su gsol// mgo dpung yan lag dud khrod dkyil
268b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor nas// sde brgyad ral ba'i mthu chen gshegs su gsol// stong gsum shar phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// sring gcig stag srin zor gdeng gshegs su gsol// gling po zhi lho phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// srid gcig pa me srin dred
268b3(rnying rgyud): gdong gshegs su gsol// gling bzhi nub phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// srin gcig kong srin pa ma gdong gshegs su gsol// 'jig rten byang phyogs nam mkha'i dkyil yangs nas// sring gcig 'brog srin chu srin gshegasasu gsol// dregs pa mi
268b4(rnying rgyud): bsrungs pho mo 'khor dang bcas// mthun pa'i dam rdzas gnyan la rgyan 'dren gyi// bstan pa bsrung phyir ma thogs myur du gshegs// AM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/ e h+ye hi/ pra b+ha ba/ a ra li/ he tri sarba pra bud+d+ha/ dzaHhUM baM hoH// bi sa ra he hi dza dza/ bugs rjes 'o
268b5(rnying rgyud): 'dren 'dul mad dkyil 'khor tshogs// gshed po yab yum lcam dral sras dang bcas// dregs pa mi bsrungs pho mo la sogs pa// bstan pa bsrung phyir gnyis med bzhugs su gsol// A~M sarba ta thA ga ta/ ya mAn+ta ka/ dzaHhUM baM hoH// kA ya bA ga tsit+ta/ sa ma ya
268b6(rnying rgyud): tiSh+Tha g+han/ oM A hUM/ thugs rjes gdug pa ma lus 'dul mdzo dang // dregs pa 'dul mdzad 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs byed gshin rje'i gshed// brjid pa'i 'od phung ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam nyid thugs mnga' gdug 'dul yum chen mo
268b7(rnying rgyud): chags pa'i rol pas thugs rje'i 'od zer 'phro// g.yas g.yon 'grel sbyor brjid pas 'khor rnams 'dul// dbyings nas khro mchog sru la phyag 'tshal lo// dug lnga kun 'dul thugs rje'i byin rlab kyis// lcam dral su 'khrungs 'jig rten kun gyi mes// ki kang sgra spogs
269a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzichan byed kyang
269a2(rnying rgyud): srid gsum sa bkong ba'i// thugs ngal pa'i sras la phyag 'tshal lo// rim chen sred gsum sprul ba'i stobs mnga' ba'i// srogs rapas kyi mnga' bdag phung za chags// lum dral 'gal byed 'dul ba'i 'khor dang
269a3(rnying rgyud): bcas// rnal 'byor gdung ba'i yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo// a la la ho// ma hA gu h+ya sa ma ya/ pu ru sha ya ho// gdug pa ma lus 'joms shing sgrol// gshin rje dU tra kun 'dul ba// bcom ldan mgon po yab yum la// dpe gtor drag dang rab myang ba'i
269a4(rnying rgyud): dur khrod rdzas kyi mchod pa 'bul// 'jig rten mi 'gyur zhe sdang sba// gdug byed srin po'i tshul can la// sha khrag gsur bcas 'di 'bral gyi// rngam pa'i zhal du thim par bzhes// bsu rigs brgyad kun 'dul ba'i// thog sran k+ta'i lham gcig ma// dkar
269a5(rnying rgyud): gsum dri dang bdug pa 'di// dmigs shing dbul lo bzhes su gsol// dug lnga 'tshal ba'i dpon sras mched// sde brgyad rol pa'i lham dral la// dkar gsum rdzas kyi mchod pa 'bul// gtsang sme med par rol du gsol// A~M sarba a mr-i ta pa pa ta re ni
269a6(rnying rgyud): swA hA/ AM AHhUM/ sa ma ya s+thAm/ ha ha he he ma tAg ba/ ka ruka sha/ sarba k+She bi ti kha kha sha ta ba la/ bar ma khA hi kha le b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ha he rak+tA khA hi/ rak+ta ru ti dra ba ling ta kha ram/ pi ba ar li/ pi ba sar+tha bi sa ra/ tra tra das stang gar+b+ha sa hA// sngags pa rnal 'phyor
269a7(rnying rgyud): ldan pa yis// dzaHhUM baM ho'i phyag rgya dang // be thon sdig mdzubar ba bslangs nas// dbyings nas bskul zhing spyan drangs la// gnyis med pasti ma rdzogs mchod par dbul// nga yis bsten pa'i gsang srab 'dis// lnga brgya tha ma'i dus su 'byung // de dus dang mos gang bsrub
269a8(rnying rgyud): pa// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub mchog/ nges par thob cing gzi brjid ce// 'jig rten 'dir yang gas gso dang // srid pa spab par po tshom med// bdud dog te nag thogs dang sgrol byed kyi rgyal po ka gang ngaka'i mdo snying gzer drag po khyud las/ phung phyed phrin las
269b1(rnying rgyud): kyiskang can pa'i mtha bdun pa// / de nas bcom ldan ga shed chen gyis// tha.aca ngas rtsig ma na// das la ba thad pa dang / sangasanas ngan pas pan babacu/ gas sa dab ban smran// rdzas smra ba thas pag
269b2(rnying rgyud): srog gcod sdig la dga' ba dang // de 'dra'i las kyis mtshams sbyar nas// d+hA tra'i gnas kun chud mar len// de 'dul gnyen por bka' 'di srungs// bdung po rog te nag po ste// bya reg mgo brtags ki kang 'di// gshin rje gshed po nyid kyis/
269b3(rnying rgyud): dam btags ngam bsgral zas su ni// bsten pa 'jig pa rnams byin pas// 'di nyid bsgrub pa'i dus su ni// dang la gtso bo yab sdam bskyed// de nas 'khor rnams rim gyis so// de la thog mar sngags pa yis// ku sha'i stan pa mnyam gnas la// 'jo
269b4(rnying rgyud): 'das ches rnams dmigs med cing // ye med bdal ba'i rab nyid las// khyab gdal snying rje'i ngo bo ni// bde gshegs kun gyi thugs nyid de// mthing nag pa yi 'phro 'du las// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs bsrel zhing // mthing nag be con nyid du gsal// 'od
269b5(rnying rgyud): zer sna lnga'i 'phro 'du las// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rim gyis chags// e yaM khaM su~M raM ke b+h+rUM// dur khrod rol pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// yi drags kau thod lang long 'phyo// rtsibs bzhi ste dbus e yi gnas// bar khams sgo bzhi rab tu gsal// e tsaH
269b6(rnying rgyud): maN+Da lA// mthong nag e li pho brang du// me ro ta ri'i gdan stengs su// bcupa su yi bskyed sngags kyis// gshin rje gshed nyid 'bar ba'i sgra// A~M a kro te ka ya man+ta ka trUM// skad zil chu nag drab 'dra ba'i// mthing nag zugasum srid rjer 'bar// thod
269b7(rnying rgyud): skam nyi blar ba gsal ba'i// sbrul nag zod kyis rnam par can// spun dkyus gon d+ha rang ba ni// g.yon gsum thugs rjes thang du gzigs// nga na sang sdug bsngal grags mas 'debs// g.yas gsum spang migazhel gnon// 'jig rten drags pa'i chod
270a1(rnying rgyud): rnams 'dang // dbus gsu ma mtha' 'das mig sa stan// gzigs pa mad pa 'a tshul gyis gshegs// smyan cig dmangs shin m+b+hi/ 'bras pa tha~Mng drug 'drabs 'byor// srin ma klog 'grus pa bams gas pa//
270a2(rnying rgyud): rje ma lcags kyu shin tu 'khrugs// stan nas badrug grogs stong gsum 'gengs// shangs nis rlu 'dzubs rdo rnga 'gro// zhal gdangs gru gsum nyim khung dbyibs// tshoms kyis skye shi ca dgatsad pa// mche ba bcu ga nyis dka la 'tshor// tha gsum
270a3(rnying rgyud): phur bur bsnol// ljags kyis dug gsum ri la ming mdzad// ag tshom me skyug dmar pos mdzes// bcu bdun gdug pa'i gsung sbra yis// stong gsum skul pas 'gengs pa'o// phyag drug 'bar 'a'i g.yas dang po// btson 'gyur zhing nam mkhar gdengs/
270a4(rnying rgyud): g.yas par g.yas kyi tham na// ral gri lcags kyu rab bskams pa// g.yon gyi dang po b+han dmar rngub// bar ma de bzhin sdigs mdzub bslang // tha mas sa gzhi rab mnan nas// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho 'khrug pa'o// ba spu rtsang khur gshibs pa las// me lhag thu lum
270a5(rnying rgyud): rab tu 'khrugs/ stobs dang b+ha g+ha car ma dang // tshangs pa'i g.yang gzhin na bzar btubs// ru d+hi rak+ta thal pas mtshan// gdug sbrul rigs bzhis yan lag dkris// rnam drang thod rlon 'bar bas kyang // ser la kha ru brgyan pa'o// zhabs ni na rag dmyal kham
270a6(rnying rgyud): gzir // me dpung gdug pa'i klong dkyil na// rngom brjid stobs kyis gnas par bsam// sbyor sgrol yum gyi sku bskyed pa// kun gzhi dbyings kyi ngo bo ni// khro mchog nyid kyi g.yas g.yon du// dmar sdug ma gnyis spro bsdus pas// skyong sgrol yum mchog
270a7(rnying rgyud): khros pa'i sku// ro langs g.yon nas 'khril shing sbyor// dmar chen gtso ba'i zhal du stob// sgrol byed me thing nag g.yas phyogs nas// tsita kha T+wAM phug na bsdams// rgyan dang chang grwa yang dang mdun// med dung spong na de bzhin gshegs// ma mai hA'i

271a1(rnying rgyud): da ldam pa gyis// 'ad dgas dang na/ nga sdug/ ga gas pa da sa// spyad cug sa tuzhugs nas// spya shu nga // mamadungs pan/
271a2(rnying rgyud): bang khyams khrag mtshol// dmar ljang ma 'i 'gro 'dulas// 'bru la phung byed paskyed sngags kyis// ljang sngon drag po khros pa'i sra// kha gdangs mchi ga tsigs mig 'grad cing // sna 'brad na rmongs ral pag cings// g.yas na chu srin nags pa thogs// gangan/
271a3(rnying rgyud): na sngags sngo ga dmar po can// rdzog ser gri thabs gtong ba'i bdag/ ma g+ho 'gre/ shar stor bar khams khrag mtshal// dkang sa ci yo to 'dums/ drang srong dka ras mas pa'i sde// khag dngas mche gtsigs mig bzang cing // snang bu na yo
271a4(rnying rgyud): ral chen gzings// g.yas na chu srin zhags pa thogs// g.yon na tri shUl g.yab nag 'dor// thog ser yams nad gtong ba'i bdag/ tsa ba depe le trAM/ ngar khyams kyang phyogs khrug ma tshal// mthing nag du yi 'gro 'dra las// bdung po ga ti mthing nag
271a5(rnying rgyud): sba// khang grang mche gtsigs de bzhin te// g.yas na chu srin zhags pa thogs// g.yon na bdud gags nag thogs// thog ser lams nang gtong ba'i bdag/ byang tshul stabs kyis gnas pa'o// du ram mi ni hU~M/ bar khyams ste nu khrag mtshal/
271a6(rnying rgyud): dmar na kar yi 'phyo du las// srin po byi 'i khros pa'i sgra// khabagrang mche gtsigs de bzhin te// g.yas na chu srin zhags pa thogs// g.yonan sung po mi chen gdengs// nad dang 'khrug pa thog ser bdag/ pA rang gzugs chen 'gying shing gnas// rag+sa wi
271a7(rnying rgyud): par byams shar phyogs khrag mchod// dung ka a li 'tsho 'dums// phung byeng dadu bdud brji dpang bya// 'bagrad mcha gtsigs dang zhin te// gapas na du srin zhags pa thogs// g.yon nas gachen mi ma gzigs// dmu thog ser sems kyi dag
271b1(rnying rgyud): rang las pacan thabs byed pan// a Te mthAr d+hu/ bar byams nub byug lag mtshal// rngo nag sa yi bru 'dulas// gta byed mjug ring khros pa'i sra// kha bgrang mche gtsogs de bzhin te// gar sad na byi zhags pa zags// nas sa
271b2(rnying rgyud): dbyug 'phyar zhing brdeg/ skye 'gro'i tshe srog thog ser bdag/ brda' mi 'phrod pa'i btsan thabs can// rol pa'i stob kyis gnas pa'o// ya mas na ya ma hUM// bar khyams lho phyogs khrag mtshol// ser nag na yi 'gro 'dulas// khyab 'dug ser nas
271b3(rnying rgyud): brjid pa'i sgra// de bzhin la bgrad mche gtsigs nas// g.yas na chu srin gdug pa phur// g.yon na sbal na gsum sgril ldog/ thog dang ser bas g.yos dang // drag shul stobs kyis gnas pa'o// nag ri hU~M/ bar khyams byang shar khrag mtshol// dkar
271b4(rnying rgyud): dmar sha yi 'phro 'du las// mi bsnyungs skra gcan thos pa'i sgra// kha gdangs mche ga tsigs mig bgrad cing // sna 'bud rna krongs ral pa gzings// g.yas na chu srin gdug pa phyar// g.yon na khral shing rdo rje can// thog ser 'bring gri'i las mkhan pa/
271b5(rnying rgyud): rol pa'i stabs kyis gnas pa'o// sha i sa na tri hUM/ phud byed chen po 'di rnams ni// re re bskul kyang dgu dpung che// phung las sna tshogs bsam mi khyab// gza' mdud rgyu skang thabs kyis rol// phan gnod las la brtson pa'o// ki ka rol
271b6(rnying rgyud): brgyad dpon// thog ser yams nad sna tshogs dang // sa g.yos 'khrug pa 'byung lnga'i bdud// kun tu khyab cing kun la 'jug/ srid gsum sgrol ba'i las mkhan de// sngags pas gsal brkom drag bsul nas// rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo'i gdan
271b7(rnying rgyud): stongs su// mchan pa 'od 'phros pas// 'byung bzhi byed pa'i srog bsdus nas// ser nag ma ying po las// bdun pa sku 'i baspre sngags kyis// skrag srin mer nagasug gi go// nga pa dmang ga bye mo pas brgyad// stag lags rnon
272a1(rnying rgyud): bskor// snyan nas 'brug sgra drag po spogs// spyan nas khrag gi mchi ma 'dzag/ shangs nas rdzi 'bud lo nyes gtong // zhal gdangs glog 'gyu ljags las kyang // khrag chen ser ba drag tu 'bebs// ngan sngags pho log
272a2(rnying rgyud): spos nad gtong // kha rlangs sprin las thog ser 'bebs// thugs las ltas ngan sprul pa 'gyed// g.yas na bse pur 'dril zhing 'debs// g.yon na khrag zor dal kha 'bebs// chibs su sreg byed nyi mchi bas// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na'o// rag
272a3(rnying rgyud): mi tsit+ta sha la ma b+h+yo// spug nag ra yi ngo bo las// bdun pa rgya yi baphyed sngags kyis// bam srin smug nag dred mgo ma// ral nag ljags kyi khro chu 'dzag/ drod kyi g.yang gzhi yabs bskor// snyan nas 'brug sgra drag po 'byin// spun nas khrag gi mchi ma 'dzag
272a4(rnying rgyud): shangs nas rdzi 'bud lo nyes gtong // zhal gdangs klog 'gyu ljags las kyang // gnam lcags ser ba drag tu 'bebs// ngan skyugs glang sna'i nad gtong zhing // kha rlangs sprin las lcags thog 'bebs// thugs las ltas ngan sgrub pa 'gyed// g.yas na gnam lcags
272a5(rnying rgyud): sgra chen 'phyar// g.yon na gdug pa'i sbrul zhags thogs// rol pa'i stabs kyis zla ba chibs// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i steng na'o// ram mo rar kha rag b+h+yo// dmar nag tsa li 'gro 'du las// bdun pa skra yi bskyed sngags kyi// kong srin dmar nag glang mgo ma/
272a6(rnying rgyud): ral dmar khrag gi gru char 'bebs// ban grang ga/ yang gzhi ya bas bskor// snyan nas 'brug sgra drag po 'byin// spyan nas khrag gi mchi ma 'dzag/ shangs nas rdzi 'bung lo nyes gtong // zhal gdangs klog 'gru ljags las kyang // 'khar thog thu lum drag tu 'khrug
272a7(rnying rgyud): ngan skyugs khrag nad gzer ba gtong // kha rlangs sprin las btsa' mug gtong // thugs las ltas ngan sprul pa 'gyed// g.yas na zangs gri dmar po thogs// g.yon na glo gzhags bsdog cing 'phen// klu rgyal sdig pa chibs su chibs// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i
272b1(rnying rgyud): nag// brgya na zugs na// glang nag gam b.las// bdun sgrar ba rgyad sngags kyis// 'jug min byung nag cumanamag/ ral nag zugs kyi ma nga bebs dog/ chu yin gas gan sangs 'dor // stan nas 'brug sa drug pa byad// wAn nas thag
272b2(rnying rgyud): ge mchi ma 'dzag/ shangs nas rdzi 'bud lo nyes gtong // zhal gdangs glog 'gru ljags las kyang // lcags thog thu lum drag tu 'bebs// ngan sngags ltog rgal gag pa gtong // kha rlangs ljin las yams nad gtong // thugs las lhas ngan sprul pa 'gyed// g.yas
272b3(rnying rgyud): nardo rje be con phyar// g.yon na 'ja' zhag bsdog cing 'phen// phyag rgyal rmig pa chibs su bcibs// gyang phyogs 'khor lo'i steng na'o// raklo shig kha rag lam g+ho// kun kyang srin mo'i cha lugs can// srid gsum sems can srog la za// 'jig rten phung

272b5(rnying rgyud): chen po las/ bshan pa gyu sgom khog rtsa ba'i le'u brgyad pa'o// / de nas dpa' bo gshed chen gyis// lnga brgyan mdus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas dkon mchog gnyen gyi bstan pa la// 'gal byed log sred cham la dbab pa'i phyi rwa/
272b6(rnying rgyud): shan pa gtso 'khor bskul ba'i las bshad pa// hUM// 'jam dpal lha mchog ya man+ta ka ni// gru gsum mthing nag e yi pho brang ngu// to ro gcal bkram mi ro'i khri steng na// ri rab brjid pa'i sku mchog rab bzhengs pa// 'phags pa la mAn gshed po 'bar ba
272b7(rnying rgyud): spyang zil chu nag rlabs ltar gnag la 'tshor// ral pa mthing nag dbus su thor tshugs bcings// zod skam sbrul gdug nyi zla'i drod kyis brgyan// mi bzad spyan dgu shin tu 'bar ba ni// g.yon gsum thugs rjes thung du gzig pa yis// ngan long sdug bsngal thar la
273a1(rnying rgyud): gnas su 'dren// g.yas gsum snang mig dmar po bzlog pa yis// khrog tum btsan drag phyogs med zil gyis gnon// dbus gsum maH'bral mi gzigs gzigs tshul gyis// rtug chad mtha' 'das chos smras rba
273a2(rnying rgyud): ba// spyan sprin dmar ser 'bras bu mthing nag 'dril// smin mtshams glog 'gyu stong khams 'od gsal byed// rdzi ma lcags kyu shin tu 'khrugs shing 'bar// gsan pa ma 'gags snyan 'brug sba 'byin cing // shangs nas rdo rje'i drung tshubs mthing nag 'byin//
273a3(rnying rgyud): zhal gsum hom khung gdangs pa'i zhal nas ni// mche ba phur bu bsnol ba'i tshems gtsigs pas// dru trag sogs log lta zad par spol// ljags ni hom gzar dug gsum ril ming mdzad// bcu bdun hU~M sgras stong khams dreg pa 'dul// ag tshom me
273a4(rnying rgyud): 'bar gdug pa'i me stag 'phro// 'jigs byed drug gi g.yas kyi dang po na// be con phyar zhing nam mkhar rab tu gdengs// g.yas pa ral gris skye shi rtsad nas gcod// tha ma lcags kyus log sred tsit+ta 'dren// g.yon gyi dang po b+han+d+ha rak+ta rngub// bar pas sdigs mdzub
273a5(rnying rgyud): rtse la me chen 'khrug/ g.yon gyi thams 'jig rten sa gzhi gnon// ba spu rtsang phur gshibs pa'i rtse mo las// me b+ha gzu lum thog ser rab tu 'khrug/ ko rlon tshogs dang khrag zhags thal bas mtshan// ba su rigs bzhi thod rlon rgyan gyis brgyan// zhabs bgrad gyad
273a6(rnying rgyud): tshul na rag dmyal khams gzir// me dpung klong na rngo ma brjid skabs kyis bzhugs// thams cad ma lu khro rgyal khyod kyi sku// de 'drang bdag bsgom bdag gis rang bor nas// khyed kyi sku ru 'gyur bar byin gyis rlabs// bdag la gnod byed dgra dang bgegs kyi tshogs//

274a1(rnying rgyud): 23/ nga'i lpags pa nas// rgyas 'bum gyi choms du 'khrug cing 'bar// snang meg zlog cing sprin mam ltur 'bar// stan nas 'brug sgrogs khams gsum 'thibs kyis mnan// shangs nas dud 'phrul gru gsumanyal

274a3(rnying rgyud): g.yon khrag mtsho 'khrug cing zhal du gsol// 'dod chags khrag mtsho 'khrug pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// yum chen ku mo rdo rje yak+ka mo// 'dod chags gti mug 'dul ba'i khyad par ni// sku mdog dmar nag dbu gnyis brjid pa ste// dbu gcig pan glang 'jigs byed pha
274a4(rnying rgyud): spa can// dbu gcig chu srin dmar 'cher lhang lhang 'don// rgyan dang cha lugs mi bsrungs yab dang mthun// phung byed klu rgyal kun gyi yang phyi mo// tsi tsi dz+wa la'i nad kyi bdag mo ste// 'jigs byed ral pa srugs pa'i sbagaseb nas// sdom dang sdig pa mi bslangs
274a5(rnying rgyud): cher chen 'bebs// rdo rje lce 'bebs thog gi bu yug can// kha rlangs sprin gung 'khrigs pa'i byin brlabs las// klu nang bsam yas gtong zhing phung byed ma// g.yas pas sbrul zhags dam nyams kun 'ching zhing // phyag g.yon rgya mtsho 'byug cing nad gtong
274a6(rnying rgyud): ma// thugs dam dus la bab po sa ma ya// klu thun sna tshogs dam nyams dgral ya// 'dod chags zhe sdang rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// mi dge bcu 'dus dug lnga'i don sras po// lus po gcig la mi mthun mgo dgu skyes// mi mthun mgo dgu
274a7(rnying rgyud): gcig dum 'khril// mi mthun mgo dgus byor ba kun gtong ba// srog dang ser ba mi mthun las dgur ston// mgo gcig srin po bai tre patra'i mgo// srin po'i ki kang drag po'i seng chen 'bebs// mgo gcig phung byed srin po dadul// sbyin da
274b1(rnying rgyud): ki keng thog ser drag tu 'bebs// mgo gcig 'jigs byed gza' bdud sgra gcan 'dzin// srog gcod gtibs gri ki kang drug tu 'bebs// mgo gcig dub mjug ring chen po ste// 'jigs byed kun sgrol gtan zung ki kang 'bebs// mag gcig khyab 'jun
274b2(rnying rgyud): chen po sprul pa'i sku// lha srin gdug pa kun gyi ki kang 'bebs// mgo gcig dmu bdud byib+hU rA dza ste// glo bur 'khrug pa'i ki kang chen po 'bebs// mgo gcig bdud po tsar ka yi mgo// drag po las kyi ki kang hur buM dbebs// mgo gcig 'jigs byed
274b3(rnying rgyud): ljang sngon dmag dpon te// thog ser gri thabs sna tshogs ki kang 'beb// rog ti nag po bya rog mgo brtsegs te// sa g.yos sad ser btsa' dang mu ge dang // phud byed nad ngan sna tshogs ki kang 'bebs// bka' las 'das pa'i log lta dam sril// ki
274b4(rnying rgyud): kang sgra tshogs dbab pa'i dus la bab// ral pa dmar po spyugs pa'i sgra gseb nas// 'jigs byed phung byed gza' bdud char du 'bebs// sku mdog dud ka baspu'i dkyil 'khor nas// rdo rje'i lha 'bebs ser chen 'od kyi bdag/ mgo lus mig mdas
274b5(rnying rgyud): khams gsum byar mkhan// smin ma glog 'gru bar snang 'od kyis 'gengs// sna nas bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nang rlangs 'thul// gdug pa'i kha rlangs par snang sprin du 'khrigs// sen mo lcags kyu g.yas na chu srin phyar// 'dzin shes gtong mi shes pa'i zhags
274b6(rnying rgyud): chen gyis// log sred kun 'dul dam nyams 'dzin par byed// bka' las 'di' byed dam nyams smod pa la// srog la chan thob lo la ser ba phob// glo bur ye 'brog dam sri'i snying la ya// shar phyogs 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs stengs su// srid
274b7(rnying rgyud): gcig chen mo rtag srin zor ba gdong // bka' las mi 'da' 'bar ba bzhad mo che// ral dmar spyib ci dragaser gyi zor bas brgyan// sku la stag ljags g.yang gzhi go du gsol// snyan nas 'brug sgra sman nas khrag 'dzag ning // gangs nas rdzi babud bzo 'jings
275a1(rnying rgyud): nyas gtong // lhags nas sgrog 'bru mun pa 'og skabs 'byed// zhal gdangs khrag chen ser ba thag tu 'bebs// khrag zhag ngan skyugs po log spos nadagatung // kha rlangs sbyin 'khrug gsor gyi phyog 'debs ma// thugs
275a2(rnying rgyud): las ltas ngan sna tshogs skul pa 'gyed// g.yas na zor phur 'dril zhing snying la 'debs// g.yon na khrag zor dmar po dgra la 'phen// khyed kyi chibs su sreg byed nyi mchi bas// bstan pa 'jig byed dam nyams dgra bo la// pho log ki kang dus 'dir d+ha ra
275a3(rnying rgyud): lho phyogs 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs sbyangs su// sring gcig chen mob ma srin dred mo gdong // sgra mdog sdug nag 'bar ba bzhad mo che// lcags kyi ral nag khro chu'i zo lum 'gro// yul dred lpags g.yang gzhi yabs bskor// stan nas 'jug rdzogs rgyan nas
275a4(rnying rgyud): khrag 'dzag cing // shangs nas rdzi 'bud btsa 'thibs lo nyes gtong // la rlangs sbyin las lcags kyi thog 'bebs ma// sngags las glog 'bru mun pa'i go skabs med// zhal gdangs khrag chen ser badrag tu 'bebs// khrag zhag ngan sngags glang lnga'i nad gto
275a5(rnying rgyud): ma// thugs las ltas ngan sna tshogs sprul pa 'gyed// g.yas nas gnam lpags dgra sta 'phyar zhing brdeg/ g.yon na sprul zhags gdug pas dam nyams 'ching // khyed kyi chibs su bsil byed zlab chibs// lce rings nad gtong lpags pa'i gud blangs mkhan/
275a6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa 'jig pa'i log sred 'byung po la// glang sA'i kI kang dus 'dir myur du phob// nub phyogs 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs steng nas// sreng gcig chen mo kong srin pan glang gdong // sku mdog dmar nag 'od 'bar bzhad moche// zangs kyi ral chen
275a7(rnying rgyud): lumi rab tu 'gro// srul ban gleng g.yang gzhin bzang min bas// nyan nas 'brug sgrogs spen nas rak+ta 'dzag/ shangs nas rdzi 'dud btsa' 'thibs lo nyes gtong // lpags nas klog 'gyu bar snang 'od kyis 'gangs// zhal gdangs khrag gi bu lug rab tu 'thor//
275b1(rnying rgyud): don sa gtugs nga cag yong// bams can mu su ga gangasas/ dugs las smras pa sang da ba ga tu// sa nga mdzud ma sa na // gnangs sa snang gas na pabyo//
275b2(rnying rgyud): da/ di snya sa sa/ sgyu sa
275b3(rnying rgyud): ga na/ nga/ sa dag sa sa
275b4(rnying rgyud): gas ga gag na
275b5(rnying rgyud): shrIsmra/ ga
275b6(rnying rgyud): sa
276a1(rnying rgyud): dgrab pa// danas bcom ldan gsheng can pas// dz+ha barbAdas kyi stegasas // sangs rgyas gtan gyi brtan pa la// 'ga'i byed rnam la da bu pa gyir// drag phyogs sngags dpa
276a2(rnying rgyud): pa// A~M a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na mthA T+TaHhU~M phaT/ khro mchog nyid kyi gsang sngags so// A~M sarba ta thAg ta kro ta ya bi dza yaM/ dz+wa li I ra ni hrI h+na pra ta shI risti hU~M phaT/ lus bsrung go bgo ba'i gsang sngags yin no// A~M badz+ra ba tA laM rag ra g+ha ma swA hA/
276a3(rnying rgyud): langs khro ma'i gsang sngags so// oM e ka dz+rIM dza~M dza/ thag graM/ mu d+ha mu tra mu sa du wa hU~M dz+dzab+h+ya/ e ka dze DI'i gsang sngags so// oM pa sha ma~M ki pa/ du dun ma ga shi krI ha nA dz+wa la ta mra dzi tsa ti ba ti rA ya~M swA hA/ mgo dgu ste gas sngags so// AH
276a4(rnying rgyud): tipra tI kar ni drA hu la/ bi kran+ta hU~M ta ka raM shar mi ta mU ra phaT/ las kyi bskul ba'i gsang sngags so// A~M badz+ra yak+sha dz+wa la ni/ ka la pra tsa ra/ tsi t+tadak+ta mur nA na swA hA/ srin po gdug pa'i gsang sngags so// oM yak+sha kro u tsAn+da/ nA ga le du ma pa la
276a5(rnying rgyud): tsit+ta ku lu ru lu b+h+yo/ glog 'gyu ma'i gsang sngags so// ma dag mo/ pan yaM shig/ mA ra ya nr-i dza dza/ tsa bdas le/ pra be sha/ ma ra tri dzA dza/ dur me mi ki rA hul/ hu thu ma ma ra dza dza/ ragrA tri a tsita rbad/ mA ra ya d+hi dza dza// i trai ra dun shag
276a6(rnying rgyud): mA ra ya ar+g+haM dza / ma ma sa na yAM/ ra tsa ra ma shar/ mA ra ya nr-i dza dza/ nA ga re shi tsil shag/ badz+ra sa dun/ ra ma d+hi la m+bA ra ya dzA dzadza/ shi i san trai yaM du/ hwA hu la hril/ shagA ra ma shar/ nI mAr ya dza dza/ hUM brgyad rol pa'i dgug sngags so//
276a7(rnying rgyud): IM many+dzu b+h+rUM ya mAn+taka/ bat+tA le grwa e kadza TI/ snying ba ga/ su badz+ra la rnam na dag mo// nAg dum pa lo/ sha shu mar k+ta// tsa 'das le/ ngu ma mi ka N+DiH/ ya ma pan yaM/ nAg ri ni she eng+ga/ raklon dung tsas mu sha la/ ga
276b1(rnying rgyud): b+h+yo// ma ma re/ dril thil/ shar shar/ ru tsadu tsa shu tri bram du kar rtsom/ sa man+taka a kar/ du ru du ru phrom/ ya ma skyeng / ya ma khrag/ ya madra/ yug ti sbyin khrag du tsar/ shar shur/ hril hril/ ya ra ma thil dz+ha// rak+Sha b+h+yo// nA ga/
276b2(rnying rgyud): b+h+rU~M// gdug pa'i dril sngags drag po yin// bdud dog ti nag po bya rog mgo brtsegs gsang ba grol byed kyi rgyal po ki kang rog ti'i mdo/ snying gzer drag po'i rgyud chen po las/ shin bsreg sngags kyi le'u bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan gshed
276b3(rnying rgyud): chen gyis// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas gnyen gyi bstan pa la// 'gal byed cham la dbab pa'i phyir// phung byed rol pa'i las bshad de// sde brgyad dreg pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di// bka' thob bsten pa rdzogs pa yis// dur khrod ro yings
276b4(rnying rgyud): grangs la// mdze can bsregs pa'i rus sol dang // bi Sha'i thal ba mdze rtol dang // sbrul dang sbal ba'i snying khrag dang // bi Sha'i 'dab ma'i spo bu dang // skyer ba'i rtsa shun bkrus pa la// pho rog sgomar sngo lkug gis// mgo dgu rol pa'i gzugs bris la// kha bgrad
276b5(rnying rgyud): gzugs chen dung ka chu srin can// mgo lus mig gang mjug ma sbrul// sde brgyad dpon snar mkhas pas bri// bstod dang mchod pa kun rdzogs nas// kong tsher 'jug pa'i tshes grangs la// nub nas mkhas pas dgram nas kyang // gro ga'am dur khrod ras chen la// khrag
276b6(rnying rgyud): chen dag gis gang dmigs bri// de nas rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis// gshed ngo// khros pa'i srung bsnad nga// srid pa'i mamo kun mngag ste// gang dmigs rnam shes drung 'dra ba// rten 'pha ste ra bcings nas// dkar dang dmar chen rdzas sbyar la// ljang sngon
276b7(rnying rgyud): zhal du 'di skad bstab// ma mo rol ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// dmag dpon chen po sru bzhengs shig/ chu srin gdug bzha' gdangs shig/ bstan pa 'jig byed dgra bo 'di/ sgrol ging dmag dpon chems kyis chems// mo'i tshogs kyi zhal dung stab//
277a1(rnying rgyud): gtang dag ta dang lngar ma btang // ma ga ma hA bdug tham stA ya/ khrib zlas kyang sngon lagatu gtad// bskal bar thar dus med pa'o// de bzhing+gA gang rtsa chos grangs la// mgo dgu rol pa shAng lhor dgram// ru kya mtshams
277a2(rnying rgyud): nas 'di skad bstab// shar lho mtshams nas sru bzhengs pa// drang srong chen po zhal gdangs shig/ bstan pa 'jig byed dam nyams 'di// rA hu la yi zhal du bstab// dgra lha'i rgyal po'i lag tu gtad// gtad dog tad do slar ma btang // tsa sangs le na zhal
277a3(rnying rgyud): ba 'artsam lamang la/ ba ma nga tshang lagang+gA gtung // thang byed gakhor ba cam ngal par dmigs/ bskal par nga ngas med pa'i// debazhin gang 'i chis grangs pa/ bad pamagod pa kyang du dag ma// gang dmigs kyinas 'a ming bsgrug// thang na
277a4(rnying rgyud): byed srub rdengs pa// bdud dpon khros bzhal gdangs shig/ bstan pa 'jig byed 'byung po 'di// tsa ka li zhal du bstab// bdud po rol pa'i phyag tu gtad// gtad do gtad do slar ma btang // du raM mi ki tsar ha bcug tha ma kha mA ra ya/ khri bzlas phung byed lag tu ga
277a5(rnying rgyud): bdud dpung 'khor bcas rol par bsam// bsgral par thar dus med pa'o// de bzhin kong+ka tsa'i chos grangs la// srin po mgo dgu'i lho nub dgram// byang shar mtshams nas 'di skad bstab// g+hozlab mtshams nas sku bzhengs pa// srin po mgo gu zhal
277a6(rnying rgyud): gdangs shig/ bstan pa 'jig pa'i 'byung po 'di// bi tri pa tra'i zhal du bstab// srin po'i tshogs kyi lag tu gtad// gtad do gtad do slar ma btang // rak+Sha tri a rbad ha bahub khram pra mA ra ya/ khri bzlas srin po'i lag tu gtad// rak+Sha tshogs kyis rol
277a7(rnying rgyud): par bsam// bskal par thar dus med pa'o// de bzhin kong tsa'i tshes grangs la// dmu bdud mgo dgu shar du dgram// nung nas log sreng 'di skad bstab// shar gyi phyogs nas sku bzhengs pa// dmu bdud pag dgu zhal gdangs shig/ bstan pa 'jig pa'i
277b1(rnying rgyud): srung ba 'di// ha li ka li'i zhal du bstab// dbu bdud chags kyi brag tu gtad// gtang drug tang da spang ma bta // a thi mtha da gan dang chu ba tham Sha mA ya/ khrib nas dmu bdud lagata gtad// rta'i tshogs kyis ral par bsam// bskal dang /
277b2(rnying rgyud): tha dus med pa'o// de bzhin kong tse'i tshes grangs la// yamA na mgo dgu nu byung dgram// shar lho mtshams nas 'di skad bstag// rab byung mtshams nas sru bzhengs pa// phung byed mgo dgu zhal gdangs shig/ bstan pa 'jig pa'i dam nyams 'di// du
277b3(rnying rgyud): ba mjug rings zhang du bstab// gshin rje'i tshogs kyi phyag tu gtad// gtad do gtad do slar ma btang // ya mas na ya mar tsa khri shi dun khram kha mA ya/ khri bzlas gshin rje'i lag tu gtad// mjug rings khros pas rol par bsam// bskal par thar dus med pa'o//
277b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin kong co'i tshes grangs la// klubatsan mgo dgu lho ru dgram// byang nas log sred 'di skad bstab// lho yi phyogs nas sru bzhengs pa// krub can mgo dgu zhal gdangs shig/ bstan pa 'jig pa'i log sred 'di// khyab 'jug chen po'i thal du bsrab
277b5(rnying rgyud): kru ba tsan dgra lha'i phyag tu gtang // gtad do gtad do slar ma btang // nA ga ri shis dun ha ba hub khra ma kha mA ra ya/ khri bzlas klu ba tsan lag tu gtad// khyab 'jug chen pos rol par bsam// bskal par thar dus med pa'o// de bzhin kong tse'i chos grangs
277b6(rnying rgyud): la// bgegs dpon mgo dgu byang shar dgram// sngags pas gshed po'i tshul 'chang ba// dam rdzas ling+ga bcas pa dag/ lho nub mtshams nas 'di skad bstab// byang shar mtshams nas su bzhengs pa// bgegs dpon mgo dgu zhal gdangs shig/
277b7(rnying rgyud): bstan pa 'jig pa'i log sred 'di// sgra gcan 'dzin gyi zhal du bstab// bi nA ya ka'i phyag tu gtad// gtad do gtad do slar ma btang zhig/ sha i sa na tri yam du bya/ rA hu la ha ba hub khram kha mA ra ya/ khri bzlas bgegs chen lag tu gtad/
278a1(rnying rgyud): gzhan 'dzin gyis ngal bar bsam// brgal bar thar dus ma dngang // danas dkar dmar rdzas chen dang // gang dmigs rtan du bcas pad// nga byed / 'jal nas kyang // king drag rtags dgagam/
278a2(rnying rgyud): khams la dgra dar phyogs su wa// de nas thun zor drag bstsal na// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan gyur yang // myur du 'chi bar the tshom med// phung byed rgyal po 'dis rol nas// gza' bdun rgyu skar 'dis rol na// rtag tu gdug pa'i sgong ngan gyis// gang
278a3(rnying rgyud): gtsog khyor rigs rgyud bcas// thang gcig med kyis drug par zad// bdud dog nyen ga pa N+DI ga ma gong phyogs gas ba sngol byed kyi rgyal po ki kA ga ti'i med/ snying gzung drug pa 'du chen po las/ gzi 'gatang dag po mthu badru gcig pa'o//
278a4(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan gshed chen gyis// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma'i tshe// sangs rgyas gnyen gyi bstan pa la// 'gal byed cha ma la dbab pa'i phyir// gtan 'pho las kyi 'khor lo 'di// thog mar brtag pa'i gnas chen du// cho gang ldan pa'i sngags pa yis/
278a5(rnying rgyud): sde brgyad rol pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// dur khrod thal bas tshul bzhin bri// zas tshogs drug 'bum bzlas byas te// mtshan ma bzang ba mthong ba na// log sred la mes thod pa'am// rabs chad mdze can thod pa dang // gzed dang lugs mo'i tsha dpal// mkhas pas
278a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo bri bya la// lces bas bsregs pa'i rus sol dang // gser dang gnam lcags la sogs pa// bdar khu bi Shar bcas pa la// 'bum bdun pad+ma rak+tar sbyar// khwa kha rig byed blo rtsa yis// bzod gong ma dag la ni// rim bzhin zlum por kun tu bskor//
278a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa rtsibs brgyad dag tu bkod// gsum pa bcu gnyis 'khor bar bya// de nas drag po'i sngags gzhan la// phung byed po yi sngags dgod do// lte dbus ya dkyil bsgrub bya zhing // de mtha' ya ng+ka'i sngags kyis bskod// gnyis pa rtsibs brgyad
278b1(rnying rgyud): rdzing ga lum
278b2(rnying rgyud): yang // phyogs pa ma rnams brgyad nga bar// gdug par yig tu bcad dgung// rtsibs mtshan sgrung bya'i ming dus sum// ba sngags pas thobar bya// gsu ma bcug nyi drugal yang // chags pazhig dug byigs rta gsad// tham ga
278b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi ngo tshang blung dgod// rtsibs mtshan bcu gnyis dag la yang // mtshams bzhi gdug pa'i gsang sngags te// gong gsum mtshan bzhi tshang bar dgod// 'bru zad rim pas legs par bri// tha ma bcu bdun sngags kyis bskor// de mthar phyag zhabs yad
278b4(rnying rgyud): dag bI// skye shrI srog la gtan 'pho ba'i// khrus mkhan lo yi 'khor lo yin// mo thod dngag la 'di lta ste// rim pa gong dang 'dras la// gnyis pa rtsibs bzhi legs par bri// de nas bdun pa'i mo sngags ni// lte dbus la dkyil ba slab bya dri// de mtha' klog
278b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyu'i sngags kyis bskor// gnyis pa'i rtsibs stengs 'bru bzhi bzhag/ rtsibs ma tshan bsrub bya'i ming rus yul// legs par b+h+yo yi bar du bris// gsum par phung byed ma bzhi'i sngags// tshul bzhin 'khor bar dgod par bya// bzhi pa rol pa'i gsang sngags
278b6(rnying rgyud): dang // ral gcig ma yi sngags kyis bskor// zhal dang phyag zhabs de bzhin bri// phung byed ma yi 'khor lo yin// rnam gnyis 'khor lo de bzhin dang // 'ug pa'i sgo nga'i mar gyis byug/ de ltar bri ba'i 'khor lo de// mo tho gan rgyal ri gsum rtse/
278b7(rnying rgyud): zod kha sbub kha sbyar la// nang du dkar dmar rdza sa la sogs// gser rgod rnams kyis rab tu dgang // de nas phung byed sngags kyis brab// dus lang ba na dmigs rten sgrol// thun dbab mtshon gdab mtshon gyis bshig/ kha brgyad sbyin sreg las
278b8(rnying rgyud): lah+ye// ma la thal rten du byas po dag/ snying shun brub la khar bcug nas// sbrul gyis kha bcing 'khor lor gzhug/ de nyid shun la zil nas kyang // dus chod gnad la bab pa'i tshe// grags pas yul gyi dbyings sas// thab zor sngags kyis
279a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ rab bskul nas// srid pa lta ga khrus kyis dbyung // grong khur pra gA'i byar sbas nas// sngags zer thun gyis rab bskul na// rtse'ab 'grang byu rab tu 'jog/ da ban ma D+har zas nas// steng dngos ga
279a2(rnying rgyud): bskul na// dmigs rten yul phyung 'khrug pas phung // dur khrod dkyil du sbas byas nas// bi Sha'i bran gyis rab bskul na// mdze sran dmucha yams su 'byung // lce dbabs ser sngos ci dgos// dre'u dang mdzo'i thod pa yi// bar du 'khor long bcuganas
279a3(rnying rgyud): logashed rgyu dang chos grangs dang // dus tshod gnad la bab pa'i tshe// log srid ngur gyi byings su wa// de nas sngags thun zor bskul na// 'gal byed gtso bor bcas pa ste// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan gyur yang // 'di tsam rba gcig yud kyis zag/ gtso 'khor bcas
279a4(rnying rgyud): pacad chod de// gtan 'bo rmig med the tshom med// bdud rog ti nag po bya rog mgo brtsegs gsang ba skol byed kyi rgyal po ki kang rogau ti'i mad/ snying gzeng drag po'i chud chen po las/ bshan pa 'khor lo nag po'i la'ubacu gnyis pa'o// / de nas
279a5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan gshed chen gyis// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma'o tshe// sangs rgyas gnyen gyi bstan pa la// 'gal byad cha ma' dbab pa'i phyir// ki kang phung pa'i las bshad pa// rdul 'byor btu la thugs can po yis// phun snam tshogs pa kun ldan nas// rje brgyad/
279a6(rnying rgyud): rol 'i dkyil 'khor ni// thig gis yul bcad de bzhin du// ro brtsegs thal chenas la kye dang // rak+ta skyer shun sam gyi dang // pi Sha'i 'dra ba skams phye ma yis// e dang 'khor lo mag dpung bcas/ sgo bzhi mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// mkhas pas 'dod
279a7(rnying rgyud): gsal bar bri// phyi rol e rgyar mda' tshed pa'o// nang dru dmigs rten tsar gdags// de nas drag po'i phreng ba yi// klu dang dbyibs tshad byin rbab dang // dgod dang sgrub pa'i khyad par bstan// de la rgya'i bye brag na// sngags sA lnga dang mchog chan dang // rmorje/
279b1(rnying rgyud): mo'i shing dang shA na'i rkang // shing shing phag rgod mche ba dang // glang shing glang chen mche ba dang // skyer shing ma he'i rwa rtse dang // seng ldeng spug po la sogs yang // phur ba'i dbyibs ni ri rab rtsa// rtsab mgol tsata rtse// rgya mdud gnyis pa logs brgyad mdzes
279b2(rnying rgyud): rtse mo zur gsum dpal dang ldan// lcags sna'i phur pa dge la ni// mkhas pas sor tshad bcu drug pa'o// mchog chen rkang la bcu gnyis tshad// mjo mo la sogs brgyad po ni// sor brgyad tshad du shes pa dab// seng ldeng las byas sor bzhi'i
279b3(rnying rgyud): tshad// de ltar tshad ldan rdzas mchog de// mkhas pas byin gyis brlab byab// stong nyid dang las slar bzhengs pa// rnal 'byor gshed po'i thugs ka nus// ya bzhi 'od 'phros srar 'dus pas// lag mthil g.yas g.yon mthe bong gnyis// yam hA
279b4(rnying rgyud): yab yub dang // skra srin pho mo'i skur gsal ba'o// ya mar tsas do ma ya/ ma ma e ka dza Ti sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ yak+sha dz+wa la ni/ snying khrag yag mo nA ga le/ sa ma ya ha// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ thal mo lan gsum drag brdabs pas// 'od zong sngo bsdus
279b5(rnying rgyud): khru 'khyud las// g.yas mdzu ba gung mo srin lag dang // mthe'u chung de bzhin mdzub mo dang // gur mo srin lag mthe rmang rnams// bai tri pa tra rA hu la// sgra gcan mjug ri khyab 'jug dang // baiSh+Ta ra tsa tsa ra ka/ ljang sngon la sogs rim bzhin te// de nas 'bru
279b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi 'od 'phros pas// mtheb snying g.yas g.yon dag dang ni// de bzhin mdzub snying g.yas g.yon la// stag srin pa masmin kong srin dang // 'breg srin la sogs rim bzhin bsgom// de nas phan tshun dam bsnol ba'i// bar du lur pa de bcug nas//
279b7(rnying rgyud): pas dril shing sngags 'di bzlas// A~M kA ya shrI ma hA badz+ra dI p+ta tsakra han ha na oM// de nas thal sbyar rtse sprad pa'i// bar du phar tshogs de bcug nas// dril tshul bstan cing sngags 'di bzlas// hriHthAg pu lur ba A/ de nas thal sbyar dam bsnol nas// grangam
280a1(rnying rgyud): m+b+ha sa ma pa'o// ba na ga gas da / nas 'o/ glab sa sa ga/ ga bdun du T+Te/ bdag nagus m+b+hag nang thugs pa smras sa// tag

280a3(rnying rgyud): krid krol bdag ma mad// chags pas 'di skad dag par bya// waM/ sI gas ma stsol ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// yum mchog ma pa 'di kyil mthong du// 'jigs byed su mchog grags pa 'dul// byang tshul skabs kyis bzhugs sa gsal// rdzid byed la
