285b7(rnying rgyud): ke nA ga le/ ka tra sa ma ni ya/ rgo dab ni/ na ra te/ saM pa re ya/ nA ga rA ngo ba li sa ma ya/ phu li pu ti ya/ si bi sa pa la gu ru ya/ nA ga ra ni pa ri te la ma ma/ nA ga gtso bar kur te/ ka ra sha ya a ti pu li ya ya/ si ma ba to ya/ sa ta/ oM
286a1(rnying rgyud): la sha ya/ pri tri ni ya/ ho na be ta li/ hur sing ya ba tsa bi ta ya/ tad si btang yer yer/ ru na TuM pa de be ya/ ho ni sa to ya/ be ta sde la yaM/ ki ra ta pa la ya/ ho ra ma me ta sha/ ya ka ni ra sha ne/ rtsen yaM te
286a2(rnying rgyud): yaM/ bi ku las ma ya/ si l-i ru trI yaM yaM/ ma te ye ta tang laM te yaM/ ma le sad ku ni ya/ gur ti ba la yag sha si da ma/ bi ba ra sha ya/ yag sha ka la rum pa ya ya/ ma ra tse mir du ne ya/ gaM shaM ba ni/ rA yaM ka de je zad/ si bi kaM tA me le ni/ yag
286a3(rnying rgyud): sha se ta ka na de yang / si bi ba ru tsu ru hUM phaT/ shor shar ba ra ya/ sho ba ti ka ra sha ya si par zad/ shag bruM ri li li ya/ rA hra la ya ma ti srog la rbad/ pa to so tra ga rag sha kha la hu ra hur/ sa ma ya ba ra bi ta la/ shaM pa ri/ da ma pa ni ya/ na ma ting
286a4(rnying rgyud): la/ kur Ni tr-i b+h+yo// nir ti ra ya/ ba ru si ya/ sa ma trai la/ dzi ba la si bi ra ra ya/ A d+ya dzi b+ha la dza len dra ye swAhA/ Ar+ya dzaM b+ha la sid+d+hi ku ni dza/ Ar+ya ti b+ha la ni raM ba te saM ya/ de mo ka li dang na dzi ba ni dza/ nA ga te ra ya/ ra tsa ba le tra ya ya/ sa mati
286a5(rnying rgyud): ya gaM shaM taM saM ya/ khu 'dze ta ya/ pra te ma yaM/ srog paM ni yaM/ sa ma ni ya/ e ka ni dzA ti rag sha yag sha ma ma ru ru rbad sha ga ya/ ding pi sa ra ba sha sha ya/ bi bid taM yaM shaM ba ri/ mu ne kar be yag sha rbad ya/ ti ri ye te sha da/ sa ma ti laM pa na ya/
286a6(rnying rgyud): lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa thams cad kyis rang rang gi srog gi snying po phul ba'i le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dregs pa 'khor dang bcas pas rang rang gi btsas ka 'di dag sbas so//
286a7(rnying rgyud): bdag cag rnams ni 'tshes pa ni// la la de ba lha yi rigs te srid pa'i nor 'dzin byed// la la zhe sdang bdud kyi rigs te gsod dang gcod la dga'// la la phrag dog btsan gyi rigs te srog gcod las la dga'// la la rgyal po chen po'i bu ste srog dang dbugs pa
286b1(rnying rgyud): dga'// la la ma yams bdud mo'i bu ste nad dang 'khrug rims gtong // la la sa bdag klu yi rigs te gdug pa che la nad rnams gtong // la la the'u brang nga la ma yi rigs te 'jig rten phrang khrol byed// la la gnod sbyin bdud sde'i rigs te sha dang khrag la dang /
286b2(rnying rgyud): de phyir spyi dang bye brag bcos// sngags bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// 'bru sna bcu gsum dang phye la// rin chen phye mar byin gyis brlabs// de la ri rab chen po ste// kha dog 'dra 'bag rigs dang bstun// smyug ma tshigs dgu byang rgyas la// kha
286b3(rnying rgyud): tshang pa nam mkha'i gur// dar gyi rnam pas brgyan par bya// gnam la 'phur dang sa la 'dzul// gzugs ni rim pa de yis bskor// bshos bu bcu gsum byang shar bcas// mda' bkra bcu gsum bshos bu la// nam mkha' bcu gsum ri rang pa//
286b4(rnying rgyud): 'phang bcu gsum 'brang rgyas la// gso ba dang rgyal mtshan de bzhin bsag// phud dang gser kha spyan gzigs bcas// de ltar tshogs nas bsngo bar bya// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa su bcos kyi le'u bzhi pa'o//
286b5(rnying rgyud): sham pa li kha la sed rbad yaM/ kaM taM ni yag sha sen tre dro ni yaM mu dril kha la d+hi chu ma se de ye/ gi pi dar ya ma tre treng ya/ bdud kha la dun tsa pra ma ne ye/ ya ma ra ga sha tsit+ta zud ling ya/ kyi ma nag po hur ma d+hi mdun ya/ kha ru dzi trag yer ya/ nag po snying rtsa shal
286b6(rnying rgyud): du na kar yer la/ gaM pa ni nutri tra dza ya/ nyung mo zor snyed mgo tshad tra yus ma dzI shAr/ sen dur tu tring ya ma ya/ mthu dun tsa tra ma ya/ mug mu kha la rbad tog sha/ tring ma dre paM/ ya? te mu ting dun dun d+ho/ sa ma pa sring li dkar rtseg ma rbad s+t+wa~M/ badz+ra
286b7(rnying rgyud): nag po dun yag sha mu na ya/ ting ge ma traM ya/ ka ra shaM zad dun pa/ oM badz+ra ki li sang / dun na par bi ma na d+h+ye/ se na ta pa ra tsa tsa ya/ ki las rba yaM pa ni/ bdud dag sha sa ma ye/ e ta ra sa ma thims ya/ ma du ke le zang mu le rbad pa/ ya ma trag sha ru lu /
287a1(rnying rgyud): nag pa sgreng la byan cig/ ya ma trig swA ya/ sham ru su tri ya/ gaM shaM ya yer yar/ trag lings mA ya/ be te ku wa ya/ yam rA dzan tshe 'dus/ ting snga mar du 'dus/ tshal pa tshal bdu tid ya/ sa ma ti yi sa dan na/
287a2(rnying rgyud): garba sad ni yaM/ rgur ti ri ti ri yaM/ rak+Sha srog tsa ti rung ya/ sa ma la badz+ra ga la srid ya btsan/ skye pa ya/ dur dur tse bang yaM/ za 'gra ma ni mu 'gra ma tri yaM/ me le sa ma tsa tsa ya yaM/ gaM ba rig ba ri rmed tubs ya/ me con te ya gra ni suM ba ya/ ma ra te ra yas rban
287a3(rnying rgyud): ku ya/ ma ra yang ti sad ka de ya/ se ting ye ni ra na ya/ ba de tse tsa de shad shad/ tshugs ting ku ru ya/ rag sha du ne rbad ya/ ma ra tse tsa ya/ ma ru du ma ra tse tse yas 'bur ti gr-i yer ye ra ya/ sarba ting lang pe ta tsa sha mar du/ ge ba ra sad nam/ ye yer
287a4(rnying rgyud): zad/ mu ke ka ne sum rbad ya/ badz+ra bong ni bong ni ya/ badz+ra zhung tris ma te shang zad/ rag sha yag dun dun rtsal phreng / khro ni khro ni ma laM ba ni/ sraM ba ni rbad/ mar tse ma ra ya~M ta ya/ gur ni chu ya/ hang bu ra ma hA li wad ya/ ngadz+ra ta ri ti re ma/ btsan bstang
287a5(rnying rgyud): pa ya ni/ grang tshe grang tso he staM s+thA/ sa ma ya kar she rba da ya/ dug ne tshe sang rbad ya/ ma be dun chum skor sod/ chu ma 'dril rgyug rtsal phreng rbad ni ra yaM/ chu ba ni sad na yaM/ ma ting saM pa te na yaM yaM/ ki ma tsa ya ma ra ti gra ya/ tsa tsa sho le po ba ni sa ma ya rbad shar
287a6(rnying rgyud): she/ baM ril mu sa la thibs thibs/ ka ra ne sad pu duM ru lu yang / te ni yaM yaM rbad dun ling / sa te kar na ya/ yag sha 'de shaM rbad ya/ kha la mu he la yaM yaM/ bre gu lu sa ma tid mer ya/ rgyug tsa la phreng yang / ma ti ri ya/ gaM pa ne/ tsa ra
287a7(rnying rgyud): ya/ se dku ru yang / be te sa ra tsa/ a ti ya/ ma ra ting ling ya ya ma ru ma/ sa ma a tang ti rbad ya/ be ba ti ne grang du na thi ma/ mar du se ya/ oM pu lu lu sa mthibs/ mar ting ya ni sad tu/ pri yer ser/ oM tro ta ni tro ta ni/ pa tra ba tra/
287b1(rnying rgyud): laTal/ rtagatheb/ ga na pa mnyis dang / sen tes la/ ka8/ shrA ba la/ te grang kyi pa/ ci byed da rji snying mag nga/ khrag pa cu ga rbA d+hI pa/ bduni/ gca laldan pa/ gan pa /
287b2(rnying rgyud): tsi rta ba la ho yang / mar tan tse ya yaM/ bram pa yer ting ku ru ya/ raHti geng kar gyung pa la phaT te yon te/ tsi ti chod pa spu drongs yid te ke ya/ mi li mi lim be ye/ ba da ri rba na yaM/ badz+ra ga dkar log \u0f7fla/ me phreng la/ sa
287b3(rnying rgyud): bruMm/ ra tsa a ti shag/ a ti rbad ya/ rgyal po chen po po pu shag bya/ ti ba ni l+r-i b+h+yo/ sbyin b+h+yo/ ma ni b+h+yo/ hri b+h+yo/ sring mo b+ho/ sudri b+ho/ d+hi mu kha la b+ho/ mu ti ya b+h+yo/ ging kar ging kar/ ba tra ba tra/ ton sho ta&/ mes mes sil mi la khanga'i bang ra/
287b4(rnying rgyud): sha ba ri/ yu ti yu ti/ snying la / ging ka rA dza/ rgyal po chen po zud bu ling / drag lir/ tsan d+he lis/ tshal ba ling / ka ra sha ma du kI la ya/ dun tshal bi kA la ya/ yag+na b+h+rUM b+ha kI la ya/ rag+ni staM nya k+Shi la ya/ ga pa ri ya/ dza du ra ya ma re tsa ya/ mar dun tshal nga kI la ya/ pa btsem ra tse srog Ta la hang hru
287b5(rnying rgyud): tsitsi ta la phaT te laT te/ ma sau pa ne yaM/ ya ba ni sa dad ya/ oM ra tse a ti mug ti l+ra hI srog rtsa la shad de/ shad de/ ra te/ dza te/ sa ma ya nir zung / tad+ya thA/ ru po badra drag ya/ ni lo dA tsa snying rtsa la 'dus 'dus/ te tengs mA ya/ swa ru srog ta shad de
287b6(rnying rgyud): rbad/ tse tsa du ni yad de tsa tsa ra dza~M baM pa re/ sa ma ya dang hUM pa ni/ ma hA kA li yaM ni yi ti ti sa mA ya~M/ ma ra ya te rje ya/ pe sha sha ra/ zad nam/ be du g+ha~M kaM sa ma ya thibs/ be bstis swa rbad ta yaM/ ta ke bi di mA ra ya/ oM ma ma dr-i tra~M sa ma ya/ @
287b7(rnying rgyud): sham ru lu lho/ rag mo tang bi sa ma ya/ chu gleng ge de tsa ni rbad ya/ drag mo drang ba nis pa ri yaM/ ya rbad/ dza ti su~M pa ni gang bti la li ma nu rag sha du na ke pa ni ya te ma/ khris ya Tur ti ye la/ me mas ma ya thibs ling ya/ rbarba pre tani 'ang zang la/
288a1(rnying rgyud): shasu ma / nan ma tad d+hA ma// sug / can pa/ tri ma sa rag ma kha log sad ni rbad/ mus ti/ mamacams/ khrag la grags/ 'alal ti mas rgyas ma yang 'gram du du /
288a2(rnying rgyud): oM rje mun lan gu gti la nad/ muni sa dkyil la kr-i ni yaM/ du nas tha~Mm ya/ oM brag pa na smin shar pre pa ta khrid des lus ma ya/ rag maH ta ma thad de thaMd da sha sa pa ni zad/ be ta n+ya ti ma du la thun la ru dza ting 'phe bya la // ta~M ne 'a
288a3(rnying rgyud): ba la / par sa ni shan shwad mi/ gsal/ ti lating bajam y-i bani/ mi ti nga / sa mahe la la ler rje rje bgyul / 'adz+ral matigananas/ sa be na ta yA/ ma nu ngas sa nA/ phag cig pa tha
288a4(rnying rgyud): te pa ya/ tang ting ke ta maM/ sa ma nyid dung gdu 'ang / khyim 'dul mu la 'du ti dag ma ma la 'das pa/ chu ti nag ma zad/ shaM ya rba tsa ting ladun gyi// mdur rus ma yA/ khang byas dpa'i sang / ting ler ldum / drug mo phra ma/ nig zhig
288a5(rnying rgyud): thig thig ni gzig/ gcig med/ gnyis drag/ brgyad bcad/ gnam mthongs phye/ lcags srog khral/ kaN+De dza de tha bkru bathun ya da ma/ ra tsa sha ya/ sa mA yA/ du ma ling tsa ya/ sa ma ya/ in tA ya/ rbaM pu sha ga ba zhe la/ tengs pa la te ras
288a6(rnying rgyud): ma ti kang / tsam tsam tsa lam na maM/ gdag la/ e pra te yer ser la yA lem/ sha tham par shag zan/ a ti ba ta i d+ha la khru zung / blan nan tshun la/ ti ri si ba la na maM/ mA pra med ling tu tu yang ya ga le matong po/ lung bings zad/ dring yin/
288a7(rnying rgyud): pa ya/ khal zhwa bur maM la/ sha ba re ga shaM ya/ mu ti ye na/ oM ting las de rbad na hUM/ bad zhes dpa yaM/ taM les dag rje ye/ gr-i ta ye/ tri mu dra dra ma ya/ zhu thung par de ya/ phu btsal khung thung / mu te pa ni phreng phreng / te rtsal ti sad/
288b1(rnying rgyud): rlungasag dag ma da pag ba ste/ sab stongs pa/ mo lo til/ ba ting sa/ ma smad na rnam te'as/ rjes du ba 'ang / mdu 'o/ sa/ bai ras danApa snom/ sags shes/ phengasams/ gus ta sam pa/ slong ba rnam
288b2(rnying rgyud): te ya/ du te mthun/ sa ma ti ma/ ka la ru ma ting / ngos ma ru ya/ mar du na che ya/ lang te shar/ lung ti ma ya/ teng ke le sa da/ 'u ni lam pa ya/ 'gar dri pa hUM/ che yang bdud kyis bsad la chung yang bdud kyis bsad/ bdud kyi bu pa nyid rje mi
288b3(rnying rgyud): mnga' ste// zhe sdang bdud kyi bu ste srog gcod las rnams byed// bdud kyi mes po chen po ni// spyi mes rA tsa rgyal bas bya// de yi bu ni gnam gyi dag pa chen pos bya// bdud kyi phyi mos chu mer bas bya// de yi bu mo mar mer lha ma gcig ma// de gnyis brags
288b4(rnying rgyud): kyi sras chen po// sras ni ya bdud bcu gsum byung // sbyi mas rA tsa rgyal po de// bdud thod pa'i phreng ba can zhes bya ba ste/ yul ni bdud yul nag po na// bdud mkhar ni ldems se ldem// rtsa ba gser la rtse mo brag/ rtse dgra gnam du zangs sa rbang /
288b5(rnying rgyud): rtse ni mi lcags rlon pas g.yogs// nang na mi khog blangs su gcor// nang na rta khog rtsig par brtsigs// rtsa nas khrag dang chu ser 'dzag/ thod pa skam rlon mkhar du brtsigs// mkhar gyi rtsa ba na/ bdud spyang sngon po 'ur dang lams se yam// bdud
288b6(rnying rgyud): srung ka di ri ri// bdud kyi khyi mo 'khang dang di ri ri// de yi nang na bdud chen mes po bzhugs// mi sha ma lags gzhan mib// rta khrag ma lags gzhan mi 'thung // pho nya mang po sha la 'gyed// mgo brnyan mang po srul bar 'gyed// bdud mes papa yum
288b7(rnying rgyud): mdos la skyon// ya bdud bcu gsum de/ nag po bkrag med de/ bdud rta nag po chi bas/ phangs nag per chen gsol/ bdud zhags nag po mda' lhar 'phen// bdud de lde mgo yag de/ bdud kyi ta nagazhon nas skyes pa khrom pa 'debs// khams gsu
289a1(rnying rgyud): rdul du nag pa'i ma le gegs de/ bre 'gro tham la 'debs pa'i badra rje mang krug dang // skye 'gro tshal dbang bsgyu sa pa ga ba can dang // bdud kyi nga ldan ma chad bzhin// skrag zum rtse dang zhebs
289a2(rnying rgyud): la brtson// khyab pa lag ring bye she sa ba gcod// bdud chen 'od da bar ba dang // 'ad lpags pa dang / 'ad dacom pa dang / lkugs pa drim tshul la yi b+ha rnams 'chang // ral pa sle ba cings mi skye 'gro srid pa'i chu 'phrul byed// gar du
289a3(rnying rgyud): thogs bdud kyi pa' chen byed// 'khor lo bcu gnyis srid pa cham la 'bebs// bdud chen rgyal ba dbugs chen len pa ste// bom po zom chung mi la chad pas gcod// bdud rje rol po'i tshogs ni me bu dag la lcags mas 'debs shing 'dzin// phya
289a4(rnying rgyud): brtan pazhini miT 'don par byed// bdud sil ma stong ni mi ltas ngan sna tshogs 'bebs/ bdud je badrad rje 'khor bcas kyang// sid pa'i mdas pa zhes shing // dri sgrib can ni chen po ste// sha khrag bdud 'grol// mab che rtsal Ta// mi yi lus dang /
289a5(rnying rgyud): sprul pa phyogs bzhir 'gyed// yul ba tsan yul po du gsum na// btsan mkhar dmar po ldam pa na// btson me lus g.yag gi mdo bo can du zug ste/ dpral na khag cig mig gnyis la// ltag na kha gcig mig gnyis byung // g.yas na kha gcig mig
289a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa// g.yon na khwa gcig mig gnyis pa// pas rta dmar por/ rmeg pa brgyad par byung / mi bu rims kyis gsod// sha la~M ga cid myong byed// sde btsan chen po bya/ ri rab 'byung ba'i shar phrogs na/ dung gi mi dag rnam pa gcig/
289a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs na/ gser gyi'i sa rjem pagacig/ mes du brgyags na/ yangs kyi me pa / rang kyang rdzogs na/ sum na / dbus nga gis pag sa// 'byung bsngal dbang byed cing / srid pa gsum pa dang bskya /
289b1(rnying rgyud): de ni 'byung ba re btsan lnga ste/ srid pa'i mdos pa zhes shig/ gnam btsan ding pa dang / sa ba tsan yu bu dang / gangs pa tsan de sa dang / g.ya' ba tsan mi ro ma dang / brag pa tsan rom bu dang / chu btsan sngon po thung bu rje/ klu ba tsan thong ba dang / btsan bran snod tshogs
289b2(rnying rgyud): kyang / srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ hUM srog bdag chen po ste// gnam gyi ding ba chen po bya// me dkar po ldam pa gcig/ rta dkar g.yu yi rngog ma can la chibs// glo la shel gyi gri chung btsugs// bzhugs pa gnam gyi dkyilan bzhugs// sprul pa
289b3(rnying rgyud): 'jom bu gling bzhi rang sbed// mi dkar ldem pa la// dbul ral gri sha ra ra// dpral na mig gcig lhangs se lgang // zhal nas mche gtsigs thams se tham// phyag na stsogs dkar ta la la// gan ma ral phyed kyi bdag po yin// sa chu phyed kyi bdag po
289b4(rnying rgyud): yin// skyes pa brgya yi srog gi bdag po yin// mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ ya tsho dkar po dang / yam shud dmar po dang / khu le lag dgu dang / srid pa'i mdos pa zhes shig/ dkar po ni de sa dang / shor ba s+yang dgu dang / rgyal sde chen po
289b5(rnying rgyud): yang srad// byung bsad/ se sangs pa/ sprul pa sad/ srid pa'i mdos pa zhes shig/ rgyal phran bcu gnyis/ rgyal sil ma stong ste/ rgyal po chen po sre bzhi/ de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes shing // yul sbas kyi mde na/ stong ma bdud chen mo bzhug
289b6(rnying rgyud): mkhar tho ba gzhogs ral gyi nang na/ yul khri ba du stong 'du bya ba na/ bdud mo rgyal phrin bya des/ dre'u nag rkang gsum chibs nas/ sba la dar nag go zugs la/ phyag na ba dan rtse gsum 'phyar/ skyugs pa'i klu ru len cing ma yams 'dun mar sdud// zhi
289b7(rnying rgyud): lpags g.yab chung 'dang shing bgegs rnams ga'ab par byed// khrag meg mdangs su phung nas rgyal po dkar chen dag pa brdeg/ mi thubs dang cad sgra 'i dra dam la spyad// sha la ral gris gad+ha kyi krig ni d+hA skyong sbyar 'thung // bdud mo'i mdun mag cad/
290a1(rnying rgyud): cing dregs pa po rnams dgyes paskong / pho bdud g.yas kyi pho bdud ru 'dren mo bdud g.yon gyi ru sna 'dren// srid pa'i g.yul nga zlog cing bsad dang gcod la dga'// ma bdud ni bcu gsum yang / la la mdze mo ru ring
290a2(rnying rgyud): zhon nas rgyug/ la la rnga mo rke ring zhon nas rgyug/ lal rtol bu ba dkar zhon nas rgyug/ la la bdud bong gA dmar zhon nas rgyug/ la la gsal le grus mo zhon nas rgyug/ la la bong bu nag po zhon nas rgyug/ khrag gi gru char 'bebs shing mi nad phyugs nad
290a3(rnying rgyud): gtong // de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ the'u rang stong sde yang / gnam la gnas pa'i spun gsum dang // bar la gnas pa'i spun gsum dang // sa la gnas pa'i spun gsum dang // ze se kug sem chu ring gsum// dri se ba ni mu dri gsum// gnam
290a4(rnying rgyud): lha byang chub gnam rten se rta dang // gnam the'u dkar dang gsum/ bti lag ge te ne gsum// dar dkar dmar dang ser po gsol// srid pa'i the'u dang stong sde yang // de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ rda la sum brgya drug cu yang // nyul byed khab byed
290a5(rnying rgyud): mdos bzhes shig/ sa bdag rgyal po ho ba dang // be sA lag chen tsang kun chen po dang / gtsang btsan ngal 'khor ba dang // ho ba hi te se pa dang // pha ni shi sa ta yin// ma ni ru zan de mo yin// 'gyur ba sa la dbang bsgyur te// la la shing lo gos su gyon//
290a6(rnying rgyud): la la sa dang rdo la gnas// la la chu dang shing la gnas// byol song mi sdug mgo bo can// la la ri rab de la gnas// sa bdag sil ma stong tshigs kyang // de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// klu rgyal ni chen po ste// ri dang mtsho la gnas pa ste// dga' bo dang /
290a7(rnying rgyud): ni 'jog po dang // mtha' yas dang ni dung skyong dang // pad+ma dang ni chu lha dang // ka ra ko ta dang ba ru Na// sbrul mgo bdun dang lnga pa dang // gsum pa dang ni rigs bzhi dang // de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// klu gzugs sna tshogs dag tu ston// la la gzug
290b1(rnying rgyud): da/ pad+ma// malarnams nga ba rgya// ral gas kyi gas// lA / gan/ nga ba das// sa bya sa// brtag gnas/ na
290b2(rnying rgyud): srid pa can la dbang gyur byed// zungs pangang chub/ 'ang mdas padag bdas pa'is dang / ma dza pa gas sa// napa ci garten da // zung ba brjed pa
290b3(rnying rgyud): bci 'brum bcugs ma dang // rnams dang cas pa'igased kyis mchod// de chen 'dog ngadrab bde 'am ma pa rjod// rnam mapa dzin rdul bya la// ma dzin mkhar du 'jog/ gcags brtan 'dzi na /
290b4(rnying rgyud): tan gsung gi sdang rung ba'o// mi mang sems kyi bung du 'thu // thang ring longs stor blang dang za'o// lha'adra stong gadraba'i gyur byan po las/ rjegs sa kyi ma 'dra pa'o// / danasngal bco 'das kyi sbyin ma drangs
290b5(rnying rgyud): bcad ba ni dang / 'dud mo nyes pacu rdza brgya dang / bdud cing ba tid ba'as te/ bdud mi rnams pa meng po bcug sum dang / brtson padrang sor po dang / bdud chen rnams pari dam/ bdung mo rnams bdud cis zin nam/ thams zangs dzad meng nyas
290b6(rnying rgyud): kra gcig ni bang gyi dustsu/ nadran par bsngagasam gcang ban/ gang marin chen phyogs ga la// rje par nga mazhin gyi ma brdungs// mang dang ma na dang bcar// bzang ra ma
290b7(rnying rgyud): thob \u0f7f/ blanga'adu gong gin / du nyid bca gapa // brjod par tsha pas bdu ba brdu bapasathaMd ded// bdag cag rnams ni du
291a1(rnying rgyud): dga' ste// 'jig rten legs dang nyes pa'i snang 'dzin cing // sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba dang // bdud la bdud pa 'tshor 'phrul// meng pa bdud chen rnams ni rkyong nyon dang // khyed ni zhe sdang bdud cadu yin te//
291a2(rnying rgyud): nyid kyang sems nyid do// sems ni ye nas sangs rgyas te// gnyis med don gyi lung la ton// bdud la bdud papas ming po bdud chen rnams la sdig/ nyes legs stang 'dzin stong gi sde dpon khyod kyis zung // gsal nga'i thun mar 'don sems kyi
291a3(rnying rgyud): 'di la kha dog lnga mchis te// phung po lnga yi gud du 'bul// 'di la du ba sU ris ma// dang bsems kyi thung du 'bul/ 'di la 'od zer lnga mchis te// 'byung ba lnga yi gyang du 'bul// 'phro ba sems dbugs sems kyi gud du 'bul// bdud kyi'i sdang
291a4(rnying rgyud): khrol dang // zhe sdang spangs na sems sangs kyus// srog gcod las 'di spang bar gyis// stong gi sde dpon gyis ni gsungs pa bzhin// sangs rgyas bstan bsrungs pa las rnams kyis// de las 'das na bdud chen rnams la sdig/ ces brjo'o//
291a5(rnying rgyud): 'dre stong gi rba ba'i chud chen po las/ bdud bcos pa'i pherje bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dregs pa can thams cad kyis rang rang gi sdang gsal 'od rje mdos 'di dag smras so// bar bu 'am kong bu dbur+ya/ gas
291a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i zhun mar dgu paM ltams la/ rin po che yi phyogs gcig gri nang du/ phud gcig gser la sogs pa'i rin po che sna lnga brdar la/ de'i rtser mda' bya rgod ma gcig/ dar de mar sing de bgacig btags la/ bdag dbang gi rtsal po'i ting nge 'dzin gsal
291a7(rnying rgyud): rdzas rnams byin gyis brlab la bsngo bar bya/ lha 'dre stong ga dra ba'i rgyud chen po las bdud nyid bcos kyi ladzubatud pa'o// // hUM sde pa gsal ba coM tsa mongs// sdang gsal chen po 'di la kun gson cig/ de sdang chen po bdud kyi Ta// nga rgyal btsan gyi bu/ phrag
291b1(rnying rgyud): dron rgyal po'i bya/ 'dod chags gnod sbyinam yiza// gti lugs bdag grwale ba// ser sna yi drugs 'de bkren bya// theH dang pa la sogs kun// ston pas grasungs pa'i srung ba ston// khyod ni 'dra bkrin so drags te// 'og d+ha'i sems dag da
291b2(rnying rgyud): yis// las ngan dag gis lus ngan blangs pa ste// mi yi 'jig rten dag na khyed gnas te// tshe srog dbugs la dbang byas pas// mnar med pa yi dmyal chen yin// da ni dag pa'i sems byed drang // sems las mu gtogs sangs rgyas med
291b3(rnying rgyud): dug rje nyid kyang sems shes na// de ni sangs rgyas sems chen no// ma bgrong sa la dgod pa yin// lung nyid nyon la gdug bzhi par gyis// sdang ba gsal ba thung du bsngo// dang po sems kyi gud de bzhes// kha dog phung po khams kyi klang /
291b4(rnying rgyud): du ba dbugs kyi glad la gsal ba yul gyi grud// bdud dang btsun dang rgyal po dang / ma bdud ma yams dang // the dra rang jel dang / sa bdag klu tshogs gnyen po kun// sdang bsal grang 'di bzhes pa zhwa sdang khrol bar gyis// de ltar nga rdo tso ba~M
291b5(rnying rgyud): 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sdang gsal gyi le'u dgu pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dregs pa 'khor dang bcas pas bskor zhing phyag btsal nas/ rang rang gi gtad pa dang khram gyi las 'di dag smras so//
291b6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams kyis bstan pa bsrung ba'i las 'di ltar bgyi ste/ gtad pa dag ni 'tshor mi srid// gang la dmigs brlag par bgyi'o// ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du bgyi'o// zhes smras so// de nas bdud kyi phyi mas rwa dza rgyal
291b7(rnying rgyud): bas/ rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di gsungs so// bstan pa gnyen po bsrung ngani// mon pa nag po'i thod pa ru// byi nag khrag gis 'khor po rtsibs drug bri// dbus su dmigs bya'i yan lag rdzogs par bri// mtha' ma'i 'khor lo drug po la//
292a1(rnying rgyud): gag nas thogs nas bdud kyi thugs kyis bkod// gzas pa d+ma yang mang dras zang bas// dbral bar dus skang gar mang // rtswa bdang sod na mtha' ma bdar// mnyes papa yang yang ga thag ngo
292a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i kha ni dar gyis dgapa// oMn pAr ti sa da tri la/ gr-i waM s+t+wa~M zhes pa kris la/ dran chen po 'am/ ri'i sbrel sa nan la/ steng nas 'dag pas 'thus par bya/ des dmigs bya rlag par 'gyur// de nas bdud mgo g.yag gis gtang ba'i la
292a3(rnying rgyud): 'di dag sbas so// khyi nag gser mig zod pargya// de ru dmigs pa'i ming dang rus// dur khrod ras ma ngag la ni// dmigs pa'i gzugs bris ming dang rus// mtha' ma bdud stags 'di yis bskor// bdud yAM pa rbi ras dpr-i ye wa~M tra/ de ni
292a4(rnying rgyud): kyi yi thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ mnyes pa dang 'dis nyes bya// bdud kyi bya ras ru man na// des ni skyugs pa'i nad kyis 'chi// de nas bdud nag po bkrag med kyis rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// grog ras sam shog bu la// dmigs bdu
292a5(rnying rgyud): bdagazugs zis pa// ting garang ming dang dbra' bar dus// 'di mis kyis kyis 'dim ba ta bab kyi// many+dzu bang nag rnam gsum gyis// bad sngags kyis la mtha'a' 'thor// nAg padun tsamananas/ nga rjes la grang ni ga nga min
292a6(rnying rgyud): du bcug la/ rung ram ya kha can du sbas na/ dmigs pa glang thabs cad kyis 'chi/ de nas bdud mo le ge shag gis rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// grog shog bu dag la ni// de la dmigs pa'i gzugs bris pa// mang dang rus ni bcas pa
292a7(rnying rgyud): la// mtha' ma bdud kyi sngags rnams bskod// badz+ra tangs sa pa ma kaN+Di ti/ spang gi sngon po tha~Md pa ru// ri gsum gyi'am lung gsum mdo// de ru mnan na dmigs pa pri rnams gsum gyis 'chi// bdud rol po bcu gnyis kyis rang gi gtad pa'i las
292b1(rnying rgyud): da dag smras so// ta la rgya thun dag sa dmags pa gzugs na bris nas sa/ med bdud thugs pa 'thig nas// 'bar byu dmar ba'i bod par gas// danas dung zhugs su/ ta tu ga/ kuku da / deta bas pa dang/
292b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang gzug/ de nas bdud rje mang khrag gis// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang gi las 'di smras te/ rabs chad nag po'i thod partsa// gro ga shog bu dag la no// dmigs pa du yod gzugs bris la// ming dus tshang bar byas nas rba//
292b3(rnying rgyud): ma bdud rtsi sngags kyis bskor// oM ta r+yA rag tu rbad la yag t+te dzI taM/ thod pa de yi nang bcug la// kha ni dur khrod g.yam pas bcad// dur khrod sbas nas mnyes dbang // de yis dmigs pa spro 'bog dag gis 'che bar 'gyur/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'du
292b4(rnying rgyud): kyi spyan sngar/ bdud stug bzhi mched bzhis 'di dag smras so// bdud bu nag po'i thod pa ru// de yi nang du dmigs pa'i gzugs// tha ma bcud kyi sngags kyis bskor// kha ni mthing nag dar gyis brjod// mu dza~M dza ma ye d+hi pa ni khwam/ bdud bzhinas
292b5(rnying rgyud): mya du swa// des ni las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sun sngar/ ya bdud bcu gsum gyis rang rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// dur khrod ras mdag la ni// mi ma gyi dang gsum gyi khrag gis ni// 'khor la rtsi bas
292b6(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis kyi// dbus su dmigs pa du yod gzugs dang bdud kyi gtso bo'i sngags// ming dang rus su ldan par bya// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la bri ba'i sngags// oM ti li rbad ya/ te bi pi pu ru pi bid/ mu du sha naM/ mung ha ba ni/ rbang tsi bi dang / mu d+haM
292b7(rnying rgyud): par/ ru ya ta kr-i ya/ dung grol/ mu d+hi pa ya/ swe ta wa ya/ de ltar 'khor lo dag la g.yon bskor bri// rabs cad nag po'i thod par gzhug/ Sha ni sngags sa'i sma yis bcad// ngur ram du khrod chen por waM// mnyes pa yi dbang gzug go// des
293a1(rnying rgyud): na dmigs pa gtan nas len// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar/ bdud sil ma skyong gis rang rang ga gtang pa'i lngasgra 'di dag smras sa// gro ga 'am shog zu dag la na// 'khrar la rtsabs ni brgyang ba
293a2(rnying rgyud): la// dbus su dmigs pa'i gzugs ni yan lag rdzogs par bya// ming rus dag dang ldan par b+ha// mtha' ma bdud kyi sngags kyis bskor// oM ya grA gr-i par ba ma du rje ser mami tang nga pa te yang mang / sad ni sri ri mtho 'dus tham te/ 'khor
293a3(rnying rgyud): la phag pa'i thod par gzhug/ dur du lngas la 'dag pas 'bras par brdzi// mnyes pa dang 'dis nyes byas// nges ni bdun chung rlag par 'gyur/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud la gtad pa'i le'u bcu pa'o// / de nas
293a4(rnying rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ sgri bcan chen pos rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag sbas so// grog dag la gzugs bris te// 'khor lo rtsibs ni brgyad pa la// dbus su dmigs pa du yod pa'i ming rus bcas// 'khor lo brgyad par btsan+da gyi sngags/
293a5(rnying rgyud): tsar te bum/ shul then po ri sha ka ya ba te khaM bri ya du ya trA~M/ glang dmar dag gir du gzhug/ kha ru 'dzam bu gling bzhi'i gzugs kyis mnan// 'bras par brjes la zag dmar po'i them pa la mdzan no// des ni gzeng nad dag gis 'chi bar 'gyur
293a6(rnying rgyud): nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sdang // 'byung ba badz+ran gyis rang rang gi gtang ba'i las 'di dag smras so// shog zug tsang mdag la ni// 'khor lo che bas ni lnga bris// dbus su dmigs pa'i mid dang rus/ mtha' ma batshan gyi sngags ni 'a
293a7(rnying rgyud): rAng sho la Ne/ hUM khro gzer/ tha~Md dun pa waM/ pri su bra ma yin zang / rdo ltar bris la 'khor lo khrel// 'phar bdamar po'i thod pa ru// 'byung ba zag gi them la mnan// des ni brgyal thabs dag gis 'che// dan sa phrag btsam
293b1(rnying rgyud): dang nga drug spyad pa shAs dag zlasas// rlung bsas pa pa za pa // dkrigs pa pan gyimang da // thug pa can thags kyis pan dub na/ ma badri ma dada'o ba 'dang sa thas spyong du// da da du sa
293b2(rnying rgyud): yab ti/ de ltar bris la 'khong po sde'o// thod pa de yi nang du gzhug/ dmar po dang gyes 'bazhab pa// thag dam de'i tham la gnan// ngas ni sems shing rid nas 'gre// de nas skyes bu srung brtan gyis rang shi gtad pa'i par 'di dag mnas/
293b3(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa du yod sring drang gzugs// thog dag la bris byas pa// rwa 'i rjod par dril la kha yang bcos// don dar gyis kyil nas sa// ming byang mtha' mang btsan gyi sngags// oM rban bye/ rba rje le ga ti jed/ de ltar byas la yang gsum mdo ma na
293b4(rnying rgyud): b+has la/ des ni dmigs bsngal thag gcod// de nas yang btsun selam stong sdes rang rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag rdzas so// rasa? dkar dag la 'khor lo ste// rtse bas ni brgyad pang bris byas pa// de la btsun gyi sngags kyis bskod// dbus bu
293b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i ming dus bcas// bathang lo mi thod par gzug/ ota tse kyang bi pang bang su waM/ yang thung tsa tale pad marba ti/ zhes kyang bris la 'dar dmang pos brjid pa/ gong gsus nga zas nad migs pa 'tshor mi srid do// zhwa dre gong gdab tud chen pa /
293b6(rnying rgyud): btsun pa gtad pa'i lenu ba dru gcig pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi stan dzar/ rdul ba ched pa zlog padag mched 'azhis dang dang she gtang pa'i las 'di dag smras so// ras dgang dag leng por mo rtsibs pazhiTi/
293b7(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa'i phan lag rdzogs bris la// ming rus de dbri bar bya// mtha' mar/ 'dis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'ashegs pas dadi khyed la gtad // 'azhes shig cis bya // da khor lo rtsings la bri nga'i lpags// oM ma ti zad shang /
294a1(rnying rgyud): par ngas te sa/ ang l+r-is/ mA N+Dit+ta ya dzang / oM pra pAl gang sa sad min+ta m+b+ha nga/ zhes pa bris la ta da/ ba'i thod bdug nag/ dpa' pa ma nga rgyas dpa sa // zag tu
294a2(rnying rgyud): dpyas gcoganyis te brgyud/ dpral par phrag pa dang / dgra kyang bshos dkru ga zug/ de nas stod byung ngam mchod rten 'og bas na/ dmigs pa gtan pa byebs par gyi tshom med/ de nas yang hrul po chen po she gta' khoms
294a3(rnying rgyud): so// skrag gzig gi thong bar ming dang rdzas bzag la/ rgyal po'i sngags kyis bskod/ oM be ba t+ta ka du ba two Sha/ oM badz+ra byi sad khri/ oM be+e ru li pa na waM/ oM be ta ga~M taM ShA ti/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bskor la/ skor khang dag tu gnan par //

294b1(rnying rgyud): tsan yad / kha~M ti hur snyi la ya~M/ sam ya thibs/ sa ma ya rba ba zhung dz+nyAn ya/ brim shag yi sad srog la ni myur ya/ de ltar 'khor lo dril ya rabs chad nag po'i thod par gzhug/ de nas byang khrod du thA/ des na rims nad mang pos byaphye// lga
294b2(rnying rgyud): badre stong gi dbu'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud mol gtad pa'i le'u bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis rang rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// rigs byed dmar po'i thod pa ru/
294b3(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa'i ming dang rus bcas nas// oM la g+ha r+thi ting khra ma gzer ya/ kha yang dug gis gcad par bya// lung gsum mdo ru ma nAn sngas na// khrag skyugs nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po lus/ gnod sbyin la gtad
294b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ the'u rang stong rtsa gcig gis rang rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di dag smras so// bong bu rda ring thod pa ru// srog shog pu dag pa ni// dmigs pa'i ming dang gzugs dus gzhug
294b5(rnying rgyud): thebs stong gi sngags kyis mtha' yang bskor// oM yaM yoM gaM gaM tri r+thi in+d+ra graM ba rong te sa ma ya rbad gtubs sod ya/ pra ku ru sod/ de yis bskor la thad pa'i nang du gzhug/ thod pa shing rkang gcig gam ya la ga can du sra// des ni brda ba la brtsang

296b3(rnying rgyud): rmi sngon ldem pa gcig/ chi bas su g.yu rta bya gdeng chibs// dbul 'ja' yi thod du bcings// sbrul rma bya'i thul pa gsol// shel gyi bu chung sru gzugs 'bar// dpral 'ja' drod ma lags te// nad kyi dbu rgyan can/ rdza bya'i thul pa ma lasa?
296b4(rnying rgyud): te/ dug gi ri mo can/ bu chung ma lags te/ sgrol ging chen por 'dug/ khyod ni srid pa kun gyi bdag po ste/ the'u dang stong gi sprul pa 'gyed// de ring srid pa'i mdos la s+hon/ the'u rung ni stong rtsa gcig/ brgya ni byang chub sems dpa'i rigs/
296b5(rnying rgyud): brgya ni de ba lha yi rigs// chibs su sha ba yu mo chibs// lus ni gser mdog ser po la// g.yas pa brgyan lcags kyu 'dzin// g.yon pa brgyan ga'u bsnams// srid pa gsum gyi long+ga spyod nu zhing bsogs// gser mkhar ser po sgo gcig
296b6(rnying rgyud): nang na gnas// bsam pa'i nor dgu dang ni brab pa'i lcags dgu dang // yid bzhin nor bu 'dzin par byed// rin chen sna lnga dag la dbang mdzod cing // lha yi bu mo brgya dang rol// nor dang longs spyod pas ma mi khyab// la la dag la phan par byed// la
296b7(rnying rgyud): ladag la gnod par byed// de ring srod pa'i mdos la spyon// brgya ni zhe sdang bdud kyi bu yin te// sha dang khrag la longs spyod cing // stong gsum byug 'gro byed pa'o// lcags kyi mi chen ldem pa brgya// mgo las ti yug re bcings// lag na
297a1(rnying rgyud): gdug pa'i mtshon mthogs// lcags mkhar zhog cag nang na gnas// 'chi bdag bdud kyilany+dza ste// bcu ni lcags sung sngon bzhan nas rgyug/ g.yas na lcags kyi khram pa ma bsdams// g.yan na zangs kyis
297a2(rnying rgyud): re rnams// skye 'gro lings su 'debs shing sha khrag rlon pa za// sha la 'breng brgya rtse gcig gcod skyong byed// khrag la hubs kyis 'debs shing spyugs pa'i gad mo bgad// de ring srid pa'i mdos la sbron// drug cu stag dgur khra zhon te d+hag/ skyes pa
297a3(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi zla yang len// na chung rnams kyi srid kyang 'phrog/ g.yas pa lcags kyi ster thogs// g.yon pa lcags kyi drab thogs// stong gsum khyab par byed pa'o// de ring srid pa'i mdos la sbron// bcu ni dam bu nag gu zhon nas chug/ stong gsum
297a4(rnying rgyud): khyab par nyul byed pa// g.yas pa brgya ni 'ug pa khra ru thogs// lhas ngan sna tshogs 'bebs par byed// skye 'gro ma lus gsod do zer// de ring srid pa'i mdos la skyon// brgya ni btsan gyi bar chen ni// zangs mkhar dmar po'i na na gnas/
297a5(rnying rgyud): zangs mkhar ba se yi sgo gcig ma// nga rgyal ba tsan gyi bu ste srid gsum rgyug 'gro byed// sprugs pa'i glu ru di ri ri// btsan stan stong gi kha lo byed// drug cu rtsa gcig zangs kyi 'phar ba dmar po re re zhon nas rgyug/ sha li brdal du byed cing rnam khrag mtsho lta
297a6(rnying rgyud): 'khyil// de ring srid pa'i mdos la skyon// sum cu zangs kyi mi reng khres khur can// zangs kyi lba ba khur tsam re// lag na zangs 'khar dmar po thogs// kha ni dkar gyi thog tab po// skyur gyi drung 'byin no// phugs la shan dmar byed/ de ring srid pa'i
297a7(rnying rgyud): mdos la ston// dgu ni zangs kyi bya dmar dgu la zhon// mgo la dar dmar thod du bcings// zangs zhags dmar po mda' ltar 'phen// de ring srid pa'i mdos la skyon// sum brgya rgyal po'i bka' nyan de// dung gi mi che ni re res rta dkar mume dmar zhon
297b1(rnying rgyud): nas rgyug// lal ban klang dkar bzhin nas rmug/ lal khye dkar gan nas srid pa kun la dbang byed pa// mi dkar sdom pa gcig/ nAg na lpags dkar rgyal mtshon 'gyur// ral pa'i chags dkur mtshad g.yab pa'i tshe// srid pa thar tu /
297b2(rnying rgyud): 'dar zhing rgyug/ de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ dung gi mi dkar ldem pa brgya// lus la dang dkar ral ga gsol// dbul nor bu'i rgyun sbas pa// phyag na shel gyi mkhar ba bsdams// srid pa kun la dbang byed pa// stong gsum rgyug 'gro byed
297b3(rnying rgyud): cing rgyal po'i dmag tshogs g.yob// bdud dang ma yams g.yob cing rims nad mang po gtong // lcags kyi lag na thogs nas rgyal po'i gang pa mdzad// mi la nad du gtong zhing lcags la god bdag mjed// phyir ba kun tu phyug cing drung khrol las
297b4(rnying rgyud): byed pa// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang // zangs kyi mi chen mche ba rgya zor 'dra// mgo la zangs kyi 'ob log can// bskya yu mo zhon nas rgyung // mna' dang gzu yi dbang po mdzad// lha 'dre kun gyi snga 'dren pa'o// gcig ni bse yi mi chen
297b5(rnying rgyud): la// lus la sles khra gos su gon// mgo la 'bying ser yib zhu can// lag na 'om mkhar dmar po thogs// khros chen khur zhing skyi ser mtshan na sded// srid dang kha rje kha ru 'jug/ mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang / gcig ni s+ya la
297b6(rnying rgyud): zuthul pa can// lag na zangs nag thogs byed cing // dkar dang dmar dang sngo thab gsum// zab sna gsum gyi sna yang drangs// bdud pa tsan rgyal po ma yams dang // sa bdag klu gnyen g.yo ba 'dren byed// de yang srid pa'i mdos bzhes
297b7(rnying rgyud): dang // gcig ni bong bu dmar khrizhon nas rgyug/ ba dan rtse gsum phyag na bskams// 'jig rten dregs pa dbang du sdud cing gum gcod las la dga'// de rang srid pa'i mdos la sbron// nyi shu rtsa gcig g.yu mi mi sngon la// dang byugs
298a1(rnying rgyud): la 'ja' yi thod// ske na dung gi lba ba khur tsam gyes// de srid dra bzhon zhing rgyug/ ltas ngan sna tshogs 'bebs byed cing // sred gsum skye 'gro ma lus kun// bsad do bcad do zer zhing rgyug/ dka
298a2(rnying rgyud): spyan gcig gid pa mdzad// de ring srid pa'i mdos pazhes dang // sprul pa brgya ni 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gyed// brgyad cu srid pa'i gzud pang mdzad// legs nyes zhal lce gcod cing bka' yi bang chen mdzad// sum cu rtsa gnyis dpal gyi lhag ma sdud cing
298a3(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten byol zlog byed/ srid pa'i ze'u rang rgyal gyi tshogs// de ring srid pa'i mngos bzhes shig/ brgya ni'i jig rten phung khrol byed cing srid pa chen po'i gos// la la rngam pa stag gi mgo ste gang la babs pa len par byed// la la lkugs pa lug gi dang
298a4(rnying rgyud): gang la babs pa myos par byed// la la smyon pa dom gyi mgo ste smyo 'bog nad rnams gtong // la la mi lus dred kyi mgo ste thams cad brgyal bar byed cing dngangs par byed// la la spyi ring yi bzhu can// la la 'greng khur mi reng po// la la dud 'gro sna tshogs zhon//
298a5(rnying rgyud): la la glog dang 'od la chibs// la la 'bog dang brgyal thabs gtong // la la srid pa'i bang phyin byed// la la tshe len dbugs len byed// la la stabs bsnol zungs rmugs gtong // la la yod pa med par byed// la la gang ba stongs par byed// la
298a6(rnying rgyud): la dag la phan par byed// longs spyod ma lus 'phel bar byed// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang // nyis brgya 'dzam gling tshe srog dbugs kyi bang chen pa/ mang ba chos tho re/ phyi ring len to re/ 'dus pas ta re/ mkhar gsum dag la gnas
298a7(rnying rgyud): kyang bcas// bse mkhar sgo gcig dung mkhar sgo gcig dang // lcags mkhar sgo gcig nang nag nas// 'khor yang bre'u rang stong sde 'gyed// lha yi bu mo chung ma yin// yid bzhin nor bu 'chi bar byed// lha la phung khrol mang bas gsang bdag
298b1(rnying rgyud): khros pas// des kyang dmal btags pa de ring srid pa'i mdas bzhes dang / thatha rang lasogs lal ri rab tu skor byed// la la 'byung ba dbang bsgyur ba/ sa the'u sa ba dang / chu theb ldan pa dang / bar thas khra chen dang / theT rang 'byung ltal/ deri da/
298b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i mdos 'bul lo// la la mi ni in+d+ra zhes bya ste// rgyal 'gong chen po drug cu gcig/ ngan 'gong ni sum cu lnga/ byur 'gong nyi shu gcig/ kami lus spre'u mgo can// kha ser so ser lce ser gsum// nyin bzhin grogs po zug drug
298b3(rnying rgyud): nyal// mtshan zhing grong khyer khyab par nyul/ byung 'gong lbab can/ mi rang 'greng khur can/ 'khar skya zo s+ya lag na thogs/ phung 'gro ra smug can/ zangs kyi lbab khur tsam skyes/ brgyad cus bdag kyu gnyan dag dang bsdongs// spa
298b4(rnying rgyud): dang 'bur gyi nad du byed// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes shig/ rtsa gcig 'dus kyi 'debs byed ma// lha 'dre kun gyi sna 'dren mo// rtsa gcig ni the rang la/ bcu gcig srid pa'i nor dang longs spyod dang // dkor khang gnyen po srung bar byed// nor
298b5(rnying rgyud): dang longs spyod bsrung ma ste// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang // dgu ni srid pa'i 'gong po ste// gnam la gnas pa spun gsum byung // gnam the'u dkar po dang / gnam lha byang chub dang / gnam lha dkar po gsum// dar dkar ser dkar
298b6(rnying rgyud): lpags dka gon// dung mkhar shel mkhar snga mkhar gsum// rgyal mtshan gsum ni phyug na bsnams// bya rgod seng ge khyi dkar gsum la bcibs// gnam khyi dkar po mched gsum yang // de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang // bar na
298b7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i spun gsum la// dri bse ba bse lag bse gsum// khri gcig dre si pa ti'i thod// lcags mkhar 'od 'bar bsdams/ stag dang gzig dang bya rgod rgyal mtshan bsnams// sa la gnas pa'i the rang spun gsum yang // the se mchu ring gsum/ chu dang mo
299a1(rnying rgyud): dar sa dang gon// rgyal mtshan gsum ni lag na thogs// zo s+ya 'khar skya rgyal mtshan 'dzin// srid pa'i ze rang sun gsum yang // de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang // ze rang stong dang rtsa gcig kyang // zhe sdang
299a2(rnying rgyud): dag ni da khrol la// dang ba'i sems kyis glud 'di longs// stong gi sde dpon gyis gsungs bzhin// bka' las ma 'da' glud 'di bzhes// 'byung ba ri rab brten pa'i glud// nam mkha' 'di rnams yul du 'bul// rin chen nam
299a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' gzhal yas khang // mda' bkra 'di rnams mkhar du 'bul// rin chen rgyu las grub pa'i mkhar// rin chen 'di rnams gau ter du bsngo// zad med gter la longs spyod cing // gzugs brnyan 'di rnams gtor du bsngo// dkor gyi loT
299a4(rnying rgyud): spyod chen por bsngo// sgra snyan 'di ni g.yung gi klud// gzugs brtan 'di ni sku yi glud// snang gsal 'di ni sems kyi glud// dang po srid pa'i dpe/ de nas 'jig rten nor bdun dang // spyan gzigs dkor cha zas su bsngo// ze brang
299a5(rnying rgyud): sde sde mang po dang // sngon gyi lan chags ded pa'am// zas nor 'dod phyir rgyu ba yang // mthun pa'i yas su bshams/ sha chang rgyu ru 'dod/ bden pa'i tshig gis bkrol/ mdog bzang dag par byin gyis brlab// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du
299a6(rnying rgyud): mchod// da ni the rang stong phrag bsgrub// ltos pa rnams la grogs kyang mdzad// zhe sdang ngan pa zhi bar gyis// da ni gshegs so gnas su gshegs// dang po byung ba'i gnas su gshegs// rigs dang sde ni stog nas gshegs/ ri rab
299a7(rnying rgyud): khal gshegs/ stong phrag dag ni gnas su gshegs// rin chen sna lnga'i 'khor du gshegs// gdug 'a thams cad zhi bar gyis// zhes pa tsA'o// lha 'dri slong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ze rang stong rtsa gcig bcos pa'i le'u nyi shu
299b1(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ rgyal ba srog bdag mched bzhis/ rang rangag rtsam pa 'thabs tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gra gying gtsang ma'i gzhi spyang du// 'bras chang ba'i
299b2(rnying rgyud): la// dbang gi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// rin chen gyi mar byin gyis brlab// de la ri rab chen po brtsig par bya// kha dog ni rigs dang bskrun// smyug ma gtsang mnam mkha'i gyur// dar dang me long dag gis brgyan// rta rjong
299b3(rnying rgyud): zang thod dang // ba dan dang ni 'phan gyis brgyan// rin chen khri ni mdzes pa rba// bshos bu ldem pa bzhi ni bzhag/ dkar po gnyis dang rtse dmar dang // phrag pa can dang bzhi po la// mda' mkhar thabs ma dang chu ris mig/ dza
299b4(rnying rgyud): mgor khang thabs chu 'babs bzhini de la gzug par bya// nam mkha' dkar po dang ni dmar po dang // rin chen tshad dang bgran pa bzhi// pa shos bu dag la gtsug par bya// pra dang d+hI dang rta le gzugs// g.yag dngar dang lhag gi gzugs//
299b5(rnying rgyud): dang ni klung gi gzugs// bse phor mtshan ldan nang du ni// phud dang spyan gzigs pasham par bya// srid pa'i 'gong po la bshos bu dgu brgya dang // mda' bkra lpags zla'i thod kyis brgyan pa bsog/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyang chen po las/
299b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal po spyi bcos pa sogs kyi le'u nyi shu gnyis pa 'o// / trAM/ phyogs phyogs dag kyang bgrin// nyi ma shar phyogs bgen// shel yul dkar pong gau nA// shel ma khar dkar po gnam du zangs se zang // drung ga
299b7(rnying rgyud): rtsibs sa thob// de'i nang rked do/ mtsha kang po 'jugs/ migacig po la ming gsung ma// rtag mas kyi skang dun// ga chen pa zhes kyang bya// midag spyod spyad duni// bcan gang rgyas bzhes kyang// dam bcos pa da
300a1(rnying rgyud): ni// rdo rje legs mchog nas kyang b+ha// khyod kyil mas pa/ yang skya ba gas sa byas gcig pa nas pa bya/ yang yang lta ga kyi gyis te rigs kyang b+ha/ mad skyed pa'i dadrug pa med// de nyid thug
300a2(rnying rgyud): kyi sprul pa las// sras ni lha madral gnyis byung ste// ming po latsho dkar po yin// sring mom btsun u chos g.yar mo sil// ming po bcos su gsol/ yatsho dkar po de/ mi dkar blan 'gro// ta dkar 'og du 'phyo// phyogs dkar ta la la/
300a3(rnying rgyud): dwang po'i'i yul nas babs pas/ li yi phyag tu glud phul bas/ li ba sad kyi rgyal por btags// de nas yang la shod du byon// yang lde'i brag tu krud phul bas// yang bsad kyi rgyal por btags// de nas mi nyag yul du babs// mi nyag
300a4(rnying rgyud): gis phyag tu klung phul bas// steng ro sad kyi tshul par bya// de nas zhang zhung yul du babs// zhang wang gi phyag tu klung phul bas/ sman mig g.yas pa shal du 'dug pas shel dkar btags// sru la dang dkar mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// sang
300a5(rnying rgyud): go dkar mo'i thod pa can// phyag na gdug pa'i mtshon cha thogs// 'gong po rnams kyi bdag po byed// glud la rnam pa gsum byung ste// dang po g.yag dkar dang mdzod kar dang / radakar gnyang nag dang gsum zhig byung / bar yang se dang lugs
300a6(rnying rgyud): dang byas dang gsum zhig byung / tha ma gshos bu chag gang dang / kyems lazang smyug ma tshigs dgu'i bdag po lags// mdos bdag mangs pazhes shig/ gnam rim pa bcu gsum yang steng na// mkhang nye brtsegs pa'i yang sbreng na/
300a7(rnying rgyud): bdag dkar po sman gcig bzhugs/ khyod kyib smos pa/ rgya mtsho chen po'i gting shed na// chu srin chen po ma tang ga/ khyod kyi ma spros pa/ srid pa'i rgyal mo yin/ gnas pa bar snang dag la gnas// de nyid dathugs kyi sprul pa las/
300b1(rnying rgyud): ming po dkar po ldan gcig yin// srang ma a kar la gcig ma// mang pa ni bac+doMs sugs la// srog bdag dkar byed spyan gcig pa// dbul ral gcig shA rar// dpral nas mig gzig sangs sa kyang // zhal nas tshams gcag thabs
300b2(rnying rgyud): se zab// gzi mig khra bo che li li// slar nag po b+ha ra ra// phyag sor nag po shad de shad// 'bar ba'i rnga chung grol btags// khang pa kun kyang 'od kyis khengs// srog bdag dkar po 'od po che// gnam ral byed kyi bdag po lags/
300b3(rnying rgyud): sa chu byed kyi bdag po lags// mi dkar than ldem/ rta dkar 'og na 'phyo/ phyag na skra dkar ta la la/ skyes pa pho brgya'i srog gi bdag po yin// sku la zhing lpags g.yang gzhi gsol// phyag na lcags gri rnon po bsnams// grud kyid
300b4(rnying rgyud): ni// g.yag dkar lug dkar dang / mdo karare ru dmar dang / rta dkar phrum dmar gyi bdag po lags/ bar pa lug dkar po bya nag dang / khri dkar sna mar dang / b+ha dkar ze mar gyi bdag po yin/ tha ma ba shos bu ldem pa dang //
300b5(rnying rgyud): 'phang dar 'phan dang / smyug mtshogs dgu'i bdag po yin/ krung bdag grud bzhes dang / byang phyogs pa gi na/ ya ma shud dmar po bzhugs/ byang dri dmar po'i kha la bzhugs/ rtse la gnod sbyin spobs chen gnas// zur la
300b6(rnying rgyud): yam shung dmar po bzhugs// rtsanA btsan btsun phyag brnyan 'khrol// zangs mkhar dmar po ldems se ldem// zengs mkhar dmar po ldem pa la// log rim ba se yi sgo mo gsal// mthing shun sngon po'i ri bzhi la// gyu ru dmar po'i
300b7(rnying rgyud): g.yag shing la// zangs khri dmar po'i gdan stong na// yam shud dmar po bzhugs pa ljags zhul khrug gsol/ phyag na zangs kyi zhags pa'i dom dgu brgya dgu bcu bsdams// za ma mo brgya'i srog gi bdag po yin// srul zangs khrab dmar
301a1(rnying rgyud): pa gsul// krung ga dang ba ba mar gang gi bdag pa yin// bar ba blad ma ga dang / lcags bu masa'i bdag pa yan// tham skrag mchags dgra dang // byags mchog sums da yang bdag pa lags
301a2(rnying rgyud): mdos bdag mdos bzhes shig/ yul khu le khu stod na/ shar lho mtshams shed na/ blon po khu le lag dgu bzhugs// khyod kyi pha smos pa/ lcags kyi sdig pa kha dgu yin// gnas pa ri rab zom la gnas// khyod kyi ma spros pa/ g.ye
301a3(rnying rgyud): gyi grog ma kha med gcig/ de gnyis sprul pa'i sras/ mi gcig po la lag dgu byung // lag gcig ste 'dzom gnam du nyab/ lag gcig ste 'joms la nyab/ lag gcig bdud kyi gnas su gtong // lag gcig btsan gyi nang du gtong /
301a4(rnying rgyud): lag gcig ston gyi lo thog nyab// lag gcig na chung srid la nyag// lag gcig dkar dang sbur gyi thog kyang 'bab// sru la gser khrab ser po gsol// rgod ma rte'u med 'bri g.yag sham gyi bdag/ chung srid thams cad kyi bdag po yin// bshos
301a5(rnying rgyud): bu phrag pa can dang // mda' bkra spyan gzigs kyis mchod// phyag brnyan the rang chen po ste// de ring glud bzhes shig/ mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes shig/ dang po srid pa chags pa'i dpes// ri rab dpag bsam bcas pa'o// nam mkha' yul
301a6(rnying rgyud): du 'bul lo// mda' ni mkhar du 'bul lo// sems can gzugs brnyan dkor du 'bul// lhan gzigs dkor cha snyems kha gser// spu ron khungs dang sha chang rgyas su 'don// da ni gnas su gshegs/ mkhar chen bzhi ni slebs te gshegs
301a7(rnying rgyud): lha 'dra stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyal po mched bzhi bcos pa'i le'u nyi shu gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan lngar/ btsan thams cad kyis rang rang gi bcos pa'i tshigs su bcang pa 'di dag smras so// sa gtsang dben pa'i

301b2(rnying rgyud): dang bdug da na ba // tshan pa ya nga smra // thacag ce / dngang ldan gcigs da/ nAH// bad da na can de dag pasag/ we ga krinapa chen pa sa/ ban gyi sa kyil
301b3(rnying rgyud): yul dang byetsan yul phagan// btsan yul po gsum bgrin// bcan ma par dmar ngo gnam du thongs pa pa glen// bas yi zan lag lings sa ling // bas la khyi mo gangs ste gang // bas rtad mang ga tsang // den bdun byin 'jo bzhugs/ 'dzin
301b4(rnying rgyud): bdud la nol// mthu che rgyal lab/ 'gran tshol rtsal la chol// mi lus gA lag gi mgo/ dbulan la gcig mig gnyis po// lhagan la gcig mig gnyis po// g.yas na la gcig mig gnyis po// g.yon na pa gcig cig gnyis po/ kha ba zhom gu brdud
301b5(rnying rgyud): nA gcig lus po la// rdeg pa brgyad par byung // lag rdeg pazhid du rkang cig pa// mgrags pa rje brgyad yin// 'ganabs yi gsum dang // bas mad 'a dmar bsngags// sprul bas khrab skal jug gsol// dbun med pa'i khams sugs pa/ rje
301b6(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i mngos 'dzin// 'byung ba ni sa yo ba tsam// shang phyogs pazhin// sa bdag dngus kyiT// dung ma khar mya mol// ga wA li kha bad can// mthing gi de bzhil// g.yus na mau can// de yi nang shed na// mi dkar ldem pa gcig/ ta dkang tha ma dam
301b7(rnying rgyud): gag/ drung ba stsu gsol// btsun pa da' can gzhu bsdus sa// dri ma stod pa dbang bsgyur ba// mdo bdag mangs pa zhes shig// stso rgyags bgan// 'byung brgya mebu// mi na rdzo // sngags ma par min pa'i nang naganas// btsan mdang btsun
302a1(rnying rgyud): gzhu phyag na bsnams// mdos bdag mdas bzhes shig/ nub phyogs pa gin// zangs mkhar dmar po'i nang shad na// me dang tshad kyi bu// mi dam pa/ R+Ya dmar// btsan mda' ba can gzhu bsdams// mdos bdag mdos
302a2(rnying rgyud): bzhes dang // nyi ma byang gi btsan// rlung dang ngad kyi bu// mi ser rta ru ser// gser mkhar ser po'i nang na gnas// btsan mda' ba tsan gzhu phyag na bsdams// byang btsan stong la dbang sgyur cing // mdos bdag mdos pazhes shig/ dpas brtson mi sdug rta ru s+phus
302a3(rnying rgyud): mchod mkhar drug po'i nang na gnas// dbus patsan stod la dbang sgyur ba// mdos bdag mdos pa zhes shig/ gnam btsan ding ba de// 'byung ba nam mkha'i dbang sgyur byed// g.yas dkar sdong rum ni// mi dkar rta dkar btsan// gangs pa tsan stong la dbang sgyur
302a4(rnying rgyud): byed// graya' btsan mi smon de// g.ya' btsan stong la dbang phyur byed// sbrang btsan mi ser rta ser ba// wang btsan kun la dbang phyur byed// nags pa tsan mi nag rta nag de// nags btson steng la dbang sgyur ba// g.ya' ba can mi bkra rbA bkra ba tsan/
302a5(rnying rgyud): ring srid pa'i mdos pa zhes shig/ brag btsan mi dmar rta dmar de// brag gi thabs la gnas/ mi dmar mdud tsam mo// dbul ral pa me ltar 'bar/ phyag na mdung gi srin mo'i rkang // mig nas skar chen char ltar 'bebs// chibs su thag gi
302a6(rnying rgyud): rdungs pa chibs// rol du srin bu'i bu mo rol// brag gi wa mo kha nag zhon// brag bya thug pa khwa ru thogs// gos su thag gi dreg pa gon// zas sra thag rgya ha 'o za// skem du brag chu'i thigs pa 'thung // brag ba tsan 'bum gyi kha lo sbyar// de
302a7(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// btsan yul ba gi na/ btsan mkhar ldem pa yi gi na// spyi ma lung gsum ya gi na// skyes bu lung btsan bzhugs// skyes bu'i lus la ci gsol na// dmar po dar gyi rwa lag gsol// chibs su btsan rta ser po
302b1(rnying rgyud): san su na gnas/ sa na/ da / so sa / smra // du /
302b2(rnying rgyud): nas no// sa /
302b3(rnying rgyud): nas gag ci mad ga dzin// me la gabang ba'i nang du mdzad// ca ma 'ims parnam mags na// 'gadubs par dam rdzogs// miganas pad pa ngag nga // khanas ga gang ni du snod// nas rlung
302b4(rnying rgyud): shA nags pa // la nga bad kyi gas pag dus kyi/ dang bdag das pa sa shes snang bdag byung nas / thams kyi gag su// mig ga
302b5(rnying rgyud): 'i phyogs pa gtong// sho na 'ang mar po mil 'a des// mdas bdag mangs pa zhes shig/ bcan ni labargya bdun// bad ta dmar bzhin nas bcan zhags mda' ltung yin// skyes pa'i brdad gtsod na rlung srid kyang Ta// phal rnaM
302b6(rnying rgyud): gdu ma dang // lam skrag ci ba dang bdus// bcan d+had ma pa'an nas brgyan dgas mda' ga badzin// gang labab pa'i rgyal par byed // mangs bdag medas pa'i sug/ btsan pa stong yang / lam thag dang rdus ga sa/
302b7(rnying rgyud): byi gyu gnas/ 'ang she sa gnos// bas da byed la gang // ya sa la nga tshangs gas// zag cad 'arje dri/ ba tun tsangs 'arkyen gyis pangs pa te/ das das

308a5(rnying rgyud): 'dab brgyad zla ga ma gsang ba'i gzhal yas sra// srid pa'i dkar mo sku thugs la// de nas dbang gi rgyal mo ste// mtsho sman stong sdes bskor ba'o// hUM/ dbang gi rgyal mo'i gzhal las su// dkar mo dbu dgu tshogs bcas gshegs su
308a6(rnying rgyud): gsol// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs dbang gi rgyal mo'i tshogs// hUM/ pad+ma ge sar gdan mchog bshams pa 'dir// dkar mo dbu dgra mtsho sman 'khor bcas bzhugs su gsol// oM badz+ra yag mo ru rus a ti pu ho// de nas dbang
308a7(rnying rgyud): gi rgyal po pad+ma shwar ma// rnam dag srid pa'i dbang bskur dkar mo yum// mtsho ldan 'bum sngo 'khor bcas la// rnam dag bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'bul// de nas bstod cing smon lam gad pa po// de nas bsngo bar bya'o// hUM/ e ka ma ni sred pa'i bdag mo
308b1(rnying rgyud): rgyamatsha gting na gnas pa yi// dbang gi rgyal mo gsang ba'i yum// srid pa'i ma modag la dbang byed ma// de ring srid pa'i mdos cig bzhes// skye 'gro ral gcig ma ni khams gsum khyab pa'i bdag/ srid par nad khrag spo zhing gsang ba'i las mdzad ma//
308b2(rnying rgyud): ngoms dad 'khrig pa dgatong shing spags pa'i klu len ma// 'drim bu gling bzhi ba gar gang rdzogs pa'i gad mo dgod// zagag par thogs dpag tshad brgyang ther drug/ dmag da pan kyad cing du mdzad 'phar // srid pags ma ma brog byed// de ri na ldan
308b3(rnying rgyud): dmar gyis chod pa bzhes// da la ka chod la nad bltar/ b+h+yAM/ srid pa'i dkar mo dbye dgra ma// smye lus dkar sham rdzim pa la// dar dkar ralag sral gsol// dbul don rje/ kor cag can// gza' chen brgyad ni ske rags byas// chu skar sbed nas 'akyang
308b4(rnying rgyud): bar byed// gza' rgod rig dmar mar du 'bebs// gnas pa rgya mtsho'i gshing na gnas// rgyuni par snang bamams kyi// nyi ma tha bzhed nas 'char// zhabs ni tsamatho'i gtang na te// rtswa chen brgyad yang gzir bar byed// dbang gi tsal mo ba
308b5(rnying rgyud): phyogs bzhin// gcig na nyid kyi thugs kAnas// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting du ma gung dkyil na// dang dkar shAr gyi nang shod na// nya chen rtsa mgur bathab// thal pa dag po bar chags// de yini nang shid na// brda'ad ba bzung ga na sted na// dkar yo
308b6(rnying rgyud): dbu na badz+rags// pa spya h+yA na' ba sa// lan ga' gra la nas bstod pa // ngas sa kyis// thong 'ams mags kyi phyur \u0f7f// rdzog dpags ldan las ya das// nad lams sa kyi bdag mtha //
308b7(rnying rgyud): ya shAn du 'khol// dung tha~Mng ma'i kun lad g.yob// sa bdag sugatan san yang po ny-i byed// klu tso ku dang brjongs nas ni// mdzo ngagral napa gtang bar byed// sa bdagagazhan dang bzungs nasu ni/ srung 'thang ga sus rnaMm pa gtong // da
309a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ mo ni dpung gu ma// dpu dgu ye shes dgu yid na rtogs rtags// ye shes spyan gyis srid pas lar gzigs// 'bar byed thugs na chas nyid grong na bzhugs// stang gi lha bran rnams dang ral// rgyal chen bzhi yi gdungs rma
309a2(rnying rgyud): mdzad// 'dzam gling kun gyi kha ma skur// mdzes shing dag pas gru lus dkar la mnyen// zhabs kyis ma bgrodas la gnas pa'i tshul// rgyal mo'i tshul gyi dbang gi rgyal mos bskor// kun gyigatso mo mdzad pas mchi ldan 'phral gyis bskor// gung gi dang
309a3(rnying rgyud): na gnas tsam na// lan 'ga' chu srin bi ral chibs// gyur chen de yi gru bzhin// chu srin sram gyi rgyal mtshan bzhi// gzhal yas de yi nang shed na// srid pa'i dkar mo chen mo khrod// sbal pa nag pa'i thod pa ru// khrag sna stong ni sbyar nas gsol/
309a4(rnying rgyud): nag mo stong ni dam la sdud// lan 'ga' rin chen sA mra'i thod pa rba// 'o ma sna tshogs 'dus pa dang // mar dang me tog ldan kyang gsol// sman ma 'gum ni dam la sprad// lan 'ga' b+ha d+ha rak+ta mang po gsol// gnod sbyin 'bum ni dam la sdang /
309a5(rnying rgyud): rin chen gas kyis ram ru// bdud rtsi rgya ni brgyas kyi na gsol// ser mo 'bram med pa 'dzud// dang kur de yi nang shed na// rlung dang gser dang bu dang // gsung nga lpags las grub pa po// rin chan 'ab ba'i gzhal yas khang // ji
309a6(rnying rgyud): bdag po bzhugs// de ring med pa'i snad pa 'di bzhes// sham+ba khrag sgra'o ma dang // maHga rmun 'brul mchod// tshan gyis chang dang rtsi ldan mang pos mchod// gzugs brnyan mang pos thugs dam bskung // klu yi gdug rtsu bzhi par gyis/
309a7(rnying rgyud): sa bdag gdug rtsu bzhi bar gyis/ ma mo'i nad rnams ma ra la na la// shar phyogs dang dkar gur gyi nang shed na// nya chen rtse mo kur ru rngub// pad+ma dkar po gdan du bting // rin chen dung gi gzhal yas khang // sred pa yongs pa dbang sbrang ma// da
309b1(rnying rgyud): gas sa dang 'dag/ sun ma du gshegasasugasas// da slong pa da pano dag / rnamams pad na gangan mod pa sa gas/ gang sa ga chu/ dgasang gnas sa

309b3(rnying rgyud): ga/ tAn+da rnam zer ba'i thar thus// brlung ba 'gazha lags pa/ mtha' bar ba'i bdun stong du// dbang gi tshal maldan ma 'grags// dmar mabya dzu'i lab can// thas pa dam po'i bad pan// ngag mang 'i su ga pa

310a1(rnying rgyud): dpa tsha'achags dang sdug ma tshogs mnam chags 'asags pas// dang 'amam kang bas cang // mnas bdag canam mnas thanas dang / klu ba gyun nasathang cags dang / ga pas ma ma

310a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo chen mo bya// daring srid pa'i mngos pazhes dang // gzu li wu ba gur tsam nang shed na// de nam tsho sman 'bum sde gnas// thad med rnon mog wa yi la na tshar can// g.yu zan gzhibs pa'i chagacan// lag na bdud rtsi bum pa 'dzin/
310a4(rnying rgyud): nas gdug pa'i nad yams gtor// de ring srid pa'i mdos pazhes dang // zangs kyi lbu ba gur tsam nang shes na// zangs kyi bud med dmar mo la// zangs kyi ral pa mda' tsam gsig/ zangs kyi mche bcu zor bkug pa 'dra// kra ldan 'bum ske las la
310a5(rnying rgyud): 'byed// de rang srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang // gser gyi lha bku re tsam nang shed na// gser gyi blad med pan tshad can// lag na gser gyi bum pa 'dzin// sman mo 'bum ni las la gtong // de ring srid pa'i mdzes pazhes dang // lcags kyi wa
310a6(rnying rgyud): gam nang shed na// ljags kyi bud med ral pa can// srin mo shaT 'bru pa nI las la gtong // deng srid pa'i mangs bzhes dang // batshang gi lung grang tsa dpe shed na// gdug pa'i bu ma mchi gtsigs ma// srid pa kun tu khyab par byed// ma nga
310a7(rnying rgyud): dag sa nas bzhes shi // gze'i srub krur tsam nang shad na// srid pa'i mtsha spyan chen rdzogs// sras ni rje ma ya mje can// gnagapo pangam na// de sa srid pa'i ngos bzhes dang // kyi dri'i lung krung tsaman she na/
310b1(rnying rgyud): rje bud med dmar bar la bsags// gabyer ba nad kyi bdag maH// narang srid pa 'amadas bags dang // shas gyi sru bgyur tsam nang shang na// shal gyi thad med dka ma gnas// srid pa kun tu thud pa// mdas bdag zan pa mdas panas

310b3(rnying rgyud): grum mang po gtong ba'i bdag/ dkar mo chen modo yi 'khor// gru bdud stong yang 'khor na gnas// de ring dkar gsum mang ra gsum mchod// mdos bdag chen mo mdos pa zhes dang // sman mo dbang gi rgyal mo ste// sman mchen maco prad+hi// wu

311a1(rnying rgyud): de ring gung dang mi gyi// nad dang mamathu// gdug pa kra li Ta// dag ba dag po mtha' mas rlung skyong dang // bad+yA chu mu ka / barba dang // sbrul mag bdun dang dgra pa dang // wa ba dang ni gsus pa dang // gzugs/
311a2(rnying rgyud): med pa dang pad+ma dang // nam mkha'i 'ja' 'dra sgong 'dra ba dang // rta dang rtsangs pa sdig pa dang // nya sbal lcong mo sdom sdig dang // mi sdug gzugs kyi klu rnams dang // rgya mtsho dag la gnas pa dang // ri rab dag la gnas pa dang // 'gyur bdag
311a3(rnying rgyud): la gnas pa yi// klu gdug klu bran 'khor dang bcas// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang // me tog sna dgu mang po dang // chen spos klu spyan sna tshogs dang // gsobag chu sna mang po dang // 'di rnams 'bul lo mdzes bzhes dang // nam mkha' yul
311a4(rnying rgyud): 'bul bas bzhes// 'byung ba'i rten dang 'jig rten nor gyis mchod// srid pa'i ma mos bdag kla gi drugi tshogs// de raring srid pa'i mdos ba zhes dang // nad rnams thams cad sos par gyis// zhes pa snga'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po
311a5(rnying rgyud): las/ mtsho sman gyi mdos kyi le'u so gsum pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar// bdud nag po bkrag med dang / phyi ba tsan kha bzhi dang / rgyal po spyan gcig dbang phyug chen po dang // klu 'jog po dang /
311a6(rnying rgyud): gza' bi ti pa dang // the rang rdo rje legs pa dang // bdud mo ral gcig rnams kyis/ se rab dbab pa'i rang rang gi las 'di smras so// drag las 'bebs pa'i gnas dag btsal nas ni// maN+Dal 'khor lo tshobs brgyad bri// de yi dbus
311a7(rnying rgyud): rabs chang zad pa gcig/ thod pa de la 'khor ma gyibs brgyad bri// dngos ni thum pa dkyil gra gsum// dbus su su bdag dang ni 'i nag cing// shar gyi 'khong lo gnas bskod// shing du rgyal po lho dra btsan// nub tu tshul byang du bdud/
311b1(rnying rgyud): ga kyong gapa' ma/ lho nub tu dbang phyug ste/ nub blang du ba dang / byang shar du bdud pa'o// sngags kyi ris pa de skang dgod// dbus su dmigs pa'i mang ngas yul dang rngas bcas/ song rje krung pa gcig ni ku yo bdag cad du gas mtha
311b2(rnying rgyud): de las bzhag/ de la bsgrub cing tha ma brda yang de yang de yis b+ha/ gdu du sbas pa de ni 'joms pa'i gta' ma'o// gang du sbas pa di dra nges par 'babs par 'gyur/ lha 'dra stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sde rab bsag pa'i le'umo bzhi
311b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / oM bdud ya tri maM mr-i/ sad du dag tu pu ta po bA ya/ oM btsun du d+hi tsatsatra pho ba ya/ de nas yang dregs pa rnams kyis mi rnams la ltas ngan btung ba'i lus 'di smras so// gtang bar 'dod pas dzad pa'i dang // ras sa pa shog
311b4(rnying rgyud): bu dag la ni// 'khor lo rtsibs drug bris nas su// de la lha 'dra'i sngags bris te/ thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ de la lha 'dre'i snying po ltas ngan gtong ba'i sngags 'di bri'o// oM nga sa dad gu la lo// gar kol thabs sad tha mi sa se mang yang ping mer/

311b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa rnams kyis ltas ngan babs pa de'i rtags dang bzlog thabs smras so// yul 'byung na dregs pa'i gnas btab pa'o// blan ga yo ba dang bzlog pa dang / gyis 'dabs pa'o// bani stan pa byung dbang chen pa ste/ than bsgyur ba'amathor bathog
311b7(rnying rgyud): ri dgas papas na gnam thas shes kyab stag tu bsgyur // sems na rlu mi drug pa'i/ deng gis 'arlog pa rgyu// mi dga' ba byams sa dang ste/ tsha // la bas byud/ de nyis log
312a1(rnying rgyud): babs pa ste/ srid bsgyur gtong ngo // lug la ra kha la dang khyil rtsed pa byung na/ de rang gis bzlog go// bya 'bras byung na dmu sngo yin te/ zam gyi bar bya'o// de rnams kyi ltas ngan rangs pa bzlog na/ khyi nag po'i
312a2(rnying rgyud): thod pa'i nang du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad kyi nang la/ de la sngags 'di bris te/ phaT te ra sad khu le phyo ni khu le dr-i sha dri ni b+h+yo/ zhes pa de bris la/ dbus su gsang bdag sngags bris la/ dar mthing nag gis kha bcad la/ sngags de bzlas shing / thod pa de lung
312a3(rnying rgyud): gsum mdo'am/ lam rgya gram mam/ ri gsum rtser bskul te mnan na ltas ngan gang babs kyang zlog par 'gyur ro// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ b+has ngan pa zlog pa'i le'u so drug pa'o// / de rnams kyi rang rang gi rgyu lugs
312a4(rnying rgyud): dang ki kang rgyu ba bstan cing smras pa ste/ bdag cag rnams ni dregs pa 'khor bcas te/ nu ba'i dus ni 'di lta ste/ srod la bdud rgya/ sod chung la btsan rgyu/ gung stod la bdud chu/ gung smad la rgyal po rgyu/ tho rangs ze rang rgya/ skya re nges la the
312a5(rnying rgyud): rang rgyu/ nam langs la glan rgyu/ nyi rtse la klu rgyu/ dros las bdag rgyu/ de ltar rgyab lags te/ gang dang 'phrad pa de ni lung bar 'gyur ro// lha 'dra stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa rgyu ba'i dus bstan pa'i le'u so bdun pa'o//

312a7(rnying rgyud): me mang kha lnga spyan gzigs bcas// nam mkha' dkar po dag dang ni// bshos bu rgyas pa de la gzug/ spug ma gtsang mtshigs ming dang // rin chen mkhar ni sum sgrog zi// lba ba shos de la gzug par bya// 'dab chags kyi dang gcan gzan dang /

312b7(rnying rgyud): naM dakhang du 'bres// rin chen lnga lnga gtir du thul// spyan gzigs dka marang po cul// zhes badz+rag// g+ha gre g+sang gi rje rgyun chen po lapa/ da gying dag papa kar btsas pa'i lengam // de nas yang bcom ldan 'a
313a1(rnying rgyud): kye ldan sngar/ rgyal pa srog bdag spyan gcig dang / sad bzhis rang rang gi bcas pa'i thabs dang las 'di dag smras so// sa gzhi di ni brtag pa dang // gsang bdag tid 'dzin ldan pa des// 'bru sna tshang ba'i nga
313a2(rnying rgyud): la// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// ri rab de ni chen po la// rtse la me mar kha bzhi btang // gla ba spos dang rkang dang tshil// mar dang mkhris dang glabs brgyan// za 'og gur dang nam mkha' bzhi// seng ge g.yu ral can dang nyi ma zer mad
313a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa dang // g.yu sbrul sngon mo dang ni khyad chen rgyas pa dang // gzhan yang mkhar dang pho brang dang // g.yag dang lug dang ba glang dang // rta dang bya dang mthun pa'i yas stags bsag/ de yis mchod cing las 'di bya// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po

313a5(rnying rgyud): mtsho yi gos// mi mtshams brda ru mtshams/ mtshams rje yag pa gcig/ mi yi mi sngon lags/ lag pa brgyad du 'dug/ lag pa brgyad po yang / g.yu dang mu man lags/ glo dang snying ga 'dabs/ yu la rma bya'i mdongs kyi thul ba gsol/ dang
