313a7(rnying rgyud): mi 'tshal// mi 'tshal ba yi dbang ma mchis/ g.yas na stag smad 'phyang // g.yon na sbrul smad 'khrug/ thugs ka'i thal gyis bu chung sru gzugs 'bar// rgyal po cing brdzun// shel gyi nyi ma dang // g.yu yi nyi ma dgu ru brdzus/ rgyal po nyi bar
313b1(rnying rgyud): da// shal mtha ba dag dubacus// zlab cas pa tshal na// brjod dam btso// gshang dus pas // rgyam pagatha' ba jus// lha ka pos pa// rgyal bas gang bzlas// gagadug pan sdang chags kyang // sed las gzhan
313b2(rnying rgyud): gangs ri ming pangasad// rgyal po khyung ba sad// rgyal po rti pang sad// khong mcho dku m+bi sad// gsu sus ldan por bcus// klu zan stong gis bsnor// klu rde sbal pangs duM// rgyal po ni chen po ste// 'bog pa'i nang du mdzad// sto ba'i rna
313b3(rnying rgyud): dri mdzad// brnam pa'i nang du ma mdzad dang // rgyal po chen po rjod// mgo 'khor bar pa mdzod// mi bas gling che// ri rib chen po dang // gsal ba'i mar me dang // spyan gzigs dkor chas mchod// mthud pa'i las ni 'bul//
313b4(rnying rgyud): kyis mchod// mdzes dang mer gyis mchod// mthun pa'i las kyis mchod// lha 'dra stang gi chu ba'i rgyud chen po las// rgyal po bcas pa'i leT bzhi bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lhan sngar/ btson sel ba skyong
313b5(rnying rgyud): gis rang mig bcas pa'i las 'di dag sbas so// 'thu chang ba'i gsang kyil// dI ra ba dang ni dang gi bas ma shing // nam sa pa'i glur dang sil ma'i rgyan// sa la 'dzul dang gnam la 'jar// gzugs ni lang bas bsar bar bya// nam ma pa
313b6(rnying rgyud): chags nyi gagacig/ mda' dmar grangs kyang de bzhin \u0f7f// brnyan ma gos na ga sum te thug ci// bya dang nga bu grangs kyang de bzhin bya// N+Da ba can grangs kyang deng zhin bya// spyan gzigs dkor mthung kyis mchod// ma 'dra stong ga ba'i
313b7(rnying rgyud): chad pa las/ btsan si lam bsag pa'i le'u bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o// hUM/ rdzib can chen po ste/ kha bzhi mig brgyad po// dargyal chen po'i gtso// btsan phran ni kha la bsgyur// srid pa gsum gyi srog dbugs bdag/ lce 'gro ma lu
314a1(rnying rgyud): bdag/ mi'i bdud da phyugs kyid// mdas bdag nA nas bzhes dang // 'byung ba sku la bcan// me duH da 'am / rgyub dam spyad// gsho ga dang tshogs pa byang//
314a2(rnying rgyud): dmar rtswa dmar rtse// klu ba can 'a khor dang bcas// mdas bdag mdos pags dang // byang rdzogs gnad sbyi ldan// mi ny+dza N+Da ltur ste// gnad sbyin gdun chags 'bar dang bcas// mangs padag mdas bzhes dang // ba can ni stong gA meng /
314a3(rnying rgyud): dmangs rigs sde ru gtogs// 'byung ba lnga la gnas bcas nas// nga rgyal khengs pas srid pa'i mi la gnod// btsan gyi stong sde las// khyed srid pa ni chub par gnas// 'phan po bcan gyi bu// gzer dang khrag skyug nad du mdzad// la la 'byung
314a4(rnying rgyud): pa nam mkha' dag la gnas// skar chen gzha'adang dgra tshogs gnas// he zer zla zer dag la gnas// mi thu gsod par mdzad// dud 'gro gan mar byed// gnam lpags mda' wAr 'ban// mdos bdag mdas bzhes dang // la la 'byung
314a5(rnying rgyud): sa la gnas// sa dang rlan gyib// ma~M ba sa rta bkra 'thung // zhags pa mda' ltar 'phen// btsan dmyag ga ya bcing byug/ mdos bdag mdos brgyas dang // la la cing dang sa la gnas// mi dkar rta dkar dang // shing logos sum /
314a6(rnying rgyud): thang chu skom du 'thung // shing 'bras zas su za// srid pa kun tu grug// gnas pa shing la gnas// gnod pa mi la gnod// rgyab tu klu chen g.yob// mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang // la la 'byung 'thag la gnas// la la brag dmar rtse lagan
314a7(rnying rgyud): la la zag dgangs la gnas// la lagrags rangs la gnas// lamathag dkar zung la gnas// 'byung ba'i ming rgyal zhan// la la yidag tad byug/ lal bdam / dmar \u0f7f// la la mas tas pa byung // las min pa na
314b1(rnying rgyud): can// la la shing gi ri mo can// lal rin chen snga las brgyan// la la dang dang nam mkha' gsal// gnas pa zag lha gnas shing rgyu ba rtse lung gas man+ta// gnod pa 'jam the gling gi mi la mdzad// mangs bdag mdas bzhes dang // gla
314b2(rnying rgyud): bdag glung bzhes dang // brag bu skya re la// btsan bu skya re gnas// lung ba su la re la// btsan po skya re gnas// mkhar dang rdzong re la// btson po skra reg nas// mdos dang yas bzhes dang // sba bcan sngon dang rje// se btsan spun dgu dang // drur btson dgra po/
314b3(rnying rgyud): kha// brag ba tsan shor brje// gnam btsan 'phrul bu rje// sa btson ljon de na// chu btsan ston dang rje// gangs btsan rom bu rje// g.ya' ba tsan dang btsan rje// spang btsan gang bu rje// nags btsun mun dang rje// g.ye ba tsan khrin du rje// mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang /
314b4(rnying rgyud): glud bdag grung bzhes dang // btsan bran stong sde dang // 'byung ba khyab par gnas// skye 'gro kun la gnod// mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang // zhes bsngos la gtang ngo // lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btson bcos pa'i le'u bzhi bcu gsum pa'o// /
314b5(rnying rgyud): de nas yang ston pa'i spyan sngar/ klu btsan mched gsum gyis rang rang gi las 'di dag sgras so// klung bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// dang dkar ras dkar gdan steng du// 'bru sna gsum mam tshang ba la// btsan bshos zur gsum byas nas ni// dmar dang
314b6(rnying rgyud): ser dang nag por bya// mda' ni lhong dmar ltong ser dang // ltong nag gsum ni gzug par bya// glang dmar dang ni lug dang ra dang gsum// bya dang bcas pa bsag pa'o// sbal lcong nya dang ni// sbrul dang rtsangs pa rta dang phug don dang // sdig pa ba glang bcas pa bsag/ dar pu bya
314b7(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyang bsag/ 'o ma sna tshogs kyi sman bcas// me tog 'bru lnga mang po dang // nam mkha' gsum ni rigs dang bskrun// 'brang rgyas gsum la gzug par bya// dkyil du spyi yi ba shos bu khru gang bzhag/ phud dang 'byor pa tshang bar bsag/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud
315a1(rnying rgyud): // chen po las/ klubatsan bsag pa'i le'u bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang bsngo ba ni/ hUM/ srid pa kun gyi bdag/ grub can ni mched de gsum// nad dang sna tshogs gtong // gdug pa che zhing lha 'dre kun gyi rgyab mdzad pa// pha ni btsan la ma ni klu yi lha ma mo de
315a2(rnying rgyud): klubatsan tshogs pa'i drag shul can// pha ni 'gro steng rgyal ba yin// ma ni btsun bza' lham gcig ma// bu ni spun gsum byung ba la// khu bo klu btsan nag po gcig/ mi nag mdung tsam gcig/ dar nag ral ka gsol// sbrul nag zar tshags// sbal nag chag can// rta na ga
315a3(rnying rgyud): po chibs// g.yas na se btsan stong gi dmag sna 'dren// g.yon na brag btsan stong gi sna yang 'dren// rgyab na gdug pa gu yi bu// sgra ni the rang chen pos 'dren// mdos bdag mdos pazhes dang // klu btsan dmar po de// mi dmar mdud tsam gcig/ glang dmar rung dmar
315a4(rnying rgyud): chibs// dar dmar ral ga la// sbrul dmar gdengs ral can// sbal ba dmar po'i cha ga can// sdom sdig sgra nas 'thor// 'brum bu nag dang nad khrag mang po 'thor// btsan phran 'gum ni sna yang 'dren// gdug pa klu yi rgyab mdzad pa// mdos bdag mdos bzhes dang // klu btso
315a5(rnying rgyud): mched gsum khyod// ston pa stong gi sde dpon lung la nyon// dregs pa kun gyi rgyab mdzad pa// yi dwags 'dre bkren ma 'dren snga ma mdzad// ces bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las// klu btsan bsngo ba'i le'u bzhi bcu lnga pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
315a6(rnying rgyud): kyi spyan sngar/ brtan ma bcu gnyis kyis rang rang gi bcos pa'i thabs tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// 'bru sgra tshang ba'i kye ma la// byin gyis brlab cing sbrus nas su// ri rab kha dog rigs dang bstun// dpag bsam shing dang nas
315a7(rnying rgyud): mkha' tshon sna lnga yi gur// dar dang rgya long brgyan par bya// ra dang lug dang bya dkar mo dang / spug mo dang dmar mo dang sngon mo dang bcas pa mang du bsag go/ sha ba dang rta dang glang dang mdze rtol dang / so bya dang 'bri dang bcas pas ri rab bskor/ 'brang rgyas bcu gnyis ri ra
315b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil du rtsa ba gcig bya/ de la nam mkha' dmar po bzhi/ dkar ba bzhi/ nag zo bzhi byas la zung rgyas la gzug/ 'phang gi grangs kyang de bzhin gzug/ lga rdzas rgyams byang rdzas bsag/ sha khrag gtor ma dkar ma ran chan phud rnams bsag/ lha 'adz+ra rkang gardza nga/
315b2(rnying rgyud): rgyud chen po las/ brtan ma bsag pa'i le'u bzhi bcu drug pa'o// / b+h+yAM/ brtan ma ni bcu gnyis te// skyong ma dang ni bcu gsum ni// dbang phyug dang ni dregs pa'i bu// bregs pa chen po'i bu mo ste// la la drag cing mthu rtsal khyad par mi zad de// rI rab che b.lI la
315b3(rnying rgyud): ga nga byu shes// gnas gyi mtha' ban rtsod pa'i rgyabs ma gas// blam grong gi ni dka nig kyang mar nga nas// gyon gyi ma smin kyi rgyal brdibs// N+Da' da tha tugagacir ba da rnams gtong // di tsun sring 'i das la ldan chen na/
315b4(rnying rgyud): gnam gyi chenan // mni nag po thoganyer can// bla ma bdud pa chen ma pa'i// bdag nyid rje ban zags ma// bdud rtanag pazhin nas srid pa tha brjod sa// dang gsus la gon zhing khram nag tugan pa rnams// dpal ldan da dag la'am rkyong // gsal la grus mdon nas
315b5(rnying rgyud): stong khams khyab par nyul// bdud dang nag po gon lding tha ma la mda' ltar baphen// gangs kyi yum chen rdo rje kun tu bzang // rnga mo ske ring zhon nas srid pa kun tu 'gro// mthing nag le'u go na nas rin chen rgyan chas spras shing khrag gi gru char 'debs// 'brog rgyan 'dzo /
315b6(rnying rgyud): 'du mdzin bgegs kyigatso// dzil na gnon nus dang kyil na gro na zhing du mtshon 'gyur// me TIgs tho zhing srid par byug/ bdud mochen mo bzhi yang mdos pazhes dang // pa ni zangs mgrin che po rtse// mni dmar mi mche gtsigs ma// bu ni gnod sbyin chen mo ba'aM//
315b7(rnying rgyud): gangs kyi yul chen rdo gsu thun ma ni da/ mi mdzes mal// gser ga sumadzes pa'i rkyen gyis smras// sman shasuM rdung son nas rgyug// gser chen mkha' ma snying rdo rnga thud chen ma// rin chen rje rdzas brgyan nas cang bu zhon nas rgyag/ rba re ra ba'i byams rdon rje /
316a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ maN+Dal// maur byam mangs pags la nas rin can chag can// kha rag krung btsun srid kun gyi sum// dmar sa rin rkyen can da da byin papa 'gas la// gnad gyur byanam bzhin mdas bzhas dang // bani la chen pa b+ha// mni
316a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin bzang ma// bu mo sran mo chen mo pa'i// kong btsun dmardo rdo bod khams skyong // dkar mo'i lus la rin chen go phyog can// chibs su shab yu mo zhon nas chu ga cing rjen na dgazer ba gtong // ma btsun sug chos rdo rje g.yang mo bsil// tsha bas surnga mchibs nas
316a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rin chen gsol// btsan la rol lo ni rje sran gcigs// nabaza' rin chen snga las brgyan// sman mo bzhi yang srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang // ma btsun partan ma bcu gnyis po// gsang bdag ston pa'i smanas ru// bstan pa bsrung bar dam bcas pa// rgyu ni sri dpa
316a4(rnying rgyud): khyab par rgya// mthu rtsal chen po'i khyad par ni// bdag cag brtan ma bcu gnyis te// bstan pa gnyen po bsrung ba na// bstan pa gcan po 'jig pa ni// sngags kyi yang dben 'jig pa na// lugs thog zangs thog rdo thog dbab byas la// de ru bcad cing gas par
316a5(rnying rgyud): zhal gyi dang padag las ni// dung ser dkar po der phab la// 'bru snani thog skyem zhing sems can drag par byed// tshon gyi gru gu der bcangs la// rtswa lnga'i nad kyis bcing bar bya// nad kyi rgyal pa der brdabs la// sems can dmyal thag gcad par bya// gzer nad khrag/
316a6(rnying rgyud): smug gtang bar bya// byang dmar dbus la gdab par bya// khram la gdab cing shod la dasam// sangs rgyas bstan pa der srung ngo // dus ngan tham lan cig byung ba'i tshe// bdag cag rnams kyi bstan pa 'byung // ltos na yon tan tshe srog bsgreng // ming po bgegs can/
316a7(rnying rgyud): rnams dang nang snga mang po bsrung // 'bru rnams bkru shing bskyab par bya// bod khams myong ba'i btan ma rnams// ri rab nam mkha' bye 'gro'i gzugs// 'ju badrud dbyems dang sha pA khAg ng+ka dang // sra gzigs dkong ma mthud pa'i las rnams 'bul// de ri /
316b1(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang // nang bsgyur la god bsgoms// zhes bsngo'o// lha 'dra stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ brtan ma bcos pa'i le'u bzhi bcwa bdun pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ rdzogs pa thams cad kyis smras pa/ bdag
316b2(rnying rgyud): cag rnams ni tshe dang srog la dbang byed pa ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi tshe dang srog la dbang byed pa ste/ tshe srog gi bdag po'ang bdag cag lags te/ mi de'i srog dang glud brje bar 'dod na/ lug gam tsa ra gang yang rung / gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des
316b3(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur bar du byin gyis brlab byas nas// de la mi yi zhwa dang gos dang lham ni bkon// mtshal thig gdab cing gser g.yus brgyan// phud gtsang dang ni chas kyis bsham// de ltar bshams nas sngon bzhin phul na/ de yis mi des gud du brje ste nad
316b4(rnying rgyud): rnams sos la 'chi ba bzlog/ ces gsungs so// hUM/ srid pas bskos pa'i phung po bskos pa zhes// srid pa'i bya mkhan nang khrol sha la gyon mdzod cig/ ru bdud chen po rul brten// bdud kyi lci mis chen po khyod// tsang rgyal ba 'di yi bcud ba zhes shig/ u
316b5(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis mgo dang bcu gsum la// ya bdud bcu gsum grung bzhes dang // ya mkhal ya bdud chen po rnams la 'bul// ma mkhal ma bdud chen po dag la 'bul// sha la kham re khrag la thigs re dang // spu la nyag re bdud bran bzhes// nam tshong lha bdud gang du bzhes//
316b6(rnying rgyud): gshang kha dur bdud dur btsan bzhes// gnye ma gnyis bdud gnyis mkham bdud bzhes// gzhung bu gyi btsan chen po ste// phung po lnga ni 'byung ba'i btsan// mchin pa brag btsan rje btsan bzhes// su la mang ba tsan phran stong sdes bzhes// snying dang srog rtsa srog bdag 'khor
316b7(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pas bzhes// glo bsil ma stong sde bzhes// shan sngan rmen bu rgyal the'u rang spun dgus bzhes// srog bdag g.yas g.yon nang khrol tshogs dang bcas// bdud mo 'khor dang bcas la 'bul// sha khrag rlon pa the rang stong sde bzhes// pho ba rmang kha dza ya ma rnams
317a1(rnying rgyud): bzhes// khrod pas bdag kruganyan bzhes// sha khrag rus pa'i phung po ya dwags 'dra ba kran bzhas// sgo bzhi 'grang ba bzhas/ mi dang sha ru brjes/ mi dang / khrag tu 'jas/ mi dang srog tu brjes/ srog pa' mdas bzhes dang / zhes badz+ra'// 6/
317a2(rnying rgyud): 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ mi dang glud brje ba'i le'u bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ lha yi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bgegs chen de dag kun rnams ni// mchod na ting 'dzin ji ltar bgyi// babru pa na dbang
317a3(rnying rgyud): ru ji ltar bsdu// dus ni gang dang gang la 'jug/ drag po'i las ni gang la bya// mnan dang gtad pa byed na ting 'dzin ji ltar bya// gnyen po stobs kyi lha ni gang // bri ba snag tsho'i rgyu ni gang // dus tshod gnan pa gang la bya// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
317a4(rnying rgyud): brgya byin nyon cig/ ma tshad na rnal 'byor lha yi gdeng du 'jug/ mgron thabs spyan drang mchod pa sprul pas bkye la btang // slar log cho bstim bkra shis gsol// bsgrub na ting 'dzin gsal bas zla stod dag la 'jug pa ste// gza' dang skar ma shis pa dag la 'jug/ nya nas
317a5(rnying rgyud): mar te drag po'i las rnams brtsam// bdag ni ting 'dzin gsal ba la// bgegs rnams dbang sdud bran gyi tshul du las byed pa'o// sems la khu 'phrig med la blta ba bsang// de yis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// gtad pa'i las ni 'di dag lte// gsang bdag klu
317a6(rnying rgyud): bdag 'jam dpal ting 'dzin ldan pa des// gyi dro'i dus su bri zhing nam gyi gung dang srod la mnan// snag tsha snag cha chen po ste// mi dang khyi dang ra yi khrag gis bri// de yis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das
317a7(rnying rgyud): kyi spyan sngar 'di skad ces gsol pa dang / ston pas bka' stsal pa/ lta ba zhes bya 'di ltar blta// thams cad byang chub sems chen te// sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas med// bdag ni lce me byang chub sems su blta// skye ba med pa'i ngang las thams cad byung
317b1(rnying rgyud): ba ste// byung ba nyid las dngos po med// nam mkha' skang med dngas pa la// sbyin dang / khu rlangs ci thung yang // nam mkha'i nga las byung ba la// zhi yang nam mkha'i ngang du'i// de bzhin lce mad byang chub sams de yis// skye ba'i cho 'phrul ji lta shung yang sa /
317b2(rnying rgyud): nyid dang du zhi// de la gyon gyis gos pa med// de ltar rtogs na de la nyes pa'i skyon mi gos// zhes stsal to// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ lha bskyed dang dus dang sdug tsha bstan pa dang dbang du bya ba dang / lta ba bstan pa'i le'u bzhi bcu dgu pa'o//
317b3(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'di yi dkor dang gtsug lag khang rnams kyi mnga' bdag gang gis bgyi zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten 'di na mthu che ba/ lha chen ma hA kA la bya
317b4(rnying rgyud): pa yod de/ de yi sring mo bdud mo phung byed khram thogs bya ba yod/ de gnyis kyis bsrung bar bgyi'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang du bsdus te/ ming sring gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du byung nas/ gtsug lag khang ngam dur khrod lha
317b5(rnying rgyud): rten du/ bdag cag ming sring gi sku bris nas su/ sngags kyis 'don cing gang ltos pa/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i mthu ni dngos grub 'byung ngo // las rnams thams cad grub par bya'o// dmod pa'i mtshon cha gang la smos pa dmyal zag gcod do// zhes gsungs so//
317b6(rnying rgyud): oM ma hA kA la yeg shaM pri ma rbad sha ga ya/ kA la ha lA rni 'gyo myogs rub thu ma ya/ oM ru ru rag mo ha la tsa la hur hur/ paM shag rbad/ mu lus ma ya thibs/ pi shag tsa tsa ra tsa ya b+h+yo thun/ rbad bu rbad bu yag mo ru ru lding rtsa la shad de shad de/ zhes
317b7(rnying rgyud): kul ma tha shA tu byin gyis brlabs kyis// ma hA kA la zhes bya ba dang / sring mor bcas 'ongs nas/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa bsrung bar bgyi/ dkor khang yang bsrung bar bgyi/ dben gnas bsrung bar bgyi'o// zhes
318a1(rnying rgyud): gsungs nas/ ming sring gnyis kyis sbas pa/ dus ngan tha ma byung ba 'tsho// chos 'khor gnyen pa bshig pa na// nga cag bstan pa dar 'byung // bdag cag yang lding gnyis 'dzub na// dmod pa 'di
318a2(rnying rgyud): yis las rnams 'grub pa ste// gsang ba'i bdag po ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// nyung dkar nyung na gzod par blug nas su// de la khrag snga bstsal la dmod pa de ska dgad ba// de yis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// lha 'dre stong gi dri ba'i rlud chen po las/ ma
318a3(rnying rgyud): hA kA la ming sring gi le'u lnga bcu pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ dregs pa de dag rnams sgrub pa na// dam tshig ji ltar bsrang bar bgyi/ zhes gus pa dang // gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// mirta khyi dang gsum
318a4(rnying rgyud): la sprid mi bya// srog gcod sdig pa dag la spyad mi bya// bud med dag la bag bsdam sems mi 'chor// 'gro nyal 'dug rjod gang la 'ang // lba ba dag las yangs mitha// nyams pa mad cing brtul zhugs bskyed// sha khrag dag la smad par bya// zhes
318a5(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal to// lha 'dra stong gi ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sprod pa dang dam tshig bsrung ba'i le'u lnga bcung gcig pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das
318a6(rnying rgyud): dregs pa chen po 'di rnams ni// bcos na yon tan ji tsam 'gyur// ma bcos pa yi skyon ni gang // zhes gsol bas/ gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// dregs pa bcos pa'i yon tan ni// lo legs 'bru lajungs me
318a7(rnying rgyud): rnams dang // nad dang mu ge'i bskal pa chad// tshe ring nad med bkra shis pa'o// de ltar gyur na 'jig rten bde// de yis bcos pa rab tu gces// ma bcos pa yi sngon bstan pa// ma bcos 'jig rten lha 'dre 'khrug/ nad dang
318b1(rnying rgyud): bya/ na du // bams sa gas nan /
318b2(rnying rgyud): sa
318b3(rnying rgyud): sa / pa nas na // / 'angs pa sa/
318b4(rnying rgyud): sa ma sa ma ma pa na sa sathas pa pa rnams pa ngas da
318b5(rnying rgyud): rnamapa ma ldan das kyis pa da mi gas pa'a'abor rnams pa de na mags san// rjo ma tha~Md na khyes sa tha sa / gan
318b6(rnying rgyud): bcu gsum pa'o// /
318b7(rnying rgyud): su sa /
319a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ rgyag // dang / A ba phul thab sham hA s+ya dz+nyAn/ bdad da du/ 'dags pa yangs pa'i grong gyur du dzag pa'i mad man pa/ sangs rgyas dang thung chub sems dpa' thams cad la khrug sartsam la// 'di sad bdag gis thos pa ngas gcigan/ yo na
319a2(rnying rgyud): 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na/ gzings pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer ga la bar 'dong ngo // btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ngas
319a3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das hral li bri dzar chu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du byan nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer kyi a s+tha bsrung ba'i tshal na pa zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ ban ga
319a4(rnying rgyud): po langs pa'i grong khyer du song la byin nas sgo'i thim pa la nang bzhog ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag lbos shig/ bi sa ra ta/ di sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sar ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la khrugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
319a5(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyibs mas pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyi bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyi bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyi bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyi bsams pa/ chos kyi bsams pa/ tshangs pa'i sangs
319a6(rnying rgyud): pa/ tshangs pa so so'i bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi bsams pa/ dbang po'i bsams pa/ lha'i bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyibasams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pa'i bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/
319a7(rnying rgyud): bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ mu N+yata/ muSh+ya ta/ ma 'dug cig yams kyi nad rnam par zhing gyur cig/ ni nats+tsha ta/ ne gan+da ta/ nig ts+tsha ta/ nin ts+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po/ lha'i
319b1(rnying rgyud): pang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shing / dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten spang ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ang / lha 'bum phrag du mdag dang /
319b2(rnying rgyud): ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed rnams la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ nIn ts+tsha tra/
319b3(rnying rgyud): ni gats+tsha ta/ ni gats+tsha ta/ nin ts+tshata/ myur du byer cig/ khyed cag las gang sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni lung bar gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la/ srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig/ lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig
319b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas 'jig rten la khrugs brje pa can gyis bka' stsal ba/ su mu su mu su mu su mra/ su mu ru su mra rba/ su mu ru/ su mra drA/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mur+ra/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu r+ra/ mu ru/ mu ru/ su ru/ swar+Ya/ sur+Ya/ mur+ra/ mu ru/ mi ri mi ri mo ma
319b5(rnying rgyud): ri mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ sU ru/ ri mi/ mu ru/ ri mi/ mu ru/ ri mi/ mu ru/ ri mi/ mu rba/ mi re/ mu ru/ ri mi/ mur+ra/ ri mi/ mu ru/ ri me/ mu ru/ ri mi/ su ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mi rU ri te/ ri ri re ri re ri/ rI nId+hi
319b6(rnying rgyud): rI/ tI mi ri/ mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri mi ri mi re/ mi ri ti/ ha si mi ri ti/ mI ri ti/ mi te/ si sI simI/ kaM ka ra/ kaM ka ra ta/ kaM kA ra/ kaM karaH/ kaM ka rA/ kai ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kr-i ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaMka
319b7(rnying rgyud): rA/ kaM kaR+Sha/ kaM kaR+Sha/ kai ka rA/ kaM kaR+Sha/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM kar ti te/ ku ri sho ka ka rA/ kaM ka ri shai/ ri ri ri ri / ti ri ti prasa?/ ri Ta ri Te/ ri gu pa/ r-i dza risa?/ re ring / nany+dza/ nAn ShAH/ ri Ta ri pra/ nASh+Tar+tha/ nirbats+tsha ta/ ri bu'i bu/ nin ts+tsha/
320a1(rnying rgyud): te/ pA la ya ta/ raM phu ra phu/ pA la ya ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs partsob can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/ thams pal gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/
320a2(rnying rgyud): btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyi/ kI pr-i na ni rgats+tsha ta swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang chos nyid kyis/ lha thams cad dang 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o// gang la ser sna
320a3(rnying rgyud): rnam chags pa// nam 'joms dri ma med mdzad cing // thugs zhiganod pa mi mnga'ades// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing // chos rnams thams cad ston pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/
320a4(rnying rgyud): ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// slob pa gang zhig byams pa yi// thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs des// khyed la bde legs
320a5(rnying rgyud): mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing // gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsang zhing bslub mi mnga' la// gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa
320a6(rnying rgyud): des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa// phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing // don grub tshogs kyang grub pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes pa'i sa rnams ni// nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing //
320a7(rnying rgyud): sems can thams cad rab dag 'des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// byang chub snying por gshegs pa na// sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing // bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na// 'phags
320b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i bden pa rnams gsung ba// thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// yid 'phrog gang gis su skyugs byed// thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing // chags kun dbang du mdzad pangs// khyed la bde lags mdzod par 'jur// spangs/
320b2(rnying rgyud): rgyas chos la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang // dbyung po kun gyi bde legs ni// khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang // lha rnams kyi ni bsams pa yis// khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring
320b3(rnying rgyud): grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog/ phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs// nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shing // khyed cag kun tu
320b4(rnying rgyud): bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis// yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis// sdang sems ldan pa rnams byed cig/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // dgra bcom
320b5(rnying rgyud): slob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'dir ni stong gyur cig/ sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun// bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nad rnams med par shog/ kun gyis
320b6(rnying rgyud): bzang rnams mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te// sa dang bar snang dag na gnas pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ de skad ces bka' stsal
320b7(rnying rgyud): nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ btsun pa de bzhin gagyi'o zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste/ sgo'i thim pa la rkang pa bzhag nas/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di
321a1(rnying rgyud): drag kyang smras so// bos ra// bai swA ta/ bos rang/ bos data/ sangs rgyas 'jog ton lathugs bcob can thos bka' sul to// sangs rgyas thams cad gra gangs pa rang sangs rgyas thams
321a2(rnying rgyud): bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyi bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyi bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyi bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyi bsams pa/ chos kyi bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/
321a3(rnying rgyud): gams pa/ 'dadapa rlung thug gabyasasas pa/ dbang pa 'asangs pa/ ba ra pa/ yin gyi sa ming / snyi mems sung pa/ rgyas bye ga ga pa ba das zung
321a4(rnying rgyud): cad kyi bsams pa/ bi sar ta/ bi sa ra twaM/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brje ba can gyis bka' stsal to// mun+ya ta/ mr-i n+tata/ yams kyi nad thams cad zhib gyur cig/ ni N+Do ta/ hrI dz+dza ta/ rjen sa/ na
321a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shing dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten myong ba ba'i thangag
321a6(rnying rgyud): lha stong phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams sam/ lha ma yin stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung ngo brgya stong mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ong ste/ de dag khyed la gnod pa chen po byed par
321a7(rnying rgyud): gyis/ nin ts+tshata/ nIn ts+tshaH/ nits+tsha ta/ nir+thats+tshata/ skyur du byer cig/ khyed cag las gang dag spang ba'i sems dang ldad pa de dag ni lung bar gyur ga/ gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod lo/ srung bar 'jug par 'ang
321b1(rnying rgyud): dad mnanam// rdzas pa 'ang badrag par tsan na// sna la smon gas ba sa da/ la/ bsan/ ba dz+ra k+Sha/ prazlas pAg+saH/ swAm+ba/ bAstu/ phan/ sa pa dang / bdud
321b2(rnying rgyud): sa/ mun/ zlas s+ya na// ma// / rnamos// ma/ mum 'aM/
321b3(rnying rgyud): 'aris/ ma/ ma k+Shesakla/ pa kr-i// k+Sha/ krA/
321b4(rnying rgyud): kAn/ kaMkaN// // kar+Na/ kar+tha/ dzin nI/ ni// /
321b5(rnying rgyud): rnamapa hU~M/ / la / nIH/ phyul / sangs rgyas 'jig rten lagrags parje camam thams cadapa na pa byug par dgo sa pa dang ldanapa/ gas pA la ldan sa pa/
321b6(rnying rgyud): napa/ dga' nga la gnas pa/ brtad rnams pa gnas pa gshegs kyi/ r+the ni hU~M b+h+yaH/ sangs rgyas kyimatshug dang / chos thamams cad dang 'byung ba thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gas sngags kyig ni 'di ba 'i thub pa'o//
321b7(rnying rgyud): tshigs gru bcar pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o// gang la ser snga rnam chags pa// rnam 'joms dri ma med mdzod byeng // thugs ni gnod pa mi mang 'dres// byed la ba de legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du 'dzud ma
322a1(rnying rgyud): chos rnams thams cad ston pa des// khyed la 'de legs mdzad par 'gyur// ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/
322a2(rnying rgyud): skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi// thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi rton gyur cing // gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa dros/
322a3(rnying rgyud): la bde leg mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsang zhing bsrub mi mda' la// gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des// khyed la 'de legs mdzad par 'gyur// dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa// phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur
322a4(rnying rgyud): cing // don grub tshogs kyang grub pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes pa'i sa rnams ni// nags tshal bcas pa rab g.yos shing // sems can thams cad rang dag 'des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// byang
322a5(rnying rgyud): chub snying por gshegs pa na// sa dag rnam drug g.yos sgyur cing // bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gsung ba// thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung
322a6(rnying rgyud): des// khyed la 'de legs mdzad par 'gyur// yid 'phrog grang gis mu stegs byed// thams cad chos kyis 'pham mdzad cing // tshogs kun dbang du mdzad ba des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos la bde legs
322a7(rnying rgyud): mdzad// bad+ma byin lhar bcas 'de legs dang // 'byung do kun gyi bde legs ni// khyed la rtag tu sbyi dbyang cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu ngag dang // lha rnams kyi ni bsams pa yis// khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring
322b1(rnying rgyud): thub cig/ rkad gnyis kyang drug pa myigs shog/ nang ba'i byed cag pa de legs nos/ byed cag sum 'tha ba na legs nog/ khyor sngog dag kyang 'de legs shig/ rkyen ma 'di lags ma can pa de legs/ nyes 'ang ba dang /
322b2(rnying rgyud): legs shing // khyed cag rtag tu 'de legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis// yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad cing // sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig/ zhing rje'i 'dag nyid cad rnams
322b3(rnying rgyud): 'khod// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'dir ni snong gyur cig/ sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag
322b4(rnying rgyud): kun// bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nad rnams med par shog/ kun gyis bzad rnams mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur te// sa dang kar snang dag la gnas pa
322b5(rnying rgyud): rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog// nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyad gyur cig/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ret+na bo d+hi dang / mi ts+tsha ga darda ye shes
322b6(rnying rgyud): rjes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab // / shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// lha yi bkra shis don grub cing // phyogs rnams bkra shis byed pa des// khyed kyi don rnams grur gyur
322b7(rnying rgyud): cig/ thams cad myur du mthun par shog/ phreng sa mgo la 'dug pasgyur// lag pag pas na dpal yong gos// g.yon na 'ang dpa la ni gnas byar cig/ yan gakun la'ang dpal yo sho// tshe de dag ni do// phyogs
323a1(rnying rgyud): dag tu 'gro ba rnams// rnyed pa chen po rnyed gyur cig/ de dag bdab skyid par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir// shar phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag sgrogs der gnas pa yi// rgyu skar sbed la skyong gyur cig/
323a2(rnying rgyud): smin drug dang ni snar ma dang // mag dang lag dang nab so dang // rgyal dang skag ces bya ba ste// de dag rnams ni shar phyogs pa// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa// shar phyogs logs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyed la kun
323a3(rnying rgyud): tu srungs// de dag bdag po rgyal po ni// yul 'khor srung zhes glags pa ste// de ni dri za kun gyi bdag/ nyi ma lhan cig srung bar shog/ de la bu ni mang yod la// mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste// dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang /
323a4(rnying rgyud): dngang ngo zhes bya stobs po che// de rnams khyed la nad med cing // shis pa lhag par khyod gyur cig/ shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// lha mo gzhon nu brgyud yod de// rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang // don grub ma dang mi 'pham dang // dga'
323a5(rnying rgyud): chog ma dang dga' bde dang // dga' can ma dang dga' 'phel ma// de dag khyed la nad med cing // shis pa lhag par skyod gyur cig/ shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// gzhi 'dzin ces bya'i mchod rten yod// rgyal ba skyob pa dgra
323a6(rnying rgyud): bcom pa// de rnams kyis ni bzhugs shing mkhyen// de yang khyed la nad med cing // shis pa lhag par skyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas//
323a7(rnying rgyud): nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir// lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi// rgyu skar khyed la skyod gyur cig/ mchu dang gre dang po dang ni// me bzhin gang lnga pa yin// sa ri dang ni sa gaste//
323b1(rnying rgyud): de dag rnams ni lho phyogs pa// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa// lho phyogs logs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyed la kun tu srungs// de dag bdag po rgyal po ni// 'phags gyes po zhes bya bar brjod// de ni bral
323b2(rnying rgyud): bum kun gyi bdag/ gshin rje lhan cig srung bar shog/ de la bu ni mang yod la// mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste// dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang // dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// de rnams khyed la nad med cing // shis pa lhag phar sbyong
323b3(rnying rgyud): gyur cig/ lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// lha mo gzhon nub rgyad yod de// dpal ldan ma dang grags ldan ma// grags pa thob dang grags 'dzin ma// legs par langs dang rab snga dang // legs par sad dang bde sbub ma// de dag ce
323b4(rnying rgyud): la nad med cing // shis pa lhag par skyong bar shog/ lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// pad+ma zhes bya'i mchod rten yod// rtag tu gzi brjid kyis kyang 'bar// rtag tu thams cad gsal bar byed// de yang khyed la nad med cing // shis pa lhag par
323b5(rnying rgyud): gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir// nub phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas
323b6(rnying rgyud): pa yi// chu skur khyed la spyod gyur cig/ lha mtshams dang ni snron dang yang // brtson 'grus brten ldan sbubs dang ni// chu stod chu smad phyi bzhin dang // gro bzhin de ni bdun pa yin// rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten sbyor ba
323b7(rnying rgyud): ldan pa// nibaphyogs logs ni yod ces bstan// de dag byed la kun tu sbyangs// de dag padag po rgyal khoni// mig mi bzeng zhes byang shes// de ni kurnams kun gyi 'dag/ sgra lhan cig srung bar shog/ de bu ni mang yod pa/
324a1(rnying rgyud): mkhas shing ming yang mthun pak+Sh+ma// dgu brgyartsa gcig zad par yang // dpung po zhes bya stobs po che// de dag khyed la nad med cing // shis pa lhag par spong gyur cig/ nu rdzogs logs kyi phyogs
324a2(rnying rgyud): chen// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de// rna cha sram bregs ma dang ni// bad+ma dkar dang skya rong dang // cha med gcig dang dgu pa dang // rol dang gnag dang stabs myur srid// de dag khyed le nad med cing / shes pa lhag par myong bar
324a3(rnying rgyud): sho/ nI phyogs logs kyi phyogs chen// rlung ces bya ba'i ribo yod// nyi ma thab gnyis ka'ang nug// nung pa'ang khyed la nor sbyin 'gyur// de yang byed la nad med cing // shis pa lhag par pyong ltar cig/ phyogs na khyed cag 'debar
324a4(rnying rgyud): shog/ khyod cag sdig par 'gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab 'asrungs nas// nor rnams ting nge ldog par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi myir// byang phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yo// rgyu smra khyer
324a5(rnying rgyud): la myong gyur cig/ mon gru dang ni mon gre dang // khums stod dang ni khrums smad dang // nam gru dang ni tha skar dang // pra nye dang ni bdun pa yin// rgyu ga bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa// byang phyogs
324a6(rnying rgyud): ldogs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyed la kun tu lungs// de dag bdag po rgyal po ni// mi la zhon pa lus ngan po// gnod sbyin kun gyi bdag po ste// nor bzang lhan cigasrung ba shog/ dal bu ni ming yong la// mkhas
324a7(rnying rgyud): shing ming yang mthun pa ste// dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang // dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// de dag khyed la nad med cing // shes pa lhag par sbyor phyir cig/ byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad
324b1(rnying rgyud): yod// rabs rgyags lha mostong sum// sa dang bzhin pardzurgyun// rgyag bachal nya gnas dang // de dang khri yod dpa la ldanas// de dag byed la nad med cing // shes pa lhag par sbyong bar shog// byang rgyags logs/
324b2(rnying rgyud): kyi phyogs chen// spos dang ldan pa'i ri bo yod// gnod sbyin 'byung po kun gyi gnas// rtse mo sna tshogs bstan sdug/ de yang khyed la nad med cing // shis balhag par myong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar bshog
324b3(rnying rgyud): khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/ chug nyi shu rtsa ba chang po// phyogs bzhi dag na bdun btsun gnas// lha yi bu mo sam na gnyis// phyogs bzhi dgan
324b4(rnying rgyud): brgyad gnas// dge sbyong brgyad dang bram ze ba rgyad// thal rnam snyan ni slong nga la bcad// dbyung por rab cas pa'i zhab cing rnams// de dag byed la kun tu srung // khyed cag dzin 'dabakra shes gyur// sdig pa na rang bag kyis
324b5(rnying rgyud): gis shis/ sa du gi na// de nas ng+gA sbyi ma na nga/ ngas rgyam pa ga nyid / shAs pa / tshogs
324b6(rnying rgyud): 'di / du sa sa/ khyod rgya rgyu par g+sa/ rdzun
324b7(rnying rgyud): de'i 'i na/ shes pa chung chags ci rdzogs sa// ga sa du/ TIg tam nu la sgrug/ 'das dadu/ de bzhin gshegs pa pa ba gra shis kyi chags su sa/ de ni ni mtshig gi
325a1(rnying rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan// zla bany+dza 'dra'i sgra mnga' srid pa'i mthar phyin pa// dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bgra
325a2(rnying rgyud): des ni skye dbu rnams la zhi byed shog/ ma 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gti mug rnam sbyong ba// mgon po yon tan thams cad chags pa'i bkra shis pa// dge mnyam bsam sems ldan pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dag
325a3(rnying rgyud): zhi byed shog/ sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan mdzad pa// yang dag bden pa'i 'byor pa sbyin mdzad mi bslab// rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dag rnams la zhi byed shog
325a4(rnying rgyud): ti 'dzin dam pa pha rol phyin pa'i gnas// ye shes pad+ma'i steng bzhugs dpag med tshe ldan zhing // tshe grangs med par byin gyis brlabs pa'i bkra shis gang // bkra shes des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byi de shog/ sems can de
325a5(rnying rgyud): mas la thugs ni sbyor mdzad cing // 'gro ba kun gyi 'ching ba'i bcings las grol mdzad pa// thub mchog don yod grub kyi bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhe byed shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ba
325a6(rnying rgyud): tshogs zla bcad pa rdzogs so// / dam pa tog dkar dga' ldan pho brang dam pa rba// mi pham mgon la rgyal tshab dam par dbang bkur zhing // 'dzi gling nyid dri grang chen rnga la kA ra ltar gshegs gang // bkra shis dam
325a7(rnying rgyud): kyang de ding bde legs shog/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dam par zas gcor sras// / bud med skyon bral g.yo sgyu spangs pa lha mdzes yum// lums su rlung cur rdo rjes rdzan pa shAkya'i rigs// bkra shis dam pa des kyang
325b1(rnying rgyud): deng 'dir bde legs shog/ lum pa'i tshal ni dben zhing nyams dga' ba la sha'i// yal gnas bzung bltams kyun tshangs dang brgya byin 'dud// mkha' la gshegs te phyogs bcur pad ma byung gyur gang // bkra shis dam pa de
325b2(rnying rgyud): kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ gzhal med khang mdzes drang srong dam pa'i mdun bzhag nas// mtshan lhas shis pa brjod de ston pa 'byung gyur pa// shA ka rigs bud med 'khor ldan kun 'dus brdzun btags gang // bkra shis dam pa
325b3(rnying rgyud): des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ gzhon nu'i stobs ni spyi rtsal yig rdzis 'phong las ni// kun las mthar byung lha mi la sogs kun pas mchog/ shA kya'i rigs 'khrungs log rtog bsal gyir btsun mo'i 'khor// bkra shis dam la
325b4(rnying rgyud): kyang ded 'dir bde legs shog/ pho brang nas byung rga nad 'chi ba las byung gzigs// mi rnams rmongs mdzad lha yi mdun bdar mkha' la ni// srid gsum dag las brgal phyir mthon mthing dbu spu bregs// bkra shis dam pa des kyang nge
325b5(rnying rgyud): 'dir bde legs shog/ lha rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags ngur smrigs gos rnams phul// na ra dza ra'i chu bor dka' thub ma lus rdzogs// thub pa bsam gtan nus bzhengs bkra shis ngo thug gsol// bkra shis dam bA des kyang deng 'di
325b6(rnying rgyud): bde legs shog/ pad mo las byung khru mchog byang chub shing zung ngu// skyil mo krung bcas mi g.yo mchog gis babung btul nas// thor ngas bdud rtsi mi 'gyur phun tshogs sangs rgyas pa// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir 'di legs
325b7(rnying rgyud): shog/ ba ra NA sIr chos kyi 'khor lo mgon pos bskor// kun shes la sogs bden bzhi lnga sde bzang la bstan// lha gru lha min la sogs mi min bdud gyur gang // bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shong // nga rgyal bsnyems
326a1(rnying rgyud): pang ldan pa'i ston pa drug brtul zhing // glang chen rab myos mi bzang lhas byin gyis rbad btul// drang srong mchog la spre'u tshul cang shes spang rtsis mchod// dgra shes 'di
326a2(rnying rgyud): gzhon nu wAlha'i mtshan ldan shAkya'i rigs// zas gtsang las sa rgyal rigs 'khor los sgyur rgyal bltams// bltams pa nas bzungs pa'i tshal du ma lus rdzogs// bkra shis dam pa des kyang dang 'dir pa de lags dog
326a3(rnying rgyud): stobs kyis 'gro ba ma lus sgrol mdzad cing // sems can mtha' yas zhi ba de'i lam la rab bkod nas// zong khyer rtswa mchog dam par dgongs pa yongs rdzogs pang // bkra shis dam pa des kyang de 'chi bde legs shog/
326a4(rnying rgyud): tsam ldan dpa par gzigs ni rgya la gas ga ba / la rgya khri'i du 'grong khye ti na/ bal dag mngon par sangs rgyas pa// de 'di dang ga
326a5(rnying rgyud): gtsug tor mnga' ba rgyal rigs rdzu 'phrul can// cho lo bdun khri'i dus na ka ni grong khyer ru// shing mchog sin 'da'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// der 'dir bde gshegs bkra shas phun sum tshogs gyung cag/ rgyal ba
326a6(rnying rgyud): nga skyob pa rgyal rigs blo gros can// tshe lo drug khri'i dus na grong khyer mnyam med du// shing mchog sA la'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun du ma tshogs gyur cig/ thub pa 'khor ba 'ja
326a7(rnying rgyud): ni stoms ldan bram po'i rigs// tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na grong khyer ba ldan du// shing sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs byas pa// der 'dir bde gshegs pakra shes phun sum tshogs krung rtsig/ 'dzin pa gzar thub bslab pa mthag ldan pa
326b1(rnying rgyud): bong rigs// tshe lo sum khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du// u dum 'bar ba'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ spobs pa 'od srungs rgyal rigs pa med yon tan can//
326b2(rnying rgyud): tshelo nyi khri'i dus na grong khyer ba ra NA s+thi// n+ya kro d+ha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ 'gro mgon shAkya thub pa rgyal rigs brtson 'grus can// tsha lo ba rgya ba'i dus na
326b3(rnying rgyud): ser skya'i grong khyer du// a sho ta yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig// phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra// 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po
326b4(rnying rgyud): ma gsum spangs pa// sangs rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba// bkra shis des ni skye dku'i 'i byed dang po'o// de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba// 'jig rten gsam na grags shing lha dang mis mdzod
326b5(rnying rgyud): pa// chos mchog dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa// 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o// dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan zos pa'i bkra shis phyug/ mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas// tshogs kyi
326b6(rnying rgyud): mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi zhing // 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o// che ba'i tshe mchog ston mchog bla na med// chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyis// bgegs dang bdud rigs gnod pa'i dgra zhi ste/
326b7(rnying rgyud): rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ chos nyid ldan pa'i chos mchog bla na med// dam chos bdud rtsi'i bden pa'i byin rlangs kyis// nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba'i dgra zhi ste// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis
327a1(rnying rgyud): shog/ dge 'dun yon tan rin chen dpal 'bar ba// rgyal sras phan mdzad bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis// nyes pa'i skyon zhi dge tshogs rnam par 'phel//
327a2(rnying rgyud): rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ tshangs dang lha dbang srung ma'i byin rlabs kyis// phan mdzad lha yi bkra shrIs gnas gyur te// bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin
327a3(rnying rgyud): grub pa dang // tshe ring nad med bde skyid ldan par shog// oM swa sti/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas gtsol yon tan mchog mnga' zhing //
327a4(rnying rgyud): che dgus mchod cing smon lam smin tshogs 'dus// go 'phang ston pa chos kyi char 'bebs pa// bkra shis des kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ skyob pa'i chos la legs pa'i
327a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs mnga' zhing // shin tu phan dang bde dang nges gsungs pa// 'khor ba rtag bde mya ngan med 'thob pa'i// bkra shis des kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ dge 'dun rtsa
327a6(rnying rgyud): la mthu rtsal rmad mnga' zhing // bslab gzhi legs bcas brtson pa'i rnal 'byor can// bdag gzhan don chen sgrub pa'i lam zhugs pa// bkra shis des kyang skye dgu rnams
327a7(rnying rgyud): byung na/ dan/
